[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/phal chen kha ba bzhugs so//
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@##/_/sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po dang po'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba 
[\[1b.2\]]sangs rgyas thams cad la yang dag par bskyed pa zhes bya ba gsum pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[1b.3\]]kyi yongs su bsngo ba la yang rjes su slob bo/_/ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba la'ang rjes su slob bo/_/da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs su 
[\[1b.4\]]bsngo ba la'ang rjes su slob bo/_/de byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_mi mthun pa ma yin zhing yid du 'ong ba'am/_mi mthun pa ma yin zhing yid du 'ong bar reg pa'am/_mi mthun pa ma yin 
[\[1b.5\]]zhing yid du 'ong ba'i chos sam/_mi mthun pa ma yin zhing kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnam par dag pa/_dge ba yangs pa/_'od gsal ba/_gang gis yid dga' ba skye zhing bde bar 'gyur ba/_dang ba skye ba/_
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]dga' ba skye ba/_rab tu dga' bar gnas pa/_spro ba rab tu 'byung ba yid mi bde ba rnam par bzlog pa/_sems bde bar 'gyur ba/_nyams dga' bar 'gyur ba/_bsam pa 'jam par 'gyur ba dang /_dbang po sim par 'gyur ba'i 
[\[2a.2\]]gzugs gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad mthong bar gyur te/_de bde ba'i 'du shes de dag mthong ba'i tshe/_'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_bdag gi bde ba yongs su bsngo ba 'dis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa'i bde ba bsam 
[\[2a.3\]]gyis mi khyab pa dang /_phyi phyir zhing yang ldan par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba mtshungs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yang dag par gzung bar gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje chen po'i bde ba mtha' yas pa phyir zhing yang shin tu brtan par gyur cig_
[\[2a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar ba'i bde ba tshad med pa dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pas shin tu gzung bar gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i bde ba rnyed par dka' bas shin tu khyab par gyur cig_/sangs 
[\[2a.5\]]rgyas kyi stobs kyi bde ba tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pas shin tu bde bar gyur cig_/tshor ba thams cad zhi zhing skye ba med pa'i bde bas 'gyur ba med par bde bar gyur cig_/chags pa med par gnas pa rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba gnyis su med cing 
[\[2a.6\]]yang dag par spyod pas 'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i bde bar gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yongs su bsngos nas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su bsngo ba byed de/_
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]'di ltar bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa rnams yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs 
[\[2b.2\]]par bya ba dang /_byang chub kyi sems rdo rje lta bu shin tu brtan par bya ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i go ca phyir mi ldog pa rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba dang /_byang chub tu gzhol ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsrung ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i byang chub kyi sems 
[\[2b.3\]]bskyed pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par spyod pa thob par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa shin tu rno bar bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[2b.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du thug par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste/_de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don du yongs su bsngo'o/_/de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu na se gol gtogs pa tsam du sangs rgyas zhi ba'i sgra thos sam/_chos 
[\[2b.5\]]nyan tam/_'phags pa'i dge 'dun bsnyen bkur byed dam/_gang ci yang rung ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la bar chad med par yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yongs su rdzogs par yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos rjes su dran pa rab tu sbyor 
[\[2b.6\]]bar yongs su bsngo'o/_/'phags pa'i dge 'dun rim gro bya bar yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems rnam par dag par yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par yongs su bsngo'o/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[2b.7\]]ba'i yon tan la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/mngon par shes pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi the tsom rnam par bstsal ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/ji ltar nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnam par dag pa 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]bstan pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la yongs su bsngo ba de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'ang yongs su bsngo ste/_'di ltar sems can dmyal ba'i lam rnam par bzlog pa'i 
[\[3a.2\]]phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/byol song gi skye gnas rgyun gcad pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten rtsa ba nas 'chad pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/ngan song gi rgyud thams cad ma lus par rgyun gcad pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can de dag thams 
[\[3a.3\]]cad kyang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i byang chub tu mos shing phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/lhag pa'i bsam pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mi spang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/
[\[3a.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa shin tu bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad ye shes mtha' yas pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[3a.5\]]dpa' ni dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yang rung ste/_byang chub tu [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang ma bral ba'i sems dang /_thams cad mkhyen par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa la brtson pa'i yid la byed pa dang /_bdag gdul ba dang pha rol gdul ba la gzhol ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_bdag dang gzhan yongs 
[\[3a.6\]]su smyin par sbyor ba'i thabs mkhas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul dang ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang bas yongs su smin par byed pa'i rnam par thar ba dang /_sems bskyed pa gnas pa med pa dang /_'grogs pa'i mnyam par gzhag pa dang /_sngon snying rje chen po bskyed pas khyim 
[\[3a.7\]]na gnas pa dang /_byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas rang gi chung ma'i rjes su 'brang ba dang /_sbyor ba nyams pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam shin tu rnam par dag pas brtson pa dang /_yang dag par brtson pa dang /_sgrub pa dang /_yang dag par sgrub pa dang /_
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]skyed pa dang yang dag par skyed pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chen pos yang dag par sdud pa dang /_grub par byed pa dang /_rgya cher byed pa dang /_yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_khyim na gnas pa dang /_bu dang 'grogs shing gnas pa na 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_byang 
[\[3b.2\]]chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas pa'i tshe gang ci yang rung ste/_gos dang zas dang mal stan dang /_nad kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad dang 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang /_spyod pa dang ldan pa dang /_stan pa dang /_skye mched 'byung ba'i las dang /_spyod lam la gnas pa dang /_spyod lam 
[\[3b.3\]]brtul ba dang /_lus dang ngag gi las spyod pa dang /_dbang po drug bsdams pa dang /_rang gi lus phyi ba dang /_mnye ba dang /_khrus byed pa dang /_zos pa dang /_'thungs pa dang /_'chos pa dang /_myangs pa dang /_brkyang ba dang /_brkum pa dang /_lta ba dang /_kun 
[\[3b.4\]]tu lta ba dang /_log pa dang /_sad pa dang /_rang gi lus brten par bya ba/_de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa la brtson pa/_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde bar sems pa/_
[\[3b.5\]]byang chub tu smon lam tshad med pa btab pa sems tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po yongs su sdud pa/_'gro ba thams cad bskyab par brtson pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba la rtag tu brtson pa/_rlom pa dang bag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnam par bzlog pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos nyid 
[\[3b.6\]]la rab tu brten pa/_rnam par shes pa dang sems bskyed pa dang /_yid la byed pa gzhan med pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub la mngon par gnas pa nyon mongs pa'i phyogs thams cad las phyir phyogs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa la slob pa'i 
[\[3b.7\]]sems dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam nyams pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ye shes kyis la rten pa/_bstan pa'i gnas dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i rtsa bas shes rab che ba/_bung ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs chen po [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa/_'gro ba thams cad las rgyud shin tu 'phags pa/_'du byed 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]la mngon par zhen pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdams ngag 'thun par 'dzin pas/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ma bsngos pa gang yang med de/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim na gnas pa'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de 
[\[4a.2\]]dag yang dag pa sdud cing sgrub bo/_/yongs su bsngo ste de ltar de chung ngu na khyi'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /_de ma yin pa'i byol song gi rigs su gtogs pa la zas sna 'ga' 'am/_kham 'ga' yongs su gtong ba byed kyang de thams cad de dag nyid la phan pa dang /_de dag nyid la 
[\[4a.3\]]bde ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas de dag sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho de dag dang /_sdug bsngal gyi rgyud de dag dang /_sdug bsngal gyi phung po de dag dang /_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag dang /_sdug bsngal gyi bstsags pa de dag dang /_sdug bsngal mngon par 'du byed pa de dag 
[\[4a.4\]]dang /_sdug bsngal gyi gter de dag dang /_sdug bsngal gyi rtsa ba de dag dang /_sdug bsngal gyi skye mched de dag nas sems can de dag yongs su sgrol zhing rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/de la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas sems can thams cad mngon du byed do/_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par 
[\[4a.5\]]byed do/_yid la byed do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang de dag la yang sngon du 'gro bar byed do/_/'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo'o/_/byang chub tu sems bskyed pas yongs su 'dzin to/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la nye bar 'jog go_/'khor ba'i dgon pa las rnam 
[\[4a.6\]]par bzlog go_/sangs rgyas kyi bde ba bsgribs pa med pa yang mngon du byed do/_/'khor ba'i rgyud las 'byin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos la brtson pa'i byams pas kyang yongs su rgyas par byed do/_/snying rje chen pos kyang de dag la snying brtse bar byed de/_bde ba rnam par 
[\[4a.7\]]dag pa yang de dag la yongs su bsngo'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir yang rab tu 'jug ste/_de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos la nye bar sdud do_/de dag bdud kyi yul las rnam par bzlog go/_/de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug par byed do/_/
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]de dag 'jig rten kyi rgyud thams cad las gyen du skyod par byed do/_/de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs la yang dag par bsgrub par byed do/_/de dag dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gzhog ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci yang rung ste/_
[\[4b.2\]]yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang /_yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_'di snyam du sems ba med de/_ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing sangs rgyas la rim gro mdzad pa'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_
[\[4b.3\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa la brtson par mdzad pa'i tshe/_gzugs la gnas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_tshor ba la mngon par ma chags pa dang /_'du shes kyi rnam pa phyin ci log med pa dang 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par shes pa mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[4b.4\]]pa dang /_skye mched drug las gyen du 'phags pa dang /_'jig rten gyi chos dang mi 'grogs pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das par yongs su bsngo ba dang /_nam mkha' lta bu'i chos 'byam klas pa rab tu mkhyen pa dang /_chos thams cad gnas med par rab tu rtogs pa dang /_chos 
[\[4b.5\]]thams cad ma skyes pas 'byung ba dang /_chos thams cad ma 'gags par gzigs pa dang /_mi bden pa'i chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa las gyen du 'phags pa dang /_chos thams cad mi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zhing bden par gzigs pa dang /_chos thams cad 'pho ba med pa la shin tu 
[\[4b.6\]]mos pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa la gnas pa dang /_chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid las shin tu 'phags pa dang /_chos de lta bu'i mtshan nyid can thams cad rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa dang /_sgo kun nas dge ba'i rtsa ba yang 
[\[4b.7\]]dag par bsgrub pa la brtson pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis gzigs pa thams cad la shin tu gzhol bas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos nyid de dag kho na la mos par bya ste/_chos de lta bu la brtson pa'i sems 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]bskyed pa/_chos thams cad dang mi 'gal ba/_sgyu ma lta bu'i chos las byung ba/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor dang chu zla lta bu'i rjes su song ba dang /_me long gi dkyil 'khor la gdong gi dkyil 'khor yod pa lta bu'i rgyud dang ldan pa'i las kyi mthu dang /_de bzhin 
[\[5a.2\]]gshegs pa'i sa'i mthar phyin par las kyi rgyu yongs su shes pas yongs su bsngo'o/_/zhes sems bskyed de/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rjes su slob cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/
[\[5a.3\]]'das pa rnams la ji lta ba de bzhin du ma byon pa dang /_de bzhin du da ltar byung ba dang /_de bzhin du 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba'i rjes su bslabs te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/
[\[5a.4\]]yang 'di ltar sems bskyed de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/zhes bya bar thugs su chud pa de lta bu'i bsngo ba rab dam pa mchog_/bla na med pa mnyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam 
[\[5a.5\]]pa/_'dra ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_mtshungs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gtso bor gyur pa/_thu bor gyur pa/_kun tu snyoms pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bdag nyid che ba shin tu yangs pa/_dge ba rnam par dag pa kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_brjod du med pas yongs su bsngo'o snyam du sems bskyed de/_
[\[5a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de ltar yongs su bsngo ba ni lus kyi las rnam par dag pas lus rnam par dag pa yin/_ngag gi las rnam par dag pas ngag rnam par dag pa yin/_yid kyi las rnam par dag pas yid rnam par dag pa yin/_kha na ma tho ba med pa la gnas pas 
[\[5a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa yin/_kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las dang ldan pas dge ba'i rtsa ba la brtson pa yin/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu brtson pas sems nyams pa med pa yin/_chos thams cad byed pa med pa la zhugs pas shin tu che ba la 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]gnas pa yin/_'jig rten gyi chos kyis ma gos pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang 'byor pa yin/_ye shes dang ldan pa'i mngon par shes pa'i las dang ldan pas las 'byam klas pa mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad rab tu shes pa yin/_gnas pa thams cad 
[\[5b.2\]]yang dag par bcom pas yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba gsum pa sangs rgyas thams cad la yang dag par bskyed pa zhes bya ba ste bsngo ba de la gnas pa'i sems dang ldan 
[\[5b.3\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las kyi zil dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa la zhugs pa yin/_ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i las dang ma bral ba yin/_thabs mkhas pa rnam 
[\[5b.4\]]par dpyod pa la mkhas pa yin/_chos kyi dbyings la rab tu zhugs pa yin/_byang chub sems dpas yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir/_mtshams sbyor ba la mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud du chud pa yin/_chos thams cad kyi rgyus 
[\[5b.5\]]mtha' dang dbus med pa la mkhas pas rab tu dbye bar khong du chud pa yin/_'jig rten du skye bar snang yang 'jig rten gyi chos kyis mi brjod pa yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par 
[\[5b.6\]]bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/de dag bsngo ba bslab pa bslabs pa ste/_/skyes bu'i gtso bo ji snyed 'das pa dang /_/gang dag ma byon gang dag bzhugs pa rnams/_/de dag spyod pa rjes su dpa' ba slob/_bde ba ji snyed gang dag rgyu ba dang /_/
[\[5b.7\]]skyes bu'i gtso bos gang dag rab bsngags pa/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]du 'ong zhing dag pa rgya chen rnams/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams la yongs su bsngo/_/lus kyi bde ba gang dag shes pa dang /_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]bde de bzhin rna ba'i bde ba dang /_/sna dang lce yi bde ba mtha' yas pa/_/de dag rgyal ba 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]kun la yongs su bsngo/_/'gro ba kun na dge ba gang yod pa/_/skyes bu 'dul bas thugs su chud pa rnams/_/de dag thams cad ma lus bsdu byas te/_/'jig rten phan phyir de la rjes su dga'/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa'i de la dgar byas nas/_/skyes 
[\[6a.2\]]bu'i seng ge'i bde ba gang mnga' ba/_/de 'dra'i bde dang 'gro ba ldan gyur ces/_/'gro ba kun la de dag bsngo ba byed/_/'jig rten dag na bde 'gyur gang yod pa/_/skyes bu dam pas thugs su chud pa rnams/_/bde ba de dang 'gro kun ldan 'gyur te/_/'jig rten sgron 
[\[6a.3\]]ma bzhin du kun gyur cig_/bde ba de dag yongs su bsngo byed kyang /_/mtshungs med rtag tu 'gro phan byed pa dag_/sems can phan par rtag tu zhugs pa rnams/_/yongs su bsngo bas rlom sems nam yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/de ltar de dag yongs su bsngo ba na/_/tshe rabs skyes bu 
[\[6a.4\]]seng ge ci 'dra ba/_/de 'dra'i dam par bsod nams 'di gyur cig_/snying rje chen pos sems kyang yongs su bskyed/_/'jig rten 'di na byang chub spyad spyod cing /_/'gro ba dag tu ji ltar las bsgrubs pas/_/rgyal bas ji ltar mkhyen pa mtshungs med pa'i/_/bde ba kun dang 
[\[6a.5\]]'bral bar ma gyur cig_/gang yang 'gro ba kun na yod pa yi/_/skye mched bsdams pa yang dag skyes pa rnams/_/ye shes dang gis bslab ba slabs pa dag_/skye dgu kun la phan phyir yongs su bsngo/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi rnams/_/gang yang 
[\[6a.6\]]rung ba'i lam la yod pa dag_/ye shes dang gis bslab bya bslabs pa rnams/_/gti mug [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yongs su bsngo ba byed/_/ji snyed de dag rab tu spyod pa rnams/_/rgyal sras rnams kyi yang dag bsdu bya ba/_/de ni mtshungs med rgyal ba'i rjes su byung /_/de dag zhi ba'i yid 
[\[6a.7\]]phyir yongs su bsngo/_/'jig rten thams cad ma lus bsdu byas te/_/'gro yangs 'di na ji snyed dge yod pa/_/bde ba de dang yongs su ldan pa'i phyir/_/de la de dag yongs su bsngo ba byed/_/bdag la bde ba nam yang mi tshol te/_/bde ba kun la'ang rtag par rab 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]tu zhugs/_/spros pa rnams la nam yang mos pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/bdag med chos la 'ang rtag par 'jug pa yin/_/rgyal ba kun gyis ji snyed gzigs pa yi/_/rgyal sras ji snyed yod pa de dag phyir/_/myur du ma lus sangs rgyas gyur cig ces/_/bsod nams de dag yongs su 
[\[6b.2\]]bsngo ba byed/_/bdag gis legs bstsags las ni gang yod pa/_/de yis 'jig rten ma lus thams cad kyi/_/lam rgyud 'gro bar gtogs pa'i sems can rnams/_/de dag ma lus mi yi gtsor gyur cig_/smon lam mang po ji snyed gang yod pa/_/mtshungs pa med pa'i 
[\[6b.3\]]rgyal bas bstan pa rnams/_/rgyal sras bsam pa yongs su grub gyur te/_/smon lam de dag rnam par dag gyur cig_/'jig rten ji snyed las kyis rnam bris pa/_/phyogs na yod pa thams cad mthong nas kyang /_/de dag yongs btsal bslab bya bslabs pa'i rnams/_/ma 
[\[6b.4\]]lus bsod nams thams cad yongs su bsngo/_/gnyis kyi chos kyis 'jal bar mi byed de/_/gnyis med chos ni de dag mngon par shes/_/gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]dang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la/_/rgyal sras de dag bsam pa mi rton to/_/'gro ba'i 'du shes rgyu ba ji snyed pa'i/_/ma lus 
[\[6b.5\]]'jig rten 'du shes 'jug byed kyang /_/'gro ba'i 'du shes rgyu ba rab rtogs pas/_/'du shes yod [{]myin [,]min [}]'du shes med mi 'gyur/_/de dag lus kyis yongs su dag gyur cig_/de dag yid kyang yongs su dag pa yin/_/de dag ngag gis shin tu bsdams byas shing /_/de dag 
[\[6b.6\]]yid kyis yongs su dag pa yin/_/de dag bde gshegs mya ngan 'das pa dran/_/ma byon sangs rgyas de dag rjes su sems/_/phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang /_/de dag rjes slob chos rnams ston pa byed/_/dus gsum rgyal ba ye shes mkhas pa 
[\[6b.7\]]rnams/_/chags pa med pa'i thugs kyis ji lta bur/_/byang chub don phyir phrin las bsgrub mdzad pa/_/de dag 'jig rten phan phyir yongs su bsngo/_/mchog gi blo dang tshul khrims ldan pa'i blo/_/bden pa'i blo dang gzhan du mi 'gyur blo/_/yang dag blo dang rnam par 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]dag pa'i blo/_/de 'dra'i blo yi dam pas yongs su bsngo/_/sangs rgyas thams cad la yang dag par bskyed pa zhes bya ba ste yongs su bsngo ba gsum pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 
[\[7a.2\]]yongs su bsngo ba bzhi pa thams cad du rjes su song ba zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba la brtson par byed pa'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_'di ltar yang dag pa'i 
[\[7a.3\]]mtha' thams cad rjes su song zhing dngos po thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang /_zhing thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang /_chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang /_nam mkha' thams cad 
[\[7a.4\]]kyi rjes su song ba dang /_dus gsum thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang /_spyod pa'i sgra thams cad kyi rjes su song ba de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad du 
[\[7a.5\]]rgyas par khyab par gyur cig_/'das pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba'i rgyur gyur cig_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur gyur cig_/da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i dbyings 
[\[7a.6\]]kyis klas pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa/_lha rdzas dang /_lha rdzas ma yin pa'i rim gro 'byam klas pa dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du gyur pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[7a.7\]]rgyan rnam par bkod pa'i rgyur gyur cig_/blo bdag nyid che ba la mos shing shin tu yangs pa'i don du bsgribs pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rgya cher yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad sems bskyed pas rgyas par gyur cig_/
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings 'byam klas pa la rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dang /_las gzhan dang gzhan gyis shin tu bsgrubs pa'i 
[\[7b.2\]]phyogs 'byam klas pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par rnam par rgyu ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khongs mtha' yas pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[7b.3\]]khams du ma dang /_'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs 'byam klas pa dang /_sa mtshams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor dang snrel zhir rgyu ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par grub pa dang /_spyi'u tshugs su rgyu ba'i phyogs kyi 'khor gyi rgyud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam 
[\[7b.4\]]klas pa dang /_sems kyi 'khor mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa shin tu bstan pa thams cad ma lus pa de dag na bzhugs shing 'tsho ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 'phrul pa dang /_cho 'phrul yang dag par ston pa dang /_byang 
[\[7b.5\]]chub sems dpa' de dag chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings su rtsa ba ma rnyed pa/_'gro ba thams cad yongs su gzung bar bsgrub pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par ston pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gzigs pa ye shes 
[\[7b.6\]]'byam klas pa'i mngon par shes pas thugs su chud pa/_rab tu brjod pa rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pas rab tu byung ba/_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi rjes su song ba tha mi dad pa'i chos kyi dbyings gzhi mnyam pa la rab tu zhugs pa/_
[\[7b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i lus su gcig pa/_chos thams cad kyis rab tu zhugs pa med pa/_'gro ba thams cad la yang dag par ston pas na phyir ldog pa med pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa thugs su chud pas 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa/_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis shin tu 'phags pa/_bsgribs pa med pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis phyir mi ldog pa/_sangs rgyas kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par byung ba'i phyir chags pa med par gzigs 
[\[8a.2\]]pa'i bdag nyid che ba can bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la me tog gam/_spos sam/_phreng ba 'am/_byug pa 'am/_gdugs sam/_rgyal mtshan nam/_ba dan 
[\[8a.3\]]nam/_rin po che'am/_me mar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'am/_mchod rten la 'ang rung ste/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa tshad med pas sbyar ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang bskyed kyang rung ste/_'khrug pa med pa'i sems dang rtse gcig tu gyur pa 
[\[8a.4\]]med pa'i sems dang /_g.yo ba med pa'i sems dang /_rmongs pa med pa'i sems dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sgul ba'i sems dang /_gnas med pa'i sems dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i sems dang /_srog med pa'i sems dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]g.yeng ba'i sems dang /_zhi ba'i sems su byas te/_
[\[8a.5\]]'di ltar yongs su bsngo zhing /_'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di chos kyi dbyings shin tu bstan pas 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub kyis 'dus pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]mang po dang /_tshig dang nges pa'i ngag mtha' yas pa dang /_dus tha dad par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i/_
[\[8a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad dang /_mtha' dang dbus med par shin tu bstan pa'i sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis rgyas pa dang /_chos 
[\[8a.7\]]kyi dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'byung gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /_chos kyi dbyings yongs su gang ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du dus ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par ston pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]de dag gi spos kyi gdugs tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/spos kyi rgyal mtshan tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/spos kyi ba dan tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/spos kyi gzhal med khang tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/spos 
[\[8b.2\]]kyi dra ba tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/spos kyi sku gzugs tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/spos kyi 'od tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/spos kyi 'od gzer tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/spos kyi sprin tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[8b.3\]]yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/spos kyi gdan tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/spos kyi 'chags tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/spos kyi gtsug lag khang tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/spos kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur 
[\[8b.4\]]cig_/spos kyi ri rab tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/spos kyi rgya mtsho tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/spos kyi chu glung tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/spos kyi shing tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/spos kyi na bza' tshad 
[\[8b.5\]]med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/spos kyi pad mo tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/spos kyi pho brang tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/me tog gi gdugs dpag tu med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya ba nas/_tshul de bzhin du me tog 
[\[8b.6\]]gi pho brang gi bar du dpag tu med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/phreng ba'i gdugs grangs med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya ba nas/_phreng ba'i pho brang gi bar du grangs med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/byug pa'i gdugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa 
[\[8b.7\]]yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya ba nas/_byug pa'i pho brang gi bar du bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/phye ma'i gdugs mtshungs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya ba nas/_phye ma'i pho brang gi bar du mtshungs pa med par 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/na bza'i gdugs kun tu mtha' yas pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya ba nas/_na bza'i pho brang gi bar du kun tu mtha' yas pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/rin po che'i gdugs kun tu 
[\[9a.2\]]mu med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya ba nas/_rin po che'i pho brang gi bar du kun tu mu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/mar me snang ba'i gdugs gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/ces bya ba nas/_mar me snang ba'i pho brang gi bar 
[\[9a.3\]]du gzhal du med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/lhab lhub kyi gdugs brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya ba nas/_lhab lhub kyi pho brang gi bar du brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/nor bu rin po che'i gdugs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 
[\[9a.4\]]yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya ba nas/_nor bu rin po che'i pho brang gi bar du brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig_/de bzhin du nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_nor bu rin po che'i ba dan dang /_nor bu rin po che'i bla re dang /_
[\[9a.5\]]nor bu rin po che'i dra ba dang /_nor bu rin po che'i sku gzugs dang /_nor bu rin po che'i 'od dang /_nor bu rin po che'i 'od gzer dang /_nor bu rin po che'i sprin dang /_nor bu rin po che'i gdan dang /_nor bu rin po che'i 'chags dang /_nor bu rin po che'i gtsug 
[\[9a.6\]]lag khang dang /_nor bu rin po che'i zhing dang /_nor bu rin po che'i ri rab dang /_nor bu rin po che'i rgya mtsho dang /_nor bu rin po che'i chu klung dang /_nor bu rin po che'i shing dang /_nor bu rin po che'i na bza' dang /_nor bu rin po che'i pad mo dang /_nor bu 
[\[9a.7\]]rin po che'i pho brang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa re re la yang grangs med pa'i rgyan rnams kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/grangs med pa'i gtsug lag khang dag kun nas gnas par gyur cig 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]grangs med pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/grangs med pa'i rta babs dag kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/grangs med pa'i zla gam dag kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/grangs med pa'i rin po che'i pu shu dag kyang kun nas gnas 
[\[9b.2\]]par gyur cig_/grangs med pa'i rin po che'i skar khung rnam pa tha dad pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che'i kha dog rnam par dag pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/grangs med pa'i rgyan rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa thams cad 
[\[9b.3\]]dang /_dpe med pa dag kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du ma lus par sangs rgyas kyi rim gro dang /_rgyan rnam pa 'di lta bus rnam par dag par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad ma lus par stobs bcu'i sar 'byung bar gyur 
[\[9b.4\]]cig_/sems can thams cad shes par bstan pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad ma lus pa la chos kyi snang ba bsgribs pa med pa skye bar gyur cig_/'gro ba thams cad gdul ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ma lus par yongs su bsngo bar gyur cig_/'pho ba med 
[\[9b.5\]]pa'i chos nyid du dus thams cad ma lus pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir nam mkha' dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang 'dra ba'i sems tshad med pas zhing thams cad yongs su rgyas par gyur cig_/'gro ba thams cad kyis sangs rgyas mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par bya 
[\[9b.6\]]ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rab tu 'bul bar gyur cig_/'gro ba thams cad kyis theg pa chen po shin tu grub pa dang /_chos thams cad ma lus pa la mngon par chags pa med par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba ma lus pa la gnas pas/_kun nas gnas par 
[\[9b.7\]]gyur cig_/spyod pa mtha' yas pa byin gyis brlab pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yongs su spyod par gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su 'gyur bar shog shig_/sems can thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag ma lus par rkyen du 'gyur bar shog shig_/ci nas kyang bdag 
[\[10a.2\]]med pa'i chos kyi dbyings las chos thams cad 'da' bar mi 'gyur bar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur yongs su spyod pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig_/chags pa med pa la 'jug pa'i phyir chos thams cad 
[\[10a.3\]]la yang dag par zin par gyur cig_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi grogs gcig tu 'thun pa yang dag par zin par gyur cig_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad smon lam yongs su rdzogs pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig_
[\[10a.4\]]bsgribs pa med pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i chos snang ba thams cad yang dag par zin par gyur cig mtha' dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig_
[\[10a.5\]]sems tshad med pas yongs su rgyas par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang mi bsnyengs pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig_/mi gnyis pa'i snang ba grub pas byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang spobs pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgor 'jug 
[\[10a.6\]]pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_cho 'phrul chen po shin tu bstan pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig_/skye ba dang rnam par 'tshang 
[\[10a.7\]]rgya ba dang /_'khor lo bskor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_nye bar gshegs pa bstan pa dang /_mchod pa dang rim gro dang /_sems can gdul ba la 'jug pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa dus gsum du byon pa mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]ma lus pa'i skye ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bas yang dag par zin par gyur cig_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pas zin par gyur cig_/bskal pa 'byam klas pa 
[\[10b.2\]]mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad ma lus par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'brel ba rgyun mi 'chad pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig_/'jig rten du skye ba'i yul thams cad ma lus par thams cad du skye ba shin tu bstan pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig_
[\[10b.3\]]sems can gyi khams thams cad ma lus par byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas yongs su smyin par bya bas yang dag par zin par gyur cig_/sems can gyi nyon mongs pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_bag chags thams cad ma lus pa rnyog 
[\[10b.4\]]pa med pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par zin par gyur cig_/sems can gyi dbang po 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus par mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig_/'gro ba thams cad kyi mos pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa thams 
[\[10b.5\]]cad ma lus par nyon mongs pa med cing yongs su dag pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig_/'gro ba thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba thams cad ma lus par dus la ji ltar 'bab pa bzhin du kun tu bstan pas yang dag par zin par 
[\[10b.6\]]gyur cig_/sems can thams cad ma lus par 'gro ba thams cad sprul pa lta bur khong du chud pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rags thams cad ma lus par sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad kyi bstan pa bzung zhing bsrung bas 
[\[10b.7\]]yang dag par zin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed cing /_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ste/_las kyis ni rnam par smyin pa la yongs su rtog par mi byed/_rnam 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]par smyin pas ni las la yongs su rtog par mi byed de/_chos kyi dbyings rtog pa med pa la yang dag par 'jug go_/dge ba'i rtsa ba byed pa med pas gnas pa yin no/_/chos nyid g.yeng ba med pa la 'ang rab tu brtson pa yin no/_/de ni chos 
[\[11a.2\]]thams cad la yang dad pas yang dag par 'jug ste/_chos gang rang bzhin gyis yongs su grub par byed pa 'am/_rnam par byed pa de dag gang yang mi mthong ngo /_/chos nyid dbang po med pa'i mthar thug pa la yang yang dag par 'jug ste/_chos kyi dbyings lta ba 
[\[11a.3\]]po med par yang rab tu shes shing chos thams cad shes pa po med par yang rab tu rtogs so/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa rab tu shes pa/_chos thams cad kyi rkyen gyi gnas khong du chud pa/_
[\[11a.4\]]chos thams cad lus pa med par rab tu mthong ba/_chos thams cad 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin par rjes su lta ba/_'jig rten 'gyur ba thams cad sprul pa lta bur rjes su rtogs pa/_chos gcig la sems can thams cad du rjes su mthong ba/_
[\[11a.5\]]chos kyi dbyings [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis par rab tu rig pa las kyi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang nye bar len pa la mkhas pas ma btang ba 'dus byas kyi khams 'dus ma byas su mngon par bsgrubs pas zhig par mi byed pa/_'dus ma byas kyi khams 'dus byas su sgro gdags pa thams 
[\[11a.6\]]cad kyis rnam par mi rtog pa/_chos thams cad rab tu zhi ba la gzhol ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par bsgrub pa/_thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa/_sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_chos rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par 
[\[11a.7\]]shes pa rmongs pa med par chos nyid la brtson pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba nam mkha' lta bur thams cad yongs su bsngo ba/_bsod nams kyis rgyas par 'gro bas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam du zhugs pa/_'jig rten gyi chos kun nas mi rgyu ba/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]la 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]rab rib med pa/_ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/_thabs mkhas pas yongs su bsngo ba'i ngang tshul can de ni ci nas kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_ci nas kyang zhing thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas 
[\[11b.2\]]kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nye bar blang bar 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du bsod nams kyi zhing dam par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi ded 
[\[11b.3\]]dpon du thog mar 'gro ba dang /_ci nas kyang snang ba'i dkyil 'khor skye dgu thams cad la 'char bar 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[11b.4\]]ci nas kyang yon tan thams cad kyis sems can gyi khams thams cad rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ba/_de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ste/_de de ltar yongs su bsngo bas sangs rgyas kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa yin/_sems can gyi rigs 
[\[11b.5\]]yongs su smyin par byed pa yin/_zhing gi rigs rnam par spyod pa yin/_chos kyi rigs 'gal bar mi byed pa yin/_las kyi rigs yongs su shes pa yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa'i rigs mnyam par byed pa yin/_phyogs kyi rigs su khyab par 'gro ba yin/_
[\[11b.6\]]'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs la yang dag par rtog pa yin/_shin tu mos pa'i rigs rab tu sgrub pa yin/_dbang po'i rigs shin tu snang bar byed pa yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 
[\[11b.7\]]yongs su bsngo ba bzhi pa ste/_thams cad du rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'o/_/de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsngo bar byed de/_de de ltar bsngo bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i lus kyi las rab tu 'thob bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rnam par bstan pa bsgribs pa med pa'i phyir thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i ngag gi las rab tu 'thob bo/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[12a.2\]]kyi chos thams cad bstan cing gzung ba'i phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i yid kyi las rab tu 'thob bo/_/sems can thams cad rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir thams cad kyi rjes su song pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/chos thams cad la yang 
[\[12a.3\]]dag par 'jug par bya ba'i phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i/_chos khong du chud pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i phyir thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i gzungs dang spobs pa thob par bya bar rab tu 'thob bo/_/spu'i 
[\[12a.4\]]sbubs gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gzud par bya ba'i phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/sems can gcig gi lus su sems can thams cad kyi lus yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir thams cad kyi rjes su 
[\[12a.5\]]song ba'i lus la 'jug pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/bskal pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba la 'dug pa'i phyir thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i bskal pa'i grangs la 'jug pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/skad cig gcig gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung 
[\[12a.6\]]ba thams cad mngon sum du bstan pa'i phyir/_thams cad rjes su song ba'i skad cig la 'jug pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs 
[\[12a.7\]]su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/'jig rten mtha' dang dbus med gang la yang /_/de dag gnas 'cha' gang yang yod pa [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/sems can phan pa'i don las phyir mi ldog_/mi rab de dag ye shes 'di 'dra'o/_/zhing rnams la yang gnas par mi byed de/_/
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]phyogs rnams la yang de dag gnas mi 'cha'/_/tshe dang chos kyis rlom sems mi byed de/_/'jig rten dag na rnam par rtog mi byed/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag na ji yod pa'i/_/'gro ba de dag ma lus kun bsdus shing /_/dngos po dngos med 
[\[12b.2\]]chos la dbang bsgyur 'jug_/de dag thams cad ma lus dus su bsngo/_/'dus byas 'dus ma byas kyi chos blangs shing /_/'jig rten 'di la rnam par rtog mi byed/_/ji ltar 'jig rten de bzhin chos rnams te/_/de ltar 'jig rten sgron ma rnam par dag_/ji 
[\[12b.3\]]snyed las rnams yang dag rtsom pa gang /_/rab dang 'bring dang de bzhin tha ma rnams/_/de dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams/_/ji snyed bzhugs la yongs su bsngo ba byed/_/de dag yongs su bsngo ba'i mthar phyin pa/_/sangs rgyas mchog rjes bslab 
[\[12b.4\]]bya bslabs pa rnams/_/ye shes dam pa rjes su sems byed cing /_/mi yi dam pa'i chos rnams rab tu 'thob/_/sems can phan pa'i don du rtag zhugs shing /_/'gro ba kun tu 'jig rten sgron ma bzhin/_/phyogs rnams kun tu ma lus gyur cig_
[\[12b.5\]]ces/_/dge ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba byed/_/de dag sems can rnam par rtog mi byed/_/chos la'ang rnam par rtog pa mi byed de/_/'jig rten gyis kyang rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yin/_/'gro ba kun nas phyir yang mi ldog go_/brtan pa de dag zhi rab rab tu 
[\[12b.6\]]zhi/_/de dag mya ngan 'das pa'i spyod yul thob/_/sems can rgyud na 'ang mi spyod ma yin te/_/'di 'dra'i ye shes dam pa khong du chud/_/de dag nam yang rtog dang rnam rtog med/_/rnam par smyin la 'ang de dag gnas mi 'cha'/_/'jig rten thams cad 
[\[12b.7\]]rgyu dang bcas pas na/_/chos rnams rgyu med par yang lta ma yin/_/de dag spyod yul 'di 'dra thob pa ste/_/de la rtog dang rnam par rtog pa byed/_/blo mchog de dag 'gro kun kha lo sgyur/_/ye shes tshul la mkhas pas yongs su bsngo/_/thams 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]cad rjes su song ba zhes bya ba ste/_yongs su bsngo ba bzhi pa'o//_//sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po gnyis pa/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub 
[\[13a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba lnga pa bsod nams [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_sgrib pa'i las thams cad las bag yongs su bya ba'i 
[\[13a.3\]]phyir bshags pa dang 'brel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'am/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi dus 
[\[13a.4\]]gsum gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang ba dang 'brel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'am/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la nan tan du byas pas phyag bya ba dang /_'brel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[13a.5\]]'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la brtson pas sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang /_'brel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'am/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad 
[\[13a.6\]]pa gang la/_byang chub sems dpas brtson par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'byam klas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag la yang dag par 'jug par byed pa 'am/_gang yang 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[13a.7\]]mngon par byang chub ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rjes su yi rang bar byed cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la gnas par byed pa 'am/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas sems 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]can mtha' dang dbus med pa dul bar gyur pa de dag la rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas khong du chud par byed pa 'am/_gang yang 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang po thugs bskyed 
[\[13b.2\]]pa nas bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la yang dag par byung bar gyur pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya bar gyur pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par bstan pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 
[\[13b.3\]]thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur ba'i ye shes kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi rjes su yi rang ba'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa yang dag par bzung ba nas nye bar bzung ste/_chos thams cad 
[\[13b.4\]]kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ba 'am/_sangs rgyas la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i bsam pa 'byam klas pa brjod du med pa dang /_rang gi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba gang bstsags pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[13b.5\]]chub tu bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par mthar phyin par byed par yang rung ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par phye ba tshad med cing 'byam klas pa/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa rgya chen po grangs med pas bstsags pa de dag thams cad 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang 
[\[13b.6\]]yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang /_gang mos par byas pa dang /_gang rjes su yi rang ba dang /_gang yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang /_gang yongs su grub par byas pa dang /_gang spyad pa dang /_gang thob par byas pa dang /_gang sems pa dang /_
[\[13b.7\]]gang rtsom pa dang /_gang mthu dang ldan par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis gang ji snyed du sngon gyi 'das pa'i dus thams cad 'byam klas pa'i dus la 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams shin tu bstan pa grangs las 'das pa thams cad du 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan byung ba dang /_gang ji snyed du de bzhin nyid kyi go skabs thams cad kyi sngon gyi mu'i bskal pa'i mthar gyur pa/_sa mtshams med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs mtha' yas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[14a.2\]]thams cad kyi ye shes kyis thugs su chud pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas rnam par shes pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyis yang dag par bzung ba dag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su dag pa byung ba dang /_gang yang las dang rgyu 'thun pa'i 'bras bu'am/_gang 
[\[14a.3\]]yang spyod pa las yang dag par byung ba 'am/_gang yang sems can bsgral bar bya ba'i tshogs rnam par bstan pa 'am/_gang yang shin tu mos pa rnam par dag pa 'am/_gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis shes par bya ba 'am/_gang yang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul 
[\[14a.4\]]ba yang dag par bstan pa 'am/_gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams su rnam par rig pa 'am/_gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las 'jig rten las 'das pas byung ba 'am/_gang yang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa 'byam klas pas byung ba 'am/_gang 
[\[14a.5\]]yang mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byung ba 'am/_phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba rgyun chad pa med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul thams cad shin tu bstan pa/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa 
[\[14a.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'byam klas pa ma 'ongs pa'i dus mtha' yas pa'i rigs su bstan pa ma 'ongs pa'i lam gyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa grangs med pa brjod pa/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus rgyun chad pa med cing sa mtshams kyi mtha' med pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bsgrubs pas 
[\[14a.7\]]thugs su chud pa/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi skad cig rgyun chad pa med pa/_chos kyi dbyings dang /_'jig rten gyi khams dang /_bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad mtha' yas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyis mngon par 'tshang rgya ba tshad med par gyur pa dang /_
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]ma 'ongs pa'i dus su mtshams med cing ris su mi chod pa dag tu ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab par gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dang rgyan yongs su dag pa/_
[\[14b.2\]]rin po che'i rgyan rnam par bre ba du ma dang /_spos kyi rgyan yid du 'ong ba dang /_ldan pa thams cad dang /_me tog thams cad kyi rgyan gyi char rab tu 'beb pa/_na bza' thams cad kyi rgyan gyi sprin sna tshogs yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_rnam pa tha dad 
[\[14b.3\]]pa'i mdzod de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par bres pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan rab tu brgyan par bya ba/_rnam pa sna tshogs pa tha dad pa brjod du med pas rab tu brgyan cing grub pa/_grogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dag 
[\[14b.4\]]pas yongs su bsgrubs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rgyan gyi rnam par dag pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang yang ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs 
[\[14b.5\]]su dag pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i mig 'jig rten las 'das pa thun mong ma yin pas rnam par mthong ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu myong bar 'gyur ba chos thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur khong du chud pa/_chos thams 
[\[14b.6\]]cad kyi mthu sprul pa lta bus rnam par dag pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i las 'byam klas pa/_mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song bas rnam par dag pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 
[\[14b.7\]]zhugs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba/_yang dag par rgyu ba/_sangs rgyas kyi 'od bla na med pas snang bar byas pa/_rgya che ba sna tshogs pa/_tshad med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams yang dag par gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par rab tu byung ba shin tu grub pa rnam par dag pa/_
[\[15a.2\]]rnam pa sna tshogs pa tha dad pa kun nas yon tan can bsngags par bya ba/_tshad med pa dri zhim po bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_mtha' yas pa/_shing tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang ldan pa/_rgyan grangs med pa can/_gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang ldan pa/_yid du 'ong 
[\[15a.3\]]ba'i sgra grangs med pa yod pa/_mtha' yas par yang dag par ston pa/_rjes su spyod pa'i grogs tshad med pa dang ldan pa/_yon tan sna tshogs zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_spos thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_phreng ba 
[\[15a.4\]]thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_phye ma thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_na bza' thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_rgyal mtshan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_ba dan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi snam bu kun 
[\[15a.5\]]tu bting bas brgyan pa/_rin po che thams cad kyi stegs bus brgyan pa/_gser gyi dra ba grangs med pas kun tu g.yog par brgyan pa/_chu klung grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_grangs med pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa/_rol mo brdung ba dang 
[\[15a.6\]]dkrol ba'i tshogs grangs med pas yid du 'ong ba rnam par dag pa de dag dang /_de bzhin du ma lus pa thams cad rab tu bzung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dang rgyan yongs su dag pa gang ji snyed pa/_gang dang gang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rab 
[\[15a.7\]]tu mkhyen pa/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa zhing gi gnas su gyur pa thams cad phyogs kyi 'khor mtha' yas par shin tu bstan pas phyogs bcur rnam par bkod pa/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]'byam klas pa las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa/_nam mkha'i khams dang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis yongs su bsdus pa/_'jig rten gyi khams phyogs gzhan dang gzhan gyi rjes su song bar rab tu gnas pa/_las rnam pa tha 
[\[15b.2\]]dad pas shin tu byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par shin tu bstan pa/_'jig rten gyi 'byung gnas nam mkha'i gos gtogs pa/_zhing gi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa brjod du med pa 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis shin tu 
[\[15b.3\]]bstan pa/_de ltar ma lus pa thams cad yongs su bzung ste/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan la 'jug pas rgyan rnam par dag pa thams cad dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad ji skad du 
[\[15b.4\]]bshad pa dang /_ji skad du bstan pa dang /_ji skad du brjod pa dang /_ji skad du gsal bar byas pa dang /_ji skad du smos pa dang /_ji skad du smras pa dang /_ji skad du bslabs pa dang /_ji skad du bkrol ba dang /_ji lta bur brtags pa dang /_ji lta bur rnam par 
[\[15b.5\]]bkod pa de dang de dag du de bzhin gshegs pa skyes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam pa nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing dge ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdag nyid che ba dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[15b.6\]]kyi zhing yangs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde bar bskyang pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing zil gyis mi non pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing zad mi shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu che ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phrogs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[15b.7\]]zhing mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'od gsal ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yid du 'ong ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mthun pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu snang ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu snang ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]zhing rnam par brgyan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu brgyan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu rnam par phye ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mchog dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gtso bo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[16a.2\]]kyi zhing phul dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing dam pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gya nom pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rmad du byung ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla na med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam pa med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dra ba med pa dang /_sangs 
[\[16a.3\]]rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa dang /_de ltar yongs su bzung ste/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rnam par dag pa gang ji snyed pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[16a.4\]]thams cad rnam par dag par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam pa 'di lta bu'i rnam par dag pa dang ldan par gyur cig_/'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan ji snyed pa de dag thams cad yang 
[\[16a.5\]]dag par gnas par gyur cig_/grub par gyur cig_/rnam par dag par gyur cig_/yongs su dag par gyur cig_/yang dag par grub par gyur cig_/rab tu byung bar gyur cig_/rab tu brgyan par gyur cig_/kun tu brgyan par gyur cig_/byang bar gyur 
[\[16a.6\]]cig_/byin gyis brlabs par gyur cig_/'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'ang ma lus par bzung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad ma lus 
[\[16a.7\]]par de snyed kyi rgyan gyis yongs su brgyan par gnas par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ma lus par dus gsum thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bdag nyid che ba dang /_sangs 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]rgyas kyi zhing blta na [{]myi [,]mi [}]ngoms pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yangs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtshungs pa med pa dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[16b.2\]]kyi zhing mtha' yas pa ji snyed pa de dag gi rgyan gyis rnam par dag par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rdzogs pa rjes su 'jug pa/_'jig rten gyi khams la rab tu 'jug pa/_kun tu spyod pa 
[\[16b.3\]]mang ba/_sems can gyi khams rtogs par bya ba khong du chud pa/_chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa rab tu rtogs pa/_nam mkha'i dbyings la 'jug pa rmongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos rjes su dran pa'i 
[\[16b.4\]]tshul can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa la rab tu zhugs pa/_gtong ba la shin tu mos pa/_gtong pa'i rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa/_ye shes kyi 'od gzer dang ldan pa'i chos kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor can chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par lta ba [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su 
[\[16b.5\]]med pa las rab tu byung ba/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gnas su gyur pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dam pas thog mar 'gro ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu byung ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rjes su song ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[16b.6\]]nyid kyi yul gyi 'od gzer rab tu 'gyed pa/_bdud kyi las thams cad rnam par sbyangs pa/_sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi rang bzhin khong du chud pa/_phyin ci log [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yang dag par byung ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang smon lam la gti mug [{]myed [,]med [}]pa sha 
[\[16b.7\]]stag gis yongs su gang bar gyur cig_/byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i tshul can de lta bu'i spyod pa la zhugs pa de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa dge ba'i rtsa ba mtshungs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa can rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi phrin las la gzhol ba/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub snang ba 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]rab tu thob pa/_mun pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang ldan pa/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad lus gcig gis khyab par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yang dag par ston pa/_ye shes chen po khong du chud pas thams 
[\[17a.2\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa/_chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba/_mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/_zhing thams cad kyi rjes su song ba gnas med par sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na gnas pa/_nam mkha'i dbyings su 
[\[17a.3\]]mos pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i yid dang ldan pa/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rnam par phye ba'i bsam pa can/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mnyam par gzhol ba la mkhas pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yul [(]kyi [,]gyi [)]sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[17a.4\]]zhing la gnas pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs shes par bya ba la mkhas pa/_chos grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bstan cing bshad pa la 'jigs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rjes su song ba/_
[\[17a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chos bstan pa yongs su 'dzin pa/_sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dbye zhing mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/_grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skad rnam pa tha dad pa shes 
[\[17a.6\]]pa/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i sa khong du chud pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par spyod pa/_nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos kyi tshul la chos su rtogs pas gnas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_sems bskyed pa 
[\[17a.7\]]yangs pa shin tu rnam par bsgoms pa rab tu thob pa/_ye shes gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rgyud la mkhas pa/_don gcig nas gcig tu bstan pa rab tu grub pa/_de lta bu dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag yongs su brgyan par gyur 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]cig/_/yongs su gang bar gyur cig_/rnam par mdzes par gyur cig_/rjes su dong bar gyur cig_/kun tu gnas par gyur cig_/bsgoms par gyur cig_/shin tu bsgoms par gyur cig_/sbyangs par gyur cig_/shin tu sbyangs par gyur cig_
[\[17b.2\]]zhi bar byed par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i phyogs re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_gzhal du med pa/_mu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_sa mtshams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_brjod du med pa/_brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yongs su 
[\[17b.3\]]rgyas par gyur cig_/phyogs gcig ji lta ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa/_ma lus pa lus pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_lhag ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu'i tshul can gyis yongs su rgyas 
[\[17b.4\]]shing yongs su gang bar gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ste/_tshul de lta bus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang /_tshul de lta bus 'byung ba thams cad dang /_tshul de lta bus sems can gyi khams 
[\[17b.5\]]thams cad rnam par dag pa dang /_tshul de lta bus sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub dang /_tshul de lta bus smon lam thams cad dang /_tshul de lta bus 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas skyes pa mthong ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'bral ba dang /_tshul de lta bus de 
[\[17b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_tshul de lta bus thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams 
[\[17b.7\]]cad kyi rjes su song ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi skye ba thams cad kyis ma lus par gang bar byas pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongs su dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]zhing thams cad ma lus par shin tu byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang /_thams cad mkhyen par 'byung bar bgo skal med par yongs su bsngos pa dang /_nam mkha'i khams tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba'i sems kyi sa dang /_yongs 
[\[18a.2\]]su bsngo ba'i tshad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dang /_yongs su bsngo ba mnyam pa nyid las kyi rnam par smin pa thams cad las rnam par grol zhing shin tu mos pa dang /_yongs su bsngo ba'i khyad par mtha' yas par 'brel bar byas pa dang /_yongs su 
[\[18a.3\]]bsngo ba'i tshul chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rjes su song bas yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe bdag la mi rtog go_/bdag gi lus la rnam par mi rtog go_/sangs rgyas la mi rtog go_/sangs rgyas kyi chos la rnam par mi rtog go_/zhing la mi rtog go_/zhing gi yang dag par spyod pas rnam 
[\[18a.4\]]par dag pa la rnam par mi rtog go_/sems can la rnam par mi rtog go_/sems can gdul ba la rnam par mi rtog go_/las la mi rtog go_/las kyi rnam par smin pa la rnam par mi rtog go_/sems pa la chags par mi byed do_/bsam pas kyang mngon par chags par mi byed do/_/
[\[18a.5\]]rgyu chud gzon par mi byed do/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu chud gzon par mi byed do/_/dngos po nye bar len par mi byed do/_/dngos po'i chos la chags par yang mi byed do/_/'khor ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa gcig tu mi byed do/_/zhi ba rnam par brtags pa med pas rlom sems mi bskyed 
[\[18a.6\]]do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyis bsnyems par mi byed do/_/chos gang gis kyang chos la gnas par mi byed do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag nye bar stobs so/_/khong du chud par byed do/_/yongs su bsngo'o/_/yongs su smin par byed 
[\[18a.7\]]do/_/mnyam par byed do/_/sgrub bo/_/mtshan mar mi byed do/_/dmigs par mi byed do/_/mi 'jal lo/_/mi rtog go_/rnam par mi rtog go_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar yongs su bsngo ba ni 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dran pas dge ba'i rtsa ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa yin/_
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yang dag par 'jug pas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa yin/_zhing rnam par dag pas yongs su bsngo bas dge ba'i rtsa ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa yin/_sems can gyi khams rnam par dag pa la rnam par dpyod pas dge ba'i rtsa ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa yin/_
[\[18b.2\]]chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pa la zhugs pas dge ba'i rtsa ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa yin/_nam mkha'i khams ltar tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems la yongs su sgom pas dge ba'i rtsa ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa yin/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la shin tu mos pas dge ba'i rtsa ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa yin/_byang 
[\[18b.3\]]chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi las la brtson pas dge ba'i rtsa ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa yin/_dus gsum rab tu rnam par 'byed pas dge ba'i rtsa ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa yin te/_de ni sems can gyi khams thams cad la sems can [{]myed [,]med [}]par rab tu rtog cing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos thams 
[\[18b.4\]]cad la srog [{]myed [,]med [}]par khong du chud cing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos thams cad la byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gang zag [{]myed [,]med [}]par sems shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos thams cad nyon mongs pa 
[\[18b.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]par rab tu rtog cing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos thams cad kyi rten pa yang dag par mthong shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/dngos po thams cad la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/zhing thams cad la yang dag par [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa nyid du 
[\[18b.6\]]shes shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa nyid du lta zhing yongs su bsngo'o/_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid du shes pas mthong zhing yongs su bsngo'o/_/de de ltar yongs su bsngo bas zhing gang 
[\[18b.7\]]yang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bcas par [{]myig [,]mig [}]lam du snang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kun tu lta yang sems can gang yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthun pa mthong bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/spyod pa'i tshe chos gang yang yang dag par [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/ye shes kyi 'jug pas gang la yang 'jug pa 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad la yang rab tu gnas te/_de yang shin tu shes so/_/bsod nams kyi stobs tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus chos thams cad gang bar shin tu shes so/_/sems 
[\[19a.2\]]can thams cad tshim par bya ba'i phyir/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad du 'gro ba la yang dag par spyod do/_/de'i sems bskyed pa re re zhing yang sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa stobs bcu'i sar yang dag par 'grub bo/_/des sems can thams cad 
[\[19a.3\]]bsod nams thams cad kyis yongs su gzung zhing thob par bya ba'i phyir/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa bsod nams thams cad kyi 'byung gnas dang ldan pa/_thams cad rab tu sgrub bo/_/de yo byad ci 'dod pa phun sum tshogs pas/_bsod nams kyi 
[\[19a.4\]]mdzod yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/_/de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de dag tu zhing thams cad rnam par sbyong zhing 'gro'o/_/de gang dang gang du spyod pa de dang de dag tu sems can brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yang brjod du med pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir/_
[\[19a.5\]]bsod nams kyi stobs kyis yongs su bzung ba la rab tu gzhog cing /_yang dag par spyod do/_/de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de la rnam pa de lta bu'i rgyu mthun pas/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yin/_'jig rten thams cad kyi zil 
[\[19a.6\]]gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]non pa'i bsod nams can yin/_bdud thams cad kyis gzi brjid [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa yin/_phyir rgol ba thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mi 'phrogs pa yin/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid yang dag par rtogs pa dang ldan pas/_smon lam shin tu che ba dang /_
[\[19a.7\]]sems rab tu yangs pa yin/_sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gro ba yin/_ye shes kyi stobs mtha' yas pas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul yongs su shes pa yin/_sangs rgyas thams cad la shin tu dad pa yin/_
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]ye shes mtha' yas par shin tu 'jug pa la rab tu gnas pa yin/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i byang chub kyi sems mngon par bsgrub pa'i mthus nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas par chos kyi dbyings shin tu yangs pa yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 
[\[19b.2\]]'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba lnga pa/_bsod nams [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba ste/_de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/_mi zad pa'i mdzod bcu rab tu 'thob bo/_/bcu gang zhe na/_skra'i sbubs gcig tu 
[\[19b.3\]]sangs rgyas grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas ba lta ba'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu 'thob bo/_/chos thams cad gcig tu rab tu gzhol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_ye shes kyi phyir/_chos la 'jug pa'i gter 
[\[19b.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa'i mdzod rab tu 'thob bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos bstan pa yongs su gzung zhing chud mi zos par bya ba'i phyir/_dran pas bzung ba'i gter [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa'i mdzod rab tu 'thob bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul 
[\[19b.5\]]dang /_dgongs pa shin tu bstan pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir/_blo gros rnam par nges pa'i gter [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa'i mdzod rab tu 'thob bo/_/chos kyi tshul rnam par dbye ba la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir/_rigs pas 'dzin pa'i gter [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa'i mdzod rab tu 
[\[19b.6\]]'thob bo/_/nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i blos dus gsum thams cad khyab par bya ba'i phyir/_blo tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i gter [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa'i mdzod rab tu 'thob bo/_/sems can thams cad tshim par bya bas [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad par bya ba'i phyir/_bsod nams kyi 
[\[19b.7\]]gter [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad ba'i mdzod rab tu 'thob bo/_/sems can thams cad kyi mun pa dang /_rab rib dang /_ling tog dang /_gti mug dang /_ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par bsal ba'i phyir/_ye shes dang /_dga' ba dang /_blo'i gter [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa'i mdzod rab tu 'thob 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]bo/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos nyid tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa rab tu bstan pas/_sems can thams cad shes par bya ba'i phyir/_spobs pa rnam par nges pa'i gter rab tu 'thob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad 
[\[20a.2\]]pas/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i thabs skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyir/_stobs bcu dang /_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa'i gter mi zad pa rab tu 'thob ste/_gter [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa'i mdzod bcu po 'di dag rab tu 'thob bo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[20a.3\]]rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/_phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bsam pas mthu stobs rnyed pa de dag ni/_/mtha' yas chos la kun tu dbang sgyur cing /_/bsod nams 
[\[20a.4\]]gter la rjes su yi rang ba/_/de dag chags [{]myed [,]med [}]tshul gyis yongs su bsngo/_/dus gsum rgyal ba su dag ji snyed pas/_/rnam dag zhing rnams 'jig rten rnam sbyangs pa/_/yon tan kun dang ldan zhing 'phags pa rnams/_/de 'dra'i rnam dag zhing du yongs su bsngo/_/
[\[20a.5\]]dus gsum rgyal ba ji snyed bzhugs pa yi/_/tshul rnams kun la rjes su sems byed cing /_/thams cad lus pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par des bzung ste/_/de 'dra'i zhing ni bstan pa rnams kyis brgyan/_/dus gsum bskal pa ji snyed yod pa yi/_/zhing gcig yon 
[\[20a.6\]]tan de dag blangs byas kyang /_/bskal pa ji snyed de dag zad 'gyur gyi/_/zhing gi yon tan bsngags pa zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_/'di 'dra'i zhing rnams thams cad ma lus par/_/mi yi mchog gis ji snyed mthong gyur pa/_/thams cad ma lus zhing gi yon tan gyis/_/
[\[20a.7\]]ji snyed 'jig rten de dag brgyan par snang /_/de dag kun kyang rnam dag yid dang ldan/_/de dag rgyal ba'i gsung skyes sras yin te/_/yon tan kun gyis brgyan pa'i sems dang ldan/_/zhing gi phyogs rnams rab tu rgyas par byed/_/de dag lus ni mtshan gyis shin tu 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]brgyan/_/de dag dpe byad bzang pos lus kyang mdzes/_/de dag mtha' yas yang dag so sor shes/_/'gro ba'i rgya mtsho [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad ci bzhin no/_/de dag spyod yul dag dang yang dag ldan/_/ting 'dzin kun la gnas pa rjes su thob/_/mtshungs [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[20b.2\]]shin tu rnam par dag pa'i yid/_/thams cad phyogs rnams su ni 'od kyang 'gyed/_/'di 'dra'i zhing rnams ma lus bzung byas te/_/nyan thos spyod yul dag la dad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_rang rgyal thams cad shin tu spangs gyur te/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]yi dam pas shin tu gang gyur cig_/
[\[20b.3\]]de dag de 'dra'i yongs bsngo sems ldan pa/_/gang gis ma lus 'jig rten byang chub tu/_/dus gsum rgyal bas mngon par sangs rgyas pa/_/de dang ldan par yongs su bsngo bar byed/_/phyogs bcu kun na ji snyed yod pa yi/_/bdud dang nyon mongs de 
[\[20b.4\]]dag rab tu 'joms/_/dpal ldan mthu can gzhan gyis pham [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus/_/rnam par nges par chos kyi dam pa spyod/_/de dag smon lam mthu stobs yongs pa yis/_/yongs su bsngo ba chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]gyur cing /_/bsod nams zad [{]myed [,]med [}]de dag mdzod du zhugs/_/
[\[20b.5\]]de ni dus gsum kun tu zad mi 'gyur/_/de dag spyod pas chos la 'jal bar byed/_/de dag byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos la zhugs/_/g.yo med chos kyang de dag rab tu shes/_/las kyi rnam pas yongs su mi sems so/_/gzugs ni ma yin 'on kyang gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[20b.6\]{]myin[,]min[}]/_/'du shes yod [{]myin [,]min [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/dngos yod ma yin dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/dngos [{]myed [,]med [}]thams cad rang bzhin khong du chud/_/yod pa ma yin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'ang ma yin te/_/rgyu yi rgyud la mngon par chags [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_/rkyen la 'ang 'jug par de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[20b.7\]]byed de/_/nam yang de dag chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/'gro ba 'di na smra tshul ji snyed pa/_/de la nam yang chags par mi byed de/_/'du shes bsam pa brda yang rab tu shes/_/bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]chos kyang so sor shin tu rtogs/_/de dag sems can mi 'bral cis 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]'gyur ba/_/de 'dra'i chos nyid mnyam pa rab tu rtogs/_/de 'dra'i zhing dang de bzhin las kyi rnams/_/dus gsum thams cad ma lus bzung byas shing /_/shes pas de dag de bzhin yongs su bsngo/_/las kyi rnam pa gang gis skyes ldan 
[\[21a.2\]]zhing /_/rang bzhin gang dang mtshan nyid gang yin dang /_/de na ci 'dra'i chos nyid yod pa dag_/de bzhin de dag dag par yongs su bsngo/_/gang gi yid kyis ngo bo nyid 'jal ba/_/rang bzhin byas pa med par de dag shes/_/'gro la de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas len pa med/_/'gro ba kun phyir yongs su bsngo bar gzhol/_/
[\[21a.3\]]spyod yul ma lus thams cad bzung byas shing /_/'od gsal thams cad rjes su sems par byed/_/ma lus de bzhin nyid kyang de dag shes/_/gang gis lta ba thams cad ma lus shing /_/bsam pa'i skyon bor rnam par spongs pa rnams/_/rtag tu de dag dri [{]myed [,]med [}]kun gdung 
[\[21a.4\]{]myed[,]med[}]/_/chags [{]myed [,]med [}]kun gyi tshul yang rjes su rtogs/_/de dag gis ni chos rnams ma bshig ste/_/nams kyang chos nyid zhig par 'gyur ba [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/chos la chags par de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_/de dag 'jig rten sgra brnyan 'dra ba yin/_/gang gis dus gsum 'jig 
[\[21a.5\]]rten skyes pa yi/_/'gro ba rkyen byung chos kyang rab tu shes/_/bsam pa dag dang bag chags khong du chud/_/thams cad 'jig par byed pa gang yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/de dag las dang las min rab tu shes/_/las dang rnam par 'gal bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_/las kyi rnam 
[\[21a.6\]]par smin pa chud [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzon/_/rgyu las byung ba'i chos kyang shin tu ston/_/'di na sems can gang yang 'khor ba [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/sems can 'byung bar de dag mi byed de/_/sems can rnams la gnas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par smra/_/sems can rgyud kyi brda yang rab tu rtogs/_/
[\[21a.7\]]bsod nams mi zad pa yi mdzod ces bya ba ste yongs su bsngo ba lnga pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba drug pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_kye 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal por gyur te/_srid chen po thob nas 'tshe ba dang phyir rgol ba bcom ste/_rgyal po chen por grags pa dang /_srid chen po'i khams la gnas shing /_srid yongs pa la dbang bar gyur 
[\[21b.2\]]nas/_'khon [{]myed [,]med [}]cing ltod pa med par srid la gnas pa/_chos kyi rgyal srid skyong bar byed pa/_chos dang mthun pa/_chos kyi rjes su snyegs pa/_phun sum tshogs pa'i srid chen po thob pa/_sa chen po la gdugs gcig tu gyur pa/_'khor lo thogs pa 
[\[21b.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]pas skyod pa/_dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i thabs thob pa/_srid pa pha rol kyi sdes gtse ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_chos dang ldan pa/_dbyig pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mtshon cha [{]myed [,]med [}]pas 'gro ba rnams shin tu skyong ba/_chos kyi rjes su zhugs shing bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis 'gro ba 
[\[21b.4\]]sdud pa/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa/_'gro ba thams cad la mdzod kyis shin tu stob pa de dbang phyug de lta bu la gnas shing de lta bu'i chos la gnas pa/_g.yog dang 'khor mang po shin tu 'dus pa gzugs dang ldan pa/_'gro ba thams cad 
[\[21b.5\]]lta bas mi ngoms pa/_yid la kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bsod nams rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa/_zil gyis mi non pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa/_lus shin tu rnam par phye ba mdzes pa dang ldan pa/_blta na bzang ba tshul dang mthun pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_/
[\[21b.6\]]stobs dang ldan pa/_thub pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_stobs chen po dang ldan pa/_mthu bo che'i lus kyis bzung ba/_rnam par dag pa'i las dang ldan pa/_bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i las rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa de/_zas yongs su gtong ba 'am/_btung 
[\[21b.7\]]ba 'am/_ro 'am bzhon pa 'am/_gos sam/_me tog gam/_phreng ba 'am/_spos sam/_byug pa 'am/_mal cha'am/_gnas sam/_rgyab rten nam/_mar me 'am/_sgron ma 'am/_nad kyi rkyen sman nam yo byad rnams sbyin pa 'am/_
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]rin po ches gzhal ba'i snod sna tshogs bkang zhing yongs su gtong ba dang /_shing rta sna tshogs dang /_shing rta du ma bkang zhing tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rin po che dang nor yongs su gtong ba dang /_glang po cang shes sam/_rta cang shes rgyan thams cad 
[\[22a.2\]]kyis brgyan pa gtong ba dang /_slong ba rnams la ci rigs su rgyal po'i stan bzang po gtong pa 'am/_gdugs gtong ba 'am/_rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gtong ba 'am/_rin po che gtong zhing sbyin pa 'am/_rgyan dang lhab lhub kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba 'am/_
[\[22a.3\]]cod pan nam/_gtsug gi nor bu dag dbang phyug la spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas mtshon chas bcings shing btson ra na 'dug pa'i sems can rnams mthong nas/_nor thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /_g.yog dang bdag tu bcas te byin nas/_btson ra de dag nas 
[\[22a.4\]]sems can rnams yongs su thar bar byed pa gsad par khrid pa mthong nas/_bdag gi lus dang srog yongs su btang ste/_gsad pa de blu bar byed pa/_gtsug phud dang thor pag tu bcas pa'i mgo bo dag kyang bslong bas bslangs na/_gtong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems 
[\[22a.5\]]kyis gtong ba [{]myig [,]mig [}]gnyis yongs su gtong ba 'am/_rna ba dang /_sna yongs su gtong ba 'am/_so dang lce yongs su gtong ba 'am/_mgo yongs su gtong ba 'am/_rka lag yongs su gtong ba 'am/_rang gi lus kyang dral cing slong ba la khrag yongs su 
[\[22a.6\]]gtong ba 'am/_sha dang rkang yongs su gtong ba 'am/_slong ba la rang gi lus las snying phyung ste/_yongs su gtong ba 'am/_slong zhing len pa sna tshogs la rgyu ma dang mtsher pa dang /_mkhal ma dang /_pho ba rnams yongs su gtong ba 'am/_rang gi lus
