[\[22a.7\]]las yan lag dang /_nying lag dang rus pa bslangs na dad pa'i sems kyis yongs su gtong ba 'am/_slong ba la mos par lta bas pags pa dang mdog yongs su gtong ba 'am/_rka lag las sor mo yongs su gtong ba 'am/_chos 'dod pa'i phyir rang gi 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]sha dang sen mo yongs su gtong ba 'am/_chos shin tu dkon pa tshol zhing myes gang ba'i 'obs [{]myi [,]mi [}]'greng lag tag bdun du mchod par byed pa 'am/_chos bsrung ba'i phyir sdug bsngal myong ba thams cad kyang rang gi lus kyis bzod par byed pa 'am/_chos tshol zhing chos kyi tshig 
[\[22b.2\]]dang /_yi ge 'bru gcig gi phyir yang rgya mtsho'i mthar thug pa'i sa chen po yongs su gtong ba 'am/_chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug byed pa 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos las sems can rnams bzlog ste/_dge ba'i chos la rab tu sbyor ba 'am/_skyes bu'i mtshan gcod 
[\[22b.3\]]pa mthong nas/_sdig pa'i las de dag las sems can de dag rnam par bzlog par byed pa 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par sangs rgyas par 'jig rten thams cad du sgrog cing gtsug lag khang dang pho brang gi longs spyod kyi phyir sa dang khams yongs su gtong ba 'am/_
[\[22b.4\]]rim gro bya ba'i phyir bran dang las byed pa'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams gtong ba 'am/_slong ba la rim gro bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid 'bul ba 'am/_chos la dad pas dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems rnyed nas/_rang gi lus kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro byed pa 'am/_bdag nyid 
[\[22b.5\]]sems can thams cad la gtong ba 'am/_sangs rgyas thams cad la rim gro bya ba'i phyir rgyal srid yongs su gtong ba 'am/_slong ba rnams la ci rigs su yul dang myir bcas pa 'am/_grong khyer dang rgyal po'i pho brang ngam rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 
[\[22b.6\]]yongs su gtong ba 'am/_slong ba la bu dang bu mo dang chung ma dag yongs su gtong ba 'am/_slong ba rnams la ci rigs su khyim thams cad yongs su sbyin zhing gtong ba 'am/_bza' shing gi ra ba sbyin pa 'am/_slong ba sna tshogs dang len pa sna tshogs dang /_
[\[22b.7\]]sems can sna tshogs dang /_gang zag sna tshogs/_sems sna tshogs dang ldan pa la phyogs tha dad pa nas 'ongs pa tshad las 'das pa'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sna tshogs dang sbyin pa'i gnas sna tshogs la mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]pa rnams byed cing yongs su gtong ba 'am/_de sbyin pa'i dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i tshe sems 'di ltar bskyed de yongs su bsngo zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas/_gzugs shin tu bzung ba/_dge ba'i 
[\[23a.2\]]rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas/_tshor ba shin tu bzung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas/_'du shes shin tu bzung ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas/_'du byed shin tu bzung ba/_dge ba'i 
[\[23a.3\]]rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas/_rnam par shes pa shin tu bzung ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas/_srid pa thams cad shin tu bzung ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas/_
[\[23a.4\]]'khor shin tu bzung ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas/_longs spyod shin tu bzung ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas sbyin pa shin tu bzung ba des dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_
[\[23a.5\]]bla na med par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]nas bza' ba dang btung ba 'di dag 'di ltar btang ba dang /_'di ltar byin pa dang /_'di ltar chags pa med pa dang /_'di ltar bcings pa med pa dang /_'di ltar nye bar btang ba dang /_'di ltar ma bzung ba dang /_'di 
[\[23a.6\]]ltar lhag par bsam pa dang /_'di ltar dngos po yongs su btang ba dang /_'di ltar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa dang /_'di ltar gtong ba dang ldan pas sems can thams cad ye shes kyi kha zas dang ldan pa dang /_chags pa med pa la brtson pa 
[\[23a.7\]]sems kyi zas yongs su shes pa dang /_chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i zas dang /_dga' ba'i zas dang /_zang zing [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i zas dang ye shes kyi 'tsho ba dang /_chos kyi brtan pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi sku dang /_ye shes kyi 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]sku la yang dag par spyod pa dang /_sbyin pa'i gnas dang snying brtse ba'i kha zas rab tu len par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zas sbyin pa de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' btung ba'i sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe 'di 
[\[23b.2\]]ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad chos kyi btung ba 'thung ba la brtson pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ldan pa/_'jig rten pa'i skom pa rgyun chad pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis skom pa las [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog 
[\[23b.3\]]pa dang /_'dod pa'i yul gyis skom pa las phyir ldog pa dang /_chos kyis tshim pa'i dga' ba rab tu 'thob pa dang /_chos kyi sku shin tu tshim pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyis tshim par byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_shes rab rgya mtsho la zhugs 
[\[23b.4\]]pa dang /_chos kyi ri rab dang ldan pa dang /_chos kyi btung bas ngoms par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po btung ba'i sbyin pa de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bro ba'i sbyin pa skyon thams cad 
[\[23b.5\]]bstsal na rnam par dag pa skyur ba dang /_dngar ba dang kha ba dang bro ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba sna tshogs kyi ro mchog dang ldan pa shin tu 'jam pa'i ro mchog gi rnam pa dang ldan pa/_ro sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong bstsags pa 
[\[23b.6\]]dang ldan pa dang /_khams rnams mnyam zhing 'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par gzhog pas lus kyi stobs rton par byed pa/_sems dga' ba dad cing mos pa dang /_spro ba dang gsal ba bskyed pa/_zhim zhing tshul dang ldan pa'i ro'i dam par gyur pa/_
[\[23b.7\]]nang gi dbang po rnam par dag par byed pa/_lte la bde bas yang dag par ston pa/_snyom pa thams cad sel bar byed pa/_nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa/_nad med par byed pa/_rnam pa 'di lta bu'i ro dam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]slong zhing len pa sna tshogs la sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_sems can thams cad bdud rtsi'i ros brten pa'i sems kyis ngo bo ba'i mchog dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems 
[\[24a.2\]]can thams cad kha zas kyi ro thams cad kyi las yongs su shes shing /_chos kyi ro'i ye shes la rab tu gnas par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad gnas pa'i mtha' chos kyi grong khyer du phyin te/_chos kyi ro du ma'i chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs par gyur cig 
[\[24a.3\]]sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par byed pas 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_gdul ba la zhugs zhing chos kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i chos kyi dga' bas rgyud tshim 
[\[24a.4\]]par gyur te/_ye shes mchog gi ro la sems rnam par gzhog par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad ro thams cad kyi mtshan ma la mi 'dzin pas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la brtson pa'i sems dang ldan zhing ro'i mchog thams cad la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par 
[\[24a.5\]]gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad du rab tu 'jug pas byung bas chos kyi ro gcig par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa las phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog cing ro mchog gi ngo bo nyid la byung bar gyur 
[\[24a.6\]]cig/_sems can thams cad dbang po thams cad dbye ba'i ye shes la mngon par mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ro tha dad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis tshim par spyod cing /_chos kyi ros yid rgyas 
[\[24a.7\]]par gyur cig ces/_de ltar ro'i sbyin pa'i tshogs la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/sems can thams cad kyi ye shes chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phung po sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/byang 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]chub sems dpa' bzhon pa'i sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo ste/_sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa la zhon par gyur cig_/theg pa chen po rab tu thob cing rnam par zhig pa med pa'i theg pa dang /_mchog 
[\[24b.2\]]gi theg pa dang /_dam pa'i theg pa dang /_mgyogs pa'i theg pa dang /_stobs chen po'i theg pa dang /_bsod nams dang ldan pa'i theg pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i theg pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /_mtha' yas pa'i theg pas byung 
[\[24b.3\]]ste/_yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhon pa'i sbyin par gtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' gos kyi sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/_dge 
[\[24b.4\]]ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi khrel yod pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyis rab tu yog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/cha byad ngan pa thams cad rnam par bzlog par bya ba'i phyir yongs su 
[\[24b.5\]]bsngo'o/_/lus spa bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/lus kyis khyud na lus la bde bar reg par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/kha dog dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/kha dog 'jam par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/mdog 
[\[24b.6\]]shin tu 'jam par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/bde bar 'gro ba rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas bde bar bsnyen bkur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[24b.7\]]yongs su bsngo ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar byed do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me tog gi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/_dri sna tshogs kyi me tog dang /_kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'i 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]me tog dang /_yid du 'ong ba'i me tog du ma dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]tu 'ong ba'i me tog dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mthun pa med pa'i me tog dang /_dus thams cad na yod pa'i me tog dang /_lha rdzas dang [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]me tog dang /_'od mdzes pa'i me tog dang /_shin 
[\[25a.2\]]tu dri che zhing yid du 'ong bar mdzes pa'i me tog dang /_'di lta bu'i me tog rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten rnams la 'bul ba dang /_chos dkon mchog la mchod pa 
[\[25a.3\]]byed pa dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog la 'bul ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' la 'bul ba dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /_pha dang ma rnams la sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe chung ngu na bdag gi lus dang de ma yin pa'i gzhan bkren 
[\[25a.4\]]pa phongs pa/_slong zhing len pa sna tshogs la de dang de dag sbyin par bya ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi me tog rgyas 
[\[25a.5\]]pa rab tu mthong bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas la dga' ba rab tu rnyed nas blta na [{]myi [,]mi [}]ngoms par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sems can kun gyi sems mi 'khrug pas blta na yid du 'ong bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 
[\[25a.6\]]dge ba'i las la lta zhing nye bar spyod pas lta ba yongs par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la lta ba dang sems mnyams pas rjes su lta ba'i dran pa dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs pa'i 
[\[25a.7\]]dug bsreg pa'i phyir dug sman bzang po nyams myong ba lta bur gyur cig_/sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgyal po chen po la 'gro ba thams cad 'god pas smon lam chen po mthong bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sems can kun gyi rab rib dang /_ling tog dang /_
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]mun pa bstsal ba'i phyir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba mthong bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad byang chub kyi zla 'od dge ba rnam par spel ba'i phyir zla ba lta bu mthong bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong zhing chos kyi rnam pa'i dge 
[\[25b.2\]]ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyis rgya mtsho'i rin po che'i gling du 'jug pa mthong bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad kyis bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i rnam par dag pa rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub 
[\[25b.3\]]sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba'i me tog yongs su gtong bar gtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag de ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' phreng ba'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de sems can thams cad blta na mdzes pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/blta na yid du 
[\[25b.4\]]'ong ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/blta na bzang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/blta na sdug pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/blta na mngon par dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/blta na mya ngan [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/blta na rab tu dga' ba'i phyir yongs su 
[\[25b.5\]]bsngo'o/_/blta na yid mi bde ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas mthong ba dang ldan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa mthong ba rnam par dag pa thob pa'i phyir/_yongs su bsngo ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[25b.6\]]chen po phreng ba'i sbyin pa byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar bsngo ste/_spos yongs su btang bas bsdus pa'i 
[\[25b.7\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad tshul khrims kyi spos dang ldan par gyur cig_/ma nyams pa'i tshul khrims dang /_ma 'dres pa'i tshul khrims dang /_rnyog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul khrims dang /_'gyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul khrims dang /_kun nas 'khor ba 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul khrims dang /_yongs su gdung pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul khrims dang /_log par ma zhugs pa'i tshul khrims dang /_mtha' yas pa'i tshul khrims dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[26a.2\]]dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cig_/tshul khrims kyi phung po gang dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad dang ldan pa de'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can thams cad ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems 
[\[26a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o//_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen 
[\[26a.4\]]po'i mdo/_/bam po gsum pa/_byang chub sems dpa' byug pa'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_byug pa sbyin pas yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad gtang ba thams cad yongs 
[\[26a.5\]]su gtong zhing /_sbyin pas bsgos par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyis shin tu rnam par dag cing tshul khrims kyis bsgos par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i bsam pa rab tu thob cing bzod 
[\[26a.6\]]pas bsgos par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po la brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos shing brtson 'grus kyis bsgos par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[26a.7\]]rab tu thob pas bsam gtan gyis bsgos par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal po la skad cig gis rnam par dag cing shes rab kyis bsgos par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos kyi 'jigs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]rab tu thob cing chos kyis bsgos par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad yon tan thams cad kyi ye shes rab tu thob cing yon tan gyis bsgos par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing byang 
[\[26b.2\]]chub sems dpa'i yongs su bsngo ba thams cad kyis bsgos par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos thams cad rab tu spangs shing chos dkar pos bsgos par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byug pa'i sbyin pa byed pa'i 
[\[26b.3\]]tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' mal cha'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_/sems can thams cad shes rab dang ye shes chen po thob pa'i phyir/_lha rdzas kyi mal 
[\[26b.4\]]cha rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi gos bgo ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir bde 
[\[26b.5\]]ba'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par rol ba'i cho 'phrul yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir rin po che lta bu'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos thams cad legs par bkod pa'i gos 
[\[26b.6\]]bgo ba'i phyir mnyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zil kyis ma non pa rnam par dag pas rgya chen po'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos kyi bde ba dang ldan 
[\[26b.7\]]pas dge ba'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa la brtson pas shin tu dag pa'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bskyab pa dang ldan pas shin tu 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]brtan pa'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas gzims pa lta bu glo g.yas pas 'beb pa dang ldan pas seng ge'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dran pa 
[\[27a.2\]]shes bzhin gyis shin tu bsams pa'i dbang po yang dag par rgyu ba dang ldan pa mal cha'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas kyi sbyin pa 
[\[27a.3\]]byed pa'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad yon tan gyi gnas la brtson zhing /_ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas spyod yul du gyur pa dang gnas pa med cing rten pa med pa'i gnas nas mi g.yo ba dang /_gnas 
[\[27a.4\]]thams cad rnam par bsgom pa dang /_'jig rten gyi gnas las rnam par 'das pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas la gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gnas yongs su zin pa dang /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i gnas kyi mthar phyin pa dang /_bde ba'i gnas la brtson 
[\[27a.5\]]pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gnas la shin tu gnas pa dang /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gnas dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bral zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la gnas par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten 
[\[27a.6\]]thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar sems pa/_sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo bas yongs su skyob pa la gnas kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la de ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/byang chub 
[\[27a.7\]]sems dpa' rgyab rten gyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i sems kyis ye shes kyi rten chen po la spyod pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]gyi rten la spyod pa dang /_bla ma'i rten la spyod pa dang /_legs par spyod pa'i rten la spyod pa dang /_byams pa chen po'i rten la spyod pa dang /_snying rje chen po'i rten la spyod pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rten la spyod pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems 
[\[27b.2\]]shin tu yangs pa'i rten la spyod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam gyi rten la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rten la spyod par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyab rten gyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/_
[\[27b.3\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad yon tan thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /_shin tu dag par 'gyur ba dang /_ye shes rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /_lam rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /_chos rnam par dag par 'gyur ba 
[\[27b.4\]]dang /_bsam pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /_mos pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /_smon lam rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /_mngon par shes pa'i yon tan dang /_ye shes rnam par dag par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/byang 
[\[27b.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste/_til mar gyi mar me 'am/_mar gyi mar me 'am/_rin po che'i mar me 'am/_nor bu'i mar me 'am/_ro'i mar me 'am/_mar me chen po 'am/_a ga ru'i mar me 'am/_tsan dan gyi mar me 'am/_
[\[27b.6\]]spos kyi ro thams cad kyi mar me 'am/_kha dog mtha' yas par snang ba'i mar me 'am/_rnam pa de lta bu'i mar me dag de yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa byed pa na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad la bde ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir 'di 
[\[27b.7\]]ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_mar me'i sbyin pas yongs su bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]chos la snang ba mtha' yas par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'jig rten thams cad shin tu phra ba [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bya ba'i 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]phyir snang ba shin tu gsal zhing dang bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sems can [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i khams yongs su shes shing snang ba rab rib [{]myed [,]med [}]par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'od 'gyed pa'i lus su mngon par byung 
[\[28a.2\]]zhing snang ba mtha' yas par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'od kun tu snang ba dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byed 
[\[28a.3\]]pa dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi 'od rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad 'od gcig gis rgyas par byed cing /_thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snang ba dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i zhing du 
[\[28a.4\]]'od zer rab tu 'gyed cing snang ba dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad ye shes kyi skar mdas 'gro ba thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan zhing 'od snang ba'i skar mda'i rgyal po lta bur gyur cig_/sems can thams cad zhing kun tu 
[\[28a.5\]]'od 'gyed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung zhing snang ba kha dog mtha' yas par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mar me'i sbyin pa rab tu gtong ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_
[\[28a.6\]]sems can thams cad la bde ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bzung bas yongs su 'dzin to/_/sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bzung bas yang dag par 'dzin to/_/sems can thams cad la dge ba'i 
[\[28a.7\]]rtsa ba'i skal bas bgo bsha' byed do/_/sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa bas snying brtse bar byed do/_/sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i skal ba sbyin par byed do/_/sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas rab tu bzung bas rab tu 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]'dzin to/_/sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba byin pas yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par byed do/_/sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par byed do/_/sems can 
[\[28b.2\]]thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba shes pas rnam par dpyod pa byed de/_de ltar mar me'i sbyin pas bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de ci nas kyang sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rab tu dgong pa'i phyir/_yongs su bsngo ba thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gro bas de ltar 
[\[28b.3\]]ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nad kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa kun las shin tu 
[\[28b.4\]]langs par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab tu thob cing lus nad med par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i nad thams cad sos par gyur te/_sman lta bur gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 
[\[28b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa'i tshul gyis sman a ga ru de lta bur gyur cig_/sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i dug bsal shing 'byin cing sangs rgyas kyi sman du gyur cig_/sems can thams cad nyon 
[\[28b.6\]]mongs pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i spyod pa dang ldan zhing nye bar bgrod pa'i ngang tshul can du gyur cig_/sems can thams cad shin tu mi 'khrug pa'i chos dang ldan zhing sman gyi rgyal po lta bur gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams 
[\[28b.7\]]cad gso ba la zhugs shing sman gyi sdong po lta bur gyur cig_/sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snang ba rab tu thob cing nad thams cad byang bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sman gyi sbyor ba la brtson pas 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]'gro ba thams cad kyi sman la mkhas par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad shin tu gso ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/shin tu bde zhing 
[\[29a.2\]]dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas snyun mi mnga' ba lta bu rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad 
[\[29a.3\]]kyi nad kyi zug rngu thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi lus nyams pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing brtan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad rdo rje'i ri khor yug lta bur gzhom du [{]myi [,]mi [}]choms pa dang stobs dang ldan 
[\[29a.4\]]par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad stobs thams cad kyis brtan cing bsam pa shin tu mtho ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi bde ba'i rnam pa zil gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]non pa yongs 
[\[29a.5\]]su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi lus sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis brtan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snod sna tshogs dang /_bre 
[\[29a.6\]]dang lnga bre'i sbyin pa byed pa 'di lta ste/_gser gyi snod dang /_gser gyi bre dang lnga bre rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba dang /_'di lta ste dngul gyi snod dang /_dngul gyi bre dang /_lnga bre rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba dang /_'di lta ste 
[\[29a.7\]]bai DUr+ya'i snod dang /_bai DUr+ya'i bre dang lnga bre rin po che rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su bkang ba dang /_'di lta ste shel gyi snod dang /_shel gyi bre dang /_lnga bre rin po che'i rgyan rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su bkang ba dang /_'di lta ste mu sa ra gal pa'i snod 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]dang /_mu sa ra gal pa'i bre dang /_lnga bre mu tig dmar pos yongs su bkang ba dang /_'di lta ste asma gar b+ha'i snod dang /_asma gar b+ha'i bre dang /_lnga bre rin po che byi ru dang /_nor bu rin po che'i 'od zer snang bas yongs su bkang 
[\[29b.2\]]ba dang /_'di lta ste rin po che shi la'i snod dang /_rin po che shi la'i bre dang /_lnga bre kha zas zhim po ro'i mchog sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba dang /_'di lta ste tsan dan gyi snod dang /_tsan dan gyi bre dang /_lnga bre lha rdzas lta bu'i gos phrugs 
[\[29b.3\]]kyis yongs su bkang ba dang /_'di lta ste rdo rje'i snod dang /_rdo rje'i bre dang /_lnga bre spos rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bkang ba dang /_'di lta ste snod sna tshogs dngos po rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshogs kyis bkang ba dang /_bre 
[\[29b.4\]]dang lnga bre du ma sna tshogs bstsags par bya ba tshad med pa nor gyi dbyig dang /_dngul dang gser phyes yongs su bkang ba de dag yon gyi gnas bsam gyis mi khyab par mos pa'i sems dang ldan pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam la 'bul lam/_dge ba'i bshes 
[\[29b.5\]]gnyen shin tu dkon par sems bskyed pas/_byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog thams cad la 'bul lam/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa shin tu bstan pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'bul lam/_'phags pa'i skye bo la shin tu mos pa'i 
[\[29b.6\]]sems kyis gang zag gi rnam pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas la 'bul lam/_bla ma la bsnyen bkur zhing bshes gnyen la rim gro bya ba'i sems kyis pha dang ma dag la sbyin par byed dam de dang de dag tu yon tan gyi tshogs bsags pa dang /_gdams 
[\[29b.7\]]ngag dang /_bslab pa dang /_'phags pa'i bstan pa la gnas par brtson pas slob dpon dang /_bla ma dang sbyin pa'i gnas la 'bul lam/_sems can thams cad la zhe mi sdang ba'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis byams pa yongs su bsgoms shing gtong ba'i 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]sems kyis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gcig tu nges par zhugs pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa thams cad rtsom zhing tshogs chen 
[\[30a.2\]]po grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pas 'gro ba thams cad yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtang zhing [{]myi [,]mi [}]spang ba'i sems la shin tu gnas te/_sbyin pa'i dngos po thams cad la mngon par ma chags pa dang /_yon gyi gnas thams cad rab tu bzung ba'i sems la gnas pas bkren pa dang /_
[\[30a.3\]]phongs ba'i slong ba rnams la snod sna tshogs dang bre dang lnga bre yo byad kyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su bkang ba de dag sbyin pa dang yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad dran pa'i 
[\[30a.4\]]dbang po nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa dang ldan te/_'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i skad thams cad gzung ba dang /_blang ba dang /_yid la bya ba'i dran pa rmongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing /_snod tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snying po can du gyur cig_/sems can 
[\[30a.5\]]thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo rgyun 'chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos can du gyur te/_snod bzang po rnam par dag par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yang 
[\[30a.6\]]dag par 'dzin pa'i chos can du gyur te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snod rin po che lta bur gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub dbyer [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la mos pas yang dag par gzung 
[\[30a.7\]]zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos yangs pa'i snod du gyur cig_/sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rgya che zhing mthu che ba la yang dag par gzhol bas rin po che'i snod rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa shin tu brgyan pa lta bur gyur cig_/sems 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mtha' dang dbung med pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la mos pa rnam par dag cing yon tan thams cad kyi snod dang 'byung gnas su gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pas thams cad mkhyen 
[\[30b.2\]]pa'i ye shes kyi mthar gtugs te/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi khongs su chud par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sems can gyi khams thams cad ma lus par thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs la rab tu gzhag pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par 
[\[30b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i snod du gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag gis chos bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur te/_yon tan mchog thams cad dang dus gsum gyi 
[\[30b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi snod du gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la gsol ba 'debs pa dang chos yongs su 'dri ba la smra ba'i sngon du 'gro ba'i skyes bur gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[30b.5\]]cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa gang bar byed pa shong ba'i snod du gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ci nas kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[30b.6\]]kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i snod du 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shing rta sna tshogs dang /_shing rta du ma dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing rta tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag 
[\[30b.7\]]sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /_bla ma dang /_ston pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /_dge 'dun dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_sbyin pa'i gnas sna tshogs slong zhing len pa dang /_
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]phyogs gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i gang zag sna tshogs dang phongs pa dang bkren pa slong ba dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sgra thos te 'ongs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpar yid ches pas skabs phye ste 'ongs pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[31a.2\]]sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang sbyin pa'i sgra thos te 'ongs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang sems kyis bos shing bstabs pa de dag las sbyin zhing gtong ba 'di lta ste/_nor bu'i shing rta la rgyan gyis shin tu mdzes par byas pa sbyin pa 'am/_
[\[31a.3\]]gser gyi shing rta la dril bu'i dra ba rab tu 'khor ba'i rgyan rin po che'i srad bu'i lda ldi bkye ba sbyin pa 'am/_bai DUr+ya'i shing rta la rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu spras pa sbyin pa 'am/_dngul gyi shing rta la shin tu dag pa'i gser 
[\[31a.4\]]rab tu bzang po'i dra bas g.yogs shing rta cang shes la bcas pa rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas brgyan cing klubs par sbyin pa 'am/_gser gyi shing rta la rin po che'i dra ba dang rgyan thams cad phun sum tshogs pas brgyan cing glang po cang shes la 
[\[31a.5\]]bcas pa sbyin pa 'am/_tsan dan gyi shing rta la rin po che'i dam pa sna tshogs gyis shin tu spras te rin po che'i seng ge'i khris brgyan pa/_na cung brgya phrag stong zhon pa/_rgyan thams cad dang rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi gdugs phun sum tshogs 
[\[31a.6\]]pa skyes bu cang shes brgya stong du mas drang ba sbyin pa 'am/_/shel gyi shing rta la rin po che du mas kha dog rnam par 'byes par shin tu mdzes par byas shing /_na cung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yongs su gang ba rin po che'i bla res yog 
[\[31a.7\]]par bres pa/_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan sna tshogs kyis phyogs bzhi nas brgyan pa sbyin pa 'am/_asma gar b+ha'i shing rta la rin po che sna tshogs du mas shin tu mdzes par byas te/_spos sna tshogs dri zhim pos bdugs pa/_spos [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]dam pa thams cad kyi byug pas rab tu byugs pa/_me tog gi rgyan thams cad kyis chal par bkang ba/_bu mo brgya phrag stong gis rin po che'i srad bu thogs te/_'khrul ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par drang ba sbyin pa 'am/_dri zhim po sna tshogs kyi shing rta la ras dang 
[\[31b.2\]]gos sna tshogs kyi bla re bres pa rin po che'i dra bas yog par khebs pa/_spos zhim po yid du 'ong ba rnam par dag pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mthun pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa tshor na dga' ba shin tu 'thul ba mtshams kyi lha'i bus drang ba/_rin po che'i 'khor lo thams cad kyis shin tu brgyan cing 
[\[31b.3\]]mdzes par byas pa sbyin pa 'am/_rin po che thams cad tshogs pa'i 'od 'byung ba'i shing rta la kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ba'i rin po che rnam pa du ma'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i bla re bres pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba mtha' 
[\[31b.4\]]yas pa kun nas sbyangs pa/_bu dang bu mo bskyon pa spos sna tshogs kyi phye mas mtha' 'khor shin tu sbyangs pa sbyin pa byed pa na de dag las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_
[\[31b.5\]]sems can thams cad sangs rgyas la yon tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'bul bar dad cing sbyin pa'i gnas kyi dam pa la shin tu mos par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas la rab tu rten par gyur cig_/
[\[31b.6\]]sems can thams cad gtong ba rgya chen po yongs su grub pas sangs rgyas thams cad la yongs su gtong bar mos par gyur cing /_sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar ba bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rab tu thob cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi smon 
[\[31b.7\]]lam dang bral te/_sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i yon tan thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis myong bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad mtha' yas pa'i ye shes la shin tu mos shing sangs rgyas la yon gsol bzang mi shes par gyur cig/_
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]sems can thams cad bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal pos rnam par dag cing ye shes kyi mchog la rab tu rten par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul thams cad du 'gro ba thob ste/_gang du dga' bar 'gro bar gyur 
[\[32a.2\]]cig/_sems can thams cad ye shes mtha' yas pa'i 'byung gnas la rab tu 'khod pa 'grub pa'i phyir ye shes chen po la rab tu rten par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi zhing las rnam par skye ba'i chos can du gyur te bsod nams 
[\[32a.3\]]kyi zhing dam par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos shing sangs rgyas thams cad la mi dga' ba med pa'i sems su gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sems kyi skad cig gcig gis chos kyi 
[\[32a.4\]]dbyings thams cad du ngal ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa lhun gyis grub par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad kyi drung du phyin pas byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 
[\[32a.5\]]shes pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du shin tu rnam par phye ba'i lus la rab tu zhugs par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad gnas dpe [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i lus rab tu thob pas ngal zhing dub pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro bar gyur cig_/
[\[32a.6\]]sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i yid [(]gyis [,]kyis [)]'gro ba dang ldan zhing lus kyi mgyogs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sems kyi skad cig gcig gis bsam pa dang /_khams khyab par byed pas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 
[\[32a.7\]]'phrul pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i snang ba dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]rjes su 'gro ba la bde bar 'gro bas rab tu brtson par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i ye shes thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug par 'gro ba thob pas shin tu myur du 'gro bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings 
[\[32b.2\]]thams cad tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad par 'jug pa la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad du 'gro ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang tshul shes te/_byang chub sems 
[\[32b.3\]]dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa khong du chud pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas 'dong bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos nyid thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing chos ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bas 'dra ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye shes kyi tshul thob par gyur cig_/ces de 
[\[32b.4\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mngon du gyur pa 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin 
[\[32b.5\]]gshegs pa'i theg pa bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'byung ba'i mthar phyin par yongs su bsngo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su 
[\[32b.6\]]bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad byas pa'i drin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ba'i phyir/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ba'i sems stor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad skal pa mnyam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 
[\[32b.7\]]'dzin pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang don mthun par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad gtong ba dang yongs su gtong ba thams cad kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bla ma'i rim gros cher brtson par 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]gyur cig_/sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang nye bar byas te/_spyad pa bsgrub pa'i phyir bsam pa dge ba dang ldan par gyur sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mthun pa'i bsnyen 
[\[33a.2\]]bkur la nan tan byed pas/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sems 'khrul pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing nyams pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'dres pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing rnyog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la grol ba'i bsam 
[\[33a.3\]]pa can du gyur cig_/sems can thams cad yo byad ci 'dod pa rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la lus yongs su gtong bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad byams pa dang ldan zhing khon [{]myed [,]med [}]par rim gro byed pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes 
[\[33a.4\]]gnyen gyis yongs su bzung zhing rab tu brtan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kun tu mthun pa yang dag par mnyan pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mthun par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad smon lam gcig pas 
[\[33a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'byung ba dang /_stobs kyi mthar gtugs pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa dang mthun zhing gcig par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin thams cad 
[\[33a.6\]]kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pas shes rab bzang pos chos kyi brtson 'grus la shin tu byung bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos thams cad bzung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthas gtugs par khong du chud pas rig pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[33a.7\]]phyin pa thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i theg pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar gtugs te theg pa chen pos mngon par spyod cing yang dag par gnas par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bde ba'i phyogs las 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i yid dang ldan zhing 'gro ba thams cad shes pa'i ye shes 'dzin par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos la ji ltar thos pa bzhin du rmongs pa med pas chos thams cad la rab tu gzhol zhing ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i 
[\[33b.2\]]mngon par shes pa dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams cad la 'byung ba'i mthar thug ste/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 
[\[33b.3\]]nyams pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dpe [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rab tu thob pas mgyogs pa dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas 'gro bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_theg pa chen pos 'dul ba la rab tu zhugs 
[\[33b.4\]]pas 'gro zhing 'ong ba phun sum tshogs par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad ye shes kyi shing rtas 'gro ba'i mthar thug pas gti mug [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gro bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad du 'gro ba'i tshul shes 
[\[33b.5\]]shing chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i shing rta bzhon pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shing rta 'bul ba dang yongs su gtong bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams 
[\[33b.6\]]cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la tshul gyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas bsnyen cing bkur ba'i yongs su bsgrub pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa thams cad la shin 
[\[33b.7\]]tu bslabs pa'i sems dang ldan pa shes rab kyis shin tu rtogs pa'i bsam pa can/_yon tan gyis rnam par dag pa'i yid dang ldan pa/_mthun par yongs su gtong ba'i bsam pa can/_dge 'dun rin po che shin tu dkon pa'i sems 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]dang ldan pa/_tshogs rin po che la shin tu mos pa'i bsam pa can/_bstan pa rab tu bzung ba'i yid dang ldan pa/_lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu brtan pa'i bsam pa can/_rim gro byed pa dang ldan pa/_mchod sbyin 
[\[34a.2\]]chen po'i mchod sbyin shin tu byas pa/_bstan pa'i yon tan chen po brjod pa/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yon tan tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pas 'od gsal zhing rnyog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par dag pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe/_
[\[34a.3\]]dge 'dun dkon mchog la shing rta phul bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la yang dag par gzhol bas yang dag par zin par gyur cig_
[\[34a.4\]]sems can thams cad 'phags pa'i skye mched las chos gzhan [{]myed [,]med [}]par shin tu grub pas/_sems nang du gzhol bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas yang dag par bzung bas 'phags par red 
[\[34a.5\]]par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun gyi shes pas yid ches par bya bas grangs su bgrang bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa'i rang bzhin shes pa khong du chud pas chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i dbyings la 
[\[34a.6\]]yang dag par gzhol bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul gyis yang dag par byung bas cang shes kyis kun nas bskor bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad 
[\[34a.7\]]dang bral bar nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos la spyod par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'phags pa'i dge 'dun so so'i skye bo [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sas bla na med pa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog rab tu brjod par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chags 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par gyur pa'i ye shes la shin tu brtson pa'i chos can du gyur te/_'phags pa'i chos dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad khams gsum thams cad kyis gos pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems dang ldan zhing tshogs kyi rgyal po dam par gyur 
[\[34b.2\]]cig_/sems can thams cad ye shes kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la mkhas pas legs par bcas pa'i ye shes kyi bzhon pa dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yang brjod du med 
[\[34b.3\]]par shin tu 'gro ba'i 'gros la mkhas pas sems skad cig gi_/rdzu 'phrul rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing nam mkha' lta bu'i lus kyi shing rta sgrub par 
[\[34b.4\]]gyur cig_/sems can thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs par khyab par byed pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob par 
[\[34b.5\]]gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ma lus par gang du dga' bar 'gro zhing rgyu ba dang ldan pas lus yang ba'i khyad par rjes su rtogs pa rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams 
[\[34b.6\]]cad du lus yang dag par ston pa'i phyir/_rdzu 'phrul gyi 'khor mtha' yas pa la mkhas par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus 'phos pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gro ba yang dag par ston pa'i phyir/_rdzu 'phrul chen 
[\[34b.7\]]po'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i lus rab tu 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad dus la ji ltar 'bab par sems can yongs su smin par byed cing /_'dul ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ba'i phyir bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par ston 
[\[35a.2\]]par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad skad cig gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis sems skad cig gcig gis phyogs thams cad du 'gro ba'i rdzu 'phrul la mngon par mkhas par gyur cig ces/_de ltar 
[\[35a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'dun la shing rta 'bul zhing yongs su gtong bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag de ltar sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta la gnas pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba 
[\[35a.4\]]dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo dang /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad shes pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes nye bar 
[\[35a.5\]]gzhag pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_rim gro can zhes dang ldan pa/_bdag nyid che ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho'i tshul la mkhas pa/_yon tan dang ye shes kyi 'byung gnas kyi rigs dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon 
[\[35a.6\]]tan la rnam par sems pa/_mthu chen por skyes pa bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dus brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa thams cad du spyod pa rnam par spyad pa la rab tu zhugs pa/_
[\[35a.7\]]bdud kyi bcings pa thams cad las sems rab tu grol ba/_bdud du ma'i sde dang bdud thams cad kyi shes pa'i stobs rab tu 'joms pa'i sems dang ldan pa gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos la mkhas pas/_snang bar gyur pa de nyan thos dang /_rang 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]sangs rgyas la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe/_shing rta yongs su btang bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_sems can thams cad bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sbyin pa yongs su smin pa grub pas sbyin pa'i gnas kyi dam 
[\[35b.2\]]par yid ches par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad gcig tu spyod cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis par yang dag par spyod pas 'du 'dzi [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la dga' bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad bsod nams kyis yang dag par bsdu ba la 
[\[35b.3\]]brtson pas sbyin pa rnam par dag par byed pa'i mchog tu gyur cig_/sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'bras bu rab tu gtong bas ye shes kyi mu stegs las byung bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i dkyil 
[\[35b.4\]]'khor mchog gis rnam par dag pas bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par rtogs par khong du chud par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par khong du chud pas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos la rnam par spyod par gyur cig 
[\[35b.5\]]sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi zhing sbyin pa'i gnas 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar byas pas bsod nams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa shin tu bstsags par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas su byas te/_phan 'dogs pa rnam par 
[\[35b.6\]]dag pas cho 'phrul mtha' yas pas rnam par rol pa yang dag par ston par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i theg pa mchog gi 'bras bu yongs su stobs pas sbyin pa'i gnas yon tan zad mi shes par gyur cig_/sems can thams 
[\[35b.7\]]cad bsod nams kyi phung po/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]zad pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i mthar thug par gyur te/_sbyin pa'i gnas don yod pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad ma thos pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshig dang yi ge 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]'dzin cing sdig pa'i chos rab tu zhi bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sgra don yod pa ye shes kyis rnam par rig pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyan pa la mos shing brtson par gyur cig_/sems 
[\[36a.2\]]can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad las thos pa rjes su bsgrags pa'i chos can du gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad zhags pa 'thub pa dgu bcu rtsa drug gi lta ba las rnam par 
[\[36a.3\]]'das te bstan pa la gnas pa'i bya ba la mos par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog rnam par spel bar byed cing 'phags pa mthong ba rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'phags pa mthong zhing 'grogs pa'i bde ba 
[\[36a.4\]]dang ldan zhing ye shes kyis spyod pa'i gang zag la mos par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi lta ba rjes su thos pa las byung bas/_thos pa don yod par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bstan pa la rab tu gzung ba dang 
[\[36a.5\]]yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ye shes kyi mkhas pa rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gsal bar bya ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pas chos thams cad thos pa shin tu 'dzin pa la zhugs par 
[\[36a.6\]]gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i mdzod kyis dga' bar spyod cing gtong ba shin tu byed pa dang /_mchod sbyin shin tu byas pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la yon tan ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces/_de ltar 
[\[36a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa mchog dam pa phul rab tu 'thob cing ci nas 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i gnas dang len pa sna tshogs phyogs gzhan dang gzhan nas 
[\[36b.2\]]'ongs pa'i gang zag dang /_slong ba phongs pa dang bkren pa mang po tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa byang chub sems dpa'i sgra thos te 'ongs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang /_sems bskyed pas mos shing bstabs pa thams cad gtong bas shin tu re ba'i 
[\[36b.3\]]yid can de dag 'ongs pa mthong nas/_slong ba la rim gro bya bas [{]myi [,]mi [}]ngoms pa'i sems kyis slong ba 'ongs pa rnams la bzod pa gsol ba'i sems bskyed de/_'di ltar bdag nyid phyogs de dag tu khyod kyi drung du song ste rim gro bya ba zhig na/_de 'di ltar 
[\[36b.4\]]khyod 'dir phyin te shin tu ngal bar gyur to/_/zhes spyi bos btud de bzod pa gsol bas slong ba thams cad bzod par byas rim gror byas/_ngal ba bstis nas ci 'dod pa sbyin pa de dag gis shin tu rim gror byed de/_'di ltar nor bu'i shing rta 
[\[36b.5\]]'dzam bu'i gling gi na chung bzang mo rin po ches yongs su gang ba dang /_'di lta ste gser gyi shing rta yul gyi na chung rin po che shin tu rnam par dag pas yongs su bkang ba dang /_'di lta ste bai DUr+ya'i shing rta chung ma'i 'khor glu dang rol mo brdung zhing dkrol 
[\[36b.6\]]ba dang ldan pas yongs su bkang ba dang /_'di lta ste dngul gyi shing rta shin tu mdzes pa bud [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhon nu lha'i bu mo lta bus yongs su gang ba dang /_'di lta ste rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i shing rta bud [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[36b.7\]]cang shes rin po che rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa tshul mkhas pas yongs su gang ba dang /_'di lta ste tsan dan gyi shing rta byang chub sems dpa' zhon par 'os pa dang /_'di lta ste shel gyi shing rta bud [{]myed [,]med [}]bzang mo bzhin bzang ba cha byad sdug gu shin 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]tu brgyan pa gzugs mdzes pa lta na sdug cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthun pa med pas/_yongs su bkang ba dang /_'di lta ste a sma gar ba'i shing rta dbang bskur bas yongs su gang ba dang /_'di lta ste spos dam pa'i shing rta bu dang bu mos yongs 
[\[37a.2\]]su bkang ba dang /_'di lta ste rin po che'i tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i shing rta nang gi bshes gnyen dbyer [{]myi [,]mi [}]phyed pas yongs su bkang ba dang /_de rnam pa 'di lta bu'i shing rta grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnam pa sna tshogs slong mo ba thams cad la sbyin zhing yongs su gtong 
[\[37a.3\]]bas slong ba 'dod par bya ba'i dngos po rab tu thob pas yid la bsam pa shin tu rdzogs nas slong ba de dag thams cad sbyin pa thams cad sbyin pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par bzung ste/_shin tu tshim par byas shing bsam pa rdzogs par byas nas dga' ba dang mgu ba dang 
[\[37a.4\]]rang sa pa dang yid bde ba skyes par byas te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad byang chub kyi shing drung du bsam gyis mi khyab cing thogs pa med pa'i shing rta'i 'khor lo phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pas 'gro ba dang ldan te/_
[\[37a.5\]]thog pa chen po'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la spyod cing phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par chos kyi shing rta cang shes la zhon par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 
[\[37a.6\]]chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa'i rlom sems med cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i rigs kyi lam la brtson pas chos thams cad ci yang ma yin pa'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad thogs pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[37a.7\]]zhing thams cad du 'gro ba la brtson pas kun tu 'gro ba dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la dga' bas mos shing yang dag par 'gro ba la brtson pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa'i shing rta 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]rjes su 'thun pa la rab tu gnas par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i lam bcu dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam 
[\[37b.2\]]par dag pa'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad tshul dang 'dra ba'i yul na gnas pa dang ldan pa dang /_skyes bu dam pa la rten pa thob pas/_sngon byas pa'i bsod nams shin tu bstsags pa dang /_yang dag pa'i smon lam 
[\[37b.3\]]la shin tu brtson pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyod pa rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pas 'khor lo bzhi pa'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa'i stobs 
[\[37b.4\]]dang ye shes la brtson pas phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings su chos kyi snang ba gtong ba la bslab par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos kyi shing rtas 'byung ba'i pha rol du phyin pa thob ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi shing rta la zhon par gyur cig_/
[\[37b.5\]]sems can thams cad phyogs thams cad du legs pa dang bde ba yang dag par ston pas bsod nams thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i shing rta la mkhas par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'jungs pa'i dri 
[\[37b.6\]]ma rab tu byang ste sbyin pa gtong bas 'byung ba'i shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa ma lus pas tshul khrims rnam par dag pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[37b.7\]]shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sems 'khrugs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par gnas pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa 'khrugs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]cad 'byung ba'i shing rtas snying po byang chub tu 'gro bar spyod pa'i go cha bgos pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad shin tu mgyogs pa'i shing rtas snying po 
[\[38a.2\]]byang chub tu byung ste/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi shing rta la shin tu zhon zhing sangs rgyas kyi yul sprul pas rgyas par byed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[38a.3\]]pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos yongs su gtong ba la 'jigs pa med pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don du sbyin pa gtong ba'i phyir chos kyi rgyal po'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 
[\[38a.4\]]chos kyi mtshan nyid dang rang bzhin gyi phyogs thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa rmongs pa med pa'i phyir smon lam la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad theg pa chen po ma nor bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye 
[\[38a.5\]]zhing lus yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi shing rta la zhon par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam skyo ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i 
[\[38a.6\]]phyir/_thams cad mkhyen pa rin po che'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i gnas dang len pa dang spong ba sna tshogs la shing rta dga' ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang mos pa dang spro ba'i 
[\[38a.7\]]yid kyi rnam par rtog pas byin pas yongs su bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa la bzhon pa shin tu bsgrubs pas ye shes dang sems kyi rnam pa mtha' yas pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]yongs su bsngo'o//_//sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po bzhi ba/_/'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glang po cang shes yan lag bdun shin tu gnas 
[\[38b.2\]]pa lo drug cu lon pa mche ba drug dang ldan pa/_kha dog pad mo lta bu gdong rnam par dag pa/_dkar zhing dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gser gyi rgyal mtshan can gser gyi rgyan dang ldan pa/_gser gyi dra bas lus kun nas yog pa/_sna rin po che sna tshogs kyi 
[\[38b.3\]]dra ba'i rgyan du bcug pa/_gser ltar blta na mdzes pa dpag tshad stong gi khyon du ngal ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gro ba sbyin zhing gtong ba 'am/_rta cang shes gom pa zo mdog bde bar 'dor zhing 'deg pa dang /_bya ltar mgyogs pa dang ldan pa/_rngog ma lcang 
[\[38b.4\]]lor 'khril ba/_nam tsong dang rmig par ldan pa/_rmig pa'i dbyibs mtho zhing skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gser gyi dril bu'i dra bas brgyan pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang /_zla ba dang ldan pa/_glo kun nas brgyan pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi gdong 
[\[38b.5\]]rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa zhon na bde ba lus la byams pa shin tu mgyogs pa phyogs bzhir yid ltar mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa/_lha rdzas lta bu'i lhab lhub thams cad dang ldan pa de lta bu'i bla ma'i skye bo dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes 
[\[38b.6\]]gnyen dang /_pha dang ma dang phongs pa dang /_bkren pa dang /_slong ba dang len pa'i 'gro ba thams cad la sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba dang /_sems yangs pas sbyin pa dang /_sems la chags pa med par gtong ba dang /_rjes su 'gyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[38b.7\]]pas yid mgu bar byed pa dang /_snying rje chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i bsam pas gtong ba chen po rab tu gtong zhing /_byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la rab tu brtson pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su mngon par skyes 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyis byung ste/_cang shes kyi theg pa la rab tu gnas 
[\[39a.2\]]par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyi theg pas byung ste/_theg pa bzang po'i bzhon pa la mngon par zhon par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgribs pa med pa'i ye 
[\[39a.3\]]shes kyi theg pas snang bar gyur te/_theg pa chen po la shin tu mos par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad smon lam thams cad sgrol ba la rab tu zhugs pas brtsam pa chen po'i theg pa dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad dge ba'i 
[\[39a.4\]]rtsa ba mnyam par bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar ba tu 'thob pa la pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byung bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye shes rin po ches sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la shin tu 'byung ba'i chos 
[\[39a.5\]]can du gyur te/_theg pa rin po che yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pa'i sems dang rgyud du gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan rnam par bsags pa'i 
[\[39a.6\]]theg pas shin tu byung bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad mtha' yas pa'i theg pa myur ba la mngon par brtson pa'i ye shes kyi chos can du gyur te/_bskal pa grangs med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i rjes su bsam pa rjes su sems shing 
[\[39a.7\]]rnam par sbyong bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yang dag par bsgrub pa la mkhas pas longs spyod kyi mchog thams cad dang cang shes kyi theg pa chen po'i sbyin pa byed par gyur cig_/sems can 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]thams cad 'gro ba kun thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyi mthar gtugs par mngon par gzung bar bya ba'i phyir/_theg pa shin tu mtho bar gnas shing rab tu brtan pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[39b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po glang po cang shes dang rta cang shes bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad chags pa med pa'i theg pa la mngon par bskyon zhing ye shes kyi bzhon pa/_yongs su 'grub 
[\[39b.3\]]pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa bsgrib pa med pas 'byung ba'i mthar thug par yongs su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa chos kyi dbang byed pa/_stan gyi sbyin pa byed cing 
[\[39b.4\]]rgyal po bzhugs pa'i khri stan bzang po bai DUr+ya'i rkang pa can seng ge'i khri la gnas pa/_gser gyi rgyu dang rin po che'i dra bas blas pa/_stan reg na bde ba grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa du ma bting ba/_nyen kor spos kyi dam pa thams cad kyis shin tu dri zhim par 
[\[39b.5\]]byas pa nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_gser gyi dra ba'i bla re bres pa/_gser gyi dril bu'i dra ba 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs 'byung ba/_rin po che'i 'bru bye ba 
[\[39b.6\]]khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor te rnam par phye bas shin tu 'phags shing blta na mdzes pa/_srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pas kun nas blta ba/_gdugs khab gcig gis sa chen po thams cad skyong bar dbang 
[\[39b.7\]]bskur ba/_rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thams cad la dbang ba'i stan du bya ba de la 'dug cing 'khor lo thogs pa med pas bskyang ba dang /_chis bya ba la rgyal po'i bka' thams cad nyams pa med par nyan pa/_dpal rnam par snang ba dang /_in dra nI la 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]dang /_nor bu rin po che'i snying pos spras pa/_nyi ma dang zla ba dang skar ma che phra lta bur rab tu brgyan pa/_rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs rmad du byung bas brgyan pa rin po che khyad par du 'phags pa rgya mtshos spras pa/_rgya mtsho dang /_
[\[40a.2\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_bkra shis dang /_bum pa sna tshogs yongs su gang ba dang /_dga' ba 'khyil pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi gyim bag dri ma med cing rdul dang bral bas bkab pa de la 'dzam bu'i gling thams 
[\[40a.3\]]cad kyi bdag po spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ba'i bsod nams kyi stobs dang ldan pa/_byams pas dbang bskur ba/_pha rol gyi 'khor bcom pa dang ldan pa/_bka' la zlog pa med pa 'dug na dga' ba de lta bu'i stan gyi rnam pa tshul de 'dra ba 
[\[40a.4\]]sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba dang /_de dang de dag gi rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa la khri stan bzang po'i rnam pa/_de lta bu'i sbyin pa byed cing yongs su gtong ba dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sbyin pa'i gnas kyi dam pa la 
[\[40a.5\]]gsol ba 'am/_skyes bu dam pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen nam/_'phags pa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog gam/_chos smra ba 'am/_chos la dgab pa'i phyir yongs su g.yog pa'i sems kyis sam/_pha dang ma dang bla ma'i skye bo 'am/_nyan 
[\[40a.6\]]thos dang rang rgyal ba'i sbyin pa'i gnas sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad dam/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod rten mchod pa'i phyir ram/_phongs pa dang /_bkren pa slong ba dpag tu 
[\[40a.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag gam/_sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir yang rung ste/_sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i ye shes dang ldan zhing shin tu byang chub pa'i stan dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bdud kyi dkrugs ma dang dpung rab tu gzhom pa'i phyir/_chos kyi dbang phyug thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ri rnam pa thams cad du 
[\[40b.2\]]thub pa med pa'i lus dang ldan zhing 'gro ba thams cad la dbang ba'i stan rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta bar 'os shing sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa'i seng ge'i gdan rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can 
[\[40b.3\]]thams cad 'gro ba kun la chos kyi dbang phyug gis skyong ba'i phyir stan gyi rgyan dang 'khor rnam par dag pa brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yang brjod du med pa rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba tshogs chen po rnam par dag pas/_khams gsum pas 
[\[40b.4\]]zil gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]non pa'i stan rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bskal pa grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]par sangs rgyas kyi gdan gyi yon tan bsngags pa mthar thug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang ldan zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yang brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stan gyis 
[\[40b.5\]]rgyas par byed pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad lus kyis rgyas par byed pa'i phyir gter chen po'i tshogs kyi stan la gnas par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad ji ltar dam 
[\[40b.6\]]bcas pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas rim gro byed pa'i phyir/_rgyan gyi rnam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i stan rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad rdzu 'phrul dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa thams 
[\[40b.7\]]cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par ston pa'i phyir dge ba'i stan la rab tu gnas par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid che ba 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]thams cad dang /_khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par ston pa'i phyir/_rin po che thams cad kyi stan dang spos thams cad kyi stan dang /_me tog thams cad kyi stan dang /_gos thams cad kyi stan dang /_phreng ba thams 
[\[41a.2\]]cad kyi stan dang /_nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi stan dang /_bai DUr+ya sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stan dang /_'jig rten gyi khams brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yang brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ltar tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i stan dang 'gro ba thams cad ma lus par rgyan gyis rnam 
[\[41a.3\]]par dag pa'i stan dang /_rdo rje'i gdan thams cad la 'khod par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' stan gyi sbyin pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis ma gos pa'i byang chub kyi 
[\[41a.4\]]stan rab tu thob cing /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdugs kyi sbyin pa byed cing dbang phyug gi lus la dgab pa'i gdugs rin po 
[\[41a.5\]]che'i rgyan chen pos shin tu brgyan pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong khyad par du 'phags shing dbang che ba'i yo byad du bya ba/_rin po che'i rtsa ba can dril bu'i dra bas kun nas bskor ba/_rin po che'i srad bus gser gyi dril bu sbyangs ba'i sgra 'byung ba/_rin po che'i bai 
[\[41a.6\]]DUr+ya'i phreng ba rab tu sbyangs pa/_nyen kor nas rnga'i sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/_gser gyi dra ba rnam par dag pas g.yogs shing brgyan pa/_rin po che'i dra ba brgya phrag stong gi bla re bres pa/_nor bu rin po che'i 'bru grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pas 
[\[41a.7\]]spras pa/_rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas sna tshogs su bres shing brgyan pa/_a ga ru dang /_tsan dan dang /_spos kyi dam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stod du mas/_nyen kor dri zhim par bsgos shing bdugs pa/_'dzam bu chu klung 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]gi gser ltar 'od gsal zhing dag pa rgyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mtha' yas pas brgyan pa de bas kyang ches lhag pa'i gdugs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa byed cing sems can gyi gtso bo mngon du 
[\[41b.2\]]gyur pa 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten brgyan pa'i phyir ram/_chos btsal ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen nam/_byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba btsun par bya ba dag 
[\[41b.3\]]gam/_pha dang ma 'am dge 'dun dkon mchog gam/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa 'am/_sbyin pa'i gnas kyi gang zag sna tshogs sam/_slob dpon dang bla ma dang /_byang chub kyi theg pa grub pa 'am/_de la zhugs pa dag gam/_
[\[41b.4\]]phongs pa dang /_bkren pa slong ba dang /_len pa dag la 'bul ba dang /_yongs su gtong ba dang sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi g.yog pa rab tu thob 
[\[41b.5\]]ste/_dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par g.yogs par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su 'das te/_yon tan dang ye shes kyis mngon par bkab par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 
[\[41b.6\]]'jig rten gyi rdul dang mun pa dang yongs su gdung ba thams cad las rnam par 'das te lus shin tu bkab par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na sdug cing sangs rgyas thams cad la mnga' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po can du 
[\[41b.7\]]gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos la log pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'jug par brtson pas ma 'khrugs pa'i chos dkar pos shin tu bkab par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos kyi lus kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mthar gtugs te mngon 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]par bgab pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun la stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi bla res skyob pas gdugs su red par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad khams gsum thams cad 
[\[42a.2\]]las shin tu 'phags shing chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snying po dang ldan pas ye shes kyis rnam par snang bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas dam pa la bsod nams thams cad kyis mchod pa'i phyir gdugs su 'os par gyur cig_/
[\[42a.3\]]sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi gdugs rnam par sangs rgyas pas gdugs kyi dam par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdugs kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad 
[\[42a.4\]]kyis chos la dbang ba'i gdugs yang dag par bzung ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/gdugs gcig gis nam mkha' thams cad kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams 
[\[42a.5\]]cad du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par bstan pa las phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings thams cad gdugs gcig gis brgyan te/_de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/
[\[42a.6\]]gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan yid du 'ong bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la mngon par dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ma lus par gdugs kyi rgyan gyis kun tu g.yog par bya ba'i phyir yongs 
[\[42a.7\]]su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la mos pa'i sems can thams cad dang 'gro ba'i tshogs thams cad gdugs thams cad kyis dgab ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa sangs 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]rgyas gcig la phul bas sangs rgyas thams cad la brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i gdugs phul bar sems shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub mngon par byang chub pas 'phags pa'i gdugs kyis sangs rgyas thams cad dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/
[\[42b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi sku ji snyed 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad na bzhugs pa thams cad la gdugs kyis dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gdugs 
[\[42b.3\]]dang rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba brgyus shing klubs pa dang /_spos thams cad kyi mchog gi dri zhim po'i ngad 'byung ba'i gdugs dang rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par spras pa'i gdugs dang /_rgyan mdzes shing rnam par dag pa'i gdugs dang /_rgyan 
[\[42b.4\]]tshad med par yangs shing rgya che ba dang /_gser gyi dra bas kun nas yog par brgyan pa/_dril bu'i dra ba kun nas sbyangs pa'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa 'byung ba'i gdugs dang /_ye shes bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i gdugs dang /_sangs 
[\[42b.5\]]rgyas thams cad la mngon par dgab pa'i gdugs yongs su btang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdugs kyi sbyin pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad 
[\[42b.6\]]la ye shes mchog gi gdugs kyis mngon par dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyis kun nas yog cing rab tu brgyan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang yon tan dang dgongs pa dam pa 
[\[42b.7\]]rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems rin po che mtha' yas pa la dbang sgyur ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos thams cad la ye shes kyis dbang sgyur ba kun tu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis mngon par yog par yongs su bsngo ba'i don du yongs su bsngo'o/_/'gro ba thams cad kyis ye shes mchog gi gdugs rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[43a.2\]]thams cad kyi stobs bcu'i bla rer bres pa'i gdugs su 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig gis yog par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_chos thams cad la dbang phyug tu dbang sgyur ba'i 
[\[43a.3\]]dbang thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/mthu chen po dang dbang chen po'i sems kyi rgyud thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/blo yangs pa dang sems rgya che ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/yon tan tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pas 'gro ba thams 
[\[43a.4\]]cad mngon par dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/yon tan thams cad kyis sems mngon par dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyis 'gro ba thams cad mngon par dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/ye shes chen pos 
[\[43a.5\]]mnyam par dgab pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyis bsngo ba'i tshul ma lus par thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems dang bsam pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/bsam 
[\[43a.6\]]pa dge ba dang yid kyi dbang po rnam par dag pa dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsngo ba chen pos mngon par dgab cing yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[43a.7\]]dpa' chen po rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i yu ba can/_rin po che'i dril bu'i dra ba 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba snam bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs spyangs pa/_kha dog dang tshon sna tshogs kyis snam bus brgyan cing 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]bsgreng ba/_gser gyi dra bas kun nas spyangs shing klubs pa/_gser gyi dril bu'i sgra 'byung ba dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas shin tu brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kha dog tha dad pa tshon tha dad pa shin tu mtho ba rin po ches rnam pa sna 
[\[43b.2\]]tshogs su brgyan pa/_rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo zla kham gyis mdzes par brgyan pa/_'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bcug pa/_'od gzer rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba/_rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan gyis thams cad kun tu yog pa/_rgyal 
[\[43b.3\]]mtshan gyi rgyan rnam pa du ma 'od dang ldan pas rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs bsgreng ba'i rgyan de lta bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa la mos pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang /_'jig 
[\[43b.4\]]rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings thams cad 'byam klas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'byam klas pa la gnas pa/_yangs pa kun tu rgyal mtshan gyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong bar mos pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 
[\[43b.5\]]rgyas par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa dang mos pa'i khyad par rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams la 'bul ba'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das 
[\[43b.6\]]pa'i mchod rten nam/_chos dkon mchog mchod pa 'am/_dge 'dun dkon mchog la 'bul lam/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' rnams sam/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams sam/_'khor gyi tshogs 
[\[43b.7\]]su gyur pa'am/_gang zag gi rnam pa gzhan su 'ang rung ste/_slong ba thams cad la rim gro bya ba'i phyir sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba na/_rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sbyin pas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan la thub pa med pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_bsod nams thams cad yang dag par bsgreng ba'i rgyal mtshan can du gyur cig_/sems can thams 
[\[44a.2\]]cad chos kyi gom 'phang bris pa sbed pa'i chos nyid kyis chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi chos yang dag par 'dzin pa'i chos can du gyur te/_rin po che'i
