[\[44a.3\]]gzhi la sangs rgyas kyi chos bris pa dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun la mar me snang bar gyur te/_rgyal mtshan shin tu 'phags par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i phyir/_thub 
[\[44a.4\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan can du gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bdud thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i chos can du gyur te/_ye shes dang stobs kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu bsgreng bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad rgyal mtshan thams cad mi 
[\[44a.5\]]ltung ba'i snang ba can du gyur te/_ye shes mthu bo che'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par dag par gyur te/_ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i 
[\[44a.6\]]rgyal mtshan dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa la brtson zhing rgyal mtshan sna tshogs rab tu bsgreng bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing brjod du med pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i phyir rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan dang ldan 
[\[44a.7\]]par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad zhags pa 'thub pa dgu bcu rtsa drug gi rgyal mtshan gyis dben zhing sems 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu thob par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]dpa' chen po rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya che zhing yangs pa dang /_zab mo thams cad dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[44b.2\]]dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa dang rnam par 'phrul pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan zhing tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa rnam par dag pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che thams 
[\[44b.3\]]cad gtong ba la mos pa dang sems can thams cad nor gyis phyug par byed pa dang /_rin po che'i mdzod thams cad 'byed pa dang /_rin po che'i gter thams cad gtong ba dang /_rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /_nor bu rin po 
[\[44b.4\]]che thams cad kyi sbyin pa byed pa dang /_rin po che kun gyis sems can thams cad la khyab par byed pa dang /_rin po che'i tshogs thams cad phongs par mi sems pa'i yid kyis gtong ba dang /_rin po che'i tshogs thams cad 'thor ba 'am/_rin po che 
[\[44b.5\]]thams cad yongs su gtang bar sems bskyed pa'i tshe/_srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la rin po che byin pas yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_sems can thams cad dran pa'i rgyud rmongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing /_
[\[44b.6\]]sangs rgyas mthong ba rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pas chos dkon mchog gi snang ba rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sbyin pa dang yongs su gtong ba shin tu brtan pas 
[\[44b.7\]]dge 'dun dkon mchog yongs su 'dzin par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems rin po che rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rmongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par gzhol bas ye shes rin po che la zhugs par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad ye shes rin po che tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rin po 
[\[45a.2\]]che grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la brtson pas yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa'i bsngags pa dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad ye shes 
[\[45a.3\]]rin po che shin tu yangs pa'i mthar thug pas ye shes rin po che bcu drug gi snyoms par 'jug pa rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rin po che la rnam par sangs rgyas pas rin po che'i dam pas sbyin 
[\[45a.4\]]pa'i gnas kyi mchog tu gyur cig_/sems can thams cad tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa'i mdzod kyi chos rin po che rab tu ston pa la brtson pas rin po che'i dbang po dam par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[45a.5\]]chen po rin po che de dag yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa byas pa'i tshe/_sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi spyan rin po che rnam par dag cing nyams pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_ye shes dam pa rin po che yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/
[\[45a.6\]]'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dang yan lag dang /_nying lag thams cad rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa/_lus blta na sdug pa lus rnam par dag cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthun pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rgyan kyis lus shin tu brgyan pa/_rin po che 
[\[45a.7\]]thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/_rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis shin tu brgyan pa/_sems can thams cad kyi lus/_rgyan gyis brgyan par brtson pa/_sems can thams cad la bu'i 'du shes kyis 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]'jig rten gyi bde ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bde ba thams cad stobs pa/_dga' ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rab tu dga' bar byed pa de rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dag_/sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sangs 
[\[45b.2\]]rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_rgyan yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgyan rnam par dag pas/_
[\[45b.3\]]lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan du red par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi rgyud kyi mtshan rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing /_mtshan gyis lus shin tu brgyan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bsod nams brgya'i mtshan dang 
[\[45b.4\]]ldan pa'i lus can du red de/_lus mtshan gyis shin tu brgyan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad lus kyi yan lag mtshan kun gyis brgyan pa dang ldan zhing lus mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par bris pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig_/
[\[45b.5\]]sems can thams cad tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan zhing tshig gi rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad dbyangs kyi yan lag yid du 'ong zhing /_rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing yon 
[\[45b.6\]]tan gyis brgyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshig gi tshul rnam par dag pas/_'gro ba kun mgu bar byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis tshig yid du 'ong bar brgyan pa 
[\[45b.7\]]dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kun la lta bas snyoms par 'jug cing /_sems kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos snang ba thams cad gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]thob cing /_gzungs thams cad kyi rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis rgyud shin tu brgyan pas/_sems ye shes kyis yang dag par brgyan pa dang ldan par 
[\[46a.2\]]gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus kyi rgyan de dag yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang /_ye shes kyi rgyan 
[\[46a.3\]]yongs su rdzogs te sems can thams cad kyi ris na nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa med par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang phyug la spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas 
[\[46a.4\]]mngon par dbang bskur ba/_cod pan dang gtsug gi rin po che'i sbyin pa byed cing yongs su gtong ba dang /_mngon par stobs pa dang /_sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa dang /_ltos pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par yongs su gtong ba'i sems rnam par 'phel 
[\[46a.5\]]bar byed pa dang /_sbyin pas bsgos pa'i rgyud yongs su sgom pa dang /_sbyin pa la dbang sgyur ba rab tu 'jug pa dang /_sbyin pa'i ye shes la rab tu slob pa dang /_sbyin pa gtong ba'i dbang po yongs su skyed pa dang /_sbyin pa gtong ba'i blo rgya cher 
[\[46a.6\]]byed pa'i tshe/_cod pan dang /_gtsug gi rin po che yongs su btang bas/_yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[46a.7\]]chos thams cad kyis spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas/_dbang po thams cad la shin tu dbang bskur bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad ye shes kyi gtsug gi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas/_/spyi bo gtsug tor can gyi mgo dang ldan par 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi yon tan gyi spyi bo'i mthar phyin pas/_ye shes rin po che mchog gis sems can thams cad yang dag par sdud par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi spyi bos phyag bya bar 'os 
[\[46b.2\]]shing /_ye shes rin po che mchog la yang dag par gnas par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos kyi skyed pa la dbang sgyur ba rab tu thob ste/_ye shes kyi cod pan shin tu bcings par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun gyis 
[\[46b.3\]]blta bar mi nus pa'i chos can du gyur te/_ye shes kyi nor bu rin po ches mgo rab tu brgyan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad spyi bor gyur pa'i ye shes kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rnam par blta ba'i chos can du gyur te/_spyi 
[\[46b.4\]]bo shin tu btsun pa dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad ye shes rin po che rgya mtsho'i snying po rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing stobs bcu'i rgyan cod pan gyis mgo rab tu brgyan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i khams kyi 
[\[46b.5\]]dang po nas bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i phyir/_sa'i dam pa la gnas par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i mthar thug ste/_chos kyi ye shes kyi spyi bo rnam par dag par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad thams 
[\[46b.6\]]cad mkhyen pa'i dbu zil gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]non pa'i snang ba rab tu thob ste/_rgyal po'i mchog dam par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po cod pan dang gtsug gi rin po che yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[46b.7\]]des sems can thams cad kyis ye shes mchog gi 'byung gnas rnam par dag pa dang /_ye shes kyi cod pan dang /_nor bu rin po che rab tu thob pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]pos btson rar bcug cing btson chas bcings pa'i sems can sdug bsngal ba/_sdug bsngal gyi khyim gyis bskor ba/_shing sgrog dang lcags sgrog dang /_ltung gi bcing bas bcings pa/_lus lcags 
[\[47a.2\]]thag gis btags pa/_bsdams pa shin tu rgyu ba'i lus can mi bde bas lus shin tu mnar ba/_skyabs [{]myed [,]med [}]par ltung ba/_bkres pa dang skom pas nyen pa/_gos med pa mun pas yog cing khebs pa/_shin tu rke ba/_brla lcags sgrog gis 
[\[47a.3\]]bsgrogs pa de lta bu dag mthong nas/_byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can dang /_rgyal po [{]myig [,]mig [}{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]ji ltar byas pa bzhin du bdag dang /_'khor du bcas nor thams cad dang bcas par yongs su btang ste/_byin nas btson ra de nas sems 
[\[47a.4\]]can de dag yongs su thar bar byed do/_/des btson ra de nas sems can de dag thar bar byas nas kyang nor gyi sbyin pa thams cad mngon par byin nas sman dang /_sman pa dang sngags kyi rnam pas lus nad med par byas te/_bde ba dang yid dga' ba 
[\[47a.5\]]la rab tu bkod nas/_chos rin po che thos par byas te/_dga' ba'i gtam gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba la bkod nas/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa las [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyams par byed do/_/de de ltar sems can btson ra nas bkye bas/_yang dag par bsdus pa'i 
[\[47a.6\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sred pa'i bcings pa dang /_zhags pa las shin tu grol bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin cing 'khor ba'i 
[\[47a.7\]]rgyud shin tu chad par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bag la nyal ba shin tu bcom ste/_kun nas 'khor ba dang /_rnam par bral bas ma rig pa'i mun pa dang rab rib dang /_ling tog rnam par bstsal cing /_rab rib [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye shes 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]yang dag par mthong bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gdon par bya ba'i ye shes kyi mthar thug par gyur te/_khams gsum pa'i bcings pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sar ye shes 
[\[47b.2\]]bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing nyon mongs pa'i bcings pa thams cad shin tu shigs par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad rlom sems kyi g.yo ba rnam par rgyu ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa'i phyir g.yo ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye shes la 
[\[47b.3\]]yang dag par gzhol zhing g.yo ba dang rlom sems kyi bcings pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad khams gsum thams cad tu chags pa med par gnas shing 'dod pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bral te/_'dod pa'i bcings 
[\[47b.4\]]pa thams cad rnam par spangs par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bsam pa sangs rgyas thams cad la btang bas lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu grol bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i 
[\[47b.5\]]mthas gtugs pa dag tu sems chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_grol zhing bcings pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba dang /_theg pa chen po la dgod par bya ba'i phyir rnam 
[\[47b.6\]]par rgyu zhing byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pas/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dong bar gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad btson ra dang /_btson ca nas bkye bas yang dag 
[\[47b.7\]]par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad shin tu grol zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar yang sems can la la zhig srog dang bral ba'i 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]phyir gsad du khrid pa sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa gzhan dang /_gzhan gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]bzad cing 'dar ba bcing ba lngas bcings pa/_skye bo brgya phrag stong gis kun nas bskor cing 'dzam bu'i gling du gtogs pa sna tshogs nas/_bshal 
[\[48a.2\]]zhing bkri ba gnyen bshes kyi rgyud dang /_mdza' bo'i rgyud thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa/_ral gris gtsab cing gshegs pa/_gsal shing bsgreng ba la bskyon pa/_lus thams cad kun nas glegs te/_me 'bar ba'i nang du dor ba'am/_sdug 
[\[48a.3\]]bsngal gyi rnam pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba thams cad kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde bar bya ba/_gtse ba sna tshogs thams cad du bsgre ba zhig_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mthong bar gyur na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gsad 
[\[48a.4\]]par bya ba de'i don du lus yongs su gtong ste/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' mi pham pa dang /_rgyal po khyad par du 'gro bas ji ltar byas pa dang /_de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan rnams kyang sems can gsad pa 
[\[48a.5\]]blu ba'i don du lus gtong zhing /_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad nyams su len pa de bzhin du rab tu gtong ba byed cing tshig 'di skad du smra'o/_/khyed kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba 'di dag bdag la gyis shig_/lus 'di yongs su gtong gis nga'i srog 
[\[48a.6\]]gcad par gyis shig_/ngal ni ci byas so cog kyang mi nyan pa [{]myed [,]med [}]kyis/_khyed kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'di la ji bya bar 'dod pa de las grangs med pa'i 'gyur du sdug bsngal gyi rnam pas gtse ba thams cad kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba sna tshogs su gyis shig ces te/_'di 
[\[48a.7\]]ltar bdag gis gsad par bkri ba mthong yang bdag gi lus dang srog gis [{]myi [,]mi [}]blu ba ni/_bdag la tshul dang mi 'dra'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag gis ni sems can thams cad la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed do/_/snyam nas bdag gi lus dang srog yongs su btang ste/_gsad par bya ba de blus nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad gzhan gyis gtse ba'i sdug bsngal 
[\[48b.2\]]nye bar byung bas lus dang srog shin tu mi 'phrogs par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad las thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub stobs bcur lung bstan pa'i gnas rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad ngan 
[\[48b.3\]]song thams cad kyi lam las yongs su 'das te/_'jigs pa thams cad las rab tu thar bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'chi ba med pa'i ye shes kyi dbyings su zhugs pas 'tsho ba thams cad kyi skabs rab tu rnyed par gyur cig_/sems 
[\[48b.4\]]can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bzung bas/_dgras 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i las dge ba thams cad spyod pas ral gris gtsab pa 
[\[48b.5\]]lta bu'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba thams cad las 'das par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad byang chub kyi shing dam pa'i drung du phyin cing /_'jigs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par bdud kyi sde thams cad rnam par 'thor bas bag tsha ba dang /_'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad dang 
[\[48b.6\]]bral bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos kyi 'jigs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas rnam par dag cing khyu mchog dang /_seng ge'i nga ro 'byin pas 'khor gyi 'jigs pa dang /_bag tsha ba thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig_/sems can thams 
[\[48b.7\]]cad kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i las la yang dag par spyod cing /_'gro ba thams cad kyi nang na bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i seng ger gyur cig_/sems can thams cad skye bo kun yongs su skyong ba'i sems dang ldan zhing /_'gro ba kun tu 'jigs 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i khang par zhugs par gyur cig ces/_de ltar gsad par gyur pa dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi lus dang /_srog btang ste/_blus nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can 
[\[49a.2\]]thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i btson ra'i sdug bsngal kun spang ba dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]spang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la mgo las gtsug phud dang /_thor pag tu bcas 
[\[49a.3\]]pa bslangs na/_rgyal po gtsug na rin po che dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yan lag dam pa shin tu 'phags pa dang /_de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis ji ltar byin pa de bzhin du/_des slong ba de dag mthong nas/_
[\[49a.4\]]gtong bar mos pa'i tshig dge bas thor pag dang /_gtsug phud du bcas te khyer cig ces stobs shing /_kye tshur sheg bdag gi mgo las gtsug phud dang /_thor bag tu bcas pa long shig ces nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 'dzam bu'i gling na btsun 
[\[49a.5\]]pa [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]dam pa des/_yid rtse gcig tu byas te/_yid ma 'khrugs pa dang /_yid ma 'dres pa dang /_las gzhan la mi sems pa'i yid dang /_'jig rten las 'phags pa'i yid dang /_rab tu zhi ba'i yid dang /_thams cad 
[\[49a.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi yid dang /_dag pa'i yid dang /_drang ba'i yid dang /_rigs pa la brtson pa'i yid kyis gtsug phud dang /_thor pag tu bcas pa de slong ba la gtong ba'i tshe/_gtsug phud dang /_thor pag tu bcas par mtshon gyis phog ste/_
[\[49a.7\]]mgo las phab nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_rim gro dang bcas pa'i lus kyis sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar nas/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]rjes su dran pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_dga' bas rnam par spel ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_chos kyis yongs su rgyas pa'i yid kyi dbang po dang /_sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas dengs par mi 'gyur ba'i yid kyi dbang po dang /_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba 
[\[49b.2\]]skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_tha dad par khong du chud pa dang /_tshor ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag thams cad [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/zhes bya bar rab tu shes pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba thams cad 
[\[49b.3\]]dang /_rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i gtong ba'i sems dang /_sems thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bskyed pa las phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lhag pa'i bsam pa'i rnam pas thob pa/_gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog 
[\[49b.4\]]pas/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bstan pa'i tshul la gnas te/_gtsug phud dang /_thor pag du bcas pa mgo las phog ste/_yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_sems can thams cad byang chub 
[\[49b.5\]]sems dpa'i gtsug gi mchod rten du gyur te/_gtsug tor bltar mi snang bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad skra shin tu phra ba dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par bstsal cing /_skra rdo rje nag po'i dam pa lta bur gyur cig_/sems 
[\[49b.6\]]can thams cad skra stug cing skra mtshams legs pa dang /_skra snum par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad mgo legs pa las shin tu legs par skyes pa'i skra rab tu 'jam pa dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad skra dga' ba 'khyil pa ltar 
[\[49b.7\]]g.yas phyogs su 'khyil cing dpal gyi be'u dang /_bkra shis kyi skra dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa las rnam par 'das shing sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang ldan pa'i skra thob par gyur cig_/sems can 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]thams cad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba thams cad/_rgyas par rang gi skra las 'od gzer rab tu 'gyed par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi dbu shin tu rnam par dag pa ltar skra shin tu mdzes par 
[\[50a.2\]]gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sems mnyams shing /_sangs rgyas kyi dbu skra dang dbu lta bur mdzes pa dang ldan pas spyi bo la gzhag pa'i mchod rten du 'os pa'i skra dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi dbu ltar chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[50a.3\]]skra mdzes par skyes pas/_mun pa dang /_rdul [{]myi [,]mi [}]chags pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug phud dang /_thor pag tu bcas pa yongs su btang bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 
[\[50a.4\]]sems can thams cad kyis sa lta bur shin tu zhi ba'i sems yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs bcu'i mthas gtugs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[50a.5\]]slong ba rnams la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba byed pa dang /_rgyal po zla 'od dang de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa gzhan dag gis gtong ba'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su sbyangs pa'i sems dang /_ye shes kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su sbyangs pa'i blo 
[\[50a.6\]]dang /_chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa'i yid kyi gnas dang /_bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas mngon du gyur pa'i yid kyi rnam pa dang /_mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pa'i yongs su bsngo ba dang /_ye shes kyi skye mched la yang dag par btang ba'i 
[\[50a.7\]]sems dang /_dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' dang /_mnyam par byas pa'i sbyin pa dang /_gtong ba'i sems dang /_zhe sdang ba med pa'i mig gis dad pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]zlog pa'i dbang dang /_slong ba rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i sems dang /_sangs 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]rgyas kyi spyan la gzhol bas byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje yongs su bsgoms pa dang /_dbang po drug shin tu bsdams pas slong ba rnams la [{]myig [,]mig [}]byin pa de bzhin du de yang mig yongs su gtong zhing chos de lta bu 
[\[50b.2\]]la zhugs pa'i sems kyis slong ba dang /_'dod pa dag la sbyin pa byed cing mchod sbyin gyi don la 'jug pa dang /_chos kyi mthu shin tu bskyed pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyi dga' bar blta ba dang /_bag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sred pa rnam par zlog par 
[\[50b.3\]]byed pa dang /_'jig rten gyi dga' ba dang /_'dod pa sna tshogs mthong bas rang gi dga' ba khong du chud par byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba myong bar byed pa dang /_ci bslangs pa'i dngos pos kha [{]myi [,]mi [}]stongs par byed pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa'i 
[\[50b.4\]]sbyin pa rjes su srung ba dang /_rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pas shin tu sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang /_slong ba rnams kyis dngos po ci bslangs pa sbyin par byed pa'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad 
[\[50b.5\]]'gro ba thams cad kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]tu gyur te/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi dam par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad ye shes kyi mdzod shin tu yangs pas nyams pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]tu gyur cig_/sems can thams cad snang ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phrogs pa dang ldan zhing sha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par dag 
[\[50b.6\]]pa yongs su grub par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad shi 'pho dang /_skye ba shes shing lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par dag par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'dong zhing chos kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]rab tu thob par gyur cig/_
[\[50b.7\]]sems can thams cad gtong ba thams cad rnam par ston pas shes rab kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi mthar thug ste/_kun tu lta ba'i mig dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sems can gyi khams yongs su shes shing /_rab rib med pa'i mig dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems 
[\[51a.2\]]can thams cad stobs bcu mnga' ba'i de bzhin gshegs par phyin pas bsgribs pa med pa'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang ldan par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [{]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su gtong ba na/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshad kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi chos 
[\[51a.3\]]sems can thams cad yongs su bsngo ba la nye bar 'god do//_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po lnga pa/_'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar rgyal po 
[\[51a.4\]]khyad par du 'gro ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mdud pa med pa'i spyi gtsug gis yongs su btang ba bzhin du slong ba nye bar 'ongs pa la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa blang ba'i sems dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su rigs dang ldan par byung bas/_sangs rgyas 
[\[51a.5\]]kyi rigs su byung ba'i sbyin pa'i sems dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes su dran pa'i spyod pa la brtson pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mthun par skyes pa dang /_dbang po dang /_ye shes dang /_yon tan gyis shin tu btsun pa dang /_khams 
[\[51a.6\]]gsum ma dag cing snying po med pa la snying por rab tu rtogs pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' blta ba rab tu thob pas/_rang gi lus la chags pa med pa'i sems dang /_gnas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rjes su dran par 
[\[51a.7\]]gnas pa dang /_dul ba dang zhi ba'i sems dang /_dbang po'i rgyu ba shin tu zhi ba dang /_'gro ba'i mya ngam thams cad nas sems can gdon par sems pa'i ye shes 'byung ba'i shes rab dang /_bsod nams kyi 'byung gnas dang /_rgyud ched du brjod 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]pa rgya mtshos gtong ba'i sems yangs par byas pa dang /_don la rnam par nges pa'i chos dang /_mgon po thams cad kyi lam du 'jug pa dang /_chos kyi dbang phyug la ye shes kyis spyod pa dang /_rang gi lus snying po med pa las snying po blang ba'i 
[\[51b.2\]]blos yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_rna ba dang /_sna yongs su btang bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi sgra rnam par rig par bya ba la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rna ba 
[\[51b.3\]]dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad kyis sgra thams cad skad ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya ba'i phyir bsgribs pa med pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi snyan dang ldan pas thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rna ba dang ldan par 
[\[51b.4\]]gyur cig_/sems can thams cad rna ba'i skye mched shin tu bsgoms pas rna ba rnam par dag par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad rnam par shes pa zhi ba skye ba'i phyir bsgribs pa med pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas 
[\[51b.5\]]thams cad kyi gsung khong du chud pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnam par rig par bya ba'i phyir gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad phyir 
[\[51b.6\]]rgol ba 'jig par byed pa'i shes pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]phyed pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad rna ba shin tu dag pa la dbang sgyur bas kun tu 'jug pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi snyan rab tu thob par bya ba 
[\[51b.7\]]thob pas lha'i rna ba rab tu thob par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rna ba yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi/_rna ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir yongs su bsngos nas/_
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]sna rnam par dag par yongs su bsngo ste/_sems can thams cad legs par mthong ba'i sna dang /_dpe byad bzang po'i sna dang /_mtshan bzang po'i sna dang /_shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sna dang /_rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[52a.2\]]sna dang /_rim gyis gzhol ba'i sna dang /_mdzes pa 'phags pa'i sna dang /_dgra thams cad rab tu 'dul ba'i sna dang /_ngo blta na sdug pa'i sna dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi shangs rab tu 'thob pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems 
[\[52a.3\]]can thams cad ngo la mi sdug pa med pa dang chos thams cad kyi ngo dang /_chags pa med pa'i ngo dang /_blta na sdug pa'i ngo dang /_mi mthun pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo dang /_shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ngo dang /_kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi 
[\[52a.4\]]dkyil 'khor lta bu'i ngo dang /_kun nas blta ba'i ngo dang /_yid du 'ong zhing tshad med pa'i ngo dang ldan par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rna ba dang /_sna yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i 
[\[52a.5\]]rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo ste/_ci nas kyang sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin tu 'dus 
[\[52a.6\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin tu shes par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang 
[\[52a.7\]]sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shin tu mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang sems can thams cad shin tu zil 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]non pa'i yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang ba rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su 
[\[52b.2\]]dag par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus dang ldan par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[52b.3\]]dpa' chen po skyid pa zil gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]non pa'i sa la gnas te/[ (]u dum pa ra [,]u dum bA ra [)]ltar shin tu dkon par sems pa'i sems rnam par dag pa dang /_gtong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad cing 'byam klas pa dang /_ngad cing klung sprugs te gtang ba'i sems dang /_yongs su gtong 
[\[52b.4\]]ba'i blo mtha' yas pa dang /_dul ba dang /_yongs su dul ba'i yid kyis gtong ba'i dbang po dang /_gtong ba thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i mthar thug pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam dang 'gro ba thams cad bde bar byed pa'i gtong ba'i 
[\[52b.5\]]'bras bu dang /_gtong ba chen po dang /_shin tu gtong ba dang /_rab tu gtong ba dang /_mchog tu gtong ba'i sems kyis rang gi lus dang /_yan lag dang /_gdong gis kyang phan 'dogs pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]smon par gtong ba'i sems kyis rnam pa de 
[\[52b.6\]]lta bu'i chos la rab tu gnas te ji ltar rgyal po me tog so dang /_glang po'i rgyal po mche ba drug pas so ji ltar byin pa de bzhin du rang gi lus dang /_kha nas so yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_/sems can 
[\[52b.7\]]thams cad 'gro ba kun gyis mchod rten du mchod par 'os par gyur te/_mche ba dkar zhing rno ba dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rab tu thob pas so mnyam zhing thags bzang bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la legs par zhugs shing /_dul ba'i sems kyis nye bar spyod par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad gdong gi dkyil 'khor blta na sdug cing kha'i nad dang so rnam par dag par gyur 
[\[53a.2\]]cig_/sems can thams cad kha dang so dpe [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnam par dag cing /_bzhin dran pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad so bzang po'i gseb nas spos zhim po'i mchog grangs med pa yid du 'ong ba'i dga' ba bskyed 
[\[53a.3\]]pa'i ngad 'byung bas yongs su dag cing so bzhi bcu tshang ba dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad shin tu dul ba'i so rab tu thob cing bkra shis dang /_dga' ba 'khyil pa dang /_pad mo sna tshogs kyis mdzes par bris pa'i so dang 
[\[53a.4\]]ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad gdong gi dkyil 'khor nas tshad med pa'i 'od gzer snang ba byung bas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mtha' yas pa rab tu 'byung ba'i so dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad kha zas la ma 
[\[53a.5\]]chags_/ma zhen cing kha na ma tho ba med par spyod pas sbyin pa'i gnas dam pa'i mthar thug par gyur te/_/so'i thags legs shing 'bras chan kha phye ba lta bur gyur cig_/sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i dam pa lung ston cing 
[\[53a.6\]]so'i gseb kun nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa'i snang ba 'byung ba dang ldan par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' so'i sbyin pas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can ma lus par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 
[\[53a.7\]]yang dag par bskyed pa dang /_chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyis chos thams cad shes pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la lce bslangs na ji ltar rgyal po bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa dang /_de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis kyang skye ba'i skye mched rnam pa sna tshogs dag la gnas shing tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa de dag tu yongs su btang bar gyur pa de bzhin 
[\[53b.2\]]du des kyang slong ba de dag rgyal po la 'os pa'i seng ge'i gdan dag la bkod cing slong bas mos pa'i sems kyi yid du 'ong zhing 'jam pa'i ngag dang /_byams pa la spyod pa'i sems kyis rang gi lce gtong ba'i tshe/_gshe ba med pa'i sems dang /_rma med pa'i 
[\[53b.3\]]sems dang /_nyams pa med pa'i sems dang /_rigs chen po'i rigs dang ldan pa'i sems dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rigs su 'byung ba'i sems dang /_byang chub kyi sems la dgod cing gzhag pa'i sems dang /_rgyud 'khrug pa med 
[\[53b.4\]]pa'i sems dang /_mthu stobs chen po'i shugs kyi sems dang /_lus la ma chags pa'i sems dang /_tshig tu brjod pa la chags pa med pa'i sems su byas te/_pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs shing bdag gi kha nas lce phyung ste/_
[\[53b.5\]]lus thams cad la slong ba dbang byed du bcug nas/_tshig mnyen zhing 'jam pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang /_byams par spyod pas tshig tu brjod cing /_ci nas kyang khyed dga' zhing yid bde ba dang /_mgu zhing rangs par bdag gi lce long la gang 
[\[53b.6\]]du dgos pa de'i dgos pa sgrubs shig ces nas/_de lce sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_lce yongs su btang bas/_yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i da ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad 
[\[53b.7\]]tshig gi tshul thams cad kyis shes par byed pa'i phyir lce shin tu yangs pa dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshig bden pa gnyis su bya ba med pa dang ldan par gyur te/_gdong gi dkyil 'khor 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]khebs pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi cho 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par ston pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du khyab pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems 
[\[54a.2\]]can thams cad ro bro ba'i mchog shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /_ldan zhing shin tu srab pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi tshig shes pas the tsom gcod pa'i phyir nges pa'i tshig gi dbyangs mtha' yas pa yod pa'i 
[\[54a.3\]]lce dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad lce'i mdzod nas 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'gyed pa'i phyir snang ba mtha' yas pa 'byung ba'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos thams cad 
[\[54a.4\]]rnam par nges pa'i spobs pa'i tshogs mi zad pas ston cing brjod pas tshig shin tu nges par brjod pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad spyod pa kun brjod pa tshad med pa'i mdzod kyi lce dang ldan zhing 'dul ba'i mtha' dang mnyam par 
[\[54a.5\]]sems can kun gyi tshig thams cad dang /_smra ba thams cad rnam par 'grel ba'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad spyod pa rjes su brjod pa'i tshig gi rgya mtsho thams cad la rab tu zhugs pas dbyangs kyi tshogs dang /_tshig 
[\[54a.6\]]gi rnam par shes pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad spyod pa thams cad mngon par brjod pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing chos thams cad kyi tshig thams cad shin tu ston pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems 
[\[54a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i smon lam la rab tu brtson pa de lce yongs su btang bas/_yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi dam pa/_mgo lta bu'i ye shes la 'jug cing /_sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i mgo byang chub khong du chud par byed pa 
[\[54b.2\]]dang /_chos thams cad kyi mchog tshul gyi mgo dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par lta ba dang /_ye shes rnam par dag pa'i mgo la yang dag par lta ba dang /_bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mgo yongs su sgrub pa dang /_sa dam pa'i mgo rjes su lta ba dang /_'gro ba 
[\[54b.3\]]thams cad kyi ye shes dam pa mgo lta bu 'dod cing tshol ba dang /_khams gsum pa thams cad kyis bltar med pa'i ye shes kyi mgo'i dam pa yang dag par sgrub pa dang /_phyogs thams cad du phyin pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal po'i mgo la mngon par mos par byed 
[\[54b.4\]]pa dang chos thams cad la dbang byed pa zil gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]non pa'i mgo yongs su grub par byed cing /_de lta bu'i chos la spyod par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs thams cad kyi yongs su gtong ba'i tshul la bslabs pa/_sangs 
[\[54b.5\]]rgyas la mos pa skyes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu thob pa/_slong ba mtha' yas pas dga' bas yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pa yid kyi dbang po shin tu gsal ba/_rgyud rab tu dang zhing sems dang yid shin tu dang ba/_sangs rgyas kyi chos la 
[\[54b.6\]]dga' ba'i snang ba thob pa/_byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa shin tu rgya che ba/_rgyun mi 'chad par sems pa/_gtong ba chen po gtong ba shin tu gtong ba/_gtong ba'i yid dang ldan pa dbang po shin tu dga' bas nye bar brtan pa'i chos can 
[\[54b.7\]]lhag pa'i bsam pa yangs shing dge la rgya che bas sbyin pa gtong bar mngon par 'dod pa/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' ye shes mchog dang /_skyes bu dam pa ka shi'i rgyal po dang /_de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]chen po gzhan grangs med pa dag kyang mgo yongs su btang bar gyur pa/_de ltar mgo gtong ba'i tshe/_mgo yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas 
[\[55a.2\]]kyi dbu rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/spyi gtsug bltar mi snang ba dang /_skye mched zil gyis ma non pa dang /_zhing thams cad du mngon par 'phags pa dang /_bum pa rgyas pa dang /_dga' ba 'khyil pa dang /_skra dang /_
[\[55a.3\]]mgo'i 'od dang 'od gzer sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad rmad du byung ba dang /_dpal gyi be'us brgyan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi dbu dang ldan pa dang /_ye shes kyi mgo rtogs par bya ba dang /_'gro ba 
[\[55a.4\]]thams cad kyi mchog tu phyin pa'i mgo dang ldan pa dang /_mgo rnam par dag pa dang /_ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mgo yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mgo 
[\[55a.5\]]yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyis chos kyi mchog yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_ye shes kyi yan lag dam pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar yang byang chub sems 
[\[55a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po slong ba rnams la dang ba'i lag pa thog mar 'gro ba dang /_phan 'dogs pa'i tshul dang /_chos spyod pa la brtson par 'gro zhing ldog pa dang /_rin po che'i lag pa thog mar 'gro bas lag pa gtong ba dang /_spyod pa 
[\[55a.7\]]don yod par byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod pa dang /_lag pa shin tu brkyang zhing gtong ba'i sems ma 'khrugs pa dang /_rim par spyod pa'i tshul shin tu nges pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis spyod cing lag pa yangs 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]pa/_gtong ba la mos pas lag pa yongs su gtong ba dang /_tshul gyi gzhi chen po rab tu brtan pa la spyod pa'i/_byang chub sems dpa'i yid dang ba dang /_tshor bas mnyams pa'i blo dang ba dang /_'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba las phyir log 
[\[55b.2\]]pa'i 'gro bas byang chub tu 'byung bas/_de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson pa dang /_rgyal po dga' ldan dang /_de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag kyang 
[\[55b.3\]]skye ba'i skye gnas sna tshogs dag na gnas shing lag pa yongs su gtong bar gyur pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems yangs shing rgya che ba tshad med pa dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bar gyur pa/_chos kyi rgyud kyi sgo rnam par phye ba/_
[\[55b.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par gtong ba'i lag pa dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin pa'i smon lam can/_sems bskyed pa rdul med pa dang 'grogs pas kun nas bskor ba med pa/_ye 
[\[55b.5\]]shes dang chos kyi lus rgyun mi 'chad pa/_mi shigs mi chod pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_bdud kyi las thams cad kyis mi sgul ba/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nye bar brtan pas sems spel ba/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis 
[\[55b.6\]]spyad pa dang gcig tu gyur pa'i gtong bas byung ba de slong ba la rka lag gi sbyin pa byed cing yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_
[\[55b.7\]]rkang lag yongs su btang ba yongs su byin pa 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa de dag 'di ltar sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad rdzu 'phrul [(]kyi [,]gyi [)]rkang pa thob cing rin po che'i lag pa dang 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]ldan par gyur cig_/de dag rin po che'i lag pa des sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes rab tu thob ste/_phan tshun gyi lus la rin po ches 'thor bar gyur cig_/mngon par 'thor bar gyur cig_/
[\[56a.2\]]rab tu 'thor bar gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyi sprin gyis sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par gyur cig_/sems can de dag thams cad kyang phan tshun du zhe sdang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems dang ldan zhing phan tshun 
[\[56a.3\]]byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig_/de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rjes su dong zhing 'jigs pa med pa la gnas te/_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i phyir thams cad lag na rin po che thogs pa dang /_lag na spos thogs pa dang 
[\[56a.4\]]lag na gos thogs pa dang /_lag na gdugs thogs pa dang /_lag na phreng ba thogs pa dang /_lag na me tog thogs pa dang /_lag na phye ma thogs pa dang /_lag na lhab lhub thogs pa dang /_lag na me tog mtha' yas pa thogs 
[\[56a.5\]]par gyur te/_kun nas sgo dang ldan pa'i thabs la gnas shing /_sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod par brtson pa'i sems dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu 'gro ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i lag 
[\[56a.6\]]pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /_cho 'phrul gyi lag pa mtshan bzang po dang ldan pa'i lag pa dang /_'od gzer gyi mdzod mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba'i lag pa dang /_'gro ba thams 
[\[56a.7\]]cad lag mthil gcig gis yog par byed pa'i lag pa dang /_dra bar 'brel cing sen mo zangs ltar 'dug pa'i lag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi phyag shin tu yangs pa dang ldan pas/_sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa byed par gyur cig 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_khas len pa'i ngang tshul dang /_slong ba thams cad la mngon par mos shing 'dod pas dga' ba dang /_spro ba 
[\[56b.2\]]dang dang ba chen po rab tu thob pa dang /_slong ba 'bod par ston pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang /_rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur bas rka lag yongs su gtong 
[\[56b.3\]]ba byed cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi byang chub tshol ba'i rka lag yongs su gtong bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar thams cad gtong ba'i don du yongs su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[56b.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsam pa dang /_sems dang yid du ldan pa byang chub kyi sems kyis rab tu dga' ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mngon par dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_tshor bas dengs par mi 'gyur ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_
[\[56b.5\]]slong ba thams cad la mngon par mos pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_len pa thams cad la zhe mi sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gtong ba'i lam du rab tu zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_byang chub 
[\[56b.6\]]sems dpa' thams cad kyi gtong bas sbyin par bya ba'i rjes su srung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa rgya chen pos btang ba shin tu gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sems rgyun mi 'chad pa dang ldan pa/_
[\[56b.7\]]bdag gi lus la phangs par mi lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'byung gnas dang /_rgyal po yid bde bar sems pa dang /_de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag kyang skye ba'i 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]skye gnas de dang de dag la gnas shing khrag yongs su gtong bar gyur pa de ltar slong ba rnams la rang gi lus kyi khrag gtong ba'i tshe/_khrag yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_
[\[57a.2\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad chos dang ye shes kyi lus dang ldan zhing byang chub sems dpa'i lus phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying po dang 'dra bar dge sbyong gi lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/
[\[57a.3\]]sems can thams cad lus nyams pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing dag pa dang ldan te lus la rma med par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun gyis mi 'phrogs pa'i sems dang ldan zhing sprul pa lta bu'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'od dang 
[\[57a.4\]]ba'i lus nyams pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang ldan zhing yid du 'ong ba'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mi gnas pa dang ldan zhing chos kyi dbyings su mngon par skyes pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can 
[\[57a.5\]]thams cad gzhan thams cad la rim gro byed pa'i lus dang ldan zhing /_rin po che lta bu'i 'od yod pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'chi ba med pa'i dbyings su chos kyi skyid pa la dbang sgyur ba'i lus dang ldan zhing /_ye 
[\[57a.6\]]shes dam pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyis blta na don yod par skyes pas rin po che rgya mtsho lta bu'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun gyi gtse bas gos pa med cing bar snang gi rang 
[\[57a.7\]]bzhin gyi lus dang ldan par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi lus las khrag gi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/_ye shes kyi theg pa dang /_theg pa chen po la rab tu gzhol ba'i sems kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]su bsngo'o/_/dag pa'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/yangs pa'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/dga' ba'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/rangs pa'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/spro ba'i yid kyis 
[\[57b.2\]]yongs su bsngo'o/_/zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/bde ba'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/dang ba'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/mgu ba'i yid dang rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang /_yid bde zhing rangs pa skyes pas/_
[\[57b.3\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba de yongs su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong ba'i sems gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i dga' bas rnam par 'phel ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang mkhas pa'i skye bos bsten pa'i zla [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[57b.4\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa 'jig rten gyi dri ma bstsal ba dang /_slong ba thams cad kyis zad par mi nus pa'i nang gi lus nye bar blangs ba'i yongs su gtong ba dang /_yon tan rin po ches yang dag par blangs pa'i dge ba 
[\[57b.5\]]'byam klas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yi dam gyis nye bar blangs pa'i sbyin pa'i tshogs chen pa dang /_slong ba thams cad kyi yid kyis 'dod par bsam pa btang yang 'gyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems dang sbyin pa la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i dngos pos shin 
[\[57b.6\]]tu brtags pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa'i rten dang /_len pa rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sems nyams pa med pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du gyur ba pha lta bu'i 'du shes su mngon par 'dzin pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad la mngon 
[\[57b.7\]]du gyur pa'i sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa la gnas pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mngon du gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan thams cad dang /_'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i snying rje chen pos yongs su skyob pa dang /_
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub la mngon du gyur pa'i stobs bcu rnam par spyod pa dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon du gyur pa'i dus thams cad 
[\[58a.2\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba mthun par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_mi 'jigs pa thams cad mngon du gyur pa'i khyu mchog dang /_seng ge'i nga ro bsgrags pa dang /_dus gsum mngon du gyur pa'i dus thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_dus gsum thams 
[\[58a.3\]]cad mngon du gyur pa'i phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par thug par zhe non pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang yongs su yi chad pa med pas mngon du gyur pa'i sems bskyed pa/_grangs med pas ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' phan pa tshol ba dang /_rgyal 
[\[58a.4\]]po thams cad gtong ba dang /_de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa dag kyang skye ba'i skye mched sna tshogs dag na gnas shing sha dang rkang yongs su btang ba de ltar slong ba rnams la lus las sha dang rkang yongs 
[\[58a.5\]]su gtong ba'i tshe/_sha dang rkang yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying po ltar 'khregs pa'i yan lag 
[\[58a.6\]]dang ldan zhing mi shigs pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad gsog med pa'i lus rab tu thob pas gsog ma yin pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus rnam par dag 
[\[58a.7\]]pa dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi lus shin tu grub pas bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gyi lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tha mi dad cing ma nyams pa dang ldan te dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par bris pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab tu thob pas mtha' las 'das pa tshad 
[\[58b.2\]]med pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bdud thams cad kyi dkrugs ma rab tu 'joms pas kun tu khyab pa'i spyod lam dang ldan zhing thub pa med pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'das pa dang /_ma byon 
[\[58b.3\]]pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang lus gcig par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu chos kyi skus khyab par byed pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i lus mngon par grub par gyur cig_/sems can thams 
[\[58b.4\]]cad 'gro ba thams cad shong ba'i lus dang ldan zhing byang chub kyi lus dam pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen par dmigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_slong ba la sha dang rkang yongs su gtong ba'i tshe 
[\[58b.5\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' las 'das pa tshad med pa rnam par dag pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i rgyud la 
[\[58b.6\]]bslabs pa'i sems dang ldan pa sbyin pa thams cad byin pas spyod pa'i sems dang ldan pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu 'gro ba'i sbyin pa grub pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams 
[\[58b.7\]]cad kyi byin pa'i rjes su bslabs pa'i sems dang ldan pa sbyin pa dang /_yongs su gtong ba thams cad kyis zad mi shes pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_sbyin pa'i gnas thams cad la shin tu gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]cad kyi sbyin pa'i las la rab tu gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad yid la bya bas mngon du gyur pa'i gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_slong ba thams cad rgyun mi 'chad par rgyu ba rab tu mchod pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_de 
[\[59a.2\]]ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' yongs su skyo ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rgyal po g.yo ba med pa dang /_de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa dag gis kyang snying yongs su btang bar gyur pa/_de ltar slong ba kun nas 'ongs pa rnams [(]gyis [,]kyis [)]bslangs 
[\[59a.3\]]shing /_rang gi lus las snying yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa byed pa dang /_spong ba dang /_thob par byed pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par spyad pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad rab tu dgrol ba'i phyir stobs bcu'i byang chub la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par byed pa dang /_smon 
[\[59a.4\]]lam chen pos nan tan du byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par gnas pa dang /_smon lam yongs su mi gtong bas/_sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_sems can thams 
[\[59a.5\]]cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin lta bus yongs su bzung ba'i snying dpal gyi be'us brgyan pa dang ldan zhing rdo rje'i ri khor yug thams cad ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]shigs shing rdo rje'i snying po lta bu'i snying dang ldan pa dang /_bag tsha ba med pa'i snying dang thub par dka' ba'i snying dang /_'jig rten 
[\[59a.6\]]thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa'i snying dang /_dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan ye shes kyi snying po can gyi snying dang /_mthu bo che chen po dam pa'i sems kyi rgyal mtshan gyi snying dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi gtso bo lta bur [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phrogs pa'i snying dang /_mthu bo che ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]shigs 
[\[59a.7\]]pa'i snying po can gyi snying dang /_bdud kyi las dang bdud kyi dpung dang bdud kyi sde rnam par 'joms pa'i snying dang /_brtan pa'i snying dang /_gzeng mtho ba'i snying dang /_dpa' ba'i snying dang /_brtul phod pa'i snying dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs [{]myi [,]mi [}]dngangs skrag par [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]'gyur ba'i snying dang /_rdo rje'i go cha chen po yang dag par bgos pa'i snying dang /_shin tu btsun pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i snying dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pas byang chub snang bar gyur pa'i snying dang /_byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug nas 
[\[59b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rjes su rtogs shing rmongs pa med par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i snying dang /_stobs bcu mngon par byang chub pa rab tu 'thob pa'i snying dang ldan par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[59b.3\]]po snying gi sbyin pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis gos pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i stobs bcu mnga' ba'i thugs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan par yongs su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar yang byang 
[\[59b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slong ba mngon par dad par byed pa'i lta ba dang gsal zhing dga' bar byed pa'i mig dang byang chub dang mnyam par bya ba'i byams pa dang /_ci 'dod pas slong ba phu dud du bya ba'i sbyin pa dang /_rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par yid 
[\[59b.5\]]la byed pa'i gtong ba dang /_lus la snying po med par rtogs pas snying po blang ba'i sems dang /_dang bar 'gyur ba'i lus rjes su dran pa yid la byed pa dang /_spyang ki dang /_wa dang /_khyis za bar 'gyur ba'i lus su rab tu rtogs pa dang /_
[\[59b.6\]]gzhan la rag lus shing lus [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag par yid la byed pa dang /_/lus kyi rgyus thams cad khong du chud pa dang /_gzhan la dad pa'i sems dang de lta bu'i chos de dag yid la bya ba la brtson pa de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' legs par byin pa dang /_rgyal po sdig 
[\[59b.7\]]pa bstsal ba dang /_de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa dag gis kyang slong ba rnams la rgyu ma dang mchin pa dang /_mkhal ma dang /_glo ba yongs su btang bar gyur pa de ltar rgyu ma dang mchin pa dang /_
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]mkhal ma dang /_glo ba yongs su btang ba'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' slong ba de dag la mi 'gebs pa'i mig gis lta zhing 'di ltar sems bskyed de/_'di ltar bdag gi lus mi rtag cing 'di ltar mi gtsang na 'on kyang 
[\[60a.2\]]rgyu ma dang mchin pa dang mkhal ma dang /_glo ba lta bu dag kyang slong ba dag la dgos pa ltas sbyin par bya'o zhes de lta bur yid la byed cing dga' ba'i rgyud dang /_de ltar chos nyid shes pa'i bsam pa dang /_slong ba mthong ba de dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes pa'i byin gyi 
[\[60a.3\]]rlabs kyis lus snying po med pa de las snying po blang bar 'dod de/_de lta bur yid la byed cing rab tu rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rgyu ma dang mchin pa dang /_mkhal ma dang glo ba de dag yongs su gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di 
[\[60a.4\]]ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_rgyu ma dang mchin pa dang mkhal ma dang glo ba yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad ye shes kyi snying po'i lus dang ldan zhing lus kyi phyi nang shin tu gtsang zhing dag par gyur cig_/sems 
[\[60a.5\]]can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyir ye shes kyi lto dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad nang spos zhim po'i mchog thams cad dang ldan zhing phyi rol tu 'od gzer rab tu 'gyed pas/_lta na 
[\[60a.6\]]bzang ba'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad rim gyis gzhol zhing mnyam pa'i lus kyi yan lag dang ldan te/_gzhu lta bu'i lto dang ldan pa'i lus su gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dga' bas lus shin tu 
[\[60a.7\]]bskyed pas lus chos kyi zas dang ye shes kyis gso bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad dga' ba'i lus dang chos kyi lus kyis yang dag par spyod pas zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad tha dad pa yang dag par 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]shes pa'i chos snang ba dang ldan pas gzungs kyi snying pos lus kyi nang rnam par dag par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad nang gi bsam pa'i rgyud shin tu sbyangs pas lus yongs su dag pa dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad ye 
[\[60b.2\]]shes kyis ngoms par byed pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang ye shes kyi rnal 'byor khong du chud par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad phyi rol gyi lus 'gro ba thams cad la ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan mdzes 
[\[60b.3\]]shing snang bar gyur pas nang gi lus dag cing zhi bar gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyu ma dang /_mchin pa dang /_mkhal ma dang /_glo ba de dag rang gi lus las slong ba rnams la yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_
[\[60b.4\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi lus phyi nang yongs su dag cing bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes la rab tu 'khod pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[60b.5\]]chos [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]'byung gnas dang /_rgyal po skar ma'i 'od dang /_de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag gis kyang yan lag dang nying lag dang /_rus pa slong ba rnams la yongs su btang bar gyur pa de ltar yan lag dang /_nying 
[\[60b.6\]]lag dang /_rus pa bslangs pa na/_slong ba rnams la gtong ba'i tshe/_slong ba mthong ma thag tu sems dga' ba dang /_sems mos pa dang /_sems dad pa dang /_sems rab tu spro ba dang /_sems 'thad pa dang /_byams pa'i 
[\[60b.7\]]sems dang /_chags pa med pa'i sems dang /_dag pa'i sems dang /_slong ba rnams la rim gror bya ba'i sems rab tu 'thob ste/_de yan lag dang nying lag dang /_rus pa de dag bslangs pas slong ba la yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_rang gi lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag dang /_rus pa yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad rus pa 
[\[61a.2\]]dang sha dang /_khrag med pa'i lus dang ldan zhing sprul pa lta bu'i lus can du gyur cig_/sems can thams cad lus la thub pa med cing zil gyis mi non pas rdo rje lta bu'i stobs kyi lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chags pa med cing 
[\[61a.3\]]grol ba dang /_bcings pa med pa'i ye shes kyi lus kyis byung ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_chos su ldan pa'i lus phun sum tshogs par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad dbang po tha mi dad cing gcad du med pa rab tu thob pas 
[\[61a.4\]]ye shes kyi stobs kyi lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad ye shes kyi stobs dang dbang gi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas chos kyi stobs kyi lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad lus shig shig po [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yan lag 
[\[61a.5\]]shin tu brtan pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun yongs su smin par byed cing 'dul ba la zhugs pas 'gro ba thams cad ji ltar mos pa'i lus dang yan lag gi byin gyi rlabs dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams 
[\[61a.6\]]cad mthu po che'i yan lag dang nying lag yang dag par zin pas stobs chen po dang ldan zhing ye shes la gnas pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chad cing dub pa med pa'i lus rab tu thob pas shin tu brtan par lus 
[\[61a.7\]]kyi rgyud 'brel ba dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad mthu dang brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa'i lus kyis shin tu brtan zhing stobs dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad mtha' yas pa'i ye shes kyi khyu mchog gi 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]mthu 'byin pa'i lus dang ldan zhing chos kyi lus kyis 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing blta na don yod pa dang ldan te/_bsod nams kyi stobs kyi lus dang ldan par gyur 
[\[61b.2\]]cig_/sems can thams cad gnas med pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug ste/_gnas pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsam pa byin gyis brlabs pa dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung 
[\[61b.3\]]ba'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam gyi lus kyi rjes su song bas 'gro ba thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la phyir phyogs pa med cing 
[\[61b.4\]]mngon par lta ba'i snang bas sgo kun nas blta ba'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa la spyod pa brtsams pa mthar phyin par bya ba la brtson pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i lus phun sum tshogs par gyur cig_
[\[61b.5\]]sems can thams cad ye shes brtan par gnas pa thob pas nga rgyal dang rlom pa dang /_dregs pa thams cad rgyun chad cing rnam par dag pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa la yang dag par ji lta ba 
[\[61b.6\]]bzhin du las grub par gyur pas brtul zhugs dam pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'jig rten du skyes pa'i lus thams cad las rnam par 'das shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge bas byung ba'i lus su gyur cig ces/_de 
[\[61b.7\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yan lag dang nying lag dang rus pa de dag slong ba rnams la yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes grub par bya ba dang /_shin tu rnam 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]par dag pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi lus las slong ba dag gis mdog dang ldan pa'i pags pa bslangs pa'i tshe/_mtshon cha thogs pa'i slong ba mthong yang 
[\[62a.2\]]dga' bar byed pa'i dbang pos slong ba la lta zhing slong ba rnams la drin du gzo ba'i 'du shes nye bar bzhag nas legs par bting ba'i stan la slong ba rnams bkod de/_slong ba rnams la rim gro'i 'du shes nye bar gzhog pa dang /_len pa rnams la 
[\[62a.3\]]shin tu dkon pa'i 'du shes yang dag par skyed pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i gzhir gyur pa smon par bya ba yang dag par mthong bar sems shing slong ba rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i sems kyis rtog cing 'dzum pa dang ldan par lta bas slong ba rnams 
[\[62a.4\]]la lta zhing tshur sheg_/longs shig ces bya ba'i tshig brjod pa dang /_slong ba rnams la bdag nyid ji dga' bar bya ba gtong ba de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' dag pa'i snying po dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po gser gyi rtsib logs ltar mdog dang ldan pa'i 
[\[62a.5\]]pags pa slong ba rnams la yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyis mi ngoms shing rnam par dag pas shin tu 'jam pa'i mdog dang 
[\[62a.6\]]ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad rdo rje'i mdog thub par dka' ba'i kha dog dang ldan zhing ma 'dres pa'i kha dog dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi snying po ltar dag cing gser gyi mdog dang ldan par gyur cig_/
[\[62a.7\]]sems can thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du kha dog rnam par sbyang bas dag cing kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mdog dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad dge sbyong de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gzhon pa'i kha dog gis rnam par dag cing rnyog 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]pa med cing dang ba'i kha dog dang /_mdog gi mchog dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis kha dog rnam par dag cing kha dog dang mdog gi dam pa dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam 
[\[62b.2\]]par bris shing sangs rgyas kyi kha dog rnam par dag pas mdog dang kha dog shin tu rnam par dag par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad kha dog dang mdog bzang po phun sum tshogs shing 'gro ba kun tu mdog gi snang ba rab tu 'gyed par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 
[\[62b.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'od gzer gyi dkyil 'khor brjod du med pa rnam par 'gyed pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan zhing mdog 'od gzer gyi dra ba can dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad gzugs thams cad kyi kha dog rnam par dag ste/_
[\[62b.4\]]mdog dang kha dog shin tu snum pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi lus las mdog dang ldan pa'i pags pa slong ba rnams la yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[62b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems la phyin ci log med pa/_bzhin 'dzum pa 
[\[62b.6\]]can yid bde ba thob pa/_theg pa chen po la legs par gnas pa/_grags pa 'dod pa med pa'i sbyin pa can/_snying thag pa nas sbyin pa la gnas pa/_gtong ba dang /_gtong ba chen po la yid rab tu zhugs pa/_'jungs pa'i dri ma la mi gnas pa'i 
[\[62b.7\]]sems dang ldan pa/_phrag dog dang 'jungs pa'i dri ma dang bral ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la rab tu zhugs pa/_de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' lta ba'i brtson 'grus dang 'dzam bu'i gling gi bdag po gser gyi 'od dang /_de ma yin pa'i 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan dag gis kyang sor mo rnams yongs su btang bar gyur pa ltar slong ba la rkang lag gi sor mo yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar bsngo ste/_
[\[63a.2\]]sor mo byin pa dang /_ci blangs pa'i dngos po btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi phyag sor thob par gyur te/_sor mo ring bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sor mo rim gyis gzhol par 
[\[63a.3\]]legs par grub bas sor mo zlum pa dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sen mo gang ba'i sor mo rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing sen mo zangs kyi kha dog lta bu'i sor mo dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos thams cad 
[\[63a.4\]]'dzin par brtson pa'i sor mo dpe byad bzang po dang ldan zhing skyes bu dpa' bo thams cad mkhyen pa'i sor mo dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i phyag sor dang ldan par gyur te/_dpe byad bzang pos grub pa'i sor mo dang ldan 
[\[63a.5\]]par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa'i sor mo tshul dang mthun par skyes pas sor mo'i dam pa dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sor mo'i chos nyid kyi yan lag dang bum pa gang ba dang /_bkra shis kyis rnam 
[\[63a.6\]]par mdzes pa dang ldan zhing sor mo'i rtse mo la 'khor lo yod pa'i sor mo dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i phyag sor 'phrin las kyi rnam par sbyin pa rgyu mthun par byung ba lta bu dang ldan zhing pad mo bzang po dang /_dga' ba 
[\[63a.7\]]'khyil pas sor mo thams cad kyi tshigs dang yan lag shin tu brgyan cing dpe byad bzang pos mdzes par rnam par phye ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sor mo dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa snang bar 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]bya ba la brtson zhing 'od gzer gyi dra ba'i mdzod rab tu 'gyed pa'i sor mo dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sor mo shin tu mdzes pa dra ba legs par 'brel pa dang ldan zhing sor mo legs pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces/_
[\[63b.2\]]de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sor mo slong ba rnams la sor mo yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_sems can thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i sems kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad sems can rnams la yongs su bsngo'o/_/gzhan 
[\[63b.3\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'dod pa la/_la la zhig gis chos thos par bya bar bsams te/_des 'di skad du gal te khyod kyi sha dang bcas pa'i sen mo nga la byin na ni/_ngas khyod la chos bstan par bya'o/_/zer ba zhig yod na/_
[\[63b.4\]]de la 'di skad du smras te/_bdag gi sha dang bcas pa'i sen mo ci bder khyer la bdag la chos bstan par mdzod cig ces nas/_ji ltar rgyal po dbang phyug tu gyur pa legs par bshad pa tshol ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zad mi shes pa dang /_
[\[63b.5\]]de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan tshad med pa chos kyi chos bzang po nyid la brtson pa/_'gro ba kun tu chos kyi lo shin tu legs pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir sha dang /_bcas pa'i sen mo yongs su btang bar 
[\[63b.6\]]gyur pa de ltar slong ba rnams la rang gi sha dang bcas pa'i sen mo yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi phyag sen rab tu grub cing zangs kyi kha 
[\[63b.7\]]dog lta bu'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad dpe byad bzang po'i sen mo rab tu thob cing mdog snum pa'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sen mo'i dam pa dang ldan zhing 'od 'tsher ba'i sen mo dang ldan 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sen mo bzang po dang ldan zhing thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyag sen rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi gos shing mtshungs pa 
[\[64a.2\]]med pa'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'od kyis snang bar bya ba la brtson zhing shin tu brgyan pa'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad nyams pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing rnam par dag pa'i sen mo gang ba dang ldan par gyur 
[\[64a.3\]]cig_/sems can thams cad ye shes che zhing yangs pa rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i las rnam par smin bas rnam par 
[\[64a.4\]]dag cing mdzes par skyes pa'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'od gzer kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i mdzod dang ldan zhing mgon po thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyag sen dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub 
[\[64a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'dod pa'i phyir sen mo dang shar bcas pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang phyag sen gyi rgyan yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_thogs pa med pa'i stobs kyi 
[\[64a.6\]]mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o//_//sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po drug pa/_/'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi don du chos tshol 
[\[64a.7\]]ba lhur len pa shin tu dkon pa'i chos tshol ba la zhugs pa la/_chos gtong ba'i gang zag la las me'i rlubs su lus gzhug par byas te/_'di skad du gal te khyod mi 'greng bdun du brkos pa'i me'i rlubs su mchong phod na/_ngas khyod la chos kyi 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]sbyin pa bya'o zhes na de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra de thos nas/_shin tu dga' zhing yid bde ba dang rab tu 'dun pa'i yid skyes nas 'di snyam du sems te/_ngan song thams cad dang mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su blang ba 
[\[64b.2\]]dang yang bsngo zhing bdag gis dam pa'i chos btsal dgos na/_'di ltar me'i rlubs su mchong ba tsam gyis dam pa'i chos rnyed par 'gyur na lta/_kye ma de ltar dkon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal lta bu [{]myed [,]med [}]par 
[\[64b.3\]{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]rlubs tsam du mchod pas rnyed pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o snyam nas/_'di ltar bdag gis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'greng bdun du brkos pa'i me'i rlubs su mchod par bgyis/_khyod kyis bdag la sangs rgyas kyi chos bshad du gsol zhes nas de ji ltar rgyal po legs par 
[\[64b.4\]]bshad pa tshol ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sems dpa' dang /_de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa dag gis kyang me'i rlubs su mchod par byas pa de ltar chos kyi don du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba 
[\[64b.5\]]thams cad dang bsngo ba'i lus kyis me'i rlubs su mtshor ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[64b.6\]]las shin tu phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du gyur te/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bde ba thams cad myong bar gyur te/_g.yang sa thams cad las phyir ldog par gyur cig_/
[\[64b.7\]]sems can thams cad 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad dang bral zhing bag tshab med pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bde ba dang yid bde ba dang /_chos thams cad kyi rgyan rab tu thob cing chos tshol ba la brtson par gyur 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]cig_/sems can thams cad me gsum rab tu zhi bas gnas pa'i sems dang ldan zhing ngan song gi lam thams cad dang shin tu bral bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bde ba'i rnam pa rab tu thob ste/_
[\[65a.2\]]yid bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad me gsum dang bral zhing byang chub kyi sems kyis 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug zhi bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba'i dga' bas yang 
[\[65a.3\]]dag par spyod cing byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa med pa la rab tu gzhol zhing shin tu thos pa'i chos can du gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 
[\[65a.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rjes su shin tu song ba'i chos dang ldan zhing byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa'i bde ba rab tu thob par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos tshol zhing me'i rlubs su mchod 
[\[65a.5\]]pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis sgrib pa'i las dang spyod pa'i mthar phyin cing ye shes kyi me shin tu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[65a.6\]]dam pa'i chos kyi phyir sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad bdag gi lus kyis bzod par byed cing dam pa'i chos brjod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam ston pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la gsal bar byed pa dang /_bla na med pa'i ye shes 
[\[65a.7\]]kyi phung po tshogs yang dag par [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_stobs bcu la brtson par byed cing thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa yangs par byed pa dang /_chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phung po la bdag mngon du mthun par yang dag par lta 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]zhing sems can thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa dang /_rnam par byang ba yang dag par sgrub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa dang /_ye shes chen po la brtson zhing sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su bsrung ba'i tshe/_
[\[65b.2\]]ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos bzang po tshol ba dang /_rgyal bo shugs chen po 'dzin pa dang /_de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan tshad med pa dag gis kyang ji ltar spyad pa bzhin du de sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa gcig ma yin pa nyams su 'bab pa 
[\[65b.3\]]dang /_sdug bsngal tshor ba'i gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs myong ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa thams cad dang phrad pa dang /_rang gi lus kyis nye bar len cing bzod par byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba'i gang zag sems gtum pa can sdig 
[\[65b.4\]]pa'i las kyis bsgribs pa/_bdud kyi las kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dag las sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa de dag thams cad nye bar len cing bzod par byed pa'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar dam pa'i chos shes par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i 
[\[65b.5\]]rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad bde ba'i nan tan gyis mngon par shes pa myur ba dang ldan zhing sdug bsngal dang mi bde ba yongs su spangs par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bde ba'i rnam pa thams cad rab tu thob pa la gnas pas/_sdug bsngal 
[\[65b.6\]]gyi tshor ba thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad mig yor lta bu'i bde ba rab tu thob cing sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad 'gag par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad ye shes kyi spyod pa'i mthar phyin te sdug bsngal gyi btson 
[\[65b.7\]]ra nas phyir log par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi lam rgyud dang /_gtse ba thams cad las phyir log cing bde ba'i lam mthong bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rnam par chad pas chos kyi dga' 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]ba dang bde ba'i rnam pas shin tu brtan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad phan tshun du zhe mi sdang zhing byams pa rab tu thob pas sdug bsngal las grol bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'khor ba thams 
[\[66a.2\]]cad na yod pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu byang zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba'i don mthong bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad kyis lus la gnod par 'gyur ba med cing 'dra ba med pa'i bde ba rnam par dag pa dang 
[\[66a.3\]]ldan par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bde ba bsgribs pa med pa'i mthar phyin te/_bde ba'i khyad par thams cad rab tu thob par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i 
[\[66a.4\]]chos kyi phyir sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa thams cad bzod par byed cing nyams su len pa'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad g.yangs las bsrung zhing thams cad mkhyen pa'i rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir yongs 
[\[66a.5\]]su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam pa'i chos btsal ba la shin tu brtson pa/_chos kyi tshig dang yi ge 'khor lngas yang dag par len pa/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung 
[\[66a.6\]]ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su btsal ba dang /_rjes su dran pa la gnas pa/_chos kyi dga' bas spro zhing mos pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_zang zing med pa'i chos rab tu btsal ba la brtson pa/_'jig rten pa'i rgyal po'i srid 
[\[66a.7\]]dang /_skyid pa'i ljan ljin thams cad las rnam par 'das pa sangs rgyas kyi rgyal srid dang chos kyi skyid pa la mngon par mos pa/_'jig rten gyi dga' ba thams cad kyis ma gos pa'i yid la byed pa dang ldan pa/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i 
[\[66b\]]
