[\[89b.6\]]shed bdag gi 'du shes kyis ma yin/_skye ba po'i 'du shes kyis ma yin/_byed pa po'i 'du shes kyis ma yin/_tshor ba po'i 'du shes kyis ma yin/_yod pa dang med pa'i 'du shes kyis yongs su bsngo ba ma yin/_'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes 
[\[89b.7\]]kyis ma yin/_'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes kyis ma yin/_shi 'pho ba'i 'du shes kyis ma yin/_skye ba'i 'du shes kyis ma yin/_rtag pa'i 'du shes kyis ma yin/_mi rtag pa'i 'du shes kyis ma yin/_srid pa'i 'du shes kyis ma 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]yin/_srid pa med pa'i 'du shes kyis ma yin/_'du shes med pas yongs su bsngo ba ma yin/_'du shes med pa ma yin pas yongs su bsngo ba ma yin te/_de chags pa med pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/bcings 
[\[90a.2\]]pa med pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/grol ba med pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo ste/_de ni las yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/rnam par smin pa yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/rtog pa yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/rnam par rtog pa yongs su mi 
[\[90a.3\]]bsngo'o/_/sems pa yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/bsam pa yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/sems yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/sems med pa yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/de de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe/_nang la mngon par chags pa med do/_/phyi 
[\[90a.4\]]rol la mngon par chags pa med do/_/rkyen la mngon par chags pa med do/_/dmigs pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/rgyu la mngon par chags pa med do/_/rgyu 'dus pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/chos la mngon par 
[\[90a.5\]]chags pa med do/_/chos nyid la mngon par chags pa med do/_/sems pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/bsam pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/de de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe/_gzugs la mngon par chags pa med do/_/
[\[90a.6\]]gzugs nye bar len pa la chags pa med do/_/gzugs 'gog pa la chags pa med do/_/tshor ba la chags pa med do/_/tshor ba nye bar len pa la chags pa med do/_/tshor ba 'gog pa la chags pa med do/_/'du shes la chags pa med 
[\[90a.7\]]do/_/'du shes nye bar len pa la chags pa med do/_/'du shes 'gog pa la chags pa med do/_/'du byed la chags pa med do/_/'du byed nye bar len pa la chags pa med do/_/'du byed 'gog pa la chags pa med do/_/rnam par shes 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]pa la chags pa med do/_/rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa la chags pa med do/_/rnam par shes pa 'gog pa la chags pa med do/_/gang de lta bu'i chos la chags pa med pa de ni gzugs la bcings pa med do/_/gzugs kyi skye ba la bcings pa med 
[\[90b.2\]]do/_/gzugs kyi 'gag pa la bcings pa med do/_/tshor ba la bcings pa med do/_/tshor ba'i skye ba la bcings pa med do/_/tshor ba'i 'gag pa la bcings pa med do/_/'du shes la bcings pa med do/_/'du shes kyi skye ba la bcings pa med 
[\[90b.3\]]do/_/'du shes kyi 'gag pa la bcings pa med do/_/'du byed la bcings pa med do/_/'du byed kyi skye ba la bcings pa med do/_/'du byed kyi 'gag pa la bcings pa med do/_/rnam par shes pa la bcings pa med do/_/rnam par shes pa'i skye 
[\[90b.4\]]ba la bcings pa med do/_/rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa la bcings pa med do/_/gang chos de dag la bcings pa med pa de ni chos thams cad la chags pa med pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos gang chos la 'dzin pa 'am/_chos gang la chos kyis 
[\[90b.5\]]chags par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu skyes pa'i skye ba 'am/_skye bar 'gyur ba gang yang med do/_/de yang 'di ltar chos thams cad ni 'du shes dang bral ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te/_gcig ma yin no/_/gnyis ma yin no/_/
[\[90b.6\]]mang po ma yin no/_/tshad med pa ma yin no/_/chung ngu ma yin no/_/mang po ma yin no/_/dma' ba ma yin no/_/yangs pa ma yin no/_/zab pa ma yin no/_/gsal ba ma yin no/_/zhi ba ma yin no/_/spros pa 
[\[90b.7\]]ma yin no/_/gnas ma yin no/_/gnas med pa ma yin no/_/chos ma yin no/_/chos med pa ma yin no/_/bsgom pa ma yin no/_/bsgom pa med pa ma yin no/_/yod pa ma yin no/_/med pa ma yin no/_/de de ltar chos med pa'i tshul 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]gyis chos rnams la rnam par lta ste/_chos kyi tshig gi lam la gnas pas/_chos ma yin zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de las kyi lam yang rgyun gcod par mi byed do/_/byang chub sems 
[\[91a.2\]]dpa'i spyod pa yang rnam par thogs par mi byed do/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las kyang phyir mi ldog go_/rten pa'i las sgyu ma lta bur yang rab tu shes so/_/chos sgra brnyan dang 'dra ba yang 'jig par mi byed do/_/sems can snang bas 
[\[91a.3\]]kyang rlom sems su mi byed do/_/chos thams cad sgyu ma dang mnyam par yang yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du shes te/_las rnams kyi rgyu'i mthu dang yang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/las la gzhol bar yang rab tu 'jug ste/_chos rnams mngon par 'du 
[\[91a.4\]]bya ba med pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i lam yang rgyun mi gcod do/_/de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_gang gi phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yul med cing /_thams cad mkhyen 
[\[91a.5\]]pa nyid kun tu 'gro bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thams cad du yongs su bsngo zhing thams cad las ldog par mi byed do/_/ci'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya zhe na/_'di ni 'jig rten las pha rol tu gyur pas na de'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya'o/_/phung po las gzhan du 'gyur bar 
[\[91a.6\]]byed pas na de'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya'o/_/tshig gi lam las gzhan du gyur pas na de'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya'o/_/sems can gyi 'du shes sna tshogs las pha rol tu gyur pas na de'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya'o/_/'jig tshogs mang po las gzhan du gyur pas na de'i phyir yongs 
[\[91a.7\]]su bsngo ba zhes bya'o/_/mngon par 'du byed pa las gzhan du gyur pas na/_de'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya'o/_/srid pa las gzhan du gyur pas na de'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya'o/_/nye bar len pa las gzhan du gyur pas na/_
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]de'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi chos las gzhan du gyur pas na/_de'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya'o/_/de de ltar yongs su bsngo bas sangs rgyas kyi rjes su song ba yin/_chos kyi rjes su song ba yin/_ye shes kyi 
[\[91b.2\]]rjes su song ba yin/_byang chub kyi rjes su song ba yin/_don gyi rjes su song ba yin/_yongs su bsngo ba'i rjes su song ba yin/_spyod yul gyi rjes su song ba yin/_spyod pa'i rjes su song ba yin/_rang bzhin gyi rjes su song ba yin/_
[\[91b.3\]]rnam par dag pa'i rjes su song ba yin te/_de de ltar yongs su bsngo bas chos shes par bya ba thams cad khong du chud par byed pa yin/_sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par bya ba yang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_sangs rgyas gang yang 
[\[91b.4\]]thugs 'byung bar byas pa med pa yin/_chos gang yang mi 'thun par byas pa med pa yin/_chos gang yang chud gzan pa med pa yin/_chos gang dang yang 'gal bar byed pa med pa yin/_dngos po gang yang nyams par byed pa med 
[\[91b.5\]]pa yin/_chos gang yang bor ba med pa yin/_rgyu gang yang bshig pa med pa yin/_rkyen gang yang phyi nang gi chos thams cad dang 'gal bar byas pa med pa yin/_las kyi 'bras bu yang rgyun gcod par mi byed de/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[91b.6\]]dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba drug pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba ste/_yongs su bsngo ba des yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[91b.7\]]dpa' chen po sangs rgyas tshad med pas byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/_/snying po thob pa yin no/_/chos nyid thob pa yin no/_/thams cad mkhyen pa la brtson pa yin no/_/don kyi chos dang ldan pa yin no/_/chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]gyi rjes su song ba yin no/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba dam pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba yin no/_/smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i rjes su song ba yin no/_/rdo rje ltar mi shigs pa'i snying po'i rjes su song ba yin 
[\[92a.2\]]no/_/chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug la dbang sgyur ba rab tu thob pa dam pa'i rjes su song ba yin no//_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po brgyad pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[92a.3\]]dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis phyogs bcur bltas te/_'khor thams cad la bltas nas chos kyi dbyings la lta ba dang /_don dang yi ge dang /_tshig la 'jug pa dang /_sems mtha' dang dbus med par yangs pa yongs su 
[\[92a.4\]]bsgom pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad snying rje chen pos rgyas par bya ba dang /_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi sems yang dag par 'brel bar bya ba dang /_yon tan thams cad la 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis 
[\[92a.5\]]brlabs pa'i lus su yang dag par shes par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rab tu dbye ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyed pa thob pa yang dag par mthong ba dang /_chos kyi lus kyi rjes su song ba'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su dag 
[\[92a.6\]]pa yang dag par ston pa dag byed cing sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/de dag rgyal po'i rigs dang ldan gyur cing /_/'gro ba kun na rgyal po gang yod pa/_/de dag zil non rgyal po 'gro ba'i mchog_/
[\[92a.7\]]phan pa'i don du rgyal po mthu chen 'gyur/_/de dag dang ba'i yid du rab gyur cing /_/'gro ba kun la dbang sgyur rab thob ste/_/chos dang ldan par chos kyi rgyal srid skyong /_/'gro ba rnams kyi bde ba rab tu bskyed/_/de dag rgyal po'i rigs rgyud 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]rnam dag pas/_/chos dang ldan par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/_/de dag 'khrug med rgyal srid skyong ba byed/_/phyogs rnams kun nas 'khor lo phyir mi ldog_/de dag yon tan gzugs dang rab tu ldan/_/mkhas pa'i blo dang shes rab ye shes 
[\[92b.2\]]ldan/_/de dag zil non mthu la ldog pa med/_/bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rab tu 'joms/_/de dag tshul khrims rnam par dag pa ste/_/bzod pa'i stobs la sdom pa'i sems kyis gnas/_/khon 'dzin khro ba rnam dag yid bstsal 
[\[92b.3\]]bas/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi chos 'dir rtag tu brtson/_/de dag zas dang skom dag sbyin byed cing /_/bzhon dang phreng ba gos dang spos mang dang /_/mal dang byug pa rgyab rten mar me dag_/rnam pa mtha' yas ji snyed gtong byed cing /_/phan pa'i 
[\[92b.4\]]sems kyis de dag sbyin byed tshe/_/de la shin tu dad pa'i sems bsgyur cing /_/bsam pa dag pas dga' ba yangs bskyed de/_/'jig rten bla ma dag la sbyin pa byed/_/de dag dngos po thams cad gtong byed cing /_/phyi dang nang dang gang rnams 
[\[92b.5\]]ji snyed pa/_/kun kyang dang ba'i yid kyis rab tu gtong /_/yid la zhum par byed pa gang yang med/_/mgo yang gtong zhing mig kyang rab tu gtong /_/lag pa gtong zhing de bzhin rkang pa gtong /_/sha dag gtong zhing de bzhin rkang yang gtong /_/
[\[92b.6\]]thams cad lus kyang mi dga' med par gtong /_/de dag dbang phyug shin tu yangs sgyur cing /_/rigs dang rus ldan 'gro ba mi yi rje/_/kha nas lce yang shin tu brkyang byas shing /_/slong ba rnams la mi dga' med par gtong /_/de dag dbang phyug 
[\[92b.7\]]shin tu yangs sgyur cing /_/slong ba rnams la lce sbyin byas nas kyang /_/'di na 'gro ba yod pa ma lus kun/_/rgyal ba'i ljags yangs ji bzhin thob 'gyur bsngo/_/rab tu spro byas bu yang sbyin par byed/_/mi dga' med byas chung ma sbyin par 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]byed/_/rab tu dga' byas rgyal srid sbyin par byed/_/bdag kyang gzhan gyi bran du sbyin par byed/_/ci 'dod gtong zhing thams cad gtong bar byed/_/mi skyor gtong zhing dus su gtong bar byed/_/ci 'dra'i dngos po bslangs 
[\[93a.2\]]par gyur pa rnams/_/thams cad bsam pa bzhin du rab tu gtong /_/chos kyi don du bdag kyang gtong bar byed/_/byang chub don du dka' ba rab tu spyod/_/sems can don du thams cad bzod par byed/_/ye shes don du phyir ldog mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[93a.3\]]rgyal ba rnams las chos rnams mnyan byas shing /_/mngon par g.yog phyir 'bul bar byed pa'i tshe/_/'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab sems kyis/_/rgyal ba rnams la dga' ba yangs pa bskyed/_/mi yi gtso bo 'dren pa mthong nas kyang /_/
[\[93a.4\]]byams ldan phan pa'i sems kyis rim gro byed/_/dga' bar byed pa'i yid dang ldan gyur cing /_/snod du gyur te chos rnams len par byed/_/ci nas 'jig rten 'di dag bder 'gyur zhing /_/ci nas thams cad bskyab par 'gyur ba dang /_/ci nas 
[\[93a.5\]]'gro ba thams cad 'grol 'gyur bar/_/de dag 'gro ba kun la yongs su bsngo/_/gzugs mdzes bzhin sdug ngag snyan ldan pa dag_/me tog sdug btags spos zhim bskus pa rnams/_/phreng ba lhab lhub rgyan dang ldan pa yi/_/'khor dang ldan 
[\[93a.6\]]par de dag rab gyur cing /_/mkhas shing shes pa'i g.yog 'khor de dag kyang /_/phan par sems pa'i yid kyis gtong ba'i tshe/_/bltos shing re ba'i sems kyang mi 'byung bar/_/sems can phan phyir byang chub rab tu tshol/_/dge ba de la 
[\[93a.7\]]rjes su sems byed cing /_/sna tshogs yangs shing rgya che snrel zhi la/_/'gro ba kun la brtan pa yongs su bsngo/_/las la gnas su byed pa gang yang med/_/de dag rgyal srid yangs pa sbyin par byed/_/yul dang mir bcas grong khyer dam 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]pa dang /_/rgyal po'i pho brang gnas su gyur pa dang /_/khyim dang bza' shing ra ba sbyin par byed/_/bskal pa brgyar yang sus kyang ma byin pa'i/_/sbyin pa 'jig rten mi yi gtso la 'bul/_/'jig rten rnams kyi pha rol phyin byas shing /_/
[\[93b.2\]]'gro ba kun la pha rol ston par byed/_/de dag phyogs bcu'i slong ba mang po dag_/rnam pa sna tshogs mthong bar gyur nas kyang /_/slong ba thams cad shin tu mgur byas shing /_/shin tu dga' 'gyur de bzhin spro bar byed/_/dus gsum 
[\[93b.3\]]rgyal ba kun gyis cir bsngos pa/_/skyes bu 'dul ba de dag spyod yul la/_/rab tu bslabs te pha rol phyin byas shing /_/de dag las de yongs su bsngo bar byed/_/chos rnams 'di la kye ma su zhig zhugs/_/gang la zhugs gyur ji ltar 
[\[93b.4\]]zhugs gyur ces/_/de dag chos dngos 'di la rnam lta yang /_/sbyin pa'i sems la rnam par thogs pa med/_/chos rnams gang la chos kyis chags med par/_/ye shes tshul shes de dag yongs su bsngo/_/chos kyi tshul la de dag yongs su bsngo/_/don gyi tshul shes de dag 
[\[93b.5\]]yongs su bsngo/_/don gyi tshul shes de dag yongs su bsngo/_/las la nam yang rnam par rtog pa med/_/rnam par smin la 'ang gnas par mi byed de/_/byang chub rten par rab tu des shes kyang /_/chos nyid dbyings las 'gal bar mi byed 
[\[93b.6\]]do/_/lus la chags par de dag mi byed do/_/sems la 'ang de dag gnas par mi byed do/_/las kyis de dag blo 'jug mi byed do/_/las kyi ye shes rten la 'ang 'jug mi byed/_/'das pa'i chos la rtog par mi byed de/_/ma 'ongs chos la 
[\[93b.7\]]'ang blo ni gtong mi byed/_/da ltar yod la 'ang gnas par mi byed de/_/dus gsum kun las rnam par dben par skyes/_/de dag gzugs kyi pha rol phyin gyur cing /_/tshor ba 'du shes 'du byed yid rnams dang /_/'jig rten kun gyi pha 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]rol phyin gyur te/_/dag pa de dag dma' ba'i yid mi 'gyur/_/phung po rnams dang khams la yongs btsal cing /_/skye mched de bzhin lus kyi rnam pa dang /_/sems kyi rnam pa ma lus rnam gzhigs kyang /_/byang chub 
[\[94a.2\]]dngos su gang yang mi rnyed do/_/rtag la nam yang chags par mi byed do/_/chad pa la yang de dag sems mi 'jug_/chos nyid yod dang med pa ma yin te/_/gcig nas gcig brgyud las kyang ma lus shes/_/sems kyi rgyu yis byang chub thob mi 
[\[94a.3\]]byed/_/chos nyid la 'ang de dag mi gnas te/_/zhing la'ang de dag gnas pa ma yin no/_/dus gsum chos rnams kun kyang yod ma yin/_/de ltar spyod pa chos 'di kun rtog cing /_/ji ltar rgyal ba kun gyis brtag mdzad pa/_/de ltar des btsal 
[\[94a.4\]]nam yang rnyed pa med/_/spyod pa rnams la mi shes rmongs pa med/_/bya ba'i lam dang 'gal bar mi byed cing /_/las kyi lam rnams yongs su rjod byed pas/_/sems can lam rnams yongs su spyod byed cing /_/rgyur bcas rkyen dang 
[\[94a.5\]]bcas par de la rtog_/ye shes mkhas pas gang rnams rjod mdzad pa'i/_/mkhas pa'i lam la de dag spyod byed cing /_/chos kyi tshul la rjes su sems byed pas/_/byang chub tshul ni mi yi gtso bos rtogs/_/chos rnams skye med 'jig pa 
[\[94a.6\]]med pa ste/_/'gro ba kun tu gang yang 'pho ba med/_/chos rnams skye dang 'chi 'pho med par yang /_/rgyal ba'i chos kyi tshul rnams rab tu rtogs/_/chos rnams gang gi rang bzhin rnam shes pa/_/de ni rang bzhin dngos yod mi rtog ste/_/dngos 
[\[94a.7\]]med rtog med de dag rab tu shes/_/bde gshegs ye shes de dag rnam par mthong /_/'gro ba kun dang chos nyid thams cad dang /_/sems can rnam pa zhing gi rnam pa dang /_/chos kyi rnam pa dus rnams ma lus pa'i/_/chos rnams mkhas pas 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]gang yang brjod pa med/_/chos rnams ma lus gzung bar bya ba med/_/ji snyed sems can rgyal bas sangs rgyas pa/_/de yi chos la'ang chos kyi dngos med de/_/de yang dus dang chos su brjod pa yin/_/chos nyid kun tu 'gro ba ci 'dra ba/_/
[\[94b.2\]]de bzhin de dag yongs su bsngo ba byed/_/des kyang 'gro ba kun nas bsgyur byas te/_/de la kun tu dpa' bo yongs su bsngo/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba ste/_/yongs su bsngo ba drug pa'o/_/
[\[94b.3\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba/_'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba bdun pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[94b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po thams cad gtong ba'i dmigs pa la brtson pa/_tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la rab tu brten pa/_lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa'i yi dam phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/_
[\[94b.5\]]thams cad gtong ba'i bzod pa dang ldan zhing rna la gzon pa'i ngang tshul can/_bsam gtan 'byam klas pa rnam pa tha dad pa la mkhas pa'i rjes su zhugs pa/_shes rab kyi tshul dang sa rnam par dpyod pa la mkhas pa/_'gro ba 
[\[94b.6\]]thams cad kyi sems kyis rnam par phye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/_yon tan mtha' yas pa yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i las la rab tu brtson par yid la byed pa dang ldan pa/_
[\[94b.7\]]'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi phyogs mngon par skyob pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu nye bar [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]kyang rung /_dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po nye bar [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]kyang rung /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs pa nye bar [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]kyang rung /_dge ba'i 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]rtsa ba rgya chen po nye bar [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]kyang rung /_dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa nye bar [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]kyang rung /_dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs mang po rdul tsam yan cad nye bar [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]kyang rung /_dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhal du med pa nye bar 
[\[95a.2\]{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]kyang rung /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa nye bar [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]kyang rung /_dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med pa nye bar [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]kyang rung /_dge ba'i rtsa ba mu med pa nye bar [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]kyang rung /_sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar 
[\[95a.3\]{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]kyang rung /_chos la dmigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]kyang rung /_tshul de bzhin du dge 'dun la dmigs pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la dmigs pa dang /_sems can thams cad la dmigs pa dang /_thabs 
[\[95a.4\]]mkhas pa la dmigs pa dang /_legs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems sgom pa la dmigs pa dang /_nang la dmigs pa dang /_phyi rol la dmigs pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa'i tshogs la dmigs pa'i dge 
[\[95a.5\]]ba'i rtsa ba nye bar [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]kyang rung ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la yongs su spyod pa dang /_nye bar gnas pa dang /_'jug pa dang /_yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_nye bar [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_tshogs su bya ba dang /_mos par bya ba dang /_rnam par 
[\[95a.6\]]sbyong ba dang /_rnam par ston pa dang /_rgya cher byed pa'i tshe bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_sems can dmyal ba'i sgo shin tu bcad pa dang /_dbang po rgyu ba shin tu bsdams pa/_bya ba'i tshul la rab tu zhugs pa/_phyin 
[\[95a.7\]]ci log med par 'gro ba/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi snod du gyur pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du byung ba/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]kyis shin tu gsos pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las byung ba/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam gyi rjes su song ba sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su spyod pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi rjes su 'brang 
[\[95b.2\]]ba/_rang gi sems kyi go skabs rnyed pa/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang 'dra ba/_sangs rgyas kyi 'khor thams cad du yang dag par 'byung ba/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag gi stobs kyis phyung ba/_sangs rgyas 
[\[95b.3\]]thams cad kyi yon tan gyis yang dag par 'phags pa/_mtho ris la chags pa med pa/_skyid pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/_mngon par 'du byed pa la chags pa med pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dngos po thams cad yongs su bsngo bar byed pa/_
[\[95b.4\]]'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi gter du gyur pa/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i nan tan la rab tu zhugs pa/_'gro ba thams cad dgab pa'i gdugs su gyur pa/_'gro ba thams cad rab tu rten pa'i lam gyis mngon par 'don pa/_sems 
[\[95b.5\]]can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan par byed pa/_yul thams cad du yongs su bsngo ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub kyi sgo rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa/_ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag par gzugs par byed pa/_lam chen 
[\[95b.6\]]po rnam par spyod pa la brtson pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na don yod pa la zhugs pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyi dri ma sbyong ba/_rab tu sbyin pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su rigs dang ldan par byung ba/_
[\[95b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi rigs rnam par dag par rab tu skyes pa/_yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor chen pos sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa/_sems can thams cad rnam par dag 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]pa la yang dag par gzhog pa/_dge ba yongs su bsdu ba la yang dag par brtson pa/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlab dang lhag pa'i bsam pa rdul med pas yongs su bzung ba de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 
[\[96a.2\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_/sems 'di ltar bskyed de dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub tu sems bskyed pas yang dag par bzung ba dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pas bsam pa dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pas bstan pa dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i 
[\[96a.3\]]bsam pa las byung ba dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pas phan pa la zhugs pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad ma lus pa la snying brtse bar byed pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yul du yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang /_stobs bcu la dmigs par brtson pa 
[\[96a.4\]]dang /_stobs bcu'i dbyings su yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dbyings su mngon par bsgrubs pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de ltar yang dag par bsgrubs pa/_de dag las rnam par smyin par gang byung ba de phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal 
[\[96a.5\]]pa'i mur thug par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_'gro ba thams cad la yongs su gtang bar bya ba yongs su gtang ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo ste/_sems can gyi khams thams cad las sems can gcig kyang 
[\[96a.6\]]ma chud pa med par byas te/_sems can gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad ma lus pa la yang yongs su bsngo bar byed de/_'di ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rin po ches yongs su rgyas pa dang /_
[\[96a.7\]]rin po che thams cad kyis chal par gang ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa gos kyis rnam par dag cing gos kyis yongs su gang ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa/_spos thams cad kyis yid du 'ong zhing dri zhim pos yongs su rgyas pa dang /_
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par mdzes shing lhab lhub kyis yongs su rgyas pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nor bu rin po che mtha' yas pa khyad par du 'phags shing nor bu rin po ches yongs su 
[\[96b.2\]]rgyas pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa me tog sna tshogs kyi kha dog du ma dang ldan par gyur cing /_me tog thams cad kyis yongs su rgyas pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa kha zas zhim po sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan 
[\[96b.3\]]zhing kha zas zhim po phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa gser dang dngul dang nor gyi dbyig gis dag cing nor gyi dbyig gis yongs su rgyas pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rin po che'i ba dan sna tshogs kyis 
[\[96b.4\]]brgyan cing lha rdzas kyi gos thams cad kyis kun nas yog ste/_grags pas yongs su rgyas pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi cod pan gyis rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su brgyan cing rin po che'i cod pan gyis 
[\[96b.5\]]yongs su rgyas pa dag slong ba re re la phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par/_sbyin pas ngoms par ma gyur cig_/rgyun gcod par ma gyur cig_/slong ba gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du slong ba thams cad ma lus pa la yongs su gtong zhing 
[\[96b.6\]]slong ba re re la yang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par shin tu tshim par byed kyang yongs su skyo bar ma gyur cig_/phyir ldog par ma gyur cig_/de yang 'di ltar sgyu med pa'i sems dang /_'dod cing sred pa med pa'i sems dang /_
[\[96b.7\]]grags pa 'dod pa med pa'i sems dang /_'gyod pa med pa'i sems dang /_mya ngan med pa'i sems dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la the tsom med pa'i sems dang /_gtong bshin tu gtong ba'i sems dang snying brtse ba'i sems dang 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]yongs su smin par bya ba'i sems dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rab tu dgod pa'i sems kyis yongs su gtong bar gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ma 'ongs 
[\[97a.2\]]pa'i bskal pa'i mthar gtong ba dang /_'dod pa'i sbyin pa gtang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can gyi khams las sems can gcig kyang ma chud pa med par byas shing 
[\[97a.3\]]sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa glang po cang shes yan lag bdun shin tu gnas pa/_gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang /_gser gyi rgyan dang /_gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa dang /_rin po che'i rgyan 
[\[97a.4\]]thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pas yongs su gang ba'i sbyin pa byed par gyur cig_/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa/_rta'i rgyal po sprin ces bya ba dang 'dra ba rta'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i rgyan sdug gu 
[\[97a.5\]]sna tshogs dang /_yan lag gi rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pas yongs su gang ba'i sbyin pa byed par gyur cig_/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bud med dang rol mo brdung ba dang /_dkrol ba yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 
[\[97a.6\]]dbyangs dang ldan pa dang bcas pas yongs su gang ba'i sbyin pa byed par gyur cig_/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bu dang bu mos gang ba byang chub kyi sems la gnas shing phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par slong ba re re la yang 
[\[97a.7\]]yongs su gtong bar gyur cig_/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rang gi lus kyis yongs su bkang ste byang chub kyi sems kyi stobs shin tu bdo ba'i yid kyis yongs su gtong bar gyur cig_/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rang gi 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]mgos yongs su bskang ste/_bag yod pa'i sems kyis yongs su gtong bar gyur cig_/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par rang gi lus las byung ba'i mig gis yongs su bkang ste/_mig gi sbyin pa byed par gyur cig_/'jig rten gyi 
[\[97b.2\]]khams grangs med pa sha dang rkang gis yongs su bkang ste/_sdug bsngal gyis nyams pa med pa'i yid kyi dbang pos yongs su gtong bar gyur cig_/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bdag dbang ba'i rgyal po'i srid dang skyid pas yongs su bkang ste/_
[\[97b.3\]]srid kyi sbyin pa byed par gyur cig_/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par bran dang las byed pa'i mis yongs su bkang ste/_btang ba thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang ma 'dres par gtang ba chen po'i sems la gnas pas slong ba re re la yang yongs 
[\[97b.4\]]su gtong bar gyur cig_/de bzhin du sems can gyi khams thams cad ma lus par yongs su bzung ste/_sems can gyi khams thams cad la gcig kyang ma chud pa med par slong ba gcig la ji ltar slong ba thams cad la'ang de bzhin du sems 
[\[97b.5\]]can re re zhing yang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par tshim par byed par gyur cig_/'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing /_'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu ji lta ba 
[\[97b.6\]]de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad du yang snying rje chen po yangs pas yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang sems can thams cad la snying brtse bas sems can 
[\[97b.7\]]thams cad la rim gro byed pa'i tshe/_de'i rgyus bdag gi sems sbyin pa las phyir ldog par ma gyur cig_/gtong ba'i sems kyis se gol gtogs pa tsam yang skyo bar ma gyur cig_/de yang 'di ltar chags pa med pa'i sems dang 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]shin tu gtong ba'i sems dang /_bdag nyid yangs pa'i sems dang /_zab pa'i sems dang /_legs par yongs su sdud pa'i sems dang /_mngon par ma zhen pa'i sems dang /_chos la srog med pa'i sems 
[\[98a.2\]]dang /_yid shin tu thul ba'i sems dang /_ma 'khrugs pa'i sems dang /_g.yeng ba med pa'i sems dang /_rin po che'i rigs sna tshogs thob pa'i sems dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa thams cad la re ba med pa'i sems dang /_chos thams 
[\[98a.3\]]cad ma lus pa mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i sems dang /_bsngo ba chen po'i rjes su 'brang ba'i sems dang /_don gyi chos shin tu rtogs pa'i sems dang /_ye shes chen po'i sa rab tu thob pa'i sems dang /_sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen 
[\[98a.4\]]pa'i ye shes la dgod pa'i sems dang /_chos kyi snang ba chen po yang dag par bskyed pa'i sems dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i sems kyis sbyin par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[98a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po sems kyi skad cig re re la nye bar bstsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ste/_sems can de dag longs spyod kyis phongs pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/de dag gis bsod 
[\[98a.6\]]nams mi zad pa yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/de dag gis bde bar gtogs pa'i bde ba thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i las kyi tshogs kyi phyir 
[\[98a.7\]]yongs su bsngo'o/_/de dag gis chos thams cad kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/de dag theg pa thams cad las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/de dag gis sangs rgyas thams cad mthong zhing 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]mchod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/de dag sems can gyi khams thams cad du nyams pa med pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/de dag sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/de dag 
[\[98b.2\]]sems can thams cad kyi mi khom pa rnam par spong zhing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rab tu dgod par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe/_yid bde zhing sems rab tu dga' bas yongs su bsngo ste/_'di ltar 
[\[98b.3\]]sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad la gtong ba'i sems las su rung ba la gnas te yongs su 
[\[98b.4\]]bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad la gtong bas yang dag par bsdu ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad mngon par mgu bar gtang ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi dbul 
[\[98b.5\]]ba bzlog pa'i phyir gtong ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad nor thams cad kyis bsdu ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad la nor grangs med par gtang ba'i sems la 
[\[98b.6\]]gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad la gtong ba mtha' yas pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad la phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par rgyun chad pa med 
[\[98b.7\]]par gtong ba'i sems la rgyun chad pa med par gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad la nor thams cad 'gyod pa med par sbyin pa dang /_mdzod thams cad skyo ba med par gtong ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]cad la dngos po thams cad sbyin zhing gtong ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i gtong ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad la phan gdags 
[\[99a.2\]]pa'i phyir gtong ba'i sems la gnas te/_yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad la nor mang po rgya che ba/_yangs pa gtong ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad rgyan du mas rim gro bya ba'i phyir gtong ba'i 
[\[99a.3\]]sems la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad la thogs pa med par gtong ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad la tha ba med par gtong ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad la 
[\[99a.4\]]stobs chen po shin tu bdo ba rdo rjes gtong ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad la nyi ma ltar snyoms pa'i 'od gzer gyis gtong ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[99a.5\]]ye shes bsgrub pa'i phyir gtong ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi theg pa chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye 
[\[99a.6\]]shes bsgrub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon du gyur pa la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad dang bsam pa tha dad pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba shin 
[\[99a.7\]]tu rnam par dag par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi the tsom thams cad bstsal zhing dgag pa la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad ye shes dang /_yon tan mnyam pas rnam par dag par 'gyur 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]bar bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mi 'phrogs pa la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa 
[\[99b.2\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tha dad pa med pa la yongs su bsngo bar bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[99b.3\]]spyod pa dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gnas med pa/_yang dag par bsgrub pa la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[99b.4\]]'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dran pa rnam par dag par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba dam pa mngon par skyes bas rnam par dag par bya ba la gnas te yongs 
[\[99b.5\]]su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi bdud kyi las dang sgrib pa dang /_bar du gcod pa'i chos thams cad bstsal cing dgag pa la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi yon tan gyi spyod pa mtha' yas pa mngon par skyes 
[\[99b.6\]]pa mnyam zhing rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rlabs chen po yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral bar bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems 
[\[99b.7\]]can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par bya ba la brtson pa'i sems dang mi 'bral bar bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyis go skabs rnyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba skyon med pa dang /_chos dkar po thams 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi shin tu rgya che zhing mtha' yas pa'i sems dang /_bsam pa rlabs po che mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam 
[\[100a.2\]]par dag pa la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi gtong ba'i sems rnam par dag cing mnyam pa nyid du bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang nan tan mnyam pa nyid 
[\[100a.3\]]kyis rnam par dag par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad brtson 'grus chen po'i phung po brtson 'grus thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i rgyud 'tshob par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can 
[\[100a.4\]]thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po rab tu thob par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad bsam gtan mtha' yas pas rnam par phye ba'i ye shes dang mngon par shes pa dang ldan par bya ba la gnas te yongs su 
[\[100a.5\]]bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyis chos kyi sku shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa rnam par dag cing mnyam pa nyid du yongs 
[\[100a.6\]]su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad spyod 
[\[100a.7\]]pa 'thun pas yang dag par 'byung zhing chos yang dag par bsgrub pa mnyam pa nyid kyis yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa yongs su 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi las mnyam zhing rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[100b.2\]]dag gi las mnyam zhing rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi yid kyi las mnyam zhing rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i las rnam par smin pa mnyam zhing rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can 
[\[100b.3\]]thams cad kyi chos khong du chud pa mnyam zhing rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi don khong du chud pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa khong du chud pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[100b.4\]]sems can thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam khong du chud pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi yon tan thams cad thob pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams 
[\[100b.5\]]cad kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa la byung bar yongs su bsngo ba mnyam pa nyid kyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi zhing rnam par dag pa thams cad mthong ba 
[\[100b.6\]]dang /_'jug pa dang nyams su myod pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa skyon med par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi mtshan 
[\[100b.7\]]dang dpe byad bzang po dang /_bsod nams kyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyi rkyen phun sum tshogs pa'i gsung yan lag 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]brgya stong phrag brgyad kyis brgyan pa dang /_gsung gi tshul mtha' yas pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs yang dag par bsgrub pa/_yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi stobs bcu'i 
[\[101a.2\]]rgyan chags pa med pa'i sems kyis mnyam par 'grub par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rgyan mi 'phrogs pa thams cad dang /_tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad bla na med 
[\[101a.3\]]pa'i mi 'jigs pas khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ro mnyam pa nyid sgrog par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med cing phyir mi ldog pa rab tu bskor bas/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad 
[\[101a.4\]]kyi chos thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa la 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i las thams cad rnam par dag pas dus mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can 
[\[101a.5\]]thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i ded dpon yongs su grub cing rnam par dag pas mnyam pa nyid du bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi rgyan gcig dang /_rgyan mtha' yas pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyan mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba 
[\[101a.6\]]dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dus thams cad mnyam pas dus gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su 'gro ba'i yid mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'dong zhing chos bstan 
[\[101a.7\]]pa don du gnyer ba'i skye mched mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa la phan pa'i rim gro rtag tu byed par shes pa'i rjes su 'dong bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi chos thams cad rnam 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]par mthong ba'i ye shes kyis thams cad mthong ba dang ldan pa'i mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi mi g.yo ba'i las kyi lam thams cad kyi rnam par smin pa bsgribs pa med pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[101b.2\]]bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad dbang po thams cad la 'jug pa'i dbang po'i mngon par shes pa sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po shes pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi rnam par dbye ba med pa'i ye shes 
[\[101b.3\]]mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid gcig cing rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mi mthun pa med cing mthun pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rnam par phye ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems 
[\[101b.4\]]can thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /_cho 'phrul chen po can gyi rdzu 'phrul khong du chud pa rab tu 'thob pa'i mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi yon tan zad mi shes pa dang thams 
[\[101b.5\]]cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams gcig du mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yongs su shes par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad 
[\[101b.6\]]sbyin pa'i gnas [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]dam par gyur te/_dam pa'i chos mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi mthu chen pos sbyin pa rnam par dag cing snying rje chen po mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi zil 
[\[101b.7\]]gyis ma non cing bzod par dka' ba'i gzi brjid mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi thub par dka' zhing blta na don yod pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]pham pa med pa'i sems dang /_yid dang bsam pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi chos 'byam klas pa thams cad la dogs pa med par zhugs te khong du chud par bya ba dang /_
[\[102a.2\]]sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'od dang 'od gzer gcig rab tu gtong ba mnyam pa nyid la 'jug par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad thogs pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa mthar 
[\[102a.3\]]phyin par bya ba mnyam pa nyid la nan tan byed par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa gcig pa dang /_smon lam 'thun pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi brjod pa gcig dang /_'byung ba mnyam pa nyid yongs 
[\[102a.4\]]su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad mthong zhing mgu bar 
[\[102a.5\]]bya ba mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang /_sems can gdul ba rgyun mi 'chad pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi thogs 
[\[102a.6\]]pa med par chos bstan pa dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad du grag pa mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems dang shes pa thams cad sems dang shes pa gcig tu yongs su bsngo ba'i dge 
[\[102a.7\]]ba'i rtsa ba mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi rnam par bral ba med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bstsags pa mnyam pa nyid la sems can thams cad rab tu dgod par bya ba dang ldan pa'i ye shes 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]rnam par dag par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams kyi lhun mnyam pa nyid rnam par dag par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi rmongs pa med par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[102b.2\]]bsams shing yongs su bsngo ba shin tu grub par 'gyur ba'i mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba mnyam pa nyid yongs su 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par bya 
[\[102b.3\]]ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 'byung ba thams cad mi mnyam pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ye shes kyi 'byung ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad 'khor gcig rnam par 
[\[102b.4\]]dag pas 'khor thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid kyis brgyan par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig dang /_mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba dang 
[\[102b.5\]]ldan par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi lhab lhub thams cad dang /_lhab lhub brjod du med pa dang /_lhab lhub mtha' yas pa dang /_lhab lhub mu med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan par bya ba'i lhab 
[\[102b.6\]]lhub mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi chos thams cad rnam par rtogs shing mkhas pa dang /_don rnam par rtogs pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams 
[\[102b.7\]]cad kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa'i mchog dam pa rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi rnam pa tha dad pa med cing rnam pa tha dad pa dang bral zhing 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]mngon par shes pa dang /_bsod nams dang yon tan mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi chos mi mnyam pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[103a.2\]]kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba gcig tu legs par dbang bskur ba mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad tshur zil gyis gnon cing phar zil gyis mi non pa'i sems can thams cad kyi ye shes 
[\[103a.3\]]dang /_lus rnam par dag pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying brtse ba dang ldan pa/_phan par dga' ba/_snying rje chen po can sems can thams cad rnam par dag 
[\[103a.4\]]par bya ba la yang dag par zhugs pa/_phrag dog med pa ser sna med pa/_rigs pa dang ldan pa/_rab tu dge ba che ba nyid dang ldan pa/_yangs pa la mos pa/_'khrug pa med pa/_khro ba med pa/_rnyog pa med pa/_rab rib med pa/_khams dang 
[\[103a.5\]]bsam pa shin tu gsal ba'i yid dang ldan pa/_drang po drang ba g.yo med pa/_rmongs pa med pa/_mchog tu bya ba mi phyed pa/_'da' ba med par spyod pa/_phyir mi ldog pa/_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/_chos dkar po'i 
[\[103a.6\]]stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pa/_mdud pa med pa/_nyams pa med pa/_chos dkar po thams cad yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa/_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba la yang dag par brtson pa las ngan 
[\[103a.7\]]pa thams cad 'gags pa/_dka' thub dang brtul zhugs chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa/_brtul zhugs dang /_dka' thub gyis sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba shin 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]tu sbyong ba/_sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rang gi lus kyis len pa/_ye shes chen po'i mig gis yang dag par lta ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa ye shes kyi 'byung gnas dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu nyan pa/_sems can thams cad la 
[\[103b.2\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba/_sems can thams cad yon tan rnam par dag pa la rab tu dag phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba mnyam par yongs su bsngo ba/_sems can thams cad kyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsdu ba la mkhas pa/_don gyi rjes 
[\[103b.3\]]su song ba'i khams kyi yon tan mngon par shes pa sems can thams cad dang mnyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par byang ba yongs su bsngo ba/_sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing gi rnam pa la chos dkar po'i sa bon lta bur gyur pa/_dge 
[\[103b.4\]]ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'gyod pa med par yongs su bsngo ba dang ldan pa/_sems can [(]kyi [,]gyi [)]khams thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i skal ba yongs su bsngo bas yongs su 'dzin pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi skal ba dang /_chos kyis char 'bebs 
[\[103b.5\]]pas dbyar gyi dus su gyur pa/_yongs su bsngo ba'i rigs dang ldan pa de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_ci nas kyang sems can thams cad shin tu bde zhing skyid pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang sems can thams 
[\[103b.6\]]cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang sems can thams cad shin tu bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang sems can thams cad shin tu grol bar 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang /_ci 
[\[103b.7\]]nas kyang sems can thams cad shin tu shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang sems can thams cad chos dkar po la shin tu bkod par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang sems can thams cad nyams pa med pa'i mig dang ldan par 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang sems can thams cad shin tu dul ba'i yid dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i 'dul ba dang ldan par 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo ste/_de ltar 
[\[104a.2\]]yongs su bsngo ba yang las kyi gnas su yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/rnam par smin pa'i gnas su ma yin no/_/lus kyi gnas su ma yin no/_/dngos po'i gnas su ma yin no/_/zhing gi gnas su ma yin no/_/phyogs kyi gnas su ma yin no/_/sems can 
[\[104a.3\]]thams cad [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]gnas su yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi gnas las gud du 'phags par yang yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/mngon par zhen pa thams cad las gud du 'phags par yang yongs su mi bsngo ste/_mngon par zhen pa'i chos yongs 
[\[104a.4\]]su shes par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo zhing stobs pa 'jig rten thams cad nges par byed pa/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_bsam pa mnyam pas sems 
[\[104a.5\]]las su rung bar byas pa/_shin tu dag pa/_shin tu brtags pa/_shes rab dang /_ye shes dang ldan pa/_nang mnyam par gzhag pa dang ldan pa/_phyi rol gyi dmigs pa shin tu rtogs pa/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung 
[\[104a.6\]]ba'i mthar phyin pa/_sangs rgyas kyi rigs shin tu gsal ba dang ldan pa de/_yongs su bsngo ba des de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe/_tshur zil gyis gnon la phas zil gyis mi gnon pa yin/_yon tan mi zad pa yin/_'gro ba thams cad 
[\[104a.7\]]du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa la brtson pa yin/_zhing thams cad na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang tshegs chung ngus mig lam du snang bar mthong ba yin/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang byang chub sems 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]dpa'i spyad pa spyod par snang ba yin te/_tshig rab tu phye ba thams cad la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyang rab tu thob cing khong du chud do/_/phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par rgyun chad pa med pa'i chos bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis sems 
[\[104b.2\]]can thams cad dga' bar bya ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par yongs su sbyang ba'i don du sems kyi skad cig re re la mig yor snang ba'i tshul du skye ba yin/_'jig rten gyi khams thams 
[\[104b.3\]]cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sems kyi skad cig re re la yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar rnam par dpyod pa'i ye shes kyis ngoms mi shes pa yin/_sems 
[\[104b.4\]]can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa mnyam pa nyid gang la bdag nyid gnas pa de la yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin/_yongs su sgrub pa yin/_yongs su sbyong ba yin/_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la rab tu brtson 
[\[104b.5\]]par byed cing sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin/_las ji ltar rnam par dag pa'i tshul bzhin du 'ang yang dag par 'byung ba yin/_thogs pa med pa'i rna ba mngon par bsgrub pa yang rab tu 'thob pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i 
[\[104b.6\]]yang brjod du med par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/_chos mtha' yas pa bstan cing /_brjod pa thos nas de dag thams cad 'dzin pa yin te/_chos bstan pa de la ring ba'i 'du shes nye bar mi gzhog go_/sems skad cig gis byung ba/_dngos po 
[\[104b.7\]]med pa la rab tu gnas pa rten pa med cing /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /_gnas pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul la gnas shing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med par 'gro ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po rnam par phye ba thams 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]cad du 'gro bar bya ba la se gol gtogs pa tsam yang dus gang du 'ang thogs pa med pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_yang skal ba mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang ldan pa yin te/_
[\[105a.2\]]yon tan 'di dag dang /_gzhan dag kyang rnam par dag cing mtha' dang dbus med pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang 'thun pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang zad mi shes pa'i yon tan dang legs pa 'thob par 'gyur na bla na med 
[\[105a.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i tshe/_'di lta ste/_zhing thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_lus thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_
[\[105a.4\]]dbang po thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba 
[\[105a.5\]]thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_
[\[105a.6\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid 'thob pa lta ci smos//_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po dgu pa/_
[\[105a.7\]]de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bsngo ba 'dis yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe/_yon tan gyi rgyud kyis tshul rnam par dag par bya ba dang /_yon tan thams cad rab tu brgyan par bya ba yongs su rdzogs par rab tu 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]'thob ste/_de de ltar yongs su bsngo ba 'dis yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe/_sems can rnams zhing dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/zhing rnams sems can dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/zhing rnams sems can gyi las dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/
[\[105b.2\]]sems can gyi las rnams zhing dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/bsam pa sems dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/sems bsam pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/bsam pa dang sems dmigs pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/dmigs pa bsam 
[\[105b.3\]]pa dang sems dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa rten pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/rten pa las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/las bya ba lam dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/lam las bya ba dang 'gal 
[\[105b.4\]]bar mi byed do/_/chos nyid mtshan nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/mtshan nyid chos nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/chos rnams skye ba'i rang bzhin dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/skye ba'i rang bzhin chos rnams dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/
[\[105b.5\]]zhing gi mnyam pa nyid sems can gyi mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/sems can gyi mnyam pa nyid zhing gi mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/sems can gyi mnyam pa nyid chos kyi mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/
[\[105b.6\]]chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid/_sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' 
[\[105b.7\]]mnyam pa nyid sems can thams cad kyi gnas mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/sems can thams cad kyi gnas mnyam pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha'i mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/'das pa ma 'ongs 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/ma 'ongs pa 'das pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa da ltar byung ba dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/da ltar byung ba ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa dang 'gal bar mi byed 
[\[106a.2\]]do/_/dus mnyam pa nyid sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid dus mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_
[\[106a.3\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/de de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe/_las mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin/_rnam par smin pa mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin/_lus mnyam pa nyid dang ldan 
[\[106a.4\]]pa yin/_tshul mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin/_smon lam mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin/_sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin/_zhing thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin/_spyod pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan 
[\[106a.5\]]pa yin/_ye shes thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas thams cad mngon par mnyes par byed pa yin/_byang 
[\[106a.6\]]chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon par dga' bar byed pa yin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par 'grub par byed pa yin/_smon lam thams cad mngon par 'grub par byed pa yin/_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba mngon par 'grub par 
[\[106a.7\]]byed pa yin/_las thams cad rab tu rtogs pa mngon par 'grub par byed pa yin/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byed pa mngon par 'grub par byed pa yin/_rnam par dag pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa mngon 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]par 'grub par byed pa yin/_chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa mngon par 'grub par byed pa yin/_chos dkar po thams cad yongs su bsngo ba rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'grub par byed pa yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[106b.2\]]dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba 'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rjes su song ba zhes bya ste bdun pa'o/_/yongs su bsngo ba de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dod pa 
[\[106b.3\]]thams cad kyi tsher ma dang bral zhing phyir rgol ba rab tu bcom pa yin/_rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pas ltod pa med par shin tu byung ba yin/_yon tan gyi rgyal srid dang dbang rab tu thob pas bsod nams kyis skyob pa'i mthu chen po dang ldan 
[\[106b.4\]]pa yin/_zhing thams cad du 'gro ba la zhugs pas/_chags pa med par spyod pa yin/_lus thams cad dang ldan pas shin tu rnam par phye ba yin/_spyod pa dang /_smon lam thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i ye shes dang ldan pas 
[\[106b.5\]]spyod pa chen pos byung ba yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rna ba'i shes pa thogs pa med par zhugs pas chos thams cad yongs su shes pa dang ldan pa yin/_shes rab kyi mig shin tu dag pa'i blo rab tu thob pas/_sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[106b.6\]]mthong ba dang ldan pa yin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par bya ba la rgyun mi 'chad pa yin te/_chos 'thob par bya ba thams cad thob pas rlom sems med pa yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[106b.7\]]chen po rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/de dag bsod nams rlabs chen byed pa dang /_/rgya che zab mo phra dang rags byed cing /_/sna 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]tshogs chung ngu'i rnam pa byed kyang rung /_/thams cad mtha' yas rnam par yongs su bsngo/_/de dag dngos po ji snyed gang yod pa/_/rgya che yangs pa gang dang gang yang rung /_/glang po'i shing rta rta yi shing rta dang /_/gos 
[\[107a.2\]]dang dbyig dang gser dang dngul dag gis/_/phyogs dang zhing rnams mtha' yas kun bkang zhing /_/de dag mgo dang mig dang lag pa dang /_/sha dang rkang dang de bzhin rkang pa dang /_/rang gi lus kyis kun bkang sbyin par bsngo/_/de dag de ltar yongs su 
[\[107a.3\]]bsngo byas nas/_/sems can phan phyir yongs su dgrol sems kyis/_/mtha' dang dbus med bskal par spyod pa byed/_/'gro ba kun nas de dag sems mi ldog_/de dag 'gro ba kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/legs par byas pa'i las kyis srid 
[\[107a.4\]]gsum gyi/_/'gro ba ma lus thams cad ci nas kyang /_/bde bar 'gyur zhing byang chub thob par bsngo/_/de dag mnyam zhing mtshungs par yongs su bsngo/_/las rnams dag pa ji ltar yongs bsgrubs pa/_/de dag 'gro ba kun dang mnyam par bsngo/_/
[\[107a.5\]]de dag smon lam 'ching bar 'gyur ba med/_/'gro ba kun tu ci la 'ang thogs med par/_/thams cad rjes su smon lam de dag 'gro/_/de dag 'gro la phan phyir sngo byed kyang /_/mkhas pa rnams la spros pa gang yang med/_/'gro ba kun la de dag gnyis 
[\[107a.6\]]'gyur cing /_/sbyin pas 'phags te tshul khrims rnam dag la/_/brtson 'grus stobs kyis sems la bcings med pa/_/de dag smon lam phyir ldog med pa yin/_/de dag bsngo ba'i pha rol phyin pa dag_/chos kyi rgyud la blo gros gnyis mnyam 
[\[107a.7\]]pa/_/de dag don des pha rol phyin pa'i phyir/_/rkang gnyis dbang po'i drung du ye shes rkang pas 'dong /_/de dag chos kyi rnga yi mthar phyin pas/_/rtag tu ye shes rnam pa'i snying po 'chang /_/tshul bzhin chos la chags pa med par zhugs/_
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]de bas de dag yid la chags pa med/_/chos la gnyis su byed pa med pa ste/_/gnyis su med par chos la mi byed do/_/gnyis med gnyis las yongs su grol bas na/_/'gro ba kun gyi tshig lam thams cad shes/_/de dag 'jig rten 
[\[107b.2\]]mnyam nyid khong du chud/_/sems dang sgra dang las rnams thams cad kyang /_/sprul pa lta bur 'gro ba kun shes te/_/kun kyang las kyi rnam smin tshul du 'jug_/'jig rten ji snyed yod pa las rnams kyi/_/byin gyis brlabs yin phyogs 
[\[107b.3\]]rnams sgra kun kyang /_/las kyi rnam par smin pa 'jig rten 'di shes na/_/las rnams thams cad ma lus 'gag par 'gyur/_/de dag 'gro ba kun dang mnyam nyid du/_/lus dang ngag dang sems rnams mnyam nyid kyis/_/'gro ba kun dang mnyam pa 
[\[107b.4\]]nyid phyir bsngo/_/mnyam pa nyid kyi gzhung tshul 'di 'dra'o/_/yongs su spyod pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi/_/gzugs rnams sbyangs shing de yi las bsngo ba/_/skyes bu 'dul ba'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba/_/de 'drar 'gro kun bsod 
[\[107b.5\]]nams gter du bsngo/_/de dag 'gro ba thams cad zil gnon cing /_/brtson 'grus lus dang ldan par gyur pa'i rnams/_/skye dgu kun la phan par bya sems kyis/_/bsod nams rgya mtsho yongs su bsngo bar byed/_/bdag gis bsod 
[\[107b.6\]]nams bsgrubs pa gang yod pa/_/de yis 'gro kun rtag tu rnam dag gyur/_/rgyal ba de dag ji ltar rnam dag pa/_/de ltar 'jig rten rnam dag ldan gyur cig_/mkhas shing don gyi tshul la shes gyur nas/_/ye shes mkhyen ldan chos rab 
[\[107b.7\]]bsngags gyur cig_/'gro kun sangs rgyas ji bzhin gyur cig ces/_/dge ba de dag mnyam pa nyid du bsngo/_/de dag chos rnams gsog tu 'jal byed de/_/'gro ba thams cad stong par rnam rig nas/_/byed pa med cing byed po gang yang med/_/
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]'gro ba rnams kyi las kyang chud mi za/_/chos rnams zhi zhing 'jig rten ma zhi bar/_/rtog med sems kyis de ltar 'jal byed cing /_/'jig rten de dag rnam par rtog shes kyang /_/rnam par rtog cing yongs su bsngo 
[\[108a.2\]]mi byed/_/bde gshegs skur bgrang lus dang ldan pa rnams/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi chos las skyes pa'i sras/_/de dag 'jig rten 'di la the tsom med/_/rgyal sras de dag de ltar yongs su bsngo/_/'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rjes su song 
[\[108a.3\]]ba zhes bya ste/_yongs su bsngo ba bdun pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba brgyad pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de 
[\[108a.4\]]la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dkar po spyod pa la rab tu brtson pa'i sems dang ldan pa snying rje chen po shin tu gsal bar bya ba la rab tu zhugs pa/_lhag pa'i bsam pa chen po rin po che rab tu thob pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad yid la bya ba 
[\[108a.5\]]la brtson pa/_chos dkar po thams cad yongs su bsngo ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi bsam pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dam pa bzang po mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa/_/yon tan dang ye shes la rab tu 
[\[108a.6\]]brtson pa'i yid la byed pa can/_kha lo sgyur ba dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ye shes kyis yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul la mkhas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yang dag par sems pa'i mig dang ldan pa/_ye shes dang mngon par shes pa shin tu rgya che ba 
[\[108a.7\]]dang ldan pa/_dran pa shes bzhin can brtan zhing mi g.yo ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_rmongs pa med pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa khong nas snying brtse ba dang ldan pa/_las la thub pa med pa ye shes la dmigs pa thams cad las phyir mi ldog pa/_
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]theg pa chen po'i sems kyis dpa' ba/_'gro ba thams cad bde bar bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu thob pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba skyon med pa yang dag par [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]shing dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa nye bar sgrub pa dang /_dmigs par byed pa dang /_
[\[108b.2\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_yongs su dag par byed pa dang /_nan tan du byed pa dang /_mngon par brtson par byed pa dang /_yongs su spyod cing sems pa dang /_yang dag par sbyor ba dang /_rab tu ston pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa bsgo rnam pa 
[\[108b.3\]]tha dad pa gzhan dang gzhan gyi mtshan nyid sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_dngos po gzhan dang gzhan las byung ba/_rnam pa sna tshogs su bkod par gyur pa yang dag par spyod pa du ma dang /_brjod pa mtha' yas pa'i tshul gyis rnam par brtags pa/_dge 
[\[108b.4\]]ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs su yang dag par spyod cing /_tshad med par rnam par phye ba las byung ba/_stobs bcur 'gro ba'i sems kyi byin gyis brlabs pa de dag dmigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs la rab tu brtson pa/_gnyis su med pa'i thams cad 
[\[108b.5\]]mkhyen pa nyid la tshul gyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/_'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson pa rnams kyi chags pa med pa'i lus yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 
[\[108b.6\]]la gnas pa rnams kyi chags pa med pa'i ngag yongs su dag par gyur cig_/theg pa chen po la gnas pa'i spyod pa thob par bya ba'i phyir chags pa med pa'i sems yongs su grub par gyur cig_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rnam par dag 
[\[108b.7\]]pa'i phyir bsgribs pa med pa'i sems yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/'gro ba mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir sbyin pa chen po mtha' yas pa'i sems bskyed pa rab tu thob par gyur cig_/zil gyis mi non pa'i sems 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]rab tu thob pa'i phyir/_/chos la dbang sgyur ba'i sems kyis chos kyi snang ba thams cad ston par gyur cig_/byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa'i phyir/_ye shes kyi 'byung gnas dang /_mngon 
[\[109a.2\]]par shes pa thams cad rnam par dag par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa'i phyir 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dran pa rnam par dag par gyur cig_/ltod pa med par yongs 
[\[109a.3\]]su 'byung ba'i phyir/_kho na med par gnas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/stobs bcu'i ye shes la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad nye bar blangs pas khyab par bya ba rgyun chad pa med par gyur cig_/gos 
[\[109a.4\]]pa med par 'jig rten gyi khams su gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyu ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can mtha' yas pa gdul ba rgyun chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par bya ba'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 
[\[109a.5\]]du gnas par bya bas mi skyo bar gyur cig_/byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir bsam pa'i rang bzhin mtha' dang dbus med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par gyur cig_/rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyogs su ye shes 
[\[109a.6\]]kyis 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rmongs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan par gyur cig_/ye shes dang mngon par shes pa la dbang sgyur bar bya ba'i phyir sems skad cig gi 'byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[109a.7\]]rnam par dag pa thams cad yongs su rgyas par gyur cig_/'jig rten thams cad mthong ba rnam par dag pa rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i phyir/_chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/tha dad pa med pa'i ye shes 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]dam pa thob pa'i phyir/_zhing gcig zhing thams cad du rjes su rtogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan par gyur cig_/sems can brjod du med pa gdul zhing byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/_zhing thams cad byin gyis rlob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs 
[\[109b.2\]]mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad tshad med par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu mngon par mos par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ye shes kyi mthong ba dam 
[\[109b.3\]]pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs rab tu thob par gyur cig ces/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zhing gi rnam pa'i phyir 
[\[109b.4\]]yongs su bsngo'o/_/'gro ba thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/ye shes kyis rnam par spyad cing byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/ji ltar bdag gi phyir yongs su bsngo ba/_de ltar sems can thams cad kyi phyir 
[\[109b.5\]]yang yongs su bsngo ste/_'di ltar sems can dmyal ba'i ngan song dgag pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/byol song gi skye gnas kyi ngan song med par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan song rgyun gcad pa'i phyir yongs su 
[\[109b.6\]]bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i las rgyun gcod pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/dgra thams cad dang mdza' ba thams cad bde ba 
[\[109b.7\]]thams cad la gzung pa'i ye shes rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad mngon du gyur pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba yang dag par bstan pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can gyi don bsam gyis mi 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]khyab pa'i ye shes rtogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa rdul med pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang ye shes tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/
[\[110a.2\]]sems can thams cad bde ba'i lam bstan par mnyam du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/yang dag pa'i sems la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_sems can thams cad la 
[\[110a.3\]]rnam par byang ba'i sprin [(]kyi [,]gyi [)]char 'bab pa'i tshul dang /_sems can thams cad la bsod nams kyi zhing du dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i yongs su bsngo bas bsrung ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 
[\[110a.4\]]sgrib pa thams cad dang mi 'grogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/bsgribs pa med pa'i dbyings la gnas par yongs su bsngo'o/_/ye shes dang mngon par shes pa chags pa med pas sems can thams cad kyis ye shes mthong ba yongs su rdzogs 
[\[110a.5\]]par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad don yod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa mchog thams cad dang ldan 
[\[110a.6\]]pa'i ye shes kyis phan 'dogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/'gro ba thams cad yongs su sdud pas 'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug ste/_sems can 
[\[110a.7\]]thams cad kyi sems bsgribs pa med cing mi sgul ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yul dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa mthong ba'am/_bza' shing gi ra ba dga' dga' 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]ltar 'dug pa mthong ba dang /_ljang pa dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang /_me tog dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang /_spos yid du 'ong ba dang /_shing tog dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang /_gos yid du 'ong ba dang /_rin po che dga' dga' ltar 'dug 
[\[110b.2\]]pa dang /_rgyan dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang /_ldum ra dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang /_grong khyer dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang /_ljongs dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang /_rgyal po'i gnas dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang /_
[\[110b.3\]]khams dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang /_yul dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang /_rgyal po'i srid dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang /_dbang dga' dga' ltar sgyur ba dang /_phyogs dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang /_'khor dga' dga' ltar 
[\[110b.4\]]'dug pa dang /_'brog dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dag mthong na/_byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang ye shes la brtson pa bsod nams dam pas byung ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba don du gnyer ba 'gro ba kun tu bag yod par spyod pa/_legs par bstan 
[\[110b.5\]]pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la brtson pa rgya mtsho lta bu shin tu dben pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba zad mi shes pa thams cad dang ldan pa/_bsod nams kyi 'byung gnas dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tha mi dad pa la mkhas pas yongs su bsngo ba/_
[\[110b.6\]]rnam pa mtha' yas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsngo ba mthong ba dang /_rnam par spyod pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa sems can thams cad la sems pas dmigs pa/_chud mi za ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad kyi tshad 
[\[110b.7\]]kyis klas par rgyun mi 'chad cing de bzhin nyid dang mnyam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_sems can thams cad chos nyid ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su 'dzin pa'i chos nyid kyi ngang tshul 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]can du gyur te/_sangs rgyas mthong ba'i dga' ba rab tu thob cing /_sems can grangs med pa thams cad de bzhin nyid dang mnyam par rnam par dag par gyur cig ces/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
[\[111a.2\]]dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa mthong ba de dag thams cad sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur ba yongs su rdzogs pas mdangs dga' ba dang /_zhing thams cad nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med cing rnam 
[\[111a.3\]]par dag pas mdangs dga' ba dang /_sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par ston pas/_mdangs dga' ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su bzung ba rab tu thob pas mdangs dga' 
[\[111a.4\]]ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la zhe sdang ba med pa'i mig gis lta bas mdangs dga' ba dang /_dngos po thams cad yid du 'thad pa mthong ngas mdangs dga' ba dang /_sems can thams cad yang dag par gzung ba rab tu thob pas mdangs 
[\[111a.5\]]dga' ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la chos kyi snang ba thams cad rab tu thob pas mdangs dga' ba dang /_sems can thams cad la gtong ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa byed pas mdangs dga' ba dang /_chos thams cad 'jigs pa med 
[\[111a.6\]]par sems can thams cad la rab tu ston pas mdangs dga' ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad rab tu thob pas mdangs dga' ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzungs 'dzin pas mdangs dga' ba dang /_byang 
[\[111a.7\]]chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes mtha' yas pas rnam par spyod pas mdangs dga' ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par ston pas mdangs dga' ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]'khor thams cad kyis shin tu stan pa yang dag par bstan pas mdangs dga' ba dang /_tshig rab tu phye ba thams cad la mkhas pas bstan pa yang dag par bstan pas mdangs dga' ba dang /_snying rje chen po rab tu thob pas mdangs dga' ba dang /_byang 
[\[111b.2\]]chub tu sems skye ba sar pa gsar pas dbang po dga' bar gyur te mdangs dga' ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs su chud pas mdangs dga' ba dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad 'dul ba rgyun mi 'chad pas mdangs dga' ba dang /_
[\[111b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spobs pa mi zad pas chos thams cad rab tu ston cing mdangs dga' ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par gnas pas yongs su mi skyo zhing mdangs dga' ba dang /_sangs 
[\[111b.4\]]rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas pa'i tshul la sgo mnyam pas 'jug pas mdangs dga' ba dang /_rtsa ba med pas chos thams cad chags pa med pa'i tshul la rab tu 'jug pas mdangs dga' ba dang /_'dod chags med pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 
[\[111b.5\]]thams cad kyi sgrib pa yongs su spang ba'i phyir mi gnyis pa'i dbyings khong du chud pas mdangs dga' ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i chos thams cad la bden pa'i mtha' ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 'jug pas 
[\[111b.6\]]mdangs dga' ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rtsod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pas mdangs dga' ba dang /_bsam pa rdo rje'i snying po lta bus thams cad mkhyen pa'i brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs pas mdangs 
[\[111b.7\]]dga' ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la bar du gcod pa'i dgra rab tu gdul ba yongs su rdzogs pas mdangs dga' ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad du khyab pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul gyi sgo mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yang dag par 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]bstan pa yongs su rdzogs pas mdangs dga' bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba/_
[\[112a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi mas sems shin tu snang bar byas pa/_rmongs pa med pa'i chos la rab tu brtson pa/_ye shes kyi las la zhugs pa/_ye shes kyi sa la shin tu bslabs pa/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par bkram pa 
[\[112a.3\]]yongs su bsngo ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gting rnyed pa/_ye shes kyi rig pa dam pa la zhugs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa tha dad pa 'byam klas pa thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug pa dang ldan pa 
[\[112a.4\]]de 'jig rten thams cad du gnas med par 'gro ba'i sems dang sems can gyi khams thams cad la mngon par chags pas mi gnas pa'i bsam pa dang /_chos thams cad la rlom sems med pa'i yid la byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la nyams pa med 
[\[112a.5\]]pa'i ye shes dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang mi 'gal ba'i yongs su bsngo ba'i sgos dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bstsags pa de dag thams cad chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal ba med 
[\[112a.6\]]cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid 'khrug par mi 'gyur ba dang /_dus mnyam pa nyid la rnam par dpyad pa dang /_sems can med par rtogs par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_chos rnam par dgod 
[\[112a.7\]]pa yang dag par brjod pa dang /_don shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /_zil gyis gnon pa'i sa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_chos nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dpyad pa dang /_ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la yang dag par sems pa dang /_
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]bsam pa shin tu brtan pa yang dag par rdzogs par bya ba dang /_las thams cad yang dag par bstsags pa la 'jug pa dang /_chos rnams kyi bden pa nyid yang dag par blta ba dang /_chos thams cad kyi skyon med pa nyid dang /_chos ji lta ba 
[\[112b.2\]]bzhin du sprul pa'i rgyu dang ldan pa la rab tu 'jug par bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dngos po med par khong du chud par bya ba dang /_don thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs su 'byung ba la rnam par dpyod pa dang /_brjod pa thams cad la gnas 
[\[112b.3\]]med par shin tu bsgrub pa dang /_gnas thams cad rkyen sna tshogs kyis byung ba yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes par bya ba dang /_yongs su bsngo ba rnam par dben pa la rab tu dpyod pa dang /_chos thams cad tshul gcig tu yang 
[\[112b.4\]]dag par blta ba dang /_tshul mtha' yas pa'i chos thams cad dang 'gal ba med par bya ba dang /_yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'grogs pas bsnyen pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su 
[\[112b.5\]]bsngo bas 'gro ba thams cad yang dag par bzung ba dang /_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yongs su bsngo ba khong du chud par byed cing yongs su bsngo ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[112b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po 'jigs pa med pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o/_/tshad med pa'i sems kyis sems can thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/bdag gir bya ba 
[\[112b.7\]]med pa'i sems kyis phyogs thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o/_/khyad par med pa'i sems kyis 'jig rten thams cad la yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yul dang spyod yul thams cad dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyis gos pa med 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la yang dag par spyod pas yongs su bsngo'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'gro ba thams cad mi dmigs shing /_mi gnas pas yongs su bsngo'o/_/
