[\[135b.5\]]rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad khong du chud pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang /_shugs chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas rab tu rtogs pa dang /_dbang po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu brten pa dang /_dran pa dang shes pa dang chos la mkhas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 
[\[135b.6\]]ye shes kyi khong du chud pa dang /_sangs rgyas mang po chos kyi dbyings thams cad yongs su khyab pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lus yang dag par bstan pa'i las dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur gtogs pa dang /_tshig rnam par dgod cing shin tu bstan pa 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[135b.7\]]thams cad du grags pa dang /_yid kyi las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yang dag par bzung ba dang /_kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ye shes chos mtha' dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i grangs dang tshul thams cad ma lus pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'i thams 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par bsgrubs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes par gyur cig_/khong du chud par gyur cig/_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po bcu gcig pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang grol 
[\[136a.2\]]zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su zhing thams cad ma lus par mngon par bsgrub pa shin tu phra ba dang /_sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i ye shes dang mngon par shes pa mngon pa bsgrub pa shin tu phra ba dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa thams cad ma lus par shes pa mngon par 
[\[136a.3\]]bsgrub pa shin tu phra ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad ma lus pa'i sems shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa shin tu phra ba dang /_dus thams cad ma lus pa slebs par chos bstan pa shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa shin tu phra ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[136a.4\]]thams cad ma lus par rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa shin tu phra ba dang nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug pa dang /_dus gsum shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa shin tu phra ba dang /_tshig dang ngag gi lam thams cad 
[\[136a.5\]]ma lus par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa shin tu phra ba dang /_'jig rten pa'i chos thams cad ma lus par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa shin tu phra ba dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i spyod pa thams cad ma lus par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa shin 
[\[136a.6\]]tu phra ba dang /_shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di dag dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lam dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi lam shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa shin tu phra ba de dag thams cad 
[\[136a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang ldan zhing kun tu bzang po'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par 'dzin pas chos ji lta ba bzhin dang /_yi ge ji lta ba bzhin du mig yor dang 'dra ba'i shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_rmi lam dang 'dra ba'i shes pa mngon 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]par bsgrub pa dang /_sgyu ma dang 'dra ba'i shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_sgra brnyan dang 'dra ba'i shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_sprul pa dang 'dra ba'i shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_dben pa dang mnyam pa'i shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_
[\[136b.2\]]zhi ba dang mnyam pa'i shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang mnyam pa'i shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang mnyam pa'i shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang 
[\[136b.3\]]mnyam pa'i shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa nye bar blang ba la gnas par brtson pa'i shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa shin tu phra bas rab tu shes par gyur cig_/khong du chud par gyur cig ces te de yang 'jig rten nam 'jig rten gyi chos 
[\[136b.4\]]la mi rtog pa dang /_de yang byang chub 'am byang chub sems dpa' la mi rtog pa dang /_de yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'am 'byung ba'i lam la mi rtog pa dang /_de yang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mi rtog pa dang /_de yang sems can thams cad gdul 
[\[136b.5\]]ba dang mi gdul ba la rnam par mi rtog pa dang /_de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'am yongs su bsngo ba la rnam par mi rtog pa dang /_de yang bdag gam gzhan la rnam par mi rtog pa dang /_de yang dngos po dang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa la rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa dang /_de yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod 
[\[136b.6\]]pa 'am/_mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la rnam par mi rtog pa dang /_de yang chos nyid dam yongs su shes par bya ba la rnam par mi rtog pas/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang grol zhing bcings pa [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[136b.7\]]pa'i sems dang /_chags pa med pa dang grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i lus dang /_chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sgra dang /_chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang grol zhing bcings pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i las dang /_chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang grol zhing bcings pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rnam par smin pa dang /_chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang grol zhing 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]bcings pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'jig rten dang /_chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang grol zhing bcings pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i zhing dang /_chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang grol zhing bcings pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems can dang /_chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i 
[\[137a.2\]]chos dang /_chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang grol zhing bcings pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bsngo ste/_de de ltar yongs su bsngo bas 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yongs su bsngo ba thob pa yin/_ma byon pa'i 
[\[137a.3\]]sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yongs su bsngo ba 'thob pa yin/_/da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yongs su bsngo ba 'thob pa yin/_'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yongs su 
[\[137a.4\]]bsngo ba la slob pa yin/_ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yongs su bsngo ba 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yongs su bsngo ba la rab tu gnas pa yin/_'das pa'i sangs 
[\[137a.5\]]rgyas thams cad kyi yongs su bsngo ba'i lam la gnas pa yin/_ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yongs su bsngo ba'i lam [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ba yin/_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yongs su bsngo ba'i lam dang 'gal bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pa 
[\[137a.6\]]yin/_'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdams ngag la nan tan du byed pa yin/_ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdams ngag la nan tan byed par 'gyur ba yin/_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdams ngag khong du chud par byed pa yin/_'das pa'i sangs 
[\[137a.7\]]rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin/_ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid bsgrub par 'gyur ba yin/_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la nan tan du byed pa yin/_
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la yongs su spyod pa yin/_ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la rab tu gnas pa yin/_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul dang mnyam par 'gyur ba yin/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i 
[\[137b.2\]]sangs rgyas thams cad dang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mtshan nyid gcig pa yin/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa thob pa yin/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin 
[\[137b.3\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul dang /_tshul gyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pa yin/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sems can gyi gtso bo thams cad kyi yul dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal ba thob pa yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[137b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_grol zhing bcings pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems shes bya ba ste dgu pa'o/_/yongs su bsngo ba de dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad de de ltar yongs 
[\[137b.5\]]su bsngo ste/_de de ltar yongs su bsngo bas 'khor yug rdo rje'i ri thams cad kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]choms pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin/_'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs thams cad ma lus pa dang ldan zhing zil gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]non pa yin/_bdud kyi sde dang bdud kyi dpung dang /_
[\[137b.6\]]bdud kyi las thams cad rab tu 'joms pa yin/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ma lus par yang dag par bstan pa la brtson pa yin/_'gro ba thams cad la go bar byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi tshig dbye ba la mkhas 
[\[137b.7\]]pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rmongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye shes 'byam klas pa dang ldan pa yin/_gang dang gang du shi 'pho ba dang skye ba dang 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang /_gnas pa dang 'dug pa thams cad du [{]myi [,]mi [}]phyed pa'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan pa yin/_
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa dang /_chos kyi 'byung gnas dran pa yang dag par 'dzin pa rnam par dag pa rab tu thob pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su gzung 
[\[138a.2\]]ba la [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyo bas phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par spyod pa rgyun mi chad pa yin/_gnas thams cad yang dag par bcom pa yang rab tu 'thob pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam yang dag par bskyed pa yang 'thob pa yin/_
[\[138a.3\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dang byin gyi rlabs dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang rnam par 'phrul pa thob par bya ba yang rab tu 'thob pa yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 
[\[138a.4\]]phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/de dag zil gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]non 'gyur byas shing /_/'dra [{]myed [,]med [}]de dag phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/las rnams ci 'drar yongs su bsags byas pa/_/de dag kun 
[\[138a.5\]]la brnyas par yong [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_/bdag gis byas pa 'am gzhan gyis byas pa yi/_/dge ba gang la 'ang brnyas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_/de la shin tu mos pa rab bskyed cing /_/de dag sems can phan phyir yongs su bsngo/_/de dag sems la mtho ba 
[\[138a.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]byas shing /_/yid la dma' ba'ang 'chang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]byas te/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi sku yi 'phrin las dang /_/gsol ba gdab las las yang gang 'byung dang /_/gang yang rnam pa mang po byed gyur cig_/sems can kun la bde dang phan sems kyis/_/
[\[138a.7\]]brtan pa'i mos dang bsam las byung ba dag_/skyes bu dbang por ci nas 'gyur bar bsngo/_/rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed gang yod tshul/_/'gro ba 'di na tha dad [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dra ba/_/rgya che yangs dang phra mo zab mo'i rnams/_/de dag bdag gi yongs bstsags shes 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]par bya/_/ji snyed 'jig rten yangs par 'gro ba yi/_/sna tshogs lus rnams lus su gzhol gzud pa/_/de dag shes byas spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_/ye shes sgo las phyir ldog ma gyur cig_/gang yang 'jig rten zhing gi sgo mnga' ba/_/phra dang rgya 
[\[138b.2\]]che spyi'u tshugs snel zhi dag_/sgra'i sbubs su kun kyang bsdu byas te/_/ye shes sgo nas thams cad shes gyur cig_/gang yang sems kyi tshul mang gcig [{]myin [,]min [}]pa/_/de dag sems su yang dag bsdu byas te/_/ye shes sgo nas de dag shes 
[\[138b.3\]]byas nas/_/spyod lam ldog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par spyad par bya/_/'gro ba kun gyi dbang po bsam pa dag_/rgya che de bzhin shin tu phra ba dang /_/zab mo sna tshogs ji snyed bsdu byas shing /_/thams cad rang bzhin ji bzhin shes gyur cig_/gang yang las kyi rnam pa 
[\[138b.4\]]sna tshogs pa/_/rab dang 'bring dang de bzhin tha ma rnams/_/thams cad ye shes sgo nas shes byas te/_/bde gshegs stobs la rab tu 'jug gyur cig_/bdag gis las gtsang yongs su gang bstsags pas/_/'jig rten bskal pa bsam 
[\[138b.5\]]gyis mi khyab pa/_/ji snyed de dag skad cig sems btud cing /_/phyogs rnams kun tu de dag shes gyur cig_/dus rnams snrel zhir dus gsum gzung byas shing /_/bskal pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam tha dad mtshan shes nas/_/de dag mnyam nyid de dang 
[\[138b.6\]]'gal [{]myed [,]med [}]du/_/spyod cing kun tu rmongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]gyur cig_/'gro ba'i spyod pa ji snyed gang yang rung /_/'jig rten dag na brkyang bskum mi g.yo ba/_/rnam pa tha dad thams cad shes gyur kyang /_/mtshan [{]myed [,]med [}]dngos kyi rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]gyur cig_/
[\[138b.7\]]phyogs rnams kun na skyes dbang ji snyed pa/_/su bzhugs de dag rnam par 'phrul mdzad pa/_/tshul gyis dkon zhing shin tu yangs pa rnams/_/de dag thams cad tshul bzhin shes gyur cig_/dga' ldan gnas na rang byung gang bzhugs pa/_/
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]mi yi seng ge 'dra [{]myed [,]med [}]chen po dang /_/phra dang yangs dang rnam dag rgya che dag_/rang bzhin bzhin du thams cad mthong gyur cig_/yum gyi phyal na dpe zla [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams/_/rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed mdzad pa dang /_/'tshang rgya mya 
[\[139a.2\]]ngan 'da' dang 'khor lo'i mchog_/'gro ba kun tu ldog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_/mi yi seng ge bltams par gyur pa'i tshe/_/lha yi mchog dang tshangs pa'i mchog rnams dang /_/ye shes mchog dang shes la gnas rnams kyis/_/lag pa'i dam pas rim 
[\[139a.3\]]gror blangs pa dang /_/de bzhin chos dbyings ma lus ji snyed pa'i/_/phyogs na gang yod thams cad bsdu byas shing /_/sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul gzhi mtha' dbung med pa/_/de dag thams cad mthong zhing shes gyur cig_/skyes bu khyu mchog 
[\[139a.4\]]'jig rten byung gyur cing /_/gshegs thabs bdun por gshegs par gyur pa dang /_/dpe zla med pas rnam par gzigs pa dag_/thams cad chags med sgo nas shes gyur cig_/gang yang skyes dbang bzhad mo bzhad pa dang /_/skye dgu 'di dag 'dod 
[\[139a.5\]]byings gzigs gyur cing /_/sems can 'di dag rab rib bsgribs mdongs pa/_/srid pa'i sdug bsngal kun las dgrol bya zhes/_/seng ge'i nga ro rnam par sgrog mdzad pa/_/bdag cag 'jig rten 'phags pa'i gtso yin gyis/_/ye shes sgron ma 
[\[139a.6\]]shin tu 'dir bstan cing /_/'gro ba kun gyi skye ba dgag par bya/_/gang yang 'od gzer brgya phrag mtha' yas pa/_/mi yi seng ge skye tshe rab 'phro bas/_/ngan song thams cad zhi bar gyur pa dang /_/'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal zhi gyur dang /_/gang yang 
[\[139a.7\]]btsun mo'i 'khor gyi khrod bzhugs shing /_/mi yi seng ge rnam par 'phrul mdzad dang /_/'gro ba kun la phan dang bde thugs kyis/_/'jig rten sgron ma mngon par byung ba dang /_/'gro rgyud 'di las shin tu byung gyur cing /_/byang chub shing drung skyes dbang bzhugs 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]gyur nas/_/sa rnams bskyod byas dpe zla med pa yi/_/'od snang phyogs bcu kun tu bkye gyur cing /_/bdud kyi khyim rnams rab tu ldeg mdzad de/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad skul mdzad dang /_/sngon spyod gang rnams yongs su smin mdzad cing /_/
[\[139b.2\]]gang non skyes dbang rnam par 'tshang rgya ba/_/ma lus skra yi sbubs su bsdu byas shing /_/phyogs rnams zhing rgyud de bzhin bsdu byas te/_/sems can mtha' yas rgyud kyang yongs bsdus shing /_/rgyal ba rnams kyi rnam 'phrul grub gyur cig_/tshul rnams 'di 
[\[139b.3\]]dag ma lus shes byas te/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa'i yon tan brjod pa dang /_/ye shes mkhyen pa'i yon tan ma brjod pa/_/thams cad spyod la gnas te shes gyur cig_/ji snyed bdud kyi dkrugs ma mang po dag_/de dag dpung gis stong gsum khyab gyur 
[\[139b.4\]]cing /_/bdud rnams phyin ci log gtong mang po dag_/thams cad chags [{]myed [,]med [}]sgo nas thul gyur cig_/zhing na mi yi seng ge gang bzhugs dang /_/brgya byin gnas na skyes dbang gang bzhugs dang /_/tshangs pa'i gnas na rang byung gang bzhugs pa/_/chags [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[139b.5\]]thams cad ma lus mthong gyur cig_/gang rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]yi gtso bo'i sku tshul mtha' yas pa/_/dus kyi dus gsum bskal pa ji snyed par/_/gang rnams rgyal bas mtha' ma ma brnyes dang /_/dpe zla [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i gdan du gyur pa 
[\[139b.6\]]rnams/_/mtha' yas phyogs rnams gang gis khyab gyur pa/_/mtshan nyid tha dad rgyan gyis dag pa rnams/_/kun na rgyal ba bsam yas bzhugs pa dag_/de dag rgyal sras mang pos yongs bskor cing /_/chos dbyings ma lus kun tu khyab mdzad nas/_/
[\[139b.7\]]gang gis sangs rgyas ma lus byung gyur pa'i/_/byang chub spyod pa kun tu ston mdzad cing /_/ye shes mkhyen pa rnams kyi tshul gcig gis/_/sangs rgyas ma lus thams cad sdud mdzad cing /_/rgyal ba'i rgyan tshul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/_gang gis chos 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]kyi chos nyid yongs khyab pa/_/dpe zla [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rnam 'phrul ji snyed dang /_/rgyal ba rnams kyi sku tshul ji snyed dang /_/gang yang sku tshe bzung ste skyes gyur dang /_/gang yang btsun mo'i 'khor gyis bskor ba dang /_/gang yang mngon par 'byung ba 
[\[140a.2\]]bstan pa dang /_/mkhas pas dbang po shin tu phra mkhyen dang /_/mya ngan 'das nas ring bsrel kun bsdus te/_/bgos shing rgyal ba'i mchod rten byas pa'i bar/_/'jig rten dag na tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]ma lus pa'i/_/spyod pa mtha' yas de dag rab spyod cing /_/rgyal 
[\[140a.3\]]ba'i spyod pa yongs su gang brjod pa/_/de dag kun la spyod yangs 'jug gyur cig_/de ltar tshul rnams kun la yongs bsngo ste/_/dge ba de dag yongs su bsngo bas na/_/byang chub spyod pa de dag rab tu shes/_/spyod pas skyo bar nam yang mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[140a.4\]]de dag rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed pa/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi brjod pa gang yang rung /_/'gro ba 'di na 'jig rten mkhyen pa yi/_/gang yod thams cad ma lus rtogs par shes/_/de ltar skyes dbang thams cad ma lus par/_/rang 'byung yul rnams rjes su thob gyur te/_
[\[140a.5\]]de dag skad cig gcig gis rtogs gyur kyang /_/byang chub spyod las rnam par phyir mi ldog_/gang yang rgyal ba'i spyod yul phra mo rnams/_/zhing dang chos kyi rgyud rnams thams cad kun/_/de dag spyod pa mchog gis shes gyur te/_/yongs su bsngo ba'i pha rol 
[\[140a.6\]]phyin pa thob/_/bskal pa shin tu phra la 'jug pa gang /_/skad cig gcig la grangs dang grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]tshul/_/de dag byang chub shes pas rtogs gyur kyang /_/spyod pa'i dam pa de las phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog_/gang yang 'gro ba rnams kyi zhing chen dang /_/kun nas nyon 
[\[140a.7\]]mongs de bzhin rnam dag rnams/_/kun kyang ye shes spyod pas shes byas shing /_/de la yid gzhungs sems can dam pa 'khod/_/dus kyi tshul rnams rjes su sems byed cing /_/skad cig sems kyis bsam yas bskal pa dang /_/de bzhin dus gsum 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]ma lus thams cad kyang /_/spyod pa'i mchog la gnas shing rab tu shes/_/sems la yang dag gzhol zhing 'jug pa dang /_/chos la yang dag 'jug pa'i tshul rnams dang /_/zhing la yang dag 'jug pa mkha' 'di la/_/kun kyang spyod pa dam pas rab tu 
[\[140b.2\]]shes/_/ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa gang yod dang /_/sems can bsgrub dang de bzhin chos bsgrub dang /_/rnam par 'phrul thob byang chub bsgrub pa rnams/_/mtha' dbus gzhi [{]myed [,]med [}]thams cad ma lus pa/_/'jug pa shin tu phra ba mtha' dag bsdu byas 
[\[140b.3\]]shing /_/rnam par phye ba ji snyed yod pa rnams/_/bskal pa mi mthun tha dad mtshan ldan pa/_/de dag thams cad spyod pa yangs pas shes/_/phyogs kyi rgyud na zhing rnams gcig [{]myin [,]min [}]pa/_/'gro ba rnams na sna tshogs gang yod dang /_/sems can 
[\[140b.4\]]'gro rgyud sna tshogs tha dad pa/_/spyod pa'i stobs la gnas shing shes par byed/_/gang gis yongs su bsngo ba 'di shes pa/_/de ni ji snyed 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_/gang rnams ma byon gang dag bzhugs pa rnams/_/de dag spyod dang mnyam pa nyid 
[\[140b.5\]]thob bo/_/rgyal ba kun gyi bsod nams thob par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba kun gyi ye shes thob par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba kun gyi spyod pa'i rjes bslabs shing /_/yongs su bsngo ba 'di dag thob par 'gyur/_/'gro ba kun gyis thub par dkar gyur cing /_/'jug pa kun 
[\[140b.6\]]tu bslab bya bslabs pa dag_/rgyal ba kun gyi rjes su sems pa rnams/_/thams cad 'jig rten sgron ma mthong bar 'gyur/_/de yi spyod la tshad gdab mi nus te/_/yon tan rnams la 'ang tshad kyis gzhal mi nus/_/dpe [{]myed [,]med [}]de dag spyod la gnas 
[\[140b.7\]]bcas shing /_/rgyal ba kun gyi rnam 'phrul rab tu shes/_/chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang grol zhing bcings pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems shes bya ba ste/_/yongs su bsngo ba dgu pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]su bsngo ba chos kyi dbyings tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba bcu pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos smra ba chen por gyur pas dri ma med pa'i go 'phang thob pa/_chos kyi mdzod 
[\[141a.2\]]kyi sbyin pa rab tu byin zhing /_snying rje chen po dang ldan pas byams pa chen po thob cing /_byang chub kyi sems la sems can rab tu dgod par brtson pa/_sems can gyi don la zhugs pas byang chub kyi sems rgyun mi chad par dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 
[\[141a.3\]]sems can thams cad kyi kha lo sgyur bas 'gro ba thams cad la thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam yang dag par ston pa/_'gro ba thams cad la chos kyi nyi ma dam par gyur pas dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pas 'jig rten thams cad snang bar byed pa/_
[\[141a.4\]]'gro ba thams cad la sems rab tu mnyam pas sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa rgyun mi gcod pa/_ye shes la dbang sgyur zhing sems rnam par dag pas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i las thams cad nyams pa med par sgrub 
[\[141a.5\]]pa/_ye shes chen pos 'gro ba thams cad kyi ded dpon tu gyur pas/_sems can thams cad la bde ba'i lam yang dag par ston pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos bskyed pa thams cad la sems can thams cad kyi sngun 'dren pa/_sems can thams cad kyi dge 
[\[141a.6\]]ba'i rtsa ba dbyer mi phyed par gyur pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba spel ba la zhugs pa/_/dam pa'i chos sbyin pa sngon du gtong bas chos dkar po thams cad yang dag par rtsom pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pas yongs su bzung ba'i lhag pa'i 
[\[141a.7\]]bsam pas stobs dang shugs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu brtan pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa yang dag par bsgrub pas nye bar ston pa'i spyod pa mthu chen po'i sems dang ldan pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]mos shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa/_sgyu med par byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yang dag par bsgrubs pas/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la sems pa/_dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[141b.2\]]ba la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]shing yongs su bsngo ba rgya chen pos bsgribs pa med pa'i yul thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba la zhugs shing rab tu bsgrub pa de chung ngu na sangs rgyas kyi gsung las tshig dang /_yi ge gcig thos sam/_ston tam yang dag par 'dzin kyang rung ste/_sangs rgyas 
[\[141b.3\]]thams cad mngon du gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag dran pas [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang yid la byed/_ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang yid la 
[\[141b.4\]]byed/_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang yid la byed/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang yid la byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su 
[\[141b.5\]]bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis yang dag par dgongs te/_'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par gyur cig_/'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis 
[\[141b.6\]]klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa ma lus pa thams cad du yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par gyur cig_/phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par sems can gcig gi don du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yang dag par spyod par gyur cig_/
[\[141b.7\]]sems can gcig gi don du ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can [(]kyi [,]gyi [)]khams mtha' dag ma lus pa lhag ma ma lus pa thams cad kyi don du sems can gcig gi phyir yong phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par go ca bgos te/_sems can gcig gi phyir ji lta ba de bzhin du sems 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]can thams cad kyi phyir yang go ca bgos te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yang dag par spyod par gyur cig_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nam yang sangs rgyas dang 'bral ba'i 'du shes dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'bral ba'i 
[\[142a.2\]]'du shes skye bar ma gyur cig_/'di ltar yang sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du gyur te/_sangs rgyas skye ba gcig dang yang mi 'bral zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par bstan pa dang brjod pa dang bsngags 
[\[142a.3\]]pa de la spyod par gyur cig_/de dag yongs su rdzogs par byed par gyur cig_/tshangs pa'i spyod pa ma god par spyod par gyur cig_/tshangs pa'i spyod pa mnyams par yongs su rdzogs par byed par gyur cig_/tshangs pa'i spyod pa ma 'dres par 
[\[142a.4\]]yongs su spyod par gyur cig_/tshangs pa'i spyod pa rnyog pa med pa la gnas par gyur cig_/ltung ba med pa'i tshangs pa'i spyod pa la gnas par gyur cig_/zil gyis mi non pa'i tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongs su spyod par gyur cig_/sangs 
[\[142a.5\]]rgyas kyis bsngags pa'i tshangs pa'i spyod pa la nan tan du spyod par gyur cig_/mi gnas pa'i tshangs pa'i spyod pa rab tu sgrub par gyur cig_/mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]shing byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa'i tshangs pa'i spyod pa rnam par spyod 
[\[142a.6\]]par gyur cig_/'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis spyad pa'i rjes su spyod pa'i tshangs pa'i spyod pa khong du chud par gyur cig_/ji ltar bdag tshangs pa'i spyod pa de la nan tan du byed pa de bzhin du tshangs 
[\[142a.7\]]par spyod pa chags pa med pa dang /_tshangs par spyod pa gnas med pa dang /_tshangs par spyod pa nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_tshangs par spyod pa nyams pa med pa dang /_tshangs par spyod pa bsgribs pa med pa dang /_tshangs par spyod pa brtan pa dang /_
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]tshangs par spyod pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /_tshangs par spyod pa mi sgul ba dang /_tshangs par spyod pa mi g.yo ba dang /_tshangs par spyod pa mi 'khrugs pa de la sems can thams cad kyang rab tu 'god do/_/sems can thams cad rab tu 
[\[142b.2\]]sbyor ro/_sems can thams cad shin tu sgrub bo/_/sems can thams cad rnam par sbyong ngo /_/sems can thams cad dri ma med par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad rnam par snang bar bya'o/_/sems can thams cad 
[\[142b.3\]]rdul med par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad rab rib med par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad yongs su gdung ba med par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad 'byung ba la gnas par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad 
[\[142b.4\]]'gyod pa thams cad dang bral zhing gnod sems dang rnam par bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par bya'o/_/de ci 'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyod pa rnam par ma dag pas gzhan gyi tshangs par spyod pa rnam par dag par bya bar mi nus so/_/
[\[142b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' tshangs par spyod pa las phyir log pas pha rol byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyod pa bsgrub par mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshangs par spyod pa rgyun chad pas gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyod pa la 
[\[142b.6\]]rnam par dag par bya bar mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshangs par spyod pa dang bral bas gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyod pa la nan tan du byed du gzhug par mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshangs par spyod pa las nyams pas gzhan byang chub 
[\[142b.7\]]sems dpa'i tshangs par spyod pa la sbyar bar mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshangs par spyod pa la mos pa med pas/_gzhan byang chub sems dpa' tshangs par spyod pa la mos par bya bar mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshangs par spyod pa la 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]rnam par mi gnas pas gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyod pa la gnas par gzhag par mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshangs par spyod pa la ma zhugs pas gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyod pa la gzhug par 
[\[143a.2\]]mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshangs par spyod pa las g.yos pas gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyod pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo ba la gzhag par mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshangs par spyod pa ma spyad pas gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyod pas 
[\[143a.3\]]yang dag par gzung bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni ji skad smra ba de ltar byed pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' ni ma nor ba la gnas shing ma nor bar smra ba yin/_byang chub sems dpa' ni bden par smra zhing de bzhin du byed pa la gnas 
[\[143a.4\]]pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' ni lus kyi las dang ngag gi las dang /_yid kyi las yongs su dag cing nyon mongs pa thams cad bstsal ba yin/_byang chub sems dpa' ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thor zhing bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul la zhugs pa yin/_
[\[143a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan zhing gzhan la lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pas chos ston pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' ni drang po'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba la 'jam pa'i sems dang ldan zhing gzhan drang po la bzhag pa yin/_
[\[143a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' ni 'gyod pa dang bral bar byas shing gzhan 'gyod pa las rnam par slong ba yin/_byang chub sems dpa' ni yid dang bar gyur cing gzhan sems dang bar dbyer med pa yang dag par sgrub pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' ni chos yang dag par 
[\[143a.7\]]brjod par gyur cing gzhan chos la nye bar stobs pa yin te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sbyin pa la brtson pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos thams cad kyi sgo mi zad pa rab tu thob par gyur cig_/chos thams cad shin tu bstan pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa/_gzhan gyis brgal ba thams cad las rnam par 'das pa/_
[\[143b.2\]]dor ba dang gzhag pa rab tu 'gag pa thob par gyur cig_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos rgya mtsho shin tu ston par gyur cig_/chos kyi skye gnas re re dang chos kyi tshul re re dang chos rnam par brjod pa re re dang /_
[\[143b.3\]]chos su gdags pa re re dang /_chos su smos pa re re dang /_chos su brjod pa re re dang /_chos kyi sgo re re dang /_chos la 'jug pa re re dang /_chos bskyed pa re re dang /_chos rnam par dgong pa re re las chos mi zad pa/_mtha' dang dbus med 
[\[143b.4\]]pa'i mi 'jigs pa la rab tu brtson pa thob ste/_tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa la zhugs pas ston cing 'gro ba thams cad kyis phyi ma'i mthar thug pa mi bde ba dang ldan pa dang /_sems can thams cad la lhag pa'i bsam pas bstan par yang dag par 
[\[143b.5\]]bsgrub pa'i tshig chags pa med pas byung ba dang /_'khrul pa med pa'i spobs pas 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar byed pa'i chos shin tu ston pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad du rjes su bsgrags pa'i chos kyi tshig gi tshul dang ldan pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi snang ba mtha' 
[\[143b.6\]]yas pa'i rgyun mi 'chad pa'i dga' ba'i shugs yang dag par bskyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad dga' ba dang /_mos pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu bzhag par rmongs pa med pa dang /_chos snang ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[143b.7\]]tshig thams cad yang dag par gzung ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rab tu brtson pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings su lus tshad med pas byin gyis rlob pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings sems yangs pa tshad med pas rgyas par 'gengs pa 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]dang /_chos kyi dbyings su dbyangs thams cad rnam par dag pa tshad med pas grags par byed pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings su tshad med pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par ston pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las tshad med pa la 
[\[144a.2\]]brtson pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa tshad med pa rab tu thob pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par 'jug pa tshad med par rab tu rtogs pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings su chos tshad med par mngon par bsgrub pa la bslabs pa dang /_
[\[144a.3\]]chos kyi dbyings su byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa tshad med pa yang dag par spyod pa la gnas pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khongs su chud pas sems can thams cad kyi gtso bos yang dag par bstan pa rab tu thob par gyur 
[\[144a.4\]]cig ces/_de ltar sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rab tu dgod pa shin tu bsgrub pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge 
[\[144a.5\]]ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i sems can gdul ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis brlab pa dang /_chos kyi 
[\[144a.6\]]dbyings tshad med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i mi 'jigs pa rab tu thob par bya ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa rab tu thob par bya ba dang /_chos kyi 
[\[144a.7\]]dbyings tshad med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs rab tu thob par bya ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu thob par bya ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i bsod nams bstsags pa 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]yongs su grub par bya ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i sems can gyi don gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba thob par gyur cig_/dge ba'i rtsa ba des chos 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/ji ltar bdag gis thob par gyur pa de bzhin du sems can thams 
[\[144b.2\]]cad kyis kyang thob par gyur cig_/thob pa 'di dang /_mnyam pa nyid 'di dang /_yongs su rdzogs pa 'dis sems can thams cad bdag dang spyod pa mnyam par gyur cig_/bsod nams mnyam pa dang ye shes mnyam pa dang /_stobs mnyam pa dang /_
[\[144b.3\]]mi 'jigs pa mnyam pa dang /_rnam par dag pa mnyam pa dang /_rnam par 'phrul ba mnyam pa dang /_mngon par byang chub pa mnyam pa dang /_chos bstan pa mnyam pa dang /_don mnyam pa dang rnam par nges pa mnyam pa dang /_mngon 
[\[144b.4\]]par shes pa thams cad mnyam pas mnyam par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[144b.5\]]ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_ji ltar chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag tshad med pa'i ye shes yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/ji ltar chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa de bzhin 
[\[144b.6\]]du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sangs rgyas mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/ji ltar chos kyi dbyings la mus gcad pa med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[144b.7\]]zhing mus gcad pa med pa thams cad du 'gro bar yongs su bsngo'o/_/ji ltar chos kyi dbyings sa mtshams med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'jig rten gyi khams sa mtshams med pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]yongs su bsngo'o/_/ji ltar chos kyi dbyings la ris su chad pa med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ris su chad pa med par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/ji ltar chos 
[\[145a.2\]]kyi dbyings rgyud kyi tshul gcig par gyur pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/ji ltar chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin yongs su dag pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba 
[\[145a.3\]]thams cad shin tu rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/ji ltar chos kyi dbyings 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su song ba de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yang dag par bsdu ba'i 
[\[145a.4\]]phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/ji ltar chos kyi dbyings 'gro ba thams cad kyi rgyan tu gyur pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i rgyan rnam par dag par yongs su bsngo'o/_/ji ltar chos kyi dbyings la 'jig pa med 
[\[145a.5\]]pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_/gang gis thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[145a.6\]]nyid du 'gyur ba der dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni thams cad du 'gro bas na thams cad du 'gro ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/ci nas kyang 'gro ba thams cad du shin tu snang bar gyur pa de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 
[\[145a.7\]]yongs su bsngo'o/_/ci nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yongs su thob pa de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/ci nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ba de ltar 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/ci nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba sems can thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba las phyir mi ldog pa de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/ci nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba yongs su shes shing 
[\[145b.2\]]rab tu 'phel bar byed pa de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/ci nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba gnas su mi 'gyur ba de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/ci nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba chags pa med par khong du chud par 'gyur ba de ltar dge 
[\[145b.3\]]ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/ci nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong zhing kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ba de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/ci nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong zhing mngon sum du blta ba rgyun mi 'chad pa de ltar 
[\[145b.4\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/ci nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong bas byang chub sems dpa'i stobs dang shugs skye bar 'gyur ba de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/ci nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong zhing dngos po nyams par 'gyur ba 
[\[145b.5\]]thams cad las 'phags par 'gyur ba de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/'di ltar yang chos kyi dbyings byed pa med pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings gnas med pa dang /_chos 
[\[145b.6\]]kyi dbyings nyams pa med pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings dben pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings zhi ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings gnas pa dang chos kyi dbyings mi 'pho ba dang chos kyi dbyings tha dad pa med pa de bzhin du 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[145b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba chos bstan cing brjod pas yang dag par bzung ba dang /_chos bstan par bskul ba dang /_de la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa la brtson par byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang de dag la sogs 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]pa dge ba brtsams pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs shing byang chub sems dpar gyur te/_chos smra bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i 
[\[146a.2\]]ye shes la sems can thams cad dgod pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun gyis chos yongs su dris pas zad par mi 'gyur bas mi 'phrogs pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig_/sems can thams 
[\[146a.3\]]cad chos kyi snang ba bsgribs pa med pa thob pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi tshig dang yi ge brjod pa la mkhas shing ye shes kyi snying po'i chos smra bar gyur cig_/sems 
[\[146a.4\]]can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ston pa la mkhas shing sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad gzhan gyis dring mi 'jog cing yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pas 
[\[146a.5\]]mig dang 'dra ba'i chos smra bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad rig pas bzung ba'i tshig dang yi ge chud ma zos par shin tu ston pas sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad dran pas yang dag par 'dzin pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig_/sems can 
[\[146a.6\]]thams cad mtshan gyis shin tu brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan zhing 'od mtha' yas par 'phro ba'i chos yang dag par dpyad pa la mkhas pas nye bar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i lam du zhugs pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos rgyun mi 
[\[146a.7\]]'chad pa la gnas shing /_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi char bsam pa thag pas dbab pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos kyi sprin rab tu ston cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa'i chos smra bar 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]gyur cig_/sems can thams cad gzhan gyis pham par mi nus pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa'i chos smra ba'i mdzod bdog pas chos rgya mtsho thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos chud mi gson pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig_/sems can 
[\[146b.2\]]thams cad sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa la brtson zhing chos thams cad yang dag par brjod pa la mkhas pas chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nyi ma'i chos smra bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa shin tu bstan 
[\[146b.3\]]pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas dang mdzod rab tu thob cing chos kyi 'byung gnas dang /_rigs kyi tshul dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos kyi mdzod rnam par phye ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan zhing chos kyi spyod pa'i 
[\[146b.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas shin tu bstan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing dbye ba med pa dang /_gnas pa med pa'i chos la gnas pa rab tu thob pa'i chos smra bar 
[\[146b.5\]]gyur cig_/sems can thams cad yon tan dang bsngags pa mu med cing zad mi shes pa dang ldan te/_chos thams cad khong du chud pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bden pa'i mtha'i tshul gyi rjes su zhugs pas 'gro ba 
[\[146b.6\]]thams cad la mi bslu ba'i chos smra bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bdud kyi las thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing bdud thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i chos smra bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bdag gi 
[\[146b.7\]]med pa dang yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i chos smra bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi stobs kyi smon lam rab tu 'thob cing 'gro ba/_
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]thams cad bde bar byed pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig_/de yang 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_nyams pa med pa'i las kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/nyams pa med pa'i rnam par smin pas yongs su bsngo'o/_/nyams 
[\[147a.2\]]pa med pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/nyams pa med pa'i chos la yongs su bsngo'o/_/nyams pa med pa'i dngos po la yongs su bsngo'o/_/nyams pa med pa'i rgyu rnams kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/nyams pa med pa'i chos kyi lam 
[\[147a.3\]]gyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/nyams pa med pa'i ming mang po dang /_tshig mang po dang yi ge mang po'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/nyams pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/nyams pa med pa'i sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir 
[\[147a.4\]]yongs su bsngo ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo yang /_gzugs kyi tshul la chags shing yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/'dod pa la gnas pa'i sgra'i don du yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/dri'i phyir yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/ro'i 
[\[147a.5\]]phyir yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/reg bya'i phyir yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/'dod pa la gnas pa'i chos rnams kyi phyir yang yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/mtho ris su skye ba'i phyir yang yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]bsngo'o/_/'dod pa la spyod pa'i phyir yang yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]bsngo'o/_/'dod pa'i 
[\[147a.6\]]yul la chags pas kyang yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/g.yog 'khor gyi phyir yang yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/dbang phyug don du gnyer bas yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/'khor ba'i dga' ba'i don du yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/'chi 'pho dang skye ba la gnas shing yongs su mi 
[\[147a.7\]]bsngo'o/_/dngos po la mngon par mos shing yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/'dod pa dang ldan par bya ba'i bsam pas yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/kun gzhi la mos pas yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/bsten pa'i sems kyis yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]gzhig pa'i don du yang yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]bsngo'o/_khams gsum pa la gnas pas kyang yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i ro la chags pas kyang yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/nyan thos 
[\[147b.2\]]dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas shing yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'i don du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/chags pa med pa'i ye 
[\[147b.3\]]shes la 'jug pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/bsgribs pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba nas rab tu 'don pa'i ye shes chen po khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/byang 
[\[147b.4\]]chub tu sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu dang /_bsam pa brten pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/yun du 'chi ba med pa'i chos bsgrub pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyis brgyan pa'i rgyan du ma dang thams cad 
[\[147b.5\]]mkhyen pa'i spyod pas rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos snang ba thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa grub par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings 
[\[147b.6\]]kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i zhing thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i gzhi yongs su rdzogs pa thob cing phyir mi ldog pa dang /_rdo rje lta bu'i go cha don yod pas sems can thams cad kun tu bzang po'i sa 
[\[147b.7\]]la rab tu dgod pa la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par sems can thams cad rab tu dgrol bar bya ba rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyis bsgribs pa med pa thams cad 'jig rten du yang dag par 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]bstan pa'i spyod pa rgyun mi chad pa la rab tu gnas par bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/de de ltar yongs su bsngo ba yang rang bzhin dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos nyid dang mnyam 
[\[148a.2\]]pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/'gro ba tshad med pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/nyon mongs pa med pa dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/byed pa med pa'i rang bzhin dang mnyam pa'i sems 
[\[148a.3\]]kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos 'khrug pa med pa yongs su shes pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du zhugs pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[148a.4\]]pa'i rigs su byung ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/mngon par shes pa mnyams pa thob pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa la grub pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad sems can 
[\[148a.5\]]dmyal ba nas phyir bzlog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad byol song gi skye gnas su mi dgod pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas ba dgag pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems 
[\[148a.6\]]can thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i chos thams cad spang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dge ba'i rtsa bas shin tu tshim par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi 'khor lo dus la bab par bskor bas dga' bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/
[\[148a.7\]]stobs bcu'i 'khor lo la sems can thams cad gzung ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang smon lam mtha' dang dbus med pa 'thob par bya ba dang rnam par dag pa'i chos can du bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/byang chub kyi 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]sems cang shes bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen grangs med pa thams cad dga' bar bya ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la gnas par bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[148b.2\]]chos thams cad yang dag par gzung zhing ye shes kyi snang ba shin tu 'phags par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bsgribs pa med par mngon sum du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas thams 
[\[148b.3\]]cad mngon du lta bar mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos snang ba thams cad la mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o/_/dogs pa med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyis 'jigs pa med pa la mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o/_/
[\[148b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i gnas bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i ye shes la mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad snying rje chen po rnam par dag pas yongs su bskyab pa la mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[148b.5\]]zhing mtha' dag ma lus pa lhag ma med par thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba dang /_brjod du med pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis thams cad brgyan par mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o/_/bdud kyi las dang /_bdud kyi zhags pa dang /_
[\[148b.6\]]bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rnam par gtor ba dang /_rab tu gzhom par mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gnas med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas par mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o/_
[\[148b.7\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rgya chen pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyud la 'jug par mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o/_/dran pa rnam par sbyangs pas yongs su bsngo'o/_/blo gros rnam par nges pas 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rig pas shin tu 'dzin pa'i mngon par shes pas yongs su bsngo'o/_/blo mtha' dang dbus med cing chags pa med pas yongs su bsngo'o/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par 
[\[149a.2\]]dag pas yongs su bsngo'o/_/'gro ba thams cad la byams pa chen po spyod pas yongs su bsngo'o/_/snying rje chen po la rab tu brtson pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/btang snyoms kyis 
[\[149a.3\]]gnyis la chags pa dang bral ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la dbang sgyur ba la gnas pas yongs su bsngo'o/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos bsngags pa'i lam rab tu dbye bas chos rnam par dbye ba la zhugs pa dang /_chos nyid nges par gzhog pa'i 
[\[149a.4\]]yid dang sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa'i mdzod kyi sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 
[\[149a.5\]]gtor ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/rnam par dag pa dang chags pa med pa thams cad rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad spyad pa las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i sems kyis 
[\[149a.6\]]yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos dam pa dang rab dang phul la mngon par mos pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/yon tan gyi chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i ye shes kyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa la mos shing dad pa'i sems kyis 
[\[149a.7\]]yongs su bsngo'o/_/bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rab tu gzhig pa dang /_chags pa med cing dri ma med pa'i chos kyi go 'phang thob pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi [{]mangs [,]mang [}]'gro ba thams cad la chos kyi 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi nyi ma rab dang phul khyad par du 'phags pa 'od gzer brgya stong gis brgyan pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes chen po'i snang ba 'gro ba thams cad 
[\[149b.2\]]du rab tu dgye ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya zhing gdul ba dang /_bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems kyi rgyud shin tu tshim par bya ba dang /_sngon gyi smon lam chen po nub pa med pas phyi ma'i mtha'i mur 
[\[149b.3\]]spyod pa chen po'i rgyud rgyun mi chad cing rnam par dag pa dang snang ba dri ma med pas rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa dang /_nga rgyal shin tu gcad pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnam par gtor ba dang /_srid pa'i dra ba yang dag par gtub pa dang /_
[\[149b.4\]]ma rig pa'i mun pa thibs po bstsal ba dang /_bsgribs pa med cing dri ma dang bral la chags pa med pa'i chos kyi/_lo shin tu legs pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad du bskal pa'i grangs rnam par chad pa med pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par 'tshang rgya ba 
[\[149b.5\]]dang spyod pa rgyud las phyir mi ldog pas sems can gyi tshogs so sor chags pa med pa'i ye shes rab dam pa mchog rnam par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang /_sems can re re la sangs rgyas kyi sku shin tu bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[149b.6\]]yongs su bsngo'o/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo yang 'dod pa'i yul dang khams gsum pa la gnas shing yongs su mi bsngo ste/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 
[\[149b.7\]]'dod ma chags pas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams zhe mi sdang bas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gti mug med pas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gnod pa med pas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams nga rgyal med pas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams g.yo med pas 
[\[150a.2\]]yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams drang pos yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rig pas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 
[\[150a.3\]]mngon par brtson pas yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/_de de ltar yongs su bsngo bas sems rab tu dad pa 'thob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la go skabs dbye ba 'thob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[150a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi nyes pa thams cad rab tu spong ngo /_/bdud kyi las thams cad rab tu spong ngo /_/dge ba'i gshes gnyen thams cad rab tu 
[\[150a.5\]]dga' bar byed do/_/bdag gi smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/sems can thams cad gnyer ba chen pos shin tu 'bod pa yin no/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sbyin pas 'byung ba la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i 
[\[150a.6\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad kyis dbyangs snyan pa dang /_ye shes kyi rnga'i dbyangs dang /_thams cad du 
[\[150a.7\]]bsam gyis mi khyab cing 'phags pa'i dbyangs dang /_yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs dang /_dag pa'i dbyangs dang /_zhing thams cad du sgras rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dbyangs dang /_yon tan bye ba brgya stong brjod du med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i dbyangs dang /_sgra mtho ba dang /_sgra che bas rnam par 'khrug pa 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i dbyangs dang /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad sgras rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dbyangs dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyis ngag mnyan pa'i dbyangs rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad kyi sgra dang dbyangs mtha' yas pa'i ye shes rab tu thob par 
[\[150b.2\]]gyur cig_/sgra dang dbyangs thams cad rnam par dag pa rab tu thob par gyur cig_/dbyangs tshad med pa dang tshig gi lam thams cad shes pa rab tu thob par gyur cig_/dbyangs la dbang sgyur ba zil gyis ma non pa'i dbyangs thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes rab tu thob 
[\[150b.3\]]par gyur cig_/dbyangs thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa'i dbyangs rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyi mnyan na mi ngoms pa'i dbyangs rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad kyis 'gro ba kun mos 
[\[150b.4\]]par nyan pa'i dbyangs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad dad par byed pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par gyur cing /_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs su brjod pas smra ba'i sems rnam par dag pa rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas 
[\[150b.5\]]kyi chos thams cad rnam par sgrog pa'i sgra rab rib med pa'i dbyangs kyis smra bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi gzungs kyi rgyan gyis chos thams cad rnam pa du mar ston pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thob pa dang /_bsam 
[\[150b.6\]]gyis mi khyab pa'i chos rdo rje'i tshig gis yang dag par gzung ba dang /_chos nyid thams cad brjod pa rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang /_tshig dang yi ge brjod du med pa brjod du med pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa dang /_chos rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad shin tu bstan pa la gzhag pa dang /_gnas par bya ba dang rgyun mi chad 
[\[150b.7\]]par bya ba dang chos snang ba thams cad kyi 'od rab tu 'thob pa la 'jug pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam par dag pa'i mthar thug par byed pa dang /_chos thams cad kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i don dang tshig dang yi ges rnam par 'phrul pa'i dbyangs kyi byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa dang /_chags pa med pa'i 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]dbyangs la dbang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi shes pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par gyur cig_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad mi dma' ba'i dbyangs dang /_bag tsha ba med pa'i dbyangs dang /_
[\[151a.2\]]'dod chags med pa'i tshig gi dbyangs dang /_ngag snyan pa'i dbyangs dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mngon par dga' bar byed pa'i dbyangs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad brjod pa'i dbyangs dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi the tsom 
[\[151a.3\]]gcod cing khong du chud par byed pa'i dbyangs dang /_spobs pas legs par sbyar ba'i dbyangs dang /_sems can gnyis kyis log pa thams cad sad par byed pa'i dbyangs dam pa yangs pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[151a.4\]]dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_/sems can thams cad kyi lus rnam par dag cing kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bsod 
[\[151a.5\]]nams rnam par dag cing kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi mtshan rnam par dag cing kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi las dang rnam par smin pa rnam par dag cing kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[151a.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag cing kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems tshad med pa rnam par dag cing kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dbang bo'i tshul rab tu shes pa rnam par dag cing kha na ma tho ba med pa 
[\[151a.7\]]dang /_sems can thams cad kyi mos pa rnam par dag cing kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa chags pa med pa la brtson pa'i smon lam rnam par dag cing kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]rig pa dang /_blo dang ye shes dam pa dang /_spobs pa rnam par dag cing kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ste/_sems can thams cad kyi lus rnam pa de ltar yongs su dag cing lus 
[\[151b.2\]]yongs su dag pa shin tu gsal ba rnyog pa med pa rnam par dang ba/_rnam par dag pa rdul med pa dri ma dang bral ba 'od gsal zhing dang ba/_yid du 'ong ba bsgribs pa med pa de la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du snang bar gyur cig_/mig yor gyi rnam 
[\[151b.3\]]par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas 'gro ba thams cad snang bar gyur cig_/mig yor gyi gnas kyi rnam pa thams cad snang bar gyur cig_/'di lta ste dper na/_me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu dag pa la tshigs su mi 'gyur bar gdong du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa rnam par snang ba de lta bu'i lus 
[\[151b.4\]]yongs su dag pa/_sems can thams cad kyis rab tu thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston pa dang /_chos yang dag par ston pa dang /_yon tan yang dag par ston pa dang /_nan tan yang dag 
[\[151b.5\]]par ston pa dang /_'grub pa yang dag par ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul dang /_smon lam yang dag par ston pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par ston pa dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[151b.6\]]thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_cho 'phrul yang dag par ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam yongs 
[\[151b.7\]]su rdzogs pas thams cad mkhyen pa yang dag par ston par gyur cig_/de ltar yongs su dag pa'i lus kyi rnam pas sems can thams cad ma lus par yongs su bzung ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams kyi sku yongs su dag pa dang ldan par 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]gyur cig_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sbyin pas 'byung ba la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rjes su 
[\[152a.2\]]song ba'i lus kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par gyur cig_/'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na don yod cing /_byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_sems can thams cad la mthun par gyur pas bsam pa mi 'khrugs pa dang /_bskal 
[\[152a.3\]]pa thams cad du skyo ba med par byang bas/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par gnas pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings tshad med par snying rje chen po rgyun mi gcod pas/_sems can thams cad 
[\[152a.4\]]la dus la bab par chos ston pa mi gtong bas dbang po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dran pa'i khongs su gtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pas sems bskyed pa gcig dang yang mi 'bral ba dang /_
[\[152a.5\]]sangs rgyas thams cad 'dod cing zhal lta ba'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed pa mi gtong ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsams pa thams cad rjes med par mi byed cing sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems la rab tu 
[\[152a.6\]]dgod pa'i sems kyis phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba thams cad kyis chos thams cad la blta zhing byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par len pas/_chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'dzin pa'i byin gyi rlabs 
[\[152a.7\]]kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad la 'jug pa dang /_zhing thams cad la 'jug pa dang /_chos thams cad la 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten dang dus thams cad la 'jug pa dang /_
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]sems can thams cad kyi las dang /_rnam par smin pa shes pa la 'jug pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mngon par 
[\[152b.2\]]bsgrubs pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul gyi ye shes la 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_khyu mchog gi mthu la 'jug pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings 
[\[152b.3\]]mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad la 'jug pa rab tu thob pa la gnas shing /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[152b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i las dang chos la brtson pa dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig kyang rgyan dang lhab lhub brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang ldan 
[\[152b.5\]]zhing chos kyi dbyings tshad med par shin tu yangs par gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig ji lta ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa thams cad ma lus par de ltar rnam par dag cing 'od gsal ba dang /_
[\[152b.6\]]bzang zhing sgrib pa med par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa rnam par dag pa rnams ji ltar gzugs brnyan gyi tshul gyis yongs su snang ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad du yang yongs su snang bar gyur cig_/sangs 
[\[152b.7\]]rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang gcig bzung bas yongs su bzung ste/_chos kyi dbyings tshad med par rtogs pa'i rnam par dag pas rnam par dag par gyur cig/_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]mdo/_/bam po bcu gnyis pa/_'di lta ste/_rin po che'i rgyan grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/gos rin po che thams cad bting zhing rin po che sna tshogs 
[\[153a.2\]]grangs med pa thams cad kyis rin po che rnam par dag pa'i gdan kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu'i dra ba dang ldan zhing rin po che'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che thams 
[\[153a.3\]]cad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas yongs su bzung zhing rin po che'i gdugs grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/nor gyi dbyig thams cad kyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i rin po che'i sprin grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/blta na yid du 'ong la rnam par 
[\[153a.4\]]dag pa'i rin po che'i me tog grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che sna tshogs kyis skar khung shin tu brgyan cing rin po che thams cad kyi stegs bu grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs yid du 'ong ba 
[\[153a.5\]]sems can thams cad kyi khams su sgrog cing rin po che'i dril bu grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi yon tan gyis sems rgyas shing gsal bas rin po che'i pad mo grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che 
[\[153a.6\]]thams cad kyi me tog dang ldan pa'i rin po che'i shing grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i gnas rin po che'i gtsug lag khang grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing thams cad 
[\[153a.7\]]du yid du 'ong bar rgyu ba'i rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che'i rgyan chen pos spras pa'i rin po che'i bag ma grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che thams cad rnam par dag pas 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]rnam par dag pa'i rin po che'i rta babs grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che thams cad kyi se mo do las rab tu bkye ba'i rin po che'i 'od zer gyi sgo grangs med pa rnams kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i shing ta la rin po 
[\[153b.2\]]che'i zla gam grangs med pas brgyan pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po ches rnam par dag pa'i rin po che'i skar khung rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las kyi dge ba'i 
[\[153b.3\]]rtsa ba rab tu grub pas rin po che'i rgyan dang lhab lhub grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan dang ldan pa'i rin po che'i snying po rab tu brgyan pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/yid du 'ong ba'i rin po ches shin 
[\[153b.4\]]tu rnam par dag pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang lhab lhub sna tshogs grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/chos thams cad kyi rgyud shin tu rigs par 'bab pa'i rin po che'i chu klung grangs med pa rnams kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/chos rgya mtsho thams cad dang 
[\[153b.5\]]ldan pa'i rin po che'i rgya mtsho grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/chos thams cad kyi me tog bun da ri ka rjes su sgrogs pa'i rin po che'i me tog pun da ri ka grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/ye shes kyi ri bo shin tu 'phags shing rnam 
[\[153b.6\]]par dag pa'i rin po che'i ri bo grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che thams cad kyi srad bu bres pa'i rin po ches mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su rnam par phye ba grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/ye shes chen po'i 'od gzer gyis chos 
[\[153b.7\](]gyi [,]kyi [)]dbyings thams cad du snang bar byed pa'i rin po che'i 'od thogs pa med par gsol ba grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan par sgrogs pa'i rin po che'i dril bu rab tu dkrol ba grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]byang chub kyi sems rin po che dang ldan pas rin po che rnam par dag pas rnam par sbyangs pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che'i kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab cing rnam par dag pa'i snam bu rin po che rab tu sbyangs pa 
[\[154a.2\]]grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che'i zla gam gyi rgyal mtshan gyis rnam par mdzes pa'i rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che thams cad kyi ba dan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab 
[\[154a.3\]]pa'i rin po che'i ba dan grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/bar snang gi rgyan sna tshogs kyi snam bu rin po che'i lda ldi mngon par bres pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che sna tshogs reg na bde ba'i rin po che'i 
[\[154a.4\]]gding ba yongs su bting ba grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par ston cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan rnam par sbyong ba'i rin po che'i glong grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/
[\[154a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs brgya stong thams cad kyis mdzes par gyur pa'i rin po che'i se mo do rab tu spyangs pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/gnas pa dang mi gnas pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pas rin po che'i khang pa dang gnas grangs 
[\[154a.6\]]med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rdo rje rin po ches mdzes par gyur cing rin po che'i rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/grangs med par mthong ba thams cad rnam par dag cing rin po che sna tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan 
[\[154a.7\]]pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che khyad par du 'phags pa thams cad dang ldan zhing rin po che rnam par dag pas rnam par sbyangs pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/chags pa med pa'i lus kyi tshul rnam par dag pas rin po che'i 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]'khor yug gis kun nas bskor ba grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dri zhim po rjes su song zhing rin po che'i spos grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/sprul pa re re zhing chos kyi dbyings kyi 
[\[154b.2\]]tshad dang mnyam pas rin po che'i 'phrul pa shin tu sprul pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/snang ba re re las snang ba thams cad ston cing rin po che'i snang ba grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/chos kyi ye shes kyi 'od rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[154b.3\]]rin po che'i 'od grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/'od gzer re res kyang chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab par 'gyur ba'i rin po che'i 'od gzer nyams pa med pa grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang ldan 
[\[154b.4\]]pa'i rin po che'i 'byung ba grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/chos rin po che dbyig thams cad sbyin pa'i rin po che'i mdzod grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal mtshan shin tu 'phags pa'i rin po che'i 
[\[154b.5\]]dpal grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/ye shes bzang po chen po rnam par dag pa'i rin po che bzang po grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la dga' zhing rtse ba'i rin po che'i bza' shing 
[\[154b.6\]]gi ra ba shin tu brgyan pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'gro ba thams cad rnam par ston pa'i rin po che'i dbyangs grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che thams cad kyi 'bru las chos kyi 
[\[154b.7\]]'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i rin po che'i gzugs grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/mtshan thams cad mtshan ma yin pas brgyan pa'i rin po che 'dra ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che thams cad kyi rim gro byang chub sems 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]dpa'i dga' ba bskyed pa'i rin po che'i rim gro grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che thams cad kyis lhun legs par brtsigs pa'i rin po che las bsgrubs pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che 
[\[155a.2\]]thams cad kyis shin tu brtan par brgyan pa'i rin po che'i gnas grangs med pa rnams kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gzhal du med pa'i gos bde bar bgo ba rab tu thob pa'i rin po che'i gos dang ldan pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas 
[\[155a.3\]]par gyur cig_/sems bskyed ma thag tu shin tu mthong ba'i gzungs rab tu thob cing chos gos dang ldan pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/las rin po che thams cad rnam par smin pa nges par rtogs shing rnam par dag pa'i rin po ches bsgos pa 
[\[155a.4\]]grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/mthong ma thag tu chos thams cad kyi tshul shes pa'i mig rnam par dag cing nyams pa med par blta ba'i rin po che grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/ye shes kyi phung pos grub pa'i rin po che'i 'od kyi phung 
[\[155a.5\]]po grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i gzims kyi nga ros rnam par dag pa'i rin po che'i mal grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/ye shes kyi mar me yongs su grub pa'i rin po che'i mar me grangs med pa mang po 
[\[155a.6\]]kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/shing ta la gcig dang gnyis la rin po che'i srad bus mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su dres pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rin po che'i shing ta la grangs med pa mang po kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che'i yal gas shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rin 
[\[155a.7\]]po che'i sdong po grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che sna tshogs kyi yal ga dang ldan pa'i rin po che'i shing lo grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bya mang po chos kyi rgyun sgrogs pas brgyan pa'i rin po che'i 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]nags tshal grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/ye shes kyi snang ba kun tu gtong ba'i rin po che'i lo ma dang ldan pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa me tog gcig la gnas shing chos kyi 
[\[155b.2\]]dbyings thams cad du rgyu ba'i rin po che'i me tog dang ldan pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen po las phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu rab tu thob pa'i rin po che'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas 
[\[155b.3\]]par gyur cig_/grong gi chos thams cad yongs su spangs par gnas pa'i rin po che'i grong grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che thams cad kyis yog pa'i sems can gyis gang zhing rin po che'i 'byung gnas grangs med pa kun nas 
[\[155b.4\]]gnas par gyur cig_/mthu bo che dpa' bo chos kyi go cha brtan pa bgos pas byang chub sems dpa'i sems phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i gnas rin po che grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/sems kyi gnas thams cad 
[\[155b.5\]]la rnam par 'das pas rab tu gang ba'i rin po che'i gnas grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/yongs su shes pa'i gos thams cad rab tu bgo ba'i gos rin po che grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/khyim med par rab tu byung 
[\[155b.6\]]ba'i byang chub sems dpas yongs su gang zhing rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi gnas grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/blta na yid du 'ong ba rin po che dang ldan pa'i mthun pa'i rin po che grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/bsam 
[\[155b.7\]]gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi 'od 'phro ba rab tu gtong ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu sprul pa rab tu bskor ba'i rin po che'i 'khor lo grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che thams cad kyi shing rnam par dag pa [{]myig [,]mig [}]'phrul gyi rnam pa 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]shin tu dag pa'i rin po che'i shing grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/blta na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che shin tu rnam par bkram pa'i rin po ches sa rnam par dag pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/
[\[156a.2\]]yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sgrog pa'i rin po che'i rol mo brdung ba grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur byin gyi rlabs rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rin po che'i rol mo dkrol ba grangs med 
[\[156a.3\]]pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/chos rin po che rnams yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems can rin po che grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/bsod nams rin po che dang ldan pa'i lus rin po che rnam par dag pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par 
[\[156a.4\]]gyur cig_/chos rin po che rab tu brjod pa'i rnam par dag pa'i ngag rin po che grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/thams cad mkhyen par smon pa'i bsam pa rin po che rab tu thob pa'i sems yongs su byang ba rin po che grangs med pa 
[\[156a.5\]]kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rin po che'i stobs rmongs pa med pa la rten pa'i dran pa rin po che yongs su dag pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos rin po che bzung ba 
[\[156a.6\]]dang yang dag par bcad pa'i byin gyi rlabs yod pa'i rig pa rin po che rnam par dag pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod nges par rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i blo 
[\[156a.7\]]gros rin po che yongs su dag pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/thams cad mkhyen pa rin po che shin tu yangs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i blo rin po che tshad med pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/stobs bcu rin 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]po che thams cad nyams pa med pa'i mig rin po che yongs su dag pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad du mnyan pa rnam par dag pa'i rna ba rin po che yongs su dag pa grangs med pa 
[\[156b.2\]]kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/mthun pa'i dri rin po che rnam par dag pa'i sna rin po che yongs su dag pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/mtha' dang dbus med pa'i tshig gi tshul thams cad rnam par ston pa'i lce yangs pa rin po che 
[\[156b.3\]]grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gro ba'i lus rin po che yongs su dag bgrangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam la brtson pa'i yid rin po 
[\[156b.4\]]che yongs su dag pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/dbyangs rin po che rnam par dag pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dbyangs rin po che yongs su dag pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/
[\[156b.5\]]ye shes rin po che sngon du 'gro ba'i lus kyi las rin po che grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/ye shes rin po che bsgribs pa med pa la brtson pas ngag gi las rin po che yang dag par yongs su dag pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/
[\[156b.6\]]chags pa med pa'i ye shes rin po che'i mthar thug pa'i yid kyi las rin po che yangs shing yongs su dag par grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig dang yul gcig dang 
[\[156b.7\]]phyogs gcig dang /_skra'i mchog ma'i rtse mo re re zhing yang de ltar skye mched kyi ye shes rnam par dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa nas byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa grangs dang bgrang ba las 'das pas kun tu gang bar gyur cig_/
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]phyogs gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad kyang yongs su gang bar gyur cig_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i 
[\[157a.2\]]rtsa ba de dag rin po che'i dmigs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig bzung bas bsdus te spos rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi spos kyi rgyan tshad med pa kun 
[\[157a.3\]]nas gnas par gyur cig_/gzhung de ltar rin po che ji lta ba de bzhin du spos yongs su bsngo ba yang khong du chud par byas te/_ye shes kyi spos chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i spos kyi yid kyi las rgya chen po yongs su dag pa tshad med pa'i bar du kun nas 
[\[157a.4\]]gnas par gyur cig_/de bzhin du me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi me tog gi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/ces bya ba nas ye shes kyi me tog chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i yid kyi las me tog rgya che zhing yongs su dag pa 
[\[157a.5\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/phreng ba dang byug pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi phreng ba dang byug pa'i rgyan mtshungs ba med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/ces bya ba nas ye shes kyi phreng ba dang byug pa chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i yid 
[\[157a.6\]]kyi las kyi phreng ba dang byug pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa mtshungs pa med pa'i bar du kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/phye ma dang bdug pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi phye ma dang bdug pa'i rgyan sa mtshams med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig ces bya ba nas ye shes kyi phye ma 
[\[157a.7\]]dang bdug pa chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i yid kyi las kyi phye ma dang bdug pa yongs su dag pas mtshams med pa'i bar du kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/gos dang chos gos sna tshogs thams cad kyi gos dang chos gos kyi rgyan mu med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/
[\[157b\]]
