[\[157b.1\]]ces bya ba nas ye shes kyi gos dang chos gos kyi rgyan chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i yid kyi las khrel yod pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa'i gos dang chos gos yongs su dag pa mu med pa'i bar du kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/zhing thams cad du gdugs sna tshogs yang 
[\[157b.2\]]dag par btsugs pa'i gdugs kyi rgyan sa 'tshams med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig ces bya ba nas ye shes kyi gdugs kyi rgyan chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mthar thug pa'i yid kyi las ye shes kyis yang dag pa khyab pa yongs su dag pas mtshams med pa'i bar du kun 
[\[157b.3\]]nas gnas par gyur cig_/rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyi rgyan tshad med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/ces bya ba nas ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan dang ba dan chags pa med pa'i mthar thug 
[\[157b.4\]]pa'i yid kyi las kyi ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi rgyan yongs su dag pa tshad med pa'i bar du gnas par gyur cig_/lhab lhub sna tshogs thams cad kyi lhab lhub kyi rgyan brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig ces bya ba nas/_ye shes kyi 
[\[157b.5\]]lhab lhub kyi rgyan gyi mthar thug pa'i yid kyi las kyi ye shes kyi lhab lhub kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnam par dag pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/de ltar tshul de bzhin du thams cad du yang shes par bya ste/_sangs 
[\[157b.6\]]rgyas kyi zhing de dag las sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig bzung bas bsdus te nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyan brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/ces bya ba nas nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi shing kun tu 
[\[157b.7\]]bres pa'i nor bu rin po che'i gdan rnam par dag pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/de ltar tshul de bzhin du kun tu byas te/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa re re zhing lan brgyar bzlas par bya'o/_/ye shes kyi nor bu rin po che 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i yid kyi las kyi ye shes kyi nor bu rin po che rnam par dag pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du gnas par gyur cig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[158a.2\]]chos sbyin pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis bsgrubs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad yongs su dag pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad 
[\[158a.3\]]mnyam pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'khrugs pa yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa dang /_sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir bsod nams kyi stobs thub pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnam par dag 
[\[158a.4\]]pa dang /_sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir bsod nams kyi mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa zil gyis [(]mnon [,]gnon [)]pa bstan pa dang /_sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir mi zad pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis sems can thams cad sangs 
[\[158a.5\]]rgyas kyi chos la gzud pa dang /_sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir tshig gi rnam pa grangs med pa shin tu dag pa'i dbyangs dang /_sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir thogs pa med pa'i mig gis chos kyi dbyings kyis klas 
[\[158a.6\]]pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa shes par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rjes su dran pa rnam par dag pa dang /_sems can 
[\[158a.7\]]thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i blo gros chen pos chos nges par rtogs pa'i mdzod dang /_sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub mtha' dang dbus med pas chos kyi dbyings rgyas par dgang ba la chags pa med par yang 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]dag par gzhol ba dang /_sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rgyud [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]tshul gcig tu gyur pas rnam par dbye ba med pa dang /_sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i lus 
[\[158b.2\]]kyi las dang ngag gi las dang /_yid kyi las yon tan thams cad kyi rgyan dang ldan pa rnam par dag pa dang /_sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pas 'byung ba dang /_sems can thams 
[\[158b.3\]]cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyud kyi tshul gcig cing rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang /_goms par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir shes pa thams cad rnam par dpyad pa la 'jug pa yongs su 
[\[158b.4\]]rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir mi mnyam pa med par dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsngo ba dang /_sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnam 
[\[158b.5\]]pa tha dad pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir dkar po'i phyogs thams cad bsgrub cing bstan par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir skad 
[\[158b.6\]]cig gcig gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i mthar thug par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir nan tan gyi rnam pa thams cad/_yongs su rdzogs pa rnam par dag pa yongs su bsgrub 
[\[158b.7\]]pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir yongs su bsngos nas/_chos thams cad yongs su dag par chos bstan pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]chos nyid kyi stobs mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa thob pa rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa'i byin gyi 
[\[159a.2\]]rlabs dang ldan par gyur cig_/ces yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos rgya mtsho de dag las chos rgya mtsho re re zhing yang chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/tshig thams cad 
[\[159a.3\]]rab tu dbye bas shin tu bstan pa mngon par bsgrub pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos 'byam klas pa mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad dang /_chos kyi snang ba thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[159a.4\]]yongs su bsngo'o/_/dus gsum dang mi 'gal ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spobs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis 
[\[159a.5\]]brlabs pa'i lus thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de sangs rgyas la dga' ba dang chos la dga' ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir snying rje chen po la dga' ba las phyir mi ldog pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[159a.6\]]par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de las kyi rnam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa thams cad kyi sems dang 
[\[159a.7\]]dbang po dang bar bya ba dang /_dga' bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de zhing gi rgyud snrel zhi dang spyi'u tshugs su rgyu ba thams cad shin tu bstan pa dang /_phra ba dang rgya che ba dang yangs pa dang /_dog pa dang tha gru che ba sna tshogs 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]dang /_rnam par dag pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo rgyun mi 'chad par mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par bskor ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de sems bskyed par skad cig re re dang mi 'jigs pa gzhan dang gzhan 
[\[159b.2\]]tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mi zad pas chos snang ba sar pa gsar pa rab tu thob cing bstan pa dang /_bshad pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la lhag pa'i bsam pa dang dbang po ma 'khrugs shing mi 
[\[159b.3\]]dma' bas chos 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus par mngon par shes pa'i ye shes dang chos kyi rdzu 'phrul thob pas sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'byam klas pa thams cad mngon par dga' ba dang /_tshim par chos thams cad rab tu 
[\[159b.4\]]bstan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa thams cad du song ba'i yongs su bsngo ba la gnas shing 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i lus kyi las kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos 
[\[159b.5\]]kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i ngag gi las kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i yid kyi las kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i gzugs mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/
[\[159b.6\]]chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i phung po mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/
[\[159b.7\]]chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i khams mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i skye mched mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i nang mnyam pa 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i phyi rol mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i brtsam pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su 
[\[160a.2\]]bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i bsam pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i sbyor ba mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i mos pa 
[\[160a.3\]]mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i dngos po mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar byung ba 
[\[160a.4\]]mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba rnam par 
[\[160a.5\]]dag pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i zhing thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs 
[\[160a.6\]]su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i 'gro ba thams cad du snang ba mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings 
[\[160a.7\]]tshad med par song ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_'dul ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid 
[\[160b.2\]]la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i chos thams cad mi gnyis pa'i dbyings 
[\[160b.3\]]mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/de de ltar yongs su bsngo bas chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang /_
[\[160b.4\]]mnyam pa'i lus yongs su dag pa kun nas gnas par 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang mnyam pa'i ngag yongs su dag pa kun nas gnas par 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang mnyam pa'i sems yongs su dag pa kun nas gnas 
[\[160b.5\]]par 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos spyod pa dang smon lam yongs su dag pa kun nas gnas par 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang mnyam pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[160b.6\]]yongs su dag pa kun nas gnas par 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang mnyam pa'i chos thams cad bstan pa dang brjod pas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad go bar bya ba yongs su dag pa kun nas gnas par 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi dbyings 
[\[160b.7\]]tshad med pa dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par gzhol ba'i tshul gyis lus 'byam klas pa rjes su 'gro ba kun nas gnas par 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang mnyam pa'i 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]chos snang ba mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad dang mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa'i tshig gcig brjod pas sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi the tsom gcod cing sems dang dbang po dang bsam pa khong du chud par byed pas 
[\[161a.2\]]tshim par byed pa dang /_bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang /_ye shes la 'jug pa shin tu 'phags pa dang /_chos mngon par shes 
[\[161a.3\]]pa la gnas par bya ba kun nas gnas par 'gyur te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa zhes bya ba bcu pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[161a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po'i chos sbyin pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsngo ba des yongs su bsngos na/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su rdzogs pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[161a.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kyis kyang rab tu thob par bya ba la brtson par byed par 
[\[161a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas bskyed pa thams cad 
[\[161a.7\]]mthong ba rab tu thob cing khong du chud par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_rgya chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_bsgribs pa med pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]par 'phrul pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin [(]kyis [,]gyis [)]rlob cing brten par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_shin tu bstan pa brjod du med pa'i rnam par 'phrul 
[\[161b.2\]]pa dang /_dus thams cad du rnam par 'phrul ba'i mngon par shes pa dang /_ye shes dang phyir mi ldog pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad ma lus par rgyas par 'gengs pa la 'jug cing khong du chud par 
[\[161b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/kun tu bzang po'i mig mtha' dang dbus med pa mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/de mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos bstan pa chags pa med pa'i rna ba'i ye shes khong du chud pa yang dag par 'dzin par 
[\[161b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad lus kyi skyil mo krung gcig gis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis rlob kyang sems can thams cad la gnod pa med par byed par 'gyur ro/_/dus gsum mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad la 
[\[161b.5\]]'jug pa'i ye shes 'byam klas pa yongs su rdzogs par thob cing khong du chud par 'gyur ro/_/blo mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad rnam par dag pa dang /_sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa dang /_chos thams cad rnam par dag pa dang /_skye mched 
[\[161b.6\]]yongs su shes pa'i ye shes thams cad rnam par dag pa dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad la 'jug cing rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa dang /_sems can gyi ris dang skye gnas rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur pa 
[\[161b.7\]]thams cad nas byung ba'i sgra dang smra ba dang /_skad thams cad ma lus pa la mngon sum gyi ye shes rnam par dag pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par rnam par mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer dang /_'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong zhing 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]mtha' dang dbus med pa snang bar byed pa rnam par dag pa dang /_dus gsum thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ma lus par mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa dang /_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar 
[\[162a.2\]]byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dang dbus med pa ma lus pa thams cad la skad cig gcig tu 'jug pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad ma lus pa la 'jug pas 'gro ba mtha' 
[\[162a.3\]]dang dbus med pa rnam par dag par bya ba rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/rab tu sgrub po/_/rnam par dag par byed do/_/mnyam par byed do/_/mngon sum du byed do/_/rab tu rtogs par byed do/_/khong du chud par byed do/_/
[\[162a.4\]]yang dag par sems par byed do/_/rnam par dag pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tho par bya ba rjes su thob par byed do/_/de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin 
[\[162a.5\]]tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos te g.yos so/_/rab tu g.yos so/_/kun tu g.yos so/_/'gul to rab tu 'gul to/_/kun tu 'gul to/_/ldeg go rab tu ldeg go_/kun tu ldeg go_/chem chem rab tu chem chem/_kun tu chem chem 
[\[162a.6\]]mo/_/'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun tu 'ur 'ur ro/_/shig shig rab tu shig shig_/kun tu shig shig go_/sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos nyid rab tu thob pas lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi char 
[\[162a.7\]]mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/lha 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi sbrul gyi snying po'i tsan dan mchog gi sprin gyi char mngon par bab 
[\[162b.2\]]po/_/lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi lha'i lus grangs med pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag brgya stong brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshig dang brjod pa la rtog pa 
[\[162b.3\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yid du 'ong bar spyod pa'i chos rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi de bzhin gshegs pas bstod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi legs 
[\[162b.4\]]so/_zhes bya ba dang /_lhung lhung ldegs kyi sgra 'byin pa dang /_dga' bar byed pa'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi lha'i lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med cing brjod du med pas rab tu btud do/_/lha yul gyi lha grangs med 
[\[162b.5\]]pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la brtson par yid la byed cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa la shin tu dad pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang mi 'bral ba'i sems kyis mngon par gnas so/_/lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba'i 
[\[162b.6\]]sgra/_lha'i glu'i dbyangs kyi tshul grangs med par grags pa de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing yid la bya ba la brtson pa rnams kyang rab tu bsgrags so/_/lha rdzas las shin tu 'das pa'i 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi 
[\[162b.7\]]dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tha gru thams cad rab tu snang bas khyab par byas so/_/lha rdzas las 'das pa'i sprul pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul grangs med pa bstan pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]gshegs pa'i sku'i cho 'phrul rnams kyang yang dag par bstan par gyur to/_/gling bzhi pa 'di'i dga' ldan gyi gnas su lha'i dbang po rab dga' ldan gyi khang pa na ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang phyogs bcur rgyas 
[\[163a.2\]]par bka' zhing chos bstan pa 'di nyid kun tu byung ngo /_sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi pha rol dag nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang 
[\[163a.3\]]chub sems dpa' lhags nas phyogs bcu bkang ste/_'di skad zer ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod kyis yongs su bsngo ba'i chos nyid 'di bshad pa legs so legs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag kun kyang ming rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan 
[\[163a.4\]]zhes bya ba sha stag ste/_'jig rten gyi khams ming rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rdo rje'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs pa dag gi drung nas 'dir phyin te/_kun na yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor gyi 
[\[163a.5\]]rnam pa 'di lta bu dag na tshig 'di dag dang /_yi ge 'di dag dang /_go bar bya ba 'di dag gis don 'di nyid lhag pa med cing chad pa med par brjod de chos 'di nyid ston to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag kyang de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re 
[\[163a.6\]]re'i gling bzhi pa dag gi dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi lha'i rgyal po'i rab dga' ldan gyi khang pa rin po che thams cad kyi brgyan ces bya ba dag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyin pa mngon du mthong ba sha 
[\[163a.7\]]stag sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor 'dir phyin to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis phyogs bcur bltas te 'khor thams cad la bltas nas chos kyi dbyings la rnam par blta ba dang /_don dang tshig dang yi ge la 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]rab tu 'jug pa dang /_sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med par yangs pa yongs su bsgom pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad la snying rje chen pos khyab par bya ba dang /_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs su sems yang dag par 'brel bar bya ba 
[\[163b.2\]]dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan la 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus yang dag par bskyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag par shes par bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyed pa 
[\[163b.3\]]'ang ji ltar dus la bab pa la yang dag par blta ba dang /_chos kyi lus kyi rjes su song ba'i gzugs kyi lus yang dag par bstan par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/de dag chos la rab 
[\[163b.4\]]tu mkhas gyur cing /_/chos rgyud mtha' yas rnam par dag byas nas/_/chos kyi 'od byed chos la kha lo sgyur/_/chos rnams rab rtogs chags pa med pa thob/_/de dag chos kyi kha lo sgyur gyur te/_/shin tu dkon pa'i chos rnams ston byed cing /_/
[\[163b.5\]]chos kyi sgo la rab tu bzhag bya bar/_/sems can mtha' yas phyogs su go bar byed/_/de dag chos kyi gang chen mtsho 'thung zhing /_/chos nyid sprin char phyogs su rab tu 'bebs/_/'jig rten khams su chos nyid nyi shar cing /_/sems can phan 
[\[163b.6\]]phyir chos rnams ston par byed/_/de dag shin tu dkon pa'i sbyin bdag ste/_/chos kyi rnam tshul shes pa rjes su thob/_/chos kyi snang bas rab tu sems gsal ba/_/'jigs med 'jig rten dag na chos rab ston/_/shin tu dri med chos 
[\[163b.7\]]kyi sems dang ldan/_/chos kyi sgo la de dag rab tu gnas/_/chos rnams rgya mtshos de dag shin tu 'phags/_/'jig rten dag tu chos nyid rnga yang brdung /_/de dag shin tu dkon pa'i chos brjod cing /_/chos nyid bsod nams yang dag ba[{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]par byed/_/chos nyid bsam pa yongs su dag byed cing /_/chos kyi gter rnams 'gro ba kun la ston/_/chos kyi khang par rgyal bas dbang bskur ba/_/chos nyid ye shes snying po'i lus dang ldan/_/chos 
[\[164a.2\]]kyi mtshan gzhi rtogs pa'i ye shes can/_/de dag chos nyid bzang po'i chos la gnas/_/rgyal ba kun gyis gang la bstod mdzad dang /_/rab kyi phul gyis gang zhig gnang gyur cing /_/skye dbang thams cad gang gis bskyed gyur pa'i/_/
[\[164a.3\]]sbyin pa dam pa de dag sbyin pa byed/_/de dag chos kyi lus ldan shes dang ldan/_/'jig rten mkhas pas chos nyid sprul mdzad pas/_/chos kyi sgron ma 'gro la phan pa'i phyir/_/dma' ba med par mtha' yas chos ston to/_/de dag 
[\[164a.4\]]chos bzang dam pa sbyin byas nas/_/dge rtsa de dag rjes su sems byed cing /_/'jig rten dag tu dge ba gang byas pa/_/de dag yongs bsngo'i shes dang ldan pa yin/_/rang byung thams cad gang gis bskyed gyur pa'i/_/dge rtsa de dag 'gro 
[\[164a.5\]]ba'i don du shes/_/thams cad rnam phye rnam par dag gyur cing /_/sangs rgyas rgyan gyis pha rol phyin par byed/_/zhing gi rgyan mang shin tu rgya che zhing /_/phyogs rnams kun tu de la tshad med pas/_/'jig rten kun tu bsam yas 
[\[164a.6\]]rgyan ldan pa/_/de 'drar zhing rnams ma lus kun gyur cing /_/skyes bu 'dul ba'i ye shes ji tsam pa/_/de 'drar sems can rnam dag ldan gyur te/_/rgyal ba'i sras po bzang po ji bzhin du/_/yon tan kun gyis sems rgyan ldan gyur cig_/
[\[164a.7\]]de dag rnam 'phrul shin tu rnam yangs pa/_/gang gis 'jig rten ma lus rgyas gang ba/_/de yi spyod la shes rab bzang gnas par/_/sems can thams cad ma lus 'gyur bar shog_/ji snyed 'jig rten ma lus gang yang rung /_/
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]phyogs su rgyal ba kun gyis sangs rgyas pa/_/kun kyang kun tu bzang po ci bzhin du/_/legs spyod dam pa mchog tu ldan gyur cig_/yon tan rgyun rnams ji snyed gang yang rung /_/rgyal sras rnams dang rgyal bas thugs chud pa'i/_/yon tan 
[\[164b.2\]]gang la mtha' dang dbus med pa'i/_/yon tan de 'drar sems can kun gyur cig_/gang yang rdzu 'phrul stobs dang ldan pa rnams/_/'jug pa kun la bslab pa kun bslabs pa/_/rnam 'phrul thams cad yang dag ston pa rnams/_/phyogs rnams 
[\[164b.3\]]thams cad rgyas par 'dod gyur cig_/sems kyi skad cig gcig gis rang byung rnams/_/'dren pa sems can kun dang mnyam mthong ste/_/chos rnams thams cad ma lus bsdu byas shing /_/skra rtse gcig tu mi mgon sdud gyur cig_/'jig rten 'di 
[\[164b.4\]]na 'gro ba gang rgyu ba/_/gang rnams mi yi dam pas mkhyen gyur pa/_/de dang mnyam pa thams cad ma lus pa'i/_/'jig rten mkhyen la mchod pa byed gyur cig_/spos kyi rgyud dang de bzhin me tog dang /_/gos kyi rgyud dang de bzhin gdugs rnams kyis/_/
[\[164b.5\]]chos dbyings ma lus rgyas par dgang byas shing /_/'jig rten kun tu yid kyis 'gengs gyur cig_/sangs rgyas mtshan gyi rnam pa bsam yas pa/_/skra rtse gcig tu thams cad bsdu ba yis/_/lhag ma med par lam rnams kun bsdus shing /_/'jig 
[\[164b.6\]]rten sgron la phyag 'tshal gyur bar shog_/rgyal ba de dag kun la phyag 'tshal te/_/thams cad lus kyi tshul gyis 'dud byed cing /_/phyogs rnams kun tu rgyal ba kun bstod pas/_/phyi ma'i bskal kun zad par byed gyur cig_/sems can snyed kyi yid 
[\[164b.7\]]kyi rnam pa yis/_/rgyal ba gcig la 'ang mchod pa byed gyur cig_/ji ltar rgyal ba gcig mchod de bzhin du/_/skyes dbang ma lus kun la 'ang mchod gyur cig_/de dag mchod pa'i yon tan rjod byed pas/_/'gro ba kun tu bskal pa zad gyur kyang /_/
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]skyes bu 'dul ba dpe zla med pa yi/_/rgyal ba mchod pa'i mthar thug med gyur cig_/'gro ba kun na bskal mang ji snyed pa/_/de snyed bskal par spyad pa spyod byed cing /_/rgyal ba gcig la rim gro bya bas kyang /_/bskal pa 
[\[165a.2\]]thams cad ma lus zad gyur cig_/rgyal ba gcig la ji tsam brjod gyur pa/_/rgyal ba kun la 'ang bskal pa de snyed de/_/bskal pa'i grangs kyi mthar thug ma gyur cig_/rgyal ba'i spyod pas skyo ba med gyur cig_/ji ltar chos dbyings rnam par dag pa 
[\[165a.3\]]dang /_/ji tsam rgya chen yongs su mtha' yas pa/_/de snyed rgya chen me tog bzang po rnams/_/thub mang sems can snyed la 'bul gyur cig_/dri zhim ldan pa'i de bzhin phye ma dag_/gtsang zhing rnam dag rnam pa sna tshogs la/_/'gro ba kun na dpe zla 
[\[165a.4\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]med pa/_/de 'dras rgyal ba mchod pa byed gyur cig_/zhing rnams du ma sems can mnyam pa yi/_/rgyal ba gcig la gdugs rnams 'bul byed cing /_/rgyal ba kun la'ang de bzhin dgab bya bas/_/rgyal ba rnams la gdugs mchod byed gyur 
[\[165a.5\]]cig_/byug pa dam pa mchog tu gyur pa rnams/_/'gro ba 'di na gang la dpe med pa/_/de yis sangs rgyas mchod byed spyod pa yis/_/bskal mang sems can mnyam pa zad gyur cig_/de bzhin byug dang spos kyi phye ma dang /_/me tog bdug pa na bza' 
[\[165a.6\]]spos rnams dang /_/rin chen lhab lhub mchod pa mtha' yas pa'i/_/rim gro skyo ba med par byed gyur cig_/'jig rten sgron ma sems can mnyam pa dag_/skad cig re rer byang chub 'tshang rgya ba/_/de dag yon tan mtha' yas rjod byed cing /_/skyes bu 
[\[165a.7\]]'dul la mchod pa byed gyur cig_/sems can mnyam pa'i 'jig rten mkhyen pa la/_/sems can mnyam pa'i bskal par bgrang byas shing /_/blo mchog ldan pa mchod pa byed pa ni/_/rgyal bas bshad kyang zad par ma gyur cig_/rgyal ba rnams la 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]'di 'dra'i mchod byed cing /_/sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul kun tu 'gengs byed pas/_/bzang dang ldan pa'i spyod la gnas bcas shing /_/sangs rgyas ma lus thams cad mthong gyur cig_/'gro kun dge ba ji snyed yod pa dang /_/byas dang byed 'gyur de 
[\[165b.2\]]bzhin byed pa dag_/bzang po ji bzhin de 'dra'i sa dag la/_/kun kyang kun nas bzang por red gyur cig_/'jig rten thams cad ma lus sems can rnams/_/ji snyed rgyal ba kun gyis thugs chud pa/_/kun kyang mkhas pa kun gyis bsngags pa yi/_/
[\[165b.3\]]kun tu bzang po de bzhin gyur par shog_/phyogs rnams ma lus kun tu ci byas pa/_/skyes bu dam pa de ltar yongs su bsngo/_/rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan rgyal bas gang gsungs pa/_/yongs bsngo dam pa mchog dang phul yang yin/_/de bzhin zhing rnams thams 
[\[165b.4\]]cad ma lus par/_/rgyu bzhin kun kyang khong du chud byas te/_/sems can ji snyed thams cad ma lus pa/_/de dag kun kyang kun tu bzang gyur cig_/sbyin pas yongs bsngo ji bzhin red gyur cig_/tshul khrims kyis kyang bsngo bzhin red gyur cig_/
[\[165b.5\]]brtson 'grus stobs kyis bskal par mi ldog cing /_/bzod pas 'khrug pa med pa'i yid gyur cig_/bsam gtan gyis kyang rtse gcig yid ldan zhing /_/ting 'dzin kun gyi spyod yul shes gyur cig_/shes rab dus rnams gsum po thams cad du/_/
[\[165b.6\]]'jig rten dag tu mthar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]med gyur cig_/lus dang ngag dang yid rnams thams cad kyang /_/rnam pa kun tu rnam dag mkhas gyur cig_/spyod pa de dag thams cad ma lus par/_/kun kyang kun tu bzang por red gyur cig_/ji ltar chos dbyings 
[\[165b.7\]]rlom pa'i sems med cing /_/de la spros dang chags pa med pa dang /_/mya ngan 'das dang bsgribs pa med pa ltar/_/de bzhin sems la rlom sems med gyur cig_/chos mkhas yongs su bsngo ba gang brjod pa/_/de ni rgyal bas gsungs pa'i bsngo ba ste/_/
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]mkhas pa'i spyod pa ci nas 'grub 'gyur bar/_/dge ba yangs pa de yis yongs su bsngo/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyis 'di la bslabs byas te/_/ji snyed gang yod thams cad ma lus par/_/khams rnams kun kyang yongs su bsdu byas 
[\[166a.2\]]te/_/ci nas bde gshegs stobs la 'jug par bsngo/_/yangs pa ji snyed rgyal bas gsungs pa dang /_/kun tu bzang zhes gang la gdags pa yi/_/rgyal ba'i sras rnams gang la gnas gyur pa'i/_/spyod pa dam pa de dag su 'dod pas/_sems 
[\[166a.3\]]can ma lus thams cad bgrang bar nus/_/dus gsum sems kyang ma lus kun bgrang nus/_/gang la kun tu bzang por ming gdags pa/_/rgyal sras de yi yon tan mtha' med do/_/nam mkha' spu rtses bgrang bar nus kyang srid/_/zhing 
[\[166a.4\]]rnams kun gyi rdul yang bgrang bar nus/_/gang la rgyal sras drang srong che gnas pa'i/_/spyod pa de dag bgrang bar mi nus so/_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa zhes bya ba ste/_yongs su bsngo ba bcu pa'o/_rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su bsngo ba'i 
[\[166a.5\]]le'u ste/_sum cu pa'o//_//[{D44-31}]shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba las sa bcu pa'i le'u ste/_bam po bcu gsum pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi gnas kyi nor bu rin po che dam pa'i 
[\[166a.6\]]khang pa na/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan nas 'dus pa sha stag kun kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ye 
[\[166a.7\]]shes kyi yul dang spyod yul thams cad rab tu thob pas gnas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yul la 'jug cing gzhol ba'i spyod yul ma btang ba/_'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul bar bya ba'i dus 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]bzhin du thogs pa med pa'i byin gyi rlabs rnam pa tha dad pas bya ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa la mkhas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub cing bskal pa dang zhing dang dus su spyod pa la gnas pa'i rgyun 
[\[166b.2\]]mi gcod pa/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dang ye shes dang rdzu 'phrul gyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs shing 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba mi zad pa la rab tu zhugs pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab dang /_thabs thams cad kyi pha rol 
[\[166b.3\]]tu phyin pa dam pa thob pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas 'khor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yang dag par bstan cing shin tu bsgrub pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 
[\[166b.4\]]'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_rig pa dang ye shes la rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pas bya ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa la mkhas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dang stobs dang /_dbang thams 
[\[166b.5\]]cad thob cing mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i sems skad cig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'dod pa la sngun du 'dren pa'i gtam gyi skyes bu dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par gzung ba dang /_
[\[166b.6\]]sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang /_rim gro rgya chen po bya ba'i don du mngon par brtson pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i las thams cad yang dag par blang ba mnyam pa nyid kyi sbyor bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba chos kyi dbyings 
[\[166b.7\]]thams cad du chags pa med pa'i dbyangs rab tu sgrog pas dus gsum thams cad du chags pa med pa'i sems dang /_ye shes kyi yul rgyas par 'gengs pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dang nan tan yongs su rdzogs pa thams cad bskal pa brjod du 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]med par rgyun mi chad par yang dag par bstan pa la yon tan bsngags shing brjod pa zad mi shes pa sha stag ste/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i snying 
[\[167a.2\]]po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal gyi snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dpal gyi snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[167a.3\]]dpa' chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsang ba'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snying po dang /_/
[\[167a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyan rnam par bkod pa thams cad rab tu snang bar ston pa'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes rnam par snang ba'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[167a.5\]]dpal yid du 'ong ba'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tsan dan dpal gyi snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me tog dpal gyi snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me tog rgyas pa 
[\[167a.6\]]dpal gyi snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal lha'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dpal gyi snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye 
[\[167a.7\]]shes rnam par dag pa'i dpal gyi snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dpal gyi snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen dpal gyi snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]dri ma med pa'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma dang bral ba'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa sna tshogs rgyan gyi snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer 
[\[167b.2\]]gyi dra ba chen po rab tu snang ba'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dri ma med pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid bzang po'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser bzang zhing dri ma med pa'i dbyig gis 
[\[167b.3\]]spras pa'i gzi brjid mdzes pa'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan thams cad kyis brgyan pas rnam par dag pa'i dpal gyi snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal gyi be 'u rdo rje 'od 'phro 
[\[167b.4\]]bas brgyan pa'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i dpal gyi snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po 'od rab tu snang ba'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[167b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod ye shes bsgribs pa med pa'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgribs pa med cing nga ro snyan pa'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[167b.6\]]dpa' chen po gzungs kyi snying po yon tan gyi 'gro ba thams cad kyi smon lam yang dag par 'dzin pa'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri rab dpal 
[\[167b.7\]]gyi snying po dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan thams cad rnam par dag pa'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par grol ba'i zla ba dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa gzhal du med pa/_grangs med 
[\[168a.2\]]pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_mtshungs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dpag tu med pa/_kun tu mtha' yas pa/_mu med pas mtshams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yang brjod du med pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i 
[\[168a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa sha stag dang /_thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po sangs rgyas kyi mthus theg pa chen po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs 
[\[168a.4\]]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin theg pa chen po rab tu snang ba de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/_de nas de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba 
[\[168a.5\]]phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang mtshan rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya bar mthun pa sha stag gis zhal mngon par bstan te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[168a.6\]]de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal ba'i bu de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin theg pa chen po rab tu snang ba la snyoms par zhugs pa legs so legs so/_/'di ltar rigs kyi bu khyod la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[168a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang mtshan rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya bar mthun pa sha stag gis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad 'di'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]byin gyi rlabs dang /_khyod nyid kyi ye shes kyi khyad par gyis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu brjod cing ye shes kyis la 'jug par bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba 
[\[168b.2\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba la mkhas par bya ba dang /_chos thams cad la ye shes shin tu yangs par bya ba dang /_shin tu legs par gnas pa'i chos rab tu bstan pa dang /_ye shes tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa rnam par sbyang ba dang 'jig rten gyi chos 
[\[168b.3\]]thams cad kyis gos pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par bya ba dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul khong du chud par bya ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul gyi bar du khong du chud par 
[\[168b.4\]]bya ba dang /_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu brtsam pa rab tu 'thob par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa ma nor bar mngon par rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bya 
[\[168b.5\]]ba dang /_zag pa med pa'i chos kyi bye brag rnam par bsgom pa dang /_rnam par dbye ba shin tu rnam par phye ba'i shes rab kyi snang ba chen po la mkhas pa'i ye shes kyi rgyan thob par bya ba dang /_shin tu brtags pa'i ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug par 
[\[168b.6\]]bya ba dang /_gnas kyi rnam pa ci rigs su brjod pa dang /_spobs pa'i snang ba dma' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa thob par bya ba dang /_tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa chen po'i sa shin tu rtogs par bya ba dang /_byang chub kyi sems la dran pa nyams pa med par 
[\[168b.7\]]bya ba dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_thams cad du song ba'i blo rnam par gdon mi za ba la mkhas pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do/_/de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]chos kyi sgo rab tu dbye ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_
[\[169a.2\]]chos kyi dbyings shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad la phan gdags pa dang /_chos kyi sku'i ye shes kyi lus la 'jug par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba yang dag par blang ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[169a.3\]]thams cad du shin tu 'phags pa'i lus 'byung bar bya ba dang /_'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi tshul yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 
[\[169a.4\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir spobs pa skyed cig_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la zil gyis mi non par lus nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pas shin tu ston pa nye bar 
[\[169a.5\]]bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/shin tu sbyangs pa'i ye shes rnam par phye ba la 'jug pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/dran pa nyams pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i byin gyi rlabs nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/blo gros shin tu nges par rtogs pas mkhas pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/
[\[169a.6\]]thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i blo'i rjes su 'gro ba nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi stobs thub pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa che zhing zhum pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nye bar bsgrub pa 
[\[169a.7\]]mdzad do/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pas rnam par dbye ba'i chos kyi tshul shin tu rtog par bya ba nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /_gsung dang thugs kyi rgyan shin tu rnam par 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]phye ba mngon par bsdu ba nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi chos nyid rab tu thob pa dang /_sngon gyi smon lam gyis mngon par bsgrubs pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu rnam par sbyangs pa dang /_ye shes kyi dkyil 
[\[169b.2\]]'khor shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_tshogs shin tu bstsags pa dang /_yongs su sbyang ba shin tu byas pa dang /_dran pa'i snod tshad med pa dang /_mos pa rnam par dag cing 'od shin tu gsal ba dang /_gzungs kyi sgo tha mi dad pa thob pa dang /_chos kyi 
[\[169b.3\]]dbyings kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas shin tu btab pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de dag na bzhugs bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus so so nas phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po'i mgo la byug pa mdzad 
[\[169b.4\]]do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la reg ma thag tu de nyid kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa'i smon 
[\[169b.5\]]lam 'di ni shin tu rnam par gdon mi za ba ste/_tha mi dad pa bltar med pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par yangs pa/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang /_sems can gyi 
[\[169b.6\]]khams thams cad du rgyas par khyab pa/_'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[169b.7\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes kyi sa la yang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes kyi sa la yang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes kyi sa la yang 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyis rnams te/_gang la bsams te bdag gis de skad du smras pa de dag ni/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung 
[\[170a.2\]]ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/_/gsung ngo /_/gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po dang /_dri ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis 
[\[170a.3\]]pa dang /_'od byed pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa dang /_'od 'phro ba can zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa dang /_rgyal bar dka' ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa dang /_mngon sum pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems 
[\[170a.4\]]dpa'i sa drug pa dang /_ring du song ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa dang /_mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa dang /_legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa dang /_chos kyi sprin ces bya ba byang chub 
[\[170a.5\]]sems dpa'i sa bcu pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa ste/_de ni 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/_/gsung 
[\[170a.6\]]ngo /_/gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po 'di dag mi gsung ba de lta bu ma mthong ngo /_/de ci'i 
[\[170a.7\]]phyir zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su sbyong ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo 'di ni yang dag phul zhes bya ba yin te/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnam par dgod pa 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]shin tu bstan pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gnas 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes pa'o/_/de nas de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po 'di dag ming tsam 
[\[170b.2\]]zhig brjod de cang mi zer bar 'dug nas/_de las rab tu phye ste ma bshad pa dang /_de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po de dag gi ming tsam zhig thos las rab tu phye ste/_mi brjod pas skom par gyur nas 
[\[170b.3\]]de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po de dag gi ming tsam zhig brjod de cang mi zer bar 'dug nas/_de las rab tu phye zhing mi ston pa de la rgyu ni gang rkyen ni ci zhig yod snyam pa dang /_
[\[170b.4\]]de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'dus pa de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par grol ba'i zla ba zhes bya ba 'dus shing 'dug 'dug ste/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas/_byang chub 
[\[170b.5\]]sems dpa'i 'khor de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la klu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad de don de dris so/_/ci phyir rtog pa rnam dag cing /_/dran dang ye shes ldan pa yis/_/
[\[170b.6\]]sa yi mchog ni brjod byas te/_/mkhas pas rnam par phye mi bshad/_/'di kun nges par rtogs pa ste/_/byang chub sems dpa' grags chen yin/_/ci phyir khyod kyis brjod de/_/rab tu phye ba bshad mi bgyi/_/rgyal sras 'jigs med 'di 
[\[170b.7\]]dag ni/_/kun kyang shin tu nyan par 'dod/_/sa yi don tshul yang dag tu/_/rnam par phye ste bshad par mdzod/_/'khor 'di shin tu rnam dang ste/_/le lo med cing dge dang ldan/_/dag pa'i mchog la gnas pa ste/_/yon tan ye shes ldan pa yi/_/
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]phan tshun gcig la gcig lta zhing /_/kun kyang rim gro bcas par gnas/_/sbrang rtsi ji ltar spang [{]myin [,]min [}]pa/_/de ltar bdud rtsi mchog kyang 'dod/_/rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med pa/_/shes rab chen pos de thos nas/_/
[\[171a.2\]]'khor rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i sras la smras/_/sangs rgyas skur ba yang dag 'byung bas na/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab bstan cing /_/sa rgyu dam pa rnam par dbye bya ba/_/de ni rmad 'byung mchog tu 
[\[171a.3\]]dga' ba yin/_/phra zhing blta dka' rnam par rtog pa spangs/_/sems kyis dang bral bas bsgrub par dka'/_/mkhas pa rnams kyi zag med spyod yul te/_/'gro ba rnams kyis de thos mos par 'gyur/_/rdo rje lta bur bsam pa rab gzhag ste/_/
[\[171a.4\]]sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la mos byas shing /_/bdag med pa yi sems kyis shes na/_/ye shes dam pa 'di bzod mnyan par nus/_/ji ltar bar snang tshon ris bris pa dang /_/nam mkha'i dbyings la rlung gnas ji bzhin du/_/de ltar ye shes zag 
[\[171a.5\]]pa med pa yang /_/shin tu blta dka' thub pas rnam par phye/_/de la bdag gis sems ni 'di snyam byed/_/sangs rgyas ye shes dam pa bsam yas la/_/'gro ba gang rnams dad par byed dkon zhes/_/de yi phyir na ma smras ma bshad do/_/de skad smras pa dang /_
[\[171a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas/_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la 'di skad smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'khor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'di dag la bsam pa shin tu sbyangs pa/_kun tu rtog pa 
[\[171a.7\]]yongs su sbyangs pa spyad par bya ba shin tu spyod pa/_tshogs shin tu bstsags pa/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong shin tu bsnyen bkur ba/_yon tan dang ye shes tshad med pa dang ldan pa/_the tsom dang nem nur med pa/_nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_mos pa dang 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]lhag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu gnas pa/_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa sha stag tshogs pas yongs su dag pa yin gyis/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis legs par bshad pa mdzod cig dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad ni rnam 
[\[171b.2\]]pa 'di lta bu'i gnas zab mo la mngon sum du gnas pa sha stag go_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas don 'di nyid gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/byang chub sems 
[\[171b.3\]]dpa'i spyod pa bla med pa/_/sa rnams rab phye rnam dgod brtags pa yi/_/ye shes sbyong zhing byang chub thob byed pa/_/mchog dang dam pa zhi ba'i chos rnams shod/_/'khor 'di dag pa nyon mongs med pa'i mchog_/mos dang bsam pa shin tu sbyangs pa ste/_/
[\[171b.4\]]sangs rgyas bye ba mang la spyad pa spyad/_/sa 'di brtags la yid ches ldan pa yin/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'khor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[171b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu'i gnas zab mo la bsam pa shin tu sbyangs pa/_kun tu rtog pa yongs su sbyangs pa/_spyod pa shin tu spyad pa/_tshogs shin tu bstsags pa/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bstsags pa/_yon tan dang ye shes 
[\[171b.6\]]tshad med pa dang ldan pa/_the tsom dang nem nur med pa/_nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_mos pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu gnas pa/_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa sha stag tshogs pas shin tu dag pa yang yin na/_'on kyang sems can mos pa chung ngu gzhan dag gis zab 
[\[171b.7\]]mo'i rnam pa 'di lta bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas dag thos par gyur la thos nas kyang the tsom dang yid gnyis su gyur na/_de dag la yun ring por gnod pa dang /_don med pa dang /_mi bde ba'i rgyur 'gyur bas 'di lta zhig tu snying brtse ba'i phyir bdag ni 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]cang mi zer bar 'dug pa nyid du mos so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos don 'di nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/'khor 'di rnam dag shes rab yangs pa ste/_/zab cing gsal ba'i 
[\[172a.2\]]spyod ldan rtog shes shing /_/gzhan dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog ri rgyal bzhin mi g.yo/_/bsam rtog mi 'khrug rgya mtsho chen po 'dra/_/'on kyang ma rtogs mi shes ma sbyang ba/_/rnam shes yul nas don la shes med pas/_thos shing ma ches phral du ngan song ltung /_/de dag snying 
[\[172a.3\]]brtses ye shes sa ma bshad/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas yang byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la gsol ba btab pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras legs par bshad pa mdzod cig dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rnam pa 
[\[172a.4\]]'di lta bu bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i gnas 'di dag kyang gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang /_legs par yid ches par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de ni 'di ltar sa shin tu bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe chos nyid rab tu thob pas/_sangs rgyas thams 
[\[172a.5\]]cad kyis kyang dgongs par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang ye shes kyis 'di yongs su bsrung ba'i don du rab tu brtson par byed do/_/de yang ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni spyod pa'i sa dang po ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par 'grub 
[\[172a.6\]]pa'i gzhi yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/_yi ge dang 'bru 'grangs pa ji snyed du bstan pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba'ang yi ge'i phyi mo'o/_/tha mar yang yi ge'i phyi mo la thug ste/_yi ge'i phyi mo bstan pas ma khyab pa de lta bu'i yi ge 
[\[172a.7\]]dang 'bru 'grangs pa bstan pa ni gang yang med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang spyod pas rab tu 'grub pas sa sngon du 'gro ba'o/_/rang byung gi ye shes kyi mthar thug par 'gyur bas/_sa'i mthar thug pa'o de bas na/_kye rgyal 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]ba'i sras shod cig dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir byin gyis rlob pa mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas don 'di nyid gsal bar 
[\[172b.2\]]bzlas pa'i phyir/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/sa dang spyod 'jug byang chub 'gyur ba ye shes sgrub byed pa/_/spyod pa rnam dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i sras kyis legs par shod/_/phyogs bcu'i 
[\[172b.3\]]rgyal ba bde gshegs kun mgon 'dren pa ji snyed pa/_/khyu mchog de kun ye shes 'byung gnas ston la dgongs pa mdzad/_/'di ni dang po zhugs pa'i shes spyod 'di mthar thug ste/_/rgyal ba'i chos rab gzhal yas ji snyed de dag 'byung gnas 
[\[172b.4\]]'di/_/yi ge 'grangs pa phyi mo'i rjes 'gro sngon du de 'gro ltar/_/de bzhin sa mchog blo yi yul du tha ma thug par 'dong /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi nga ro gcig tu glu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad de/_byang chub 
[\[172b.5\]]sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la don 'di nyid kyi phyir/_gsol ba btab pa/_blo yangs dam pa'i phul mnga' ba/_/spobs pa mtha' yas rnam par dbye ba rtogs mkhyen pas/_/yid du 'ong ba'i gsung dbyangs kyis/_/kun la phan don dam pa 
[\[172b.6\]]bshad pa mdzod/_/dran dang dga' bas spyod dag pa/_/stobs bcu'i stobs kyis shugs [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]yon tan ldan pa yi/_/sa yi dam pa mchog gi rnams/_/tha dad yang dag don mkhyen spyod pas shod/_/zhi sdom bsgrub pa'i yid ldan pa/_/
[\[172b.7\]]nga rgyal dregs dang lta ba'i nyon mongs zhir gyur pas/_/'khor 'dir the tsom bral ba ste/_/khyod kyis legs par bshad do re zhig sdod/_/skom pa bsil ba'i chu 'dod bzhin/_/bkres pa kha zas nad pa sman rab 'dod pa dang /_bung ba sbrang rtsi 'dod 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]pa ltar/_/de bzhin 'khor 'di khyod kyi tshig la sdod/_/de bas shin tu blo yangs pas/_/rdul med rnams las yi dam pa 'jug pa shod/_/chags med stobs bcu'i tshogs gyur pa/_/bde gshegs spyod pa ma lus bshad 
[\[173a.2\]]par mdzod/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mdzod spu nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i stobs snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor gyi 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa dang ldan pa byung ngo /_/de byung nas phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten 
[\[173a.3\]]gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus par snang bar byas nas/_sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad rtse zil bar byas te/_bdud kyi khyim thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[173a.4\]]kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byas te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i mthu bstan nas/_phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor 
[\[173a.5\]]gyi dkyil 'khor du chos bstan pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus snang bar byas te/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan nas/_steng gi bar snang la 'od zer stug po'i sprin gyi dra 
[\[173a.6\]]ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen por byas te 'dug go_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mdzod spu dag nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i 'od snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor gyi 'od zer grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang ldan pa dag byung bar gyur to/_/byung nas kyang de dag 
[\[173a.7\]]gis phyogs bcu thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du chos bstan pa'i byin gyis byin du brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams snang bar byas te/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]'phrul pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa bstan nas/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di yang snang bar byas/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di'ang snang bar byas te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[173b.2\]]chen po rdo rje'i snying po'i lus kyang snang bar byas nas/_steng gi bar snang la de bzhin du 'od zer stug po'i sprin gyi dra ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen por byas te 'khod do/_/de nas 'od zer stug po'i sprin gyi dra ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po de dag nas sangs rgyas kyi byin 
[\[173b.3\]]gyis sgra'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ngo /_/mi mnyam mnyam dang mnyam pa mkha' dang mnyam pa dag_/stobs bcu'i khyu mchog mthu ldan tshad med yon tan can/_/'jig rten kun mchog mi yi dam pa phul gyi rnams/_shAkya seng ge'i chos la byin rlabs 
[\[173b.4\]]dam pa mdzad/_/bde gshegs sras po 'dren pa'i byin gyis bshad par gyis/_/chos rgyal khyu mchog rnams kyi mdzod kyi dam pa phye/_/sa yi ye shes rnam phye spyod mchog rab yangs pa/_/stobs bcu'i byin gyis ma thogs myur du bstan pa gyis/_/gang gi rna lam 
[\[173b.5\]]bsam par chos dam rin chen 'di/_/song bar gyur pa de dag bde gshegs byin gyis brlabs/_/rdul med sa kun rim gyis rab tu rdzogs byas nas/_/stobs bcu ldan pa'i rgyal ba dam par 'grub par 'gyur/_/rgya mtsho'i chu byung gyur cing bskal pa'i myes gdungs 
[\[173b.6\]]kyang /_/gal te snod gyur sems can de dag 'di la nyan/_/gang rnams the tsom za zhing yid gnyis byed pa ni/_/de dag rna bas rnam pa kun tu thos mi 'gyur/_/de phyir sa yi ye shes lam mchog bstan par gyis/_/gnas dang rgyud dang 'phro ba rim gyis rab tu 
[\[173b.7\]]shod/_/spyod dang yul dang chos dang ye shes tshul rnams kyi/_/chos kyi tshul yang 'gro ba kun la phan phyir shod/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos phyogs bcur bltas nas/_'khor thams cad de bas kyang dad par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]pa 'di dag smras so/_/phra la shes dka' drang srong chen po'i lam/_/mi rtog rtog yul ma yin lta bar dka'/_/rang bzhin zhi zhing 'gag med 'byung ba med/_/mkhas gsal shes pas khong du chud pa yin/_/ngo bo nyid stong zhi zhing sdug 
[\[174a.2\]]bsngal zad/_/rgyud las rnam grol mnyam par mya ngan 'das/_/mtha' dang dbus med tshig gis brjod du med/_/dus gsum grol ba nam mkha' 'dra zhing mtshungs/_/bde gshegs spyod yul zhi zhing nye bar zhi/_/smra ba'i lam rnams kun gyis brjod par dka'/_/
[\[174a.3\]]de dag sa dang spyod pa de 'dra bas/_/smra bar dka' na bstan par ga la nus/_/de ni bsam yas sems lam rnam par spangs/_/ye shes mngon bsgrubs rgyal ba'i spyod yul te/_/phung po skye mched khams kyis skyed pa min/_/sems kyis mi shes yid kyis 
[\[174a.4\]]rnam ma brtags/_/ji ltar bar snang gnas kyi bya yi rjes/_/shin tu smra dka' bstan par mi nus pa/_/de ltar bde gshegs sras kyi sa rnams kyang /_/yid dang sems kyi yul gyis shes mi nus/_/'on kyang byams dang snying rje smon lam gyis/_/de 
[\[174a.5\]]las phyogs tsam rim pa'i tshul bzhin du/_/bshad par bya ste sems kyi spyod yul min/_/ye shes tshul gyis rdzogs par bya ba'o/_/de 'dra'i spyod yul phra zhing blta dka' ba/_/rang rig yin pas brjod par mi nus kyang /_/'on kyang bde bar gshegs 
[\[174a.6\]]pa'i mthus brjod kyis/_/thams cad mthun par nan tan gyis de nyon/_/ye shes sa dang spyod 'jug ci 'dra ba/_/bskal pa bye bar zad par mi nus te/_/yang dag don dngos gzhan min gnas pa las/_/mdo tsam bshad kyis de dag mnyan par gyis/_/mthun 
[\[174a.7\]]zhing nan tan yod par sta gon gnas/_/bde gshegs byin gyis bdag gis bshad par bya/_/dpe ldan 'thad la yi ge mnyam pa yi/_/chos sgra dam pa bdag gis brjod par bya/_/'di ni tshig gis brjod par shin tu dka'/_/de ltar tshad med bde gshegs 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]mthu dag las/_/chu thigs gcig 'dra bdag gi lus 'di la/_/de ring zhugs kyis bshad pa mnyan par gyis/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bstsags pa spyad pa shin tu spyod pa/_tshogs shin tu bsags pa/_sangs rgyas 
[\[174b.2\]]'byung ba shin tu bsnyen bkur ba/_chos dkar po shin tu bsdus pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis shin tu bzung ba/_bsam pa yongs su dag pa/_lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu rgya chen po can mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa/_snying rje dang snying brtse ba mngon du gyur pa/_
[\[174b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par mos pa rnams rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mos pa dang /_stobs bcu'i stobs thob par bya ba dang /_mi 'jigs pa chen po thob par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /_'gro ba 
[\[174b.4\]]thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya ba dang /_snying brtse ba dang snying rje chen po yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_phyogs bcu ma lus par thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mngon du 'gyur bar bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad thogs pa med par yongs su sbyangs par 
[\[174b.5\]]bya ba dang /_dus gsum thams cad skad cig gcig gis khong du chud par bya ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rab tu bskor ba la khyu mchog gi mthu dbyung ba rgya chen po 'thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba/_
[\[174b.6\]]shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang du gyur pa/_thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba/_bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas rab tu brtan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad med pa dang ldan pa/_sems can gyi stobs dang /_blo'i stobs rnam par dbye bar bya 
[\[174b.7\]]ba shin tu rnam par phye ba chags pa med pa'i ye shes mngon du gyur pa rang byung gi ye shes dang mthun pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la shes rab dang ye shes kyi man ngag yang dag par tshol ba/_sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad las gdams ngag 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]yang dag par blangs pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthar thug par gnas pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par skye bar 'gyur te/_sems bskyed pa de bskyed ma thag tu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[175a.2\]]chen po so so'i skye bo'i sa las rab tu 'das pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa shin tu non pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa yin/_rigs brjod pa la kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/_/
[\[175a.3\]]'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las phyir log pa yin/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam shin tu non pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid la gnas pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa la rab tu gnas pa yin/_dus gsum mnyam 
[\[175a.4\]]pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba yin/_rdzogs pa'i byang chub la shin tu gzhol bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su nges pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/chos kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu 
[\[175a.5\]]dga' ba la mi g.yo ba'i tshul gyis rab tu gnas so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rab tu dga' ba mang ba yin/_yid bde ba mang ba yin/_mos pa mang ba yin/_rangs pa 
[\[175a.6\]]mang ba yin/_mgu ba mang ba yin/_spro ba mang ba yin/_rtsol ba mang ba yin/_'tshe ba med pa mang ba yin/_khro ba med pa mang ba yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[175a.7\]]ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]ba yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i khyad par rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin/_byang chub sems 
[\[175b.2\]]dpa'i spyod yul mi 'phrogs pa rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdams ngag dang lus rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin/_sems can gyi don rab tu thob par bya ba rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[175b.3\]]kyi ye shes la 'jug pa'i thabs rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin/_yang 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi yul las phyir log go_/zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi sa dang nye bar gyur to zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do/_/bdag 
[\[175b.4\]]ni byis pa'i sa las ring du gyur to/_/zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do/_/bdag ni ye shes kyi sa dang nye bar gyur to/_/zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do/_/bdag ni ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad rgyun chad do/_/zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do/_/bdag 
[\[175b.5\]]ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur to/_/zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do/_/bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba dang nye bar gyur to/_/zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do/_/bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la 
[\[175b.6\]]yang dag par 'byung ngo /_/zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do/_/bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid dang ldan par gyur to/_/zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do/_/bdag ni 'jigs pa dang /_bag tsha ba dang sngangs pa dang /_skyi g.ya' ba 
[\[175b.7\]]thams cad dang bral lo/_/zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba 'di thob ma thag tu 'jigs pa'i rnam pa 'di dag 'di lta ste/_'tsho ba med pas 'jigs 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]pa 'am/_mi bsngags pas 'jigs pa 'am/_'chi bas 'jigs pa 'am/_ngan song gis 'jigs pa 'am/_'khor du bag tsha bas 'jigs pa de dag thams cad de la [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yin/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni bdag gi 'du shes dang bral 
[\[176a.2\]]bas de la bdag 'phangs par sems pa 'ang med na/_yo byad thams cad la phangs par sems pa lta ga la yod de/_de'i phyir de la 'tsho ba med pas 'jigs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ni su las kyang rim gror bya ba [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]tsam yang re ba med la gzhan du na bdag nyid kyis 
[\[176a.3\]]sems can de dag la yo byad mang po thams cad kyis bsdud par bya'o/_/snyam du sems pas/_de'i phyir de la mi bsngags pa'i 'jigs pa med do/_/de bdag tu lta ba dang bral bas de la bdag gi 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]de de'i phyir de la 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[176a.4\]]bdag shi nas kyang gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes de'i phyir de la ngan song gi 'jigs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi bsam pa dang 'jig rten na mtshungs pa su yang med 
[\[176a.5\]]na lhag pa lta ga la yod ces de'i phyir de la 'khor du bag tsha ba med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar 'jigs pa dang /_dngangs pa dang bag tsha ba dang skyi g.ya' ba med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas lhag pa'i bsam pa ma nyams 
[\[176a.6\]]shing mi dma' bas de bas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir rab tu brtson par byed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de dad pa la dbang bsgyur ba dang mos pa mang ba dang yid ches pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang rtog pa mang ba dang snying brtse ba dang /_
[\[176a.7\]]snying rjes mngon par bsgrub pa dang byams pa chen po dang ldan pa dang /_yid skyo ba med pa dang ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'i rgyan dang bzod cing des pa dang ldan pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]pa la rim gro dang bkur sti dang ri mo yod pa dang nyin mtshan du mi ngoms par dge ba'i rtsa ba [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang /_chos kyi dga' bas dga' bar gnas pa dang /_mi ngoms par mang du thos pa tshol ba dang /_ji skad du thos pa'i chos la 
[\[176b.2\]]tshul bzhin du rtogs pa dang /_gnas med pa'i yid dang 'thob pa dang bkur sti dang /_bsngags pa la chags pa med pa dang yo byad thams cad la phangs par sems shing chags pa med pa dang sems bskyed pa rin po che lta bus ngoms pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par mngon par bsgrub pa 
[\[176b.3\]]dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis la mngon par mos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la dmigs pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs yongs su tshol ba dang /_sgyu dang g.yo yongs 
[\[176b.4\]]su spangs pa dang /_ji skad du smras pa de ltar byed pa dang /_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bden pa'i tshig gi rjes su bsrung ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la skyon du 'gyur bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa mi gtong ba 
[\[176b.5\]]dang /_ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po chen po ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi sgul ba dang /_'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i lam dang ldan pa dang /_mi 
[\[176b.6\]]ngoms par byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs rab tu [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gong nas gong du khyad par du 'bogs pa'i lam tshol ba dang sa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[176b.7\]]chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa yin te/_de byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba de la shin tu gnas shing rnam pa 'di lta bu'i smon lam chen po dang /_brtson pa chen po dang /_mngon par bsgrub pa chen po 'di dag 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]mngon par sgrub ste/_'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad ma lus pa lhag ma med pa dang mtha' dag la mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i phyir rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa mos pa rgya chen pos rnam par dag pa/_chos kyi dbyings 
[\[177a.2\]]kyis klas par rgya che ba nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug ba/_bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du sangs rgyas skye ba 'grangs pa la rim gro dang /_mchod pa chen po bya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub po/_/'di lta ste/_
[\[177a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par gzung ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub yang dag par blangs pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa yang dag par bsrung 
[\[177a.4\]]ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/_bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'grangs pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i 
[\[177a.5\]]smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub po/_/'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad kyi dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa na bzhugs pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]te/_'pho ba dang gshegs pa dang /_sku 
[\[177a.6\]]na bzhugs pa dang /_skye ba dang /_gzhon nu'i rol pa dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang /_mngon par 'byung ba dang /_dka' ba spyad pa dang /_snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang /_bdud gdul ba dang /_mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gsol 
[\[177a.7\]]ba gdab pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa'i drung du 'gro zhing mchod pa dang /_rim gro bya ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yang dag par gzung ba'i sbyor ba las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa thams cad gcig tu mngon par 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]bsgrub pa'i phyir/_chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'grangs pa'i drung du 'gro ba nas/_mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar 
[\[177b.2\]]gyi drung du 'gro ba rgyun mi chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub po/_/'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa tshad med pa/_mi 'phrogs pa tha mi dad pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis yang dag par bsdus pa/_
[\[177b.3\]]sa yongs su sbyang ba'i yan lag dang nye ba'i yan lag du bcas pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_mtshan nyid dang bye brag gi mtshan nyid du bcas pa dang /_'grub pa dang /_'jig pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod par gtogs pa thams cad 
[\[177b.4\]]dang /_sa ji lta ba bzhin dang /_ji lta bur bstan pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang ba la gdams ngag dang /_man ngag gi sbyin pa nye bar bstan pa'i sems bskyed pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa rgya che ba/_
[\[177b.5\]]nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/_bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du spyod pa 'grangs pa sems bskyed pas mngon par bsgrub pa/_rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo/_/'di lta ste/_
[\[177b.6\]]sems can gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa lhag ma med pa mtha' dag gzugs yod pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'du shes yod pa dang /_'du shes med pa dang /_'du shes yod pa'ang ma yin/_'du shes med pa'ang ma yin pa dang /_sgo nga 
[\[177b.7\]]las skyes pa dang /_mngal las skyes pa dang /_drod gsher las skyes pa dang /_rdzus te byung ba khams gsum du gtogs pa/_'gro ba drug tu 'dus pa/_skye ba thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]par bya ba dang sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzud pa dang /_lam gyi rgyud 'grangs pa thams cad rgyun gcad pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par/_rgya che ba nam mkha'i 
[\[178a.2\]]dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad dang /_sems can 'grangs pa thams cad du sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba la rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo/_/
[\[178a.3\]]'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa dang /_dog pa dang /_rgya chen po dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_phra ba dang /_che ba dang /_snrel zhi dang /_sbyi'u tshugs su rgyu ba thams cad ma lus pa lhag ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mtha' dag gzhi mnyam par yang 
[\[178a.4\]]dag par 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]'phrul gyi rnam pa ltar phyogs bcu'i rnam pa tha dad pa ma lus pa'i rnam pa la 'jug pa/_rnam par phye ba'i ye shes khong du chud cing /_mngon du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyis klas 
[\[178a.5\]]par rgya che ba/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/_bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du/_'jig rten gyi khams 'grangs par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la 'jug cing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/_smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo/_/
[\[178a.6\]]'di lta ste/_zhing thams cad zhing gcig tu yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang /_zhing gcig zhing thams cad du yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang /_yongs su sbyang ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa 'od mang po'i rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan par bya 
[\[178a.7\]]ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad bstsal bas/_yongs su dag pa'i lam dang ldan pa dang /_sems can ye shes kyi 'byung gnas tshad med pas yongs su gang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po la yang dag par gzhol zhing khong du chud 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]par bya ba dang /_bsam pa'i tshul bzhin du sems can rnams la yang dag par bstan cing shin tu tshim par bya ba'i phyir/_chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/_bskal 
[\[178b.2\]]pa 'grangs pa thams cad du zhing 'grang par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo/_/'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bsam pa gcig pha'i sbyor ba dang /_ltod pa med pa'i 
[\[178b.3\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bstsags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa gcig cing mnyam pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'grogs shing [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bral ba dang /_sangs rgyas 'byung ba ci dgar bstan pa dang /_rang gi 
[\[178b.4\]]sems bskyed pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul dang /_mthu dang ye shes khong du chud par bya ba dang /_mnyams shing rjes su 'brang ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob par bya ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu bar bya ba dang /_
[\[178b.5\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gzugs brnyan 'byung ba yang dag par bstan pa dang /_skye ba'i skye gnas thams cad du rang gi lus rjes su 'gro bar bya ba dang /_theg pa chen po bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa dang ldan pa'i/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams 
[\[178b.6\]]cad spyad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/_bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du/_spyod pa 'grangs par theg pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa la rgyun mi 'chad 
[\[178b.7\]]pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo/_/'di lta ste/_phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo la yang dag par gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa dang /_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las don yod par bya ba dang /_mthong ma thag tu 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos gdon mi za bar 'thob par bya ba dang /_dbyangs brjod ma thag tu ye shes khong du chud par bya ba dang /_dad par gyur ma thag tu nyon mongs pa phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang /_bsam pa sman gyi rgyal po chen po lta bu rab tu thob par bya ba dang /_
[\[179a.2\]]lus yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu 'thob par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad spyad pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/_bskal pa 'grangs pa 
[\[179a.3\]]thams cad du phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'grangs par spyod pa thams cad 'bras bu yod pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo/_/'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon 
[\[179a.4\]]par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_skra'i sbubs gcig dang tha mi dad pa'i skra'i sbubs thams cad du tshe dang skye ba dang /_gzhon nu rol pa dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang /_mngon par 'byung ba dang rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_snying po byang chub tu gshegs 
[\[179a.5\]]pa dang /_bdud 'dul ba dang mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gsol ba gdab pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po bstan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul dang mthu dang ye shes chen po khong du chud par 
[\[179a.6\]]bya ba dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang /_skad cig gcig tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_rab tu zhi ba thob par bya ba yang dag par bstan pa dang /_mngon par 'tshang rgya ba gcig gis chos
