[\[179a.7\]]kyi dbyings thams cad 'phrul pas rgyas par dgang pa dang /_dbyangs gcig brjod pas sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sems dang /_bsam pa shin tu tshim par bya ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yongs su bstan pa dang /_spyod pa rnams 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba dang /_theg pa chen po'i sa la chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa yang dag par bstan pa dang /_chos shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rgyu dang /_mngon par shes pa dang dbang gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad sprul pas rnam par dgang ba'i phyir/_
[\[179b.2\]]chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/_bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba 'grangs par ye shes chen po'i mngon par shes pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon 
[\[179b.3\]]lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar rnam pa 'di lta bu'i smon lam chen po dang /_brtson 'grus chen po dang /_mngon par bsgrub pa chen po'i smon lam gyi sgo bcu po 'di dag las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa/_smon lam brgya stong 
[\[179b.4\]]grangs med pa phrag bcu tshang ba dag_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas thob bo/_/mngon par sgrub bo/_/smon lam de dag kyang mthar thug pa'i gnas bcus mngon par bsgrub ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[179b.5\]]sems can gyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dang /_nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang /_chos kyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[179b.6\]]'byung ba'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dang /_sems kyi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang /_ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi 
[\[179b.7\]]rgyud dang /_chos kyi rgyud dang /_ye shes kyi rgyud kyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dag go/_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po bcu bzhi pa/_de ltar smon lam chen po 'di dag sems can gyi 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]khams kyi mthar gang du thug pa de'i mthar thug par gyur cig_/smon lam chen po 'di dag 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtha' gang du thug pa dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang chos kyi khams dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams dang /_sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i khams dang /_
[\[180a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi khams dang /_sems can gyi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i khams dang /_ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i khams dang /_'jig rten gyi rgyud dang /_chos kyi rgyud dang /_ye shes kyi rgyud kyi khams kyi mtha' gang du thug pa/_de'i mthar 
[\[180a.3\]]thug par gyur cig_/'di ltar sems can gyi khams mthar thug pa med pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams dang /_sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i khams dang /_de bzhin 
[\[180a.4\]]gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi khams dang /_sems can gyi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i khams dang /_ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i khams dang /_'jig rten gyi rgyud dang /_chos kyi rgyud dang /_ye shes kyi rgyud kyi khams mthar thug pa med pa de bzhin du smon 
[\[180a.5\]]lam chen po 'di dag kyang mthar thug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par gyur te/_bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag kyang /_mthar thug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par gyur cig ces de ltar smon lam shin tu bsgrubs shing phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_'jam pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_las su 
[\[180a.6\]]rung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_dul ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_nye bar zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_mnyen pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_'khrugs pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_
[\[180a.7\]]glong ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa de ni legs par rtog pa mang zhing dad pa dang ldan pa yin te/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'i rgyud la yid ches 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]pa yin/_pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsdu ba la yid ches pa yin/_sa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_khyad par du 'gyur ba la mngon par yid ches pa yin/_stobs yongs su 'grub pa la 
[\[180b.2\]]mngon par yid ches pa yin/_mi 'jigs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba la mngon par yid ches pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa mi 'phrogs pa la mngon par yid ches pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa 
[\[180b.3\]]la mngon par yid ches pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' dang dbus med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mngon par yid ches pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba'i rjes su 'jug pa la 
[\[180b.4\]]mngon par yid ches pa yin/_'bras bu yongs su grub pa la mngon par yid ches pa yin te/_mdor bsdu na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang /_ye shes kyi bar du shin tu bstan pa'i 
[\[180b.5\]]byin gyi rlabs la mngon par yid ches pa yin no/_/yang de 'di snyam du sems te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag de ltar rgya che zhing de ltar zab la de ltar dben zhing de ltar zhi ba ste/_de ltar stong la de ltar mtshan ma med cing de ltar smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_
[\[180b.6\]]de ltar chags pa med de/_/de ltar gos pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing de ltar tshad med la sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag de ltar rlabs chen 'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag lta ba ngan par ltung ba'i rgyud dang /_ma rig pa'i mun nag dang /_rab rib thibs pos 
[\[180b.7\]]kun nas khebs pa'i yid dang /_nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan shin tu bsgrengs pa'i yongs su rtog pa dang /_sred pa'i dra bas mngon par ye rngam pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_sgyu dang g.yo'i thibs po la rjes su spyod pa'i sems dang /_bsam pa dang phrag dog dang 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]'jungs pa can gyi kun nas 'khor bas lam gyi rgyud du skye ba'i kun tu 'brel ba dang /_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /_gti mug la spyod pa'i las shin tu bstsags pa dang /_khro ba dang khon du 'dzin pas 'bar bar byas pa'i sems 
[\[181a.2\]]kyi me lce dang /_phyin ci log dang bcas pa'i las mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_'dod pa dang sred pa'i ma rig pa dang /_lta ba dang kun tu zab pa'i bag chags mtshams 'brel ba'i sems dang /_yid dang rnam par shes pa'i sa bon gyis 'di lta ste/_khams gsum 
[\[181a.3\]]du ming dang gzugs lhan cig tu/_skyes shing tha mi dad par byung ba'i yang skye ba'i sdug bsngal gyi myu gu mngon par skyed do/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs de rnam par 'phel nas skye mched drug gi tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/skye mched rnams byung bas phan 
[\[181a.4\]]tshun reg pa dang phrad cing 'dus pas tshor ba mngon par 'byung ngo /_/tshor ba myong ba de nyid la yang dang yang mngon par dga' bas sred pa dang nye bar len pa rnam par 'phel lo/_/nye bar len pa rnam par 'phel bas/_srid pa kun tu 
[\[181a.5\]]'byung ngo /_/srid pa kun tu 'byung bas skye ba dang /_rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi phung po 
[\[181a.6\]]bdag dang bdag gi [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gsob gsog stong ba byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_sems med pa rtsa dang shing dang /_rtsig pa dang /_sgang sgong dang mig yor lta bu mngon par 'byung ba yang de ltar khong du [{]myi [,]mi [}]chud do zhes/_de la byang chub sems dpas sems can 
[\[181a.7\]]de dag de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po dang 'bral mi myong ba mthong nas/_de'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po rgyas par 'byung ste/_sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis yongs su bskyab par bya ba dag go_/yongs su dgrol bar bya ba dag go_/shin tu bde ba la 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]dgod par bya ba dag go snyam ste/_de'i phyir de'i byams pa chen po rgyas par 'byung ngo /_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' snying rje dang byams pa de lta bu'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la 
[\[181b.2\]]gnas pa'i tshe/_dngos po thams cad la phangs par sems pa'i sems yongs su spangs nas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos pa dang /_dad pa rlabs po che'i blos sbyin pa chen po la rab tu brtson par byed de/_de 'di ltar 'di lta ste/_nor dang /_'bru'i mdzod 
[\[181b.3\]]dang /_bang ba yongs su gtang bar bya ba dag gam/_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_rin po che shi la dang /_byi ru dang /_dngul dang /_sa le sbram yongs su gtang bar bya ba 'am/_rin po che'i rgyan dang /_lhab lhub yongs su gtang ba 'am rta dang /_
[\[181b.4\]]glang po dang /_shing rta dang rkang tang dang /_bzhon pa yongs su gtang ba 'am/_bran pho dang /_bran mo yongs su gtad ba 'am/_grong dang grong khyer dang /_ljongs dang /_pho brang 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i gnas yongs su gtang ba'am/_bza' shing gi ra ba dang /_dka' 
[\[181b.5\]]thub kyi nags tshal dang /_gtsug lag khang yongs su gtang ba'am/_chung ma dang bu dang bu mo yongs su gtang ba'am/_sdug cing yid du 'ong ba'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtang ba'am/_mgo dang rna ba dang rka lag dang [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang yan lag gi dam pa dang /_
[\[181b.6\]]lus thams cad yongs su gtang ba 'am/_gtang bar bya ba'i dngos po de dag thams cad la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dad pa dang /_mos pa'i blos yongs su gtong ste/_de ltar de byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po 'di la gnas 
[\[181b.7\]]pa'i tshe gtong ba chen po rab tu byed do/_/de de ltar byams pa dang snying rje dang gtong ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir yang dang yang 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i don yongs su tshol zhing don 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]du gnyer to/_/de de ltar yongs su tshol zhing don du gnyer ba'i tshe/_yongs su skyo ba'i sems mi skye ste/_de'i phyir de'i yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems mngon par 'byung ngo /_/yongs su skyo ba med pas gtsug lag thams cad la 
[\[182a.2\]]'jigs pa med pa yin/_de'i phyir de gtsug lag thams cad la rab tu shes pa yin te/_de de lta bu'i gtsug lag dang ldan pas bya ba dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya ba shin tu rtogs pa'i blos sems can rab 'bring dang tha ma la dad pa'i tshul ji lta ba dang /_
[\[182a.3\]]ci 'os pas ci nus su snying thag pa nas yang dag pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do/_/nan tan du byed do/_de'i phyir de 'jig rten shes pa yin te/_'jig rten shes pas dus dang tshod du ran par spyod cing ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pas bsam 
[\[182a.4\]]pa shin tu brgyan pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don du rab tu brtson par byed de/_de'i phyir ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa yin/_sbyor ba de dag la'ang 'byung bar spyod pa yin/_phyir mi zlogs shing phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus dang stobs kyi shugs kyang 
[\[182a.5\]]rab tu thob pa yin te/_de ltar de'i dga' ba'i stobs dang shugs yongs su skyes pa yin/_dga' ba'i stobs dang shugs rab tu thob pas de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gro bya ba la rab tu brtson zhing bstan pa la 'ang nan tan shin tu 
[\[182a.6\]]byed do/_/de ltar de'i sa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos 'di lta ste/_dad pa dang snying rje dang /_byams pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_skyo ba med pa dang /_gtsug lag shes pa dang /_'jig rten shes pa dang /_khrel yod cing ngo tsha shes pa dang /_dga' ba'i 
[\[182a.7\]]stobs kyi shugs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i nan tan yongs su skyes pa yin no/_/de de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba 'di la gnas pa'i tshe lta ba rgya chen po dang /_smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]mang po rab tu snang bar 'gyur te/_lta ba rgya chen po dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_
[\[182b.2\]]sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag mang po dang sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro/_/des de bzhin gshegs 
[\[182b.3\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas bsam pa rgya chen pos rim gro byed do/_/bkur sti byed do/_bsti stang byed do/_/mchod pa byed do/_/na bza' dang bsod snyoms dang /_gzims ca dang snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /_
[\[182b.4\]]yo byad dag kyang 'bul zhing /_byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo/_/dge 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la 'ang yang dag par mchod par byed de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[182b.5\]]pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/_/de ltar des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mchod pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba mngon par 'grub pa yin/_de bsdu ba'i dngos po sbyin pa dang /_ngag snyan pa gnyis kyi shas che bas 
[\[182b.6\]]sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/de'i mos pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po gong ma gnyis kyang yongs su 'grub par 'gyur te/_ma lus par khong du chud par ni ma yin no/_/de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu 
[\[182b.7\]]las sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shas che ba yin te/_lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par mi bsgrub pa ma yin no/_/de ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa byed cing sems can yongs su smin 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]par bya ba la brtson pa dang /_sa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos 'di dag yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta de ltar de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa de dag de bas kyang shas cher shin tu byang 
[\[183a.2\]]ba dang /_yongs su dag pa dang las su rung bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_mgar ba mkhas pas gser gyi sa le sbram/_ji lta ji ltar myer bsregs pa de lta de ltar shin tu byang zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_ci 
[\[183a.3\]]dgar las su rung bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa byed cing sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba la brtson par byed pa dang /_
[\[183a.4\]]sa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta de ltar de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa de dag shin tu byang ba dang /_yongs su dag pa dang /_ci dgar las su rung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[183a.5\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/gzhan yang sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po de nyid kyi rnam pa dang /_'thob par bya ba dang /_rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[183a.6\]]dpa' dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen las yongs su btsal zhing yongs su dri bar bya'o/_/sa'i yan lag yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir yang ngoms [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes par byas te/_des byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems 
[\[183a.7\]]dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa dang /_drug pa dang /_bdun pa dang /_brgyad pa dang /_dgu pa dang /_bcu pa'i rnam pa dang /_thob par bya ba dang /_rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen las yongs su btsal zhing yongs su dri bar bya'o/_/sa'i yan lag yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir yang ngoms mi shes par bya'o/_/des sa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la mkhas par bya'o/_/sa 'grub pa dang 'jig pa 
[\[183b.2\]]la mkhas par bya'o/_/sa'i rnam pa dang /_rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu la mkhas par bya'o/_/sa 'thob par bya ba dang rnam par bsgom pa la mkhas par bya'o/_/sa'i rnam pa yongs su sbyang ba la mkhas par bya'o/_/sa nas sar 'phar ba la 
[\[183b.3\]]mkhas par bya'o/_/sa dang sa la rnam par gnas pa la mkhas par bya'o/_/sa nas sa'i gnas gzhan du 'pho bar bya ba la mkhas par bya'o/_/sa nas sar yongs su sbyang ba'i khyad par gyi ye shes la mkhas par bya'o/_/sa nas sa thob nas phyir mi ldog 
[\[183b.4\]]pa'i ye shes la mkhas par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su sbyang bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa gnan pa la mkhas par bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i rnam pa 
[\[183b.5\]]mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa ni sa dang po las gyen du ma bskyod par sa bcu'i bar du gnan cing thob par bya ba thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gro ba dang /_sa'i ye shes snang bas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes snang ba 'ang rab tu thob bo/_/
[\[183b.6\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_ded dpon chen po mkhas pas lam grogs yongs su gdon pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/_grong rdal chen po'i sar phyin par bya bar/_'dod pa ni thog ma nas lam dang lam gyi yon tan dang /_lam las gol ba'i 
[\[183b.7\]]nyes pa dang lam gyi bar mal gyi khyad par dang /_lam gyi bar mal 'khrul na nyes par 'gyur ba dang /_lam du bya mi bya dang /_brgyags bshams pa yongs su tshol zhing kun tu 'dri'o/_/thog ma'i lam gyi bar mal nas ma 'phags pa nas grong 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]rdal du phyin gyi bar du shin tu mkhas pa yin/_lam gyi bar ma la de nas ma 'phags par de nyid nas shes pas shin tu brtags pa'i blo dang brgyags kyi tshogs chen po phun sum tshogs pas lam grogs mang po rnams nyam nyes [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[184a.2\]]par grong rdal chen po der phyin par byed de/_mya ngam dang dgon pa'i nyes pas bdag dang lam grogs rnams la gnod par mi 'gyur bar byed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ded dpon mkhas pa 
[\[184a.3\]]yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas shing sa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la mkhas pa dang /_sa 'grub pa dang 'jig pa la mkhas pa dang /_sa'i rnam pa dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu la mkhas pa dang /_sa 'thob par bya 
[\[184a.4\]]ba dang /_rnam par bsgom pa la mkhas pa dang /_sa'i yan lag yongs su sbyang ba la mkhas pa dang /_sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa dang /_sa nas sar rnam par gnas pa la mkhas pa dang /_sa nas sar khyad par du 'gyur ba'i ye shes la 
[\[184a.5\]]mkhas pa dang /_sa nas sa thob pa las phyir mi ldog pa la mkhas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su sbyang bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa gnon pa la mkhas par gyur pa de'i tshe/_bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po'i 
[\[184a.6\]]brgyags yongs su gzung ba dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs chen po la rnam par dbye ba shin tu byas pa dang /_sems can gyi lam grogs mang po yongs su gdon pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong rdal chen por phyin par bya bar 
[\[184a.7\]]'dod cing thog ma nas sa'i lam dang /_sa'i lam gyi yon tan dang /_sa'i lam gol ba'i nyes pa dang /_sa'i lam gyi bar mal gyi khyad par dang /_sa'i lam gyi bar mal 'khrul na nyes par 'gyur ba dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]chen po'i brgyags bshams shing ba[{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dag kyang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dag dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag las yongs su tshol shing yongs su 'dri ste/_de lam gyi bar mal dang po nas gyen du ma 'phags par 
[\[184b.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong rdal chen por phyin par bya ba'i bar du mkhas pa yin/_de de ltar ye shes kyis rnam par rtog pa'i blo dang /_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i brgyags phun sum tshogs pas sems can gyi lam grogs kyi 
[\[184b.3\]]tshogs chen po yongs su smyin pa'i tshul bzhin du 'khor ba'i mya ngam dang dgon pa brgal dka' ba las bsgral te thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi grong rdal chen po'i bar phyin par byed cing 'khor ba'i mya ngan dang dgon pa'i nyes pas sems 
[\[184b.4\]]can lam grogs sam bdag la gnod par yang mi 'gyur bar byed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su skyo ba med pa'i yid kyis sa yongs su sbyang ba'i khyad par la brtson 
[\[184b.5\]]par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyis gnan pa'i bar du yang mkhas par bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po rab tu 
[\[184b.6\]]dga' ba'i sgor 'jug pa mdor bsdus te bstan pa'o/_/rgya cher ni shin tu bstan pa brgya stong grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la rnam pa'i mur thug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_bskal pa grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mthar thug par shin tu bstan pa'i tshul gyis khong du chud par bya'o/_/
[\[184b.7\]]de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phal cher 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal por 'gyur te/_srid chen po la dbang sgyur ba rab tu thob cing chos kyis yongs su bskyang ba dang /_sems can rnams sbyin pa chen pos yongs su bsdu 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]ba la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin/_sems can rnams kyi 'jungs pa'i dri ma bzlog pa la mkhas pa yin/_sbyin pa chen po rtsom pas yongs su dub par mi 'gyur ba yin/_de sbyin pa 'am ngag snyan pa 'am/_
[\[185a.2\]]don bsgrub pa 'am/_don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/_de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/_gtso bor 'gyur/_thu bor 'gyur/_phul du 'gyur/_dam par 'gyur/_bla na med 
[\[185a.3\]]par 'gyur/_'dren par 'gyur/_rnam par 'dren par 'gyur/_yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste/_sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang /_chos yid la bya ba dang /_dge 'dun 
[\[185a.4\]]yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang /_stobs yid la bya ba dang /_
[\[185a.5\]]mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas/_rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin/_de 'dod na skad cig 
[\[185a.6\]]yud tsam thang cig tu/_khyim dang chung ma dang srid thams cad yongs su spangs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_rab tu byung nas kyang skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin brgya rab tu 
[\[185a.7\]]'thob cing snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas brgya mthong ba dang /_de dag gis byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang /_'jig rten khams brgya skyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyar 'gro ba dang /_'jig rten 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]gyi khams brgya snang bar bya ba dang /_sems can brgya yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_bskal pa brgyar gnas par bya ba dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa brgya la rab tu 'jug pa dang /_chos kyi sgo brgya rnam par 'byed pa dang /_
[\[185b.2\]]lus brgya yangs su bstan pa dang /_lus re re la byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor brgya yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo/_/de yan cad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad 
[\[185b.3\]]par gyis rnam par 'phrul te de dag gis lus sam 'od dang rdzu 'phrul lam [{]myig [,]mig [}]gam spyod yul lam/_dbyangs sam spyod pa 'am rgyan tam byin gyi rlabs sam mos pa 'am/_mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya phrag du ma 
[\[185b.4\]]dang /_bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas kyang bgrang bar dka'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang 
[\[185b.5\]]bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/de dag dkar po'i chos bstsags dge ba mthun ldan zhing /_/bde gshegs yongs su bsnyen bkur snying rje byams ldan la/_/dad pa rgya che dge sems ngang tshul dag ldan 
[\[185b.6\]]pa/_/rgyal ba'i ye shes don du rlabs chen sems kyang bskyed/_/rgyal ba'i chos rdzogs 'gro ba yongs su bskyab don du/_/thams cad mkhyen pa sangs rgyas stobs sbyong brtan mthu can/_/brtse ba chen pos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor 
[\[185b.7\]]bya bas/_/rgyal ba'i zhing sbyong sems kyi dam pa rab tu bskyed/_/'gro bar rnam pa sna tshogs dus rnams bstan pa'i phyir/_/'dren pa kun gyi yon tan thams cad 'dod tshol zhing /_/dus gsum skad cig gcig tu mi rtog shes byed 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]pa'i/_/mkha' 'dra shin tu yangs pa'i sems dang ldan par byed/_/shes rab dbang sgyur snying rje sngun 'gro thabs ldan zhing /_/mos dang bsam pa rnam dag stobs kyis tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_/chags [{]myed [,]med [}]mngon gyur 
[\[186a.2\]]gzhan gyi dring la [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog pa/_/bde gshegs rnams dang mnyam gyur sems kyi dam pa bskyed/_/bde gshegs sras sems rin chen yang dag skyes 'phral du/_/byis pa'i spyod bral sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod dang ldan/_/stobs bcu mnga' 
[\[186a.3\]]rigs kha na ma tho med par skyes/_/bde gshegs mnyam nyid rjes rtogs byang chub mchog tu nges/_/'di 'dra'i sems dang sa thob lhan cig mngon par skye/_/bsam pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo ri yi rgyal po 'dra bar gnas/_/rab tu dga' zhing spros mang dad 
[\[186a.4\]]dang ldan pa ste/_/mos pa'i shugs yangs rtag par sems kyi mchog dang ldan/_/'khrugs dang 'tshe ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing khro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_/ngo tsha shes shing sri zhu dran ldan shin tu bsdams/_/'gro ba yongs su bskyab pa'i mtshungs med ye shes dran gyur cing /_
[\[186a.5\]]'dod par bya ba'i gnas dang ldan gyur dga' ba skyed/_/sa thob gyur ma thag tu 'jigs pa lnga dang bral/_/'tsho ba med dang 'chi dang mi bsngags ngan 'gro dang /_/'khor gyi 'jigs bral de la bag tsha'i rnam pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/ci phyir zhe na de la bdag gi gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[186a.6\]]do/_/de dag bag tsha bral zhing snying rje byams dang ldan/_/bsti stang dang ldan dga' ba phun sum yon tan mang /_/nyin dang mtshan du dge ba'i phyogs la sten byed cing /_/sems can don du chos brtson 'dod bskyed phyir ma yin/_/dge ba'i chos thos bsam la 
[\[186a.7\]]mkhas shing gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]spyod/_/'thob sems sred bral byang chub sems la rtag par dga'/_/bde gshegs ye shes 'dod cing gzhan du sems pa med/_/pha rol phyin pa tshol zhing sgyu dang g.yo yang spangs/_/ci smras de bzhin byed pas bden pa'i tshig 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]la gnas/_/rgyal ba'i rigs skyon mi 'gyur byang chub slob la spyod/_/'jig rten las kyi bsam bral 'gro ba'i don du brtson/_/dkar pos ngoms pa med par phyir zhing gong du rtsol/_/de dag 'di 'dra'i chos brtson yon tan don dang ldan/_/rgyal 
[\[186b.2\]]ba blta ba'i don du smon lam mngon par sgrub/_/dam chos yongs su gzung zhing drang srong drung 'gro dang /_/spyod pa mchog gi don du smon lam mngon par sgrub/_/sems can yongs su smin bya sangs rgyas zhing sbyangs te/_/de yi zhing mchog rgyal 
[\[186b.3\]]sras kun gyis gang 'gyur zhing /_/rgyal sras rnams dang bsam pa gcig cing don mthun phyir/_/skra sbubs kun tu don gyi dam pa mngon 'tshang rgya/_/de dag smon lam du ma mngon par bsgrub pa byed/_/de dag mtha' yas yangs shing 
[\[186b.4\]]mthar thug med dang ldan/_/nam mkha'i khams dang chos nyid mya ngan 'das khams dang /_/'jig rten mthar thug rgyal ba 'byung dang ye shes sa/_/sems kyi yul dang ye shes 'jug pa'i mthar 
[\[186b.5\]]thug dang /_/rnam gsum rgyud rnams mthar thug 'gro ba'i mur thug pa/_/rnam pa de tshul bdag smon mthar yang thug gyur cing /_/de dag mthar thug ji bzhin bdag spyod de 'drar shog_/de ltar mngon bsgrubs 'jam zhing byams pa'i sems ldan 
[\[186b.6\]]pa/_/sangs rgyas yon tan yid ches sems can rnam par lta/_/sems can sdug bsngal nyon mongs bdag gis bskyab ces te/_/rten 'brel 'byung 'jug snying rje byams dang ldan pa ni/_de dag don du sna tshogs sbyin pa yang du rtsom/_/rgyal srid mchog 
[\[186b.7\]]dang rin chen sna tshogs glang po rta/_/mgo dang rkang lag [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang de bzhin bdag nyid sha/_/thams cad yongs su gtang yang zhum pa'i yid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gtsug lag sna tshogs tshol yang yongs su skyo ba [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/gtsug lag 'jig rten 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]spyod pa'i rjes kyang bar du snyegs/_/'jig rten shes dang ldan zhing khrel yod dga' dang ldan/_/bde gshegs gcig [{]myin [,]min [}]rim gro rjes su mchod pa byed/_/de ltar mkhas pa nyin mtshan rtag tu brtson pa yi/_/dge ba [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[187a.2\]]bcug gser bzhin shin tu dag par 'gyur/_/de dag sa rnams bcu po 'di la sbyangs byas shing /_/thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par chags med rab tu thob par 'gyur/_/ji ltar ded dpon lam grogs mang la phan brtson pa/_/lam gyi yon tan dri zhing bde ba'i 
[\[187a.3\]]grong du skyel/_/de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dang po'i sa gnas pa/_/'gro ba'i don bshams chags med sa bcu rab tu 'thob/_/'di gnas yon tan ldan pa mi yi dbang por 'gyur/_/byams pa'i sems kyis sa rnams yongs su skyong /_/
[\[187a.4\]]'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan srid kun rab tu skyong byed cing /_/sbyin pas 'gro ba sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la dgod/_/khyu mchog dam pa 'dod na rgyal srid rab tu gtong /_/rgyal ba'i bstan pa rab tu byung zhing brtson 'grus rtsom/_/ting 'dzin 
[\[187a.5\]]brgya dang sangs rgyas brgya rnams mthong bar byed/_/zhing brgya skyod cing rab tu snang byed kun tu 'gro/_/sems can brgya sbyong chos kyi sgo la 'god pa byed/_/bskal pa brgyar 'jug lus brgya rab tu ston pa byed/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyang brgya yi 
[\[187a.6\]]grangs tshangs yongs su ston/_/de yi gong na smon mchog stobs ldan tshad kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/bdag gis don du mdor bsdus te/_/sa rnams khyed la bshad pa byas/_/rgya che bskal pa bye bar yang /_/thams cad zad par mi nus so/_/
[\[187a.7\]]de ltar sa yi dang po 'di/_/'jig rten kun la phan sems pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' mchog rnams la/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyis bstan pa yin/_/rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ste/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po/_/sa mchog 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]yid du 'ong ba 'di/_/gnas kyi dam pa thob gyur nas/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i sras kyi rnams/_/yid rtog dang zhing rab tu dga'/_/kun kyang stan las langs gyur te/_/mkha' yi dbyings la mngon 'phags nas/_/me tog sil ma rab tu 
[\[187b.2\]]'thor/_legs zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang brjod/_/rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med pa/_/shes rab chen po legs so legs/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ste/_/sa 'di khyod kyis legs par bshad/_/'khor 'di rnam par dang zhing gsal/_/
[\[187b.3\]]rnam grol zla ba 'di yang 'dri/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyi gong du yang /_/sa gnyis rab tu brjod pa mdzod/_/yid kyi rtog pa ci 'dra bas/_/sa gnyis pa ni 'thob 'gyur ba/_/shes rab chen pos bshad par mdzod/_/rgyal ba'i sras rnams nyan par 
[\[187b.4\]]'dod/_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sa dang po la yongs su sbyang ba byas pa des gnyis pa la mngon par mos pa yin te/_de'i sems kyi bsam pa bcu 
[\[187b.5\]]'byung ngo /_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_drang po'i bsam pa dang /_'jam pa'i bsam pa dang /_las su rung ba'i bsam pa dang /_dul ba'i bsam pa dang /_zhi ba'i bsam pa dang /_dge ba'i bsam pa dang /_ma 'dres pa'i bsam pa 
[\[187b.6\]]dang /_mi ltos pa'i bsam pa dang rlabs po che'i bsam pa dang /_bdag nyid che ba'i bsam pa dang /_sems kyi bsam pa bcu po 'di dag 'byung ste/_de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dri ma bral ba la gnas pa 
[\[187b.7\]]yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa dri ma dang bral ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis srog gcod pa dang bral ba yin te/_dbyig pa spangs mtshon cha spangs/_khon du 'dzin pa spangs 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]shing ngo tsha dang ldan pas srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la phan pa dang bde bas phan 'dogs shing byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin te/_de yid kyi yongs su rtog pa tsam gyis kyang srog chags la 'tshe ba mi byed na 
[\[188a.2\]]sems can gzhan la sems can du 'du shes shing ched du bsams te/_lus la gtse ba chen po bya ba lta ci smos/_bdag gi longs spyod gyis chog shes shing gzhan gyi longs spyod la re ba med pas ma byin par len pa dang bral ba yin te/_de gzhan 
[\[188a.3\]]gyis yongs su bzung ba'i dngos po la gzhan gyis yongs su bzung bar 'du shes shing rku sems nye bar bzhag ste/_chung ngu na rtswa dang lo ma yang ma byin par mi len na 'tsho ba'i yo byad gzhan lta ci smos/_bdag gi chung mas chog shes shing gzhan gyi chung ma la re ba med pas 
[\[188a.4\]]'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang bral ba yin te/_de gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba'i bud [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhan gyi chung ma rus dang mtshan ma dang chos kyis bsrung ba rnams la chags sems kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye na gnyis kyis gnyis phrad par bya ba lta ci smos/_/yang 
[\[188a.5\]]dag par smra zhing bden par smra ba dang /_dus su smra ba dang /_tshod du smra ba la ji skad du smras pa de bzhin du byed pas/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang bral ba yin te/_de chung ngu na rmi lam du yang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig mi brjod na/_ched du bsams te brjod pa lta ci smos/_
[\[188a.6\]]de sems can gyi dbyen mi byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]'tshe ba la zhugs pas/_phra ma'i tshig dang bral ba yin te/_de dag dbye ba'i phyir tshu bi las thos shing pha bir snyod pa ma yin/_pha bi las thos nas tshu bir snyod pa ma yin te/_'dum pa rnams dbye bar mi byed/_bye 
[\[188a.7\]]ba rnams la dpar bas mi rnon te/_/mi 'dum pa la dga' zhing mi 'dum pa la mos pa ma yin pas bden nam rdzun yang rung mi 'dum par bya ba'i tshig mi smra'o/_/zhe gcod pa'i tshig dang bral ba yin te/_snyogs pa dang /_brlang ba dang /_rtsub pa dang /_gzhan 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]la gnod pa dang /_zhe snad par gyur pa dang /_nyes pa ngor brjod pa dang /_nyes pa ngor brjod pa la gzhol ba dang /_grong ma'i tshig dang /_ma rabs kyi tshig dang /_gzungs su bzung ba ma yin pa dang /_rnar mi snyan pa dang /_khro ba dang gshe ba las byung ba dang /_
[\[188b.2\]]snying na bar byed pa dang /_yid yongs su gdung bar byed pa dang /_mi snyan pa dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba dang /_bdag dang gzhan gyi sems ma rung bar byed pa'i tshig gi rnam pa de lta bu spangs te/_gang 'di 'jam pa dang yid du 'ong ba dang /_snyan pa dang /_gzungs 
[\[188b.3\]]su bzung ba dang /_rnar 'ong ba dang /_snying du sdug pa dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi tshig dang /_gtsigs pa dang /_gsal ba dang /_'go ba dang mnyan par 'os pa dang /_mi gnas pa dang /_skye bo mang po dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong ba dang /_
[\[188b.4\]]mkhas pas bsngags pa dang /_sems can thams cad la phan zhing bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_yid bde bar byed pa dang /_yid sim par byed pa dang /_bdag dang gzhan gyi sems dang bar byed pa dang /_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang /_
[\[188b.5\]]nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i tshig gi rnam pa de lta bu dag brjod do/_/tshig kyal pa spangs pa yin te/_legs par lan glon pa'i tshig dang /_dus su smra ba dang /_bden par smra ba dang /_don du smra ba dang /_chos su smra ba dang /_rigs par smra ba dang /_
[\[188b.6\]]dul bar smra ba dang /_dus la bab par shin tu go ba'i gtan tshigs dang bcas par smra bar de chung ngu na bzhad gad du bya ba tsam gyi tshig la yang yongs su spang bar bya ba yongs su spong na dgos pa don du gnyer cing tshig gis rnam par 'khrug pa lta ci smos/_chags 
[\[188b.7\]]sems med pa yin te/_de gzhan gyi nor dang /_gzhan gyi 'dod pa dang /_gzhan dbang ba'i yo byad gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la ji ltar na/_gang gzhan gyi yin pa de dag bdag gir 'gyur zhes te/_chags sems mi bskyed mi re mi smon 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]cing 'dod pa'i sems mi bskyed do/_/gnod sems dang bral ba yin te/_sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i sems dang snying brtse ba'i sems dang /_bde ba'i sems dang /_'jam pa'i sems 
[\[189a.2\]]dang /_'gro ba thams cad la phan gdags pa'i sems dang /_'byung po thams cad la phan zhing snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pas/_gang 'di khro ba dang /_mdud par 'dzin pa dang /_thab dang dri ma dang gnod sems dang khong khro ba la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa de dag spangs te/_
[\[189a.3\]]gang 'di phan pa dang ldan pa/_byams pa dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde bar bya ba'i phyir rnam par rtog cing /_rnam par dpyod pa de dag la rnam par rtog pa yin/_yang dag par lta ba dang ldan zhing ngo mtshar dang bkra shis 
[\[189a.4\]]dang /_ngang tshul ngan pa'i lta ba sna tshogs dang bral ba yin te/_lta ba drang zhing g.yo med la sgyu med pas sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang dge 'dun la bsam pa nges pa yin/_de dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung zhing 'di ltar sems 
[\[189a.5\]]kyi bsam pa mngon par sgrub ste/_sems can rnams kyi ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba yod pa gang yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad mi dge ba bcu'i lam yongs su blangs pa'i rgyu las byung gis bdag gis ni 'di ltar bdag 
[\[189a.6\]]nyid yang dag pa'i nan tan la gnas te/_gzhan yang yang dag pa'i nan tan la dgod par bya'o/_/yang dag pa'i nan tan la gnas par bstan to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag log pa'i nan tan la gnas shing /_gzhan yang dag pa'i nan tan la dgod par bya ba 'di ni gnas med skabs med pa ste/_'di 
[\[189a.7\]]ni mi srid do/_/zhes nas yang de 'di ltar rnam par dpyod de/_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag yongs su bzung ba'i rgyus sems can dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du skye ba rnams yod par gyur to/_/
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su bzung bas ni mir skye ba la sogs pa srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du skye ba yod par gyur to/_/de'i gong du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag nyi tse'i sems dang khams gsum pas skrag pa'i yid dang /_snying rje chen po 
[\[189b.2\]]med pa dang /_gzhan las thos pa'i sgra'i rjes su 'brang ba'i shes rab kyis rnam par yongs su bsgoms na nyan thos kyi theg pa yongs su sgrub po/_/de'i gong du gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /_rang mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_snying rje chen po 
[\[189b.3\]]dang /_thabs mkhas pa med pa dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab par khong du chud pas yongs su sbyangs na/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su sgrub po/_/de'i gong du yangs shing tshad med pa'i sems dang /_snying brtse zhing snying rje dang ldan 
[\[189b.4\]]pa dang /_thabs mkhas pas yang dag par gzung ba dang /_smon lam chen po shin tu gdab pa dang /_/sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya chen po la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas yongs su sbyangs na/_byang chub 
[\[189b.5\]]sems dpa'i sa yongs su dag pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa rgya chen po yongs su bsgrub par 'gyur ro/_/de'i gong du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag nyid rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par yongs su sbyangs pas 
[\[189b.6\]]stobs bcu'i stobs thob par 'gyur ba dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'thob pa nas rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su 'grub pa yang dag par sgrub bo/_/de lta bas na bdag gis dge ba bcu'i las mngon par bsgrub du 'dra ba la rnam pa 
[\[189b.7\]]thams cad du yongs su sbyang zhing mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson par bya'o zhes nas/_de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag bsten pa dang /_bsgoms pa dang mang du byas pa'i shas che bas ni sems can dmyal 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/'bring gis ni byol song gi skye gnas [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]rgyur 'gyur ro/_/tha mas ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyur 'gyur te/_de la srog gcod pas na sems can dmyal bar khrid do/_/byol song gi skye gnas su 
[\[190a.2\]]khrid do/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/_/de nas ci ste mir skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par 'grub pa 'di lta ste/_tshe thung ba dang nad mang ba'o/_/ma byin par len pas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do/_/byol song gi skye 
[\[190a.3\]]gnas su khrid do/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/_/de nas ci ste mir skyes na yang rnam par smyin pa gnyis mngon par 'grub pa 'di lta ste/_longs spyod chung ba dang thun mong gi longs spyod du 'gyur ba'o/_/'dod pas log par g.yem pas ni 
[\[190a.4\]]sems can dmyal bar khrid do/_/byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/_/de nas ci ste myir skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par 'grub pa 'di lta ste/_ltod pa dang bcas pa'i chung ma dang /_g.yog 'khor 
[\[190a.5\]]mi srun pa'o/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra bas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do/_/byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/_/de nas ci ste myir skyes na yang rnam par smyin pa gnyis mngon par 'grub pa 'di lta ste/_skur pa mang ba dang /_
[\[190a.6\]]gzhan gyis bslu ba'o/_/phra mas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do/_/byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/_/de nas ci ste mir skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par 'grub pa 'di lta ste 
[\[190a.7\]]g.yog mi 'dum pa dang /_g.yog ngan par 'gyur ba'o/_/zhe gcod pa'i tshig gis ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do/_/byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/_/de nas ci ste mir skyes na yang rnam par smin 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]pa gnyis mngon par 'grub pa 'di lta ste/_yid du mi 'ong ba thos pa dang /_'thab mo'i tshig go/_tshig kyal bas ni/_sems can dmyal bar khrid do/_/byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/_/de nas ci ste mir skyes na'ang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par 
[\[190b.2\]]'grub pa 'di lta ste/_tshig mi btsun pa dang /_spobs pa ma brtags pa'o/_/chags sems kyis ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do/_/byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/_/de nas ci ste mir skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par 'grub pa 'di lta ste/_chog mi shes 
[\[190b.3\]]pa dang /_'dod pa che ba'o/_/gnod sems kyis ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do/_/byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/_/de nas ci ste myir skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par 'grub pa 'di lta ste/_gnod par glags lta ba dang /_pha rol gyis mnar ba'o/_/
[\[190b.4\]]log par lta bas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do/_/byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/_/de nas ci ste myir skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par 'grub pa 'di lta ste/_lta ba ngan par ltung ba dang g.yo sgyu can no/_/de ltar na mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 
[\[190b.5\]]'di dag ni sdug bsngal gyi phung po che zhing tshad med pa sdud par 'gyur gyis mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag bdag gis spangs te chos la dga' zhing mos par dga' bar gnas par bya'o zhes te/_de mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag spangs nas dge ba bcu'i 
[\[190b.6\]]las kyi lam la gnas shing gzhan yang de nyid la rab tu gzhog go_/de sems can rnams la sngon bas kyang phan pa'i sems dang /_bde ba'i sems dang /_byams pa'i sems dang /_snying rje'i sems dang /_snying brtse ba'i sems dang /_phan gdags pa'i sems dang /_yongs su bsrung 
[\[190b.7\]]ba'i sems dang /_slob dpon kyi sems dang /_ston pa'i sems dang mnyam pa'i sems bskyed cing de 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni lta ba ngan par ltung ba dag ste/_blo gros mi mnyam zhing bsam pa mi mnyam pa/_log pa'i lam thibs 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]por rgyu ba yin gyis de dag bdag gis bden pa'i lam yang dag par lta ba'i lam/_de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin la rab tu dgod par bya'o/_/e ma'o sems can 'di dag ni mi mthun zhing rtsod pa dang /_'thab 
[\[191a.2\]]pa la zhugs pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par khro ba dang /_khon du 'dzin pas shin tu 'bar bar gyur pa yin gyis de dag bdag gis bla na med pa'i byams pa chen po rab tu nye bar bsgrub pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o/_/kye ma sems can 'di dag ni chog 
[\[191a.3\]]mi shes shing gzhan gyi nor la mngon par zhen te/_shin tu mi zad par 'tsho bas rjes su spyod pa yin gyis de dag bdag gis lus dang /_ngag dang yid kyi las yongs su dag pas 'tsho ba la rab tu dgod par bya'o/_/kye ma sems can 'di dag ni 
[\[191a.4\]]'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang /_srid pa'i gzhi dang ldan zhing nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyi me lce rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par kun tu 'bar bar gyur kyang 'di las 'byung ba'i thabs yongs su mi tshol ba yin gyis de dag bdag gis nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[191a.5\]]cad shin tu zhi zhing gtse ba med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o/_/kye ma sems can 'di dag ni gti mug gi mun pa dang /_rab rib kyi ling thog gis bsgribs shing mun pa chen po thibs po'i nang du song bas shes rab kyi snang ba dang 
[\[191a.6\]]ring du gyur te/_'khor ba'i mya ngam chen por las shing lta ba ngan pa'i mya ngam la gzhol bar gyur pa yin gyis de dag bdag gis ci nas kyang chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid bsgribs pa med pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog 
[\[191a.7\]]pa 'thob par 'gyur bar shes rab kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]bsgribs pa med pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/kye ma sems can 'di dag ni 'khor ba'i mya ngam dang dgon pa chen por las shing sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]rten gyi g.yangs la mngon du bltas pa/_lta ba ngan pa mi zad pa'i dra bas kun nas 'khor ba/_gti mug thibs pos kun nas yog pa/_log pa'i lam gol bar zhugs pa/_long bar gyur pa dge ba'i mgon med pa/_
[\[191b.2\]]'byung ba ma yin pa la 'byung bar lta ba/_/bdud kyi zhags pas bcings pa/_yul gyi rkun pos zin pa/_bdud kyi bsam pa thibs por nub pa/_sangs rgyas kyi bsam pa dang ring du gyur pa yin gyis de dag bdag gis rnam pa de lta bu'i 'khor ba'i 
[\[191b.3\]]dgon pa dang /_mya ngam brgal dka' ba las bsgral te/_'jigs pa med pa'i gnas thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong rdal chen po gtse ba med par rab tu dgod par bya'o/_/kye ma sems can 'di dag ni chu bo chen po'i gling du bying zhing 'dod pa dang srid 
[\[191b.4\]]pa'i ma rig pa dang /_lta ba'i chu bo la rab tu gzhol ba/_'khor ba'i rgyud du 'brang ba/_sred pa'i chu klung gis khyer zhing rba rlabs chen pos g.yengs pa/_sred pa'i 'dod chags kyi mthus shin tu bcom pa/_brtag pa'i mthu med par 'dod pa 
[\[191b.5\]]dang /_gnod sems dang 'tshe ba dang /_rnam par rtog pa mang po'i rjes su spyod pa 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i chu'i srin pos khrid pa 'dod pa'i yon tan thibs po'i gling du zhugs pa/_smon pa'i 'dod chags kyi 'dam du thogs pa/_nga'i nga rgyal gyi dbye 
[\[191b.6\]]ba chen por 'khyams pa/_rten med pa/_skye mched kyi grong rdal nas ma 'phags pa dge ba'i sgrol ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yin gyis/_de dag bdag gis snying rje chen po dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs kyi shugs kyis bton te/_thams cad mkhyen 
[\[191b.7\]]pa rin po che'i gling gtse ba med pa rdul [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhi ba bde ba 'jigs pa med pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o/_/kye ma sems can 'di dag ni khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa mang po can chags pa dang khong khro ba 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]dang /_sdug pa dang mi sdug pas rnam par bcings pa/_mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa'i rjes su spyod pa/_sred pa'i sgrog gis bcings pa/_ma rig pa'i thibs pos kun nas yog pa'i nang na mi mthun par 
[\[192a.2\]]gyur pa yin gyis de dag bdag gis khams gsum pa'i gnas thams cad las dben pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa bsgribs pa med pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o/_/kye ma sems can 'di dag ni bdag dang bdag gi la mngon par zhen zhing phung po'i 
[\[192a.3\]]gnas las ma 'phags pa phyin ci log bzhi la rab tu zhugs pa/_skye mched drug gi grong stong pa la shin tu gnas pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i sbrul gyis gtse ba phung po'i gshed ma dang chom pos shin tu bcom pa/_gzhal du med pa'i sdug 
[\[192a.4\]]bsngal myong bar gyur pa yin gyis de dag bdag gis bde ba'i dam pa gnas thams cad dang bral ba 'di lta ste/_bsgribs pa med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o/_/kye ma sems can 'di dag ni dma' ba dang zhan pa dang zhum pa 
[\[192a.5\]]la mos shing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dam pa'i sems mi ldog pas theg pa chen pos 'byung ba yod kyang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi blo can yin gyis de dag bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po'i blo gros dang bsam 
[\[192a.6\]]pa yangs pa'i theg pa chen po bla na med pa la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su bstan pas rab tu dgod par bya'o snyam mo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar tshul khrims kyi stobs dang mthu de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[192a.7\]]dpa'i snying rje dang byams pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/_sems can thams cad kyis ma bcol pa'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa/_sems can thams cad yongs su ma btang ba/_bya ba dang mi bya ba mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/_
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa'i sa dri ma med pa la gnas pa de'i lta ba rgya chen po dang /_smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po rab tu snang bar gyur te/_lta ba rgya chen po dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs 
[\[192b.2\]]rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya 
[\[192b.3\]]stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro/_des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas bsam pa rgya chen pos rim gro byed do/_/bkur 
[\[192b.4\]]sti byed do/_/bsti stang byed do/_/mchod pa byed do/_/na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi rkyen sman dang yo byad dag kyang 'bul zhing byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongs su 
[\[192b.5\]]'bul lo/_/dge 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la yang dag par mchod pa byed de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[192b.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas de dag las dge ba bcu' las kyi lam 'di dag kyang rim gro chen pos rab tu 'dzin te/_ji ltar bzung ba de 'ang bar ma dor chud zos par mi byed do/_/de bskal pa du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa stong phrag du 
[\[192b.7\]]ma dang /_bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar ser sna'i skyon dang /_tshul khrims ngan pa'i dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pas gtong ba dang /_tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la yang dag par 'byung zhing gnas so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste/_
[\[193a.2\]]dper na/_gser gyi sa le sbram de nyid nag mtshur du bcug na de bas kyang dri ma thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa dri ma dang bral ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang bskal pa 
[\[193a.3\]]du ma nas/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar du ser sna'i nyes pa dang /_tshul khrims ngan pa'i dri ma med pas gtong ba dang /_tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la yang dag par 'byung zhing gnas so/_/de'i bsdu ba'i 
[\[193a.4\]]dngos po bzhi las ngag snyan pa shas che ba yin/_pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shas che ba yin te/_lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par mi bsgrub pa ma yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/
[\[193a.5\]]'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa mdor bstan pa'o/_/de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phal cher 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gling bzhi la dbang bar 'gyur te/_
[\[193a.6\]]chos kyis dbang bsgyur ba rab tu thob cing rin po che bdun dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad kyi ser sna'i skyon dang /_tshul khrims ngan pa'i dri ma bzlog par bya ba la mkhas shing mthu yod pa dang /_sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i 
[\[193a.7\]]las kyi lam la rab tu dgod par bya bar shin tu mkhas pa dang /_sbyin pa chen po rtsom pas thub pa med pa yin te/_sbyin pa 'am ngag snyan pa 'am/_don grub pa 'am don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/_de thams cad 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/_gtso bor 'gyur/_thu bor 'gyur/_phul du 'gyur/_dam par 'gyur/_bla na med par 'gyur/_'dren par 'gyur/_rnam par 'dren par 'gyur yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas thams cad 
[\[193b.2\]]mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste/_sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang /_chos yid la bya ba dang /_dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang /_
[\[193b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang /_stobs yid la bya ba dang /_mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i 
[\[193b.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin no/_/de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu khyim dang /_chung ma dang srid thams cad yongs su spangs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_
[\[193b.5\]]de rab tu byung nas kyang skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin stong rab tu 'thob bo/_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin stong rab tu thob cing de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas stong mthong ba dang /_de dag gi byin gyi 
[\[193b.6\]]rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams stong skyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong du 'gro ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams stong snang bar byed pa dang /_sems can stong yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_bskal pa stong 
[\[193b.7\]]du gnas pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa stong la rab tu 'jug pa dang /_chos kyi sgo stong rnam par 'byed pa dang /_lus stong yongs su bstan pa dang /_lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor stong yang dag 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]par bstan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus de lta bu rtsom mo/_/de yan chad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te/_de dag gi lus sam/_'od dang rdzu 'phrul lam/_
[\[194a.2\]{]myig [,]mig [}]gam spyod yul lam/_dbyangs sam/_spyod pa 'am/_rgyan tam byin gyi rlabs sam/_mos pa 'am/_mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal 
[\[194a.3\]]pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka' 'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang /_bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe 
[\[194a.4\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/de dag mnyen drang las rung 'jam pa'i sems ldan zhing /_/bsam pa dge dang bsam pa zhi dang ldan pa rnams/_/'du 'dzi'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]bral rlabs chen blo dang ldan pa yi/_/che 
[\[194a.5\]]nyid sems ldan mkhas pa de dag gnyis la 'phar/_/de gnas yon tan 'chang zhing dge ba phun ldan pa/_gtse med sems ldan srog gcod rnam par kun spangs shing /_ma byin len dang gzhan gyi chung ma de bzhin spangs/_/bden 
[\[194a.6\]]dang ldan zhing phra ma mi smra zhe gcod med/_/gzhan gyi longs spyod 'dod sems bral zhing byams sems ldan/_/drang zhing g.yo med yang dag lam du rab tu zhugs/_/g.yo med thibs po med cing shin 
[\[194a.7\]]tu nges pa ste/_rtag tu bag yod ston pa'i spyod pa yongs su bsrung /_/sems dmyal byol song skye gnas sdug bsngal ji snyed dang /_/gshin rje'i ris na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rtag tu lus 'bar ba/_/de dag sdig blos dge ba [{]myin [,]min [}]la 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]brtson pas byung /_/de bas de spangs bden pa'i chos dang ldan par bya/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]yi nang du skye ba yid du 'ong la [{]stsogs[,]sogs[}]/_/srid rtse'i bar gyi lha yi bsam gtan bde ba dang /_/rang rgyal theg pa de bzhin nyan thos theg pa dag_/kun kyang dkar 
[\[194b.2\]]lam bcu pos byung ba yin zhes te/_/de ltar shes shing rtag par mkhas pa bag yod pa/_/shin tu bsdams pa'i yid kyis pha rol tshul la dgod/_/sems can sdug bsngal shes shing snying brtse bskyed byas nas/_/de bas gong du snying rje'i 
[\[194b.3\]]sems dang ldan par byed/_/kye ma byis pa'i blo can 'di dag lta ngan lhung /_/khro zhing shar gnyer gdon pa kun sems rtsod pa can/_/rtag tu mi ngoms yul la yang dang yang du smon/_/gzhi gsum 'brel pa de dag yongs su dgrol bar bya/_/
[\[194b.4\]]gti mug mun pa chen pos kun nas yog pa rnams/_/lta ba'i dra mang mya ngam lam du lhung gyur pa/_/'khor ba'i shing thags nang na rtag tu dgras gtse zhing /_/bdud kyi chom po'i nang gnas de dag bdag gis dgrol/_/nyon 
[\[194b.5\]]mongs rlabs kyis g.yengs shing chu bo bzhir nub pa/_/khams gsum sdug bsngal brgya yis yongs su gdungs pa rnams/_/phung po'i gnas la rten cing bdag tu 'du shes pa/_/de dag sdug bsngal dgrol don bdag gis brtson 
[\[194b.6\]]par bya/_/sangs rgyas ye shes dam pa rmad byung phul spangs shing /_/'byung ba yod bzhin dma' ba'i blo gros skyed byed pa/_/de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yangs dgod ces/_/rgyal ba'i ye shes don du brtson 
[\[194b.7\]]'grus yangs pa rtsom/_/'di gnas yon tan brgya bstsags drang srong chen po rnams/_/bde gshegs du ma mthong zhing mchod pa 'ang rab tu byed/_/dge ba de dag bskal pa bye bar phyir zhing sbyong /_/gser gyi dam pa nag mtshur nang du 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]bcug pa bzhin/_/'di gnas rgyal sras 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/_/dge ba bcu la sems can rab tu dgod pa byed/_/dge tshogs gang yang rung ste [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]par byed pa rnams/_/stobs bcu ldan zhing 'gro ba'i skyabs 
[\[195a.2\]]'gyur don du sogs/_/'dod na rgyal po'i srid kyang rnam par spangs byas shing /_/brtan pa rnams ni bstan pa'i mchog la rab byung nas/_/brtson 'grus ldan zhing ting 'dzin dam pa mchog kyang 'thob/_/sangs rgyas stong tshangs skad cig gcig gis mthong bar 
[\[195a.3\]]byed/_/'di 'dre'i tshul gyis bgrang bas gzhan yang gcig min pa/_/khyu mchog sa 'di gnas pa rab tu ston par byed/_/de yi god na ye shes smon lam mchog ldan pa/_/rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa du mas sems can 'dul/_/de ltar sa mchog gnyis pa 'di/_/
[\[195a.4\]]'jig rten kun la phan 'dod pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mchog rnams la/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i sras kyis bstan/_/dri ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba ste byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa'o//_//sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i 
[\[195a.5\]]mdo/_bam po bco lnga ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul bsam yas pa/_/sa mchog spyod pa de skad thos gyur nas/_/rgyal ba'i sras rnams rab tu dga' zhing bsti stang du/_/me tog sprin char mngon par kun nas 'bebs/_/ri yi rgyal po bod pa legs so legs/_/sems can 
[\[195a.6\]]kun la snying brtse bsam pa yis/_/sa mchog dam pa'i spyod yul de 'dra dang /_/mkhas pa'i tshul khrims sdom pa khyod kyis bshad/_/yang dag de dngos ma nor gzhan min pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid 'ong zhing /_/sems can kun la phan dang bde ba rab sems pa/_/phul du 'od 
[\[195a.7\]]gsal khyod kyis bstan pa byas/_/da dung da chud lha dang mis mchod cing /_/chos kyi ye shes rigs par brjod mkhas pa/_/de dag spyod yul tshul ni ji bzhin du/_/sa yi dam pa gsum po brjod par mdzod/_/drang srong chen po'i sbyin tshul spyod 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]pa dang /_/bzod pa brtson 'grus zhi ba shes rab thabs/_/byams pa'i mchog dang snying rje'i lam gyi rnams/_/rgyal sras spyod pa rnams sbyang bstan mdzod cig_/rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_/rnam grol zla bas yang 
[\[195b.2\]]smras pa/_/gsum la yang dag 'phar 'gyur ba'i/_/bsam pa mkhas pas bshad par mdzod/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar byang chub sems 
[\[195b.3\]]dpa' sa gnyis pa la bsam pa shin tu sbyangs pa ni sa gsum pa yongs su gnon to/_de sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba bcus yongs su gnon te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dag pa'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba dang /_mi 
[\[195b.4\]]g.yo ba'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba dang /_skyo ba'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba dang /_brtan pa'i 
[\[195b.5\]]sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba dang /_sbyongs ba'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba dang /_rlom pa'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba dang /_rlabs po che'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba dang /_bdag nyid che ba'i sems kyi bsam pa 
[\[195b.6\]]yid la bya ba'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa la gnas pa ni 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad la mi rtag pa yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog go_/sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa 
[\[195b.7\]]dang /_mi sdug pa dang /_yid brtan du mi rung ba dang /_rnam par 'jigs pa dang /_ring du mi gnas pa dang /_skad cig tu 'byung zhing 'gag pa dang /_mi zad cing mi skye mi 'gag pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' kun nas ma byung ba dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]'pho ba med pa dang /_da ltar byung ba mi gnas par rab tu rtog go_/de 'du byed kyi rnam pa de lta bu la rab tu rtog pa'i tshe mngon par 'jig pa dang /_mya ngan can smre sngags 'don pa can dang /_'khrug pa can yid du 'ong 
[\[196a.2\]]ba dang /_yid du mi 'ong bas rnam par bcings pa/_sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba mang ba bstsags pa med pa las byung ba/_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi [{]mye [,]me [}]rab tu 'bar ba/_nad du mas rnam par bskyed pa/_sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 
[\[196a.3\]]lta bur mthong nas de de bas kyang 'du byed thams cad las sems gyen du bskyod cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la rab tu gtong ste/_des de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'ang rjes su mthong ste/_mtshungs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[196a.4\]]dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_rnyed par dka' ba dang /_ma 'dres pa dang /_gnod pa med pa dang /_'khrug pa med pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa'i grong rdal du 'gro ba dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa dang /_'gro ba mang po yongs su skyob pa yang dag par 
[\[196a.5\]]rjes su mthong ngo /_/des de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de ltar tshad med pa mthong ste/_'du byed kyi rnam pa de ltar sdug bsngal mang pos gtses pa mthong nas/_sems can thams cad la de bas kyang shas cher sems kyi bsam pa bcu nye 
[\[196a.6\]]bar gzhog ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mgon med pa dang /_skyabs med pa dang /_rten med pa'i sems kyi bsam pa dang /_rtag tu 'phongs pa'i sems kyi bsam pa dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi me kun 
[\[196a.7\]]nas 'bar ba'i sems kyi bsam pa dang /_srid pa'i btson ras bzung ba'i sems kyi bsam pa dang /_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par nyon mongs pa'i thibs pos bsgribs pa'i sems kyi bsam pa dang /_brtag pa'i mthu med pa'i sems kyi 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]bsam pa dang /_dge ba'i chos la mos pa med pa'i sems kyi bsam pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las shin tu gol ba'i sems kyi bsam pa dang /_'khor ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'bab pa'i sems kyi bsam pa dang /_
[\[196b.2\]]thar pa'i lam gyis sdangs pa'i sems kyi bsam pa dang /_/sems kyi bsam pa 'di bcu nye bar gzhog go_/de nas de ltar sems can gyi khams gtse ba mang po can mthong nas/_brtson 'grus 'di ltar rtsom 
[\[196b.3\]]ste/_sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis bskyab par bya ba yongs su dgrol bar bya ba/_yongs su sbyang bar bya ba/_shin tu gdon par bya ba rab tu dgod par bya ba/_shin tu brtan par bya ba/_yongs su tshim par bya ba/_gnas su phyin par bya ba/_
[\[196b.4\]]rnam par gdul bar bya ba dang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba yin no/_/zhes nas de de ltar 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad las skyo ba'i rjes su song zhing sems can thams cad la rab tu lta ba'i rjes su song ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i 
[\[196b.5\]]ye shes la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su song zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la rab tu rten pas sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya ba la brtson pa de 'di ltar yongs su rtog ste/_rgyu dang gzhi dang tshul dang 
[\[196b.6\]]thabs gang zhig gis 'di lta bur sdug bsngal dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs par ltung ba'i sems can 'di dag mngon par gdon par nus rgyu dang gzhi dang tshul dang thabs gang zhig gis ni shin tu bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das par dgod 
[\[196b.7\]]par nus snyam nas/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes rnam par thar pa'i gnas ma gtogs par gzhan gyis mi nus so/_/bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes rnam par thar pa'i gnas de yang chos thams cad 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa ma gtogs par gzhan gyis thob par mi nus so/_/chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa yang rgyu ba med cing skye ba med pa la spyod pa'i shes rab 
[\[197a.2\]]ma gtogs par gzhan gyis khong du chud par mi nus so/_/shes rab kyi snang ba de yang bsam gtan la mkhas shing rtogs pa'i blos rab tu rtog pa med par gzhan gyis thob par mi rung ngo /_/bsam gtan la mkhas shing rtogs pa'i 
[\[197a.3\]]blos rab tu rtog pa de yang thos pas mkhas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par mi 'byung ngo /_/zhes de de ltar shin tu brtags pa'i shes pa dang ldan pas de bas kyang shas cher dam pa'i chos tshol ba la mngon par brtson par gnas te nyin mtshan du chos mnyan pa don du gnyer 
[\[197a.4\]]ba yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal ba'i don du chos la mos shing ngoms mi shes la rgyun mi 'chad pa yin/_chos la dga' zhing spro ba dang /_chos la rab tu 'jug pa yin/_chos la gzhol zhing chos la 'bab pa dang /_chos la 'bab pa 
[\[197a.5\]]yin/_chos la rten cing chos la skyabs tshol ba dang /_chos la mthu tshol ba yin/_chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la mngon par brtson pa yin te/_de de ltar chos tshol ba la mngon par brtson pas rin po che'i rnam pa 'am/_dbyig gi rnam pa 'am/_
[\[197a.6\]]nor dang /_'bru'i mdzod dang bang ba gang yang rung ste/_yongs su mi gtong ba de lta bu gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/chos smra ba'i gang zag de 'ba' zhig la dka' ba'i 'du shes su gyur pa las phar de dag gzhan la cung zad kyang dka' ba'i 'du shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[197a.7\]]bskyed do/_/de ni chos kyi don du phyi rol gyi dngos po nye bar bzung ba yongs su mi gtong ba de gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nang gi dngos po yongs su mi gtong bar bya ba de lta bu 'ang cung zad kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gang 'di dag 'di lta ste/_g.yog 'khor yongs su gtang 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]ba'am/_rgyal srid yongs su gtang ba'am/_longs spyod yongs su gtang ba 'am/_nor dang 'bru dang /_nor bu dang /_gser gyi mdzod dang /_bang ba yongs su gtang ba dang /_rta dang glang po dang /_shing rta dang /_bzhon pa yongs su gtang ba 'am 
[\[197b.2\]]rin po che'i rgyan dang lhab lhub yongs su gtang ba dang /_chung ma dang bu dang bu mo yongs su gtang ba 'am/_mgo dang rka lag dang yan lag gi dam pa yongs su gtang ba 'am/_lus thams cad yongs su 
[\[197b.3\]]gtad bar bya ba yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad chos kyi don du yongs su mi gtong ba gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/bla ma la bsnyen bkur dang rim gro bya ba gang yang rung ste/_nyams su mi len pa gang yang med do/_/nga rgyal dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su gtang bas/_nga rgyal 
[\[197b.4\]]med pa la spyad pa gang yang rung ste/_nyams su mi len pa gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lus kyi gnod pa gang yang rung ste/_nyams su mi len pa gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshig gcig thos pa nor che bar 'dzin gyis/_stong gsum 
[\[197b.5\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gang ba'i rin po che'i phung po thob pas ma yin no/_/legs par bshad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig thos pas sems dga' bar 'gyur gyi/_brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /_'khor los sgyur 
[\[197b.6\]]ba'i rgyal bo'i srid la bskal pa brgya stong mang po'i mthar thug par gnas pas ni ma yin no/_/de la la la zhig brgya la 'di skad du zer te/_gal te khyod kyis me'i dong chen por lus bor te/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba'i phung po chen po rang gi lus 
[\[197b.7\]]kyis nyams su blang bar nus na/_ngas khyod la chos kyi tshig yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su spyod pa 'di bshad par bya'o/_/zhe na yang de 'di snyam du sems te chos kyi tshig 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba'i don du ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes gang bar yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas bdag gis 
[\[198a.2\]]bdag dor bar mos na me'i dong tha mal pa ni 'di lta zhig tu bdag dor ba lta ci smos kyis/_de bas sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad nyams su bab pas kyang bdag gis chos btsal bar bya'i [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]sdug bsngal dang 'grogs 
[\[198a.3\]]pa lta khyad du bsad do zhes nas de rnam pa de lta bu'i brtson 'grus rtsom pas chos yongs su tshol lo/_/ji skad du thos pa'i chos rnams la yang tshul bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa'i ngang tshul can yin te/_des chos de dag thos nas kyang rjes la rang gi sems 
[\[198a.4\]]rtog par bzhag pas gcig pu dben pa na 'dug cing 'di ltar rtog go_/chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du bya bas sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bya ba'i tshig gi lam yongs su dag pa 'ba' zhig gis ma yin no zhes te/_byang chub sems 
[\[198a.5\]]dpa' de byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa la gnas shing /_'dod pa rnams las dben/_sdig to dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben zhing rnam par rtog pa can rnam par dpyod pa can/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde 
[\[198a.6\]]ba'i bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa rnam par zhi ste/_nang shin tu dang zhing sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[198a.7\]]las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba bsam gtan gnyis pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de dga' ba la 'dod chags dang bral te btang snyoms su gnas pas/_dran pa dang ldan zhing rab tu shes par bde ba yang lus kyis rab tu tshor te/_
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]'phags pa rnams kyi btang snyoms pa dran pa can dga' ba med la bde ba la gnas pa'o/_/zhes bya bar bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bde ba yang spangs/_sdug bsngal ba yang spangs la bde ba'i yid dang /_nyam nga ba'i 
[\[198b.2\]]yid kyang sngar nub pas sdug bsngal yang med/_bde ba yang med pa'i btang snyoms dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de gzugs su 'du shes pa las rnam pa thams cad du 'das nas/_thogs pa'i 'du shes 
[\[198b.3\]]rnams nub ste/_'du shes sna tshogs yid la mi byed pas mtha' yas nam mkha' zhes te/_nam mkha' mtha' yas pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de nam mkha' mtha' yas pa'i skye mched las rnam pa thams cad du 'das nas 
[\[198b.4\]]mtha' yas rnam shes shes te rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam par shes pa'i skye mched las rnam pa thams cad du 'das nas ma yod cung zad ces te cung zad kyang med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te 
[\[198b.5\]]gnas so/_/de cung zad kyang med pa'i skye mched las rnam pa thams cad du 'das nas/_'du shes med 'du shes med min gyin gyi skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du bya ba ma gtogs par de yang mngon par dga' 
[\[198b.6\]]ba'i gnas dang /_rten pa yin pas de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/_rgya che ba gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa khon med pa/_ltod pa med pa bsgribs pa med pa/_gnod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_thams cad du khyab pas 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi 
[\[198b.7\]]dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad rgyas par bkang nas nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang /_dga' ba dang ldan pa/_btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/_rgya che ba 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]gnyis su med pa/_tshad med pa kho na med pa ltod pa med pa bsgribs pa med pa/_gnod pa med pa thams cad du khyab pas 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad 
[\[199a.2\]]rgyas par bkang nas nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa du ma myong bar byed des 'di yang g.yo bar byed do/_/gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ro/_/mang por gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/snang ba dang mi snang ba la 'ang rab 
[\[199a.3\]]tu spyod de rtsig pa la thags thogs med pa dang /_ra ba la thags thogs med pa dang /_ri la yang dper na nam mkha' bzhin du thags thogs med cing chags pa med par 'gro'o/_/dper na nam mkha' la lding ba'i bya bzhin du nam mkha' la 
[\[199a.4\]]'ang dkyil mo dkrung gis gnas par byed do/_/chu bzhin dus la'ang nub cing 'byung ba ston to/_/sa bzhin du chu la yang 'bying ba med par 'gro'o/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]phung po chen po bzhin du du ba 'thul lo/_/me lce 'bar ro/_/sprin chen po bzhin du lus 
[\[199a.5\]]las char 'bebs so/_/nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che la/_'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa dag kyang lag pas nyug cing reg par byed do/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du yang lus kyis dbang bsgyur te/_
[\[199a.6\]]de lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]las 'das pas lha dang mi'i sgra gnyis ka yang nyan to/_ring yang rung nye yang rung ste chung ngu na sbrang bu dang /_sha sbrang dang /_bung ba dang /_srin bu'i sgra yang thos so/_/de sems can 
[\[199a.7\]]pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems kyang sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems shes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang /_zhe sdang dang bral ba dang /_gti mug dang bcas pa dang /_gti mug dang bral ba dang /_
[\[199b.2\]]nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang /_che ba dang /_chung ba dang /_yangs pa dang /_dog pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa dang /_mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par ma grol ba dang /_
[\[199b.3\]]skyon can dang /_skyon med pa dang /_sems rgya chen po la sems rgya chen po'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/sems rgya chung ngu la sems rgya chung ngu'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_de ltar na sems 
[\[199b.4\]]can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te/_tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran no/_/gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga dang /_
[\[199b.5\]]bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu dang /_tshe rabs brgya yang rjes su dran no/_/tshe rabs brgya phrag du ma dang /_tshe rabs stong phrag du ma dang /_tshe rabs brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_tshe 
[\[199b.6\]]rabs bye ba phrag brgya stong phrag du ma nas/_tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar du rjes su dran no/_/'du ba'i bskal pa du ma dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /_'du ba dang 'jig pa'i bskal pa du ma yang rjes su dran no/_/bskal pa brgya yang rjes su dran no/_/bskal 
[\[199b.7\]]pa stong dang /_bskal pa stong phrag brgya dang /_bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgya nas/_bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du ma'i bar du rjes su dran no/_/bskal pa khrag khrig dang bskal pa khrag khrig brgya dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig stong dang /_bskal 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]pa khrag khrig stong phrag brgya dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong nas/_bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar du rjes su dran te/_bdag ni che ge mo zhig na 'dug 'dug go_/ming ni 'di 
[\[200a.2\]]zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni 'di yin no/_/rus ni 'di yin no/_/kha zas ni 'di zos so tshe ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur to/_/'di srid cig tu ring du gnas so/_/bde ba dang nyon mongs pa ni 'di lta bu zhig myong ngo /_/de nas shi 'phos 
[\[200a.3\]]nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so/_/de nas kyang shi 'phos nas 'di lta bu zhig tu skyes so/_/zhes sa tshigs dang bcas/_mtshan ma dang bcas/_dan rtags dang bcas par rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran no/_/des lha'i mig rnam 
[\[200a.4\]]par dag cing mi las 'das pas sems can rnams shi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba dang /_kha dog sdug pa dang /_kha dog mi sdug pa dang /_bde ba'i lam du phyin pa dang /_ngan song du song ba dang /_ngan pa dang /_bzang po thams cad rab 
[\[200a.5\]]tu mthong ngo /_/las ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba'i sems can rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/_ngag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/_yid kyis ngan du 
[\[200a.6\]]spyod pa dang ldan pa/_'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa log par lta ba can dag ste/_log par lta ba'i las rab tu blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig ste/_shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o/_
[\[200a.7\]]zhes bya ba dang /_sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_'phags pa la skur ba mi 'debs pa yang dag par lta ba 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]can dag ste/_yang dag par lta ba'i las rab tu blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig ste/_shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lhar skye'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_de ltar na lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas sems can 
[\[200b.2\]]'chi ba dang /_skye ba dang /_kha dog sdug pa dang /_kha dog mi sdug pa dang /_bde 'gror song ba dang /_ngan song du song ba dang /_ngan pa dang /_bzang po thams cad sa tshigs dang bcas/_mtshan ma dang bcas/_dan rtags dang bcas par rab tu 
[\[200b.3\]]mthong te/_/las ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba'i sems can rnams kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang yang 
[\[200b.4\]]gang du byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i gnas ma gtogs par de dag gi dbang gis mi skye'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/_de'i lta ba rgya chen po dang /_smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po snang 
[\[200b.5\]]bar 'gyur te/_lta ba rgya chen po dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po 
[\[200b.6\]]dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro/_/des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[200b.7\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong nas/_bsam pa rgya chen pos rim gro byed do/_/bkur sti byed do/_/bsti stang byed do/_/mchod pa byed do/_/na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]rkyen sman dang /_yo byad dag kyang 'bul zhing byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo/_/dge 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la yang yang dag par mchod pa byed de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang 
[\[201a.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing de dag las rim gror chos nyan to/_/len to 'dzin to/_/thos nas kyang ci tshul du nan tan 
[\[201a.3\]]gyis yang dag par sgrub ste/_de chos thams cad la 'pho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'jig pa med pa dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shes pas rab tu lta zhing rtog pas kyang 'dod pa'i bcings pa thams cad bsrabs par 'gyur ro/_/srid pa'i bcings 
[\[201a.4\]]pa thams cad bsrabs par 'gyur ro/_/ma rig pa'i bcings pa thams cad bsrabs par 'gyur ro/_/lta ba las byung ba'i bcings pa rnams ni snga nas kyang byang ba yin te/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub 
[\[201a.5\]]sems dpa'i log pa'i 'dod chags ni bskal pa du ma dang bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang /_
[\[201a.6\]]bskal pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar spangs shing mi [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]par gnas so/_/log pa'i zhe sdang spangs shing zhe sdang mi [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]par gnas so/_/log pa'i 
[\[201a.7\]]gti mug spangs shing mi [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]par gnas te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang yongs su byang ba dang /_yongs su dag pa dang /_las su rung bar gyur pas gnas so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_gser gyi sa le 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]sbram de nyid mgar ba mkhas pa'i lag na spyod na srang grangs ci yod pa'i tshad bzhin du 'dug go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa 'di la gnas pa'i 
[\[201b.2\]]log pa'i 'dod chags kyang 'grib pa med par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/log pa'i zhe sdang yang 'grib pa med par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/log pa'i gti mug kyang 'grib pa med par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rab tu 'byang 
[\[201b.3\]]zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_las su rung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i bzod pa dang des pa yang de bas kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/grogs la bde zhing nges pa'i bsam pa dang /_mi 'khrugs pa'i bsam pa dang /_glong ba med pa'i bsam pa dang /_
[\[201b.4\]]rnyog pa med pa'i bsam pa dang /_mthon dman med pa'i bsam pa dang /_sems can la phan 'dogs pas lan mi re ba'i bsam pa dang /_phan btags pa la phyir lan glon pa'i bsam pa dang /_g.yo med cing sgyu med pa'i bsam pa dang /_
[\[201b.5\]]thibs po med pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag par 'gyur te/_de'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi las don sgrub pa shas che ba yin/_pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shas che ba yin te/_lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang
