[\[201b.6\]]dag par mi bsgrub pa ma yin te kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa zhes bya ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa'o/_/de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phal cher lha'i rgyal po dbang 
[\[201b.7\]]por 'gyur te sems can rnams kyi 'dod pa'i 'dod chags rnam par bzlog pa'i thabs nye bar bsgrub pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin/_de sbyin pa 'am/_ngag snyan pa 'am/_don bsgrub pa 'am/_don mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/_
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]de thams cad ji ltar na/_sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/_gtso bor 'gyur/_thu bor 'gyur/_phul du 'gyur/_dam par 'gyur/_bla na med par 'gyur/_'dren par 'gyur/_rnam par 'dren par 'gyur/_
[\[202a.2\]]yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste/_sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang /_chos yid la bya ba dang /_dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[202a.3\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang /_stobs yid la bya ba dang /_mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid 
[\[202a.4\]]la bya ba nas/_rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te/_de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin brgya stong rab 
[\[202a.5\]]tu thob cing de dag la snyom par 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas brgya stong mthong ba dang /_de dag gi byin gyi rlab kyang yang dag par shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong skyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong du 'gro ba dang /_'jig rten 
[\[202a.6\]]gyi khams brgya stong snang bar byed pa dang /_sems can brgya stong yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_bskal pa brgya stong du gnas par bya ba dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa brgya stong la rab tu 'jug pa dang /_chos kyi sgo brgya 
[\[202a.7\]]stong rnam par 'byed pa dang /_lus brgya stong yongs su bstan pa dang /_lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor brgya stong yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo/_/de yan cad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi mthu can rnams 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te/_de dag gi lus sam 'od dam/_rdzu 'phrul lam/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gam spyod yul lam dbyangs sam/_spyod pa 'am/_rgyan tam/_byin gyi rlabs sam/_mos pa 'am/_mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa 
[\[202b.2\]]du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal ba stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka' 'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 
[\[202b.3\]]snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag pa dang bstan par bya ba'i phyir/_/de'i tsha tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/de dag yon tan 'byung gnas bsam dag sems des pa/_/skyo zhing 'dod chags bral te 'tshe med sems dang ldan/_/sems 
[\[202b.4\]]bskyed bstan pa dga' ldan rgya chen shugs can rnams/_/mkhas pa bdag nyid che ba'i sems ldan gsum pa gnon/_/'od byed sa phyogs 'di la gnas pa'i mkhas pa ni/_/sdug bsngal mi rtag mi sdug rab tu 'jig chos dang /_/ring por mi gnas 
[\[202b.5\]]skad cig snying po med pa ni/_/'dus byas rnam pa 'ong ba med la rab tu rtog_/nad du gyur pa mya ngan smre sngags 'don dang bcas/_/gnod dang 'khrug dang sdug dang mi sdug rjes 'brang ba/_/sdug bsngal yid blong phung po 'bar ba'i me 'dra bar/_/'dus 
[\[202b.6\]]byas mtha' yas kun nas 'bar mthong de las skyed/_/srid pa gsum po kun las skyo zhing ltos sems med/_/bde gshegs ye shes 'dod cing blo gzhan med pa ste/_/bsam du med cing gzhal yas pha rol mtha' yas pa'i/_/rgyal 
[\[202b.7\]]ba'i ye shes gnod med de dag rab tu mthong /_/de dag sangs rgyas ye shes gnod med mthong gyur nas/_/skyabs med mgon dang bral ba rab tu dgrol ba'i phyir/_/rtag tu dbul zhing me gsum kun nas 'bar gyur dang /_/srid pa'i btson rar 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]sdug bsngal sna brgyas sems bskor cing /_/nyon mongs bsgribs dang rnam par lta dang 'dod nyams pa/_/bde gshegs chos kyi dga' ba stor ba'i byis pa rnams/_/'khor ba'i rgyud du 'bab cing thar bas 
[\[203a.2\]]sngangs gyur pa/_/bdag gis skyabs pa yin zhes brtson 'grus dam du rtsom/_/ye shes 'dod pas ltos pa med par 'gro don byed/_/gang rgyus rnam thar lam gyi rgyu ni gang zhes rtog_/bde gshegs ye shes bsgribs pa med las gzhan med na/_/
[\[203a.3\]]bde gshegs ye shes de yang shes rab mthus 'byung ste/_/shes rab thos las 'byung bar byang chub sems dpa' rtog_/de ltar shes nas thos don spyad par brtson 'grus rtsom/_/nyin mtshan nyan pa'i rgyur spyod bya ba gzhan [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_/chos kyi don 
[\[203a.4\]]gnyer chos la rab tu brten pa yin/_/nor bu mu tig rin chen tshogs dang mdza' gnyen dang /_/srid longs du ma pho brang phun ldan dam pa dang /_/chung ma dag dang bu dang mthun par spyod pa'i 'khor/_/ltos med sems kyis mkhas pa chos kyi don du gtong /_
[\[203a.5\]]mgo dang rka lag [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang de bzhin bdag gi sha/_/lce dang mche ba rna ba sna dang khrag rnams dang /_/phangs pa'i rkang dang snying phyung yongs su gtong ba byed/_/'di ni dka' bar mi brtsi thos pa de dkar brtsi/_/la la de drung 'ongs shing 'di skad smrar gyur 
[\[203a.6\]]te/_/de ste me lce mi zad 'bar dong mchong phod na/_/bde gshegs bstan chos rin chen bshad do zhes na yang /_/thos nas mi dma'i yid kyis yon tan don du mchong /_/chos kyi tshig gcig don du ri rab rtses brtag par/_/stong gsum mes 
[\[203a.7\]]bkang tshangs ris yul nas mchongs gyur kyang /_/da dung rgyal ba'i byang chub yangs pa thob dka' na/_/de ste tha mal mi bdes rnyed 'gyur shin tu bde/_/drang srong mchog gi ye shes 'thob 'gyur ji srid pa/_/de srid bar du mnar med sdug bsngal 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]bzod bya na/_/mi yi sdug bsngal phung po sna tshogs ci smos kyis/_/chos rab mnyan pa'i don du bdag gis nyams blang zhes/_/chos rnams thos par gyur nas tshul bzhin sems par byed/_/bsam gtan tshad med de bzhin gzugs med rnam pa 
[\[203b.2\]]bzhi/_mngon par shes pa'i dam pa lnga po mngon sgrub kyang /_/de dag dbang gis skye bar de dag 'gyur ba min/_/legs ldan 'di gnas sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po la/_/mchod pa byed cing des rtogs yid kyis chos kyang nyan/_/srabs par gyur 
[\[203b.3\]]cing log bral yongs su dag par 'gyur/_/skyon med gser sbram ji ltar srang la bcal ba bzhin/_/de gnas yon tan ldan pa lha yi bdag po ste/_/dbang sgyur don byed 'dod pa'i nad kyi rnam pa sel/_/lha mang sna tshogs du ma dge ba'i 
[\[203b.4\]]lam la dgod/_/sangs rgyas yon tan mngon 'dod bsam pa gzhan yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/'di la gnas pa'i rgyal sras brtson 'grus rab rtsom ste/_/brgya phrag stong las mi nyung ting 'dzin thob pa yin/_/mtshan rab sku brgyan sangs rgyas rnams kyang rab 
[\[203b.5\]]tu mthong /_/yan cad smon lam rab ldan yon tan bsam mi khyab/_/de ltar sa mchog gsum pa 'di/_/'jig rten kun la phan brtson pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mchog rnams la/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyis bstan pa yin/_/'od 
[\[203b.6\]]byed pa zhes bya ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa'o/_/sa mchog dam pa yid 'ong phul gyi/_/spyod pa yangs pa 'di 'dra thos nas/_/rgyal sras yid dga' shin tu mgu gyur/_/rgyal ba la ni me tog mngon 'thor/_/
[\[203b.7\]]chos 'di shin tu bstan cing brjod pas/_/lan tshwa'i gang chen mtsho yang g.yos 'gyur/_/lha yi bu mo yid 'ong snyan pa'i/_/glu yi dbyangs su chos rab dbyangs len/_/dbang bsgyur lha dbang shin tu yid dga'/_/bde gshegs 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]rin chen lha rdzas nor 'thor/_/don grub yon tan pha rol phyin pa'i/_/rgyal ba de tshe gsung rab sgrog mdzad/_/ci phyir zhe na chos kyi dam pa/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod rab/_/
[\[204a.2\]]de ring 'dir thos mkhas pa'i sa de/_/bskal pa brgyar yang thos par rab dka'/_/rgyal sras mkhas la spyod pa'i dam pa/_/lha dang mi la phan pas yang shod/_/sa don nges par ma nor lam 'di/_/lha mang 'di 
[\[204a.3\]]dag yid dga' nyan 'gyur/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po la/_/rnam thar zla bas yang smras pa/_/bzhi por yang dag 'phar ba yi/_/spyod yul mkhas pas bshad par mdzod/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying 
[\[204a.4\]]pos smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa la snang ba shin tu sbyang ba ni/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa yongs su gnon te/_/de chos snang ba la 
[\[204a.5\]]'jug pa bcu yongs su gnon te/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can gyi khams rnam par dpyad pa snang ba la 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dpyad pa snang ba la 'jug pa dang /_chos kyi khams rnam par 
[\[204a.6\]]dpyad pa snang ba la 'jug pa dang nam mkha'i khams rnam par dpyad pa snang ba la 'jug pa dang /_/rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par dpyad pa snang ba la 'jug pa dang /_'dod pa'i khams rnam par dpyad pa snang ba la 'jug pa dang 
[\[204a.7\]]gzugs kyi khams rnam par dpyad pa snang ba la 'jug pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams rnam par dpyad pa snang ba la 'jug pa dang /_bsam pa dang mos pa yangs pa'i khams rnam par dpyad pa snang ba la 'jug pa dang /_bdag 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]nyid che ba'i bsam pa dang mos pa'i khams rnam par dpyad pa snang ba la 'jug pa dang /_chos snang ba la 'jug pa bcu po 'di dag gis yongs su gnon to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'phro ba can 
[\[204b.2\]]thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su de'i bdag nyid kyi chos rab tu 'thob pa'i phyir ye shes yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos bcus yang dag par byung ba yin/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phyir mi ldog pa'i 
[\[204b.3\]]bsam pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum la dad pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]phyed pa rab tu thob pa'i mthar thug pa dang /_'du byed skye ba dang /_'jig pa rnam par bsgom pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa rnam par bsgom pa dang /_'jig rten rgyu zhing ldog pa rnam par bsgom pa dang /_las kyis srid par skye 
[\[204b.4\]]ba rnam par bsgom pa dang /_'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa rnam par bsgom pa dang /_sems can gyi zhing dang las rnam par bsgom pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par bsgom pa dang /[ {]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mtha' dang zad pa'i mtha' 
[\[204b.5\]]rnam par bsgom pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/ye shes yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su de'i bdag nyid kyi chos 
[\[204b.6\]]rab tu 'thob pa'i phyir yang dag par byung ba yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'phro ba can la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni yongs su sbyong ba dang ldan zhing shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan par 'jig rten gyi 
[\[204b.7\]]chags sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par spangs te/_nang gi lus la lus kyis rjes su lta bar gnas so/_/yongs su spyod pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan par 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]spangs te/_phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta bar gnas so/_/spyod pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan par 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par spangs te/_phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi 
[\[205a.2\]]rjes su lta bar gnas so/_/de bzhin du nang gi tshor ba dang /_phyi rol gyi tshor ba dang /_phyi nang gi tshor ba dang /_de bzhin du nang gi sems dang /_phyi rol gyi sems dang /_phyi nang gi sems la lta ste spyod pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan 
[\[205a.3\]]par 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par spangs te/_nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta bar gnas so/_/yongs su spyod pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan par 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam 
[\[205a.4\]]par spangs te/_phyi rol gyi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta bar gnas so/_/yongs su spyod pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan par 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par spangs te/_phyi nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta 
[\[205a.5\]]bar gnas so/_/de sdig to dang mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skye ba'i phyir dang pa skyed do/_/rtsol lo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems rab tu 'dzin to/_/smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/_/sdig to dang mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa 
[\[205a.6\]]rnams spang ba'i phyir dad pa skyed do/_/rtsol lo/_brtson 'grus rtsom mo sems rab tu 'dzin to/_/smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/_/dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skye bar 'gyur bar dad pa skyed do/_/rtsol lo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems 
[\[205a.7\]]rab tu 'dzin to/_/smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/_/dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang /_mi nyams pa dang /_rgya cher 'gyur ba dang /_de bas kyang 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /_bsgom pa dang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]dad pa skyed do/_/rtsol lo/_brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems rab tu 'dzin to/_/smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/_/de mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_
[\[205b.2\]]'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spangs pas yongs su grub pa yongs su sgom mo/_/brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spangs pas 
[\[205b.3\]]yongs su grub pa yongs su sgom mo/_/sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spangs pas yongs su grub pa yongs su sgom mo/_/dpyod pa'i ting nge 
[\[205b.4\]]'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spangs pas yongs su grub pa yongs su sgom mo/_/dad pa'i dbang po dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas 
[\[205b.5\]]pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spangs pas yongs su grub pa yongs su sgom mo/_/brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spangs pas yongs su grub pa yongs su sgom mo/_/dran pa'i 
[\[205b.6\]]dbang po dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spangs pas yongs su grub pa yongs su sgom mo/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spangs pas 
[\[205b.7\]]yongs su grub pa yongs su sgom mo/_/shes rab kyi dbang po dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spangs pas yongs su grub pa yongs su sgom mo/_/dad pa'i stobs dben pa la gnas pa/_
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spangs pas yongs su grub pa yongs su sgom mo/_/brtson 'grus kyi stobs dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba

[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spangs pas yongs su grub pa yongs su sgom mo/_/ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_

[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spangs bas yongs su grub pa yongs su sgom mo/_/yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog 
[\[207a.2\]]pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spangs pas yongs su grub pa yongs su sgom mo/_/de dag kyang sems can thams cad la lta ba dang /_sngon gyi smon lam mngon pas bsgrubs par nye bar brten pa dang /_snying rje chen po sngon du btang ba dang /_byams pa chen po 
[\[207a.3\]]dang ldan par bya ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dmigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsgrub cing rgyan mngon par grub par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /_
[\[207a.4\]]gzugs dang mtshan dang /_dpe byad bzang po dang /_dbyangs kyi yan lag dang /_gsung phun sum tshogs pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_gong nas gong du khyad par du 'gyur ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar ba zab mo 
[\[207a.5\]]thos pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /_shes rab dang thabs la shin tu mkhas pas rnam par dpyod pa'i phyir ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'phro ba can 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gang 'di 'jig tshogs

[\[207a.7\]]mngon par chags pa las byung ba/_brkyang ba dang bskum pa dang /_rnam par brtag pa dang /_rnam par dpyad pa dang dran pa dang /_bdag gir byas pa dang /_nor du byas pa dang /_brten pa'i gnas su gyur pa de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du rab tu 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]shes so/_/rab tu spong ngo /_/de 'di ltar las gang bya ba'i mi cha ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis smad pa/_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang ldan pa de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du spong ngo /_/las gang bya ba'i rigs pa yang dag 
[\[207b.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa/_byang chub kyi lam gyi tshogs dang mthun pa de dag yang dag par blangs shing gnas te/_de phyir zhing ji lta ji ltar thabs dang shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i lam yang dag par bsgrub pa'i 
[\[207b.3\]]phyir lam gyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa de lta de ltar 'jam pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/_mnyen pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin las su rung ba'i sems dang ldan pa yin/_phan pa dang bde ba skyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/_kun nas 
[\[207b.4\]]nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/_gong nas gong du khyad par yongs su tshol ba'i sems dang ldan pa yin/_ye shes kyi khyad par la mos pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/_'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i sems dang ldan 
[\[207b.5\]]pa yin/_bla ma la rim gro bya ba dang mthun pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/_ji skad du thos pa'i chos la nan tan du byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin te/_de ni byas pa shes pas drin du gzo ba yin/_'grogs na bde zhing des pa yin/_'jam zhing 
[\[207b.6\]]mnyen pa yin/_sgyu med cing nga rgyal med la/_thibs po med par spyod pa yin/_mthun par 'dzin cing nga lo bde ba yin te/_de de ltar bzod pa dang ldan de ltar dul ba dang ldan de ltar zhi ba dang ldan te/_de ltar bzod cing dul la zhi ba dang ldan pas gong 
[\[207b.7\]]dus yongs su sbyong ba'i las rnams yid la byed cing yang dag par spyod pas phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/_rgyun ma chad pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/_
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]zlog par mi nus pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/_skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/_yangs pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/_mtha' yas pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/_shin tu sbyangs pa'i brtson 
[\[208a.2\]]'grus dang ldan pa yin/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/_mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin tshul dang mi tshul ba bye brag phyed pa'i 
[\[208a.3\]]brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin te/_phyir zhing de'i bsam pa'i khams yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khams dang rnam par mi 'bral lo/_/mos pa'i khams kyang shin tu byang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba yang 
[\[208a.4\]]yongs su skye'o/_/'jig rten gyi dri ma'i rnyog pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/the tsom dang yid gnyis dang nem nur yang rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/nem nur med pa la mngon sum du gyur pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/dga' ba dang bag yangs kyang 
[\[208a.5\]]yang dag par 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pa rlabs chen po yang mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/sems kyi bsam pa tshad med pa yang yang dag par skye'o/_/de byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'phro ba can 'di la gnas pa'i tshe lta ba rgya chen po dang smon lam gyi 
[\[208a.6\]]stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po snang bar 'gyur te/_lta ba rgya chen po dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_
[\[208a.7\]]sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas bsam pa rgya chen pos rim gro byed do/_/bkur sti byed do/_/bsti stang byed do/_/mchod pa byed do/_/na bza' dang bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang snyun gyi rkyen sman dang yo byad dag kyang 'bul zhing byang chub 
[\[208b.2\]]sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo/_/dge 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la yang yang dag par mchod pa byed de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[208b.3\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag bsnyen bkur ba byed cing de dag gis chos bstan pa yang rim gror nyan cing len to/_/'dzin to thos nas kyang ci tshul du nan tan gyis yang dag par sgrub bo/_/de dag las phal cher de bzhin 
[\[208b.4\]]gshegs pa de dag gi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ste/_phyir zhing de'i bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa dang mos pa mnyam pa nyid kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'phro ba can 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[208b.5\]]de bskal pa du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig phrag du ma dang /_
[\[208b.6\]]bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_mos pa'i bsam pa mnyam pa nyid rab tu gnas so/_/de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang yongs su 
[\[208b.7\]]dag cing shin tu 'od gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_gser gyi sa le sbram de nyid mgar ba mkhas pas rgyan du byas pa ni/_de ma yin pa'i gser gyi sa le sbram gzhan rgyan du ma byas pas mi 'phrogs 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]shing mi thub pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'phro ba can 'di la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang de ma yin pa'i byang chub 
[\[209a.2\]]sems dpa'i sa 'og ma rnams la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas mi 'phrogs shing mi thub pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na nor bu rin po che 'od dang ldan pa 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su 
[\[209a.3\]]dag pa can snang ba rab tu gtong ba ni de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i rnam pas mi 'phrogs shing mi thub pa yin/_rlung langs pa dang chu dang char bab pas 'od mi chod pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[209a.4\]]chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'phro ba can 'di la gnas pa yang de ma yin pa'i sa 'og ma la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mi 'phrogs shing mi thub pa yin/_bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i rgyud rnams kyis ye shes mi chod pa yin/_
[\[209a.5\]]de'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi las don mthun pa'i shas che ba yin/_pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas che ba yin te/_lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par mi sgrub pa ma yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 
[\[209a.6\]]'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa ste 'od 'phro ba can zhes bya'o/_/de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phal cher lha'i rgyal po rab 'tshe mar 'gyur te/_sems 
[\[209a.7\]]can rnams kyi 'jig tshogs la lta ba mang po yang dag par gzhol ba la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin/_de sbyin pa 'am/_ngag snyan pa 'am/_don bsgrub pa 'am/_don 'thun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci tsam yang rung ste/_de thams cad ji ltar na 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/_gtso bor 'gyur/_thu bor 'gyur/_phul du 'gyur/_dam par 'gyur/_bla na med par 'gyur/_'dren par 'gyur/_yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste/_sangs rgyas 
[\[209b.2\]]yid la bya ba dang /_chos yid la bya ba dang /_dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sbyong ba yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang /_stobs 
[\[209b.3\]]yid la bya ba dang /_mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang /_mi 'bral ba yin te/_de 'dod na skad cig yud 
[\[209b.4\]]tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin khrag khrig rab tu thob cing de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig mthong zhing de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig skyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig 
[\[209b.5\]]du 'gro ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig snang bar bya ba dang /_sems can khrag khrig yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig du gnas par bya ba dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa khrag khrig la rab tu 'jug pa dang /_chos 
[\[209b.6\]]kyi sgo khrag khrig rnam par 'byed pa dang /_lus khrag khrig yongs su bstan pa dang /_lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor khrag khrig yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo/_/de yan cad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam 
[\[209b.7\]]gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te/_de dag gi lus sam/_'od dam rdzu 'phrul lam/_mig gam/_spyod yul lam/_dbyangs sam/_spyod pa 'am/_rgyan tam/_byin gyi rlabs sam/_mos pa 'am/_mngon par 'du 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka' 'o/_/
[\[210a.2\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang /_bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sa gsum 'od byed pa la shin tu sbyangs byas shing /_/nam mkha'i khams dang yid kyi khams 
[\[210a.3\]]dang khams gsum dang /_sems can spyod dang chos dang 'jig rten dpyod byed cing /_/mos dang bsam pa rnam par dag pa yang dag gnon/_/'od 'phro yod pa'i sa thob 'phral du mthu chen rnams/_/ston pa'i rigs su yang dag skyes pas phyir mi ldog/_/
[\[210a.4\]]sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog dang mi phyed/_/skye zhing 'jig dang gnas pa byed pa med pa ltar/_/'jig rten rgyu ba'i las dang byed dang srid skye dang /_/mya ngan 'das 'khor zhing dang sems can rnam par sgom/_/sngon dang phyi mtha' zad dang skye 
[\[210a.5\]]med grub pa dang /_/las la ston pa'i rigs kyi rjes su 'brang zhing sgom/_/de dag 'di 'dra'i chos ldan phan dang bder sems pa/_/lus dang dran pa tshor ba sems dang chos sgom ste/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag bsgom brten pa rnam spangs pa/_/phyi dang 
[\[210a.6\]]nad dang gnyis ka'i rnam par mkhas pa sgom/_/sdig to zad cing dge chos rnam par 'phel 'gyur ba'i/_/yang dag spong ba bzhi la 'ang mkhas pa sgom pa byed/_/rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi dang stobs dang dbang po dang /_/byang chub yan lag rin 
[\[210a.7\]]chen lam rab yid 'ong sgom/_/de dag kun kyang 'gro la lta ba'i blo sgom ste/_/snying brtse byams pa sngon 'gro smon lam nye bar rton/_/stobs kyi dam pa go 'phang mchog gi rjes sems shing /_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sangs 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]rgyas zhing la smon/_/ston pa'i 'jigs med rnams dang chos rnams 'phrogs med dang /_sangs rgyas gsung gi mchog la brten pa smon byed cing /_/rin chen lam zab rnam par thar pa'i gnas rnams dang /_/che ba'i thabs rnams yang dag bsgrub phyir 
[\[210b.2\]]bsgom pa byed/_/'jig tshogs lta med lta ba drug cu gnyis kyang med/_/bdag dang bdag gi med cing srog tu dmigs pa med/_/phung po skye mched rnams dang khams kyi gnas dang rten/_/kun kyang mkhas pas bzhi po'i sa la rab tu spangs/_/des ni gang dang 
[\[210b.3\]]gang rnams rgyal bas smad mdzad pa'i/_/las dang nyon mongs bcas pa don du mi 'gyur rnams/_/de dag yongs su spangs shing mkhas pa khong nas dag_/'gro ba bskyab pa'i don du las rab dge la brtson/_/mkhas pa de ni byams pa'i sems ldan bag kyang 
[\[210b.4\]]yod/_/mnyen 'jam sems ldan phan dang bde byed dran dang ldan/_/dam pa'i don rnams thams cad skyon med yongs su tshol/_/ye shes dbang bskur [(]mdon [,]mngon [)]mos 'gro ba'i don kyang byas/_/bla ma rim gror byed dang ldan zhing nan tan brtson/_/drin 
[\[210b.5\]]gzo khro ba med cing nga lo bde dang ldan/_/sgyu med thibs po med cing shin tu nges pa ste/_/yang dag sgrub byed brtson 'grus phyir ldog med pa yin/_/yid du 'ong ba'i sa 'di la ni de gnas tshe/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid dang bsam dag 'thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[210b.6\]]mos pa rab tu 'byung 'gyur dge chos rnam par 'phel/_/dri ma rnyog pa the tsom yid gnyis thams cad bstsal/_/'di la gnas pa'i mi rab khyu mchog rgyal ba'i sras/_/bde gshegs bye ba du ma mngon par mchod pa byed/_/chos kyang nyan byed bstan pa 
[\[210b.7\]]de la rab tu 'byung /_/rgyan du byas pa'i gser ltar mi 'phrogs thub pa med/_/mkhas pa 'di la gnas pa'i yon tan bsam pa dang /_/ye shes thabs dang spyod pa rnam dag lam la yang /_/rnam par bzlog par bdud rnams bye bas mi nus te 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]rin chen 'od la rlung gis chod par mi 'gyur bzhin/_/mi dang lhas mchod 'os pa 'di la gnas pa ni/_/dbang phyug mtshe ma'i dam pa chos la spyad par 'gyur/_/lta ba'i thibs po rnams las sems can rnam par bzlog_/
[\[211a.2\]]rgyal ba'i ye shes don tu dge ba rab tu rtsom/_/brtson 'grus ldan pas mi yi khyu mchog khrag khrig brgya/_/gzhan du mi sems shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas mthong /_/yan cad smon lam dam pa yon tan don spyod pa/_/ye shes 'byung gnas bskal 
[\[211a.3\]]pa mang por mngon par sgrub/_/de ltar sa mchog bzhi pa 'di/_/rnam dag dag pa'i spyod ldan zhing /_/yon tan ye shes don ldan la/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i sras kyis bstan/_/'od 'phro can zhes bya ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[211a.4\]]sa bzhi pa'o//_//sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bcu drug pa/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis mchog spyod pa thos gyur nas/_/chos kyi shes pas rgyal sras mgu zhing 
[\[211a.5\]]dga'/_/dga' ba'i yid kyis mkha' las me tog char yang 'bebs/_/bdag nyid che ba'i bde gshegs sras po dge zhes brjod/_/lha yi bdag po dbang sgyur lha yi tshogs rnams dang /_/dga' bas mkha' la 'phags te bde gshegs 
[\[211a.6\]]mchod pa'i phyir/_/me tog sna tshogs sprin chen mdog sdug yid 'ong ba/_/dga' zhing mos pas bde bar gshegs la mngon par gtor/_/glu dbyangs snyan pa yid 'ong sil snyan rnga yi sgra/_/lha tshogs mang pos rgyal ba mchod pa'i don du byas/_/
[\[211a.7\]]rgyal ba de tshe rab tu 'phrul pa'i sku yang ston/_/sgra dbyangs rnam pa kun las 'di 'dra'i sgra byung ngo /_/yun ring mchog gis thub pa'i dgongs pa rdzogs/_/yun ring mchog gis thub pas byang chub brnyes/_/lha mi phan pa yun ring mchog gis 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]mthong /_/lha yi gnas su shAkya thub pa gshegs/_/yun ring mchog gis rgya mtsho'i chu yang g.yos/_/yun ring mchog gis 'od bzang thub pas bkye/_/yun ring mchog gis sems can bde bar gyur/_/thugs rje che gsung yun ring 
[\[211b.2\]]mchog gis thos/_/yun ring mchog gis thub pa che dang phrad/_/yon tan kun gyi mthar phyin da byon to/_/nga rgyal degs snyems mun pa kun spangs te/_/mtshungs med mchod par 'os la mchod pa gyis/_/de la mchod byas bde 'gro'i lam du 'gro/_/de 
[\[211b.3\]]la mchod byas bde ba rnam pa mang /_/de la mchod byas sdug bsngal thams cad 'byang /_/de la mchod byas rgyal ba'i ye shes 'thob/_/rgyal ba mkha' ltar rnam par dag pa ste/_/'gro bas mi gos pad ma'i chu dang 'dra/_/shin tu 
[\[211b.4\]]'phags pa rgya mtsho'i ri rab bzhin/_/spro ba'i sems kyis rgyal ba mchod gyis shig_/de skad dbyangs su brjod byas nas/_/lha yi bu mo brgya mang ba/_/dga' bas rgyas pas rab tu blta/_/shin tu dga' bas rim gro byed/_/de nas rdo rje'i 
[\[211b.5\]]snying po la/_/rnam thar zla bas smras pa ni/_/sa lnga'i rnam pa ci 'dra ba/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyis bshad par mdzod/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 
[\[211b.6\]]sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa la sa'i lam yongs su rdzogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa la 'jug ste/_de sems kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i mnyam pa nyid bcus 'jug go_/bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis 
[\[211b.7\]]bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_tshul khrims kyis bsam pa rnam par dag pa 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]mnyam pa nyid dang /_sems kyis bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_lta ba dang nem nur dang dogs pa bstsal bas bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_lam dang lam ma yin pa shes pas bsam pa rnam par dag pa 
[\[212a.2\]]mnyam pa nyid dang /_nan tan dang spong ba shes pas bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad gong nas gong du rnam par sgom pas bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su 
[\[212a.3\]]smin par bya bas bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid de/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/sems kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa bcu po 'di dag gis de la 'jug ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[212a.4\]]de ni byang chub kyi phyogs dang lam gyi yan lag de dag nyid la sbyang ba shin tu byas shing /_lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu sbyangs pas de'i gong du lam gyi khyad par tshol zhing de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang /_smon lam gyi mthu dang /_shugs dang snying rje dang /_byams 
[\[212a.5\]]pas sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rab tu bstsags pa dang /_yongs su rgyun 'chad pa med pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pas mngon par sgrub pa dang /_gong nas gong du sa'i snang ba blta ba dang /_de bzhin 
[\[212a.6\]]gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs btsal ba dang /_dran pa dang blo gros dang /_rig pa dang /_blo'i stobs dang /_shugs kyis yid la bya ba'i phyir mi zlog par byas te/_'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes 
[\[212a.7\]]so/_/'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba/_'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'gog pa/_'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_de kun rdzob kyi bden pa la mkhas 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]pa yin/_don dam pa'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin/_mtshan nyid kyi bden pa la mkhas pa yin/_rnam par dbye ba'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin/_brtag pa'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin/_dngos po'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin/_'byung ba'i bden pa 
[\[212b.2\]]la mkhas pa yin/_byang zhing mi skye ba'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin/_lam gyi ye shes la 'jug pa'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i rim pa mtshams sbyar ba bsgrub par bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 
[\[212b.3\]]yang dag par bskyed pa'i bar du mkhas pa yin te/_de sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du shin tu dga' bar byed pas kun rdzob kyi bden pa yang rab tu shes so/_/theg pa gcig tu yang dag par gzhol bas don dam 
[\[212b.4\]]pa'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so/_/chos kyi rang gi mtshan nyid khong du chud pas mtshan nyid kyi bden pa yang rab tu shes so/_/chos kyi bye brag rnam par dgod pa khong du chud pas rnam par dbye ba'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so/_/phung po dang khams dang 
[\[212b.5\]]skye mched rnam par dgod pas rtog pa'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so/_/lus dang sems la gnod pa nyams su 'bab pas dngos po'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so/_/'gro ba'i rgyud kyi mtshams sbyor bas 'byung ba'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so/_/
[\[212b.6\]]rims dang yongs su gdung ba thams cad shin tu zhi bas byang zhing mi skya ba'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so/_/mi gnyis pas mngon par bsgrub pas lam gyi ye shes la 'jug pa'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so/_/rnam pa thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_
[\[212b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i rim pa thams cad mtshams sbyor ba rab tu bsgrub pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'byung ba'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so/_/de 'ang mos pas shes pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis te lhag ma ma lus par ye 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]shes khong du chud pas ni ma yin no/_/de de ltar bden pa la mkhas pa/_mngon par bsgrub pa'i blos 'dus byas thams cad gsob gsog [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa bslu ba'i chos can dku byed pa/_byis pa 'drid par yang dag pa ji 
[\[213a.2\]]lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_de sngon bas kyang sems can thams cad la snying rje mngon du 'gyur ro/_/byams pa chen po'i snang ba yang rab tu 'byung ste/_de de ltar ye shes kyi stobs dang shugs rab tu thob cing sems can thams cad la lta 
[\[213a.3\]]ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par mos pas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' rab tu rtog ste/_'di ltar sngon gyi mtha'i ma rig pa dang /_srid pa dang sred pa las rab tu byung ba'i sems can 
[\[213a.4\]]'khor ba'i rgyud du 'bab pa/_phung po'i gnas las ma 'phags pa/_sdug bsngal gyi phung po bdag med pa/_sems can med pa/_srog med pa/_gso ba med pa/_gang zag med pa/_bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba rnam par 'phel 
[\[213a.5\]]lo/_/zhes de 'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'di ltar phyi ma'i mtha'i med pa la rmongs pa'i 'dod pa 'di nyid rgyun gcod pa dang mthar dbyung ba dang /_'byung bar bya ba dang /_yod pa dang med pa de yang yang dag pa ji lta ba 
[\[213a.6\]]bzhin du rab tu shes te/_de 'di snyam du sems so/_/de ltar lus grangs med pa zhig 'gags la 'gag par 'gyur zhing 'gag bzhin te/_'di ltar rgud par 'gyur yang lus la skyo ba mi skyed cing sdug bsngal gyi 'khrul 'khor je 
[\[213a.7\]]bas je 'phel du byed pa dang /_'khor ba'i rgyud las phyir mi ldog cing phung po'i gnas mi gtong ba dang /_khams [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]sbrul gyis skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_nga rgyal dang lta ba'i zug rngu mi 'byin cing 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]gi me lce 'bar ba zhi bar mi byed pa dang /_ma rig pa'i mun pa chen po mi sel cing srid pa'i mtsho mi skem la stobs bcu'i ded dpon mi tshol zhing bdud kyi bsam pa thibs po'i rjes su song ste 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs kyi chu srin gyis 
[\[213b.2\]]dkrugs pas yongs su g.yeng bar 'khod cing byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag de ltar mi shes shing rmongs pa ni ngo mtshar ches ma la bdag gis sems can de ltar sdug bsngal gyis mnar ba/_mgon med pa/_dpung gnyen med pa/_skyabs med 
[\[213b.3\]]pa/_gnas med pa/_gzhi med pa/_rten med pa/_long bar gyur pa/_ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dang /_bris yog pa/_mun pas khebs pa de dag gi don du bdag gcig pu gnyis su med pas bsod nams dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs 
[\[213b.4\]]kyi rnam par bstsags par bya ba ji lta bur bstsags pas sems can de dag shin tu rnam par dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_stobs bcu'i stobs kyi ye shes chags pa med pa'i bar gyi mthar thug pa thob par 'gyur ba'i 
[\[213b.5\]]rnam pa de lta bu'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bstsags par bya 'am ci snyam ste/_de de ltar shin tu brtags pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bsgrub pa'i blos dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang de dag thams cad sems can thams cad yongs su 
[\[213b.6\]]bskyab pa dang /_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_sems can thams cad la bde ba dang /_sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang /_sems can thams cad la gtse ba med pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol ba 
[\[213b.7\]]dang /_sems can thams cad drang ba dang /_sems can thams cad dad par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad gdul ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir rab tu rtsom ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]sa lnga pa shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni/_de bas kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos nyid kyis dran pa dang ldan pa yin/_shin tu nges par rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi blo gros dang 
[\[214a.2\]]ldan pa yin/_mdo'i don dang tshul dang ldem po'i ngag khong du chud pas rig pa dang ldan pa yin/_bdag dang gzhan gyi rjes su srung bas ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa yin/_sdom pa dang tshul ma bor bas dga' ba dang ldan pa yin/_gnas dang gnas ma 
[\[214a.3\]]yin pa la mkhas shing shin tu brtags pas blo dang ldan pa yin/_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pas ye shes dang ldan pa yin/_don dang don ma yin pa'i tshig yang dag par dbye ba la mkhas pas shes rab dang ldan pa yin/_bsgom pa mngon par bsgrub 
[\[214a.4\]]pa la mkhas pas mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa thob pa yin/_'jig rten gyi rjes su 'brang bas thabs la mkhas pa yin/_bsod nams kyi tshogs nye bar [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pas ngoms mi shes pa yin/_ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su tshol bas brtson 
[\[214a.5\]]'grus rgyun mi 'chad pa yin/_byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i tshogs yang dag par sogs pas skyo ba med pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su tshol bas 
[\[214a.6\]]snyom las med par yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsgrub pa dang /_rgyan mngon par shom pas mngon par bsgrub pa'i yid dang ldan pa yin/_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yang dag par bsgrub pas dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs la 
[\[214a.7\]]brtson pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyan yongs su tshol bas/_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par brtson pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' dang chos smra ba thams cad la rim gro byed pas bsnyen bkur dang /_sri zhu chen po'i dang 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]tshul can yin/_byang chub kyi sems dang thabs mkhas pa chen po'i ngang tshul dang ldan par 'jig rten du rgyu bas khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la mngon par brtson pas nyin mtshan du gzhan du 
[\[214b.2\]]sems pa'i yid yongs su spangs pa yin te/_de de ltar mngon par brtson pas sbyin pas kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed do/_/ngag snyan pa dang /_don bsgrub pa dang /_don mthun pa dang gzugs kyi lus kun tu bstan pa dang /_chos bshad pa 
[\[214b.3\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brjod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid smos pa dang /_'khor ba'i nyes pa bstan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yon tan yongs su grag par bya ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa chen po 
[\[214b.4\]]mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_bya ba dang thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sbyor bas sems can yongs su smin par byed do/_/de ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mngon par brtson pa dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rjes su song ba'i bsam pa 
[\[214b.5\]]can dge ba'i rtsa ba phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa/_khyad par can gyi chos yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson pa de gang 'di 'jig rten na yod pa'i yi ge dang gtsug lag dang /_lag brda dang /_grangs dang /_rtsis dang /_shod thabs las 
[\[214b.6\]{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_khams kyi cho ga dang /_gso ba'i cho ga dang /_skem pa dang /_brjed byed dang /_'byung po'i gdon bsal ba dang /_dug dang ro langs kyi sbyor ba bsal ba dang /_rang bzo dang gar gyi cho ga dang /_gtam dang /_rol mo dang /_sgrung gtam 
[\[214b.7\]]dga' ba bskyed pa dang /_grong dang grong khyer dang /_bza' shing gi ra ba dang /_chu klung dang /_mtshe'u dang /_lteng ka dang /_rdzing bu dang /_me tog dang /_shing tog dang /_rtsi dang /_nags tshal mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_baiDUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_rin po che shi la dang /_byi ru dang /_rin po che rnams kyi 'byung gnas bstan pa dang /_nyi ma dang zla ba dang /_gza' dang rgyu skar dang /_sa g.yo ba dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi ltas dang /_
[\[215a.2\]]rmi lam dang /_ltas bstan pa la 'jug pa dang /_yan lag dang /_nying lag gi mtshan dang /_spyod pa'i mtshan dang /_sdom pa dang /_tshul dang /_bsam gtan dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i gnas rnams dang /_
[\[215a.3\]]gzhan yang gang sems can la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba dang /_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ba yong dgu de dag thams cad 'jig rten la snying brtse bas rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir mngon par sgrub bo/_
[\[215a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lta ba rgya chen po dang /_smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po snang bar 'gyur te/_lta ba rgya chen po dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag 
[\[215a.5\]]mang po dang /_sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong 
[\[215a.6\]]phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po snang bar 'gyur ro/_/des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas bsam pa rgya chen pos rim gro byed do/_/bkur sti 
[\[215a.7\]]byed do/_/bsti stang byed do/_/mchod pa byed do/_/na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad dag kyang 'bul zhing byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo/_
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]dge 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la yang yang dag par mchod pa byed do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la rim 
[\[215b.2\]]gro byed cing de dag las rim gro dang /_zhe sa dang bsti stang du chos bstan pa nyan to/_/len to 'dzin to/_/thos nas kyang ci tshul du nan tan gyis yang dag par bsgrubs te/_de dag las phal cher de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi bstan pa la rab tu 
[\[215b.3\]]'byung ngo /_/rab tu byung nas kyang thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa'i chos smra bar 'gyur ba yin/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bskal pa 
[\[215b.4\]]du mar shin tu byang ba dang /_yongs su dag pa dang /_'od rab tu gsal bar gnas so/_/bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_
[\[215b.5\]]bskal pa khrag khrig phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag shin tu byang ba 
[\[215b.6\]]dang yongs su dag pa dang /_rab tu 'od gsal bar gnas so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/gser gyi sa le sbram de nyid rin po che mu sa ra gal pas btab na de bas kyang yongs su 'tsher ro/_/yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/'od shin tu gsal 
[\[215b.7\]]zhing dang bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thabs dang /_shes rab kyis rnam par spyad pa yang de bas kyang shin 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]tu byang ba dang /_yongs su dag pa dang rab tu 'od gsal zhing dang ba yin/_ye shes kyi sbyor ba'i yon tan mngon par bsgrub pa dang ldan pa yin/_mi 'phrogs shing shin tu brtags pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[216a.2\]]sras dag_/'di lta ste/_dper na/_nyi ma dang zla ba dang /_skar ma dang /_rgyu skar gyi gzhal med khang gi 'od snang ba ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis mi 'phrogs shing rlung dang thun mong du mi spyod pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[216a.3\]]dpa'i sa shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba 'di la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thabs dang shes rab dang ye shes dang sems kyis shin tu brtags pa dang ldan pa yang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin/_'jig rten pa dang thun mong du 
[\[216a.4\]]mi spyod pa yin/_de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shas che ba yin te/_lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su mi bsgrub pa ma yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shin tu 
[\[216a.5\]]rgyal bar dga' ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa mdor bstan pa'o/_/de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phal cher lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan du 'gyur te/_sems can thams cad kyi mu stegs kyi gnas thams cad rnam par 
[\[216a.6\]]zlog pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin/_de sbyin pa 'am ngag snyan pa 'am/_don bsgrub pa 'am/_don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/_de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/_gtso bor 'gyur/_
[\[216a.7\]]thu bor 'gyur/_phul du 'gyur/_dam par 'gyur/_bla na med par 'gyur/_'dren par 'gyur/_yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la brten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste/_sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang /_chos 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]yid la bya ba dang /_dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang /_stobs yid la bya ba dang /_
[\[216b.2\]]mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas/_rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te/_de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu 
[\[216b.3\]]ting nge 'dzin khrag khrig phrag stong rab tu 'thob cing de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig phrag stong mthong zhing de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig phrag stong skyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[216b.4\]]kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag stong du 'gro ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig phrag stong du snang bar bya ba dang /_sems can khrag khrig phrag stong yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig phrag stong du gnas par bya ba dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi 
[\[216b.5\]]ma'i mtha'i bskal pa khrag khrig phrag stong la rab tu 'jug pa dang /_chos kyi sgo khrag khrig phrag stong rnam par 'byed pa dang /_lus khrag khrig phrag stong yongs su bstan pa dang /_lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor khrag khrig phrag 
[\[216b.6\]]stong yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo/_/de yan cad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te/_de dag gi lus sam/_'od dam rdzu 'phrul lam 
[\[216b.7\]]mig gam/_spyod yul lam dbyangs sam/_spyod pa 'am rgyan tam byin gyis rlabs sam/_mos pa 'am/_mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas kyang bgrang bar dka' 'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang /_bstan par bya ba'i 
[\[217a.2\]]phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rgyal ba'i spyod pa bzhi po de ltar rnam sbyangs te/_/dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su sems byed cing /_/tshul khrims sems dang nan tan lam rnams rnam dag pas/_/nem nur med pa'i mkhas pa lnga po 
[\[217a.3\]]yongs su gnon/_/dran pa'i gzhu dang dbang po'i mda' rno phyir mi ldog_/yang dag spong ba rta yin bzhon pa rdzu 'phrul rkang /_stobs lnga go ca dgra rnams kyis ni tshugs mi nus/_/dpa' bas mi ldog mkhas pa lnga po yongs su gnon/_/ngo tsha khrel yod gos 
[\[217a.4\]]yin mkhas pa'i tshul gtsang spos/_/byang chub yan lag phreng ba byug pa bsam gtan mchog_/shes rab rnam par dpyod dang thabs mchog rgyan yin te/_/bza' shing ra ba ting 'dzin dga' ldan yang dag gnon/_/rdzu 'phrul bzhi po rkang pa dran pa rnam dag 
[\[217a.5\]]mgrin/_/byams brtse rnam dag mig yin shes rab mche ba mchog_/bdag med nga ros nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu 'joms/_/mkhas pa mi yi seng ge sa lnga yongs su gnon/_/de dag sa mchog lnga po'i phyogs su phyin gyur nas/_/yongs su 
[\[217a.6\]]dag pa'i lam rnams phyir zhing gong du sbyong /_/bsam dag mkhas pa rgyal ba 'thob par bya don du/_/skyo ba med par snying rje byams pa'i rjes su sems/_/bsod nams tshogs bstsags de bzhin ye shes rab ldan pa/_/sa rnams snang bar 
[\[217a.7\]]bya phyir gcig min thabs rtog cing /_/sangs rgyas byin gyis dran dang blo gros blo thob pas/_/bden pa bzhi po ma lus yang dag khong du chud/_/don dam bden pa de bzhin kun rdzob mtshan bden dang /_/rnam par dbye ba'i bden pa de bzhin brtag bden dang /_/
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]'byung zhing 'jug dang dngos po zhi lam bden pa nas/_/sgrib med bden pa'i bar du yang dag rab tu rtogs/_/de ltar bden pas yongs su sbyangs pa'i blo phra yang /_/rnam thar dam pa sgrib med de ni thob pa min/_/ye shes mos yangs yon tan rnams kyi 'byung 
[\[217b.2\]]gnas te/_/'gro kun dgra bcom rang rgyal rnams ni zil gyis gnon/_/de dag bden pas de ltar rang gi blo bsgrubs pas/_/'dus byas [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zhing rang bzhin snying po med par shes/_/sems can don du bde gshegs ye shes tshol ba'i tshe/_/
[\[217b.3\]]bde gshegs thugs brtse byams pa snang ba rab tu thob/_/'dus byas sngon dang phyi mtha' mkhas pa rab tu lta/_/gti mug mun nag mun pas 'khrugs shing sred tshags pa'i/_/'gro rnams sdug bsngal phung po lta ba bdag med cing /_/srog bral 
[\[217b.4\]]rtsa shing 'dra ba mngon par sel ba byed/_/nyon mongs rjes 'gro 'di dag 'das dang ma 'ongs pa'i/_/sdug bsngal rgyun gcod mthar phyin gzhal bar yong mi byed/_/kyi hud 'gro ba de ltar 'khyams shes snying rje skye/_/gti mug 'khrul bas 'khor 
[\[217b.5\]]ba'i rgyud du phyir mi ldog_/phung po'i gnas dang khams sbrul lta bu'i zug rngu can/_/mes gdungs yid can sgrib pa'i mun pas bsgribs gyur pa/_/don rnams rnam par ma brtags sred pa'i mtshor ltung zhing /_/rgyal ba'i ded dpon bral ba sdug 
[\[217b.6\]]bsngal rgya mtshor gnas/_/de ltar rig nas bag yod phyir zhing rab tu rtsom/_/ci rtsom kun kyang 'gro ba rnam thar don du ste/_/phyir zhing dran ldan blo gros rig dang ldan pa yin/_/khrel yod dga' ldan mkhas pa blo ldan shes rab ldan/_/bsod nams 
[\[217b.7\]]bstsags dang ye shes dam pas mi ngoms shing /_/rtag tu skyo med le lo med par thos pa tshol/_/zhing bsgrub rgyal ba'i mtshan dang sangs rgyas gsung tshol zhing /_/sems can phan par brtson pa'i bya bas ngoms mi shes/_/'gro ba smin bya'i don du 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]mkhas pas bzo yi gnas/_/yi ge lag brda grangs dang rtsis dang gso ba'i thabs/_/'byung po'i gdon dang las rnams sna tshogs bstsal ba'i phyir/_/snying brtse byams pa'i blo gsal gtsug lag kun 
[\[218a.2\]]la gzhol/_/rang bzo mchog dang gar sdug sna tshogs dga' byed dang /_/chu klung ra ba shing tog me tog 'dug gnas dang /_/bya ba sna tshogs sgrub byed sems can bde don du/_/rin chen 'byung gnas du ma 'ang nye bar ston pa byed/_/sa 
[\[218a.3\]]g.yo nyi zla gza' skar kun kyang de bzhin du/_/sems can yan lag mtshan ma'i dpyad dang rgyal srid gnas/_/gzugs med bsam gtan mngon shes mchog dang tshad med pa/_/'gro la bde dang phan pa'i don 'dod mngon par 
[\[218a.4\]]bsgrub/_/shin tu rgyal dka' 'di thob shes rab mchog spyod pa/_/sangs rgyas bye ba mchod byed chos rnams nyan pa byed/_/de dag dge dang bsam pa phyir zhing dag par 'gyur/_/gser sbram ji ltar mu sar gal bas btab pa 
[\[218a.5\]]bzhin/_/ji ltar bar snang gza'i rin chen gzhal med khang /_/rlung la rgyu ste 'on kyang rlung gis 'phrogs pa min/_/de ltar 'gro ba'i don spyod 'jig rten chos spyod kyang /_/ji ltar pad mo chus mi chags bzhin 'phrogs pa min/_
[\[218a.6\]]'di la gnas pa dga' ldan dbang po mkhas par 'gyur/_/mu stegs spyod dang lta ba mang po'i gnas kyang sel/_/stobs rnams bcu pos sems can bskyab par bya'o zhes/_/dge ba de dag rgyal ba'i ye shes don du rtsom/_
[\[218a.7\]]'di nas gong du brtson 'grus rtsom byed mthu thob pa/_/khrag khrig bye ba stong gi bde gshegs mchod pa byed/_/ting 'dzin thob nas khrag khrig zhing yang mkhas pas skyod/_/yan cad smon lam khyad par yon tan 'byung gnas so/_/
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]de ltar sa mchog lnga pa 'di/_/thabs kyi rnam pa khrag khrig gis/_/sems can gtso la yang dag tu/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyis bstan pa yin/_/shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba zhes bya ba ste/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa'o/_/
[\[218b.2\]]mkhas pa rnams kyi sa mchog spyod pa rab thob nas/_/rgyal sras dga' zhing mkha' las me tog char 'bebs so/_/nor bu rin chen rnam dag 'od gsal rgya chen 'byung ba dag_/bde bar gshegs la mngon 'thor dge zhes rnam par 
[\[218b.3\]]brjod/_lha rnams brgya phrag stong grangs dga' zhing bar snang las/_/lha rdzas yid 'ong rin chen sna tshogs phye ma'i rnams/_/bde bar gshegs la mngon 'thor byug pa phreng ba spos/_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan se mo do yang 'bul/_
[\[218b.4\]]lha'i dbang po dbang bsgyur lha tshogs mang po dang /_/steng gi mkha' la 'khod cing rin chen sprin yangs pa/_/rgyal ba mchod pa'i don du bde bar gshegs la 'thor/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyal sras legs zhes rnam par brjod/_/
[\[218b.5\]]bar snang gnas nas lha yi bu mo stong gis kyang /_/glu dbyangs yid 'ong rol mo'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa phyung /_/sgra rnams kun gyi dbyangs las 'di skad tshig kyang byung /_/rgyal ba'i gsung ni yid 'ong nyon mongs gdung ba sel/_/chos rnams 
[\[218b.6\]]thams cad stong zhing dngos zhi mtshan ma med/_/nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs mnyam rnam dag rnam mi rtog_/'gro dang gnas las rnam 'das ma lus spros pa med/_/de bzhin nyid du chos rnams yang dag mnyam mi rtog_/chos rnams kun la snang ba 
[\[218b.7\]]khong du sus chud pa/_/de la dngos dang dngos med g.yo ba gang yang med/_/snying rje brtse bas 'gro ba dgrol phyir brtson pa ni/_/de dang de dag rgyal sras chos kyi sku skyes pa'o/_/mtshan ma thams cad spangs shing sbyin pa'i spyad pa spyod/_/
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]tshul khrims shin tu sems dam sngon nas zhi zhing du la/_/'gro ba'i don du chos kyi ye shes mnyams bzod/_/brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan zhing chos rnams kun gyis dben/_/nyon mongs bstsal zhing rnam dag bsam gtan 
[\[219a.2\]]tshul la zhugs/_/dngos po thams cad snga nas zhi zhing rnam par phye/_/ye shes spyod dang stobs phyug rtag tu 'gro don brtson/_/rgyal sras de dag sdig zhi che ba nyid dang ldan/_/de skad sgra dbyangs snyan pa stong grangs brjod byas nas/_/lha'i bu mo mi 
[\[219a.3\]]smra dad par thub la lta/_/rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med la/_thar pa'i zla bas yang smras pa/_/sa mchog lnga yi gong ma de/_/rnam pa ci 'dras 'grub par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 
[\[219a.4\]]de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa la/_sa'i lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa la 'jug go_/de chos mnyam pa nyid bcus 'jug ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med 
[\[219a.5\]]pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad mi skye ba mnyam pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad ma byung ba mnyam pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad dben pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad snga nas 
[\[219a.6\]]rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad spros pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad blang ba med pa dang /_dor ba med pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad sgyu ma dang rmi lam dang mig yor dang sgra brnyan dang /_chu'i zla ba dang /_
[\[219a.7\]]gzugs brnyan dang /_sprul pa dang mtshungs pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad dngos po yod pa dang /_dngos po med pa dang /_gnyis ka ma yin pa mnyam pa nyid de/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/chos mnyam pa nyid bcu po 'di dag gis byang chub 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]sems dpa' sa drug pa la 'jug go_/de chos thams cad la rang bzhin de 'dra bar rab tu rtog cing dpyod pa dang /_'thun par sems shing mi 'thun par mi byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa 'thun pa'i bzod pa rnon pos 'thob ste/_'on kyang da dung mi skye 
[\[219b.2\]]ba'i chos la bzod pa mngon du gyur pa ni thob pa ma yin no/_/de chos thams cad la rang bzhin de ltar rtog pa'i tshe/_de bas kyang snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang /_snying rje chen po la dbang sgyur bas snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya 
[\[219b.3\]]ba'i phyir 'jig rten 'byung ba dang /_'jig pa la rnam par lta'o/_/de 'jig rten 'byung ba dang /_'jig pa la lta ba'i tshe 'di snyam ste/_'jig rten kun tu rgyu ba'i skye ba ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdag tu mngon par zhen pa las 'byung ste/_bdag tu mngon par zhen pa dang bral 
[\[219b.4\]]na 'byung ba yang med par 'gyur ro/_/byis pa'i blo can bdag tu mngon par zhen pa mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis bsgribs pa/_yod pa dang /_med pa la mngon par mos pa/_tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa la gzhol ba/_yang dag pa ma yin par rab tu zhugs pa/_
[\[219b.5\]]log pa'i rjes su 'brang ba de dag ni bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'du byed nye bar [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]te/_'du byed de dag gis yongs su bsgos pa'i sems kyis bon zag pa dang bcas pa/_nye bar len pa dang bcas pa ni ma 
[\[219b.6\]]'ongs pa'i skye ba dang /_rga shi dang /_yang srid pa mngon par 'grub pa 'byung bar nye bar song ba yin te/_las kyi zhing gi gzhi dang /_ma rig pa'i mun pa dang sred pa'i snum dang /_nga'i nga rgyal gyis brlan pa'i lta ba'i rnam pa dang 
[\[219b.7\]]'dra ba rab tu 'phel bas ming dang gzugs kyi [{]myi [,]mi [}]gu 'byung ste/_byung nas rnam par 'phel lo/_/ming dang gzugs kyi [{]myi [,]mi [}]gu rnam par 'phel nas dbang po lnga 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po lnga byung nas phan tshun 'dus shing 'phrad pas 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]reg par 'gyur ro/_/reg pa 'dus pas tshor ba 'byung ngo /_/tshor nas de'i rjes su mngon par smon pas sred pa 'byung ngo /_/sred pa ni nye bar len pa rnam par 'phel bar byed do/_/nye bar len pa rnam par 'phel 
[\[220a.2\]]ba las srid pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/srid pa byung nas phung po lnga po 'byung bar 'gyur te/_phung po lnga byung nas lam gyi rgyud lngar rim gyis dengs par 'gyur ro/_/dengs nas 'bral bar 'gyur te dengs shing bral bas/_mi dga' zhing yongs su gdung bar 
[\[220a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/mi dga' ba dang yongs su gdung ba'i rgyus mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_yang de dag las su 'ang 'byung bar byed pa med do/_/rang bzhin dang lhun gyis grub 
[\[220a.4\]]par 'jig par 'gyur yang de dag la 'jig par byed pa su 'ang med do zhes de ltar/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lugs su mthun par rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rab tu rtog go_/de 'di snyam du sems te bden par 
[\[220a.5\]]mngon par mi shes pa ni yang dag par ma rig pa ste/_ma rig pas byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa ni 'du byed rnams so/_/'du byed la gnas pa'i sems dang po ni rnam par shes pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa dang /_lhan cig tu skyes pa'i nye bar len pa'i 
[\[220a.6\]]phung po bzhi ni ming dang gzugs so/_/ming dang gzugs rnam par 'phel ba ni drug gi skye mched do/_/dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa gsum phrad pa zag pa dang bcas pa ni reg pa'o/_/reg pa'i rjes las skyes pa ni tshor 
[\[220a.7\]]ba'o/_/tshor ba la chags pa ni sred pa'o/_/sred pa rnam par 'phel ba ni nye bar len pa'o/_/nye bar len pa las byung ba'i las zag pa dang bcas pa ni srid pa'o/_/las dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni skye ba'o/_/skye ba ni phung po 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]'byung ba'o/_/phung po yongs su smin pa ni rga ba'o/_/rgas nas phung po 'jig pa ni 'chi ba'o/_/'chi zhing 'bral ba'i tshe mos shing chags par gyur pa'i sems la yongs su gdung ba ni mya ngan to/_/mya ngan las byung ba'i tshig tu 
[\[220b.2\]]rjod pa ni smre sngags 'don pa'o/_/dbang po lnga'i nyams su bab pa ni sdug bsngal lo/_/yid kyi lta ba'i nyams su bab pa ni yid mi bde ba'o/_/sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba mang po byung ba ni 'khrugs pa ste/_de ltar na sdug bsngal 
[\[220b.3\]]gyi phung po chen po dang sdug bsngal gyi sdong po 'ba' shig byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po med pa mngon par grub par 'gyur ro/_/de 'di snyam du sems te byed pa po la mngon par chags pas las rnams yod par gyur to/_/gang na byed pa po med pa 
[\[220b.4\]]de na don dam par las kyang mi dmigs so/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar khams gsum pa 'di ni sems tsam ste/_gang 'di srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu phye ste/_bka' stsal pa de dag thams cad kyang sems 
[\[220b.5\]]gcig la gnas pa dag go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dngos pa gang la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems skyes pa de ni rnam par shes pa'o/_/dngos po ni 'du byed do/_/'du byed la mgo rmongs pa ni ma rig pa'o/_/ma rig pa'i sems dang 
[\[220b.6\]]lhan cig skyes pa ni ming dang gzugs so/_/ming dang gzugs rnam par 'phel ba ni drug gi skye mched do/_/drug gi skye mched dang 'brel ba ni reg pa'o/_/reg pa dang lhan cig skyes pa ni tshor ba'o/_/tshor bas mi ngoms pa ni sred pa'o/_/
[\[220b.7\]]sred pas mnar te sdud cing me gtong ba ni nye bar len pa'o/_/srid pa'i yan lag 'byung ba 'di dag ni srid pa'o/_/srid pa 'byung ba ni skye ba'o/_/skye ba yongs su smin pa ni rga ba'o/_/rga ba dang bral ba ni 'chi ba'o/_/de la ma 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]rig pa ni bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/_sems can rnams kyang dmigs pa la rmongs par byed do/_/'du byed mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to/_/'du byed rnams kyang bya ba gnyis su nye 
[\[221a.2\]]bar gnas pa yin te/_ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par smin pa yang mngon par 'grub par byed do/_/rnam par shes pa mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to/_/rnam par shes pa 'ang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/_srid pa'i 
[\[221a.3\]]nying gi mtshams kyang sbyor ro/_/ming dang gzugs mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to/_/ming dang gzugs kyang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/_phan tshun nye bar rton pa yang byed do/_/skye mched drug mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to/_/
[\[221a.4\]]drug gi skye mched kyang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/_rang gi yul rnam par phye ba yang ston to/_/reg pa mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to/_/reg pa yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa la reg par yang byed do/_/tshor ba mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 
[\[221a.5\]]'byin to/_/tshor ba yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/_yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba dang gnyis ka ma yin par tshor ba yang skyed do/_/sred pa mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to/_/sred pa yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/_
[\[221a.6\]]chags par 'gyur ba'i dngos po la mngon par chags par yang byed do/_/nye bar len pa mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to/_/nye bar len pa yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/_kun nas nyon mongs pas 'ching ba yang byed do/_/srid 
[\[221a.7\]]pa mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyu yang 'byin to/_/srid pa yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/_srid pa'i rgyud gzhan du yang gnas par byed do skye ba mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to/_/skye ba yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/_
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]phung po 'byung bar yang byed do/_/rga ba mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to/_/rga ba yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/_dbang po yongs su 'gyur bar yang byed do/_/'chi bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu yang 'byin to/_/'chi ba yang bya ba 
[\[221b.2\]]gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te 'du byed 'jig par yang byed do/_/yongs su ma shes pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to/_/de la ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams so/_/zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams rgyun 
[\[221b.3\]]mi 'chad cing rton pa'o/_/'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa'o/_/zhes bya ba ni 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs shes bya ba ni rnam par shes 
[\[221b.4\]]ba'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o/_/ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis drug gi skye mched ces bya ba ni ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis drug gi skye mched rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o/_/drug gi skye mched kyi rkyen gyis reg 
[\[221b.5\]]pa'o/_zhes bya ba ni drug gi skye mched kyi rkyen gyis reg pa rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o/_/reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/_/zhes bya ba ni reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rgyun mi 'chad cing ston pa'o/_/tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa'o/_/
[\[221b.6\]]zhes bya ba ni tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o/_/sred pa'i rkyen gyis nye bar len pa'o/_/zhes bya ba ni sred pa'i rkyen gyis nye bar len pa rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o/_/nye bar len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa'o/_/zhes 
[\[221b.7\]]bya ba ni len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o/_/srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba'o/_/zhes bya ba ni srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o/_/skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi'o zhes bya ba ni skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi rgyun mi 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]'chad cing rton pa'o/_/ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed rnams 'gag go/_/zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa'i rkyen med pas 'du byed rnams nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o/_/'du byed 'gags pas rnam 
[\[222a.2\]]par shes pa 'gag go/_/zhes bya ba ni 'du byed kyi rkyen med pas rnam par shes pa nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag go/_/zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i rkyen med pas ming dang 
[\[222a.3\]]gzugs nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o/_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas drug gi skye mched 'gag go/_/zhes bya ba ni ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen med pas drug gi skye mched nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o/_/drug gi skye mched 'gags pas 
[\[222a.4\]]reg pa 'gag go/_/zhes bya ba ni drug gi skye mched kyi rkyen med pas reg pa nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o/_/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag go_/zhes bya ba ni reg pa'i rkyen med pas tshor ba nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o/_/tshor ba 
[\[222a.5\]]'gags pas sred pa 'gag go_/zhes bya ba ni tshor ba'i rkyen med pas sred pa nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o/_/srid pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag go_/zhes bya ba ni sred pa'i rkyen med pas len pa nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o/_/nye 
[\[222a.6\]]bar len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag go_/zhes bya ba ni nye bar len pa'i rkyen med pas srid pa nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o/_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag go_/zhes bya ba ni srid pa'i rkyen med pas skye ba nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med 
[\[222a.7\]]pa'o/_skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag go_/zhes bya ba ni skye ba'i rkyen med pas rga shi nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o/_/de la ma rig pa dang srid pa dang nye bar len pa ni nyon mongs pa'i lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/_/'du byed dang srid pa ni 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]las kyi lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/_/lhag ma rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/_/rab tu rnam par phye bas sngun gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' 'gags pas lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/_/de ltar lam 'di gsum ni bdag 
[\[222b.2\]]med cing bdag dang bdag gi dang bral bar 'byung zhing 'jig pa ste/_rang bzhin gyis mdung khyim lta bu'o/_/de ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams shes bya ba 'di ni sngon gyi mtha' la bltas pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs 
[\[222b.3\]]dang drug gi skye mched dang reg pa dang /_tshor ba 'di dag ni da ltar byung ba la bltas pa'o/_/sred pa dang nye bar len pa dang srid pa dang /_skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni phyi ma'i mtha' la bltas pa ste/_de phan chad du 'ang de dag rgyun du 'byung ngo /_/ma 
[\[222b.4\]]rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed rnams 'gag ces bya ba 'di ni lta ba rgyun chad pa ste lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/yang 'di ltar srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis po 'di dag gi rgyus sdug bsngal gsum 'byung ste/_de la ma rig pa dang 'du 
[\[222b.5\]]byed dang rnam par shes pa dang ming dang /_gzugs dang /_drug gi skye mched ces bya ba ni/_'du byed kyi sdug bsngal lo/_/reg pa dang tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi yang sdug bsngal lo/_/sred pa dang nye bar len pa dang /_
[\[222b.6\]]srid pa dang /_skye ba nas 'khrug pa zhes bya ba'i bar 'di ni 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal lo/_/ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed rnams 'gag ces bya ba 'di ni sdug bsngal gsum gyi rgyun chad pa'o/_/ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams 
[\[222b.7\]]shes bya ba ni 'du byed rnams rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba ste/_lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag ces bya ba ni/_'du byed rnams med pa ste/_lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/ma rig pa'i rkyen 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]gyis 'du byed rnams shes bya ba ni skye ba rnam par 'brel ba ste/_lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag ces bya ba ni/_'jig pa rnam par 'brel ba ste/_lhag ma rnams kyang 
[\[223a.2\]]de bzhin no/_/ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams shes bya ba ni srid pa lugs su 'thun par brtag pa ste/_lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag ces bya ba ni zad pa dang 'jig pa'i lugs su 'thun par 
[\[223a.3\]]brtag pa ste/_lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/zhes de ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la lugs su 'thun pa dang /_mi 'thun pa'i tshul du rab tu rtog ste/_'di ltar srid pa'i yan lag rjes su 'brel ba dang /_sems gcig tu yang 
[\[223a.4\]]dag par 'du ba dang /_rang gi las ma 'dres pa dang /_ched du byed pa med pa dang lam gsum gyi rgyud du 'grang ba dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang da ltar byung ba dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' la blta ba dang /_sdug bsngal gsum 'byung ba dang /_rgyu dang rkyen 
[\[223a.5\]]las byung ba dang /_skye ba dang 'jig pa rnam par 'brel ba dang /_srid pa'i lugs su 'thun pa dang /_zad par 'gyur bar rab tu rtog pa'o/_/de de ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rnam pa bcur rab tu rtog cing bdag med pa dang /_srog 
[\[223a.6\]]med pa dang /_gang zag med pa dang /_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po med par rab tu rtog pa'i tshe/_stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgo skyes pa yin/_srid pa'i yan lag 'di dag gi rang bzhin 'gags 
[\[223a.7\]]shing rnam par thar pa la shin tu nye bar gnas pas chos kyi mtshan ma gang yang mi skye ste des de'i mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo skyes pa yin/_de ltar de stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa la zhugs pas snying rje chen po sngon du gtong 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]zhing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ma gtogs par 'dod pa gang yang mi skye ste des de'i smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo skyes pa yin/_de rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di dag sgom pas bdag dang pha rol gyi 'du shes dang bral ba 
[\[223b.2\]]dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang bral ba dang /_yod pa dang med pa'i 'du shes dang bral bas/_byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po sngon du btang ste/_de bas kyang 
[\[223b.3\]]shin tu brtson par byed do/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_'du ba yod pas ni 'dus byas 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/'du ba dang bral bas ni 'phel ba med do/_/rgyu rkyen dang ldan pas ni 'du byed 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyu rkyen dang mi ldan pas ni 
[\[223b.4\]]'phel ba med do/_/de lta bas na bdag gis de lta bu'i 'dus byas nyes pa mang po'i skyon can shes par byas te 'du ba dang rgyu rkyen dang ldan pa 'di dag rgyun gcad par bya'o/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'du byed rnams 
[\[223b.5\]]shin tu zhi ba 'ang mngon du mi bya'o zhes te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de de ltar 'du byed kyi rnam pa de ltar nyes pa mang po'i skyon can snying po dang rang bzhin med pa skye ba med pa 'gag pa med pa'i rang bzhin du rab tu rtog pa dang snying rje chen po rab tu bsgrub 
[\[223b.6\]]pa dang /_sems can yongs su mi gtong bas chags pa med pa'i ye shes mngon sum zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa snang ba'i tshul du mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan zhing shes rab [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]pha rol tu phyin 
[\[223b.7\]]pa la gnas pas snang bar gyur nas kyang /_byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su sdud pa'i rkyen nye bar [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]shing yang dag par sdud do/_/'dus byas dang 'grogs par yang mi gnas so/_/'du byed rnams rang bzhin gyis zhi ba yang rab 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]tu rtog go_/'on kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma rdzogs pa'i phyir de la mi gnas te/_de byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i tshe 'jug pa stong pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[224a.2\]]rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_'du ba stong pa nyid dang /_mngon par bsgrub pa stong pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rtog pa'i stong pa nyid dang /_ltos pa stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[224a.3\]]tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu de la mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin brgya stong 
[\[224a.4\]]phrag bcu dang smon pa med pa'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de phyir zhing mi phyed pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob po/_/
[\[224a.5\]]nges pa'i bsam pa dang dge ba'i bsam pa dang /_zab pa'i bsam pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i bsam pa dang /_rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bsam pa dang /_dri ma med pa'i bsam pa dang /_mtha' yas pa'i bsam pa dang /_ye shes la mngon par 
[\[224a.6\]]mos pa'i bsam pa dang /_thabs dang shes rab tu ldan pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa 'di bcu ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi rjes su song ba yin/_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad 
[\[224a.7\]]kyi phyir mi ldog pa yin/_ye shes kyi sa la yang dag par gzhol ba yin/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis las rnam par log pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon du bya ba la shin tu nges pa yin/_bdud dang nyon mongs pa 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]kun nas rgyu ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba la shin tu gnas pa yin/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i chos yang dag par spyad pa yongs su bsgoms pa yin/_
[\[224b.2\]]thabs dang /_shes rab dang /_ye shes rnam par dpyad pa dang ldan pa yin/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_rnam par 'dres pa yin/_de ltar de byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/_
[\[224b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i shas che ba yin/_chos de dag la tshul bzhin du 'thun par byed cing mi mthun par mi byed pas 'thun pa'i bzod pa gsum pa rab tu rno ba rab tu skyes pa yin/_de ltar de byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[224b.4\]]sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i tshe de'i lta ba rgya chen po dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po snang bar 'gyur te/_lta ba rgya chen po dang /_smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang sangs rgyas 
[\[224b.5\]]brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs 
[\[224b.6\]]rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po snang bar 'gyur ro/_/des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas bsam pa rgya chen pos rim gro byed do/_/bkur sti byed do/_/bsti 
[\[224b.7\]]stang byed do/_/mchod pa byed do/_/na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi rkyen sman dang yo byad dag kyang 'bul zhing byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo/_/dge 'dun gyi 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]tshogs rnams la yang yang dag par mchod pa byed de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la 
[\[225a.2\]]bsnyen bkur byed cing rim gro dang /_bkur stis nan tan tu chos nyan cing len to/_/'dzin to/_/thos nas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_shes rab dang ye shes kyi snang bas rab tu brtson par byed de nan tan gyis yongs su 
[\[225a.3\]]'dzin pas de sngon pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod rab tu thob pa yin/_de ltar de byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /_
[\[225a.4\]]bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang /_
[\[225a.5\]]bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar sngon bas kyang ches byang ba dang /_ces 'od gsal zhing dang bar gnas so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_gser gyi sa le sbram de 
[\[225a.6\]]nyid bai DUr+yas btab na sngon bas kyang shin tu 'tsher la 'od gsal zhing dang bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag
