[\[225a.7\]]kyang shes rab dang ye shes kyis shin tu brtags pas sngon bas kyang shin tu byang la 'od gsal zhing dang ba yin te/_phyi phyir zhing yang rab tu zhi bas mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_zla ba'i 'od ni sems 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]can gyi lus kyang sim par byed la/_rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po bzhis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i dge 
[\[225b.2\]]ba'i rtsa ba de dag sngon bas kyang sems can du ma'i bsam pa'i nyon mongs pa 'bar ba yang zhi zhing sim par byed la/_bdud kyi lam gyi rgyud bzhis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin/_de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas che 
[\[225b.3\]]ba yin te/_lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par mi bsgrub pa ma yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum zhes bya ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa'o/_/de la gnas 
[\[225b.4\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phal cher lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dgar 'gyur te/_sems can thams cad kyi lhag pa'i nga rgyal zhi bar bya ba la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin/_nyan pa thams cad kyi yongs su dri bas 
[\[225b.5\]]mi 'phrogs pa yin/_de sbyin pa 'am/_ngag snyan pa 'am/_don bsgrub pa 'am/_don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/_de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/_gtso bor 'gyur 
[\[225b.6\]]thu bor 'gyur/_phul du 'gyur/_dam par 'gyur/_bla na med par 'gyur/_'dren par 'gyur/_yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la brten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste/_sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang /_chos yid la 
[\[225b.7\]]bya ba dang /_dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang /_stobs yid la bya ba dang /_
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas/_rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te/_de 
[\[226a.2\]]'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin khrag khrig brgya stong rab tu 'thob cing de dag la mnyam par gzhog pa dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong mthong ba dang /_de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi 
[\[226a.3\]]khams khrag khrig brgya stong skyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig brgya stong du 'gro ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig brgya stong snang bar bya ba dang /_sems can khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_bskal 
[\[226a.4\]]pa khrag khrig brgya stong du gnas par bya ba dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong la rab tu 'jug pa dang /_chos kyi sgo khrag khrig brgya stong rnam par 'byed pa dang /_lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs 
[\[226a.5\]]su bstan pa dang /_lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor khrag khrig brgya stong yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo/_/de yan cad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi 
[\[226a.6\]]khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te de dag gi lus sam/_'od dam rdzu 'phrul lam/_mig gam spyod yul lam/_dbyangs sam/_spyod pa 'am/_rgyan tam byin gyi rlabs sam/_mos pa 'am/_mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa 
[\[226a.7\]]du ma dang /_bskal ba brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang /_bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/mkhas pas lam gyi spyod pa lnga por yongs rdzogs nas/_/chos rnams mtshan med mtshan nyid med dang ma skyes dang /_/
[\[226b.2\]]ma byung snga nas yongs su zhi zhing spros med pa/_/yongs su bsgom pas ye shes blo can drug pa gnon/_/chos rnams dben zhing len med rnam par rtog med dang /_/sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gnyis ka'i dngos lam rnam grol bas/_/chos kyi tshul la 
[\[226b.3\]]'gal med rjes su 'thun byed cing /_/ye shes ldan pa'i dam pa drug pa yongs su gnon/_/'thun pa rno la gnas shing ye shes stobs ldan pa/_/'jig rten kun gyi 'byung dang 'jig la rab tu rtog_/gti mug mun pas 'gro ba 'byung ba kun 
[\[226b.4\]]tu skyed/_/gti mug de nyid bral bas 'byung ba med pa yin/_/rkyen gyi rnam pa don dam stong par rnam par 'byed/_/bya ba mi 'gal rgyu rkyen byed pa mnyam par shes/_/yang dag ji bzhin byed pa med par las shes nas/_/'dus byas sprin sdug lta bur byed pa med 
[\[226b.5\]]par shes/_/bden pa mi shes de ni yang dag ma rig pa/_/las ni sems kyi stobs kyis mgo rmongs byung bar gyur/_/sems la rten te lhan cig byung ba ming dang gzugs/_/de ltar sdug bsngal phung po chen po'i bar du 'byung /_/khams gsum sems kyi rgyu 
[\[226b.6\]]las byung bar de 'jug ste/_/srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis 'di dag sems gcig rten/_/'dod chags skyes pa de las sems su brjod pa yin/_/de bzhin srid pa'i dngos po sems kyi rnam pa'o/_/ma rig bya ba gnyis byed rmongs pa'i dngos po la/_/rmongs par 
[\[226b.7\]]byas shing de nas sems pa'i rgyu yang 'byin/_/de bzhin rga ba phung po gzhig bya 'jig byed par/_/de las sdug bsngal ming thogs thams cad mi zad 'byung /_ma rig rkyen gyis chad par 'gyur ba yod pa ma ni/_/rnam par chad cing rgyu rkyen bral bas yod pa 'gag_/
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]gti mug sred pa nyer len nyon mongs lam yin te/_/las dang srid pa sems pa lhag ma sdug bsngal yin/_/gti mug skye mched bar du 'dus byas sdug bsngal te/_/reg dang tshor ba de dag sdug bsngal sdug bsngal yin/_/yan lag lhag 
[\[227a.2\]]ma 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal rnams 'phel ba/_/bdag med shes pas sdug bsngal gsum po 'chad par 'gyur/_/mun pa sems dang 'dus byas 'di ni sngon ltas yin/_/rnam par shes nas tshor ba'i rgyud tu da ltar byung /_/sred dang srid par sdug bsngal 'byung ba phyi 
[\[227a.3\]]ma'i mtha'/_/'gags shing zad pa de dag lta ba chad pa yin/_gti mug rkyen gyis de dag rnam par 'brel ba 'byung /_/zad pas byang chub rkyen rnams rnam par 'brel ba yin/_/rgyu las rgyu 'byung med na rgyu yi rgyun chad 'gyur/_/bde phan shes ldan rang 
[\[227a.4\]]bzhin stong pa de ltar rtog_/rgyud du 'thun pa gti mug mun las byung ba yin/_/mi 'thun bzlog pa gti mug zad pas mi 'byung ba'o/_/zab pa'i rkyen dang de dag yod dang med pa las/_/gnas pa med blo rnam pa bcur ni de ltar rtog_/srid pa'i 
[\[227a.5\]]yan lag mtshams dang sems gcig las 'thun dang /_/ched du mi byed rgyud gsum rjes 'brang sngon mtha' dang /_/sdug bsngal gsum dang rgyus byung skye dang 'jig pa dang /_/srid pa'i mthar phyin zad dang rkyen gyi lugs 'thun par/_/de ltar 
[\[227a.6\]]rten 'brel 'byung la yang dag 'jug byed pas/_/sgyu 'dra yang dag ma yin tshor bar byed med cing /_/rmi lam 'dra ba de bzhin mig yor 'dra ba ste/_/byis pa bslu ba'i smig rgyu rang bzhin mtshungs mnyam pa/_/de ltar bsgom pa mkhas pa'i stong pa 
[\[227a.7\]]nyid kyi sgo/_/rkyen rnams med pa de ni mtshan ma med pa ste/_/log par shes pas nam yang smon pa med pa yin/_/gzhan du sems can snying brtse'i don du skye ba 'dzin/_/de 'dra'i rnam thar sgo la sgom byed mthu che ba/_/
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]snying brtse'i blo ldan sangs rgyas yon tan mngon 'dod cing /_/'dus byas 'dus pa mkhas pa yongs su rtog byed pas/_/bsam pa nges shing gcig min legs dang ldan pa yin/_/stong nyid ting 'dzin stong phrag bcu rnams yongs su rgyas/_
[\[227b.2\]]de bzhin brtan pa mtshan ma med dang smon med ldan/_/shes rab shas che 'thun pa'i bzod pa mchog can te/_/mkhas pa'i rnam thar ye shes chags pa med dang ldan/_/de 'dra'i bsam pas drang srong che mang mchod byed pas/_/rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di 
[\[227b.3\]]la shin tu bsngags pa yin/_/de ni sangs rgyas mdzod thob khong du chud pas na/_/bai DUR+Yas btab gser mchog bzhin du sngon bas gsal/_/zla ba'i 'od ni 'gro ba'i lus la sim par byed/_/rlung bzhi langs pas yongs su 'phrogs par mi 
[\[227b.4\]]nus so/_/rgyal sras 'od kyang bdud kyi lam las shin tu 'das/_/nyon mongs yongs su gdung dang sdug bsngal nad kyang sel/_/sa 'di phyogs su phyin pa lha yi bdag por 'gyur/_/'phrul dga'i dam pa lhag pa'i nga rgyal sel la mkhas/_/ye 
[\[227b.5\]]shes lam dang ldan pa de ni ci rtsom yang /_/nyan thos lam las 'das te brtan zhing mi 'phrogs pa'o/_/bde gshegs sras po brtson 'grus ldan pa 'dod gyur na/_/ting 'dzin bye ba brgya stong tshang ba thob par byed/_/skad cig gcig tu phyogs bcur 
[\[227b.6\]]sangs rgyas mang po lta/_/dpyid kyi nyi ma gsal zhing lhan par byed pa bzhin/_/zab cing blta dka' phra ba ste/_/nyan thos nga rgyal shes mi nus/_/bdag nyid che la sa drug pa/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyis bshad pa yin/_/
[\[227b.7\]]mngon sum pa zhes bya ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa'o//_//sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po bcu bdun pa/_/de nas sna tshogs 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]yid 'ong sprin/_/lha tshogs mang po mkha' la gnas shing mngon par 'thor/_/tshig snyan rnam par brjod pa byed/_/dga' ba'i dam pa mchog gis yongs su rgyas/_/dge'o don 
[\[228a.2\]]dam sems mdzad cing /_/yon tan brgya dang yang dag ldan zhing dbang sgyur ba/_/mi yi pun dA ri ka yin/_/'gro la phan pa'i spyod rab yang dag bshad/_/yid 'ong 'od mchog ldan khyod dang /_/mi yi gtso bo mya ngan yongs su 
[\[228a.3\]]sel mdzad la/_/dbang phyug chen po mkha' gnas shing /_/spos sprin yid 'ong dam pa mngon par 'thor/_/tshig snyan rab tu brjod pa byed/_/lha tshogs mang po mkha' las dga' 'gyur dbyangs sgrog cing /_/gang gis sa 
[\[228a.4\]]bstan 'di thos pa/_/de dag thob pa bzang po thob ces zer/_/rol mo brdung dkrol dbyangs snyan pa/_/brgya mang lha yi bu mos dga' bar byas/_/bde bar gshegs dang khyod mthu yis/_/tshig rab 'di 'dra rab tu brjod par 
[\[228a.5\]]'gyur/_/zhi dang nges spyod dam pa can/_/ma dul 'dul mdzad 'jig rten kun gyis mchod byas pa/_/'jig rten kun las 'das pa yi/_/'jig rten spyod pa shin tu phra ba bstan/_/sna tshogs lus kyang rab tu bstan/_lus dang lus 
[\[228a.6\]]la chos nyid phun sum tshogs shing ldan/_/rnam dpyod zhi gnas mthus bcil bas/_/dbyangs su sgrog kyang yi ge brjod mi byed/_/zhing rnams brgyar yang 'dod byed cing /_/mgon po mchod par 'os la mchod rab byed/_/zhing rgyal 
[\[228a.7\]]bdag tu 'du shes pa/_/ye shes dbang sgyur mchog gis rab tu sel/_/sems can yongs su smin byed kyang /_/bdag dang gzhan gyi 'du shes rnam pa kun tu med/_/dge ba yangs pa yang dag [{]stsogs[,]sogs[}]/_/'on kyang dge ba 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]la gnas pa med/_'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis/_/'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'bar bar mthong gyur cing /_/'du shes thams cad rnam spangs nas/_/snying brtse ldan par brtson 'grus rab tu rtsom/_/lha 
[\[228b.2\]]mang lha yi bu mo yis/_/gsung ba'i mchog la mchod byas nas/_/kun kyang mi smra dgar gyur te/_/drang srong che la lta zhing gnas/_/thar ba'i zla bas yang smras pa/_/'khor rnams shin tu rnam par dang /_/sa bdun pa yi rnam pa 
[\[228b.3\]]dag_/rgyal ba'i sras kyis bshad pa mdzod/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa la de ltar sa'i lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[228b.4\]]dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa yongs su gnon to/_/de thabs dang shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i lam brtsam pa'i khyad par bcus yongs su gnon te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma 
[\[228b.5\]]med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa'i yid dang yang ldan la bsod nams dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yang yang dag par [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa yin/_/bdag med pa dang /_gso ba med pa dang /_gang zag med pa'i chos la 
[\[228b.6\]]'ang rab tu 'jug la tshad med pa bzhi mngon par bsgrub pa yang yongs su mi gtong ba yin/_bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis shin tu mtho ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'ang mngon par sgrub la/_chos gang la 'ang mngon par chags pa med pa yin/_khams 
[\[228b.7\]]gsum pa las dben par gyur pa'ang thob la khams gsum pa bsdu ba dang /_rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa yin/_nyon mongs pa 'bar ba thams cad shin tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi ste/_nye bar zhi ba 'ang yin la sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]gti mug dang /_nyon mongs pa'i me lce rab tu zhi bar mngon par bsgrub pa'ang mngon par sgrub pa yin/_sgyu ma dang rmi lam dang mig yor dang /_sgra brnyan dang /_chu'i zla ba dang /_gzugs brnyan dang /_sprul pa'i rang bzhin lta bur 
[\[229a.2\]]yod pa dang /_med pa dang /_gnyis ka ma yin pa thams cad kyang khong du chud la/_las dang bya ba rnam par phye ba tshad med pa'i bsam pa yang mngon par sgrub pa yin/_zhing gi tha gru nam mkha' dang mnyam par shin tu bsgoms pa'i yid dang 
[\[229a.3\]]yang ldan la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong zhing bsgrub pa dang /_rgyan kyang mngon par sgrub pa yin/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang /_chos dang /_sku nam mkha' lta bur yang rab tu 'jug la/_gzugs dang /_mtshan 
[\[229a.4\]]dang /_dpe byad bzang po bsdu zhing rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa'ang mngon par sgrub pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rang bzhin gyis zhi zhing brjod du med pa'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan par yang yid ches la sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag 
[\[229a.5\]]rnam par phye ba'i rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa yang mngon par sgrub pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis skad cig gcig tu dus gsum thugs su chud par yang khong du chud la dus dang bsgal pa'i grangs mtshan 
[\[229a.6\]]nyid tha dad pa la'ang sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par bsgom pa'i phyir rjes su 'jug pa yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/thabs dang shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i lam brtsam pa'i khyad par 'di bcus/_byang chub sems 
[\[229a.7\]]dpa' sa drug pa la rnam par dbye ba shin tu byas pa/_sa bdun yongs su gnon to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi tshogs thabs dang shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrub 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]pa'i khyad par snang bar gyur pa 'di dag mngon par bsgrubs pas/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun yongs su gnon ces bya ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi khams 
[\[229b.2\]]tshad med pa la 'jug go_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/_sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /_'dul ba'i phrin las tshad med pa la 'jug go_/'jig rten gyi khams mang po tshad med pa 
[\[229b.3\]]la 'jug go_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa tshad med pa la 'jug go_/chos tha dad pa tshad med pa la 'jug go_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes 
[\[229b.4\]]mngon par 'tshang rgya ba tshad med pa la 'jug go_/bskal pa'i grangs tshad med pa la 'jug go_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dus gsum thugs su chud pa tshad med pa la 'jug go_/sems can gyi mos pa'i khyad par 
[\[229b.5\]]tshad med pa la 'jug go_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang /_sku gzugs dang sku sna tshogs ston pa tshad med pa la 'jug go_/sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_dbang po tha dad pa tshad med pa la 
[\[229b.6\]]'jug go_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung brjod pas/_sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa tshad med pa la 'jug go_/sems can rnams kyi sems dang spyod pa tshad med pa la 'jug go_/sangs rgyas 
[\[229b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes 'byam klas pa thugs su chud pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la 'jug go_/nyan thos kyi theg pas 'byung ba la mos pa tshad med pa la 'jug go_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi lam shin tu bstan 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa tshad med pa la 'jug cing mos par byed do/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yang dag par bsgrub pa shin tu rdzogs par bya ba tshad med pa la 'jug go_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[230a.2\]]'das rnams kyi ye shes zab mo'i sgor 'jug pa bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jug go_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sbyor ba tshad med pa la 'jug go_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 
[\[230a.3\]]theg pa chen po yang dag par bsgrub pa la 'jug pa shin tu bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jug go_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni de ltar tshad med pa ste/_
[\[230a.4\]]de ni bskal pa brgya phrag khrag khrig dang /_bskal pa stong phrag khrag khrig dang /_bskal pa brgya stong phrag khrag khrig nas de snyed kyi/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis kyang bgrang bar dka' ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[230a.5\]]rnams kyi spyod yul de bdag gis lhun gyis grub par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rtog pa med pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa med par yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/zhes de de ltar shin tu brtags pa'i ye shes dang /_mngon par shes pa dang ldan zhing rtag 
[\[230a.6\]]tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par brtson pa ni/_thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su bsgoms pa'i lam gyi tshogs rgya chen po'i ye shes la mi g.yo ba'i tshul gyis yongs su gnas pa yin/_de skad cig gcig tu yang lam mngon par bsgrub pa 
[\[230a.7\]]las ldang bar mi byed de/_de 'gro yang de lta bu'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin/_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba dang /_rmi lam dag tu yang sgrib pa med cing spyod lam thams cad la gnas kyang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i ye 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]shes yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin/_de'i sems bskyed pa re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yang dag par bsgrub pa yang dag par 'byung ngo /_/de ci'i 
[\[230b.2\]]phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de snying rje chen po sngon du btang ba'i sems bskyed pa byung ba re re zhing yang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[230b.3\]]ye shes kyi don du yongs su bsngo bas de la gang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su tshol zhing /_sems can rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gtong ba 'di ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang nyon mongs pa'i 
[\[230b.4\]]yongs su gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi ba 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang snying rje dang byams pa sngon du 'gro bas sems can thams cad la 'tshig pa med pa 'di ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[230b.5\]]gang gong nas gong du dge ba'i chos tshol bas mi ngoms par dam 'cha' ba 'di ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon du bya ba'i phyir/_'gyod pa med pa'i lam dang ldan pa 
[\[230b.6\]]'di ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa mngon du gyur pa 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang ye shes tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di ni de'i thabs mkhas pa'i pha 
[\[230b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang gong nas gong du ye shes la dmigs shing mngon par bsgrub pa 'di ni de'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dang bdud kyi tshogs thams cad kyis lam yongs su mi 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]chod pa 'di ni de'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang chos thams cad la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa 'di ni de'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar na byang 
[\[231a.2\]]chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po de dag de ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_bsdu pa'i dngos po bzhi yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/byin gyi rlabs 
[\[231a.3\]]bcu dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_mdor bsdu na byang chub kyi yan lag gi chos thams cad skad cig skad cig tu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces 
[\[231a.4\]]smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_
[\[231a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa 'ba' zhig gi byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad skad cig skad cig tu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ram/_'on te ma yin gyis sa bcu po thams cad la 'ang de bzhin du yongs su 
[\[231a.6\]]rdzogs par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras sa bcu po kun la 'ang byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad skad cig skad cig tu yongs su rdzogs par lta 'gyur te/_
[\[231a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun po 'di la ni de dag pas lhag par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di ni nan tan du bya ba'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su gnon pa ste/_de ltar kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la ni smon lam thams cad la lhag par dmigs pas byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad 
[\[231b.2\]]yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/gnyis pa la sems kyi dri ma thams cad bstsal bas gsum pa la smon lam rnam par 'phel ba dang /_chos kyi snang ba thob pas/_bzhi pa la lam la 'jug pas/_lnga pa la 'jig rten 
[\[231b.3\]]gyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang bas/_drug pa la chos zab mo'i sgor 'jug pas byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su 
[\[231b.4\]]sgrub pas byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad skad cig skad cig tu yongs su grub par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nas bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa'i bar du byang chub sems 
[\[231b.5\]]dpas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba'i yan lag de dag byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa yan cad lhun gyis grub par yongs su 'grub bo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras/_'di lta ste/_dper na/_kun nas nyon 
[\[231b.6\]]mongs shing rnam par dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang shin tu dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar ni smon lam dang /_thabs dang shes rab dang mngon par shes pa'i stobs dang /_shugs chen po ma gtogs par 
[\[231b.7\]]'dod 'dod brgal bar mi nus so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'dres pa dang yongs su dag pa'i bar yang smon pa dang /_thabs dang /_shes rab dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ye shes kyi stobs 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]dang shugs chen po ma gtogs par/_'dod 'dod brgal bar mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'o na ci byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[232a.2\]]spyod pa nyon mongs pa'i spyod pas kun nas nyon mongs par yid ches par bya ba yin nam/_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po rab tu dga' ba nyid bzung ba yan cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 
[\[232a.3\]]thams cad byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i dbang gis nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa dang bral bar gar 'os pa'i tshul gyi lam mnyam pa nyid kyis yid ches par bya ste/_de tsam gyis sa bdun po rnams su nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa las yang dag 
[\[232a.4\]]par 'das shes ni mi bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni lha rdzas kyi glang po rin po che la zhon zhing gling bzhi dag tu 'ang 'gro/_mi'i sdug bsngal dang /_phongs pa dang /_kun nas 
[\[232a.5\]]nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa rnams kyang rab tu shes te/_'on kyang nyes pa de dag gis gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/de tsam gyis mi'i lus las yongs su 'das pa 'ang ma yin te/_nam mi'i lus spangs te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes 
[\[232a.6\]]par gyur pa de'i tshe ni tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang na gnas shing stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang mthong /_de dag tu 'ang 'gro tshangs pa'i gzugs brnyan yang kun tu ston te mi zhes kyang mi brjod do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang 
[\[232a.7\]]chub sems dpa'i sa dang po bzung ba yan cad byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa la zhon zhing 'gro ba thams cad du rgyu ba'i tshe kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa rnams kyang rab tu shes te yang dag pa'i lam du zhugs pas 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa de dag gis gos par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang de tsam gyis bdun po rnams la nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa rnams las yang dag par 'das shes ni mi bya ste/_nam sbyor ba can gyi spyod pa thams cad spangs te 
[\[232b.2\]]sa bdun po nas sa brgyad pa yongs su non par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa yongs su dag pa la zhon zhing 'gro ba thams cad du rgyu ba'i tshe kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa thams cad kyang rab tu shes te/_'jig rten gyi bya 
[\[232b.3\]]ba kun las 'das pas nyes pa de dag gis kun nas nyon mongs par gyur ces mi bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i 
[\[232b.4\]]nyon mongs pa thams cad las kyang shin tu shas che bar 'da' ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyon mongs pa can zhes kyang mi bya/_nyon mongs pa med pa zhes kyang mi 
[\[232b.5\]]bya'o/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyon mongs pa thams cad rgyu ba med pas nyon mongs pa can zhes mi bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mngon par 'dod cing bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs pas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes kyang mi bya'o/_/de ltar byang chub 
[\[232b.6\]]sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin/_lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/_lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs 
[\[232b.7\]]su dag pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin/_de ni 'di ltar mi dge ba'i las kyi lam de bzhin gshegs pas smad pa kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa de dag las thams cad kyi thams cad du yang dag par 'das pas 'das pa yin/_gang 'di dag dge 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]ba'i lam yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa de dag gi rjes su rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'brang ba yin/_gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa la bzo'i gnas dang las [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]gnas ji ltar mngon par 
[\[233a.2\]]bsgrubs pa de dag thams cad kyang lhun gyis grub par rab tu 'byung ngo /_/de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na slob dpon du bya ba yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub 
[\[233a.3\]]sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa yan cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par su 'ang de dang bsam pa 'am sbyor bas mnyam pa med do/_'di ltar yang gang 'di dag bsam gtan rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin dag dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[233a.4\]]rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa dag dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du bsgom pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo'i tshul gyis mngon du 'gyur te/_'on kyang da dung byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du ni rnam 
[\[233a.5\]]par smin pas yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin no/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa thams cad la shes rab dang /_thabs dang /_bsgom pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs 
[\[233a.6\]]par 'gyur te/_sngon bas kyang byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/de de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par dbye ba shin tu rnam par 
[\[233a.7\]]phye ba zhes bya ba la mnyam par gzhog ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin don shin tu bsam pa zhes bya ba dang /_khyad par gyi blo gros shes bya ba dang /_rab tu phye ba'i don gyi mdzod ces bya ba dang /_chos ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]rtsa ba shin tu gnas pas brtan pa zhes bya ba dang /_ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i sgo zhes bya ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings yongs su sbyangs pa zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba dang /_don sna tshogs kyi mdzod 
[\[233b.2\]]'khor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo zhes bya ba la yang mnyam par gzhog ste/_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa mngon par shes pa dang /_ye shes chen po'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin sa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa/_brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba la snyoms 
[\[233b.3\]]par 'jug go_/de thabs dang /_shes rab kyis yongs su sbyangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de dag rab tu thob pa dang /_snying rje dang snying brtse ba'i mthus nyan thos kyi sa las 'das pa yin/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das pa yin/_
[\[233b.4\]]shes rab dang ye shes kyis rnam par dpyad pa'i sa mngon sum du gyur pa yin/_de ltar de byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/_lus kyi las tshad med pa mtshan ma dang bral ba rab tu 'byung ngo /_/ngag gi las tshad med 
[\[233b.5\]]pa mtshan ma dang bral ba rab tu 'byung ngo /_/yid kyi las tshad med pa mtshan ma dang bral ba shin tu rnam par sbyangs ba mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pas snang bar gyur ba tshad med pa rab tu 'byung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras 
[\[233b.6\]]pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de lta go byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas pa'i tshe 'ang byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las tshad med pa/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa las yang dag par 
[\[233b.7\]]'das na ji rob/_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de lta'ang ma yin te/_de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la dmigs pa'i mthur zad kyi rang gi blo sa rnam par dpyad pa ni ma yin no/_/byang chub 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]sems dpa'i sa bdun po 'di la ni rang gi blo'i spyod yul rnam par dpyod pa rab tu thob pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi 'phrogs pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/_rgyal po'i rigs 
[\[234a.2\]]su skyes pa'i rgyal po'i bu rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa ni btsas ma thag tu rgyal po'i byin gyis blon po'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon gyi/_rang gi blos rnam par dpyad pas ni ma yin no/_/nam nar son par gyur pa de'i tshe/_
[\[234a.3\]]rang gi blo'i mthus blon po thams cad kyi byed pa'i tshul las shin tu 'das pa yin/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' 'ang sems bskyed ma thag tu lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bdag nyid chen pos/_
[\[234a.4\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon te/_rang gi blos rnam par brtags pa ni ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rang gi yul gyi ye shes 
[\[234a.5\]]kyi stobs kyi shugs kyis/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi byed pa'i tshul las shin tu 'das pa yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 
[\[234a.6\]]'di la gnas pa'i tshe/_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las zab cing dben la rgyu ba med pa dang ldan pa 'ang rab tu thob pa yin te/_khyad par gong du btsal ba'i brtson 'grus kyang yongs su mi gtong ngo /_/yongs su btsal 
[\[234a.7\]]ba'i brtson 'grus des kyang yang dag pa'i mthar gnas pa la gnas te/_khyad par gong ma shin tu thob par bya ba'i phyir/_yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du 'ang mi byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa/_
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa gang yan cad du/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug_/byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[234b.2\]]sa drug pa yan cad/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems skad cig re re la yang 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug 
[\[234b.3\]]ste/_'gog pa mngon du byas shes ni mi bya'o/_/de bas na de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus dang /_ngag dang yid kyi las dang ldan zhes bya ba yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i 
[\[234b.4\]]mtha' la gnas pas kyang /_gnas la yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang mi byed pa ni ngo mtshar che'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/_mi la la zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gru chen por zhugs te rgal ba'i thabs la mkhas shing rlung la 
[\[234b.5\]]mkhas pa dang /_chu la mkhas pa ni rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i nyes pas mi gos so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas shing pha rol tu phyin pa'i gru chen por 
[\[234b.6\]]zhugs pa yang yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pas kyang gnas la yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang mi byed do de ltar de ye shes kyi stobs dang shugs thob pa ni ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes kyi stobs dang shugs kyis mngon par bsgrub pa'i blo dang thabs dang shes rab kyi 
[\[234b.7\]]stobs dang shugs chen pos 'khor ba'i sgo yang ston la mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pa dang yang mi 'bral ba yin 'khor mang pos kun nas bskor bar snang yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems kyi dben pa yang rab tu thob pa yin/_khams 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]gsum du skye ba yang smon lam gyi dbang gis mngon par sgrub la 'jig rten gyi nyes pas kyang mi gos pa yin/_zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba 'ang yin la thabs kyis kyang rab tu 'bar te/_de ltar 'bar yang tshig 
[\[235a.2\]]par mi 'gyur ba yin/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la'ang yongs su 'jug la nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las kyang phyir mi ldog pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthil du yang phyin la bdud kyi yul na 'ang 'dug par snang ba yin/_
[\[235a.3\]]bdud kyi lam bzhi las kyang yang dag par 'das la bdud kyi yul dang spyod yul yang yang dag par ston pa yin/_mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad na 'ang 'dug par snang la/_sangs rgyas kyi mu stegs kyi gnas kyi bsam pa yang /_
[\[235a.4\]]mi gtong ba yin/_'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad dang yang ldan par snang la/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul la yang yang dag par gzhol ba yin/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[235a.5\]]nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad las lhag pa'i rgyan dang lhab lhub shin tu bsgrub pa yang rab tu thob la/_chos la dga' 
[\[235a.6\]]ba yid la bya ba 'ang mi spong ba yin/_de ltar de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan par byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de'i lta ba rgya chen po dang /_smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po snang bar 
[\[235a.7\]]'gyur te/_lta ba rgya chen po dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis/_sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]mang po dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[235b.2\]]brgya stong phrag mang po snang bar 'gyur ro/_/des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas bsam pa rgya chen pos rim gro byed do/_/bkur sti byed do/_/bsti stang byed do/_/mchod pa 
[\[235b.3\]]byed do/_/na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad dag kyang 'bul zhing /_byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo/_/dge 'dun gyi tshogs 
[\[235b.4\]]rnams la yang yang dag par mchod pa byed de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing /_de dag las rjes dang rim 
[\[235b.5\]]gros nan tan du chos bstan pa nyan cing len to 'dzin to/_/thos nas kyang ma nor ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_shes rab dang ye shes kyi snang bas rab tu brtson par byed cing nan tan gyis yongs su 'dzin to/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[235b.6\]]ldan 'das de dag gi bstan pa yang yang dag par 'dzin to/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi mngon par rtogs pa yongs su dri bas kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin te/_de sngon pas kyang sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i chos kyi bzod pa rnam 
[\[235b.7\]]par dag par 'gyur ba yin/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du sod pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sngon bas kyang bskal pa du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya stong phrag 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya 
[\[236a.2\]]stong phrag du mar shin tu dag cing yongs su byang bar gnas so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/_gser gyi sa le sbram de nyid rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu spras pa ni sngon bas kyang /_rgyan gyi rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /_
[\[236a.3\]]ches 'od gsal zhing dang bar 'gyur ro/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba 'di la gnas pa'i thabs dang shes rab kyis bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sngon 
[\[236a.4\]]bas kyang ches shin tu byang ba dang /_ches 'od gsal zhing dang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma'i 'od ni skar ma'i tshogs dang zla ba'i 'od kyis mi 
[\[236a.5\]]'phrogs shing 'dzam bu'i gling na rlan gyi bag yod pa thams cad kyang shin tu skem par byed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba 'di la gnas pa'i/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sngon bas kyang /_
[\[236a.6\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_mi 'phrogs pa yin/_phyin ci log bzhi dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rlan gyi rnam pa thams cad kyang /_yongs su skem mo/_de'i pha rol du phyin 
[\[236a.7\]]pa bcu las/_thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas che ba yin te/_lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su mi bsgrub pa ma yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/_ring du 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]song ba zhes bya ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa mdor bstan pa'o/_/de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_phal cher lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur du 'gyur te/_sems can rnams 
[\[236b.2\]]la/_mngon par rtogs pa'i ye shes yang dag par bstabs pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_yongs su dri bas mi zad pa yin/_sems can skyon med par shin tu 
[\[236b.3\]]bslab par bya ba la 'ang mkhas pa yin te/_sbyin pa 'am/_ngag snyan pa 'am/_don bsgrub pa 'am/_don 'thun pas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/_de thams cad ji ltar na/_sems can thams cad kyi mchog 
[\[236b.4\]]tu 'gyur/_gtso bor 'gyur/_thu bor 'gyur/_phul du 'gyur/_dam par 'gyur/_bla na med par 'gyur/_'dren par 'gyur/_yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar 
[\[236b.5\]]du 'gyur snyam ste/_sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang /_chos yid la bya ba dang /_dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la 
[\[236b.6\]]bya ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang /_stobs yid la bya ba dang /_mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas/_rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar 
[\[236b.7\]]du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te/_de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu/_ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rab tu thob cing de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mthong ba dang /_de dag gi byin gyi 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snang bar bya ba dang /_sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du gnas par bya 
[\[237a.2\]]ba dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la rab tu 'jug pa dang /_chos kyi sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnam par 'byed pa dang /_lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su bstan pa dang /_lus re re la yang 
[\[237a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo/_/de yan cad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te/_de dag gi lus sam 'ong 
[\[237a.4\]]dam/_rdzu 'phrul lam/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gam/_spyod yul lam/_dbyangs sam/_spyod pa 'am/_rgyan tam/_byin gyi rlabs sam/_mos pa 'am/_mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal 
[\[237a.5\]]pa stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang bstan par bya ba'i 
[\[237a.6\]]phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/ye shes zab mo don dam tshig gi rjes snyegs shing /_/sa drug rtogs pa'i yid ldan bdag nyid mnyam bzhag pa/_/shes rab thabs gnyis zung du 'brel pa mngon par bsgrub/_/mkhas pas 
[\[237a.7\]]bdun sbyong ba dam pa yongs su gnon/_/stong pa mtshan med mi smon snying rje byams dang ldan/_/chos nyid mnyam pa'i rjes 'gro sangs rgyas mchod par byed/_/shes pas shes byas bsod nams stobs kyis mi ngoms pas/_/de'i phyir mkhas pa 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]bdun pa'i sa phyogs yongs su gnon/_/khams gsum mngon par sgrub byed shin tu dben pa thob/_/nyon mongs stobs rnams zhi zhing grol ba zhi la mos/_/mig yor sgyu ma rmi lam mi gnyis chos spyod kyang /_/snying rje las spyod ston pa 
[\[237b.2\]]mkhas pas bdun pa gnon/_/nam mkha'i bsam pas zhing rnams yongs sbyong rnam mi rtog_/rgyal ba'i mtshan dang ldan zhing mi g.yo chos dang ldan/_/brjod pa'i dbyangs bral 'gro ba dgar bya don du gnyer/_/skad cig sems kyis rgyal bas kun 
[\[237b.3\]]mkhyen yang dag gzhol/_/chos rnams 'di dag spyad pas snang ba thob gyur pas/_/'gro ba'i don 'dod sa mchog yongs su gnon ces bya/_/de dag sa 'di gnas shing mtha' yas sems can spyod/_/bde gshegs tshad med las mkhyen rnam par 
[\[237b.4\]]dpyod pa byed/_/zhing dang bskal pa chos grangs sna tshogs du ma dang /_/mos dang bsam pa sems dang spyod pa sna tshogs dang /_/theg pa gsum po bstan pa tshad med yang dag 'jug_/bdag gis sems can de dag yongs su smin bya zhes/_/de dag 
[\[237b.5\]]de ltar rnam phye shes rab lam ldan pa/_/spyod lam bzhi por mngon par brtson zhing thabs dang ldan/_/sems kyi skad cig kun la byang chub yon tan sgrub/_/pha rol phyin pa bcur 'jug yongs su rdzogs par byed/_/sems skyes 'gro la yongs 
[\[237b.6\]]sngo de ni sbyin pa'o/_/tshul khrims nyon mongs zhi ba bzod pa mi 'tshig pa/_/brtson 'grus de nas khyad par gong du rtsom pa ste/_/lam las mi sgul de ni legs ldan bsam gtan no/_/mi skye'i bzod pa rdul med mkhas pa'i shes rab mchog_/da dung 
[\[237b.7\]]mngon 'dod sngo ba de yi smon lam ste/_/mi thub stobs yin shin tu rtogs pa ye shes so/_/de ltar byang chub yon tan thams cad skad cig ldan/_/dang por dmigs pas yon tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_/gnyis la dri ma bstsal phyir 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]gsum la bgegs bstsal bas/_/bzhi la lam gyis lnga la mnyam pa nyid kyis te/_mi skye'i snang bas mkhas pa'i drug po rnam par 'phel/_/bdun po 'dir phyin yon tan mtha' dag kun rdzogs par/_/smon lam du 
[\[238a.2\]]ma sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa byed/_/ci phyir zhe na ye shes spyod pa 'dir grub pa/_/de ni brgyad pa yan cad kun tu rnam dag 'gyur/_/'da' dka' phyin dka' ye shes mang po'i las kyis 'grub/_/zhing gnyis bar mtshams ji ltar yongs su 
[\[238a.3\]]brgal dka' bzhin/_/bdun la spyod pa rgyal po chags med ji bzhin te/_/lam la gnas pa yin gyi thams cad brtan ma 'das/_/brgyad pa'i ye shes sa dang gang tshe ldan gyur pa/_/de tshe sems kyi yul 'das ye shes las la gnas/_/tshangs 
[\[238a.4\]]pa 'gro ba lta yang mi yi bdag nyid min/_/de bzhin mkhas pa pad mo bzhin du mi chags spyod/_/'di la gnas pa nyon mongs sna tshogs rab tu 'da'/_/de dag nyon mongs spyod med byang ba 'ang thob pa min/_/lam la gnas kyang de 'dra'i nyon mongs 
[\[238a.5\]]spyod med min/_/rgyal ba'i ye shes mngon 'dod de bas zad pa min/_/'jig rten bzo dang las gnas rnam pa sna tshogs dag_/mkhas pas gtsug lag rgyus la gnas te shes byas dang /_/bsam gtan mngon shes stobs bsgoms ldan par gyur pa rnams/_
[\[238a.6\]]de bas gsal 'gyur ting 'dzin sna tshogs mngon par sgrub/_/nyan thos rang rgyal spyod las yongs su 'das pa ste/_/bdun pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la mkhas pa gnas/_/sngon chad bsam pas yin gyi 'di la ye shes kyis/_/nar son 
[\[238a.7\]]mthu dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i bu bzhin no/_/shin du zab dang ldan pas gong du rtsom byed de/_/'gog pa'i sems dang ldan yang mngon par mi byed do/_/ji ltar rgya mtshor phyin zhing gru chen zhugs gyur pa/_/chu tshul thams cad mngon gyur gru la skyon 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]mi 'gyur/_/de dag sngon bas thabs dang shes rab mchog dang ldan/_/shes dka' 'gro ba kun tu shes spyod yon tan mang /_/sangs rgyas bye ba yang du bsam pa dag pas mchod/_/gser sbram de nyid rin chen mang pos spras pa bzhin/_/
[\[238b.2\]]'di la gnas pa'i mkhas pa'i shes rab mchog gi 'od/_/sred pa'i chu rnams ji ltar gnyi bzhin yongs su skem/_/sa mchog 'di la gnas pa dbang sgyur rgyal por 'gyur/_/ye shes dam pa'i 'bras bu ston la mthu yod mkhas/_/
[\[238b.3\]]'dod na brtson 'grus dam pa'i stobs dang ldan gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshang ba dag_/phyogs rnams kun tu shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas mthong /_/yan cad smon lam yon tan mchog can tshad kyang med/_/'di ni sa 
[\[238b.4\]]mchog bdun pa ste/_/rang rgyal dbang la spyod pa dang /_/'jig rten kun gyis shes par dka'/_/thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba'o/_/ring du song ba zhes bya ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa'o//_//
[\[238b.5\]]sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_mkhas pa'i spyod pa de 'dra dam pa thos nas/_/lha yi tshogs dang lha'i dbang po kun dga'/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'gro phan brtson pa mang po/_/bde bar 
[\[238b.6\]]gshegs dang rgyal sras rnams la mchod byed/_/me tog phreng ba rgyal mtshan ba dan yid 'ong /_/spos dang phye ma rin chen na bza' rgyan pa/_/dbyig gis spras pa'i gdugs rab khrag khrig du ma/_/phreng ba'i sprin kyi dam pa'i char yang mngon 'bebs/_
[\[238b.7\]]lha'i bu mos yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs/_/du ma'i sil snyan gar gyi mchog dang ldan byas/_/bde bar gshegs dang rgyal sras mchod pa'i don du/_/thub pa'i yon tan rmad du byung ba rjod byed/_/thams cad gzigs pa rkang gnyis khyu mchog gtso 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]bo/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul 'gro la phan phyir ston mdzad/_/dbyangs sprin yid du 'ong ba rab tu 'byung ba'i/_/rnga dang sil snyan sna tshogs rnams las 'di 'byung /_/skra yi rtse la bde gshegs brgya phrag stong snyed/_/gang glu khrag 
[\[239a.2\]]khrig bye ba'i rdul bas de mang /_/zhing mchog dam pa mnyam pa med pa dag na/_/khyu mchog rnams ni rdul bral chos rnams ston mdzad/_/spu gcig rtse la 'byam klas dam pa'i zhing mang /_/gling bzhi du ma rgya mtsho mtsho chen kun gnas/_/khor yug bye ba de bzhin ri 
[\[239a.3\]]rab thams cad/_/so so'i tshul dang ldan par kun kyang snang gyur/_/skra yi rtse mo de la 'gro rgyud drug po/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]byol song mi dang sems dmyal lha dang /_/gnod sbyin srin po klu dang lha min mang po/_/sna tshogs las kyi yul la kun kyang spyod byed/_/
[\[239a.4\]]rdul bral kun gyi zhing gi spyod yul kun tu/_/'khor lo dam pa'i mchog kyang de tshe 'khor gyur/_/'gro ba'i 'du shes sems dang de bzhin spyod pa/_/bde gshegs gsung gi dam pas kun kyang bstan byas/_/sems can lus la bde gshegs zhing mang 
[\[239a.5\]]sna tshogs/_/zhing la sems can rmad snyed lus kyang de bzhin/_/lha dang mi yi lam rgyud de bzhin sna tshogs/_/mkhyen nas bde bar gshegs pa chos rnams kun ston/_/shin tu yangs pa'i zhing la 'du shes phrar gyur/_/rdul gyi mtshan ma dag la 'du 
[\[239a.6\]]shes yangs gyur/_/de las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa bde bar gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul/_/'jig rten kun gyi brjod kyang zad par mi 'gyur/_/che ba nyid dbyangs de skad du/_/snyan pa'i dbyangs su grag gyur nas/_/'khor rnams rab tu dga' zhing zhi/_/gsung ba'i 
[\[239a.7\]]mchog la lta zhing gnas/_/'khor rnams zhi bar shes gyur nas/_/rnam grol zla bas yang smras pa/_/sa brgyad pa yi rnam pa dang /_/de la 'jug pa bstan par mdzod/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la rnam par dbye ba shin tu byas pa/_thabs dang shes rab kyis lam shin tu sbyangs pa/_tshogs shin tu bstsags pa/_smon lam chen po shin tu btab pa'i stobs dang 
[\[239b.2\]]shugs can/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du rlabs pa rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang shugs thob pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba dang ldan pa/_bsam pa dang 
[\[239b.3\]]lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su sbyangs ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis mngon par 'phags pa/_snying rje dang snying brtse ba chen pos sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa/_ye shes 
[\[239b.4\]]kyi lam tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba de chos thams cad thog_/ma nas ma byung ba nyid la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug go_/ma skyes pa dang /_mtshan nyid med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa dang /_thug pa med pa dang /_mi rgyu ba dang /_
[\[239b.5\]]mi ldog pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin dang /_thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus mnyam pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug ste/_des rnam pa thams 
[\[239b.6\]]cad du sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_'du shes dang bral zhing thogs pa med la nam mkha' dang 'dra zhing nam mkha'i rang bzhin du khong du chud pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ces bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la de 
[\[239b.7\]]lta bu'i bzod pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i gnas zab mo shes par dka' ba tha mi dad pa mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba 'du shes kyi bgegs thams cad las phyir log pa tshad med 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa/_dben pa thams cad mngon du gyur pa/_shin tu thob pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_dge slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa sems 
[\[240a.2\]]kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu bgrod par phyin pa mthar gyis 'gog pa'i bar du mnyam par bzhag pa ni rgyu ba dang sems pa dang /_g.yo ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_'du shes thams cad dang bral ba yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[240a.3\]]dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa mi g.yo ba 'di thob ma thag tu ched du bya ba thams cad dang bral te lhun gyis grub pa'i chos nyid thob cing lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rtsol ba thams cad dang bral te shin tu dben pa'i chos nyid la gnas pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 
[\[240a.4\]]'di lta ste dper na/_mi la la zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du bdag chu klung chen pos khyer ba snyam byed la/_de de nas ci phyin tu 'bad cing rtsol ba chen po rtsom rtsom pa las de 'bad cing rtsol ba chen po de nyid kyis sad par gyur na/_de sad ma thag tu 'bad cing 
[\[240a.5\]]rtsol ba thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i chu klung chen po bzhir sems can mang po dong bar shes nas 'bad cing rtsol ba yongs su rtsom mo/_/de brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pas byang 
[\[240a.6\]]chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba 'di thob ma thag tu ched du bya ba thams cad bral ba yin te/_de'i gnyis po rgyu ba 'am/_mtshan ma rgyu ba dag kyang thams cad du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[240a.7\]]du skyes shing gnas pa ni 'dod pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su mi rgyu ba yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems dang yid dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su rgyu ba 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su mi rgyu ba yin te/_de sangs rgyas la yongs su rgyu ba 'am/_byang chub la yongs su rgyu ba 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la yongs su rgyu ba 'am/_rang sangs rgyas la yongs su rgyu ba 'am/_nyan thos la yongs su rgyu ba 'am/_
[\[240b.2\]]mya ngan las 'das pa la yongs su rgyu ba'am/_dgra bcom pa la yongs su rgyu ba 'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba la yongs su rgyu ba 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba la yongs su rgyu ba 'am/_rgyun tu zhugs pa la yongs su rgyu ba yang yongs su mi rgyu na 'jig rten pa'i 
[\[240b.3\]]yongs su rgyu ba yongs su mi rgyu ba lta ci smos/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar mi g.yo ba'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs dang shugs la gnas pa de'i chos kyi sgo'i rgyud de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de bzhin 
[\[240b.4\]]gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad de/_de la 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rjes su rtogs par bya ba la 'di ni don dam pa'i bzod pa'ang yin na/_'on kyang rigs kyi bu nged kyi 
[\[240b.5\]]stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa de khyod la med cing /_sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa de dag yongs su btsal ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsoms shig_/bzod pa'i sgo 'di nyid kyang ma btong shig_/
[\[240b.6\]]rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_khyod kyis de ltar zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa thob kyang /_byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag zhi ba ma yin rab tu zhi ba ma yin te/_nyon mongs pa sna tshogs yongs su rgyu bar gyur na/_de ltar rnam par rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 
[\[240b.7\]]yongs su mnar ba la soms/_'di ltar yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyi sngon gyi smon lam sems can kyi don yongs su 'grub par bya bar btab pa dang /_ye shes kyi sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dran par gyis shig_/'di ltar yang rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]rnams kyi chos nyid de/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung rung /_chos kyi dbyings dang chos kyi gnas nyid 'di ni de bzhin du 'dug pa ste/_'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyi tse brjod par bya ba ma yin te/_nyan thos 
[\[241a.2\]]dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos nyid 'di 'thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu khyod nged kyi lus tshad med pa dang /_ye shes tshad med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dang /_ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa tshad med pa dang /_'od kyi 
[\[241a.3\]]dkyil 'khor tshad med pa dang /_dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa tshad med pa la ltos/_khyod kyis kyang de bzhin du mngon par bsgrub par bya dgos so/_/'di ltar rigs kyi bu gang de ltar chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa de ni khyod kyi snang ba gcig pur 
[\[241a.4\]]zad de/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos snang ba ni 'di 'dra ste/_yongs su mtha' yas par song la yongs su mtha' yas par bsgrub pa ste/_de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis kyang bgrang bar dkas/_de dag thob 
[\[241a.5\]]par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub pa skyed cig_/'di ltar yang rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i zhing tshad med pa dang /_sems can tshad med pa dang /_chos rnam par phye ba tshad med pa ltos te/_de dag thams cad ma nor bar bgrang bar gyis shig ces 
[\[241a.6\]]ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rnam par phye ba'i tshul mngon 
[\[241a.7\]]par bsgrub pa'i las tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa gzhal du med pa de dag nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/khyed kyis yid ches pa dang /_khong du chud par bya na gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' de mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgor gzhug pa mdzad du zin na/_de nyid de'i mtha' las brgal ba'i mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur te/_sems can thams cad kyi dgos pa 'ang rgyun gcad par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[241b.2\]]ldan 'das de dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' de la ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i las gang gis skad cig gcig tu mngon par bsgrub pas kyang thog ma sems bskyed pa phyin cad sa bdun pa la zhugs shing /_rjes su song ba yongs su rtsom pa'i bar snga ma de dag 
[\[241b.3\]]gis brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/_stong gi cha dang khrag khrig gi cha dang /_khrag khrig brgya'i cha dang /_khrag khrig stong gi cha dang /_khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_
[\[241b.4\]]rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas bsgrun btsam gyi bar du 'ang mi chog pa de snyed du tshad med pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa las nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sngon cad lus gcig gis mngon par bsgrubs pas 
[\[241b.5\]]spyod pa mngon par bsgrub par gyur gyi 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus rnam par phye ba tshad med pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i mthu yongs su sdud de/_dbyangs mngon par bsgrub pa tshad med pa dang /_ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa 
[\[241b.6\]]tshad med pa dang /_skye ba mngon par bsgrub pa tshad med pa dang /_zhing yongs su sbyang ba tshad med pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa dang /_sangs rgyas mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba tshad med pa dang /_chos kyi tshul khong du chud pa tshad med pa dang /_
[\[241b.7\]]mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs dang shugs tshad med pa dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa rnam par phye ba dang /_tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba'i lus dang /_ngag dang yid kyi las kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi mthu 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]mi sgul ba'i tshul gyis yang dag par sgrub bo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba'i gru ni rgya mtsho chen por ma phyin gyi bar du ched du bskyod cing 'gro bar bya ba yin te/_rgya mtsho chen po la 
[\[242a.2\]]zhen ma thag tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis bstsu bas ched du bskyod mi dgos pa yin/_des rgya mtsho chen po la nyin gcig gis ci chod pa de ni sngon ched du bskyod cing 'gro bas lo brgyar yang de ltar tshad med par phyin par mi nus so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du 
[\[242a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i tshogs yang dag par bstsags pa/_theg pa chen po'i grur zhugs pa yang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgya mtshor phyin nas/_yud tsam cig tu lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes 
[\[242a.4\]]kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ji tsam yang dag par gnon pa de ni sngon gyi ched du bya ba'i las kyis bskal pa brgya stong du yang yang dag par gnon par mi nus so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa 'di thob pa'i byang chub 
[\[242a.5\]]sems dpa' ni thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis bsgrub pa lhun gyis grub pa la shin tu zhugs pa'i/_byang chub sems dpa'i blos thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rnam par dpyod cing 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba yang rnam par dpyod do/_/'jig rten gyi 
[\[242a.6\]]khams 'jig pa 'ang rnam par dpyod do/_/de 'jig rten ji ltar 'byung ba de yang rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten ji ltar 'jig pa de yang rab tu shes so/_/las gang bstsags pas 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so/_/las gang 
[\[242a.7\]]bstsags pas 'jig rten na 'jig par 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so/_/dus ji srid kyis 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so/_/dus ji srid kyis 'jig rten 'jig par 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so/_/dus ji srid du 'jig rten byung nas gnas 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]pa de 'ang rab tu shes so/_/dus ji srid du 'jig rten zhig par gnas pa de yang rab tu shes so/_/de sa'i khams shin tu chung ba yang rab tu shes so/_/sa'i khams shin tu che ba 'ang rab tu shes so/_/sa'i khams tshad med pa yang rab tu shes so/_/
[\[242b.2\]]sa'i khams rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so/_/de chu'i khams shin tu chung ba yang rab tu shes so/_/chu'i khams shin tu che ba'ang rab tu shes so/_/chu'i khams tshad med pa 'ang rab tu shes so/_/chu'i khams rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so/_/
[\[242b.3\]]de [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams shin tu chung ba yang rab tu shes so/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams shin tu che ba yang rab tu shes so/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams tshad med pa yang rab tu shes so/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so/_/de rlung gi khams shin tu chung ba yang rab tu 
[\[242b.4\]]shes so/_/rlung gi khams shin tu che ba yang rab tu shes so/_/rlung gi khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang rab tu shes so/_/rlung gi khams rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so/_/de shin tu phra ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba nyid kyang rab tu shes so/_/shin tu phra ba'i rdul 
[\[242b.5\]]yangs pa yang rab tu shes so/_/shin tu phra ba'i rdul tshad med pa yang rab tu shes so/_/shin tu phra ba'i rdul rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten gyi khams gang na sa'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/chu'i 
[\[242b.6\]]khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/rlung gi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/rin po che rnam par phye ba ji snyed yod pa dang /_
[\[242b.7\]]rin po che'i rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/sems can gyi lus la rdul ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/zhing gi lhun la rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/de sems can gyi lus che ba dang /_
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]lus yangs pa dang /_lus phra ba dang /_lus rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so/_/sems can dmyal ba pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba dang /_
[\[243a.2\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba dang /_lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba dang /_lha'i 'jig rten pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]ris su gtogs pa'i lus rdul 
[\[243a.3\]]shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba de dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/de de ltar rdul shin tu phra ba rab tu dbye ba la zhugs pa ni 'dod pa'i khams 'jig pa yang rab tu shes so/_/gzugs kyi khams 'jig pa yang rab tu shes so/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i khams 'jig pa 
[\[243a.4\]]yang rab tu shes so/_/'dod pa'i khams 'du ba yang rab tu shes so/_/gzugs kyi khams 'du ba yang rab tu shes so/_/gzugs med pa'i khams 'du ba yang rab tu shes so/_/'dod pa'i khams chung ba yang rab tu shes so/_/'dod pa'i 
[\[243a.5\]]khams che ba 'ang rab tu shes so/_/'dod pa'i khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'ang rab tu shes so/_/'dod pa'i khams rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so/_/gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i khams chung ba yang rab tu shes so/_/che ba 'ang rab tu shes so/_/
[\[243a.6\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'ang rab tu shes so/_/rnam par phye ba 'ang rab tu shes so/_/de khams gsum rnam par dpyad pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang ldan la/_sems can gyi lus rab tu dbye ba la mkhas shing /_zhing gi lhun 
[\[243a.7\]]rnam par dbye ba'i ye shes la mkhas pas skye ba'i skye mched thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa la blo shin tu gtong ste/_de ni sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams kyi skye ba dang /_yongs su grub pa ci 'dra ba de lta bur rang gi 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]lus byin gyis rlob bo/_/de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par bkang zhing sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du rang gi lus mig yor lta bu'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang bas skye bar bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub ste/_stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[243b.2\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis sam/_gsum mam/_bzhi 'am/_lnga 'am/_bcu 'am/_nyi shu 'am/_sum cu 'am/_bzhi bcu 'am/_lnga bcu dag nas brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yang brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i bar dag rgyas par bkang ste/_sems can gyi mos pa ji lta 
[\[243b.3\]]ba de bzhin du rang gi lus [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang bas skye bar bya ba'i phyir mngon par sgrub bo/_/de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag gi de bzhin 
[\[243b.4\]]gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag du yang snang bar phyin pa yin/_de sems can rnams kyi lus rnam par phye ba dang /_mos pa dang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhing de dang de dag dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang /_de dag tu de lta de ltar rang gi 
[\[243b.5\]]lus ston te/_dge sbyong gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du dge sbyong gi kha dog dang gzugs ston to/_/bram ze'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du/_bram ze'i kha dog dang gzugs ston to/_/rgyal rigs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rgyal rigs kyi 
[\[243b.6\]]kha dog dang gzugs ston to/_/rje'u rigs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du/_rje'u rigs kyi kha dog dang gzugs ston to/_/khyim bdag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du/_khyim bdag gi kha dog dang gzugs ston to/_/rgyal po chen po 
[\[243b.7\]]bzhi'i ris kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du/_rgyal po chen po bzhi'i kha dog dang gzugs ston to/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i kha dog dang gzugs ston to/_/de bzhin du 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]mtshe ma'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_dga' ldan gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_'phrul dga'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[244a.2\]]nas 'og min gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi bar tu de lta de lta bu'i kha dog dang gzugs ston to/_/de nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi lus dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to/_/rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang sangs 
[\[244a.3\]]rgyas kyi lus dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to/_/byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin 
[\[244a.4\]]gshegs pa'i sku dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa ji snyed pa de dag gi sems can rnams kyi mos pa rab tu mang ba de dag thams cad du rang gi lus de lta de ltar rnam par phye ba yongs su 
[\[244a.5\]]ston to/_/de lus kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /_'du shes thams cad dang rnam par bral ba ste/_lus mnyam pa nyid thob pas/_sems can gyi lus rab tu shes so/_/zhing gi lus dang rnam par smin pa'i lus dang /_nyan thos kyi lus dang /_rang sangs 
[\[244a.6\]]rgyas kyi lus dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang /_ye shes kyi lus dang /_chos kyi lus dang /_nam mkha'i lus kyang rab tu shes so/_/des sems can rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa mngon par bsgrub 
[\[244a.7\]]pa yongs su shes pas/_'dod na sems can gyi lus nam mkha'i lus su byin gyis rlob bo/_/de bzhin du zhing gi lus dang /_las rnam par smin pa'i lus dang /_nyan thos kyi lus dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang /_byang chub 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]sems dpa'i lus dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang /_ye shes kyi lus dang /_chos kyi lus kyang nam mkha'i lus su byin gyis rlob bo/_/des sems can rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su shes pas sems can gyi lus 
[\[244b.2\]]rang gi lus su byin gyis rlob bo/_/de bzhin du zhing gi lus dang las rnam par smin pa'i lus dang /_nyan thos kyi lus dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang /_ye shes kyi lus dang 
[\[244b.3\]]chos kyi lus dang nam mkha'i lus kyang rang gi lus su byin gyis rlob bo/_/des sems can rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su shes pas/_lus gang dang gang /_lus gang dang gang du 'dod pa de dang de'i lus su lus de dang de dag byin gyis rlob bo/_/des 
[\[244b.4\]]sems can kyi lus rnams kyi las kyi lus kyang rab tu shes so/_/rnam par smin pa'i lus dang /_nyon mongs pa'i lus dang /_gzugs kyi lus dang /_gzugs med pa'i lus kyang rab tu shes so/_/zhing gi lus rnams kyi chung ba'i rang bzhin yang rab tu 
[\[244b.5\]]shes so/_/che ba dang tshad med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par dag pa dang /_snrel zhi dang /_spyi'u tshugs dang /_gzhi mnyam par yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_phyogs kyi dra ba rnam par dbye ba yang rab tu shes so/_/las rnam par smin 
[\[244b.6\]]pa'i lus rnam par phye ba'i brda yang rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du nyan thos kyi lus rnam par phye ba'i brda dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi lus rnam par phye ba'i brda dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lus rnam par phye ba'i brda yang rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[244b.7\]]sku rnams kyi mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i lus kyang rab tu shes so/_/smon lam gyi lus dang sprul pa'i lus dang /_byin gyi rlabs kyi lus dang /_gzugs dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan gyi lus dang /_'od kyi lus dang yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus dang /_
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]bsod nams kyi lus dang /_ye shes kyi lus dang /_chos kyi lus kyang rab tu shes so/_/ye shes kyi lus rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dpyad pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so/_/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags pa yang rab tu shes 
[\[245a.2\]]so/_/'bras bu'i sbyor bas yang dag par bzung ba dang /_'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par phye ba dang /_theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa dang /_thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa dang /_'byung ba dang mi 'byung ba dang /_slob pa dang /_mi slob 
[\[245a.3\]]pa yang rab tu shes so/_/chos kyi lus rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so/_/'khrul pa med pa yang rab tu shes so/_/gnas dang brda dang kun rdzob rnam par dgod pa dang /_sems can dang sems can ma yin pa'i chos rnam par dgod pa dang /_
[\[245a.4\]]sangs rgyas dang chos dang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnam par dgod pa yang rab tu shes so/_/nam mkha'i lus rnams kyi tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so/_/thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang /_lus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_nor ba med cing mtha' yas pa dang /_gzugs 
[\[245a.5\]]mang po mngon zhing gsal bar byed pa yang rab tu shes so/_/des lus kyi ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa de lta bu rab tu thob pas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par tshe byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/_tshe'i dbang rab tu 'thob bo/_/ting nge 'dzin shin tu 
[\[245a.6\]]rtogs pa'i ye shes la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir sems can gyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyan du mas rab tu brgyan cing shin tu klubs pa'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir yo byad kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo/_/las kyi 
[\[245a.7\]]rnam par smin pa'i byin gyi rlabs/_dus bzhin du ma nor bar bstan pa'i phyir las kyi dbang rab tu 'thob po/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir skye ba'i dbang rab tu 'thob po/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang dus gang du ci dga' 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]bar mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir smon lam gyi stobs rab tu 'thob bo/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyis rab tu gang ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir mos pa'i dbang rab tu 'thob bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 
[\[245b.2\]]'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs rab tu 'thob bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang /_mngon par 
[\[245b.3\]]'tshang rgya ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/_ye shes kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo/_/mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir chos kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo/_/de byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bcu po 'di dag thob ma thag 
[\[245b.4\]]nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin/_tshad med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin/_yangs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin/_mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin/_des de lta bu'i rjes su song zhing de lta bu'i ye shes dang 
[\[245b.5\]]ldan pas lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ba yin/_ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ba yin/_yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med cing ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ye shes rjes su 'brang 
[\[245b.6\]]ba/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dbang sgyur ba/_snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba thabs mkhas pas shin tu rnam par phye ba smon lam gyis shin tu mngon par bsgrubs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis shin tu brlabs pa/_sems can gyi 
[\[245b.7\]]don bya zhing sbyor ba rgyun ma chad pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par phye ba yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ngo /_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la mdor bsdu na byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]dang ngag dang yid kyi las ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa'i phyir yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ngo /_/de ltar des byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba 'di thob pas/_nyon mongs pa'i rgyu ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir 
[\[246a.2\]]bsam pa'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin/_lam dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu brtan pa yin/_sems can gyi don yongs su mi gtod ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin/_'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob 
[\[246a.3\]]pa'i phyir byams pa chen po'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin/_nyams pa med pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir gzungs kyi stobs shin tu brtan pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i bye brag la mkhas pa'i phyir spobs pa'i stobs shin tu brtan 
[\[246a.4\]]pa yin/_'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par spyod pa'i rnam pa la mkhas pas mngon par shes pa'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba thams cad yongs su mi gtong bas smon lam gyi stobs shin tu brtan pa yin/_
[\[246a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam pa thams cad du mngon tu gyur pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs shin 
[\[246a.6\]]tu brtan pa yin te/_de de lta bu'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pas bya ba thams cad kyang yang dag par ston la bya ba thams cad la kha na ma tho ba 'ang med pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyis brgyad pa ste/_mi 
[\[246a.7\]]'phrogs pa'i phyir mi g.yo ba zhes bya'o/_/ye shes mi zlog pa'i phyir mi 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/_/'gro ba thams cad kyis shes par dka' bas na thob par dka' ba'i sa zhes bya'o/_/kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir gzhon nu'i sa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bsgyur bas skye ba'i sa zhes bya'o/_/gzod bya ba med pas yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa zhes bya'o/_/ye shes kyi rnam par dbye ba shin tu bya bas mthar thug pa'i sa zhes bya'o/_/smon lam shin tu mngon par bsgrub 
[\[246b.2\]]pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan gyis rnam par mi 'khrugs pas byin gyi rlabs kyi sa zhes bya'o/_/sngon gyi mthar mngon par bsgrubs pas lhun gyis grub pa'i sa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar byang chub sems 
[\[246b.3\]]dpa' de lta bu'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang ldan zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi rjes su song ba/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyis shin tu gsal bar gyur pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam dang /_spyod pa dang tshul gyi rjes su song ba/_sangs 
[\[246b.4\]]rgyas kyi yul la mngon du gyur pa de ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis shin tu brlabs pa yin/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi mgon pos rab tu bstsu ba yin/_lag na rdo rje rtag par rjes su 'brang ba yin/_ting 
[\[246b.5\]]nge 'dzin gyi stobs yongs su ma btang ba yin/_lus rnam par phye ba tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa yin/_lus kyi spyod pa'i stobs thams cad dang ldan pa yin/_mngon par shes pa chen po'i rnam par smin pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin/_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[246b.6\]]mtha' yas pa la dbang bsgyur ba yin/_lung bstan pa tshad med pa yang dag par nod pa yin/_yongs su smin pa'i tshul bzhin du 'gro ba rnams la mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su ston pa yin te/_de de lta bu'i sa dang ldan zhing theg pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[246b.7\]]la rab tu zhugs pa shin tu rnam par dpyad pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa chen po dang ldan pa/_rtag tu rgyun mi chad par shes rab snang ba'i 'od gzer gtong ba/_chos kyi dbyings chags pa med pa'i lam du zhugs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi lam rnam par dbye 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]ba la mkhas pa/_yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa/_rang gi sems bskyed pa la dbang bsgyur ba sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' shin tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/_bdud kyi lam thams cad yongs su 
[\[247a.2\]]bzlog pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang spyod yul gyi rjes su zhugs pa ni/_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas shing mu med pa dag tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis/_spyod pas de'i phyir byang chub sems 
[\[247a.3\]]dpa' de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba thob pa yin zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par de 
[\[247a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba yin/_sangs rgyas mthong ba la mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba rgya chen po yang yongs su mi gtong ste/_de bskal pa re re dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa re re dag tu yang sangs rgyas du ma dang /_
[\[247a.5\]]sangs rgyas brgya phrag du ma dang /_sangs rgyas stong phrag du ma dang /_sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig du ma dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong 
[\[247a.6\]]phrag du ma dang /_sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la rim gro byed do/_bkur sti byed do/_/bsti stang byed do/_/mchod pa byed do/_/mchod pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i rnam pa thams cad kyang yang dag par 'bul lo/_/
[\[247a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba sngon du 'gro ba'i chos snang ba nye bar bsgrub pa yang yang dag par len to/_/de sngon pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod rab tu thob pas/_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]phye ba yongs su bris pa shin tu bstan pas mi 'phrogs pa yin/_de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du 
[\[247b.2\]]ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar shin tu byang ba dang 
[\[247b.3\]]yongs su dag pa dang shin tu 'od gsal zhing dang bar gnas pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_gser gyi sa le sbram de nyid mgar ba mkhas pa des yongs su zin par gyur nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi bdag po'i mgul lam mgo 
[\[247b.4\]]la btags na sems can 'dzam bu'i gling pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyi rnam pa kun gyis mi thub mi 'phrogs pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag nyan 
[\[247b.5\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bar gyis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi 
[\[247b.6\]]'od chen po ni ye shes kyi sgo shin tu rnam par phye bas sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i mun pa rab tu sel to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_stong la dbang ba'i tshangs pa ni/_stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byams 
[\[247b.7\]]pas bkang zhing 'od kyis snang bar byed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]khams snang bas rgyas par bkang zhing /_sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba mthar gyis zhi bar byed do/_/lus kyang shin tu tshim par byed do/_/de bzhin du pha rol du phyin pa bcu las smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas
