[\[248a.2\]]che ba yin te/_lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par mi bsgrub pa ma yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa mdor bstan pa'o/_/rgya cher ni bskal pa mu med 
[\[248a.3\]]pas bstan pa'i mthar thug par shes par bya'o/_/de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phal cher stong gi bdag po tshangs pa chen por 'gyur te/_gzhan zil gyis gnon cing /_gzhan gyi zil gyis mi gnon pa dang /_don mthong zhing dbang thob par 'gyur te/_
[\[248a.4\]]sems can rnams la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin/_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba yongs su dris pas mi 'phrogs pa yin/_de sbyin pa 'am/_ngag snyan pa 'am/_don bsgrub pa 'am/_
[\[248a.5\]]don 'thun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/_de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/_gtso bor 'gyur/_thu bor 'gyur/_phul du 'gyur/_dam par 'gyur/_bla na med par 'gyur/_'dren par 'gyur/_yongs su 'dren par 'gyur 
[\[248a.6\]]ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la brten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste/_sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang /_chos yid la bya ba dang /_dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[248a.7\]]sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang /_stobs yid la bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]yid la bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'bral ba yin te/_de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu/_ting nge 'dzin stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob cing de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba 
[\[248b.2\]]snyed mthong ba dang /_de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed skyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed du 'gro ba dang /_
[\[248b.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed snang bar bya ba dang /_sems can stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_bskal pa stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin 
[\[248b.4\]]tu phra ba snyed du gnas par bya ba dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu 'jug pa dang /_chos kyi sgo stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam par 'byed pa dang /_
[\[248b.5\]]lus stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su bstan pa dang /_lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyi 
[\[248b.6\]]rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo/_/de yan cad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis/_rnam par 'phrul te de dag gi lus sam 'od dam/_rdzu 'phrul lam/_mig gam/_spyod yul lam/_dbyangs sam/_spyod pa 
[\[248b.7\]]'am/_rgyan tam/_byin gyi rlabs sam/_mos pa 'am/_mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dag bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang /_bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/de dag sa bdun shes rab thabs kyis lam sbyangs shing /_/shin du mchog bstsags 
[\[249a.2\]]smon lam chen po rab btab pa/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]yi dam pas byin rlabs dge ba'i rtsa ldan zhing /_/ye shes mngon 'dod mkhas pa brgyad pa yongs su gnon/_/bsod nams ye shes nyer bstsags snying rje byams ldan zhing /_/tshad med sems kyi rjes song mkha' dang 
[\[249a.3\]]'dra ba'i blo/_/drang srong chen po chos thos rtogs pa'i stobs ldan pa/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba yi bzod pa phra zhing zhi ba rab tu 'thob/_/snga nas ma skye mi skye mtshan nyid med pa dang /_/ma byung 'jig pa med cing rgyu ba med pa dang /_/dngos po skye 'jig med pa'i de nyid 
[\[249a.4\]]rtog med pa/_/yid dang sems kyi rgyu ba med cing nam mkha' 'dra/_/de dag 'di 'dra'i bzod ldan spros pa med gyur pa'i/_/mkhas pa zab spyod zhi ba'i gnas rab thob pa yin/_/dgra bcom rang rgyal 'gro ba kun gyis shes par dka'/_/
[\[249a.5\]]mtshan ma sna tshogs 'dzin pa'i 'du shes rnam par bstsal/_/de ltar gnas pa'i yid dang sems dang rtog pa med/_/dge slong 'gog dang ldan par rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog thob/_/rmi lam chus khyer gnyid sad bzhin du rtsol dang bral/_/tshangs 
[\[249a.6\]]pa'i gnas kyi 'dod pa ji bzhin gnyis kyang med/_/sngon gyi byin gyis bde gshegs yang dag bskul ba mdzad/_/'di ni bde gshegs dbang bskur bzod pa dam pa ste/_/nged kyi ye shes stobs yang sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams/_/de dag khyod 
[\[249a.7\]]la med kyis de la brtson 'grus rtsom/_/ci phan khyod kyi nyon mongs 'bar ba kun zhi yang /_/'jig rten nyon mongs myes tshig de dag mi blta 'am/_/sems can phan phyir spyad pa'i sngon gyi smon lam sems/_/'gro ba mthar rgyur ye shes don 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]zhugs shes par gyis/_/chos nyid de bzhin nyid 'di [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog rtag tu 'dug_/sa 'di rgyal ba nyan thos rang rgyal kun gyi ste/_/'dis ni 'jig rten dag tu stobs bcu mi brjod do/_/gzhan du ye shes yangs pa dus gsum tshad kyis brjod/_/de ltar 
[\[249b.2\]]de la mtshungs med lha dang [{]myis [,]mis [}]mchod pa/_/ye shes sgo mo rnam mang nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad/_/rgyal ba'i chos bsgrub pha rol mtha' yas gzhug mdzad pa/_/de la sngon gyi byang chub spyod pas char [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro/_/khyu mchog de dag ye shes sa mchog 'di thob nas/_/
[\[249b.3\]]phyogs rnams kun tu skad cig gcig gis rgyas 'gengs pa/_/ye shes shugs dang ldan zhing mngon shes mchog thob pas/_/rgya mtsho cher phyin gru chen rlung gis bkur ba bzhin/_/ched du bskyod sems bral zhing ye shes las la gnas/_/zhing rnams 
[\[249b.4\]]'byung zhing gnas pa rnam par dpyod pa byed/_/khams rnams bzhi po kha dog tha dad yangs pa dang /_/phra zhing che dang rnam par phye la yang dag 'jug_/stong gsum shin tu rdul phra kun la 'jug byed de/_/khams bzhi 'gro ba'i lus rnams rnam par phye ba dang /_/
[\[249b.5\]]rgyu drug rin chen rnam par phye ba'i rdul phran rnams/_/rnam par phye zhing ye shes yul gyis ma lus bgrang /_/ye shes rnams bsgoms yid ldan lus rnams thams cad du/_/'gro ba'i don phyir rang gi lus rnams gzud pa byed/_/stong gsum thams 
[\[249b.6\]]cad sna tshogs gzugs kyis khyab byas shing /_/'jig rten mtha' yas dag tu sna tshogs lus kyang ston/_/bar snang mkha' la nyi zla rlung gis rgyu 'gro yang /_/so so'i dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan chu dkyil rab tu snang /_/de bzhin mi g.yo'i chos la ye 
[\[249b.7\]]shes dam pas rgyu/_/bsam dag 'gro ba rnams la mkhas pa'i gzugs brnyan snang /_/'gro ba'i bsam pa bzhin du lus kyi rnam phye ba/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha yi 'khor rnams kun tu ston pa byed/_/nyan thos rang rgyal bde gshegs sras kyi lus rnams dang /_/
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]bde bar gshegs sku yan lag brgyad pa rab tu ston/_/sems can zhing dang de bzhin las kyi rnam smin lus/_/'phags lus sna tshogs de bzhin chos dang ye shes lus/_/nam mkha'i lus dang mnyam pa nyid du 
[\[250a.2\]]khyu mchog ldan/_/rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs 'gro ba tshim par bya phyir ston/_/dbang bcu dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye shes dpyod pa thob/_/ye shes spyod dang las rnams snying rje 'thun pa 'ang thob/_/las rnams ji snyed rgyal ba'i chos rnams yongs 
[\[250a.3\]]su bsgrub/_/sdom pa gsum la gnas shing mi g.yo ri rab bzhin/_/rgyal sras rnams kyi stobs bcu bskyod par mi nus pa/_/de dag kun ldan bdud rnams kun gyis yong mi zlog_/sangs rgyas byin rlabs brgya byin tshangs pas 
[\[250a.4\]]phyag kyang bya/_/lag na rdo rje'i dpung rnams rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang /_/sa phyogs 'di la gnas pa'i yon tan mtha' yas te/_/de dag bskal pa khrag khrig stong gis zad mi nus/_/de dag sangs rgyas bye ba bsnyen bkur yang byed pas/_/
[\[250a.5\]]rgyal po'i mgo la 'dug pa'i rgyan bzhin shin tu gsal/_/sa phyogs 'di gnas byang chub sems dpa' shes ldan pa/_/stong gi bdag po tshangs chen yon tan mang por 'gyur/_/theg pa gsum ston yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'khrugs mi 'phrogs te/_/
[\[250a.6\]]'od bzang byams pa'i bsam pas 'gro ba'i nyon mongs sel/_/skad cig gcig tu stong phrag bcu yi zhing rnams kyi/_/rdul khams ji snyed de snyed ting 'dzin ldan pa 'thob/_/phyogs bcu'i sems can gtso bo de snyed mang po mthong /_/yan 
[\[250a.7\]]cad smon lam mchog gi rgyan can gcig min no/_/'di ni mdor bsdus rgyal sras kyis/_/sa brgyad shin tu bstan pa ste/_/rgya che bskal pa bye bar yang /_/thams cad mthar phyin [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa ste 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'o//_//sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo//_bam po bcu dgu pa/_/sa yi dam pa 'di bshad tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin rlabs kyis/_/tshad 
[\[250b.2\]]med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/bye ba'i zhing rnams g.yos par gyur/_/thams cad gzigs pa'i sku las kyang /_/'od gzer yid du 'ong ba bkye/_/des ni zhing rnams snang bar byas/_/sems can rnams kyang bde bar gyur/_/
[\[250b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' stong snyed kyang /_/bar snang gnas la 'khod gyur te/_/lha rdzas lhag pa'i mchod pa yis/_/gsung pa'i mchog la mchod pa byed/_/lha yi rgyal po dbang phyug dang /_/dbang bsgyur rnams kyang dga' bar 
[\[250b.4\]]gyur/_/mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/_/yon tan rgya mtsho mchod pa byed/_/de nas lha mi bu mo stong /_/dga' zhing dbang po bder gyur pas/_/sbyar legs snyan pa'i glu yi dbyangs/_/ston pa mchod pa'i don du len/_/rol 
[\[250b.5\]]mo'i sgra dbyangs de dag las/_/drang srong chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/_/'di 'dra'i sgra dbyangs stong snyed du/_/snyan pa'i dbyangs su grag par gyur/_/zhi dul rab zhi dri ma thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]gyur cing /_/sa yi mchog dang ldan pas spyod pa legs 
[\[250b.6\]]spyod pa/_/phyogs bcur 'gro la phan par spyod pa'i khyu mchog rnams/_/mkha' dbyings 'dra ba'i yid kyi rgyal ba'i spyod pa ston/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]yi gnas dang lha yi gnas dang klu gnas su/_/phyogs bcur bsod nams stobs kyis rgyan rnams mang po byung /_
[\[250b.7\]]de las yang du rgyal sras ye shes la mos pa/_/rgyal ba'i yon tan bsngags pa rgya chen rab tu ston/_/zhing gcig ma g.yos rdul med zhing rnams thams cad du/_/'gro la phan byed zla ba lta bu'i 'od ldan pa/_/thams cad dbyangs su 'du shes sems 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]zhi yid rab kyis/_/so so'i skad bzhin sgra skad brgya yang rnam par brjod/_/sems can gang rnams blo zhan sems yid dmar gyur pa/_/de la mkhas pa khyu mchog nyan thos spyod pa ston/_/sems can gang rnams sems 
[\[251a.2\]]rno rang rgyal theg brtson pa/_/de la rdul med rang rgyal theg pa'i ye shes ston/_/sems can gang rnams phan sems snying rje brtse yid can/_/de la de dag rgyal sras spyod pa'i mchog kyang ston/_/sems can gang rnams blo mchog dam pa'i yid mos pa/_
[\[251a.3\]]de la mkhas pa tshad med sangs rgyas sku ston to/_/ji ltar sgyu mkhan 'gro ba rnams la sgyu ston pa/_/lus mang bye ba sna tshogs de dag dngos po [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/de bzhin rgyal sras mkhas pa ye shes sgyu mkhas pa/_/spyod pa thams cad ston kyang de dag dngos 
[\[251a.4\]]po med/_/'di 'dra'i sgra skad brgya stong du/_/snyan pa'i dbyangs su brjod byas nas/_/lha'i bu mo mi smra bar/_/zhi la mos pas rgyal ba lta/_/'khor rnams rnam par dang bas na/_/bde gshegs sras la yang smras pa/_/dam chos 
[\[251a.5\]]spyod pa'i spyod pa rnams/_/brgyad pa'i gong du yang gsungs shig_/byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa la gnas pa ni de lta bu'i blo tshad med 
[\[251a.6\]]pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par dpyad pas de nas gong du rnam par thar pa zhi ba la mos par zhe non cing de nas gong du/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes shin tu rdzogs pa rnam par spyad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rjes su 'jug par bya ba 
[\[251a.7\]]la 'jug pa dang /_ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i che ba nyid rnam par dbye ba dang /_gzungs dang /_ting nge 'dzin rab tu dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /_mngon par shes pa rgya chen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba khong 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]du chud par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su mi 'phrogs pa sbyang bar bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_khyu mchog gi 
[\[251b.2\]]mthu phyung ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /_snying rje chen po'i mthu phyung ba yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong bar byed pas/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa yongs su gnon te/_de byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/_dge ba dang /_mi 
[\[251b.3\]]dge ba dang /_lung du ma bstan pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 
[\[251b.4\]]mngon par 'du bya ba dang /_bsam pa dang bsam du med pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang nges pa dang /_ma nges pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[251b.5\]]spyod pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang /_'dus byas kyi chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos mngon par 'du bya ba yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/
[\[251b.6\]]de de lta bu'i shes par bya ba khong du chud pa'i blos sems can gyi sems thibs po rab tu rgyu ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_nyon mongs pa'i thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang /_las thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang /_dbang po thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang /_mos 
[\[251b.7\]]pa'i thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang /_khams thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang /_bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang /_skye ba thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang /_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang /_phung po gsum du rnam 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]par gnas pa'i thibs po rab tu rgyu ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de ni sems can rnams kyi sems rnam pa tha dad pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_sems rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_sems skad 
[\[252a.2\]]cig tu myur du 'gyur zhing 'jig pa dang mi 'jig pa dang /_sems lus med pa dang /_sems mtha' yas shing thams cad du dbang byed pa dang /_sems 'od gsal zhing dang ba dang /_sems nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med 
[\[252a.3\]]pa dang /_sems bcings pa dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_sems sgyu ma lta bur rnam par bsgrub pa dang /_sems 'gro ba'i rgyud ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa nas/_sems rnam pa sna tshogs/_stong phrag du ma'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[252a.4\]]du rab tu shes so/_/de ni nyon mongs pa rnams ring du song ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_sbyor ba mtha' yas pa dang lhan cig skyes shing tha mi dad pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_kun nas 'khor ba'i gnas gcig pa dang /_sems dang 
[\[252a.5\]]ldan pa dang /_mi ldan pa dang skye ba'i mtshams sbyor ba dang /_lam gyi rgyud ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa dang /_khams gsum rnam par phye ba dang /_sred pa dang /_ma rig pa dang /_lta ba'i zug rngu dang /_nga rgyal dang gti mug gi kha na ma tho ba chen po 
[\[252a.6\]]dang /_las rnam pa gsum gyi gzhi rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad pa nas mdor bsdu na nyon mongs pa'i rgyud stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du rjes su 'jug par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de ni las dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_lung du ma bstan pa yang 
[\[252a.7\]]dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rnam par mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_sems dang lhan cig tu skyes shing tha mi dad pa dang /_rang gi ngang gis skad cig tu rgyus 'byung zhing 'jig la 'bras bu chud [{]myi [,]mi [}]za bar mtshams sbyor ba dang /_rnam 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]par smin pa yod pa dang /_rnam par smin pa med pa dang /_nag po dang /_dkar po dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dkar [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnag pa dang /_phyogs du ma'i las yongs su len pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_las kyi zhing tshad med pa dang 'phags pa dang /_'jig rten pa rnam par 
[\[252b.2\]]phye ba dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnam par dgod pa dang /_nye bar len pa dang bcas pa dang /_nye bar len pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas dang /_tshe 'di dang skye ba dang /_rgyud gzhan du tshor bar 'gyur ba dang /_theg pa dang theg 
[\[252b.3\]]pa ma yin par nges pa dang ma nges pa nas/_las rnam pa tha dad pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de ni dbang po zhan pa dang /_'bring dang rab rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i 
[\[252b.4\]]mthar tha dad pa dang /_tha mi dad pa dang /_yangs pa dang /_'bring dang tha ma dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_lhan cig tu skyes shing tha mi dad pa dang /_theg pa dang theg pa ma yin par nges pa dang /_ma nges pa dang /_yongs su smin pa'i tshul bzhin du 'dul ba dang /_dbang po'i 
[\[252b.5\]]dra ba'i rjes su 'brang zhing myur du 'jig pa dang /_mtshan mar 'dzin pa dang /_dbang po'i dbang gzhan gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]thul ba dang /_dbang po'i rnam pa phyir bzlog tu rung ba dang /_phyir bzlog tu mi rung ba dang /_ring du song ba dang /_lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[252b.6\]]tha dad pa nas dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de ni mos pa zhan pa dang 'bring dang /_rab rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa nas/_dbang po'i tshul bzhin du mos pa rnam 
[\[252b.7\]]pa tha dad pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de ni khams tha ma dang 'bring dang /_rab rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa nas khams rnam pa tha dad pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du yang dag 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de ni bsam pa tha ma dang 'bring dang /_rab rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa nas bsam pa rnam pa tha dad pa stong phrag du ma'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/
[\[253a.2\]]de ni bag la nyal ba rnams bsam pa dang lhan cig skyes pa dang /_sems dang lhan cig skyes pa dang /_sems dang ldan pa dang /_sems dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa dang ring du song ba dang /_thog ma med pa nas/_gud du ma bskyod pa dang /_bsam gtan dang rnam par thar 
[\[253a.3\]]pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_mngon par shes pa bzod par dka' ba dang /_khams gsum pa'i mtshams shin tu sbyor ba dang /_thog ma med pa'i dus kyi sems kyi rgyud kun tu rgyu bar byed pa dang /_skye ba'i sgo kun nas 'byung ba rnam par 
[\[253a.4\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par byed pa dang /_gnyen po thob pas dngos por [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_sa'i skye mched dang phrad pa dang /_mi phrad pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam tha dad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yang dag par bstsal ba/_yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de ni skye ba rnam 
[\[253a.5\]]pa tha dad pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_las ji lta ba bzhin du skye ba dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang byol song dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_lha ma yin dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha'i gnas rnam par dgod pa dang /_gzugs dang gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]par 
[\[253a.6\]]skye ba dang /_'du shes yod pa dang 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]par skye ba dang /_las kyi zhing dang /_sred pa'i rlan dang /_ma rig pa'i mun pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i sa bon gyis yang srid pa rab tu 'byung ba dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs lhan cig skyes shing tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa dang /_
[\[253a.7\]]srid par 'gro yang khyer zhing sred pas mngon par mos pa'i mtshams sbyor ba dang /_spyod par 'dod pa dang /_'byung bar 'dod pa dang /_sems can la mos pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_khams gsum pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_srid pa 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]nying gi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de ni bag chags rnams rgyu ba dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgyu ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_/lam gyi rgyud gang dang ji ltar 'brel ba'i bag chags kyis bsgos pa dang /_sems can spyad pa spyod pa ji 
[\[253b.2\]]lta ba bzhin du bsgos pa dang /_las dang nyon mongs pa la goms pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsgos pa dang /_dge ba dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba dang /_lung du ma bstan pa'i las la goms pas bsgos pa dang /_yang srid par 'gro bar bsgos pa dang /_mthar gyis bsgos pa dang /_
[\[253b.3\]]ring du song zhing rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /_nyon mongs pa bstsal bas bsgos pa dang /_dngos por gyur pa dang dngos por ma gyur pas bsgos pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing thos pas 
[\[253b.4\]]bsgos pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de ni sems can gyi phung po yang dag par nges pa dang /_log par nges pa dang /_gnyis kar ma nges pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_yang dag par lta bas yang dag par nges pa dang /_
[\[253b.5\]]log par lta bas log par nges pa dang /_de gnyis ka dang bral bas ma nges pa dang /_mtshams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa lnga las gang yang rung bar log par nges pa dang /_dbang po lngar yang dag par nges pa dang /_de gnyis ka dang bral bas ma nges pa dang /_log pa brgyad 
[\[253b.6\]]du log par nges pa dang /_yang dag pa la yang dag par nges pa dang /_phyis byar [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang de gnyis ka dang bral bas ma nges pa dang /_ser sna dang phrag dog dang /_snying [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtse ba la nye bar spyod pa ma btang bas log par nges pa dang /_'phags pa bla na med 
[\[253b.7\]]pa'i lam bsgoms pas yang dag par nges pa dang /_de gnyis ka dang bral bas ma nges pa'i phung por bstan pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa de lta bu dag yongs su shes nas/_de'i 
[\[254a.2\]]tshul bzhin du thar pa nye bar bsgrub pa nye bar sgrub bo/_/de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_sems can gdul ba dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa bstan pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bstan pa 
[\[254a.3\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa bstan pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bstan pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/des de ltar shes nas sems can rnams la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston te/_bsam pa rnam par dbye 
[\[254a.4\]]ba'i tshul ji lta ba dang /_bag la nyal ba rnam par dbye ba'i tshul ji lta ba dang /_dbang po rnam par dbye ba'i tshul ji lta ba dang /_mos pa rnam par dbye ba'i tshul ji lta ba dang /_spyod yul rnam par dbye ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes nye bar bsgrub pa 
[\[254a.5\]]dang /_spyod yul thams cad kyi rgyus khong du chud pa dang /_khams thibs po yongs su rgyu ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /_skye ba dang /_nyon mongs pa'i las kyi bag chags rnam pa gang dang gang yod pa phyir bzlog 
[\[254a.6\]]par bya ba dang /_phung po rnam par dgod pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du tshul dang sbyar ba dang /_theg pa gang la mos pa'i rnam par thar pa thob par bya bas chos ston te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[254a.7\]]dpa' ni/_chos smra ba chen po'i go 'phang la gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod yongs su bsrung ba yin/_de chos smra ba'i tshul dang ldan pas ye shes la mkhas pa tshad med pa'i rjes su song zhing tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]bzhis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gis chos ston te/_de la byang chub sems dpa' tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhi rtag tu rgyun mi chad cing ma 'dres par yang dag par 'byung ngo /_/bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_chos tha dad pa yang 
[\[254b.2\]]dag par shes pa dang /_don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa dang /_spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'o/_/de chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas/_chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid 
[\[254b.3\]]rab tu shes so/_/don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos rnams kyi rnam par dbye ba rab tu shes so/_/nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos rnams ma 'dres par bstan pa rab tu shes so/_/spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes 
[\[254b.4\]]pas chos rnams 'thun par rjes su mtshams sbyar ba rgyun mi 'chad pa rab tu shes so/_/gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos rnams kyi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rab tu shes so/_/don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos rnams kyi 'byung ba dang /_
[\[254b.5\]]'jig pa rab tu shes so/_/nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa rgyun chad pa med par chos ston to/_/spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas ji ltar rnam par bkod pa bzhin du 'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mtha' yas 
[\[254b.6\]]pas chos ston to/_/gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas/_da ltar byung ba'i chos rnam par dbye ba rab tu shes so/_/don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnam par 
[\[254b.7\]]dbye ba rab tu shes so/_/nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba ma 'dres par chos ston to/_/spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas dus re re zhing chos kyi snang ba mu [{]myed [,]med [}]par chos 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]ston to/_/gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas/_chos kyi bye brag rab tu shes so/_/don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas/_don gyi bye brag rab tu shes so/_/nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes 
[\[255a.2\]]pas skad ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pas chos ston to/_/spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas chos ston to/_/gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos kyi rgyus rnam par dbye ba ma 'dres pa mkhas par rab tu 
[\[255a.3\]]shes so/_/don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas rjes su 'gro ba'i ye shes de bzhin nyid du rnam par dgod pa rab tu shes so/_/nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas kun rdzob kyi rgyus yang dag par bstan pas chos ston to/_/spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag 
[\[255a.4\]]par shes pas don dam pa'i rgyu la mkhas pas chos ston to/_/gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos rnams tshul gcig las mi 'gyur ba rab tu shes so/_/don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched 
[\[255a.5\]]dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mkhas par khong du chud par bya ba la yang dag par 'jug go_/nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas 'gro ba thams cad mngon par smon pa'i sgra dbyangs shin tu snyan pa'i tshig gis chos ston to/_/spobs pa tha dad pa yang 
[\[255a.6\]]dag par shes pas/_phyi phyir zhing dran pa mtha' yas pas chos ston to/_/gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas theg pa gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba tha dad pa rab tu shes so/_/don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas theg pa rab tu rnam par phye ba'i 
[\[255a.7\]]rnam pa tha dad pa rab tu shes so/_/nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas theg pa thams cad tha dad pa med par shin tu ston to/_/spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas theg pa re re la yang chos kyi snang ba mu [{]myed [,]med [}]par shin tu ston to/_/gzhan yang chos 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_ye shes kyi spyod pa dang /_chos kyi spyod pa thams cad ye shes kyi khong du chud par bya ba la rab tu 'jug go_/don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas/_sa bcu 
[\[255b.2\]]rnam par dgod cing /_shin tu bstan pa rnam par phye ba la yang dag par 'jug go_/nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas/_sa'i lam ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar bsgrub pa tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad par yang dag par ston to/_/spobs pa tha 
[\[255b.3\]]dad pa yang dag par shes pas/_sa re re zhing rnam pa mu [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par ston to/_/gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu/_khong du chud par bya ba la rab tu 
[\[255b.4\]]'jug go_/don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas dus dang dngos po dang /_mtshan nyid rnam par phye ba sna tshogs khong du chud par bya ba rab tu shes so/_/nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas/_khong du chud pa rnam par phye ba ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[255b.5\]]bstan pas chos ston to/_/spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas/_chos kyi tshig re re la yang bskal pa mtha' yas par rgyun mi chad par chos ston to/_/gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[255b.6\]]thams cad kyi gsung dang /_stobs dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_thugs rje chen po dang /_tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i tshul dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i 
[\[255b.7\]]ye shes rtogs par bya ba rab tu shes so/_/don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas sems can gyi spyod pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang /_bsam pa ji lta ba dang /_dbang po ji lta ba dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab tu shes so/_/nges pa'i 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas/_sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang /_ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rjes su bsgrags pas chos ston to/_/spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas/_de bzhin 
[\[256a.2\]]gshegs pa'i ye shes 'od gsal ba dang /_spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la mos pas chos ston to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod 
[\[256a.3\]]thob cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa la gnas pa chos smra ba chen po'i go 'phang la gnas pa'i tshe/_don dang ldan pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa yin/_chos dang ldan pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa yin/_ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs rab 
[\[256a.4\]]tu thob pa yin/_snang ba dang ldan pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa yin/_blo gros bzang po dang ldan pa'i gzungs dang /_dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs dang /_grags pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs dang /_gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i gzungs dang /_chags pa med pa'i sgo'i gzungs dang /_
[\[256a.5\]]mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs dang /_don sna tshogs kyi mdzod dang ldan pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa yin/_de gzungs de dag la sogs pa gzungs kyi sgo brgya stong grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa phrag bcu yongs su tshang bar 'thob ste/_/gzungs kyi sgo brgya stong grangs 
[\[256a.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa phrag bcu dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag la mkhas pas de snyed du tshad med pa nyid dang ldan pa'i spobs pa rnam par phye ba'i sgos chos ston to/_/de de ltar tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i gzungs kyi sgo brgya stong grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pas tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das las chos 
[\[256a.7\]]nyan cing thos nas kyang brjed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_ji skad du thos pa yang tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnam par phye bas shin tu ston to/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las gzungs kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcus chos khong du chud par byed de/_de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las ji lta ba de bzhin 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa las gzungs kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcus chos khong du chud par byed do/_/de smon pa tsam gyis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las chos kyi sgo snang ba ches mang du yang dag par 'dzin gyi nyan thos shin 
[\[256b.2\]]tu mang du thos pa dang ldan pa thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa rnams kyis ni bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang gzung ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]zin to/_/de ltar de lta bu'i gzungs thob cing spobs pa thob pas chos kyi gtam bya ba'i phyir 'dug na/_stong gsum gyi stong 
[\[256b.3\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/_chos kyi stan la 'dug cing sems can rnams la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par phye zhing chos ston to/_/de'i chos kyi stan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dbang 
[\[256b.4\]]bskur ba'i sa thob pa ma gtogs par thams cad las 'phags shing snang ba tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang ldan pa yin/_de 'dod na chos kyi stan la 'dug cing dbyangs gcig gis 'khor thams cad du sgra skad sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas yang dag par go bar byed do/_/'dod na sgra 
[\[256b.5\]]skad sna tshogs dang /_dbyangs kyi yan lag tha dad pa rnam par phye bas 'khor thams cad mngon par go bar byed do/_/'dod na 'od gzer gyi sgo nye bar bsgrub pas chos kyi sgo shin tu brjod do/_/'dod na ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas dbyangs rnam par phye ba shin tu brjod do/_/'dod 
[\[256b.6\]]na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs su snang ba ji snyed yod pa'i gzugs su snang ba de dag las chos kyi sgra 'byung bar byed do/_/'dod na dbyangs kyi yan lag gcig gi sgras chos kyi dbyings thams cad khong du chud par byed do/_/'dod na sgra 
[\[256b.7\]]dang dbyangs thams cad chos kyi sgrar byin gyis rlob bo/_/'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yod pa'i glu dang rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba'i sgra thams cad las chos kyi sgra 'byung bar byed do/_/'dod na yi ge gcig gi sgra las chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu phye ba'i 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]sgra 'byung bar byed do/_/'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas shing brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sa dang chu dang [{]mye [,]me [}]dang rlung gi phung po rdul shin tu phra ba rnam par phye ba rdul shin tu phra ba re re las chos kyi sgo brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'byung bar byed do/_/
[\[257a.2\]]gal te de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams 'ongs te/_skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu dri ba yongs su 'dri zhing de dag re res kyang sgra rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pas yongs su dris par gyur la/_gcig gis 
[\[257a.3\]]gang dris ba de gzhan [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri bar gyur na'ang de la byang chub sems dpa' des sems can de dag thams cad kyi sgra tshig so so dang /_yi ge'i 'bru yan cad ma lus par bzung ste/_bzung nas kyang tshig gcig mngon par brjod pas sems can de dag thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa 
[\[257a.4\]]tshim par byed pa nas/_'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i bar du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis skad cig thang cig yud tsam du dri ba yongs su dris te/_de dag re re zhing yang sgra rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pas dri bar gyur la/_gcig gis ci dris pa de 
[\[257a.5\]]gzhan [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri bar gyur na'ang de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' des skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ma lus par bzung ste/_sgra gcig brjod pas de dag thams cad khong du chud par byed do/_/de 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i bar dag kyang 
[\[257a.6\]]rgyas par bkang zhing sems can rnams la bsam pa dang /_dbang po dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston to/_/chos kyi gtam la zhugs pa'i tshe yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs len cing /_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyis sems can thams 
[\[257a.7\]]cad la nye bar gnas pa yin yang /_de lta bu'i ye shes snang bas 'dzin pa yongs su rtsom ste/_gal te skra'i rtse mo'i go gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs la de snyed du tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]par gyur pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du chos bstan te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag re res kyang de snyed kyi sems can tshad med pa la chos rnam pa tha dad par shin tu bstan te/_sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud re re la'ang de snyed du chos nye bar bsgrub pa tshad 
[\[257b.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa nye bar bsgrub par gyur la/_de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du ste/_skra'i rtse mo'i go gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings thams cad du de ltar gyur kyang de dag 
[\[257b.3\]]thams cad zin par 'gyur na/_'jig rten gyi khams de tsam dag gi sems can rnams kyi lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nyin mtshan du yid la bsam pa gzhan med par sangs 
[\[257b.4\]]rgyas kyi spyod yul la zhugs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa zab mo rab tu thob pa yin/_de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan zhing mnyam par bzhag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]spong 
[\[257b.5\]]ste/_bskal pa re re zhing yang sangs rgyas du ma nas/_sangs rgyas brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig lta zhing mthong nas kyang rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod pa byed de/_sangs rgyas mthong zhing mchod pa bya ba rgya chen po yongs su mi gtong ngo /_/de 
[\[257b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa de dag la zhu ba yongs su zhu ba byed de/_chos kyi gzungs rab tu bstan pa las shin tu 'byung ba yin/_de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sngon bas kyang shin tu byang zhing [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phrogs par 'gyur te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na/_gser gyi sa le 
[\[257b.7\]]sbram de nyid mgar ba mkhas pas rgyan tu byas te/_yongs su zin pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i yan lag gi dam pa mgo 'am mgul du btags na/_khams kyi rgyal po thams cad dang /_gling bzhi ba'i sems can thams cad kyi rgyan gyi rnam pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]thub cing 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'phrogs pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_sa 'og ma la gnas pa'i byang 
[\[258a.2\]]chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phrogs shing mi thub pa yin/_de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba snang ba des ni sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang /_sems kyi thibs po snang bar byas te/_de nyid nas phyir ldog go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na/_stong gnyis la 
[\[258a.3\]]dbang ba'i tshangs pa chen po ni stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi thibs po dma' bar gzhol ba yongs su snang bar byed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 
[\[258a.4\]]ba'i rtsa ba'i snang ba de yang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang /_sems kyi thibs po snang bar byas te/_de nyid nas phyir ldog go_/de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas che ba yin te/_lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par mi bsgrub 
[\[258a.5\]]pa ma yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros shes bya ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa mdor bstan pa'o/_/rgya cher ni bskal pa mu med pas bstan pa'i mthar thug par shes par bya'o/_/de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[258a.6\]]ni phal cher tshangs pa chen por gyur te/_stobs dang mthu chen po thob pa stong gnyis la dbang zhing zil gyis non pa/_gzhan gyi zil gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]non pa/_mthun pa'i don mthong ba dbang shin tu thob pa/_sems can rnams la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[258a.7\]]pa thams cad ston pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa ste/_sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su dris pa bstan pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phrogs pa yin/_de sbyin pa 'am/_ngag snyan pa 'am/_don bsgrub pa 'am/_don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/_de thams cad ji ltar na sems can 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/_gtso bor 'gyur/_thu bor 'gyur/_phul du 'gyur/_dam par 'gyur/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gyur/_'dren par 'gyur/_yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste/_sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang /_chos yid 
[\[258b.2\]]la bya ba dang /_dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang /_stobs yid la bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa yid la 
[\[258b.3\]]bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas/_rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'bral ba yin te/_de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[258b.4\]]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob cing de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong ba dang /_de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par 
[\[258b.5\]]shes pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed skyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du 'gro ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams sangs 
[\[258b.6\]]rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed snang bar bya ba dang /_sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[258b.7\]]zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du gnas par bya ba dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu 'jug pa dang /_chos kyi sgo sangs 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam par 'byed pa dang /_lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su bstan pa dang /_lus re re la yang byang 
[\[259a.2\]]chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yang dag par bstan pa'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo/_/de yan cad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad 
[\[259a.3\]]par gyis rnam par 'phrul te/_de dag gi lus sam 'od dam rdzu 'phrul lam/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gam spyod yul lam/_dbyangs sam spyod pa 'am/_rgyan tam byin gyi rlabs sam/_mos pa 'am mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /_
[\[259a.4\]]bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas kyang bgrang bar dka'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang bstan par bya ba'i phyir/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/de dag 
[\[259a.5\]]tshad med stobs kyi blo yis rnam dpyod cing /_/ye shes phra ba'i dam pa 'gro bas shes dka' ba/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i gnas la yang dag 'jug_/'gro ba'i don byed de dag sa dgu yongs su gnon/_/de dag gzungs mchog ting 'dzin che ba nyid mchog dang /_/
[\[259a.6\]]mngon shes yangs dang de bzhin zhing 'jug mtha' yas dang /_/stobs dang rtogs pa'i ye shes rgyal ba'i brtan gnas dang /_/smon lam snying rje'i bsam pas mkhas pa dgu la 'jug_/sa dgu ldan pa de dag rgyal ba'i mdzod 'dzin cing /_/dge ba'i chos dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge 
[\[259a.7\]]lung du ma bstan dang /_/zag dang bcas dang 'jig rten pa dang 'phags pa dang /_/bsam du rung dang bsam du mi rung mkhas pas shes/_/nges pa'i chos dang ma nges chos kyang rab tu rtogs/_/theg gsum phun sum tshogs pa'i bya ba yongs su 'jal/_/
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]'dus byas rnam par phye dang grangs dang rgyu ba dag_/'jig rten ji ltar mngon byed de la rab tu 'jug_/de dag de 'dra'i shes ldan blo mchog phra ldan pa/_/sems can sems kyi thibs po yongs su rtog pa byed/_/rnam shes sna tshogs myur du 'gyur zhing ldog pa 
[\[259b.2\]]dang /_/rnam shes mtha' yas 'byung la rtag tu mkhas pa 'jug_/nyon mongs mtha' yas sbyor dang grogs su 'gyur ba dang /_/kun nas 'khor dang bag nyal 'gro rgyud mtshams sbyor dang /_/las rnams sna tshogs rnam par phye la 'ang de bzhin 'jug_/
[\[259b.3\]]rgyu dang 'gog dang 'bras bu 'jig la'ang yang dag 'jug_/dbang po rno dang tha ma 'bring dang yangs pa dang /_/tha dad sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' la'ang yang dag 'jug_/mos pa dge dang mi dge sna tshogs du ma dag_/stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi kun la yang dag 'jug_/
[\[259b.4\]]khams kyi rnam pa nyon mongs lta ba srid pa rnams/_/thibs po gyur pa snga phyi med cing 'chad med dang /_/bag nyal bsam pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyud rnams kyi/_/sems rnams kun rgyu 'brel cing rgyun chad [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba/_/bsam pa bag nyal rgyud yod dngos po 
[\[259b.5\]]ma yin te/_/yul la mi gnas bsam pa yongs su 'bral mi 'gyur/_/shes par dka' ba'i bsam gtan yul las phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog_/rdo rje lta bu'i lam gyis chod 'gyur gzhan gyis [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/rgyud drug skye ba rnam par phye la rab tu 'jug_/sred rlan ma 
[\[259b.6\]]rig mun pa de bzhin las kyi zhing /_/rnam shes sa bon bcas 'byung myu gu [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs/_/khams gsum sngon mtha' med par de dag rab tu 'jug_/de dag bag chags tshul dang nyon mongs las dang sems/_/'dod chags bral bas lam gyi rgyud du 'byung 
[\[259b.7\]]ba [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/sems can phung po gsum du nges pa yang dag shes/_/lta bar bying ba shes pa'i lam dang de dag ldan/_/de 'dra'i shes ldan sa mchog 'di la gnas pa ste/_/sems can bsam pa mos pa dbang po'i tshul bzhin du/_/chos rnams rnam par phye zhing shin tu 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]ston pa byed/_/tha dad yang dag don shes nges tshig spobs pa yis/_/de dag chos smra'i tshul la gnas pa rab tu thob/_/seng ge khyu mchog dpe 'dra ri yi rgyal po 'dra/_/bdud rtsi sprin chen zhim pa'i char yang rab tu 'bebs/_/klu yi 
[\[260a.2\]]rgyal pos rgya mtsho rgyas par byed pa bzhin/_/don gyi don shes de bzhin chos nyid rab tu shes/_/nges tshig rjes su song zhing spobs pa rab tu thob/_/de dag grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]stong phrag bcu yi gzungs thob pas/_/chos rnams 'dzin pa rgya mtsho sprin chen char 'dzin 
[\[260a.3\]]bzhin/_/de dag de 'dra'i ting 'dzin gzungs gsal thob gyur pas/_/skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas mang po stong yang mthong /_/rin chen chos rnams thob nas yang du ston byed de/_/tshig gi dkyil 'khor rnam dag dbyangs kyi yan lag ldan/_/
[\[260a.4\]]'dod na stong gsum 'jig rten khams su gtogs pa yis/_/sems can bsam sems sna tshogs tshul bzhin smin byed cing /_/thams cad bsam pa dbang po ji bzhin tshim par byed/_/gling bzhi rgya mtsho'i sprin bzhin yang dag rab tu 'jug_/de bas gong du 
[\[260a.5\]]legs ldan brtson 'grus rab thob pa/_/skra rtse'i go gcig bsam gyis mi khyab sems pa byed/_/sems can sna tshogs mang la bde gshegs chos ston pa/_/thos nas sa bon kun 'dzin sa bzhin yongs su 'dzin/_/phyogs rnams bcu po'i sems 
[\[260a.6\]]can mang po ji snyed pa/_/de dag thams cad 'khor gcig 'dus par 'khod gyur kyang /_/de dag bsam pa skad cig gcig gis bsam byas shing /_/sgra skad gcig gis de dag thams cad tshim par byed/_/'di la gnas pa chos rgyal lha [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[260a.7\]]mchog tu 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sras po chos kyis yongs su skyong ba yin/_/nyin mtshan kun tu rgyal ba rnams dang rtag par 'grogs/_/zab yangs ye shes rnam par thar pa ldan par gnas/_/de dag du yang sangs rgyas khrag khrig bsnyen bkur byed/_/
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyan bzang yongs su byang ba bzhin/_/de yi 'od kyang nyon mongs thibs po snang bar byed/_/tshangs pa'i 'od kyis stong gnyis 'jig rten ji bzhin no/_/'di la gnas pa legs ldan tshangs chen 'jig rten du/_/skye 'gyur 
[\[260b.2\]]theg gsum ston la mkhas shing mthu yod pa/_/'gro ba kun la phan phyir ci rtsom gang yang rung /_/yon tan shes ldan bde gshegs ye shes ldan par sngo/_/grangs med zhing du gtogs pa rdul phran du yod pa/_/de snyed ting 'dzin skad cig 
[\[260b.3\]]gcig tu brtan pas 'thob/_/phyogs rnams kun gyi rgyal ba mthong zhing gsung yang nyan/_/yan cad smon lam ldan pa tshad med rnam par 'phrul/_/'di ni sa rab dgu pa ste/_/ye shes chen po rnam par spyod/_/zab cing blta dka' shin tu phra/_/
[\[260b.4\]]rgyal ba'i sras kyis bstan pa yin/_/legs pa'i blo gros shes bya ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa'o//_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po nyi shu pa'o/_/
[\[260b.5\]]spyod pa bla na med pa 'di thos nas/_/gtsang gnas lha rnams bye ba rab tu dga'/_/dbang po tshim par bar snang mkha' la gnas/_/bde bar gshegs la rje sar mchod pa byed/_/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba bsam yas pa/_/bar snang mkha' gnas 
[\[260b.6\]]rab tu dgar gyur cing /_/spos sprin tshad med yid du 'ong ba dag_/'gro ba'i nyon mongs sel ba dri zhim bdug pa byed/_/lha yi dbang po dbang bsgyur rab dga' zhing /_/bar snang gnas las lha 'khor khrag khrig dang /_/rim gro bcas par gos rnams 
[\[260b.7\]]'dor bar byed/_/yid 'ong gos brgya yongs su bskor ba byas/_/lha yi bu mo mang po shin tu dga'/_/bde bar gshegs la rjes su mchod pa byed/_/rol mo brdung ba bye ba khrag khrig byed/_/'di 'dra'i sgra dbyangs kun las byung bar gyur/_/zhing mchog 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]gcig na bde bar gshegs pa bzhugs/_/zhing rnams kun tu sku gzugs rab tu bstan/_/sku gzugs khrag khrig sna tshogs yid du 'ong /_/chos dbyings rgya chen yongs su rgyas par gang /_/spu gcig rtse nas bde gshegs 'od bkye 
[\[261a.2\]]ba/_/'gro ba'i nyon mongs yongs su zhi bar 'phro/_/zhing gi rdul khams zad par nus 'gyur gyi/_/de dag bgrang bas shes par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/la las sangs rgyas mtshan rab mnga' bar mthong /_/'khor los sgyur ba'i dam par la las mthong /_/zhing 
[\[261a.3\]]rnams la lar spyod pa mchog mdzad cing /_/dag cing zhi bar rkang gnyis dam pa mthong /_/dga' ldan gnas na mgon po bzhugs pa dang /_/'pho dang gshegs par de bzhin rab tu snang /_/zhing rnams bye bar yum gyi skur bzhugs dang /_/zhing rnams la lar 
[\[261a.4\]]skye ba de bzhin snang /_/'gro ba'i don du mgon po 'byung mdzad dang /_/byang chub dam pa mchog tu 'tshang rgya zhing /_/chos kyi 'khor lo mya ngan 'da' ba dag_/zhing mang khrag khrig kun na de bzhin snang /_/sgyu ma'i mkhan po mkhas par lobs gyur pa/_/
[\[261a.5\]]ji ltar 'tsho phyir gzugs mang ston pa bzhin/_/de bzhin ston pa ye shes mchog mkhyen pa/_/sku gzugs kun tu 'gro ba rnams la ston/_/stong pa zhi ba rang bzhin mtshan nyid [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/chos nyid bar snang mkha' dang mnyam par yang /_/sangs rgyas ston pa 
[\[261a.6\]]don dam de nyid du/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul mchog gis yang dag bstan/_/bde gshegs spyod yul rang bzhin ci 'dra ba/_/sems can kun gyi chos nyid de 'dra ste/_/mtshan dang mtshan gzhi mnyam pa nyid kyis 'dra/_/mtshan nyid med pa chos rnams kun 
[\[261a.7\]]gyi mchog_/bde gshegs ye shes don du su gnyer bas/_rtog dang rnam rtogs yod rtog yongs su spongs/_/dngos dang dngos med mnyam nyid shes par gyis/_/myur du [{]myi [,]mi [}]yi gtso bo mchog tu 'gyur/_/'di 'dra'i sgra skad stong snyed du/_/snyan pa'i dbyangs su 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]brjod byas nas/_/lha'i bu mo [{]myi [,]mi [}]smra zhing /_/zhi la dga' bar bde gshegs lta/_/'khor rnams zhi bar shes gyur nas/_/rnam thar zla ba 'jigs med pas/_rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_/rgyal sras de la yang smras pa/_/bcu par yang dag 'phar ba yi/_/rnam pa yon tan spyod yul 
[\[261b.2\]]dang /_/mtshan ma dag dang cho 'phrul rnams/_/mkhas pas kun kyang bstan par mdzod/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa'i bar 
[\[261b.3\]]du shes par bya ba/_tshad med pa yongs su brtags pa'i blos rnam par dbye ba shin tu rnam par phye ba/_chos dkar po shin tu rdzogs pa bstsags par bya ba'i tshogs mtha' yas pa shin tu bstsags pa/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su zin pa/_snying 
[\[261b.4\]]rje chen po shin tu yangs pa thob pa/_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba rnam pa tha dad pa la mkhas pa/_/sems can gyi khams thibs pos nye bar spyod pa la rab tu zhugs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i 'du shes dang /_yid la byed pa 
[\[261b.5\]]can stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos la lhag par dmigs pa'i rjes su song ba ni rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' ye shes de lta bu dang ldan zhing dbang 
[\[261b.6\]]bskur ba'i sa thob pa de la byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba mngon du 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings rnam par phye ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba dang /_snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[261b.7\]]'od gzer gyi me tog rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba dang /_rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba dang /_rgya mtsho'i rgya zhes bya ba dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa zhes bya ba dang /_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba dang /_sems can thams 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du bzhugs pa zhes bya ba mngon du 'gyur te/_de la de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag grangs med pa phrag 
[\[262a.2\]]bcu mngon du 'gyur ro/_/de ting nge 'dzin de dag thams cad la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ngo /_/de ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te/_ting nge 'dzin gyi dgos pa de dag thams cad la yang rab tu spyod do/_/ting nge 'dzin brgya stong grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[262a.3\]]pa phrag bcu'i tha ma la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi khyad par gyis mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur te/_mngon du gyur ma thag tu stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i tha gru dang mnyam pa'i rin po che'i pad 
[\[262a.4\]]mo rin po che thams cad kyis rnam pa thams cad du spras shing brgyan pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi spyod yul las 'das pa/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas byung ba/_sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang /_spyod yul gyis yongs su grub pa/_chos kyi dbyings la shin 
[\[262a.5\]]tu gnas par snang ba lha rdzas kyi yul las shin tu 'das pa/_nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya'i chu ba chen po can/_tsan dan gyi rgyal po mtshungs pa med pa'i snying po can/_a sma gar b+ha rab kyi ze ba can/_'dzam bu chu klung gi gser ltar snang ba'i lo ma can/_'od gzer tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[262a.6\]]pas shin tu rgyas pa'i lhun can/_rin po che thams cad kyis nang yongs su spras pa rin po che mu med pa'i dra bas kun nas yog pa/_stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rin po che'i pad mo chen po'i 'khor dang ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_
[\[262a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyang de dang rkyen tu 'tsham zhing de'i tshul dang mthun par gnas so/_/de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi khyad par gyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob ma thag tu rin po che'i pad mo'i rgyal po chen po de la 'dug par 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]snang ste/_rin po che'i pad+mo'i rgyal po chen po de la byang chub sems dpa' de 'dug ma thag tu rin po che'i pad+mo'i rgyal po chen po de'i 'khor rin po che'i pad+mo ji snyed byung ba de snyed kyi byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' de yongs su bskor te/_rin po che'i pad mo de dag 
[\[262b.2\]]la 'khod nas/_byang chub sems dpa' de nyid la blta zhing de dag re re zhing yang ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu bcu la snyoms par 'jug go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis mnyam par bzhag ma 
[\[262b.3\]]thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/ngan song thams cad rtse zhil bar 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi dbyings thams cad snang bas rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su dag 
[\[262b.4\]]par 'gyur ro/_/zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sgra grag par 'gyur ro/_/skal ba dang spyod pa mthun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi lha dang [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba'i 
[\[262b.5\]]sgra yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kyi bde ba yang skye bar 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mchod pa dang /_rim gro yang rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[262b.6\]]pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kyang rnam par dmigs par 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' de ni rin po che'i pad mo'i rgyal po de la 'dug ma thag tu rkang pa'i mthil gnyis kyi 'og nas 'od 
[\[262b.7\]]gzer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ngo /_/byung nas kyang phyogs bcur mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po yan cad snang bar byas te/_sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/pus mo'i lha nga gnyis nas 'od 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]gzer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu byung ste/_byung nas kyang phyogs bcur byol song gi skye gnas kyi gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med 
[\[263a.2\]]pa phrag bcu 'byung ste/_byung nas kyang phyogs bcur gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas/_sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/g.yas g.yon gyi rtsib logs gnyis nas 'od gzer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag 
[\[263a.3\]]bcu 'byung ste/_byung nas kyang phyogs bcur [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]gnas rnams snang bar byas te/_sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/lag pa'i mthil gnyis nas 'od gzer_brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste/_byung nas kyang phyogs bcur lha dang lha 
[\[263a.4\]]ma yin gyi gnas rnams snang bar byas nas/_sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/phrag pa gnyis nas 'od gzer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste/_byung nas kyang phyogs bcur nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi gnas snang bar byas nas/_
[\[263a.5\]]chos snang ba'i sgo yang nye bar sgrub bo/_/rgyab dang mgul nas 'od gzer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste/_byung nas kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul gyi sgo'ang nye bar sgrub bo/_/kha'i sgo nas 'od 
[\[263a.6\]]gzer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste/_byung nas kyang phyogs bcur byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ba yan cad sa dgu pa thob pa'i bar dag snang bar byas nas/_shes rab dang thabs kyi tshul gyi sgo yang nye bar sgrub bo/_/smyin mtshams kyi 
[\[263a.7\]]mdzod spu nas 'od gzer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste/_byung nas kyang phyogs bcur bdud kyi gnas thams cad zil gyis mnan te/_dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams snang bar byas nas/_de dag gi lus su nub par 'gyur 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]ro/_/yan lag dam pa'i spyi gtsug nas 'od gzer stong gsum brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ste/_byung nas kyang phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar byas te/_'jig rten lan bcur 
[\[263b.2\]]bskor ba byas nas/_steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings la 'dug ste/_'od gzer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor du byas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gro bya ba 'od shin tu gsal ba zhes bya ba rab tu byed de/_mchod pa dang rim gro de la sems 
[\[263b.3\]]dang po bskyed pa nye bar bzung ba yan cad sa dgu pa thob kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gro byas pas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang brgya stong gi cha dang /_khrag khrig gi cha dang /_khrag khrig brgya'i cha dang /_khrag khrig stong 
[\[263b.4\]]gi cha dang khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/grangs dang cha dang /_bgrang ba dang rgyur yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro ba nas bsgrun pa tsam gyi bar du'ang [{]myi [,]mi [}]chog go_/'od gzer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[263b.5\]]chen po de las phyogs bcu na me tog du gdags pa dang /_spos dang /_bdug pa dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rin po che'i rgyan dang /_nor bu rin po cher gdags 
[\[263b.6\]]pa ci yod pa de dag thams cad las lhag cing 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad las 'das la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dbang gis grub pa dag sprin chen po'i char bzhin du mngon par 'bab bo/_/mchod pa de dag sems can gang 
[\[263b.7\]]gis mthong ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/_/mchod pa dang /_rim gro'i rnam pa de lta bu dag byas nas kyang 'od gzer de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]cad snang bar byas nas/_'jig rten lan bcur bskor ba byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhabs kyi mthil gyi 'og tu nub par gyur te/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag 
[\[264a.2\]]dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa che ge mo zhig tu de lta bu'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i dus la bab par thugs su chud do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/der phyogs bcu nas byang 
[\[264a.3\]]chub sems dpa'i sa dgu la gnas pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa 'ongs te/_byang chub sems dpa' de la kun nas bskor nas/_mchod pa chen po byas te byang chub sems dpa' de nyid la lta zhing ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu bcu la 
[\[264a.4\]]so so nas mnyam par gzhog go_/byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa rnams kyi dpal gyi be'u dang rdo rje dang /_bkra shis las bdud kyi dgra las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i 'od gzer chen po gcig_/'od gzer gyi 'khor brgya stong 
[\[264a.5\]]grangs med pa phrag bcu dang ldan pa 'byung ste/_byung nas kyang phyogs bcur snang bar byas nas cho 'phrul mu med pa yang dag par bstan te/_byang chub sems dpa' de'i dpal gyi be'u dang /_rdo rje dang bkra shis su nub par 'gyur ro/_/'od gzer de dag der nub 
[\[264a.6\]]ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de'i stobs dang /_mthu yang brgya phrag stong gyur pas kyang lhag par mngon par 'phel bar snang ngo /_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi smin 
[\[264a.7\]]mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'od gzer gyi 'khor grangs med pa dang ldan pa 'byung ste/_de dag gis phyogs bcu thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par snang bar byas nas/_'jig rten lan 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]bcur bskor te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po bstan nas/_byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig mang po yang dag par bskul nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad rnam pa drug tu bskyod de/_ngan song 
[\[264b.2\]]thams cad kyi lam gyi rgyud dang skye ba dang /_shi 'pho rab tu zhi bar byas nas bdud kyi gnas thams cad zil gyis mnan te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gdan yang dag par 
[\[264b.3\]]bstan nas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor brgyan pa'i mthu rab tu bstan te/_'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad snang bar byas nas/_phyir log ste/_byang chub sems 
[\[264b.4\]]dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi steng nas bskor ba byas te/_rgyan chen po bstan nas/_'od gzer de dag byang chub sems dpa' de'i yan lag gi dam par nub po/_/de'i 'khor gyi 'od gzer rnams kyang de ltar tshogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[264b.5\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi mgor nub par 'gyur ro/_/'od gzer de dag gis phog ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sngan cad ma thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu bcu rab tu 'thob bo/_/'od gzer de dag kyang dus gcig tu byang chub 
[\[264b.6\]]sems dpa' de'i yan lag dam pa la 'char bar 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' de yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul la mngon par dbang bskur zhes bya'o/_/stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs nas ni/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su bgrang ba yang 'thob 
[\[264b.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu thu bo gzhon nu btsun mo dam pa las btsas pa/_rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos lha'i glang po rin po che la 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]gser gyi khri dam pa'i steng du bzhag ste/_steng nas bla re bres shing /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rol mo bcud pa dang /_dkrol pa dang /_glu'i dbyangs la sogs pa'i rgyan chen po byas te/_rgya mtsho chen po 
[\[265a.2\]]bzhi las chu blangs pa gser gyi bum pas bcus te/_chu nges gzhon nu de'i sbyi bo nas mngon par dbang bskur nas/_dbang bskur ma thag tu de ni rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/dge ba bcu'i las 
[\[265a.3\]]kyi lam yongs su rdzogs nas ni 'khor los sgyur bar bgrang ba rab tu 'thob bo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis dbang bskur ma thag tu/_ye shes kyi dbang mngon 
[\[265a.4\]]par bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya'o/_/stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs nas ni/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi grangs su 'gro'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni/_gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[265a.5\]]dka' ba brgya stong du ma rtsom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba'o/_/de de ltar mngon par dbang bskur zhing yon tan dang ye shes rnam par 'phel ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[265a.6\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos kyi khams yang dag par bsgrub pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'dod pa'i khams yang dag par 
[\[265a.7\]]bsgrub pa dang /_gzugs kyi khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_sems can gyi khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_rnam 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]par shes pa'i khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_nam mkha'i khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i khams bstan pa yang dag par 
[\[265b.2\]]bsgrub pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_lta ba'i rnam pa dang nyon mongs pa yang dag par bsgrub pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang 'du ba yang dag par bsgrub 
[\[265b.3\]]pa dang /_nyan thos kyi spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang /_gzugs kyi sku dang /_chos kyi sku 
[\[265b.4\]]yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_bzlog pa bstan pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_mdor 
[\[265b.5\]]bsdu na chos thams cad rnam par phye ba la 'jug cing shin tu brtag pa yang dag par bsgrub pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i blos gong du sems can rnams kyi sprul pa'i las yang dag pa ji lta ba 
[\[265b.6\]]bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/nyon mongs pa'i sprul pa dang /_lta ba'i rnam pa'i sprul pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kyi sprul pa dang /_chos kyi khams kyi sprul pa dang /_nyan thos kyi sprul pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[265b.7\]]sems dpa'i sprul pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dang /_sprul pa thams cad kyi rnam par dgod pa dang /_rnam par mi dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag pa 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/chos kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_dge 'dun gyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_las kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_nyon mongs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_dus kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_smon lam gyi byin 
[\[266a.2\]]gyi rlabs dang /_mchod pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_bskal pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[266a.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes 'di lta ste/_spyod pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/_skye ba dang 'pho ba phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/_sku tshe phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/_mngon par 'byung ba phra ba 
[\[266a.4\]]la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/_mngon par byang chub ba phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/_rnam par 'phrul pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/_sku tshe'i tshad byin gyi rlabs pa phra ba 
[\[266a.5\]]la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/_bstan pa gnas pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes de dag thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du des rab tu shes so/_/gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[266a.6\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba la 'jug pa'i gnas 'di lta ste/_sku'i gsang ba 'am/_gsung gi gsang ba 'am/_thugs kyi gsang ba 'am/_dus dang dus ma yin pa thugs su chud pa'i gsang ba 'am/_
[\[266a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa'i gsang ba 'am/_sems can bsdu ba dang /_tshar gcad pa gsang ba 'am/_theg pa tha dad pa gsang ba 'am/_sems can gyi spyod pa dang /_dbang po rnam par phye ba gsang ba 'am/_las dang bya ba la 'jug pa 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]gsang ba 'am/_spyod pa dang mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rang bzhin brjod pa thugs su chud pa gsang ba de dag thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du des rab tu shes so/_/gang 'di dag bskal pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes 'di lta ste/_bskal pa gcig la bskal 
[\[266b.2\]]pa grangs med par yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_grangs med pa'i bskal pa la bskal pa gcig tu yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_bskal pa grangs med pa la bskal pa grangs med par yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_skad cig la bskal pa dang bskal pa la skad cig 
[\[266b.3\]]tu yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_bskal pa la bskal pa ma yin par yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_bskal pa ma yin pa la bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i bskal pa sangs rgyas med pa'i bskal 
[\[266b.4\]]par yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas med pa'i bskal pa sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa la/_da ltar byung ba dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa 
[\[266b.5\]]'jug cing /_ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba'i bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_bskal pa ring po la bskal pa thung ngur yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_bskal pa thung ngu la bskal pa ring por yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_bskal pa thams 
[\[266b.6\]]cad la ming du gdags pa yang dag par 'jug pa de dag thams cad kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du des rab tu shes so/_/gang 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis thugs su chud pa'i ye shes 'di lta ste/_skra'i rtse mo la 'jug pa'i ye shes 
[\[266b.7\]]sam/_rdul shin tu phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/_zhing mang po mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/_sems can gyi lus dang /_sems mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/_thams cad du khyab par mngon par 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]'tshang rgya ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/_snrel zhi'i spyod pa la 'jug pa yang dag par bstan pa'i ye shes sam/_lugs dang mthun pa'i spyod pa yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/_lugs dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthun pa'i 
[\[267a.2\]]spyod pa yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/_'jig rten bsam du rung ba dang /_bsam du [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ba dang /_rnam par shes par rung ba dang /_rnam par shes par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ba'i spyod pa yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/_nyan thos kyis shes 
[\[267a.3\]]par bya ba dang rang sangs rgyas kyis shes par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpas shes par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen par bya ba'i spyod pa yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes de dag thams cad kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[267a.4\]]du des rab tu shes so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes shin tu yangs pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_sa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas khong du chud pa'i ye shes kyang tshad 
[\[267a.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa zhes bya ba rab tu 'thob bo/_/bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par 
[\[267a.6\]]dag pa rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba dang /_sgo kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod ces bya ba dang /_'khor lo thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang /_dus gsum gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi snying 
[\[267a.7\]]po zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor snang ba zhes bya ba dang /_yul ma lus pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]bcu po de dag las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo brgya stong grangs med pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas rab tu 'thob ste/_de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin brgya phrag stong dang /_gzungs brgya phrag stong dang /_mngon par 
[\[267b.2\]]shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa brgya phrag stong yang rab tu 'thob bo/_/de ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i blo dang tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rjes su song ba'i dran pa mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin/_de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa las 
[\[267b.3\]]skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba chen po tshad med pa dang /_chos kyi 'od chen po dang /_chos kyi sprin chen po yang dag par 'dzin to/_/mos par byed do/_/yang dag par len to/_/bdag gir byed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/
[\[267b.4\]]'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po'i sprin las rnam par bkye ba'i chu'i phung po chen po ni rgya mtsho chen po ma gtogs par sa'i phyogs gzhan gyis bzod pa 'am/_bdag gir bya ba 'am/_blang ba 'am/_gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/
[\[267b.5\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la 'jug pa dang /_chos kyi snang ba chen po dang /_chos kyi 'od chen po dang /_chos kyi sprin chen po de dag ni sems can thams cad dang /_nyan thos 
[\[267b.6\]]dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang sa dang po nye bar bzung ba yan cad/_sa dgu pa'i bar la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang bzod pa 'am/_blang ba 'am/_yang dag par gzung ba 'am/_bdag gir bya ba sla ba ma yin te/_
[\[267b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag thams cad la mos par byed do/_/yang dag par len to/_/yang dag par 'dzin to/_/bdag gir byed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen po ni klu'i rgyal po chen po gcig gis sprin chen po yang bzod do/_/len to/_'dzin to/_/bdag gir byed do/_/klu'i rgyal po chen po gnyis dang /_gsum nas tshad med pa'i bar gyi sprin chen po 
[\[268a.2\]]dag kyang skad cig yud tsam thang cig gis bzod do/_/len to/_/'dzin to/_/bdag gir byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgya mtsho chen po de tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]par rgya che zhing yangs pa'i phyir ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[268a.3\]]dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las kyang skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba chen po dang /_chos kyi 'od chen po dang /_chos kyi sprin chen po tshad med pa rnams 
[\[268a.4\]]bzod do/_/yang dag par len to/_/yang dag par 'dzin to/_/bdag gir byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis dang /_gsum nas tshad med pa'i bar dag las kyang skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba chen po dang /_
[\[268a.5\]]chos kyi 'od chen po dang /_chos kyi sprin chen po tshad med pa bzod do/_/yang dag par 'dzin to/_/yang dag par len to/_/bdag gir byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sa 'di yang chos kyi sprin ces bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla 
[\[268a.6\]]bas smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig las byang chub sems dpa' skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba chen po dang /_chos kyi 'od chen po dang /_chos kyi sprin chen po bzod par byed pa dang /_yang dag par 'dzin pa 
[\[268a.7\]]dang /_yang dag par len cing bdag gir byed pa de dag bgrang bar nus sam/_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyed cig las byang chub sems dpa' skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]kyi snang ba chen po dang /_chos kyi 'od chen po dang /_chos kyi sprin chen po bzod cing yang dag par len pa dang /_yang dag par 'dzin cing bdag gir byed do/_/zhes grangs kyis shin tu bstan pa'i tshul du bgrang bar sla ba ma yin te/_'on kyang dpe tsam du bstan 
[\[268b.2\]]par bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi rdul phra ba snyed na sems can gyi khams ma lus pa'i tshul du ji snyed cig yod pa de dag 
[\[268b.3\]]las/_sems can gcig cig thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rab tu thob par gyur te/_'di lta ste dper na/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pad mo'i bla de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dge slong rnam par rgyal 
[\[268b.4\]]ba chen po zhes bya ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring ba/_nyan thos chen po thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog tu phyin par gyur la/_rnam pa de lta bu'i thos pa 'dzin pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang /_sems can gcig po de ldan par gyur te/_sems can 
[\[268b.5\]]gcig po de ci 'dra ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi sems can thams cad ldan par gyur la/_gcig gis gang bzung ba de bzhin gyis bzung na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de la ji snyam du sems sems can de dag gi thos pa 'dzin pa'i shes 
[\[268b.6\]]pa de dag tshad med cing mang ba yin mod/_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras sems can de dag gi thos pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa de ni mang ste tshad kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/_
[\[268b.7\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod kyis khong du chud pa dang /_yid ches par bya na de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las kyang skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba dang /_
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]'od dang sprin chen po chos kyi dbyings dus gsum gyi mdzod ces bya ba bzod cing yang dag par len to/_/yang dag par 'dzin to/_/bdag gir byed do/_/chos kyi snang ba dang /_'od dang sprin chen po yang 
[\[269a.2\]]dag par 'dzin pa'i shes pa de la thos pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba'i cha dang bye ba brgya'i cha dang /_bye ba stong gi cha dang /_bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag 
[\[269a.3\]]khrig brgya stong gi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro ba nas bsgrun pa tsam gyi bar du 'ang [{]myi [,]mi [}]chog go_/de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams snga ma 
[\[269a.4\]]dag na rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang /_de dag bas kyang ches mang zhing tshad med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba dang /_'od dang sprin chen po 
[\[269a.5\]]chos kyi dbyings dus gsum gyi mdzod ces bya ba bzod cing yang dag par len to/_/yang dag par 'dzin to/_/bdag gir byed do/_/de bas nas 'di yang chos kyi sprin ces bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi 
[\[269a.6\]]sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rang gi smon lam gyi stobs dang shugs kyis snying brtse ba dang snying rje chen po'i sprin chos kyi snang ba chen po rab tu sgrog pa'i 'brug sgra shin tu sgrog pa mngon par shes pa dang /_rig pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa'i glog rnam
