[\[269a.7\]]par 'gyu ba/_'od gzer chen po'i rlung gis shin tu bskyod pa/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi sprin gyi dra ba stug pos kun nas khebs pa/_lus sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi klong yang dag par ston pa/_chos kyi sgra chen po rab tu sgrog pa/_bdud kyi 'khor thams 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]cad shin tu tshar gcod pa/_yongs su bslang ste/_skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten snga ma de dag na rdul phra rab ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang /_de dag bas kyang ches mang zhing tshad med pa'i 
[\[269b.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rgyas par bkang ste/_dge ba'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi char chen pos bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa las langs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rdul gyi me lce thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed de/_de bas 
[\[269b.3\]]nas 'di'ang chos kyi sprin ces bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu yang dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa nas bzung ste/_'pho ba dang yum gyi skur bzhud pa dang /_sku na bzhugs pa dang /_
[\[269b.4\]]tshe dang mngon par 'byung ba dang /_mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gsol ba gdab pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan pa'i bar du sems can gyi bsam pa'i tshul dang /_'dul ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs 
[\[269b.5\]]pa'i 'phrin las thams cad byin gyis rlob bo/_/de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis nas 'jig rten gyi khams snga ma de dag na rdul phra rab ji snyed yod pa de dag bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa'i bar dag tu yang dga' 
[\[269b.6\]]ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa nas bzung ste/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan pa'i bar du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul dang /_'dul ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las thams cad byin gyis rlob 
[\[269b.7\]]bo/_/de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan zhing shin tu brtags pa'i mngon par shes pa chen po thob pas/_'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams dog pa yangs par byin gyis rlob bo/_/yangs pa yang dog par byin gyis rlob bo/_/'dod na kun nas nyon mongs pa 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]rnam par dag par byin gyis rlob bo/_/rnam par dag pa kun nas nyon mongs par byin gyis rlob bo/_/de bzhin du rgya chen po dang shin tu yangs pa dang /_tshad med pa dang /_phra ba dang /_tha gru chen po dang /_snrel zhi dang /_spyi'u tshugs 
[\[270a.2\]]dang /_gzhi mnyam pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang khyu mchog gi mthu phyung bas mngon par bsgrub pa de dang der byin gyis rlob bo/_/de 'dod na rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams khor yug gi 'obs dang bcas pa rnam pa thams 
[\[270a.3\]]cad dang ldan pa gcig kyang byin gyis rlob ste/_rdul shin tu phra ba de'ang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel la bya ba de dag kyang yongs su ston to/_/rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga nas 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i bar 
[\[270a.4\]]du thams cad kyang khor yug gi 'obs dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad dang ldan par byin gyis rlob ste/_rdul shin tu pha ba de yang mi 'phel la bya ba de dag kyang yongs su ston to/_/'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis 
[\[270a.5\]]kyi rgyun yongs su ston to/_/'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i bar gyi rgyun yongs su ston to/_/'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi rgyan 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis su yongs su ston to/_/'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med 
[\[270a.6\]]pa dag tu yang yongs su ston to/_/'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa dag na/_sems can gyi khams ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu sdud de sems can de dag la yang gnod par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'dod na 'jig 
[\[270a.7\]]rten gyi khams gcig na sems can gyi khams ci snyed pa de dag 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par sdud de/_sems can de dag la yang gnod par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'dod na skra'i rtse mo gcig la sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rgyan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa gcig ston to/_/
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]'dod na sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rgyan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa brjod du med pa'i bar du ston to/_/'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa dag na rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi lus skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu shin tu 
[\[270b.2\]]sprul pa byed do/_/lus re re la yang de snyed kyi lag pa yongs su ston te/_lag pa de dag gis kyang phyogs bcur sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu byed de/_lag pa re res kyang me tog gi phung po chu klung gang gA'i bye ma snyed sangs rgyas 
[\[270b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das de dag la mngon par 'thor ro/_/me tog ji lta ba de bzhin du spos dang /_phreng ba dang byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_de bzhin du rgyan thams 
[\[270b.4\]]cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo/_/lus re re la yang de snyed kyi mgo byin gyis rlob cing mgo re re la yang de snyed kyi lce byin gyis brlabs te/_de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yon tan shin tu brjod pa byed do/_/sems bskyed pa 
[\[270b.5\]]re re la yang phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par 'gro ste/_sems bskyed pa tsam gyis kyang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa tshad med pa nas/_mya ngan las 'das pa chen po rgyan gyi bar du byin gyis rlob bo/_/dus gsum gyi lus chad med pa yang byin gyis 
[\[270b.6\]]rlob ste/_rang gi lus la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chad med pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dang rgyan tshad med pa byin gyis rlob bo/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang /_'du ba thams cad kyang rang gi lus la byin gyis rlob bo/_/rlung 
[\[270b.7\]]gi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang ba spu'i khung bu gcig nas gtong ste/_sems can rnams la yang gnod par mi byed do/_/'dod na chu'i phung po yan cad 'jig rten gyi khams gcig byin gyis rlob bo/_/der yang pad mo chen po byin gyis rlob bo/_/
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]pad mo chen po de'i 'od rnam par phye bas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa rgyas par gang bar byed do/_/de la yang byang chub kyi shing chen po yongs su ston pa nas/_rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i 
[\[271a.2\]]bar du yang dag par ston to/_/rang gi lus la phyogs bcu'i nor bu dang /_glog dang nyi zla'i 'od byin gyis rlob pa nas/_snang ba dang 'od thams cad kyi bar du byin gyis rlob bo/_/kha'i dbugs kyis kyang phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa g.yo bar 
[\[271a.3\]]byed de/_sems can rnams 'jigs par yang mi byed do/_/phyogs bcur rlung gis 'jig pa dang /_myes 'jig pa dang /_chus 'jig pa yang byin gyis rlob la/_'dod na sems can thams cad bsam pa bzhin du gzugs kyi lus dang /_gnas yongs 
[\[271a.4\]]su rgyan par byin gyis rlob bo/_/rang gi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byin gyis rlob bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rang gi lus byin gyis rlob bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis rlob bo/_/rang gi sangs 
[\[271a.5\]]rgyas kyi zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byin gyis rlob bo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag dang /_gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya 
[\[271a.6\]]stong tshad med pa yongs su ston to/_/de nas 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' la la dang /_lha dang klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi mgon po dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_
[\[271a.7\]]gtsang ma'i gnas su gtogs pa kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/_de ltar de ste byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba'i spyod yul yang de ltar tshad med na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa ci 'dra ba zhig yod snyam pa 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]dang /_de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas 'khor de dag gi sems dang bsam pa'i rgyud shes nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'khor 'di dag the tsom 
[\[271b.2\]]du gyur na/_de dag gi the tsom gcod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul rnam par phye ba [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]cig mi bstan tam//_//sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po 
[\[271b.3\]]nyi shu gcig pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi lhun dang /_rang bzhin yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par 
[\[271b.4\]]zhugs so/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi lhun dang /_rang bzhin yang dag par ston pa la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de nyid kyi tshe/_byang 
[\[271b.5\]]chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang /_lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi mgon po dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_gtsang ma'i gnas kyi ris su gtogs 
[\[271b.6\]]pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po'i lus kyi nang na 'khod pa rang rang gis shes par gyur te/_der sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon du grub par shes so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i rnam pa dang /_rgyan ji snyed pa 
[\[271b.7\]]de dag kyang bskal pa khrag khrig tshang bas kyang brjod par mi nus par mthong ste/_der byang chub kyi shing stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcur khyab pa'i lhun can stong gsum khrag khrig yongs su tshang ba tsam du yangs shing /_tshad med pa'i yal 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]ga can/_rtse mo shin tu mtho ba byung ste/_de dang rkyen du 'bab par de'i drung gi snying po byang chub la seng ge'i khri rgya chen po byung nas de la de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par shes pa'i blo gros thams cad kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba 
[\[272a.2\]]snying po byang chub tu gshegs te bzhugs par mthong ngo /_/de ltar de na rgyan ji snyed snang bar gyur pa de dag ni bskal pa khrag khrig yongs su tshang bas kyang brjod par dka'o/_/des cho 'phrul chen po 'di bstan nas byang chub sems 
[\[272a.3\]]dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang /_lha dang klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris su gtogs pa'i 
[\[272a.4\]]'khor de dag thams cad so so'i gnas ji bzhin du bkod pa dang /_de nas 'khor de dag thams cad ngo mtshar dang rmad du gyur nas/_mi smra bar byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po de nyid la sems shing 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas byang 
[\[272a.5\]]chub sems dpa'i rnam par grol ba'i zla bas/_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras ting nge 'dzin 'di'i mthu rnam par bkod pa de ni rmad du byung bar ngo mtshar che na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras ting 
[\[272a.6\]]nge 'dzin de'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]ci zhes bya/_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras ting nge 'dzin de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi lhun dang rang bzhin yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnam 
[\[272a.7\]]par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'o na ting nge 'dzin 'di'i spyod yul dang /_yul dang rgyan ji lta bu yin/_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]la shin tu goms pa ni/_'dod na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'dra ba 'jig rten gyi khams chu klung gang gA'i bye ma snyed dam/_de bas kyang mang du rang gi lus la ston to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas 
[\[272b.2\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dra ba brgya stong shin tu mang ba rab tu 'thob ste/_de bas byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus sam/_lus kyi las ni byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab kyi go 'phang thob cing byang chub sems 
[\[272b.3\]]dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros la gnas pa dag gis kyang shes par sla ba ma yin no/_/ngag gam ngag gi las kyang shes par sla ba ma yin no/_/yid dam yid kyi las kyang shes par sla ba ma yin no/_/rdzu 'phrul shes par sla ba ma yin no/_/
[\[272b.4\]]dus gsum la rnam par lta ba shes par sla ba ma yin no/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul la 'jug pa shes par sla ba ma yin no/_/ye shes kyi yul shes par sla ba ma yin no/_/rnam par thar pas rnam par rol pa shes par sla ba ma yin no/_/
[\[272b.5\]]'phrul pa'i las shes par sla ba ma yin no/_/byin gyi rlabs kyi las shes par sla ba ma yin no/_/mthu'i las shes par sla ba ma yin pa nas mdor bsdu na gom pa 'dor zhing 'degs pa'i las kyi bar du yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[272b.6\]]rgyal tshab kyi go 'phang thob cing byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros la gnas pa rnams kyis kyang shes par sla ba ma yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin 'di ni mdor bsdus te bstan na yang de ltar tshad 
[\[272b.7\]]med pa ste/_rgya cher ni bskal pa brgya stong grangs med pas kyang bstan pa'i mthar thug par mi 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]dang byin gyis rlabs kyang de ltar tshad med na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod yul dang yul gyi rgyud ci 'dra ba zhig yod/_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]la la zhig 
[\[273a.2\]]gis gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas rde'u rgya shug gi tshig gu tsam gnyis sam gsum zhig blangs te/_'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dag na/_sa'i khams ji snyed cig yod pa/_rdo ba 'di las ji tsam zhig gis lhag par 'phags shing 
[\[273a.3\]]lhag par tshad med ces zer ba zhig yod na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de lhar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes tshad med pa mnga' ba rnams kyi chos nyid byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid kyis 'jal ba ni khyod kyi 
[\[273a.4\]]tshig 'di de dang 'dra bar bdag gis dpags so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras ji ltar gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas gang blangs pa'i sa'i khams [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]la lhag ma las tshad med pa de bzhin du/_kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin 
[\[273a.5\]]'di kho na yang bskal pa grangs med par shin tu bstan kyang phyogs tsam zhig bstan du zad na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa lta smos su 'ang ga la yod/_kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod kyis khong du chud pa dang /_yid ches par bya na de bzhin gshegs pa 'di bdag 
[\[273a.6\]]gi mdun na dpang du bzhugs te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras/_gal te phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed cig sa 'di lta bu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bu ram shing gi 
[\[273a.7\]]tshal lam/_smyig ma'i tshal lam/_'od ma'i tshal lam/_til gyi zhing thibs po bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa bskal pa mu med par mngon par bsgrubs pa de dag gis ni de bzhin 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]gshegs pa'i ye shes skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya stong gi cha dang /_bye ba brgya'i cha dang /_bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi 
[\[273b.2\]]char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang dpe dang rgyu dang bsgrun pa tsam du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dang 
[\[273b.3\]]gnyis su med pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyang yongs su mi gtong la sangs rgyas blta ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_rim gro yang rab tu byed de/_bskal pa re re la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa la 
[\[273b.4\]]mchod pa rnam pa thams cad du mngon par bsgrubs pa'i mchod pa rgya chen po'i rjes su song bas mchod pa byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyi snang ba yang yang dag par 'dzin to/_/de ni sngon bas kyang bskal pa du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya phrag du ma 
[\[273b.5\]]dang /_bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang /_
[\[273b.6\]]bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar chos kyi dbyings yongs su dris pa shin tu bstan pas mi 'phrogs par gnas so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_lha rdzas kyi rgyan 
[\[273b.7\]]gyi rnam pa mgar bas ma brdungs pa rin po che'i dam pas spras pa/_lha'i rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi yan lag gi dam pa mgo'am mgul du btags na/_de ma yin pa'i lha dang [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]rgyan gyi rnam pa gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs shing mi thub pa yin/_
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rgyud de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_
[\[274a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nye bar bzung ba yan cad byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa thob pa'i bar gyi/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di la gnas pa'i ye shes snang ba ni sems 
[\[274a.3\]]can rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la gzud pa'i rgyu yin te/_de ma yin pa'i ye shes snang ba gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/_lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i 'od kyis ni skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du 'ang 
[\[274a.4\]]khyab la sems can rnams kyi lus kyang sim par byed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba yang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_byang chub 
[\[274a.5\]]sems dpa'i sa dang po la nye bar bzung ba yan cad byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa la gnas pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar gyi chos nyid la yang sems can rnams 
[\[274a.6\]]rab tu gzhog go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa la ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dus gsum gyi ye shes yang dag par ston to/_/chos kyi dbyings rab tu phye ba'i ye shes dang /_'jig 
[\[274a.7\]]rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sems can thams cad dang zhing gi chos yongs su shes par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /_spyod pa la 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]'jug pa'i ye shes nas mdor bsdu na/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i bar du yang dag par bstan to/_/de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas che ba yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni byang chub 
[\[274b.2\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi sprin ces bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa mdor bstan pa'o/_/rgya cher ni bskal pa grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mu [{]myed [,]med [}]pas bstan pa'i mthar thug par shes par bya'o/_/de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[274b.3\]]dpa' ni phal cher lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen por 'gyur te/_sems can rnams la nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin/_chos kyi dbyings rnam 
[\[274b.4\]]par phye ba yongs su dris pa bstan pas mi 'phrogs pa yin/_sbyin pa 'am/_ngag snyan pa 'am/_don bsgrub pa 'am/_don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/_de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 
[\[274b.5\]]'gyur/_gtso bor 'gyur/_thu bor 'gyur/_phul du 'gyur/_dam par 'gyur/_bla na med par 'gyur/_'dren par 'gyur/_yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste/_
[\[274b.6\]]sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang /_chos yid la bya ba dang /_dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /_
[\[274b.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang /_stobs yid la bya ba dang /_mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]'bral ba yin te/_de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob cing de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[275a.2\]]dang /_sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong ba dang /_de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med 
[\[275a.3\]]pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed skyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du 'gro ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag 
[\[275a.4\]]khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed snang bar bya ba dang /_sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag 
[\[275a.5\]]khrig brgya phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du gnas par bya ba dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu 'jug pa dang /_chos kyi sgo 
[\[275a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam par dbye bar bya ba dang /_lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su bstan pa dang /_lus re 
[\[275a.7\]]re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yang dag par bstan pa'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo/_/de yan cad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi mthu 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par kyis rnam par 'phrul te/_de dag gi lus sam 'od dam/_rdzu 'phrul lam/_mig gam spyod yul lam/_dbyangs sam spyod pa 'am/_rgyan tam/_byin gyi rlabs sam/_mos pa 'am/_mngon par 'du 
[\[275b.2\]]byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po de dag 
[\[275b.3\]]ni rim gyis mngon du gzhol bas/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rnam pa thams cad du rjes su song bar blta'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/_mtsho chen po ma dros pa las byung ba'i 'bab chu ni chu klung chen po'i 
[\[275b.4\]]rgyud kyi sgo bzhis 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su ngoms par byas nas mi zad par byas te/_gong du rnam par 'phel ba dang /_rgya mtsho chen po'i bar du zhen par 'gyur te/_chu de ni thog ma nas kyang rgya mtsho chen po la mngon par gzhol ba 
[\[275b.5\]]yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chu 'bab pa yang smon lam chen po'i chu klung gi rgyun gyi sgo nas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can gyi khams ngoms par byas te/_mi zad par byas 
[\[275b.6\]]nas gong du rnam par 'phel ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar gyi rgya mtsho chen po la zhen par 'gyur te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chu de ni thog ma nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho chen po la mngon par 
[\[275b.7\]]gzhol ba yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi gzhi las yod par 'gyur te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/_sa chen po'i gzhi las ri'i rgyal po chen po bcu yod par 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]gyur pa 'di lta ste/_ri'i rgyal po chen po kha ba can dang /_ri'i rgyal po chen po spos ngad can dang /_ri'i rgyal po chen po rnam par 'dal ba dang /_ri'i rgyal po chen po drang srong ri dang /_ri'i rgyal po chen po gnya' shing 'dzin dang /_
[\[276a.2\]]ri'i rgyal po chen po rta rna ri dang /_ri'i rgyal po chen po sa 'dzin dang /_ri'i rgyal po chen po khor yug dang /_ri'i rgyal po chen po dpal chen dang /_ri'i rgyal po chen po ri rab bo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de la 'di lta ste dper na/_ri'i rgyal po chen po kha ba 
[\[276a.3\]]can ni sman gyi rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas te/_sman sna tshogs thams cad blangs pas mthar thug pa med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig 
[\[276a.4\]]rten pa'i gtsug lag dang /_tshig dang sngags dang /_rig pa'i gnas kyi 'byung gnas yin te/_'jig rten pa'i gtsug lag dang chig dang sngags dang /_rig pa'i gnas bstan pas mthar thug pa med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste 
[\[276a.5\]]dper na/_ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad can ni/_spos kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/_spos kyi rnam pa sna tshogs blangs pas mthar thug pa med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras/_de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa dri ma dang 
[\[276a.6\]]bral ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'ang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang /_sdom pa dang tshul thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang sdom pa dang /_tshul rnam pa sna tshogs kyi spos kyi mthar 
[\[276a.7\]]thug pa med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras/_'di lta ste dper na/_ri'i rgyal po rnam par 'dal ba ni/_rin po che'i rang bzhin shin tu dag pa/_rin po che'i rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/_rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad blangs 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]bas zad pa med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 
[\[276b.2\]]kyi 'byung gnas yin te/_'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dris pa bstan pas zad pa med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste/_
[\[276b.3\]]dper na/_ri'i rgyal po chen po drang srong ri ni rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'byung gnas te/_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong bgrangs pas zad pa med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras/_
[\[276b.4\]]de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'phro ba can la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang lam dang lam ma yin pa'i khyad par dang /_bye brag shes pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/_lam dang lam ma yin pa'i khyad par dang bye brag 
[\[276b.5\]]gi rgyus yongs su dris pa yongs su bstan pas zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/_ri'i rgyal po chen po gnya' shing 'dzin ni rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyi 
[\[276b.6\]]'byung gnas yin te/_gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po can bgrangs bas zad pa med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang mngon par shes pa dang /_
[\[276b.7\]]rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_cho 'phrul thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/_mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_cho 'phrul yongs su dris pa bstan pas zad pa med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]dper na/_ri'i rgyal po chen po rta rna ri ni rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa/_shing tog gi rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas te/_shing tog gi rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad blangs pas zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal 
[\[277a.2\]]ba'i sras/_de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i/_sa mngon sum la gnas pa'i/_byang chub sems dpa' yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa shin tu bstan pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/_nyan thos kyi 'bras bu mngon par 
[\[277a.3\]]khong du chud par bya ba yongs su dris pa bstan pas zad pa med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/_ri'i rgyal po chen po sa 'dzin ni rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa/_klu rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas te/_
[\[277a.4\]]klu rdzu 'phrul chen po can bgrangs pas zad pa med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang thabs dang shes rab shin tu bstan pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/_rang 
[\[277a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu mngon par khong du chud par bya ba yongs su dris pa/_bstan pas zad pa med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/_ri'i rgyal po chen po khor yug ni rin po che chen po'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa dbang du gyur pa 
[\[277a.6\]]rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/_dbang du gyur pa bgrangs pas zad pa med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dbang mngon par bsgrub pa/_yongs 
[\[277a.7\]]su dris pa shin tu bstan pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba yongs su dris pa bstan pas zad pa med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/_ri'i rgyal po dpal dang ldan pa ni rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]pa lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/_lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po can bgrangs pas zad pa med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros la gnas pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[277b.2\]]dpa' yang sems can 'byung ba dang /_'jig pa shes pa'i rgyud thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/_'gro ba thams cad 'byung ba yongs su dris pa bstan pas zad pa med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/_ri'i rgyal po chen po ri rab ni 
[\[277b.3\]]rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa lha rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/_lha rdzu 'phrul chen po can bgrangs pas zad pa med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub 
[\[277b.4\]]sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las yang dag par bstan pa yongs su dris pa bstan pas zad pa med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[277b.5\]]ji ltar rin po che'i ri chen po de dag rgya mtsho chen po las byung zhing rgya mtsho chen po las smos pa de bzhin du/_kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po 'di dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las byung ngo /_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las smos pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[277b.6\]]sras 'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen po ni rnam pa bcus mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir rgya mtsho'i grangs su 'gro ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_rim gyis gzhol ba dang /_shi ba'i ro dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gogs pa dang /_chu gzhan gyi grangs yongs su spangs 
[\[277b.7\]]pa dang /_ro gcig pa dang /_rin po che mang ba dang /_zab cing gting ring ba dang /_yangs shing tshad med pa dang /_'byung bo mang po'i gnas su gyur pa dang /_dbres kyi tshul las mi 'da' ba dang /_sprin chen po'i char thams cad yongs su 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]'dzin pas mi ngoms pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras/_de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang spyod pa'i rnam pa bcus mi 'phrogs pa'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu 
[\[278a.2\]]dga' ba la smon lam chen po rim gyis mngon par bsgrubs pas gzhol ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa dri ma dang bral ba la tshul khrims ngan pa'i ro dang mi 'grogs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa la 'jig rten pa rnam par 
[\[278a.3\]]gdags pa'i grangs yongs su spangs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'phro ba can la/_sangs rgyas la mos pa mi phyed pa'i ro gcig pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba la thabs dang mngon par shes pa tshad 
[\[278a.4\]]med pas 'jig rten gyi bya ba mngon par bsgrubs pa'i rin po che mang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rab tu brtags pas shin tu zab pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba la blo 
[\[278a.5\]]dang rnam par 'byed pa dang /_mkhas pa yangs shing tshad med pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba la rgyan chen po mngon par bsgrub pa yang dag par bstan pa'i 'byung po mang po gnas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i 
[\[278a.6\]]blo gros la rnam par thar pa thab mo dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa'i tshul gyi dbres las mi 'da' ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos snang ba'i sprin chen po'i 
[\[278a.7\]]char yang dag par bzung bas/_mi ngoms pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che ni rin po che'i mkhan po mkhas pas shin tu bsregs shin tu bsgrubs shin tu sbyangs shin tu yang dag par byas legs par phug_/
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]rin po che'i srad bus legs par btags/_rin po che'i bai DUr+ya'i rtsa ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la bzhag ste/_'od thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur la rgyal pos bsngags par gyur te/_rin po che'i rigs bcu las 'das shing shin tu 'phags 
[\[278b.2\]]par gyur pa de'i tshe/_sems can thams cad la rin po ches phan gdags pa'i don du nye bar gnas pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems rin po che bskyed pa yang sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa 
[\[278b.3\]]dang tshul khrims dang brtul shugs dang dka' thub kyis shin tu bsregs/_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pas shin tu bsgrubs/_lam gyi yan lag gi rnam pas shin tu sbyangs/_
[\[278b.4\]]thabs dang mngon par shes pas shin tu dag par byas/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas shin tu phug_/thabs dang shes rab rin po che sna tshogs kyi srad bus shin tu btags/_dbang gi rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i yu ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la 
[\[278b.5\]]bzhag_/sems can gyi spyod pa rab tu brtags pa dang /_thos pa'i ye shes kyi 'od rab tu 'byung bar gyur te/_chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mngon par dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar gyur pa 
[\[278b.6\]]de'i tshe/_sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rin po che thams cad kyis yang dag par phan gdags pa'i don du nye bar gnas pa yin te/_de'i tshe thams cad mkhyen pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems 
[\[278b.7\]]dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang yon tan yang dag par bstsags pa'i chos kyi sgo'i rgyud 'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyi rna lam du grag par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'o na rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang yon tan yang dag par bstsags pa'i chos kyi sgo'i rgyud 'di gang gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag bsod nams 
[\[279a.2\]]kyi tshogs ji tsam zhig dang ldan par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthu ji tsam pa de snyed kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed cing bsgrub 
[\[279a.3\]]par dmigs pa la yod de/_chos kyi sgo'i rgyud 'di grag cing mngon par gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyang de tsam du shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang yon tan yang dag par bstsags pa'i 
[\[279a.4\]]chos kyi rgyud 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas mnyan pa 'am/_mos par bya ba 'am/_gzung bar yang mi nus na bsgom pa'i rnam par sbyor bas brtson par mi nus pa lta ci smos/_de bas na kye rgyal ba'i sras gang gis chos kyi sgo'i rgyud 'di thos te thos nas 
[\[279a.5\]]mos par byed pa dang /_mos par byas shing 'dzin pa dang /_bsgom pa'i rnam pas brtson par byed na/_sems can de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sgo dang ldan par shes par bya'o/_/de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos nyid thob pas/_
[\[279a.6\]]phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam pa drug dang ltas chen po [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad du g.yos so/_/rab tu g.yos so/_/kun tu g.yos so/_/'gul to rab tu 'gul to/_/kun tu 'gul to/_/
[\[279a.7\]]ldeg go rab tu ldeg go_/kun tu ldeg go_/chem chem rab tu chem chem/_kun tu chem chem mo/_/'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun tu 'ur 'ur ro/_/shig shig rab tu shig shig_/kun tu shig shig go_/sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos nyid rab tu thob pas 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/_/lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/_/lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/_/lha rdzas kyi gdugs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/_/lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan gyi 
[\[279b.2\]]sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/_/lha rdzas kyi ba dan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/_/lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dang /_dkrol ba dang glu'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi sgra mngon par sgrog go_/lha rdzas las 'das pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la mngon par 
[\[279b.3\]]bstod pa'i glu'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi sgra dbyangs mngon par sgrog go_/ji ltar gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas su lha'i rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che'i snying por ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig 
[\[279b.4\]]rten gyi khams thams cad du yang phyogs bcu rgyas par gang zhing chos bstan pa 'di yang thams cad du byung bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu 
[\[279b.5\]]phra ba snyed phyogs bcu rgyas par byed cing lhags te de dag phyin nas kyang 'di skad ces zer ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid 'di brjod pa legs so legs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag kyang 
[\[279b.6\]]rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya bar ming mthun pa sha stag ste/_'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i dpal zhes bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba dag gi drung nas 'dir lhags te/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad na yang 
[\[279b.7\]]chos bstan pa 'di nyid sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi rnam pa 'di 'dra ba dag la tshig 'di dag nyid dang yi ge 'di dag nyid dang khong du chud par bya ba 'di dag nyid dang /_don 'di nyid lhag chad med par mngon par brjod de 'byung bar gyur to/_/
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag kyang dbang du gyur pa sha stag_/sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor 'dir phyin to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bdag cag ji ltar phyin pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[280a.2\]]thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas kyi lha'i rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che'i snying por yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems 
[\[280a.3\]]dpa' rnams phyin par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos/_phyogs bcur bltas te 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas nas/_chos kyi dbyings la rnam par blta ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sems 
[\[280a.4\]]bskyed pa yang dag par brjod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i yul yang dag par bstan pa dang /_spyod pa'i stobs yongs su sbyangs pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yang dag par bsgrub pa brjod pa dang /_'jig rten gyi dri ma sel ba dang /_
[\[280a.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes nye bar bsgrub pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi rgyan yongs su bstan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan rab tu brjod pa byed cing sa'i don 'di yang brtag par bya ba dang /_bstan 
[\[280a.6\]]pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/zhi dang dul dga' zhi zhing dul ba'i yid ldan la/_/nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra bar snang mkha' dang mtshungs 'dra zhing /_/tha ba'i dri ma rnam sbyangs lam rnams shes gnas pa'i 
[\[280a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par rab la nyon/_/bskal pa bye bar dge ba brgya stong rab bsags shing /_/sangs rgyas brgya stong drang srong chen po mchod byas te/_/dbang bsgyur rnams dang rang rgyal mtha' yas mchod byas nas/_/'gro ba kun la 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]phan phyir byang chub sems skye'o/_/brtul zhugs dka' thub dka' spyad dul bzod ldan gyur la/_/khrel yod dpal gyis spyod ldan ye shes dge 'phags shing /_/blo gros rig yangs sangs rgyas ye shes sems ldan gyi/_/byang chub sems rab rgyal 
[\[280b.2\]]ba'i stobs dang mnyam 'dra skye/_/dus gsum rgyal ba ji snyed mchod rab mchod pa'i phyir/_/nam mkha'i dbyings tshad zhing rnams thams cad yongs su sbyong /_/chos rnams thams cad ji snyed de dag mnyam rtogs pas/_/'gro ba dgrol ba'i don du 
[\[280b.3\]]byang chub sems skye'o/_/gzhal yas sems skyes sa mchog rab tu thob gyur nas/_/sdig pa thams cad bsal phyir rdul med rab tu dga'/_/smon lam stobs dpyad dkar chos yang dag bstsags byas nas/_/snying rje brtse ldan sa yi 
[\[280b.4\]]gong ma yongs su gnon/_/'gro phyir byams sems tshul khrims thos dang yon tan ldan/_/dri med dri bral rang bzhin yang dag bsam pa yis/_/'jig rten thams cad me gsum 'bar bar mthong gyur nas/_/gsum pa rnam yangs blo 
[\[280b.5\]]yis 'gro ba'i don du gnon/_/sdug bsngal mi rtag nad pa zug rngus mi bde ba'i/_/khams gsum rtag tu sdug bsngal brgya yi me 'bar bas/_/'dus byas nyes mthong rgyal ba'i legs pa mngon mos shing /_/ye shes 'od 'phro yangs ldan 'od 
[\[280b.6\]]'phro yod pa gnon/_/dran dang blo ldan lam gyi ye shes thob gyur cing /_/sa mchog de la sangs rgyas brgya stong bsnyen bkur nas/_/mi yi gtso bo'i yon tan rtag tu dran byed cing /_/'gro ba kun gyis thub dka' rgyal bar dka' ba gnon/_/
[\[280b.7\]]ye shes blo gros thabs dang shes rab blo dpyod pas/_/'gro don mtha' yas sna tshogs bya ba bsten byas shing /_/stobs bcu mchod pa sems can don rnams bsgrubs byas te/_/mi skye mngon sum mtha' yas sa drug yongs su gnon/_/'jig 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]rten kun tu 'gro bas shes dka' spyod byed cing /_/bdag bral byed med yod dang med pa rnam bstsal ba'i/_/rang bzhin stong chos yan lag bcu gnyis rab 'byung zhes/_/phra zhing rno ba'i sems ldan bdun pa yongs su gnon/_/
[\[281a.2\]]thabs dang shes rab sems yangs rab tu thob gyur cing /_/ring du song ba gdul dka' ring du song ba gnon/_/rang bzhin dul zhing zhi phyir du ma'i sems spangs te/_/de nas nam mkha' 'dra ba'i mi g.yo yongs su gnon/_/de la mkhas pa'i ye 
[\[281a.3\]]shes las rnams sna tshogs phyir/_/zhi ba de las bslang zhing mi yi mchog tu bsnams/_/dbang bcu ldan zhing 'jig rten yang dag nyid dpyad pa'i/_/rang bzhin chen po 'gro phyir legs pa'i blo gros gnon/_/'di la shin tu phra bar 
[\[281a.4\]]'jig rten kun dpyad cing /_/sems can thibs po'i spyod ldan nyon mongs las dpyad de/_/de dag gdul ba'i spyod pas yon tan mang po gnon/_/bde gshegs mdzod thob don gyi dam pa rab tu ston/_/dkar chos rim gyis de 
[\[281a.5\]]'dra'i spyod dang ldan gyur pas/_/sa dgu'i bar du bsod nams ye shes tshogs thob cing /_/rgyal ba rnams kyi stobs mchog don dam mngon 'dod pa/_/ye shes yon tan dbang bskur sangs rgyas kun las 'thob/_/brgya stong phrag bcu'i ting 
[\[281a.6\]]'dzin grangs med gang yod pa/_/spyod yul shes pa che nyid shes yangs thob gyur nas/_/de yi rjes la thams cad mkhyen par dbang bskur 'thob/_/yul yangs ting 'dzin de dag thos pa de mi sgul/_/gang tshe de yis kun mkhyen dbang bskur thob pa'i 
[\[281a.7\]]tshe/_/pad mo rgya chen rin chen kun gyis brgyan pa 'byung /_/de yi tshul mthun lus kyi dbus su gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyis yongs bskor de la lta zhing gnas/_/de yi 'od gzer khrag khrig mtha' yas stong phrag mang /_/phyogs 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]bcu'i 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal kun kyang zhi bar byed/_/mgo yi gtsug nas 'od gzer bye ba stong byung zhing /_/phyogs rnams kun gyi mi yi gtso bo'i 'khor du rgyu/_/steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings la 'od gzer dra ba gnas/_/sangs rgyas mchod phyir brtson 
[\[281b.2\]]par rgyal ba'i zhabs su 'dong /_/de'i tshe rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras rnams kyis kyang /_/chos rab don du rgyal sras dbang bskur thob par mkhyen/_/mchod pa'i don du rgyal sras mtha' yas kun kyang 'ong /_/de cho kun mkhyen dbang bskur mi mchog 
[\[281b.3\]]mdzod spu nas/_/dbang bskur 'od gzer dam pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur/_/'od gzer mchog gis bskor zhing spyi bo'i gtsug tu nub/_/gang tshe rgyal mchog bu yi thu bo srid mchog la/_/dbang bskur bzhin du sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur tshe/_/
[\[281b.4\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad kun nas g.yo bar 'gyur/_/mnar med bar gyi sdug bsngal de tshe zhi zhing 'dug_/gang tshe kun mkhyen dbang gis mngon par dbang bskur ba/_/de phyir mkhas pas chos sprin sa mchog thob ces bya/_/mkhas pa 'di la gnas 
[\[281b.5\]]pa'i shes rgyud tshad med de/_/sa rab 'di la gnas pa 'gro kun gtso yin no/_/gzugs dang gzugs med de bzhin 'dod pa'i khams yangs dang /_/sems can khams dang zhing dang chos khams yangs pa dang /_/grangs dang grangs med nam 
[\[281b.6\]]mkha'i khams kyi bar du ste/_/chos dbyings yangs pa thams cad ma nor khong du chud/_/'di la gnas pa mthu chen sprul pa'i las kun dang /_/de bzhin byin rlabs rgyal ba'i ye shes phra ba dang /_/mi mchog gsang ba bskal ba'i grangs rnams 
[\[281b.7\]]shes bya dang /_/skra rtse gcig tu 'jig rten khams rnams gzud pa dang /_/mi yi gtso bo 'byung dang sku tshe 'tshang rgya dang /_/'khor lo dam pa bskor dang mya ngan 'da' ba'i rnams/_/thams cad rab shes gong du rnam thar zhi ba dag_/sngan chad ma thob kun 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]kyang de tshe rab tu 'thob/_/'di la gnas pa'i mthu chen rgyal ba'i chos kyi sprin/_/thams cad khong du chud byed dran pas kun kyang 'dzin/_/klu rnams kun gyi sprin char rgya mtsho 'dzin pa ltar/_/de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos 
[\[282a.2\]]sprin char chen kun kyang 'dzin/_/rgyal ba gcig las chos gang mthu chen des thob pa/_/de la phyogs bcu mtha' yas zhing gi sems can rnams/_/thams cad bde gshegs nyan thos thos pa 'dzin gyur kyang /_/byang chub sems dpa' thos pa'i grangs char 
[\[282a.3\]]nyer mi 'gro/_/ye shes spyod pa'i stobs kyis sngan cad spyad pa'i mthus/_/skad cig yud tsam gcig tu khrag khrig zhing bkang zhing /_/bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs nyon mongs kun kyang zhi bar byed/_/de phyir rgyal bas 'di ming chos kyi sprin ces 
[\[282a.4\]]gsungs/_/'di nas mthu chen lha yi 'jig rten gtsor gyur pa'i/_/phyogs rnams kun tu mi yi gtso bo'i yul yang ston/_/rnam 'phrul khrag khrig stong phrag du ma yang ston te/_/byang chub spyod pa de sems 'gro ba myos par 'gyur/_/
[\[282a.5\]]mkhas pa legs ldan 'di gnas gom pa bor ba tsam/_/sa dgu'i bar du gnas pas shes par mi nus na/_/sems can gzhan gyis shes par mi 'gyur smos ci dgos/_/dus gsum nyan thos rang rgyal kun gyis de bzhin no/_/'di 
[\[282a.6\]]gnas thams cad mkhyen par 'gro ba kun la ston/_/shes pas dus gsum kun tu thogs med zhi chos can/_/zhing rnams kun tu rgyas bkang chos rnams kun gyi bar/_/rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan brjod cing ston pa byed/_/mkhas pa 'di la 
[\[282a.7\]]gnas pa sangs rgyas mchod byed cing /_/phyogs rnams kun tu zhing dang chos kyi dbyings bkang ste/_/rgyal ba mngon du mchod pas mchod byed 'phrogs pa med/_/yon tan kun ldan sa yi lha yi lha zhes bya/_/mkhas pa 'di gnas shes 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]rab snang bas 'gro kun gyi/_/mun pa kun bstsal chos kyi tshul yang rab tu ston/_/dbang phyug dam pa'i mthu yis 'gro ba'i 'dod chags sel/_/de bas rgyal sras nyon mongs sel la mkhas zhes bya/_/'di la gnas pa de dag khams gsum 
[\[282b.2\]]dbang phyug 'gyur/_/ye shes tshul shes theg pa gsum po ston la mkhas/_/skad cig yud tsam cig gsi ting 'dzin gcig min thob/_/phyogs bcu kun tu rgyal ba'i dam pa gcig min ston/_/'di ni bdag gis rgyal sras sa rnams mdor 
[\[282b.3\]]bstan gyi/_/rgya cher bskal pa brgya phrag stong gis bstan mi nus/_/yon tan 'di 'dra'i sangs rgyas ye shes sa 'di la/_/gnas pa rtag tu ri yi rgyal po bzhin mi g.yo/_/rgyal sras thog ma gtsug lag kun gyis mi g.yo ste/_/sman gyi rnam pa 
[\[282b.4\]]kun nas ri rgyal gangs bzhin no/_/tshul khrims thos pas gnyis pa spos ngad spos dang 'dra/_/rnam 'dal me tog ji bzhin gsum pa shes par bya/_/lam la mos bzhin mi 'khrugs 'od 'phro thob pa ste/_/drang srong gnas bzhin mkhas 
[\[282b.5\]]pa rnams kyi rten gyur pa'o/_/gnod sbyin gnya' shing 'dzin bzhin bsam yas lnga pa thob/_/rta rna'i shing tog 'dra bar drug pa'i 'bras bu ste/_/bdun pa sa 'dzin klu bzhin shes rab chen pos thob/_/khor yug dbang ldan bzhin du 
[\[282b.6\]]brgyad pa dbang can thob/_/dgu pa dri ma sel ba dpal can lha min bzhin/_/bcu pa rgyal ba'i legs ldan ri rab lha gnas 'dra/_/dang po smon lam sngon 'gro gong ma tshul khrims tshogs/_/gsum pa spyod pa'i yon tan bzhi pa gcig gi dngos/_/
[\[282b.7\]]lnga pa dge mang drug pa shin tu zab pa'i dngos/_/brgyad pa blo gros yangs pa kun tu gcig min rgyan/_/dgu pa mkhas pa ye shes phra zhing zab dang ldan/_/'gro rgyud thams cad ye shes ldan pas rab tu gnon/_/bcu pa rgyal ba rnams las yang 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]dag chos 'dzin te/_/rgyal sras spyod pa mi sgul rgya mtsho de 'dra'o/_/spyod pa bcu 'das thog ma'i sems rab skye bar 'gyur/_/dka' thub rtul bas gnyis pa gsum pa bsam gtan gyis/_/dag pas bzhi pa shin tu 
[\[283a.2\]]byang bas lnga pa'o/_/drug pa rnon pos rtogs pa bdun pa mi phyed sa/_/brgyad pa mthu chen rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan ldan pa yin/_/dgu la ye shes ldan pas thibs po'i spyod pa shes/_/bcu la rgyal bas dbang bskur rgyal po dbang thob bzhin/_/yon tan 
[\[283a.3\]]rin chen dag pas de bzhin rim du 'phar/_/phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing rnams bshig ste bgrang bar nus/_/rnam shes gcig gis 'gro ba kun sems shes par rung /_/nam mkha'i dbyings kun skra yis gzhal bar nus srid kyi/_/rgyal ba'i yon 
[\[283a.4\]]tan bskal pa khrag khrig bshad mi nus/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mngon par gnang ste/_yid dga' bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos de skad ces smras pa 
[\[283a.5\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang na bzhugs shing mngon par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon te/_zhag bdun pa gnyis la bab pa'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang byed kyi gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che'i snying po can na bzhugs 
[\[283a.6\]]pas/_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos bshad pa la mngon par dgyes pa mdzad do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang /_lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang lha ma yin dang /_brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /_
[\[283a.7\]]'jig rten gyi mgon dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_gtsang ma'i ris su gtogs pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang mngon par dga'o/_/sa bcu'i le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o//_//[{D44-32}]sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la sogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[283b.2\]]kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la gnas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du/_phyogs bcu nas 
[\[283b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'khod pa bcu 'thon par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor seng 
[\[283b.4\]]ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'khod pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas pa sha stag go_/byang chub 
[\[283b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu snang ba'i mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[283b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po zab mo'i mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin sgra 
[\[283b.7\]]zab mo rnam pa tha dad pa'i mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje mi phyed pa'i gtsug gi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]lam [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo bar kun tu 'gro ba'i 'od gzer snang ba'i gzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grags pa snyan pa kun tu rnam par grags pa'i 'od kyi gzi 
[\[284a.2\]]brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba'i 'od zer snang ba'i gzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas 
[\[284a.3\]]blta ba'i gzugs rnam par dmigs pa'i 'od gzer gyi rgyal po snang ba'i gzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs bcu rnam par dag pa thub pa med pa'i 'od gzer snang 
[\[284a.4\]]ba'i gzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de ltar 'thon ma thag tu de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ma gtogs par 
[\[284a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyang langs par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i 'od ma gtogs par 'od thams cad kyang mi snang bar gyur te/_thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon 
[\[284a.6\]]par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa mang po 'ang mngon par byung bar gyur te/_'di ltar spos kyi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa byed pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon 
[\[284a.7\]]par bab par gyur to/_/me tog gi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i char mngon par bab par gyur to/_/byug pa'i sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to/_/gdugs kyi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to/_/gos kyi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[284b.2\]]brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to/_/rin po che'i sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to/_/rgyal mtshan gyi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba 
[\[284b.3\]]khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to/_/ba dan gyi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa'i sprin chos kyi dbyings 
[\[284b.4\]]thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par 
[\[284b.5\]]bab par gyur to/_/'od gzer gyi dra ba snang ba chen po'i sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to/_/rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang gi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas 
[\[284b.6\]]par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to/_/snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[284b.7\]]pa'i gzugs brnyan snang ba'i gos kyi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi seng ge'i khri mang po de dag las byang 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]chub sems dpa' re re'i seng ge'i khri'i rgyan rin po che rnam par dag pa re re dang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa mang po de dag thams cad las dmigs pa re re las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad yongs su snang bar gyur to/_/
[\[285a.2\]]dmigs pa mang po de dag thams cad las dmigs pa re re zhing yang sems can gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad yongs su snang bar gyur to/_/dmigs pa mang po de dag thams cad las [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[285a.3\]]'byam klas pa thams cad yongs su snang bar gyur to/_/dmigs pa mang po de dag thams cad las dmigs pa re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' 'byam klas pa thams cad yongs su snang bar gyur to/_/dmigs pa mang po de dag 
[\[285a.4\]]thams cad las dmigs pa re re zhing yang dus 'byam klas pa thams cad yongs su snang bar gyur to/_/dmigs pa mang po de dag thams cad las dmigs pa re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa 
[\[285a.5\]]brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang bcas pa/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang bcas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/_
[\[285a.6\]]sems can 'dul ba dang bcas pa/_ming gi 'khor lo dang bcas pa/_mang po yongs su snang bar gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i dus dag tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du 
[\[285a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par gyur pa de dag kyang yongs su snang bar gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi zhabs kyi drung na/_'khod cing pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su sbyong ba yang yongs su snang bar gyur to/_/dmigs 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]pa mang po de dag thams cad las [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa re re zhing yang phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i dus kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sangs rgyas skye ba dang bcas pa chos kyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[285b.2\]]'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/_sems can 'dul ba dang bcas pa/_ming gi 'khor lo dang bcas pa mang po yongs su snang bar gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 
[\[285b.3\]]phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i dus dag tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par gyur pa de dag kyang yongs su snang bar gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi zhabs kyi drung na 'khod cing pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong 
[\[285b.4\]]ba byed pa dag kyang yongs su snang bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa ni gang dang gang nas lhags/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang 
[\[285b.5\]]dang gang gi zhabs kyi drung nas phyin snyam ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems 
[\[285b.6\]]dpa' 'di dag lhags ni gang nas lhags/_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa ni gang shed nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig gi zhabs kyi drung nas 'dir phyin/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos/_byang chub 
[\[285b.7\]]sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bas na khyed nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag 'jig rten gyi khams ni gang nas lhags/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang gi zhabs 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]kyi drung nas phyin pa yongs su brtag pa dang /_yongs su dpyad pa gyis shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i mig gis kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[286a.2\]]chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba dang /_mngon par shes pa thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang /_dmigs pa thams cad shin tu rnam par phye ba'i snying po zhes bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi lus mngon par shes pa dang ldan 
[\[286a.3\]]pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi gzhi rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ba dag la mnyam par gzhag go_/de ltar de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[286a.4\]]brgya stong phrag bcu la byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang mnyam par gzhag ste/_kun gyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan dang gzhan sha stag la mnyam par gzhag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa de dag kyang ma mthong /_de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi 
[\[286a.5\]]zhabs kyi drung na byang chub sems dpa' de dag tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa de dag kyang ma mthong nas ting nge 'dzin de dag las langs te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' re res 
[\[286a.6\]]kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu la mnyam par gzhag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa de dag kyang ma mthong /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi zhabs 
[\[286a.7\]]kyi drung na tshangs par spyod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang ma mthong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos/_yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag la smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]da dung du byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa gang nas lhags pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi zhabs kyi drung nas lhags pa brtag par gyis shig dpyad par gyis shig_/'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa de dag ni 
[\[286b.2\]]mthong bar dka'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi zhabs kyi drung na byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang de bas kyang shin tu mthong bar dka'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 
[\[286b.3\]]las byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mnyam par gzhag go_/de ltar mnyam par gzhag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[286b.4\]]'byam klas pa de dag kyang ma mthong /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi zhabs kyi drung na byang chub sems dpa' de dag tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang ma mthong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin 
[\[286b.5\]]de dag las langs te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' re res byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin 
[\[286b.6\]]tu phra ba snyed la mnyam par gzhag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa de dag kyang ma mthong ngo /_/gang gi zhabs kyi drung na byang chub sems dpa' de dag tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang ma mthong ngo /_/de nas 
[\[286b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po stan de las nam mkha'i dbyings su 'phags te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]'khor thams cad la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chags pa mi mnga' ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa dus gsum mtshungs par mnyam par 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa 
[\[287a.2\]]thams cad kun tu khyab pa chos kyi dbyings khongs su chud pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa 'di la ltos shig dang de la 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad kyang gzugs brnyan du gyur 
[\[287a.3\]]par snang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'byam klas pa thams cad kyang gzugs brnyan du gyur par snang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' 'byam klas pa thams cad kyang gzugs brnyan du gyur par snang ngo /_/sems can gyi khams 'byam 
[\[287a.4\]]klas pa thams cad kyang gzugs brnyan du gyur par snang ngo /_/lam gyi rgyud 'byam klas pa thams cad kyang gzugs brnyan du gyur par snang ngo /_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bas na khyod kyis rang gi lus kun tu lta ba'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang ldan 
[\[287a.5\]]par byin gyis rlobs la shes rab kyi mig nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas par byin gyis rlob ste/_ye shes yangs pa'i mig dmigs pa thams cad kyi rjes su song la khong du chud par gyis la phyogs 'byam klas pa thams cad du de bzhin 
[\[287a.6\]]gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis rlob ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thams cad du mi gnas pa 'di la gnas pa thams cad yongs su bstsal ba'i lta bas ltos shig_/mngon par zhen pa thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa dang 
[\[287a.7\]]srid pa thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang shin tu phra ba'i tshul gyis stobs bcu'i stobs yongs su non pa dang /_dmigs pa chung ngu la rgya chen por 'jug pa'i blta bas ltos shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i kun tu bzang po'i gdams ngag bzhin du thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas sems shing rtog pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong yod 
[\[287b.2\]]pa la 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod pa mthong bar gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo chos ston to/_/de'i sangs rgyas 
[\[287b.3\]]kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis 
[\[287b.4\]]bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go_/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs byin pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e na ya'i byin pa lta bu gnyis la 'jig rten gyi khams chags pa med pa'i snying po can zhes bya 
[\[287b.5\]]ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rgya mtsho chags pa med cing dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/chos ston to/_/de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' zab mo'i mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes 
[\[287b.6\]]bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te/_'ongs nas seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan 
[\[287b.7\]]gyi snying po can la 'dug go_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs pus mo gnyis kyi lha nga la 'jig rten gyi khams sa le sbram yod pa zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'bar ba dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo chos ston to/_/
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi gzi brjid mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[288a.2\]]brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te/_'ongs nas seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go_/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku sta zur gyi dkyil 'khor la 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che 
[\[288a.3\]]sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi snying po can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba sna tshogs kyi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo chos ston to/_/de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' sprin sgra zab mo rnam pa tha dad 
[\[288a.4\]]pa'i mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas seng 
[\[288a.5\]]ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go_/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i snying po can zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad gzi brjid kyi 
[\[288a.6\]]rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo chos ston to/_/de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje mi phyed pa'i gtsug gi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang 
[\[288a.7\]]brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i snying po can la 'dug go_/bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi 'od 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]gzer snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi be'u rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo chos ston to/_/de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' dag gi lam mi g.yo bar kun tu 'gro ba'i 'od gzer 
[\[288b.2\]]snang ba'i gzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas seng ge'i khri chags pa med 
[\[288b.3\]]pas brgyan pa'i snying po can la 'dug go_/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku phrag pa'i lhun gnyis la 'jig rten gyi khams gser yod pa zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'bar ba'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo chos ston to/_/
[\[288b.4\]]de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' grags pa snyan par kun tu rnam par grags pa'i 'od kyi gzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag 
[\[288b.5\]]khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas/_seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal gyi gsung gi dbyangs la 'jig rten gyi khams rin 
[\[288b.6\]]po che sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gzer dpag tu med pa'i gzi brjid kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo chos ston to/_/de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' ri'i rgyal po mi 
[\[288b.7\]]g.yo ba'i 'od gzer snang ba'i gzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]mdun du byas te 'ongs nas seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi smin mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yod de/_
[\[289a.2\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dus gsum du mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo chos ston to/_/de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' kun nas blta ba'i gzugs rnam par dmigs pa'i 'od gzer gyi rgyal po snang ba'i 
[\[289a.3\]]gzi brjid mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te/_'ongs nas 
[\[289a.4\]]seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu la 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi spyi'u tshugs kyi lhun yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog 
[\[289a.5\]]brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo chos ston to/_/de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu rnam par dag pa thub pa med pa'i 'od gzer snang ba'i gzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[289a.6\]]'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas/_seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go_/de nas byang 
[\[289a.7\]]chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag dang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]mthong bar gyur nas/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad las byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thob par gyur to/_/
[\[289b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang gzungs chos thams cad kyis las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa gzungs sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdul dang bral ba'i 
[\[289b.3\]]snying po la sogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad las byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang stobs kyi glog la sogs pa 
[\[289b.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi glog_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thob par gyur to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag chos kyi sgo 'di dag ni bsam pa rdo rje dam pa lta bur byas te/_yongs su chub par bya'o/_/rim gro 
[\[289b.5\]]chen po dang ldan pa'i bsam pas yongs su bsrung bar bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras chos kyi sgo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa/_kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la zhugs pa 
[\[289b.6\]]rnams ma gtogs par gzhan gyi rna lam du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos de skad ces smras pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yid dga' ste/_
[\[289b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos smras pa la mngon par dga'o/_/kun tu bzang pos bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/_sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//[{D44-33}]bcom ldan 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]'das thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas pa pho brang 'od thams cad kyi snying po can na de bzhin du mnyam par gzhag par bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan khrag khrig brgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_thams cad kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]phyed 
[\[290a.2\]]pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas thob pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku shin tu dag pa dang /_gnas med pa la rten pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku dang mi gnyis pa'i zhi gnas dang yang dag par ldan pa dang /_tshad 
[\[290a.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]par khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan gyi rgyud dang 'gro ba thams cad kyis rnam par dmigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba dang dus la bab pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang skad cig gcig 
[\[290a.4\]]gis byung ba'i mtshan nyid med pa la spyod pas bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa la rab tu gnas pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su 
[\[290a.5\]]dag pa dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu lta ba rab tu thob pa 'gro ba thams cad bde bar byed pa'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa/_bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu 'joms pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang 
[\[290a.6\]]dag par bsgrub pa 'gro ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar gnas pas/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mi gnas pa la gnas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar byang chub 
[\[290a.7\]]sems dpa' rdo rje'i gtsug dang gzhal du med pa'i blo gros dang /_zhi ba'i blo gros dang gtong ba'i blo gros dang /_klu'i blo gros dang thob pa'i blo gros dang /_sbyin pa'i blo gros dang stobs kyi blo gros dang bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i blo gros dang 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]chags pa med pa'i blo gros dang /_mchog gi blo gros dang lha'i blo gros dang /_mchod sbyin byas pa'i blo gros dang mthu'i blo gros dang /_don gyi blo gros dang chos la dad pa'i blo gros dang /_chos kyi blo gros dang zhi ba'i blo gros dang /_
[\[290b.2\]]nam mkha'i blo gros dang /_skad cig gcig gi blo gros dang /_legs pa'i blo gros dang /_sdom pa'i blo gros dang /_mkha'i blo gros dang /_stobs kyi blo gros dang /_glang po'i blo gros dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mthu'i blo gros dang /_
[\[290b.3\]]don rnam par dmigs pa'i blo gros dang /_dam pa'i blo gros dang /_ye shes snang ba'i blo gros dang /_'phags pa'i blo gros dang dran pa'i rgyan dang /_dngos po med pa'i mthar phyin pa dang /_rang bzhin gyi rgyan dang yul zab mo dang 
[\[290b.4\]]gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pa dang /_klu'i 'od dang snang ba 'dzin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rim gro la brtson pa dang /_sems kyi rgyal po dang spyod pa gcig pa dang mngon par shes pa mnyams pa dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs dang 
[\[290b.5\]]yon tan 'byung gnas dang chos kyi sgron ma dang /_'gro ba'i bdag po dang /_'gro ba 'dzin pa dang /_bde ba byed pa dang mchog tu gyur pa dang bla na med pa dang mnyam pa med pa dang 'dra ba med pa dang /_'od thogs pa med pa dang /_'od rab tu snang ba dang /_grags pa'i 
[\[290b.6\]]'od dang /_shin tu rnam par snang ba dang lag pa brtan pa dang /_chos kyi char pa dang thig le dam pa dang /_ye shes kyi mig dang chos [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]mig dang /_shes rab kyi sprin dang sa'i rgyal po dang smon lam khyad par du thogs pa med pas 'gro ba dang /_
[\[290b.7\]]ye shes kyi snying po dang bsam pa'i rgyal po dang nang gi blo gros yang dag par grub pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yul dang /_sa'i stobs kyis rnam par gnon pa dang sa dang stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa 'dzin pa dang zla ba bzang po dang ri bo chen po'i dpal 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]dang /_rin po che chen po'i dpal dang bar snang gi rgyud dang /_khams chen po'i rgyal po dang dkyil 'khor mnyam pa khong du chud pa dang /_gzi brjid gzhan gyis mi 'pham pa dang /_klu chen po lta ba'i dpal dang mnyam 
[\[291a.2\]]pa nyid kyi ngang tshul dang phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus dang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo yang dag par 'dzin pa'i dpal dang /_dran pa'i yul nyams pa med pa dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros kyis rnam par rtogs pa dang mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 
[\[291a.3\]]blos rnam par rol pa dang /_mdzod zad mi shes pa dang /_ye shes nyi ma'i dpal dang /_chos kyi nyi ma dang /_ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'i snying po dang /_blo dam pa'i char 'bebs pa dang /_kun tu lta ba dang /_blta na don yod pa dang rdo rje mngon par shes 
[\[291a.4\]]pa dang /_ye shes rdo rje'i blo gros dang kun tu mig gi dpal dang /_sangs rgyas kyi don gyi nyi ma dang sangs rgyas kyi rdo rje yang dag par gzung ba'i bsam pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig gi yul kun tu ye shes kyi rgyan dang /_de dag 
[\[291a.5\]]la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang sngon bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba la grogs su gyur pa sha stag dang 
[\[291a.6\]]thabs gcig go_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mos 
[\[291a.7\]]btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te bdag gis zhus nas zhus pa'i lung bstan par bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye bar gnang na/_bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs gcig cig zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu mig la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun tu mig khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[291b.2\]]pa la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang ngas dris pa de dang /_de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems tshim par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[291b.3\]]to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par thar ba du ma dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i sgo dang /_kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam du ldan pa rnams ting nge 'dzin dang rnam par thar pa 
[\[291b.4\]]la snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ba lags/_ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyi gnas 'thob pa lags/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par ldang ba la mkhas pa rgyun
