[\[291b.5\]]mi 'chad pa 'thob pa lags/_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang rnam par 'phrul pa dang ldan pa lags de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[291b.6\]]stsal to/_/kun tu mig khyod kyis de ltar 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pa la don 
[\[291b.7\]]'di 'dri bar bsam pa legs so legs so/_/kun tu mig de bas na byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu bsgrub par 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]dka' ba dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa tshad med pas mngon par byung ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa la shin tu bslabs pa byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam 
[\[292a.2\]]bsgrub par dka' bas rnam par sbyangs ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul mtha' yas pas rnam par sbyangs pa/_gzungs 'thob par bya ba mu med pa dang ldan pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes 
[\[292a.3\]]pa/_zad mi shes pas thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par rnam par dag pa/_'gro ba thams cad la skyo ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa thob pa'i snying rje chen pos phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/_'di 'khor 'dir 'dus te/_'dug pa yin gyis de la dris shig 
[\[292a.4\]]dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang rnam par 'phrul pa ston to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ming thos ma thag tu/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa mngon du gyur to/_/
[\[292a.5\]]chags pa med pa'i sems rnam par phye bas kyang byin gyis brlabs par gyur to/_/ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab par 'jug par bya ba la 'ang rab tu gzhol bar gyur to/_/ye shes mi 'phrogs pa'i spyod yul yang rab tu byung ngo /_/de bzhin 
[\[292a.6\]]gshegs pa grangs med pa mthong zhing rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa yang mngon du gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad med pa yang khong du chud par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig pa yang rjes su rtogs par gyur 
[\[292a.7\]]to/_/dus gsum mtha' yas pa la 'jug pa yang khong du chud par gyur to/_/bsod nams zad mi shes pa'i byin yang thob par gyur to/_/rnam par 'phrul pa bzang po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'ang khong du chud par gyur 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]nas/_de dag thams cad kyis rim gro dang bcas shing rjes dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du lta bar gyur na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[292b.2\]]kun tu bzang po'i rdzu 'phrul gyi khyu mchog gi mthus byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po yang ma mthong /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus kyang ma mthong /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po gang na gnas 
[\[292b.3\]]pa'i stan yang ma mthong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po da lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 
[\[292b.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu mig 'khor 'di nyid na nga'i zhabs kyi drung na 'dug go_/nga'i zhabs kyi drung na spyod do/_/nga'i zhabs kyi drung nas ma g.yos so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig dang /_byang chub 
[\[292b.5\]]sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis/_yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kun tu bzang po de ma 
[\[292b.6\]]mthong ngo /_/de'i lus kyang ma mthong de'i stan yang ma mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus ma mthong zhing stan ma mthong ba ni/_de de bzhin 
[\[292b.7\]]te yus so de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po de ni brjod du med cing zab pa la gnas pa ste/_'di ltar ye shes kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa la 'jug pa la zhugs pa'o/_/seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul bla na med pa rab tu thob pa'o/_/chags pa med pa'i mthas rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus grub pa'o/_/chos kyi 
[\[293a.2\]]dbyings dam pa'i lus dang ldan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs la gnas pa'o/_/'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang ye shes tha mi dad pa'i rgyun dang ldan pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_
[\[293a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'di ni sems skad cig gi mtha'i rjes su 'brang ba'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig gis de bzhin gshegs pa las kun tu bzang po'i yon tan rnam par dag pa thos ma 
[\[293a.4\]]thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu la mnyam par gzhag ste/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mngon par 'dod cing mthong bar bya ba dang /_gsol ba gdab pa'i bsam pas tshol 
[\[293a.5\]]lo/_/yongs su tshol lo rab tu rtog go_/shin tu zhib cing brtags par rnam par dpyod do/_/rjes su rtog go_/rnam par lta'o/_'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig gis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ma 
[\[293a.6\]]mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis kyang mthong bar ma gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[293a.7\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin grangs ma mchis pa stong phrag bcu la mnyam par gzhag ste/_rnam par bltas kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ma mthong ngo /_/de'i lus kyi las kyang ma mthong ngo /_/de'i ngag 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]dang ngag gi las kyang ma mthong ngo /_/de'i yid dang yid kyi las kyang ma mthong ngo /_/de'i stan yang ma mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po de gang na mchis pa dang spyod pa'i phyogs de yang ma mthong ngo 
[\[293b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu mig don de bzhin te/_khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po de mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la shin tu 
[\[293b.3\]]bslabs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'o/_/kun tu mig de la ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma'i gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs mang po sgyu ma'i sngags kyi yi ge gang la gnas pa [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par nus sam/_btsun pa bcom 
[\[293b.4\]]ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu mig rgyu ma'i sngags kyi gzugs kyi/_rnam pa de dag kyang dmigs shing bstan par mi nus na/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus kyi spyod yul 
[\[293b.5\]]gsang ba dang /_ngag gi spyod yul gsang ba dang /_yid kyi spyod yul gsang ba la 'jug par mi nus pa dang /_mthong bar mi nus pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni zab cing /_
[\[293b.6\]]bsam gyis mi khyab par rnam par spyod pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni tshad med cing tshad las 'das pa ste/_ye shes rdo rje'i blo dang ldan pa'o/_/chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la yang dag par gnas pa'o/_/
[\[293b.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gnas med par spyod cing /_sems can thams cad kyi lus dang gzugs kyi rjes su zhugs pa'o/_/blang ba med pa'i chos kyi tshul dang ldan pa'o/_/mi zad cing tha mi dad pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang khyu mchog gi 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]mthu la lhun gyis grub par gnas pa'i mthar phyin pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa dang ldan pa'o/_/de ltar rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni 
[\[294a.2\]]blta na don yod pa'o/_/mnyan na don yod pa'o bsnyen bkur byed pa don yod pa'o/_/bsam pa don yod pa'o rjes su dran pa don yod pa'o/_/de la dad par byas pa don yod pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po de ni mthong ba don yod pa'o/_/
[\[294a.3\]]thos pa don yod pa'o/_/bsnyen bkur ba don yod pa'o/_/khams pa don yod pa'o/_/rjes su dran par byas pa don yod pa'o/_/de la mos par byas pa don yod pa'o/_/blta ba don yod pa'o/_/brtags pa don yod pa'o/_/btsal ba don yod 
[\[294a.4\]]pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni rjes su smon lam gdab pa don yod pa'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 
[\[294a.5\]]mthong bar 'dod cing /_thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad brjod do/_/sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 
[\[294a.6\]]bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas thams cad la btud de phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la btud de phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig dang 
[\[294a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po de dag la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshol la gsol ba thob shig_/phyogs thams cad du mngon du gyis la kun tu mig gi las su byin gyis rlob 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]ste/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la dmigs pa gyis la/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad mngon tu bya ba'i sems kyis byin gyis brlab pa gyis te/_chos thams cad 'dod chags dang bral bar khong du chud par gyis la byang

[\[294b.3\]]kun tu bzang po'i smon lam kun tu 'gro ba yongs su sbyang bar gyis shig dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de skad thos 
[\[294b.4\]]nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag dang bcas pas spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la gsol ba [(]gtab [,]gdab [)]bo/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol ba [(]gtab [,]gdab [)]ma thag tu/_
[\[294b.5\]]de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos rnam par thar pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na gnas shing 
[\[294b.6\]]pad mo'i stan la 'dug par mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /_'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus las kyang 'byung bar snang ba dang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'byam klas pa dag nas kyang 'ong bar snang ba dang /_sangs 
[\[294b.7\]]rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'phrin las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rab tu brjod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rab tu ston pa dang /_thams 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi lam snang bar byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba thams cad yang dag par brjod 
[\[295a.2\]]pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa'i dus gsum rab tu ston pa de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa kun tu bstan to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis 
[\[295a.3\]]rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong nas dga' zhing mgu ste/_rangs nas rab tu dga' zhing bde ba dang yid dga' ba skyes nas dmigs pa thams cad kyis btud pa'i rjes sa/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal to/_/
[\[295a.4\]]de'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'/_de dag mos pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'/_kun tu bzang po'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas sprin gyi char stong phrag bcu mngon par bab par gyur 
[\[295a.5\]]pa 'di lta ste/_me tog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/_/phreng ba sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/spos sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/_/spos kyi phye ma sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/_/
[\[295a.6\]]gdugs sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/_/na bza' sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/_/rgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/_/rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/_/spos sna tshogs 
[\[295a.7\]]kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/snam bu rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos so rol mo brdung ba dang /_dkrol ba thams cad kyi sgra mang po byung ngo /_lha'i nga 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]ro snyan pa mang po rab tu byung ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snang ba chen pos khyab par snang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sems can rnams rnam par dag par gyur to/_/
[\[295b.2\]]ngan song gi lam gyi rgyud gsum rnam par zhi bar gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rnam par dag par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa byang chub sems dpa' kun 
[\[295b.3\]]tu bzang po'i spyod pa la zhugs par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la yongs su grub par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i yang 
[\[295b.4\]]brjod du med pa byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 
[\[295b.5\]]mig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni/_bdag nyid che ba la mngon par spyod pa'o/_/mtshungs pa ma mchis pa la rnam par spyod pa'o/_/yongs 
[\[295b.6\]]su mi chod pa la rnam par spyod pa'o/_/slar mi ldog pa la rnam par spyod pa'o/_/mnyam pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa la rnam par spyod pa'o/_/gzhan gyis mi zlog pa la rnam par spyod pa'o/_/chos thams cad tha mi dad pa la rnam par 
[\[295b.7\]]spyod pa'o/_/chos thams cad ma 'dres par rnam par spyod pa'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs mkhas pa la rnam par spyod pa'o/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni chos thams cad kyi dbang dang /_
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]ting nge 'dzin dang rnam par thar pa la rnam par spyod pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu mig de khyod kyis ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni yon tan 
[\[296a.2\]]grangs med pas rnam par dag pa'o/_/yon tan mtshungs pa med pas rnam par brgyan pa'o/_/yon tan tshad med pa rin po che dang ldan pa'o/_/yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'byung gnas rgya mtsho'o/_/yon tan dpag 
[\[296a.3\]]tu med pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/yon tan mu med pa'i sprin to/_/yon tan sa mtshams med pas bsngags shing bstod pa'o/_/chos rin po che zad mi shes pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni sangs rgyas thams 
[\[296a.4\]]cad kyis yon tan brjod cing bsngags pa mi zad pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun tu bzang po khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig 
[\[296a.5\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad la/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin 
[\[296a.6\]]shin tu bstan pa gang gis 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byung ba dang /_'byung ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin bcu shin tu bstan pa la mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rgya chen 
[\[296a.7\]]po bcu shin tu bstan pa spobs par gyis shig_/bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa rab tu thob pa dang /_rjes su 'gro ba snang ba zhes bya ba dang /_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po rab tu thob pa yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /_'di lta ste/_zhing 'byam klas pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rjes su song ba dang /_'di lta ste/_lhag pa'i bsam pa gtsang mas spyod pa zhes bya ba 
[\[296b.2\]]dang /_'di lta ste 'das pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba dang /_'di lta ste/_ye shes rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba dang /_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rnam par bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyan ces bya ba 
[\[296b.3\]]dang /_'di lta ste/_sems can gyi lus tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba dang /_'di lta ste/_sems can gyi khams la dbang ba zhes bya ba dang /_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa rab tu thob pa bcu pa 
[\[296b.4\]]chags pa med pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po 'di bcu ni/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[296b.5\]]kyis gsungs so/_/gsung ngo gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gis ting nge 'dzin bcu po 'di dag la bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa dang /_dngos por byas pa dang /_shes par byas pa dang /_mngon 
[\[296b.6\]]du byas pa dang mdun du byas pa dang /_mnyam par gzhag pa dang /_shin tu brtsams pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pas/_byang chub sems dpa' yin yang sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_
[\[296b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/_/stobs bcu pa zhes bya'o/_/'dren pa zhes bya'o/_/rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o/_/thams cad gzigs pa zhes bya'o/_/chags pa med pa la 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spyod yul can zhes bya'o/_/chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug ces bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gis ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob pa de ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rjes su song ba yang yin la/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[297a.2\]]thams cad nas phyir log pa 'ang yin/_sems can thams cad kyi khams su rab tu song ba 'ang yin la sems can med pa'i mtha' yang khong du chud pa yin/_chags pa med pa'i lus kyi snying po'i rjes su song ba 'ang yin la/_chos kyi dbyings 
[\[297a.3\]]thams cad la 'jug par spyod pa yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pas kyang rnam par dag la 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yang rjes su 'brang ba yin/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[297a.4\]]pa thams cad kyi chos rnam par mthong ba yang yin la/_spyod pa thams cad kyi yang rjes su song ba yin/_dbyangs kyi yan lag dang yi ge la rab tu spobs shing /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas rnam par dag pa yin 
[\[297a.5\]]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par phye ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la 'ang rab tu gnas pa yin/_rtag par dus gsum skad cig tu/_zhugs pa 'ang yin la dus gsum thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir yang yang 
[\[297a.6\]]dag par gzhol ba 'ang yin/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos ston pa yang yin la/_thabs kyis chos thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog pa'i lus dang yang ldan pa yin/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung 
[\[297a.7\]]ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rnam par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i tshul la yang rab tu zhugs la sangs rgyas gcig mngon par sangs rgyas pas/_sangs rgyas thams cad du 'ang shin tu ston pa yin te/_'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi rnam 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]pa'i tshul lo/_/'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/_ye shes rnam par sbyangs pa'i tshul lo/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal mtshan gzhan gyis mi pham pa'i tshul lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa 
[\[297b.2\]]dang smon lam gyi tshul lo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa rnon po dang /_'grogs pa'i tshul lo/_/gzungs dang spobs pa thams cad kyi tshul lo/_/dus gsum tha mi dad pa'i tshul lo/_/'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang da 
[\[297b.3\]]ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul lo/_/sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu dgod pa'i tshul lo/_/'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su dag par 
[\[297b.4\]]bya ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu bstan pa'i tshul lo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mthu mi zad pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi stobs thob pa yin no/_/'pho ba med pa'i mthar thug par 'gyur 
[\[297b.5\]]ba'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings ltar tshad med pa yin/_chos kyi rgyal srid la 'gro ba dbang bskur ba'i phyir dbang mtha' yas par bsgyur ba yin/_stobs bcu shin tu yangs pa'i tshul thob pa'i phyir/_'gro ba thams cad du tshad med pa'i ye 
[\[297b.6\]]shes thob pa yin/_rab tu zhi ba'i mtha' la zhugs pas/_nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems rab tu bsgoms pa yin/_shugs dang ldan pa'i rtsal bdog pas snying rje chen po'i seng ge yin/_yon tan dang bsngags pa thams cad dang ldan pas 
[\[297b.7\]]chos kyi sgron ma la yang dag par gzhol zhing mi zad pa yin/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/_chos shes shing khong du chud pas gnas kyi mthar phyin pa yin/_spyod pa dang rnam par gdags pa dang /_brda thams 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]cad la sna tshogs su shin tu bstan pa byed par mkhas pa yin/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa lam khas pa la zhugs pas/_mtshan ma med pa la mos pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' chen pos rnam par dag 
[\[298a.2\]]pas rigs dang /_rgyud rnam par dag pa yin/_gzhi med pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyis chos kyi gzhi rab tu dbye ba'i snying po'i rjes su song ba yin/_chos yongs su gtong ba la brtson pas dus thams cad du mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin/_
[\[298a.3\]]shes par bya ba thams cad khong du chud pas sems can gyi nang na mkhas pa yin/_skye dgu thams cad shin tu dag par byed pas mtha' yas pa rnam par sbyong ba yin/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rnam par sangs rgyas pa dang /_'tshang 
[\[298a.4\]]rgya bar bya ba'i spyod pa yang dag par ston pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi thabs la mkhas pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis zad mi shes pa yin/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul rnam 
[\[298a.5\]]par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba la mkhas pas/_cho 'phrul chen po ston pa yin gyis de bas na kun tu bzang po byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bcu po 'di dag rgya cher spros te/_bshad pas bstan par gyis shig_/byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[298a.6\]]'khor 'di dag thams cad mnyan par 'dod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang gsol ba btab par shes nas/_byang chub 
[\[298a.7\]]sems dpa' kun tu [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/bcu po 'di rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma lus par 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]mthar thug pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas skye ba khong du chud pa'i ye shes dang /_sems can dri ma med par mngon par bsgrub par bya ba'i ye shes dang /_'jig rten gyi khams mig yor lta bur shes pa'i ye shes dang /_chos kyi 
[\[298b.2\]]dbyings kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i ye shes dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rab tu gzung ba la mkhas pa'i ye shes dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i thabs yongs su gnan pa'i ye shes dang /_don thams cad dang ldan pa'i chos 
[\[298b.3\]]kyi lhag mthong la mkhas pa'i ye shes dang /_byang chub kyi sems kyi mthu'i rjes su song ba'i ye shes dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam dang byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes te/_
[\[298b.4\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma lus par mthar thug pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems 
[\[298b.5\]]bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad nye bar gzung ba dang /_yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir/_sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /_'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi chos thams 
[\[298b.6\]]cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir/_sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /_'di lta ste sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur zhing mchod pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /_'di lta ste/_sangs 
[\[298b.7\]]rgyas thams cad mthong bar bya ba'i mig tshad med pa yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /_'di lta ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung dang dbyangs dang bka' yang dag par bzung zhing 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]nyams pa med par bya ba'i phyir/_sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i bye brag tha dad pa rnam par dbye ba la mkhas par khong du chud 
[\[299a.2\]]pa bskyed pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub kyi mtshams sbyar ba'i stobs la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/_sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa 
[\[299a.3\]]dang /_'di lta ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas pas shin tu phra bar dmigs shing /_yongs su mnan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu bstan pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /_'di lta 
[\[299a.4\]]ste/_sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab cing 'byam klas pa la 'jug pa dang khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/_sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /_'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi tha dad pa yang dag 
[\[299a.5\]]par mkhyen pa mngon du bya bar lhag pa'i bsam pa yang dag par gtang zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par blang ba'i phyir/_sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[299a.6\]]pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug cing /_lus sna tshogs kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/_sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/bcu po de dag ni byang 
[\[299a.7\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/bcu po 'di rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag la 'jug pa'i 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]ye shes te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar shar phyogs su snyoms par zhugs te/_nub phyogs nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_nub phyogs su snyoms par zhugs te/_shar phyogs nas rnam par ldang ba dang shar dang byang gi mtshams su snyoms 
[\[299b.2\]]par zhugs te/_lho dang nub kyi mtshams nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_lho dang nub kyi mtshams su snyoms par zhugs te/_shar dang byang gi mtshams nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_lho phyogs su snyoms par zhugs te/_
[\[299b.3\]]byang phyogs nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_byang phyogs su snyoms par zhugs te/_lho phyogs nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_nub dang byang gi mtshams su snyoms par zhugs te/_shar dang lho'i mtshams nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_
[\[299b.4\]]shar dang lho'i mtshams su snyoms par zhugs te/_nub dang byang gi mtshams nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_'og gi phyogs su snyoms par zhugs te/_steng gi phyogs nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_steng gi phyogs su snyoms par zhugs shing 
[\[299b.5\]]'og gi phyogs nas rnam par ldang ba ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po 'di rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag la 'jug pa'i ye shes so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po 'di rnams ni/_byang 
[\[299b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen por bya ba la mkhas pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[299b.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams pad mo gcig tu byin gyis brlabs te/_pad+mo gcig po de rang gi skyil mo krung gis rgyas par khyab par byin gyis rlob bo/_/rang gi lus de las kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ston to/_/stong 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der yang gling bzhi pa khrag khrig phrag brgya ston to/_/gling bzhi pa khrag khrig brgya po re re zhing yang bdag gi lus re re byin gyis rlob ste/_lus de dag re re la'ang stong gsum 
[\[300a.2\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig brgya brgya ston to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi gling bzhi ba re rer yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa khrag khrig brgya brgya yang dag par ston te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de dag re re 
[\[300a.3\]]la yang mos pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya brgya mngon par sgrub bo/_/mos pa de dag re re la yang dbang po sna tshogs rnam par phye ba khrag khrig brgya brgya yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu thob par bya ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dbang po sna tshogs 
[\[300a.4\]]rnam par phye ba de dag re re la yang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag brgya brgya phyir mi ldog pa'i las kyis byang chub sems dpa'i chos la rab tu gzhog go_/'on kyang lus mang po 'am lhag par 'phel bar mi byed do/_/mnyam par gzhag 
[\[300a.5\]]pa'ang nyams par 'gyur ba med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan zhes bya ba yod de/_de'i rang bzhin gyi lus ni dpag tshad bdun brgya'o/_/de'i sprul pa'i lus ni dpag tshad brgya stong phrag 
[\[300a.6\]]drug cu rtsa brgyad de/_de'i lus phyed rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na/_'dug kyang lus kyi stod gyen du 'phags pa ri rab kyi rtse mo dang mnyam yang /_kye rgyal ba'i sras lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan da sprul pa'i lus tshad brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad 
[\[300a.7\]]pa des sngon gyi lus 'jig par mi byed do/_/sngon skyes pa'i phung po dang khams dang /_skye mched kyang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/lus chen po de yod pas kyang sprul pa'i lus la gzhan du 'du shes par mi 'gyur te/_lus snga 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]ma shi 'phos pa'i 'du shes kyang med la gsar du skyes pa'i lus kyis kyang nyams dga' ba rab tu thob pa yin te/_sprul pa'i lus des mthu dang dbang byed par dbang sgyur bar yang yang dag par ston na/_rmongs shing 'khrul bar 'gyur ba 'ang 
[\[300b.2\]]med de/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan de ni 'dod chags can zhe sdang can gti mug can te/_nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang ldan yang rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas shing rgya mtsho'i nang gi khyim na 'dug bzhin du rnam pa de lta bu'i sprul pa'i lus 
[\[300b.3\]]kyis mngon par 'phags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam par rab tu rtogs pa/_'jig rten thams cad na dpe med pa/_mig yor dang mnyam par rab tu zhugs pa/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[300b.4\]]khams thams cad sangs rgyas skyes pa'i sprul pa rnam par dmigs pa lta bur khong du chud pa/_sgra dbyangs rnam par dmigs pa thams cad ri'i brag ca lta bur shes pa/_yang dag pa'i chos rab tu mthong ba/_chos ji lta ba bzhin gyi lus dang ldan 
[\[300b.5\]]pa/_rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhing dang ba'i chos la zhugs pa/_sems kyi rang bzhin dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par rab tu rtogs pa/_lus kyi yul tshad med pa la gnas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes snang bas byang chub kyi spyod pa rnam par sbyangs 
[\[300b.6\]]pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de ting nge 'dzin chen po de la gnas pas chud zad du 'khrul pa 'ang med na blong zhing rmongs par 'gyur ba med pa lta ci smos/_de lus kyi stod lha'i 'jig rten du 'phags par byin gyis rlob cing lus kyi smad 'dod pa'i 
[\[300b.7\]]khams na 'dug par byin gyis rlob kyang shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas rab tu sbyar ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po des lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan de yang rang gi lus kyi nang du rlag pa de lus chen po ston cing spyoms pa'i skye 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]ba dang rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyang lus kyi nang du rlag par byin gyis rlob bo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na/_mi sdug pa sgom pa la gnas pa'i dge slong ni/_mi sdug pa'i mtshan mar rnam par lta zhing 
[\[301a.2\]]nang gi lus la rtog pa la mngon par brtson pa yin/_de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang lus su 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad chud par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi lus la brtag par mngon par brtson pa yin te/_
[\[301a.3\]]lus de la 'jig rten dang /_'jig rten gyi chos mthong ba yang 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pas lus la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten gyi 
[\[301a.4\]]chos kyis chags pa med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa'i ye shes rjes su 'gro ba snang ba zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gzhan 
[\[301a.5\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams/_stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams re re la byin gyis 
[\[301a.6\]]rlob ste/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag re re yang lus rnam par dmigs pa/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yang dag par ston to/_/lus de dag re re las kyang 'od gzer gyi dkyil 
[\[301a.7\]]'khor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'gyed do/_/'od gzer re re la yang kha dog stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yang dag par ston te/_kha dog 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]de dag re res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed snang bar byed do/_/snang ba de dag re res kyang sems can stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su smin par byed do/_/
[\[301b.2\]]de la yang byang chub sems dpa' des 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro ba 
[\[301b.3\]]rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten gyi khams byin gyis brlab pa rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten gyi khams su gnas par bya ba rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten gyi khams snang bar bya ba rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten gyi khams nas 'gro ba'ang rab tu shes so/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'jig 
[\[301b.4\]]rten gyi khams la de ltar 'jug kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ji lta ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug ste/_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dmigs pas/_'jig rten gyi khams spro bar yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_chos kyi rang bzhin las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do//_//
[\[301b.5\]]sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po nyi shu gsum pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na lha'i bu nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe ri rab ri'i rgyal po 'khor bar gnas pa'i rin po che'i ri bdun la 'char bar 'gyur te/_ri bdun po de dag la shar nas ri 
[\[301b.6\]]mtshams kyi gnas bdun po shin tu rub pa de dag tu 'ang snang ba'i tshul gyis kun tu 'char ro/_/de yang rin po che'i ri bdun po gser gyi mdog can de dag la nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan snang bas ri bdun gyi nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan ri mtshams bdun po de dag tu snang ba'i tshul gyis 'char 
[\[301b.7\]]bar 'gyur te/_ri mtshams bdun po de dag kyang gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pas/_de dag las kyang ri bdun po de dag la gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du nyi ma'i 'od 'char shing rnam par dmigs par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na gcig gis gcig snang bar 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]bya ba'i tshul du ri mtshams de dag tu nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan shar cing rin po che'i ri de dag la nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan 'byung bas de'i phyir rin po che'i ri rnams las nyi ma 'char zhes bya'o/_/de ltar gcig nas gcig tu snang 
[\[302a.2\]]ba rnam par dmigs par brgyud pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug pa med de/_de ltar snang ba yang dngos po yang ma yin/_dngos po ma yin pa'ang ma yin/_yod pa'ang ma yin/_med pa'ang ma yin/_ri rnams la gnas pa'ang ma yin 
[\[302a.3\]]nang du phyin pa 'ang ma yin/_phyi rol na gnas pa 'ang ma yin/_de dag dang bral bar gnas pa 'ang ma yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la 
[\[302a.4\]]gnas pa yang 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dmigs pa 'jig par yang mi byed do/_/chos rnams kyi rang bzhin yang yongs su mi spong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' de nyid 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nang du phyin pa 'ang ma yin no/_/byang chub sems 
[\[302a.5\]]dpa' de 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dmigs pa'i phyi rol na 'dug pa 'ang ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' de 'jig rten gyi khams la yang mi rtog ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de 'jig rten gyi khams la rnam par rtog pa 'ang ma yin no/_/byang chub sems 
[\[302a.6\]]dpa' de 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshan ma rnam par 'jig par byed pa yang ma yin no/_/chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid gcig po yang mtshan nyid med pa las rnam par mi zlog ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de yang chos rnam par dbye ba 'khrug par mi byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[302a.7\]]de de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin gnas pa de las kyang phyir mi ldog go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i gtsug lag mig 'phrul zhes bya ba 'jig rten na yod de/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po sgyu ma'i gtsug lag de la shin tu bslabs shing 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]nan tan tu byed byed pa rnams lam po che'i bzhi mdo dag tu 'khod cing 'gro ba'i tshogs chen po 'dus pa dag gi mdun du skad cig yud tsam du nyi ma gcig dang /_nyin zhag bdun dang zla ba phyed dang /_zla ba gcig dang zla ba gcig kyang ston to/_/lo gcig kyang 
[\[302b.2\]]ston to/_/lo brgya yang ston to/_/grong yang ston to/_/yul yang ston to/_chu klung gi rgyun kyang ston to/_/rgya mtsho yang ston to/_/sprin yongs su sdud pa yang ston to/_/sprin chen po las char 'bab pa yang ston to/_/gnam stong pa las char 'bab pa yang 
[\[302b.3\]]ston to/_/'jig rten gyi gnas rnam pa sna tshogs yang ston te/_de ltar bstan pas nyi ma gcig po 'jig par mi 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma gcig pos kyang nyin zhag dang zla ba dang lo de dag 'jig par mi 'gyur ro/_/yun ring pos kyang sgyu ma ston cing bsgrub pa zad 
[\[302b.4\]]par mi 'gyur te/_sgyu ma bstan pa'i dus kyis kyang yun ring po rnam par dmigs pa zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di la mnyam par gzhag pa yang 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[302b.5\]]gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa la 'jug pa rab tu ston to/_/rlung gi phung po dang /_me'i phung po dang /_chu'i phung po dang /_sa'i phung por bcas pa dang /_rgya mtsho dang gling du bcas pa dang /_rin po che'i ri dang ri rab dang khor 
[\[302b.6\]]yug dang /_btang bzung dang khor yug chen pos yongs su bskor bar bcas pa dang /_mi'i 'jig rten dang grong rdal dang yul gru dang /_grong gi gang par bcas pa dang /_bza' shing gi ra ba dang /_chu klung dang /_mtsho dang lteng kar bcas pa dang /_
[\[302b.7\]]lha'i gnas dang /_rgyan du bcas pa dang /_klu'i gnas su bcas pa dang /_gnod sbyin gyi gnas su bcas pa dang /_dri za'i gnas su bcas pa dang /_lha ma yin gyi gnas su bcas pa dang nam mkha' lding gi gnas su bcas pa dang /_mi 'am ci'i 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]gnas su bcas pa dang /_mi'i rgyan dang gnas su bcas pa dang /_'dod pa'i khams kyi yul dang bcas pa dang /_gzugs kyi khams kyi yul dang bcas pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams kyi yul dang bcas pa 
[\[303a.2\]]dang /_'jig rten gyi khams byur bur bcas pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams stong du bcas pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams stong gsum du bcas pa dang /_las dang rnam par smin par bcas pa dang /_shi 'pho dang skye bar bcas pa dang /_sems 
[\[303a.3\]]can du bcas pa dang yun ring por bcas pa dang /_yud tsam thang cig tu bcas pa dang /_nyi mar bcas pa dang /_dus mtshams su bcas pa dang /_zla ba dang lo dang lo brgyar bcas pa dang bskal pa dang /_'jig pa dang 'du bar bcas pa dang /_
[\[303a.4\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par dag pa dang /_yangs pa dang phra ba dang rgya che ba dang tshad med par bcas pa dang /_sangs rgyas skye bar bcas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor du bcas pa dang /_'dul ba'i sems can du bcas 
[\[303a.5\]]pa dang /_sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul dang thams cad du byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par bcas pa dang /_yul dang phyogs dang /_gzhi sna tshogs dang /_gnas snod du mas gang ba dang /_'gro ba'i rgyud sna 
[\[303a.6\]]tshogs dang /_sems can gyi ris bsam gyis mi khyab par bcas pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_da ltar byung ba dang /_rin po che sna tshogs dang /_rin po che du ma dang /_las dang rnam par smin pa sna tshogs rnam par 
[\[303a.7\]]dag par bcas pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams de dag la 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu 'jug pa'i tshe/_'jig rten na yod pa dang /_'jig rten du gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang ston to/_mthong bar byed do/_/shes par byed 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]do/_/rnam par dpyod do/_/rtogs par byed do/_/rab tu shes par byed do/_/khong du chud par byed do/_/de la yang dag par 'jug pa yang mi zad pa'i ye shes kyis thob par gyur par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma nor bar lta'o/_/'jig rten 
[\[303b.2\]]gyi khams kyi grangs de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag rnam par 'jig par mi byed de 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnam par 'jig par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni chos 
[\[303b.3\]]thams cad la srog med pa'i chos la yongs su rab tu zhugs pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' ni byed pa med pa'i chos la rab tu zhugs pas spyod pa thams cad la rlom sems med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni 'jig rten thams cad nyon mongs pa 
[\[303b.4\]]med pa'i chos la brtson pas bdag med pa la spyod pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' ni lus thams cad la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lta bas sems can med pa la spyod pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' ni 
[\[303b.5\]]skye ba dang 'jig pa thams cad chos kyi rgyud kyi rgyu las byung ba'i chos su rtogs pas gang zag med pa la spyod pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' ni chos kyi rang bzhin yang dag par blang ba la zhugs pas shed can dang shed las skyes pa med pa la 
[\[303b.6\]]gnas pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pas byed pa po med pa la spyod pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa rnam par phye ba gcig gis spyod pas rnam par 
[\[303b.7\]]mi rtog pa la spyod pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' ni chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i chos nyid kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' ni thabs kyi rnam grangs la mkhas shing sems can gdul ba la brtson 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]pas snying rje chen po la spyod pa yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi khams gcig rnam par gzhog pas 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dgod pa grangs med pa la 'jug go_/bskal pa 
[\[304a.2\]]grangs med pa'i rgyud rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'jug pa grangs med pa yang dag par mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas grangs med pa'i rjes su yang dag par 'brang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[304a.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis chos bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de la bdag yang dag par spyod par mthong ste/_'di nas kyang bdag gud du g.yo ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de dag dang bdag tu tha dad pa 
[\[304a.4\]]med par yang rab tu shes te/_chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas kyang rgyun chad pa med par rab tu 'jug go_/ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug cing /_phyir mi ldog pa 'ang rab tu shes te/_dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po des 'di la gnas shing sgyu 
[\[304a.5\]]ma thams cad ston kyang sgyu ma'i sprul pa des sa 'di skyon can du'ang mi 'gyur la/_sgyu ma'i sprin de dag gis kyang sa 'di rlan par mi 'gyur te/_sgyu ma'i nyi ma des mun pa'i grangs su bya ba 'di dag bstsal bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang 
[\[304a.6\]]chub sems dpa' yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yul la zhing du 'jug pa'ang byed/_'jig rten ma yin pa'i yul la 'jig rten yang rab tu shes/_gzugs med pa'i yul la gzugs su byin gyis rlob pa'ang shin tu ston te/_gcig gis 
[\[304a.7\]]gnyis pa yang 'jig par mi byed do/_/gnyis pas kyang gcig 'jig par mi byed do/_/de ni des 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad sgyu ma'i dra bar chos kyi rang bzhin la 'jug pas rab tu shes shing khong du chud pa dang /_ye shes 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]kyi rang bzhin la 'jug pa dang /_las kyi rang bzhin la 'jug pas khong du chud pa dang /_las kyi rang bzhin ye shes kyi rang bzhin du rab tu bsgrub pa dang /_ye shes kyi rang bzhin du las thams cad rab tu spyod pas de'i phyir rab tu 
[\[304b.2\]]shes so/_/'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po de ni sgyu ma'i rnam par ston na sa med par yongs su ston pa ma yin/_skye bo'i tshogs sna tshogs med par yongs su ston pa'ang ma yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[304b.3\]]dpa' yang nam mkha'i rang bzhin med par 'jig rten thams cad la yongs su 'jug pa 'ang ma yin/_'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa med par nam mkha'i rang bzhin la 'jug pa'ang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nam mkha'i rang 
[\[304b.4\]]bzhin yang 'jig rten dang tha mi dad/_'jig rten gyi rnam pa yang nam mkha'i rang bzhin dang tha mi dad de/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin de la 'jig rten gyi yul dang las sna tshogs kyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs la 
[\[304b.5\]]rab tu 'jug go_/mngon par sgrub bo/_/yang dag par lta'o/_/rnam par lta'o/_/khong du chud par byed do/_/rtog par byed do/_/goms par byed do/_/rjes su sgom mo/_/rab tu rtog go_/rnam par dpyod do/_/sems skad 
[\[304b.6\]]cig gis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i 'jig pa dang /_'du ba'i rnam pa yang rab tu shes so/_/bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rnam pa la brtson par bya ba yang rab tu shes so/_/skad cig gcig gis 
[\[304b.7\]]bskal pa de dag gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i dus thams cad dbang du byed do/_/sems skad cig re re la bskal pa dang dus rnam par dmigs pas mang du byed pa de yang lus las gzhan du mi byed de/_de yang de bzhin 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pa sgyu ma la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu slob cing yongs su grub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ye shes sgyu ma'i mthar phyin pa dang /_'jig rten sgyu ma'i grangs 
[\[305a.2\]]kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang /_chos thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa dang /_'jig rten dang 'gal ba med pa'i ye shes sgyu ma'i mthar phyin pa dang /_dus gsum sgyu ma tha mi dad par khong du chud pa dang /_mngon par shes pa sgyu 
[\[305a.3\]]ma nges par rtogs pa dang /_sems sgyu ma mtha' yas shing mu med pa la rab tu zhugs pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du yang dag par mos par byas pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten 
[\[305a.4\]]gyi khams thams cad la rab tu 'jug cing rnam par spyod kyang thams cad du chags pa med de/_kun la 'ang rlom sems med do/_/'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma byed pa ni mig 'phrul dang sgyu ma thams cad ston kyang yongs su ston pa yang med de/_
[\[305a.5\]]de la rmongs par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i pha rol tu 'ang phyin la chos la zhugs pas rlom pa yang med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems 
[\[305a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa'i ye shes yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag shar phyogs 
[\[305a.7\]]logs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 'das shing /_der sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag ji snyed 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]'das pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu'ang 'jig rten gyi khams la lar nyi ma rangs par snyoms par 'jug go_/la lar snga dro'i dus la lar nyi ma gung 
[\[305b.2\]]gi dus la lar phyi dro'i dus la lar snga dro'i thun gyi dus/_la lar nyi ma gung gi thun gyi dus/_la lar phyi dro'i thun gyi dus/_la lar skad cig gcig gi dus/_la lar yud tsam cig gi dus/_la lar thang cig gi dus/_la lar srod kyi dus 
[\[305b.3\]]la lar yud du yan man gyi dus/_la lar zla ba gcig gi dus/_la lar lo'i dus/_la lar lo brgya stong gi dus/_la lar lo bye ba brgya stong gi dus/_la lar lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi dus/_la lar bskal pa gcig gi dus/_
[\[305b.4\]]la lar bskal pa brgya'i dus/_la lar bskal pa stong gi dus/_la lar bskal pa brgya phrag stong gi dus/_la lar bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi dus/_la lar bskal pa tshad med pa'i dus/_la lar bskal pa dpag tu med 
[\[305b.5\]]pa'i dus/_la lar bskal pa mu med pa'i dus/_la lar bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i dus/_la lar bskal pa grangs med pa'i dus/_la lar bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus/_la lar bskal pa gzhal du med pa'i dus/_
[\[305b.6\]]la lar bskal pa bgrang du med pa'i dus/_la lar bskal pas mtshams med pa'i dus/_la lar bskal pa brjod du med pa'i dus su snyoms par 'jug kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' des chos sgyu ma de dag ring du gnas par sems par 
[\[305b.7\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/dus gzhan du rjes su 'brang bar yang mi sems te/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dus rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs de dag la mngon par chags par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/mngon par zhen pa yang mi byed do/_/dbang du yang mi byed do/_/
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]mi rtog go_/rnam par mi rtog go_/chos thams cad la nyams pa med par gzhol bas byams pa'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa yin/_ting nge 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/
[\[306a.2\]]'di lta ste dper na/_lha'i bu nyi ma ni nyin par snang bar byed cing 'gro yang /_nyin par dang yang 'grogs pa med/_mtshan mo dang yang mi 'grogs so/_/'gro ba'i tshe 'ang nyin mor snang la/_nub nas 
[\[306a.3\]]kyang mtshan mor snang ngo /_/'on kyang nyin par yang skyed pa med la mtshan mo yang gshig pa med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag tu snyoms par zhugs shing /_
[\[306a.4\]]grangs su brjod pas rnam par ston to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa'i ye shes zhing 'byam klas pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rjes su song ba 
[\[306a.5\]]zhes bya ba ste gsum pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sems can gyi lus sangs rgyas kyi skur mngon par mos par byed de/_des de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mang 
[\[306a.6\]]po mthong bas 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la spos kyi rnam pa'i mchog thams cad kyis mchod pa byed do/_/me tog sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba thams cad kyis mchod pa byed do/_/zhing yangs 
[\[306a.7\]]pa'i rnam pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod pa byed do/_/rgyan gyi rnam par 'gro ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byed do/_/'gro ba thams cad kyi rin po che sna tshogs tshad med pas kun tu 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]yog pa'i rnam pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byed do/_/rgyan rnam par phye ba'i tshogs kyi rnam pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byed do/_/nor bu rin po che sna tshogs dam pa'i gtsug lag khang gi rnam pa grangs med pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byed do/_/lha rdzas las 
[\[306b.2\]]kyang 'das pa'i man bstsal dang /_zhal zas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnam pa dam pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa 
[\[306b.3\]]ma lus pa sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba dang /_mchod pa'i rnam par gtogs pas sangs rgyas thams cad la rim gro bya ba'i tshul dang ldan par mchod pa byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi zhabs la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing lus 
[\[306b.4\]]thams cad kyis rab tu 'bebs so/_/rje sar zhu ba rnams kyang byed de/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang shin tu rtogs par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yang rab tu 'dzin to/_/sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid kyang khong du chud par byed 
[\[306b.5\]]do/_/de bzhin nyid la yang yang dag par 'jug pas rab tu 'jug go_/snying rje chen po'i rjes su 'brang ba 'ang rab tu byed do/_/chags pa med pa'i stobs rab tu spel ba la'ang mngon par mos shing /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs 
[\[306b.6\]]su 'thob par byed do/_/sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo'i rjes su yang rab tu 'brang ste/_skad cig gcig gis mthar yang rab tu 'jug go_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag 'byung ba'i tshe'ang skye ba mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[306b.7\]]de dag mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe'ang 'jig pa mi dmigs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_g.yeng ba'i sems kyis yul rnam par dmigs pa ni gzugs las kyang ma byung dmigs pa las kyang ma byung 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]ngo /_/sems rnam par mi dmigs pa'i tshe'ang mi dmigs pa gang las kyang 'gag par mi 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag 'byung ba'i 
[\[307a.2\]]tshe 'byung ba mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mya ngan las 'da' pa'i tshe'ang 'jig par mi dmigs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_nyi ma'i gung la smig rgyu ba snang ba ni sprin las byung ba'ang ma yin/_rgya mtsho las 
[\[307a.3\]]byung ba 'ang ma yin/_sprin la gnas pa yang ma yin/_sa la gnas pa yang ma yin/_phyogs nas byung ba yang ma yin/_dge ba yang ma yin/_mi dge ba yang ma yin/_dad pa yang ma yin/_rnyog pa can yang ma yin/_btung ba 
[\[307a.4\]]yang ma yin/_bdo ba yang ma yin/_dngos po yod pa yang ma yin/_dngos po med pa yang ma yin/_ro dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_rnam par dmigs pa dang rnam par mi dmigs pa'i grangs su yang mi chud na/_de'i rkyen gyis rnam par shes 
[\[307a.5\]]par gdags pa 'ang yod de/_smig rgyu pa'i rgyud ji lta ba de bzhin du chu klung gi 'du shes skye ste/_rgyang ring po nas 'du shes dang rnam par shes pa skye'o/_/nye bar bsnyen na 'jig cing smig rgyu bar rnam par dmigs pa yang med do/_/kye rgyal 
[\[307a.6\]]ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag skye ba'i tshe'ang skye bar mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe 'ang 'jig par mi dmigs kyang mtshan yod pas sangs 
[\[307a.7\]]rgyas la sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyis rnam par dmigs so/_/mtshan [{]myed [,]med [}]pas mtshan med pa'i mtshan mas mi dmigs te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]'dzin lhag pa'i bsam pa gtsang mas spyod pa zhes bya ba ste/_de la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par langs kyang de ni 'jig pa med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_mi gnyid kyis log pa rmi lam rmis nas sad de 
[\[307b.2\]]mtshan ma yid kyis zin la dran zhing rmi lam bsgribs pa med pa rnam par dmigs pa ni sad kyang rmi lam rjes su dran pas yongs su dran no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[307b.3\]]kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba'i mtshan ma yang yongs su 'jig par mi byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos blangs pa rnams kyang yang dag par 'dzin to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par yang bsam 
[\[307b.4\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan kyang rjes su 'thob par byed do/_/don gyi tshul yang rnam par 'phel bar byed do/_/chos thams cad kyi tshul yang rnam pa du mar yongs su sbyong ngo /_/ye shes kyi sgron 
[\[307b.5\]]ma yang shin tu yangs par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyang rnam par 'phel bar byed do/_/mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa yang rab tu brjod do/_/tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mi zad pa'ang rab tu ston to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[307b.6\]]dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa'i ye shes bzhi pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[307b.7\]]rnams kyi 'od la rab tu 'jug go/_bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas/_zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa khong du chud par byed do/_/zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rab tu shes so/_/
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas chos bstan pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rab tu shes so/_/chos gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas/_bsam pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rab tu shes so/_/
[\[308a.2\]]bsam pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas/_dbang po gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rab tu shes so/_/dbang po gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas/_'dul ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rab tu shes so/_/'dul ba gcig nas gcig tu 
[\[308a.3\]]brgyud pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku tshe gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rab tu shes so/_/sku tshe gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas/_lo grangs bye ba khrag khrig gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rab tu shes pa ste/_de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[308a.4\]]rnams kyi ye shes mtha' yas pa 'dab chags par rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du 'das pa'i zhing rnams 'dab chags par rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du 'das pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs rnams 'dab chags par rab tu shes so/_/de 
[\[308a.5\]]bzhin du 'das pa'i bskal pa rnams 'dab chags par rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du 'das pa'i chos rnams 'dab chags par rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du 'das pa'i sems can rnams 'dab chags par rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin 
[\[308a.6\]]du 'das pa'i mos pa rnams 'dab chags par rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du 'das pa'i sems can gyi spyod pa rnams 'dab chags par rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du 'das pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams 'dab chags par rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin 
[\[308a.7\]]du 'das pa'i bag chags rnams 'dab chags par rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du 'das pa'i rnam par byang ba rnam par dag pa rnams 'dab chags par rab tu shes so/_/de dag ting nge 'dzin 'das pa rnam par dag pa'i snying po zhes bya ba la snyoms 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]par 'jug ste/_sems bskyed pa gcig gis bskal pa brgya phrag stong la 'jug go_/de dang 'dab chags pa'i sems mtha' yas pas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong la 'jug go_/bskal pa tshad med pa la 'jug go_/bskal pa dpag tu med 
[\[308b.2\]]pa la 'jug go_/bskal pa gzhal du med pa la 'jug go_/bskal pa mu med pa la 'jug go_/bskal pas mtshams med pa la 'jug go_/bskal pa grangs med pa la 'jug go_/bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug go_/bskal pa 
[\[308b.3\]]dpag gis mi khyab pa la 'jug go_/bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la 'jug go_/de dag ting nge 'dzin da ltar byung ba 'gag pa med pa la 'das pa ma skyes shing bsgribs pa med pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par 'jug ste/_ting nge 'dzin de la 
[\[308b.4\]]de dag chos bcus dbang bskur ba yin/_de dag de las langs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbang bskur ba'i chos bcu po de dag la bsam gyis mi khyab par yang dag par 'jug go_/rab tu 'thob par byed do/_/shin tu brtson 
[\[308b.5\]]par byed do/_/yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/thogs pa med par yongs su khong du chud par byed do/_/rtogs par byed do/_/rjes su 'thob par byed do/_/yongs su rgyas par byed do/_/yongs su 'dzin to/_/'khor gsum la 
[\[308b.6\]]rab tu zhugs pas mnyam pa nyid du 'dzin par byed do/_/bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chud mi za ba dang /_'phral du bsgrub pa ma yin pa'i 
[\[308b.7\]]spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa dang /_gcad du med pa'i chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams la rang byung ba dang /_sems can med pa'i tshig rab tu brten pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 'jug 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]pa'i tshul dang /_khams gsum pa'i dam pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rdul gcig gi tshad du ston pa ste/_des de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rdul brgya'i bar gyi tshad du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rdul stong gi tshad 
[\[309a.2\]]du rab tu mthong ngo /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rgyang grags tsam du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad phyed tsam du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad gcig tsam du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin 
[\[309a.3\]]gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad bcu tsam du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad brgya tsam du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad brgya stong tsam du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[309a.4\]]sku 'dzam bu'i gling tsam du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[309a.5\]]pa'i sku stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'jig rten gyi khams brgya'i tshad du 
[\[309a.6\]]rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi tshad du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong gi tshad du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'jig 
[\[309a.7\]]rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong gi tshad du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa'i tshad du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i tshad du rab tu mthong 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i tshad du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i tshad du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[309b.2\]]mu med pa'i tshad du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshad du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa'i tshad du rab tu mthong ngo /_/
[\[309b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i tshad du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'jig rten gyi khams bgrang du med pa'i tshad du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[309b.4\]]sa mtshams med pa'i tshad du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i tshad du rab tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i tshad du rab tu mthong 
[\[309b.5\]]ngo de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de lta bu'i kha dog tshad med par rab tu mthong ngo /_/de lta bu'i sku gzugs tshad med par rab tu mthong ngo /_/de lta bu'i mtshan tshad med par rab tu mthong ngo /_/de lta bu'i 'od tshad 
[\[309b.6\]]med par rab tu mthong ngo /_/de lta bu'i 'od gzer gyi dra ba snang ba tshad med par rab tu mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings tshad med par rab tu mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med par rab tu mthong ngo /_/chos kyi 
[\[309b.7\]]dbyings thams cad ye shes kyis khong du chud par rab tu mthong ngo /_/chags pa med pa'i lus rab tu mthong ngo /_/bsgribs pa med pa'i rnam par dag pa rab tu mthong ngo /_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]rab tu mthong yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de rnam par 'phel bar yang mi byed/_'grib par yang mi byed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' ni yungs kar srin bus zos 
[\[310a.2\]]pa'i sbubs kyis chung ngu byas pa yang ma yin/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshams de dag gis yangs par byas pa yang ma yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 
[\[310a.3\]]yang lta ba rgya chen pos yangs par byas pa 'ang ma yin/_lta ba rgya chung ngus bltas pas chung ngu byas pa yang ma yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni 'dzam bu'i gling nas lta bas chung ngu byas 
[\[310a.4\]]pa 'ang ma yin/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te bltas pas cher byas pa 'ang ma yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas shing sangs rgyas de dag mthong bar 
[\[310a.5\]]yang 'gyur la/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de dag kyang 'jig par mi byed do/_/bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang sangs rgyas mthong bar byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi gsung de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs kyis chos ji snyed du brjod 
[\[310a.6\]]cing bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu 'dzin cing shes par byed pa yin/_rab tu shes par byed pa yin/_nyams pa med pa'i chos la 'ang rab tu rten pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_sems can rnams 
[\[310a.7\]]kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba ni sems la gsol ba gdab pa med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyan dang sangs rgyas rnam par dmigs pa yang nan tan bya mi dgos 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]par rnam par 'dag ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni myur ba bcu dang ldan pa yin/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_spyod pa la yang dag par byung bas yongs su rdzogs par bya ba myur du yongs su rdzogs 
[\[310b.2\]]par byed pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos snang bas 'jig rten myur du snang bar byed pa yin/_chos kyi 'khor lo'i thabs mkhas pas sems can myur du yongs su smin par byed pa yin/_las 
[\[310b.3\]]ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing myur du yongs su sbyong ba yin/_stobs bcu mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes myur du gnon pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang myur du 'grogs pa yin/_
[\[310b.4\]]byams pa chen po'i stobs kyis bdud kyi dkrugs ma myur du 'joms pa yin/_the tsom yongs su gcod pas sems can thams cad myur du tshim par byed pa yin/_mos pa dang 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par 'phrul ba myur du yang dag 
[\[310b.5\]]par ston pa yin/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sgra skad sna tshogs rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang myur du ldan par 'gyur ba yin/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni chos thams cad la byang chub sems 
[\[310b.6\]]dpa'i rgya bcus btab pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[310b.7\]]de ni mtha' dang dbus med pa'i lus kyis ye shes kyi rang bzhin gcig pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pas spyod pa gcig pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni gnyis su med pa yang dag 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]par blang ba la rtogs par bzhag pas dkyil 'khor tshad med pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes pas chags pa med pa'i yul dang ldan pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni stobs 
[\[311a.2\]]bcu'i snang ba thob pas bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni mi gnyis pa la yang dag par spyod pas dgang sla ba yin/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir 
[\[311a.3\]]yongs su rgyun 'chad pa med pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni don shes shing mkhas par bya ba la shin tu rtogs par bzhag pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mi gnyis pa yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/
[\[311a.4\]]'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa'i ye shes kyi tshul sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rnam par bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyan ces bya ba ste/_ting nge 'dzin de dang ldan pa'i byang chub 
[\[311a.5\]]sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la slob dpon med pa yin/_'gro ba thams cad du 'gro ba'i rtsal yod pas gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yin/_sems rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing dag pa dang ldan pas shin tu dag pa 
[\[311a.6\]]yin/_'jig rten thams cad yongs su 'grel ba la zhugs pas thu bo dam pa yin/_skye dgu thams cad la bsam pa thag pa nas phan pa yin/_ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs rab tu bsgrub pa yin/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo la rab tu 
[\[311a.7\]]gzhog pa yin/_gnyis su med par smra zhing nor ba med par khong du chud par ston pas de kho na nyid la mkhas pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod rab tu btang ba yin/_sems can gyi ris rnams su bsam pa ji lta ba 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]bzhin du chos kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_brgya byin mngon par dga' ba'i nor bu rin po che ni/_lha'i rgyal po'i spyi bo la btags na/_nor bu de'i byin gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[311b.2\]]'od dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/_nor bu rin po che bdog pas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin chos bcus sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha thams cad zil gyis gnon te/_bcu gang zhe na/_sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan thams cad kyi lha rdzas 
[\[311b.3\]]las 'das pa'i mdog dang /_lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gzugs dang /_lha rdzas las 'das pa'i blta na mdzes pa dang /_lha rdzas las 'das pa'i 'khor dang /_lha rdzas las 'das pa'i longs spyod dang /_lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rdzu 
[\[311b.4\]]'phrul dang /_lha rdzas las 'das pa'i dbang chen po dang /_lha rdzas las 'das pa'i spyod pa dang /_lha rdzas las 'das pa'i blo gros dang /_lha rdzas las 'das pa'i shes rab ste/_de ni lha rdzas las 'das pa'i bsod nams rab tu 
[\[311b.5\]]grub pas nor bu rin po che de thob pa'i phyir ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de yang ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pas ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yangs pa'i gter chen po bcu 'thob bo/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste 
[\[311b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar bya ba'i ye shes rab tu 'thob bo/_/'di lta ste sems can gyi khams thams cad du skye zhing 'byung ba'i ye shes rab tu 'thob bo/_/'di lta ste/_dus gsum du sprul pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i ye shes 
[\[311b.7\]]rab tu 'thob bo/_/'di lta ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i ye shes rab tu 'thob bo/_/'di lta ste/_chos thams cad rtogs par rig pa'i ye shes rab tu 'thob bo/_/'di lta ste/_chos thams cad nye bar ston pa'i chos 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]shin tu brjod pa'i ye shes rab tu 'thob bo/_/'di lta ste/_'gro ba thams cad khongs su cha chos kyi lus kyi ye shes rab tu 'thob bo/_/'di lta ste/_chos thams cad mngon du gyur cing kun tu mthong ba'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]
[\[312a.2\]]gi ye shes rnam par dag pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/'di lta ste/_dbang thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes rab tu 'thob bo/_/'di lta ste/_chos 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus par khong du chud pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/ting nge 'dzin 'di 
[\[312a.3\]]thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de rnam par dmigs pa thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par brgyan par bya ba'i phyir dag pa'i lus bcu 'thob bo/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi khams brjod du 
[\[312a.4\]]med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snang bar bya ba'i phyir/_'od kyi dkyil 'khor brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rab tu 'gyed do/_/'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir/_kha dog du ma dang /_kha dog 
[\[312a.5\]]sna tshogs dang /_'od kyi dkyil 'khor brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par byin gyis rlob po/_/'di lta ste/_sems can byin gyis brlab cing gdul ba'i phyir 'od gzer gyi dkyil 'khor brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rab 
[\[312a.6\]]tu 'gyed do/_/'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyan sngar 'gro ba'i phyir lus brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par byin gyis rlob bo/_/'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur bar bya ba'i phyir/_spos dang me tog sna 
[\[312a.7\]]tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i sprin du ma brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i char mngon par 'bebs so/_/'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba dang /_sems can gdul ba'i phyir ba spu'i khung bu re rer yang rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba dang 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]brgya phrag du ma yid du 'ong zhing rgya che ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par byin gyis rlob bo/_/'di lta ste sems can mos pa'i tshul bzhin yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_sprul pa'i rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pa dang /_khyu 
[\[312b.2\]]mchog gi mthu dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprul pa du ma brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la rab tu rten to/_/'di lta ste/_/phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs yongs su dri ba'i phyir gom pa re res 'jig rten 
[\[312b.3\]]gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yongs su 'da' bar byed do/_/'di lta ste/_mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_mchod pa thams cad don yod par bya ba'i phyir spyi gtsug bltar mi snang ba'i lus rnam par dag pa dang /_
[\[312b.4\]]gzugs dang mtshan sna tshogs rnam par dag pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rab tu 'thob po/_/'di lta ste/_sgra skad sna tshogs dang /_sgra skad du mas 'gro ba rnams rnam par bstan pa'i phyir/_sgra dang skad dang nga ro dang /_
[\[312b.5\]]dbyangs kyi yan lag brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rab tu brjod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi gzi brjid phun sum tshogs shing /_rnam par dag pa bcu rab tu 'thob po/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems 
[\[312b.6\]]can byin gyis brlab pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba bcu rab tu 'thob ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir/_sems can rnams byin gyis rlob bo/_/'di lta ste/_sangs 
[\[312b.7\]]rgyas la dad pa rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i phyir/_sems can rnams byin gyis rlob bo/_/'di lta ste/_chos nyan cing khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/_sems can rnams byin gyis rlob po/_/'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i 'jig 
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]rten gyi khams bstan pa'i phyir sems can rnams byin gyis rlob po/_/'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir sems can rnams byin gyis rlob bo/_/'di lta ste las ji ltar bstsags pa bzhin 
[\[313a.2\]]du rjes su dran par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams byin gyis rlob bo/_/'di lta ste/_rtse gcig tu 'gyur ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams byin gyis rlob bo/_/'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi cha byad rnam par dag par bya ba'i 
[\[313a.3\]]phyir sems can rnams byin gyis rlob bo/_/'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi sems la yang dag par 'jug par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams byin gyis rlob bo/_/'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/
[\[313a.4\]]sems can rnams byin gyis rlob bo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de sems can byin gyis brlab pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar byang chub 
[\[313a.5\]]sems dpa' sems can byin gyis brlab pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas nas sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu byed de/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni thos pas kyang sems can 
[\[313a.6\]]rnams yongs su smin par byed pas sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa yin/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' ni mthong bas kyang sems can 'dul ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa yin/_
[\[313a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' ni rjes su dran pas kyang sems rnam par dag par 'gyur bas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' ni 'jig rten gyi khams skyong bas kyang ngan song gsum rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/_
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' ni byin gyi rlabs kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[313b.2\]]ni rmi lam du mthong bas kyang sems can rnams kyi dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'gyed pas kyang sems can rnams kyi dran 
[\[313b.3\]]pa nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston pas kyang sems can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par la rab tu gzhog 
[\[313b.4\]]pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par 'tshang rgya bas kyang sems can rnams chos khong du chud par rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa yin/_byang chub sems 
[\[313b.5\]]dpa' ni mya ngan las 'das pa ston pas kyang sems can mi dga' ba bstan pas shin tu rtogs par byed pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems can 
[\[313b.6\]]rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu byed pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ting nge 'dzin chen po lus yang dag par 'dres pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par 'jug ste/_lus yang 
[\[313b.7\]]dag par 'dres pa des mi gnas pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la mi gnas pa dang /_phyogs thams cad la mi gnas pa dang /_bskal pa thams cad la 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]mi gnas pa dang /_sems can thams cad la mi gnas pa dang /_chos thams cad la mi gnas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la mi gnas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i smon 
[\[314a.2\]]lam thams cad la mi gnas pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la mi gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la mi gnas pa dang /_sa thams cad la mi gnas pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' lus yang dag par 'dres pa'i 
[\[314a.3\]]ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i tshe/_gnas med pa bcu po 'di dag rab tu 'thob bo//_//sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[314a.4\]]sems can thams cad kyi lus yang dag par 'dres pa la mnyam par gzhog ce na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di la byang chub sems dpa' nang gi lus su snyoms par zhugs shing phyi rol gyi lus las rnam par ldang ngo /_/phyi rol gyi lus 
[\[314a.5\]]su snyoms par zhugs shing /_nang gi lus las rnam par ldang ngo /_/lus gcig tu snyoms par zhugs shing /_lus tha dad pa las rnam par ldang ngo /_/lus tha dad pa la snyoms par zhugs shing [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]lus las rnam par ldang ngo /_/mi'i lus su snyoms par 
[\[314a.6\]]zhugs shing /_gnod sbyin gyi lus las rnam par ldang ngo /_/gnod sbyin gyi lus su snyoms par zhugs shing /_klu'i lus las rnam par ldang ngo /_/klu'i lus su snyoms par zhugs shing /_lha ma yin gyi lus las rnam par ldang 
[\[314a.7\]]ngo /_/lha ma yin gyi lus su snyoms par zhugs shing /_lha'i lus las rnam par ldang ngo /_/lha'i lus su snyoms par zhugs shing /_tshangs pa'i lus las rnam par ldang ngo /_/tshangs pa'i lus su snyoms par zhugs shing /_'dod 
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]pa'i khams nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/'dod pa'i khams nas snyoms par zhugs shing /_mtho ris kyi 'jig rten nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du snyoms par zhugs shing /_sems can dmyal ba nas rnam par 
[\[314b.2\]]ldang ngo /_/sems can dmyal bar snyoms par zhugs shing /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]khams nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/[{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]khams la snyoms par zhugs shing /_de ma yin pa'i lam gyi rgyud gzhan nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/de ma yin pa'i lam 
[\[314b.3\]]gyi rgyud la snyoms par zhugs shing /_lus stong las rnam par ldang ngo /_/lus stong la snyoms par zhugs shing /_lus gcig las rnam par ldang ngo /_/lus gcig la snyoms par zhugs shing /_lus 
[\[314b.4\]]bye ba las rnam par ldang ngo /_/lus bye ba la snyoms par zhugs shing /_lus gcig las rnam par ldang ngo /_/lus gcig la snyoms par zhugs shing /_lus khrag khrig las rnam par ldang ngo /_/lus khrag khrig la 
[\[314b.5\]]snyoms pa zhugs shing /_'dzam bu'i gling du gtogs pa'i sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/'dzam bu'i gling du gtogs pa'i sems can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_nub kyi ban lang spyod du gtogs pa'i sems can las 
[\[314b.6\]]rnam par ldang ngo /_/nub phyogs kyi ban lang spyod du gtogs pa'i sems can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_byang gi sgra mi snyan du gtogs pa'i sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/byang gi sgra mi snyan du gtogs pa'i sems 
[\[314b.7\]]can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_shar gyi lus 'phags por gtogs pa'i sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/shar gyi lus 'phags por gtogs pa'i sems can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_gling gsum du gtogs pa'i 
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/gling gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_gling gnyis su gtogs pa'i sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/gling gnyis su gtogs pa'i sems 
[\[315a.2\]]can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_gling bzhir gtogs pa'i sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/gling bzhir gtogs pa'i sems can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/rgya mtshor 
[\[315a.3\]]gtogs pa'i sems can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_rgya mtsho'i lha'i lus las rnam par ldang ngo /_/rgya mtsho'i lha'i lus su snyoms par zhugs shing /_rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i chu'i phung po las rnam par ldang ngo /_/rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i chu'i 
[\[315a.4\]]phung po la snyoms par zhugs shing /_rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sa'i phung po las rnam par ldang ngo /_/rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sa'i phung po la snyoms par zhugs shing /_rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]phung po las rnam par ldang ngo /_/rgya mtshor 
[\[315a.5\]]gtogs pa'i me'i phung po la snyoms par zhugs shing /_rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i rlung gi phung po las rnam par ldang ngo /_/rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i rlung gi phung po la snyoms par zhugs shing /_'byung ba chen po bzhi las rnam par ldang ngo /_/
[\[315a.6\]]'byung ba chen po bzhi la snyoms par zhugs shing /_chos 'byung ba med pa las rnam par ldang ngo /_/chos 'byung ba med pa la snyoms par zhugs shing /_ri rab las rnam par ldang ngo /_/ri rab la snyoms par zhugs shing /_rin po 
[\[315a.7\]]che'i ri bdun las rnam par ldang ngo /_/rin po che'i ri bdun la snyoms par zhugs shing /_rin po che'i rgyan bdun las rnam par ldang ngo /_/rin po che'i rgyan bdun la snyoms par zhugs shing /_sa bon dang lo tog dang /_sa dang shing dang ri nag po sna tshogs 
[\[315b\]]
