[\[315b.1\]]las rnam par ldang ngo /_/sa bon dang /_lo tog dang sa dang shing dang /_ri nag po la snyoms par zhugs shing /_me tog bzang po dang dri zhim po dang rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i ri las rnam par ldang ngo /_/me tog bzang po dang dri zhim po dang rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i ri la 
[\[315b.2\]]snyoms par zhugs shing /_gling bzhi par gtogs pa'i bla dang 'og thams cad dang /_sems can rnam par phye ba thams cad kyi skye gnas las rnam par ldang ngo /_/gling bzhi bar gtogs pa'i bla dang 'og thams cad dang sems can rnam par phye ba thams cad kyi 
[\[315b.3\]]skye gnas la snyoms par zhugs shing /_stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_stong gnyis kyi 
[\[315b.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/
[\[315b.5\]]stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[315b.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig phrag brgyar gtogs pa'i sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[315b.7\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig phrag brgyar gtogs pa'i sems can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_bye ba brgya phrag stong du gtogs pa'i sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong du gtogs pa'i 
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]sems can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_'jig rten gyi khams tshad med par gtogs pa'i sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams tshad med par 
[\[316a.2\]]gtogs pa'i sems can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par gtogs pa'i sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par gtogs pa'i sems 
[\[316a.3\]]can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med par gtogs pa'i sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med par gtogs pa'i sems can la snyoms par zhugs 
[\[316a.4\]]shing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par gtogs pa'i sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par gtogs pa'i sems can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_sangs 
[\[316a.5\]]rgyas kyi zhing mu med par gtogs pa'i sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mu med par gtogs pa'i sems can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_'jig rten gyi khams gzhal 
[\[316a.6\]]du med par gtogs pa'i sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med par gtogs pa'i sems can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[316a.7\]]bsam gyis mi khyab par gtogs pa'i sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab par gtogs pa'i sems can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_'jig rten gyi 
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]khams dpag gis mi lang bar gtogs pa'i sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams dpag gis mi lang bar gtogs pa'i sems can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med 
[\[316b.2\]]pa'i sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i sems can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par gtogs pa'i sems can las rnam par 
[\[316b.3\]]ldang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par gtogs pa'i sems can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems 
[\[316b.4\]]can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_rnam par byang ba'i sems can las rnam par ldang ngo /_/rnam par byang ba'i sems can la snyoms par zhugs shing /_mig gi skye mched las rnam par ldang ngo /_/mig gi skye mched la snyoms 
[\[316b.5\]]par zhugs shing /_rna ba'i skye mched las rnam par ldang ngo /_/rna ba'i skye mched la snyoms par zhugs shing /_sna'i skye mched las rnam par ldang ngo /_/sna'i skye mched la snyoms par zhugs shing /_lce'i skye mched las rnam par 
[\[316b.6\]]ldang ngo /_/lce'i skye mched la snyoms par zhugs shing /_lus kyi skye mched las rnam par ldang ngo /_/lus kyi skye mched la snyoms par zhugs shing /_reg gi skye mched las rnam par ldang ngo /_/reg gi skye mched la snyoms par 
[\[316b.7\]]zhugs shing /_ro'i skye mched las rnam par ldang ngo /_/ro'i skye mched la snyoms par zhugs shing /_dri'i skye mched las rnam par ldang ngo /_/dri'i skye mched la snyoms par zhugs shing /_sgra'i skye mched las rnam par 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]ldang ngo /_/sgra'i skye mched la snyoms par zhugs shing /_gzugs kyi skye mched las rnam par ldang ngo /_/gzugs kyi skye mched la snyoms par zhugs shing /_rdul shin tu phra ba gcig las rnam par ldang ngo /_/rdul 
[\[317a.2\]]shin tu phra ba gcig la snyoms par zhugs shing /_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba rnam par phye ba las rnam par ldang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba rnam par phye ba la snyoms par 
[\[317a.3\]]zhugs shing /_nyan thos las rnam par ldang ngo /_/nyan thos la snyoms par zhugs shing /_rang sangs rgyas las rnam par ldang ngo /_/rang sangs rgyas la snyoms par zhugs shing /_rang gi lus las rnam par ldang ngo /_/rang gi 
[\[317a.4\]]lus la snyoms par zhugs shing /_sangs rgyas kyi sku las rnam par ldang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi sku la snyoms par zhugs shing /_sems kyi skad cig gcig las rnam par ldang ngo /_/sems kyi skad cig gcig la snyoms par 
[\[317a.5\]]zhugs shing /_bskal pa bye ba las rnam par ldang ngo /_/bskal pa bye ba la snyoms par zhugs shing /_sngon gyi mtha' las rnam par ldang ngo /_/sngon gyi mtha' la snyoms par zhugs shing /_phyi ma'i mtha' las rnam par ldang ngo /_/
[\[317a.6\]]phyi ma'i mtha' la snyoms par zhugs shing /_da ltar byung ba'i mtha' las rnam par ldang ngo /_/da ltar byung ba'i mtha' la snyoms par zhugs shing /_dus gsum las rnam par ldang ngo /_/dus gsum la snyoms par zhugs shing /_
[\[317a.7\]]skad cig gi mtha' las rnam par ldang ngo /_/skad cig gi mtha' la snyoms par zhugs shing /_dus gsum las rnam par ldang ngo /_/dus gsum la snyoms par zhugs shing /_phyogs bcu nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/phyogs bcur snyoms 
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]par zhugs shing /_ngag gi lam las rnam par ldang ngo /_/ngag gi lam la snyoms par zhugs shing /_phyogs bcu nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_'byung po'i gnod sbyin gyis non pa'i mi 
[\[317b.2\]]ni gnod sbyin gyi dbang gis lus de dang der gyur cing 'phyan te rang la dbang med do/_/'byung po'i gnod sbyin de yang gzhan gyi lus kyi dbang gis 'gro ste/_bdag gi lus mi ston to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/_de bzhin 
[\[317b.3\]]du ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nang du snyoms par zhugs shing /_phyi rol las rnam par ldang ngo /_/phyi rol du snyoms par zhugs shing /_nang nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/'di lta ste dper na/_shi ba'i ro sngags 
[\[317b.4\]]kyi byin gyis brlabs pa ni 'gro zhing rgyu'o/_/gang gi phyir yongs su bslab pa de la yang ci dga' ba thob par byed de shi ba'i ro de dang sngags su yang gcig pa ma yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du/_ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa'i byang chub 
[\[317b.5\]]sems dpa' yang dmigs pa skal pa mnyam par snyoms par zhugs shing /_skal pa mi mnyam pa'i dmigs pa las rnam par ldang ngo /_/skal pa mi mnyam pa'i dmigs pa la snyoms par zhugs shing /_skal pa mnyam pa'i dmigs 
[\[317b.6\]]pa las rnam par ldang ngo /_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste/_dge slong dbang thob pa ni gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur ro/_/mang por gyur cing gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/lus gcig nas shi 'phos te/_de'i tshe lus mang po de 
[\[317b.7\]]dag tu skyes pa 'ang ma yin/_lus mang po de dag las shi 'phos te/_de'i tshe lus gcig tu skyes pa 'ang ma yin no/_/gcig tu gyur pa las shi 'phos te/_mang por skyes pa 'ang ma yin/_mang por gyur pa las shi 'phos te/_gcig 
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]tu gyur pa 'ang ma yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang lus gcig tu snyoms par zhugs shing /_lus mang po las rnam par ldang ngo /_/lus mang po la snyoms par zhugs shing /_lus 
[\[318a.2\]]gcig las rnam par ldang ngo /_/'di lta ste dper na/_sa gcig gi ro ni rnam pa gcig pa ste/_lo tog mang po dang /_'byung ba mang po sna tshogs su rang gi ro kun tu gtong yang /_sa'i ro dus dus su rnam pa tha dad par 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/
[\[318a.3\]]de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa yang rnam pa gcig la snyoms par zhugs shing /_rnam pa mang po las rnam par ldang ngo /_/rnam pa mang po la snyoms par zhugs shing /_rnam pa gcig las rnam par ldang ngo /_/kye rgyal 
[\[318a.4\]]ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can rnams kyi khams tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba ste brgyad pa'o/_/de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rab tu bsngags 
[\[318a.5\]]pa'i chos bcus rab tu bsngags pa yin bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_de bzhin nyid la mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad khong du chud par rtogs pas sangs rgyas zhes bya/_'jig rten 
[\[318a.6\]]thams cad la rab tu ston pas ston pa zhes bya/_chos thams cad shes par gyur pas/_thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya/_'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pas mgon zhes bya/_chos thams cad kyi tshul rjes su rtogs pas 'dren pa zhes bya/_
[\[318a.7\]]sems can thams cad la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun tu byin par byed pas/_rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya/_'gro ba thams cad du snang ba'i sgron mar gyur pas snang ba zhes bya/_don grub ste bya ba byas la chos thams cad rab tu phye ba shes shing 
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]chags pa med pa la spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pas/_stobs bcu mnga' ba zhes bya/_chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad la dbang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas thams cad gzigs pa zhes bya ba ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' de 
[\[318b.2\]]ni rab tu bsngags pa'i chos 'di bcus rab tu bsngags pa yin byang chub sems dpa' de ni snang ba bcus snang bar byas pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snang ba dang /_sems can gyi khams yang dag par blangs te/_rnam par brgyan 
[\[318b.3\]]cing byin gyis brlabs pa'i snang ba dang /_gdul zhing byin gyis brlabs pa'i snang bas sems can thams cad kyi snang ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du ston pas mi 'jigs pa tshad med pa'i snang ba dang chos thams cad 
[\[318b.4\]]la tha dad par byed pa med pas tha dad par byed pa med pa'i snang ba dang /_chos thams cad 'dod chags dang bral bar khong du chud pas tshul la 'jug pa'i snang ba dang /_chos thams cad 'dod chags dang bral bas mnyam pa nyid kyis tha dad par bya ba med 
[\[318b.5\]]pa la 'jug pa'i snang ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs rgyun mi 'chad pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi skyabs su rnam par 'phrul pa'i snang ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[318b.6\]]thob pas/_mun pa shin tu bstsal ba'i snang ba dang /_thams cad la gnas par shin tu bstan pa la mkhas shing gzhol bas/_chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi snang ba ste/_snang ba 'di bcus byang chub sems dpa' de snang 
[\[318b.7\]]bar byas pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' de thams cad du mngon par 'du bya ba med pa bcus shin tu bslabs pa yin/_bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i lus kyi las dang /_mngon par 'dus ma 
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]byas pa'i ngag gi las dang /_mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i yid kyi las dang /_dngos po med pa la gnas shing /_mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /_ma nyams shing mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i chos 
[\[319a.2\]]nyid dang /_tha mi dad pa'i ye shes dang /_ma skyes pa'i ye shes dang /_ma 'gags pa'i chos nyid dang /_bstan pa'i tshig rab tu shes pa dang /_don nyams pa med pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems 
[\[319a.3\]]dpa' de thams cad du mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i tshig bcu po 'di dag gis shin tu bslabs pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar na de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam pa 
[\[319a.4\]]tha dad pa'i dmigs pa rnams kyis gcig dang mang po la snyoms par 'jug cing /_rnam par ldang ba dang /_skal ba mi mnyam pa dang /_skal ba mnyam pa dang /_skal pa mnyam pa dang /_skal pa mi mnyam pa dang /_yangs pa dang /_phra ba dang /_
[\[319a.5\]]phra ba dang /_yangs pa dang /_chung ba dang /_che ba dang /_che ba dang /_chung ba dang /_rjes su 'gro ba dang /_rnam par phye ba dang /_rnam par phye ba dang /_rjes su 'gro ba dang /_lus med pa dang /_lus dang bcas pa dang /_lus dang bcas pa dang /_lus med pa dang /_rnam par ldang ba dang /_
[\[319a.6\]]snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_rnam par ldang ba dang /_rnam par dmigs pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa med pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par dmigs pas ting nge 'dzin 'di ni cho 'phrul thams cad kyi yul lo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_
[\[319a.7\]]rig sngags can chen po'i rig sngags kyis bsgrubs pa ni gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa'i 'byung gnas su rab tu grub par 'gyur yang sngags de yang gzhan la sgyu ma'i gzugs kyi rnam par smin pa dag kyang gzhan no/_/de lta 
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]yin yang sgyu ma'i rnam pa de dag ni sngags kyi sgra'i mthar thug pa yin te/_mig gi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i sgyu ma'i gzugs kyi rnam pa dang /_sgyu ma dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i sgyu ma'i sgra dang sgyu 
[\[319b.2\]]ma dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i sgyu ma'i dri dang /_sgyu ma dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i sgyu ma'i ro dang /_sgyu ma dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i sgyu ma'i reg bya dang /_
[\[319b.3\]]sgyu ma dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i sgyu ma'i rnam pa dang /_sprul pa mang pos cho 'phrul zhing rnam par 'gyur ba dag kyang de bzhin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 
[\[319b.4\]]skal ba mnyam par snyoms par zhugs shing /_skal ba mi mnyam pa las rnam par ldang bar ston to/_/skal ba mi mnyam pa la snyoms par zhugs shing /_skal ba snyam pa las rnam par ldang bar ston to/_/
[\[319b.5\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_lha dang lha ma yin g.yul du lhags pa'i tshe/_lha rnams rgyal zhing lha ma yin pham par gyur na/_de'i tshe lha'i dbang po dpag tshad brgya'i lus mig stong dang ldan pa/_dpung gi 
[\[319b.6\]]tshogs yan lag bzhis yongs su bskor cing /_lha ma yin rnam par 'thor te/_de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po de lha ma yin gyi sgyu la shin tu mkhas pas/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i sde kun tu 'byer ba dang /_rdzing bde ba 
[\[319b.7\]]'byung ba'i drung gi khung nas lha ma yin shing rta dang /_bzhon pa dang dpung du bcas pa mang po 'byung bar ston to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes la 
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]gnas pa yongs su grub pa'i phyir tha mi dad pa'i chos la snyoms par zhugs shing /_tha dad pa'i chos las rnam par ldang ba ston to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di lta ste dper na/_sa bon mang po dang 'byung ba 
[\[320a.2\]]mang po dag las sa bon sa la btab na sa bon ni 'og tu 'gro/_'bras bu ni steng du 'byung ba yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyud kyi tshul gcig par snyoms par zhugs 
[\[320a.3\]]shing /_tshul gyi rnam pa tha dad pa las rnam par ldang ba ston to/_/'di lta ste dper na/_bud med skyes pa dang phrad par gyur pa'i khrag rdus pa las bur 'gyur te/_rdus pa de ma'i khong na gnas shing rim gyis skyes pa dang /_zla 
[\[320a.4\]]ba bcu la las yongs su dag pa ni yan lag dang nying lag dang thams cad dang ldan pa/_dbang po tshang zhing rnam par dag par skye yang khrag rdus pa de yang gzhan dbang po drug rnams kyang gzhan no/_/khrag rdus pa de la yang dbang po 
[\[320a.5\]]drug phra ba'i tshul du med pa ma yin te/_srid pa'i yan lag gi mtshan nyid dang ldan la las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas bskyed cing rlung dang ldan na/_las kyi rnam par smin pa ji lta ba bzhin du yan lag mnyams par skye'o/_/de 
[\[320a.6\]]bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i dngos po'i tshul du snyoms par zhugs shing /_dngos po med pa'i tshul las rnam par ldang ngo /_/'di lta ste dper na/_klu'i gnas ni sa la rten mod kyi bar snang gnas 
[\[320a.7\]]la sprin kyang skyed la bar snang gnas la klu'i gnas dang khyim [{]myed [,]med [}]kyang /_sprin gyi char 'dod pa'i mi rnams gyen du lta zhing /_klu'i sprul pa bar snang gi gnas la yod pa la lta ste/_gnas 'og na 'dug kyang sprin bla na lding bar snang ngo /_/de 
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]bzhin du ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang mtshan nyid med pa la snyoms par zhugs shing /_mtshan nyid las rnam par ldang ngo /_'di lta ste dper na/_tshangs pa yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang chen 
[\[320b.2\]]po rnam dag phul zhes bya ba yod de/_gzhal med khang chen po de la stong gi 'jig rten thams cad snang ngo /_/stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad snang ngo /_/stong phrag brgya'i 'jig rten thams cad snang ngo /_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[320b.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/_klu'i gnas dang bcas pa/_gnod sbyin gyi gnas dang bcas pa/_dri za'i gnas dang bcas pa/_lha ma yin gyi gnas dang bcas pa/_nam mkha' lding gi gnas dang bcas pa/_mi 'am 
[\[320b.4\]]ci'i gnas dang bcas pa/_lto 'phye chen po'i gnas dang bcas pa/_mi'i 'jig rten dang bcas pa/_ngan song gi rgyud gsum dang bcas pa/_ri rab dang bcas pa/_khor yug dang bcas pa/_rin po che'i ri dang bcas pa/_btang bzung dang 
[\[320b.5\]]bcas pa/_rgya mtsho dang bcas pa/_gling bzhi ma 'dres par 'khor dang bcas pa/_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_pho brang 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i gnas dang bcas pa/_ri dang brag dang /_shing mang po sna tshogs dang bcas pa/_
[\[320b.6\]]rin po che'i rgyan dang bcas pa/_sman dang nags tshal dang rdzing dang /_lu ma'i rgyan dang /_chu klung dang chu klung chen po dang /_khor yug chen po'i mthar thug pa thams cad snang ste/_de yang de tsam du zad kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[320b.7\]]khams 'dir gtogs pa las/_chung ngu na rdul shin tu phra ba'i gzegs ma bar snang ba gnas la 'phyo ba lta bur phra ba dang /_ra ba dang chu klung yangs pa de dag thams cad kyang tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang 'gro ba thams cad na phul du gyur cing /_rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]lhun la gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du snang zhing rnam par dmigs la mthong bar gyur kyang de dag la thag thogs gang yang med do/_/de yang 'di ltar dper na/_me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin du gzhal med khang 
[\[321a.2\]]chen po de la thams cad snang /_thams cad kyang gsal/_thams cad kyang dmigs te/_thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan dmigs par yod do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can gyi khams tha mi dad pa/_zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'dis 
[\[321a.3\]]zhing gi rgyud kyang rab tu shes so/_/sangs rgyas kyi rgyud kyang rab tu shes so/_/sems can gyi rgyud kyang rab tu shes so/_/chos kyi rgyud kyang rab tu shes so/_/spyod pa'i rgyud kyang rab tu sgrub bo/_/mos pa'i rgyud kyang yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[321a.4\]]byed do/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyud la 'ang rnam par 'phrul par byed do/_/rnam par ldang ba'i rgyud kyang yongs su ston to/_/ye shes kyi rgyud kyang rab tu 'thob bo/_/skad cig gi mtha'i rgyud la'ang rab tu gnas so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub 
[\[321a.5\]]sems dpa' de ni rnam par 'phrul pa bcus kyang mchog tu gyur pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[321a.6\]]dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa tha dad pa med pa'i mthar thug pa tha mi dad pa'i dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam chen po'i rnam par 'phrul ba de bzhin nyid la zhugs shing /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[321a.7\]]mdzad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par 'phrul pa dmigs pa thams cad don yod cing rnam par dag pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu snang bar bya ba'i byin gyi rlabs can dang /_sems can 
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i las rnam par smin pa sgyu ma lta bu la 'jug pa dang /_ye shes dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa yangs pa dang /_phra ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[321b.2\]]las ldang ba shes pa dang /_'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang byang chub sems dpa'i khong du chud pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug cing 'byung ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang /_gzhan 
[\[321b.3\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas sprul pa dang /_sangs rgyas su byin gyis rlob pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo sprul pa dang /_'dul ba byin gyis brlab pa byed cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /_rgyud du skye ba dang /_sangs 
[\[321b.4\]]rgyas kyi sgra grag par bya ba rab tu sgrub pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa sems ltar mgyogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas brjod du med pa'i bstan pa dang /_ldem po dag rab tu shes 
[\[321b.5\]]te/_chos kyi sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par 'phrul ba dag par byed do/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyin zhag gi grangs dang yud du yan man dang /_zla ba'i grangs dang lo dang 
[\[321b.6\]]bskal pa'i grangs rab tu shes te/_skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis dus gsum mngon par bsgrub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par ston te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par 'phrul pa bcu po 'di dag la 'ang pha 
[\[321b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa thob pa yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa'i ye shes sems can gyi khams tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba ste brgyad pa'o/_/gzhan 
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag gi lus dang mig gi skye mched nas yid kyi skye mched kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings la dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya ba la 
[\[322a.2\]]snyoms par 'jug ste/_bdag gi ba spu'i khung bu re rer yang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings la dbang bsgyur ba la snyoms par 'jug go_/de'i rang bzhin gyi chos nyid kyang der byin gyis rlob ste/_de nyid nas 
[\[322a.3\]]'jig rten yang rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten gyi chos kyang rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyang rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yang rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 
[\[322a.4\]]yang rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan yongs su rdzogs shing /_dag pas 
[\[322a.5\]]rnam par dag la 'od gsal zhing rgyan bzang po shin tu mang bas rnam pa du mar brgyan cing /_rin po che bzang po sna tshogs kyis shin tu gang bar mthong ste/_de nas bskal pa brgyar yang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod cing gnas so/_/bskal pa stong dang /_
[\[322a.6\]]bskal pa khrag khrig dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang /_bskal pa tshad med pa dang /_bskal pa grangs med pa dang /_bskal pa dpag tu med pa dang /_bskal pa mu med pa dang /_bskal pa bgrang du med pa dang /_
[\[322a.7\]]bskal pa mtha' yas pa dang /_bskal pa mtshungs pa med pa dang /_bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_bskal pa gzhal du med pa dang /_bskal pa brjod du med pa dang /_bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang /_
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing gnas so/_/yongs su rgyun mi gcod do/_/de na de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de mnyam par bzhag pas snyoms 
[\[322b.2\]]par 'jug go_/rnam par ldang ngo /_/de de ltar ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing /_rnam par ldang ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams mngon par bsgrub pa dag kyang rab tu spyod do/_/der yang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin 
[\[322b.3\]]par byed do/_/chos kyi dbyings khong du chud par byed do/_/dus shes par bya ba rab tu rtogs par byed do/_/chos bstan pa shin tu byin gyis rlob po/_/chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa'i rgyud kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/
[\[322b.4\]]chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang gis mig tha dad pa med pa 'ang khong du chud pa yin/_rna ba tha dad pa med pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/_sna tha dad pa med pa la mkhas par gyur pa yin/_lce tha dad pa med pa'i bslab pa la shin tu bslabs pa yin/_
[\[322b.5\]]lus tha dad pa med pa shin tu grub pa yin/_sems tha dad pa med pa'i rjes su song zhing khong du chud pa yin te/_de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas gzungs khrag khrig stong phrag bcu'i chos snang ba 'byung ngo /_/spyod pa yongs su dag pa 
[\[322b.6\]]khrag khrig stong phrag bcu yongs su 'grub bo/_/dbang po thams cad mngon par shes pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu rab tu gnon to/_/mngon par shes pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin khrag khrig stong phrag 
[\[322b.7\]]bcu yongs su gnon to/_/rdzu 'phrul khrag khrig stong phrag bcu yongs su 'grub bo/_/stobs khrag khrig stong phrag bcu rnam par 'phel lo/_/bsam pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/byin gyi rlabs 
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]khrag khrig stong phrag bcu yang dag par ston no/_/rnam par 'phrul ba khrag khrig stong phrag bcu mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i chags pa med pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu yang dag par 'grub bo/_/byang chub 
[\[323a.2\]]sems dpa'i tshogs khrag khrig stong phrag bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rigs khrag khrig stong phrag bcus yongs su sbyong zhing kun tu 'gro'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrag khrig stong phrag bcus yongs su snang 
[\[323a.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/don khrag khrig stong phrag bcu shin tu ston to/_/smon lam khrag khrig stong phrag bcu dang yang dag par ldan no/_/yongs su bsngo ba khrag khrig stong phrag bcu shin tu ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa khrag khrig 
[\[323a.4\]]stong phrag bcu yongs su dag par byed do/_/chos kyi sgo khrag khrig stong phrag bcu rab tu snang bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bstan pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/byang chub sems 
[\[323a.5\]]dpa'i rnam par dag pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu rnam par dag par byed de/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings la dbang bsgyur ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_
[\[323a.6\]]yon tan gyi tshogs du ma dang ldan pa yin/_yon tan gyi tshogs tshad med pa dang ldan pa yin/_yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa yin/_yon tan gyi tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan 
[\[323a.7\]]pa yin/_yon tan gyi tshogs mtshungs pa med pa dang ldan pa yin/_yon tan gyi tshogs gzhal du med pa dang ldan pa yin/_yon tan gyi tshogs brjod du med pa dang ldan pa yin/_yon tan gyi tshogs zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa yin/_/
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]yon tan gyi tshogs kun tu mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa yin/_yon tan gyi tshogs de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' shin tu sbyangs pa yin/_yang dag par byang bar byas pa yin/_rab tu brgyan pa yin/_yongs su bzung ba yin/_yang dag par 
[\[323b.2\]]grub par byas pa yin/_yang dag par brjod pa yin/_nye bar brtan pa yin/_mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan par byas pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings la dbang bsgyur ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub 
[\[323b.3\]]sems dpa' de ni shar phyogs logs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan mthun la mtshan gcig la yang rnam par brtag cing /_rnam par dbye ba'i rnam pa sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[323b.4\]]zhing grangs med pa stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mda' zhing mtshan gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du mtshan re re las rnam par brtag cing rnam par dbye ba'i rnam pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 
[\[323b.5\]]mda' ba sha stag gi byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do/_/shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_de bzhin du nub phyogs dang /_de bzhin du byang phyogs dang /_de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /_de bzhin du shar lho'i 
[\[323b.6\]]phyogs mtshams dang /_de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang /_de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa stong phrag bcu'i 
[\[323b.7\]]rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan rnam par dgod pa gcig tu mthun pa sha stag_/byang chub sems dpa' de la byin gyis rlob pa mdzad cing zhal mngon par ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag 
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]pa yang byin gyis rlob pa mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kyi thu bor brjod pa'i phyir lus tshad med pa yang rab tu brjod pa mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'ang rab tu bstan to/_/
[\[324a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan tshad med pa 'ang shin tu brjod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i shangs mi bsnyengs pa'i dgongs pa dang ldan pa yang rab tu bstan to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kyi thu bo'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa yang yang dag par bstan to/_/de 
[\[324a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul rjes su bsgrags pa yang rab tu bshad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub mtha' dang dbus med pa yang dag par sbyang ba mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dgongs pas rnam par dag pa 'ang thob par mdzad do/_/de bzhin 
[\[324a.4\]]gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo phyir mi ldog pa yang yang dag par ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor mtha' yas pa yang rnam par dmigs pa mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ldem po dag mtha' yas pa la 'ang rab tu zhugs pa mdzad 
[\[324a.5\]]do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang yang dag par brjod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnyam pa nyid la 'ang yang dag par gzhug pa mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang rgyud dus kyi 
[\[324a.6\]]tshad dang mnyam pa yang rab tu brjod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rnam pa dang bye brag thams cad kyang shin tu bstan to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi byin gyi rlabs rnam par dmigs par bya ba'ang rab tu brjod do/_/de 
[\[324a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing bstan pa yang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung chos kyi sprin gyi char yang rab tu 'bebs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam par dmigs par bya ba yang yongs su bstan to/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]snyoms par 'jug pa yang rab tu brjod do/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor kun nas 'dus pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa 'ang rnam par dmigs pa mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'ang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do/_/chos 
[\[324b.2\]]thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyang yang dag par bstan to/_/chos thams cad mi 'pho zhing rgyun 'chad pa med pa yang khong du chud par mdzad do/_/chos kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba yang rab tu rdzogs par mdzad do/_/de bzhin 
[\[324b.3\]]gshegs pa'i yon tan tshad med pa yang yongs su bstan to/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad sbyang ba yang khong du chud par mdzad do/_/sems sgyu ma lta bu mthar thug pa med pa yang rab tu bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[324b.4\]]sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings la dbang bsgyur ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtshan tha dad pa mtshan re re zhing yang rnam par dbye ba'i bye brag_/sangs rgyas 
[\[324b.5\]]kyi zhing grangs med pa stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mnga' ba mtshan de dag re re'i rnam par dbye ba'i rnam grangs kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mnga' bdag gis mtha' dang dbus med pa'i tshul 
[\[324b.6\]]du lus kyang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do/_/chags pa med pa'i tshul du sems kyang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do/_/chos thams cad nyams pa med pa la gzhol bar dran pa'ang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do/_/chos thams cad 
[\[324b.7\]]rtogs par khong du chud par blo gros kyang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do/_/chos thams cad shin tu 'dzin par rig pa'ang byin gyis brlab par mdzad do/_/chos thams cad yangs shing 'byam klas pa'i tshul du blo yang byin gyis brlab 
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]pa mdzad do/_/mngon par shes pa rnon pos chos tha mi dad par mkhas par khong du chud par dbang po tshad med pa'ang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do/_/byin gyi rlabs kyis chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa'i tshul du 
[\[325a.2\]]spyod yul thogs pa med pa yang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do/_/bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes rnam par dag par ye shes la 'jug pa 'ang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag 
[\[325a.3\]]par ston par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba 'ang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rgya mtsho'i sgo bcu la shin tu rtogs pa yin te/_
[\[325a.4\]]bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bas rtogs pa yin/_sems can rgya mtsho ming gis khong du chud pa yin/_chos rgya mtsho ye shes kyis rab tu rtogs pa yin/_zhing rgya mtsho la dngos po med par gnas shing mngon 
[\[325a.5\]]par 'dus ma byas pa'i bsam pas rjes su 'brang ba yin/_yon tan rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs pas rab tu rtogs pa yin/_ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho rnam par dmigs pas khong du chud pa yin/_dbang po rgya mtsho rnam 
[\[325a.6\]]par phye ba la mkhas pa'i sa'i ye shes kyis khong du chud pa yin/_sems rgya mtsho sems can gyi ris thams cad kyi sems tha dad pa dang sems yangs pa dang /_sems tshad med pa yongs su shes pas khong du chud pa 
[\[325a.7\]]yin/_spyod pa rgya mtsho smon lam gyis yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin/_smon lam rgya mtsho mtha' las brgal bar 'byung ba rnam par dag pas yongs su grub par byed pa yin te/_'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' de rgya mtsho'i sgo 
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]bcu la shin tu rtogs pa rnams so/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ni mchog tu bya ba bcu 'thob pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi phul du bya ba 'thob pa yin/_lha thams cad kyi mchog tu bya ba 'thob 
[\[325b.2\]]pa yin/_tshangs pa khyu mchog thams cad kyi nang na chags pa med pa 'thob pa yin/_'jig rten thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa 'thob pa yin/_'gro ba thams cad kyis mi thub pa 'thob pa yin/_'gro ba thams cad dang tha mi dad pa 
[\[325b.3\]]'thob pa yin/_lam gyi rgyud thams cad nas 'byung ba 'thob pa yin/_skye ba thams cad du dbang phyug 'thob pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang 'thob pa yin/_'byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad la stobs dang 
[\[325b.4\]]shugs 'thob pa yin te/_'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas mchog tu bya ba bcu 'thob pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ni stobs bcus sems can gyi khams su nan tan byed pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar 
[\[325b.5\]]'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i stobs kyi 'byung ba'i ded dpon du 'gyur ba dang /_brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis phyir mi ldog pa dang /_chags pa med pa'i stobs kyis dri ma med pa dang /_zhi ba'i stobs kyis bsgrib pa med pa dang /_
[\[325b.6\]]sems kyi rgyud yongs su bsgyur ba'i stobs kyis chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba dang /_rang bzhin gyi chos kyi stobs kyis don gyi dbang dang /_bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos kyis shes rab che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa'i stobs kyis 
[\[325b.7\]]chos ston pa dang /_tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i stobs kyis byin gyi rlob pa'i chos nyid dang /_rang byung gi stobs kyis mtha' yas pa'i ye shes rnam par ston pa ste/_stobs chen po/_stobs 'phags pa/_
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]stobs dpe med pa/_stobs tshad med pa/_stobs shin tu bsgrubs pa/_stobs mi g.yo ba/_stobs shin tu brtan pa/_stobs 'khrugs pa med pa/_stobs ye shes kyi blo gros can/_
[\[326a.2\]]stobs legs par bsgrubs pa/_stobs mnyam par bzhag pa/_stobs yongs su dag pa/_stobs chos kyi lus can/_stobs chos snang ba can/_stobs chos kyi sgron ma can/_stobs chos kyi tshul can/_
[\[326a.3\]]stobs zil gyis mi non pa/_stobs shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa/_rtsal dam pa dang ldan pa'i stobs/_skyes bu dam pa'i stobs/_skyes bu dam pas bsten pa'i stobs/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[326a.4\]]rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i stobs/_rnam pa thams cad du dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten pa'i stobs/_dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa la gnas pa'i stobs/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la zhugs pa'i stobs 
[\[326a.5\]]sems rtogs par bzhag pa'i stobs/_byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba rnam par 'phel ba'i stobs/_byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa rab tu bskyed pa'i stobs/_byang chub sems dpa'i shugs shin tu 'phel bar byed 
[\[326a.6\]]pa'i stobs/_byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi rgyu mthar phyin pa'i stobs/_byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag par byed pa'i stobs/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la yongs su gnas pa 
[\[326a.7\]]dang /_rgyu mthun pa'i stobs/_chos la shin tu gzhol ba'i stobs/_lus la thogs pa med pa'i stobs/_thabs mkhas pa'i tshul la zhugs pa'i stobs/_chos thams cad 'od dang zhing rnam par snang ba'i stobs/_
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]'gro ba thams cad du g.yo ba med pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i stobs/_sems can thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs shing mi sgul ba'i stobs bcus sems can gyi khams su nan tan byed pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de'i yon tan 
[\[326b.2\]]de ltar tshad med pa dang /_chos kyi bsngags pa de ltar tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/mngon par snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rab tu rton par 
[\[326b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/yang dag par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur te/_yon tan de dag la mtha' med do/_/bden pa shes pa la mtha' med do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de dag 
[\[326b.4\]]la mtha' med do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshul de dag la mtha' med do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu de dag la mtha' med do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba spyod pa de dag la mtha' med do/_/byang 
[\[326b.5\]]chub sems dpa'i mngon par grub pa de dag la mtha' med do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dag pa de dag la mtha' med do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba de dag la mtha' med do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i las la dbang 
[\[326b.6\]]bsgyur ba de dag gi mtha' ni bskal pa brjod du med pas kyang brjod par mi nus te/_de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' des 'thob bo/_/de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' des 'grub bo/_/de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' des gnon to/_/de dag 
[\[326b.7\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' de la mngon sum du dad par 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' de la rab tu snang ngo /_/de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' des yongs su shes so/_/de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' de'i chos kyi 
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]tshul du 'byung ngo /_/de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' de'i rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes su 'gro'o//_//sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/
[\[327a.2\]]bam po nyi shu lnga pa/_ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa grangs med pa/_gzhal du med pa/_mu med pa/_kun tu mtha' yas pa/_dpag tu med pa/_bsam gyis 
[\[327a.3\]]mi khyab pa/_mtshungs pa med pa/_brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag la dmigs pa re re nas 'jug pas snyoms par 'jug go_/rnam par ldang ngo /_/ting nge 'dzin de dag dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par yang rab tu shes so/_/
[\[327a.4\]]ting nge 'dzin gzhal du med pa yang rab tu shes so/_/ting nge 'dzin shin tu yangs pa yang rab tu shes so/_/ting nge 'dzin la rnam par spyad pa'ang rab tu shes so/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma yang rab tu shes so/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi bstan pa 
[\[327a.5\]]yang rab tu shes so/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul yang rab tu shes so/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu 'ang rab tu shes so/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi dben pa 'ang rab tu shes so/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin yang rab tu shes 
[\[327a.6\]]so/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi 'byung ba'ang rab tu shes so/_/'di lta ste dper na/_klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa'i gnas nas/_chu klung chen po ma 'dres pa/_rnyog pa med pa/_dang ba/_'od gsal ba/_dri ma med pa/_dag pa/_nam mkha' lta bu dri ma 
[\[327a.7\]]dang bral ba bzhi 'bab ste/_de dag kyang gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi'i sgo nas 'bab ste/_'di ltar chu klung chen po gang gA ni glang po che'i kha nas 'bab bo/_/chu klung chen po si ta ni seng ge'i kha nas 'bab bo/_/chu klung chen po sin d+hu ni glang gi kha 
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]nas 'bab bo/_/chu klung chen po pa k+shu ni rta'i kha nas 'bab bo/_/de dag de ltar phyogs bzhi nas kha bzhi nas 'bab ste/_chu klung gang gA ni dngo nas dngul gyi bye ma 'dren cing 'bab ste/_dngul gyi bye ma la gnas so/_/chu klung si ta ni dngo 
[\[327b.2\]]nas rdo rje'i bye ma 'dren cing 'bab ste/_rdo rje'i bye ma la gnas so/_/chu klung sin d+hu ni dngo nas gser gyi bye ma 'dren cing 'bab ste/_gser gyi bye ma la gnas so/_/chu klung chen po pak+shu ni dngo nas bai DUr+ya sngon po'i bye ma 'dren cing 
[\[327b.3\]]'bab ste/_bai DUr+ya sngon po'i bye ma la gnas so/_/chu klung chen po gang gA ni lha rdzas kyi dngul gyi kha dog lta bu'i sgo nas 'bab bo/_/chu klung chen po si ta ni lha rdzas kyi rdo rje'i kha dog lta bu'i sgo nas 'bab bo/_/chu klung chen po sin d+hu ni 
[\[327b.4\]]lha rdzas kyi gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sgo nas 'bab bo/_/chu klung chen po pa k+shu ni lha rdzas kyi bai DUr+ya sngon po'i kha dog lta bu'i sgo nas 'bab bo/_/chu klung chen po de bzhi yang kha'i sgo dpag tshad tsam gyi tshad nas 'bab ste/_de dag 
[\[327b.5\]]'bab pa'i tshe re res kyang mtsho chen po la lan bdun du g.yas phyogs su bskor te/_phyogs bzhir 'bab cing rgya mtsho chen po gang chen mtsho la zhen par 'dong ngo /_/de ltar chu klung chen po rnams kyis lan bdun du g.yas phyogs su 
[\[327b.6\]]bskor ba'i bar gyi gling de dag kyang me tog uta pa la dang /_pad mo dang /_ku mu da dang /_pun da ri ka dang /_lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rang bzhin las grub pa yid du 'ong ba dri zhim pa/_mtha'i rgyan du sdug pa/_mdog gsal ba/_
[\[327b.7\]]rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa/_'od dang zhing gsal ba/_gcig gi gzugs brnyan gcig tu snang ba mdangs dga' ba blta na yid du 'ong ba/_rang bzhin dang zhing shin tu rnam par dag pas brgyan pa ste/_blta na kha 
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]dog gsal ba/_mun pa sel cing snang ba 'byin pa/_blta na gtang mi bra zhing shin tu rnam par phye bar brgyan pa/_kha dog sna tshogs su me tog gis kun nas yog pa/_'dab ma sna tshogs dang ldan zhing snying 
[\[328a.2\]]po kha dog sna tshogs can/_ze ba mdog du mar snang ba'i me tog gis yongs su brgyan pa ste/_mtsho chen po de'i nang dang /_mtsho'i dkyil 'khor ni rgyar dpag tshad lnga bcu yod pa de/_zabs su dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do/_/
[\[328a.3\]]de'i gzhi ni rin po che'i gseg ma bdal ba ste/_rin po che sna tshogs kha dog du ma dang ldan pas shin tu brgyan par gnas pa'o/_/de'i ngogs ni rin po che sna tshogs pha gu brtsigs pa ltar 'dug pas kun nas 'khor ba'o/_/
[\[328a.4\]]de'i dri ni tsan dan bzang po'i bsung lta bu ste/_me tog kha dog du ma can las bsung gi ngad rnam pa du ma langs pa dang ldan pa/_me tog ut+pal dang /_pad mo dang /_ku mu da dang pun da ri kas kun nas yog pa/_rin po 
[\[328a.5\]]che'i shing me tog rab tu rgyas pas kun nas 'khor ba ste/_nam lha'i bu nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer de dag mtsho'i rin po che dang gseg ma dang /_me tog dang /_chu klung gi rgyud kyi bye ma dang /_dngo'i kha dang /_chu klung gis g.yas phyogs su bskor 
[\[328a.6\]]ba'i mtsho dang rin po che'i shing gi lhun dang /_yal ga dang lo ma dang me tog la bab par gyur na/_de'i tshe 'od zer re res phog kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas sna tshogs kyi dbyings na gnas pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya 
[\[328a.7\]]stong gis kun nas yog pa lta bur snang ste/_thams cad kyang 'od kyi mdog dam pa des/_'jam 'jam ltar 'dug pas mtsho chen po ma dros pa rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par snang ngo /_/mtsho chen po ma dros pa de'i 'khor na 
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]rin po che rgyan du 'khod pa yid du 'ong zhing chal bar rgyas la rgya che bar 'dal ba de dag thams cad kyang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gyur bar snang ste/_rin po che dam pa sna tshogs shin tu phra ba thams cad dang /_rin po che'i bye ma kun tu 
[\[328b.2\]]bdal ba dang /_rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs shin tu phra ba dang /_rin po che'i rdul shin tu phra ba dang /_rin po che'i rdul shin tu phra ba'i bye ma de ltar phra ba dag la'ang phan tshun du/_gzugs brnyan snang na/_chung zhes dog pa 'am che zhes 
[\[328b.3\]]yangs pa med par dngos pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma nor bar snang ngo /_/chu klung chen po de dag ji ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa las kha bzhi nas 'bab pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tha dad pa yang 
[\[328b.4\]]dag par shes pa bzhi'i chu klung chen po 'bab pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho la zhen par 'dong ngo /_/ji ltar chu klung chen po gang gA glang po'i kha dngul gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa nas dngul gyi bye ma 'dren cing 'bab pa/_
[\[328b.5\]]de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos dkar po dag par byed pa'i sgo nas don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/_don gyi tshul thams cad shin tu dag par byed pa 
[\[328b.6\]]yang chos thams cad kyi snang ba rnam par gsal bar byed cing 'bab ste/_bsgribs pa med pa'i rgya mtsho'i mthar thug par 'gro'o/_/ji ltar chu klung chen po si ta seng ge'i kha rdo rje'i kha dog tu 'dug pa nas rdo rje'i bye ma 'dren cing 'bab pa 
[\[328b.7\]]de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa sangs rgyas kyi rdo rje'i tshig brjod pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad la snang bar bya ba dang /_ye shes kyi rdo rje'i tshig rab tu 'dren cing 'bab ste/_chags pa 
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]med pa'i rgya mtsho la zhen par 'gro'o/_/ji ltar chu klung chen po sin d+hu glang gi kha gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa nas gser gyi bye ma 'dren cing 'bab pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa 
[\[329a.2\]]sems can gyi tshogs thams cad khong du chud par byed cing 'gal ba med pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa/_shin tu 'gro ba yang tshul rnam par dag pa'i yan lag gis yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_'dul ba la 
[\[329a.3\]]rtag tu brtson par 'bab ste/_rten cing 'brel bar byung ba'i tshul gyi rgya mtsho la zhen par 'gro'o/_/ji ltar chu klung chen po/_pak+shu rta'i kha bai DUr+ya sngon po'i kha dog du 'dug pa nas/_bai DUR+Ya sngon po'i bye ma 'dren cing 'bab pa de bzhin 
[\[329a.4\]]du byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa tha dad pa mi zad pa yang chos brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rab tu snang bar bya ba dang /_dam pa'i chos kyi chu klung rgyun du 'bab par bya ba'i klung rab tu bskyed par byed cing chos thams cad kyi rgya mtsho las 
[\[329a.5\]]gzhol bar 'bab ste/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos rgya mtsho la zhen par 'gro'o/_/ji ltar chu klung chen po bzhi po de dag gis mtsho chen po ma dros pa la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/_phyogs bzhi nas rgya mtsho la zhen par 
[\[329a.6\]]'dod pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa'i yang lus kyi las mthun pa dang ldan pa yin/_ngag gi las mthun pa dang ldan pa yin/_yid kyi las mthun pa dang ldan pa yin/_mthun pa'i ye shes sngon du 'gro ba dang ldan pa yin/_ji ltar de dag 
[\[329a.7\]]phyogs bzhi nas rgya mtsho chen po la zhen par 'dod pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' yang phyogs bzhi nas thams cad mthong ba'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la zhen par 'gro ba yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas rnam par dmigs 
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]pas/_sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba'i phyogs dang /_'di lta ste/_lus kyi las nges pa dang /_gzungs brjod du med pas yongs su 'dzin pas chos thams cad snang ba'i phyogs dang /_'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad 
[\[329b.2\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas sems can thams cad dga' bar bya ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i phyogs so/_/ji ltar chu klung chen po de dag gis lan bdun du bskor 
[\[329b.3\]]ba'i bar gyi gling rnams me tog uta pa la dang /_pad mo dang ku mu da dang /_pun da ri kas kun nas yog pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bar ma dor 'dul bar ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams la btang snyoms su gzhog pa yang ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag 
[\[329b.4\]]khrig brgya phrag stong gis kun tu khyab pa'o/_/sangs rgyas mthong ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs su brgyan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag cing rdul med pas yid du 'ong ba'o/_/ji ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa rin po che'i shing gis yongs 
[\[329b.5\]]su 'khor ba de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba ston na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gis kun nas 'khor zhing brgyan pa yin/_ji ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang dpag tshad lnga bcu yod la dang zhing 
[\[329b.6\]]rnyog pa med pa dang gsal ba de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i sems kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis yongs su rgyas pas dang zhing rnyog pa med la gsal ba dang /_mtha' dang dbus med pa yin/_ji ltar 
[\[329b.7\]]mtsho chen po ma dros pa rin po che'i pha gus brtsigs pas mtha' bskor cing tsan dan dri zhim po'i bsung dang ldan pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i sems kyang ye shes rin po che khrag khrig stong phrag bcus shin tu brgyan 
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]cing khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam gyi ye shes dang ldan la dge ba'i rtsa ba dri zhim po thams cad dang ldan pa'o/_/ji ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang rin po che thams cad kyi gram bus yongs su brgyan cing 
[\[330a.2\]]nor bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par gyur pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes bra ba khong du chud pa'i dran pa yang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po ches rnam par brgyan cing 
[\[330a.3\]]da ltar byung ba'i chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas la rnam par spyod pas tshul dang /_dus shes par bya ba thams cad la zhugs pa yin/_ji ltar klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa gtse ba dang /_mi bde ba 
[\[330a.4\]]thams cad las rnam par 'das pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten gyi gtse ba dang /_'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba yin te/_'jig rten thams cad du snang bar gnas kyang 'jig rten thams 
[\[330a.5\]]cad kyis mi gos pa yin/_ji ltar chu klung chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'dzam bu gling mngon par brlan cing yongs su brlan nas rgya mtsho chen po la zhen par 'dod pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' yang ye shes kyi chu klung chen po 
[\[330a.6\]]bzhis lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa/_tshangs par bcas pa/_dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgur bcas pa mngon par brlan te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes rgya mtsho stobs bcus rnam par brgyan pa la zhen 
[\[330a.7\]]par 'gro'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_smon pa'i ye shes kyi chu klung 'gro ba thams cad bskyab pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad gdul ba'i phyir rgyun mi 'chad par 'gro ba dang /_'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i chu klung byang chub 
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pas rab tu dang ba/_sems can gyi khams thams cad la phan 'dogs shing mi zad pa'i rgyun gyis mthar thug pas dus gsum gyi ye shes rgya mtsho la zhen par 'bab pa dang /_'di lta ste byang 
[\[330b.2\]]chub sems dpa'i mnyam pa med pa'i ye shes kyi chu klung ting nge 'dzin rin po che grangs med pas brgyan pa sangs rgyas thams cad lta zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la zhen par 'bab pa dang /_'di lta ste/_snying 
[\[330b.3\]]rje chen po'i ye shes kyi chu klung byams pa chen po'i dbang du gyur pa/_'gro ba thams cad nas phyir mi ldog cing 'gro ba thams cad nye bar bzung ba'i phyir/_thabs mkhas pa'i mtshams sbyor ba grangs med pas/_yongs su 
[\[330b.4\]]gdung ba zhi bar byed cing stobs bcu rgya mtsho la zhen par 'bab pa'o/_/ji ltar chu klung chen po bzhi po de dag mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho la zhen par 'dod pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang khyad par du 
[\[330b.5\]]'phags pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes zad mi shes pa'i mthar thug par 'gro zhing rnam par 'tshang rgya bar rnam par rol pas rnam par 'tshang rgya ba yin/_ji ltar chu klung 
[\[330b.6\]]chen po bzhi po de dag rgya mtsho chen po la zhen par 'dong zhing phyir mi ldog pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi rgyun ma 'chad par byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam la rab tu brtson pa yang thams 
[\[330b.7\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par bsgrub pa las/_phyir mi ldog cing sangs rgyas kyi byang chub chos thams cad la bsgribs pa med pa dang /_chags pa med pa la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la zhen par 
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]'gro'o/_/ji ltar chu klung chen po bzhi pa de dag bskal par gnas shing skyo ba dang /_yongs su skyo ba med par rgya mtsho la zhen par 'dod pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod 
[\[331a.2\]]pa dang /_smon lam la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas yongs su mi skyo bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rgya 
[\[331a.3\]]mtsho rgyun ma chad par rjes su gzhol zhing zhen par 'gro ba yin/_ji ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa de rin po che sna tshogs kyi mdog ltar 'dug cing dngul gyi bye ma'i mdog tu snang ba dang /_gser gyi bye ma'i mdog du snang ba dang 
[\[331a.4\]]rdo rje'i bye ma'i mdog tu snang ba dang /_bai DUr+ya'i bye ma'i mdog tu snang ba dang /_nyi ma'i 'od gzer gyis phog na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs su mngon zhing snang ba dang /_nyi ma'i 'od gzer dang 
[\[331a.5\]]phrad na mtsho chen po ma dros pa de dmigs pa thams cad kyi gzugs su gyur par snang yang gzugs lus kyi gzugs su snang ba dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi rnam par snang bar gyur pa de dag gcig gis gcig bdo zhing phan tshun du gnod par 'gyur ba med 
[\[331a.6\]]do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings la dbang bsgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pas rang gi lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu re re yang de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod 
[\[331a.7\]]du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du yang 'jug go_/chos bstan pa yang nyan to/_/de dag thams cad kyang mnyes par byed do/_/de bzhin 
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]gshegs pa'i sku tshad med pa la 'ang yid ches shing khong du chud par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing chos nyan pas kyang bskal pa brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[331b.2\]]'da' bar byed kyang yun ring po'i 'du shes kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye/_yun thung ngu'i 'du shes kyang mi skye'o/_/ba spu'i bu ga de dag tu'ang de'i lus la mi bde ba med cing 'jig rten gyi khams de dag dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa de dag dang /_
[\[331b.3\]]'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag dang sems can gyi khams sna tshogs 'khod pa de dag la'ang gnod pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa de sems shin tu phra bas mtha' dang dbus med pa las kyi rnam 
[\[331b.4\]]par smin pa dpe med pa'i tshul la 'jug pa/_ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul rtogs par gnas pa/_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i yul sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul rnam par bsgrub pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 
[\[331b.5\]]byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa tshad med pa bsgrub par dka' ba/_bzod par dka' ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su 'dzin pa/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i 
[\[331b.6\]]spyod pa dang /_dmigs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pas skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de sems skad cig la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par ldang 
[\[331b.7\]]yang /_yun ring po yang 'jig par mi byed/_mngon par zhen par yang mi ltung /_dmigs pa thams cad la'ang gnas pa med de/_dngos po thams cad la 'ang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/skad cig gi rgyud la 'ang rab tu 'jug go_/sems can gyi 
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]don yang yang dag par sgrub bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba mthong bas kyang ngoms par mi byed do/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar dbyung bas kyang sgyid lug par mi byed de/_de la bzhag par bya ba yang gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[332a.2\]]do/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i rjes su yang rab tu 'jug go_/ye shes kyi sprul pa yang byin gyis rlob po/_/sems can gyi ris la 'jug par yang mtha' dang dbus med par 'jug go_/'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[332a.3\]]thams cad rnam par dag pa yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/'jig rten gyi phyin ci log thams cad kyang rnam par rtog pa med pas rab tu shes so/_/rtog pa'i sa thams cad las kyang yongs su 'da'o/_/mtshan ma sna tshogs 
[\[332a.4\]]yongs su shes pa yang mi spong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang thabs la mkhas pa yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa la 'ang rtog par mi byed do/_/thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i sa yang rab tu 
[\[332a.5\]]'thob par byed do/_/'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i rang bzhin ni dngos po thams cad kyi rjes su song ba 'ang yin la/_dngos po thams cad las kyang rnam par 'das pa'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten gyi 
[\[332a.6\]]khams thams cad du'ang rgyu la/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad las kyang rnam par 'das pa yin/_sems can gyi khams yongs su dgrol ba la'ang brtson la sems can gyi 'du shes thams cad kyang med pa yin/_chos kyi dbyings thams 
[\[332a.7\]]cad kyang ye shes kyi spyod yul du gyur la chos thams cad kyis snyems pa'i sems kyang med pa yin/_sangs rgyas thams cad blta bas kyang mi ngoms la/_sangs rgyas thams cad la blta ba'i gnas kyang yongs su bstsal ba yin/_
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa thams cad la mkhas par bya ba 'ang khong du chud la/_chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid khong du chud pas chags pa yang med pa yin/_chos kyi tshig rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan 
[\[332b.2\]]la tshig med cing yi ge med pa yang khong du chud pa yin/_brjod du med pa la'ang shin tu spyod la/_dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa dang yang ldan pa yin/_chos thams cad kyi 'ang mthar phyin la gzugs sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba rnams 
[\[332b.3\]]kyang yul du byed pa yin/_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi mthar yang rab tu thug la snying rje chen pos sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su dgrol zhing gdul ba la yang rab tu brtson pa yin/_sems can gyi khams 'phel ba 
[\[332b.4\]]dang /_'grib pa med pa'ang rab tu shes la chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa khong du chud pa las kyang mi g.yo ba yin/_'gro ba thams cad gdul ba yang rgyun mi gcod la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yang khong 
[\[332b.5\]]du chud pa yin/_chos rnam pa sna tshogs la'ang rnam par mi rtog la bstan pa sna tshogs la 'jigs pa med pas chos bstan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yang rgyun mi chad pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[332b.6\]]dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings la dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya ba ste dgu pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la 
[\[332b.7\]]mkhas pa'i ye shes bcu gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa med cing dri ma med pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par 'jug ste/_ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms 
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]par zhugs pa'i tshe lus kyi las chags pa med par yang dag par gnas so/_/ngag gi las chags pa med par yang dag par gnas so/_/yid kyi las chags pa med par yang dag par gnas so/_/sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[333a.2\]]zhing mnyam pa nyid chags pa med par yang dag par gnas so/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ye shes chags pa med pa la yang dag par 'jug go_/sems can 'dul ba'i ye shes chags pa med par yang dag par 
[\[333a.3\]]gnas so/_/'od gzer kun tu dgye ba chags pa med pa rab tu 'gyed do/_/'od kyi dkyil 'khor chags pa med pa rab tu gtong ngo /_/sprul pa mang po chags pa med pa rab tu 'gyed do/_/chos kyi 'khor lo chags pa med pa 
[\[333a.4\]]rab tu skor ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'ang rab tu thob par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi stobs rnams la'ang yang dag par 'jug go_/sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang rab tu 'thob par byed do/_/sangs 
[\[333a.5\]]rgyas kyi bzhengs pas rnam par ldang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba snang bas nye bar spyod do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i de ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu rtog go_/thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[333a.6\]]nyid la yongs su lta'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid khong du chud par byed do/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs par byed do/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs par byed do/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu lta'o/_/
[\[333a.7\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rjes su lta'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam par lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]sems chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i khong du chud pa chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba chen po dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[333b.2\]]dpa'i skye ba chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rgyun chen po yongs su mi gcod do/_/ldog par mi byed do/_/skyo bar mi byed 
[\[333b.3\]]do/_/gtong bar mi byed do/_/'gyed par mi byed do/_/sgyid lug par mi byed do/_/gzhog par mi byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rgyun mthar 'byin par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos 
[\[333b.4\]]la smon lam chen pos rab tu grub pa dang /_yang dag par 'jug pa'i 'byung gnas chen po dang /_'jigs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho chen po shin tu bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam khyad par du 'phags pa 
[\[333b.5\]]dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa khyad par dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes snang ba la shin tu bslab pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro/_/sems 
[\[333b.6\]]can thams cad kyi gtso bos byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir ro/_/'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_thugs rje chen po'i rjes su snyegs pa'i phyir ro/_sangs rgyas kyi chos 'gyur ba med pa yongs 
[\[333b.7\]]su bsgrub pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na/_mi la la zhig gis nor bu rin po che sna tshogs tshon gyis bsgyur ba'i gos kyi steng du bzhag na/_nor bu rin po che de yang khong nas tshon gyis gyur bar snang ste/_
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]nor bu rin po che'i rang bzhin ni 'gyur ba med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ting nge 'dzin rin po che thob pa'i ye shes kyi sgos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su lta zhing /_byang chub sems 
[\[334a.2\]]dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa 'ang rgyun mi gcod do/_/ji ltar nor bu rin po che de kha dog thams cad ston kyang nor bu'i rang bzhin yongs su mi spong ba de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rang 
[\[334a.3\]]bzhin thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan can yongs su mi spang ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du yang dag par zhugs pa'i phyir ro/_/'gro ba thams cad dgrol bar smon pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[334a.4\]]sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par sbyong bas sgyid lug pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/'gro ba thams cad du rgyun mi chad par spyod pas skyo ba med pa'i 
[\[334a.5\]]phyir ro/_/chos rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med cing tshad med pas yongs su yi chad pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/sems can rnam par dag par bya ba'i dmigs pas rnam par 'phel ba thams cad ston pa'i las phyir 'gyed pa med pa'i 
[\[334a.6\]]phyir ro/_/'gro ba thams cad la rim gro bya bas snyom pa med cing sgyid lug pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/'gro ba thams cad snang bar bya bas skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa la 'jug pa las phyir mi ldog cing 
[\[334a.7\]]yongs su skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i rang bzhin ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su 'dzin cing rten kyang ngal ba med cing dub pa med la nyam chung bar mi 'gyur zhing dga' bar mi 'gyur/_
[\[334b\]]
[\[334b.1\]]'jig par mi 'gyur 'gyes par mi 'gyur/_byang bar mi 'gyur/_rnam pa tha dad par mi 'gyur/_rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur/_dngos po gzhan du mi 'gyur/_rang bzhin rnam par mi spong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni nam mkha'i rang 
[\[334b.2\]]bzhin chos nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang smon lam chen po rgya che zhing yangs la tshad med pa dang ldan pas sems can thams cad dgrol ba la nye bar gnas pa'i sgos skyo zhing dub pa'i sems mi 
[\[334b.3\]]skyed do/_/'di lta ste dper na/_mya ngan las 'das pa ni dus gsum gyi sems can mtha' dang dbus med pa de snyed cig yongs su mya ngan las zlo yang bar 'ga' tsam yang skyo ba med cing sgyid lug pa med de yongs su yi chad pa med 
[\[334b.4\]]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi dben pa nyid de de bas na gang las kyang phyir nur bar bya ba med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'gro ba thams cad 
[\[334b.5\]]gdon pa'i phyir 'jig rten du skyes pas sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol ba la skyo ba'i sems mi skyed do/_/'di lta ste dper na/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' de snyed cig byang chub kyi don du gnas kyang 
[\[334b.6\]]skyo ba dang dub pa med de/_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba rnams sangs rgyas kyi mnga' bsgyur ba la bsgrubs so/_/bsgrub po/_/bsgrub par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni zad pa med pa'i chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te/_
[\[334b.7\]]de las gzhan du 'gyur ba med cing 'dul ba'i chos la mngon par chags pa med pas phyir nur ba med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mang po bdag gis thob par byed cing khong du chud par byed do/_/
[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de'i ting nge 'dzin de ni 'od phyogs thams cad kyi mthas klas par 'dal ba/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'od gzer thogs pa med pa/_yon tan sna tshogs du ma'i snying po 
[\[335a.2\]]can gos brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung ba rin po che brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung ba/_spos brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung brgyan dang /_lhab lhub du ma dang ldan pa/_gser gyi dra ba rgya chen pos kun nas yog pa/_dril bu'i dra 
[\[335a.3\]]ba'i sgra kun nas 'byung ba/_blta na bzang zhing yid du 'ong ba/_rin po che sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa/_rin po che sna tshogs mang po ston pas dag cing bzang bar spyod pa gnas shin tu brtan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[335a.4\]]nyid kyi sgo ston pa'i yon tan can/_de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos byin gyis rlabs pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dag pa thams cad kyis yang dag par byung bas rnam par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal gyi byin dang 
[\[335a.5\]]ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs las byung ba/_lus gcig tu gnas kyang phyogs bcu brjod du med cing tshad med par byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i go 'phang dang yon tan tshad med pa grangs med pa 
[\[335a.6\]]brgya stong rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mthun zhing gnas su gyur pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mthun zhing gnas su gyur pas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snang ba 'byung bar byed pa/_
[\[335a.7\]]'gro ba thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyis phyag bya zhing mdun du bya bar 'os pa/_chos nyid sgyu ma lta bu'i mthun pa'i 'bras bu sprul pa kun tu 'gyed pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi dpe dang dpe med pa'i yon tan 
[\[335b\]]
[\[335b.1\]]can te/_de la gnas pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' skyil mo krung gcig tu gnas shing de'i bdag nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par byang chub sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gcig gis 
[\[335b.2\]]yongs su khyab par 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa ste/_de ltar gnas pa'i tshe/_ba spu'i khung bu gcig nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 
[\[335b.3\]]'od gzer 'byung ste/_ba spu'i khung bu gcig nas ji lta ba de bzhin du ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang 'od gzer de snyed de snyed 'byung ngo /_/'od zer gyi sgo de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa phrag 
[\[335b.4\]]bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i snying po can kha dog du mar snang ba/_rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_yon tan gyi rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/_rin po che'i dra ba rgya chen pos kun nas khebs pa/_me tog gi 
[\[335b.5\]]dra ba rgya chen pos yongs su khebs pa/_spos rin po che khrag khrig brgya stong kun tu gtong ba/_rin po che'i rgyan yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs kyi snying po can/_rin po che'i gdugs bsam gyis mi khyab pas bkab pa 'byung ste/_rin po che de dag 
[\[335b.6\]]re re las kyang khang pa brtsegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo /_/khang pa brtsegs pa de dag re re las kyang seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag 
[\[335b.7\]]khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo /_/seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can de dag re re las kyang 'od sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo /_/
[\[336a\]]
[\[336a.1\]]'od de dag re re las kyang kha dog sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo /_/kha dog de dag re re las kyang snang ba'i dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag 
[\[336a.2\]]khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo /_/snang ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag re re las kyang nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba sna tshogs kyi me tog sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i 
[\[336a.3\]]rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo /_/me tog de dag re re las kyang rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo /_/rgyan de dag re re las kyang khyu mchog gi mthu 
[\[336a.4\]]phyung ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo /_/khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i 
[\[336a.5\]]rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi char rab tu 'bab bo/_/chos kyi tshig rnam par phye ba'i char de dag las kyang chos khong du chud par bya ba'i mdo'i tshul sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su brjod 
[\[336a.6\]]do/_/mdo'i tshul yongs su brjod pa de dag re re las kyang chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu ston to/_/chos kyi sgo rab tu bstan pa de dag re re zhing yang ye shes 
[\[336a.7\]]rdo rje lta bus gtan la phebs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo chos kyi rnam grangs sna tshogs dang ldan pa bstan pa rgya chen po can chos kyi tshig rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan par 'khor ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba 
[\[336b\]]
[\[336b.1\]]snyed rab tu skor ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de dag re re zhing yang sems can gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su smin par byed do/_/sems can gyi khams yongs 
[\[336b.2\]]su smin par bya ba 'byam klas pa de dag re re zhing yang sems can gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'dul te/_de ltar snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par 
[\[336b.3\]]'phrul pa rgya chen po ston pa/_ting nge 'dzin gyi yul zil gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]non pa/_sprul pa'i sgyu ma sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa med pa/_rang bzhin tshad med pa mtha' dang dbus med pa brjod du med pa dang ldan pa/_chos kyi dbyings rdul med pa'i rang bzhin can 
[\[336b.4\]]yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid can/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la spyod pa/_chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa/_gnas med pa/_len pa med pa/_rtsa ba med pa/_zab pa/_gting dpag dka' ba/_mngon sum du khong du chud pas rab tu rtogs pa 
[\[336b.5\]]tshad med pa rmongs pa med pa/_gzhi med pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas gzhi med pa dang ldan pa/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu 
[\[336b.6\]]can/_sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rjes su snyegs pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshe gcig pa'i mngon sum du gyur pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i mig rdul med pa dang ldan pa/_shes rab kyi mig kun tu spyod pa can/_sha'i mig rdul dang bral zhing rdul med par 
[\[336b.7\]]yang dag par skyes pa/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan kun tu snang ba can/_ye shes kyi mig zhes bya ba'i don gyi yul dang /_rnam pa rab tu ston pa can chos kyi sgo 'byed pa'i skyes bu dam pa yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems yongs 
[\[337a\]]
[\[337a.1\]]su rdzogs pa/_yul la thogs pa med pa/_ye shes kyi rnam pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/_skye ba med pa yang dag par byung ba/_rnam par 'phrul pas skye ba 
[\[337a.2\]]kun tu ston pa/_byin gyi rlabs kyi yul la mkhas pa/_yon tan mchog gis rnam par dag pa/_bsam pa 'od gsal ba'i snying po can/_mos pa shin tu dge pas ye shes nam mkha'i dbyings kun nas khebs pa dang ldan pa/_
[\[337a.3\]]'phags pa'i tshogs kyis blta bar 'os pa/_smon lam mngon du gyur pa/_'dod pa yongs su rdzogs/_yon tan bsngags pa zad mi shes pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lhag mthong gi mdzod du gyur pa/_sangs rgyas kyi byang 
[\[337a.4\]]chub kyi 'byung gnas rgya mtshor gyur pa ye shes rin po che thams cad kyis shin tu brgyan pa/_ye shes kyi skyes bu pun da ri kar byung ba/_sems can gyi don mtha' dang dbus med par rab tu sgrub pa/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mu med pa la 
[\[337a.5\]]zhugs pa'i 'od gzer gyis snang bar gyur pa/_ye shes kyi 'od yongs su snang ba/_chos rnam par dag pa snang bas kun tu spyod pa/_shin tu dben pa'i sgor gyur pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la thogs pa med par dmigs pa'i ye 
[\[337a.6\]]shes kyi mthar thug pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi thabs dang ldan pa/_yon tan gyi spyod pa las byung ba/_skyes bu dam pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshul rab tu shes pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i btsun spu 
[\[337a.7\]]la rab tu gnas pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par dgongs pas/_rab tu zhugs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku'i byin dang /_snying po can/_dran pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rtse gcig tu 
[\[337b\]]
[\[337b.1\]]gyur pa/_dmigs pa med pa'i yul dang mtshan ma ston pa/_shin tu yangs pa las yang dag par byung ba'i rgyud can/_chags pa med pa'i spyod yul du khong du chud pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis byang chub tshad med pa nam mkha'i dbyings 
[\[337b.2\]]ltar yangs shing sa mtshams med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis 'jig rten thams cad du/_sems can gyi don byed pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i deg ba'i rtsa ba dang /_rgyu mthun pa'i ye shes tshad med pa'i yul rnam par 
[\[337b.3\]]non pa/_dag cing drag shul che ba'i ye shes kyis grub pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa dang yang dag par 'grogs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rigs dag par byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub yid du 'ong ba 
[\[337b.4\]]dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad kyis kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul shin tu phra ba'i thabs shes pa/_rtogs pa rdo rje lta bu'i stobs dang mthus byung ba/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rtogs par 
[\[337b.5\]]gyur pa/_sems can gyis thos par dka' ba mi gnyis pa'i sgor zhugs pa/_chos kyi tshul mtshan nyid med pa la gzhol ba/_mtshan ma'i rgyud kyi chos ston pa thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa/_sems can bsam pa bzhin du 
[\[337b.6\]]'dul ba yang dag par ston pa/_dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba tshim par byed pa/_chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa'i rang bzhin can/_ye shes mi zad pa'i yul shin tu non pa/_byang 
[\[337b.7\]]chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos byung ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i mnyam pa nyid thub pa med pa rab ta thob pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i yon tan la 'jug pa/_thams cad kyi mtha'i rjes su 'gro ba/_rnam par phye ba thams cad la mkhas pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/_chos kyi 
[\[338a\]]
[\[338a.1\]]grangs yongs su ston pa/_zhing thams cad rnam par dmigs par bya ba la rab tu gzhol ba/_zhing dag par bya bar dka' ba thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba thams cad 
[\[338a.2\]]yang dag par ston pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i gnas kyis byung ba 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos rab tu brjod pa/_'jig rten thams cad la rnam par lta ba dge ba mtha' dang mu med 
[\[338a.3\]]pas yang dag par byung ba/_'jig rten gyi rtsom pa thams cad las rnam par 'das pa/_sangs rgyas kyi 'jig rten las 'das pas shin tu byung ba/_mtshungs pa med pa dang /_'dra ba med pa'i dbang gis shes par gyur pa/_
[\[338a.4\]]mkhas pas khong du chud pa/_skyes bu dam pas yang dag par bsu ba/_ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyud yongs su 'dzin pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis byung ba/_lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par 
[\[338a.5\]]dag pas 'bras bu yongs su grub pa/_lhag pa'i bsam pa che ba nyid la gnas pa rab tu thob pa/_mnyan pa dang bstan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thob par bya ba rab tu thob pa/_chos thams cad la chags pa med par gnas pa'i mtha'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/_g.yo 
[\[338a.6\]]ba med par kun tu spyod pa rlom sems thams cad rnam par 'jig pa/_g.yo ba thams cad las yang dag par langs pa/_chos la gnas pas ye shes rnam par snang ba dang ldan pa/_mun pa med pa la zhugs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[338a.7\]]thams cad la yang dag par zhugs pas snang ba thob pa/_'gag pa med par srid pa thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa/_srid pa thams cad khong du chud pa 'dus byas thams cad yul du gyur pa'i tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa dang 
[\[338b\]]
[\[338b.1\]]ldan pa/_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin dang /_ngo bo nyid can lus kyi las mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa/_ngag gi las mu med pa dang ldan pa/_yid kyi las mtha' dang dbus med pa dang ldan pa/_tha snyad dang yi ge'i 
[\[338b.2\]]rgyud brjod du med pa dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/_'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad khong du chud pas chags pa med cing bcings pa med pa 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba'i yul la shin tu bsgoms 
[\[338b.3\]]pa/_chos kyi dbyings gzugs med pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bus yang dag par byung ba/_chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur rnam par bsgom pa la rab tu zhugs pa/_chos kyi dbyings bstan pa la ye shes dbang du gyur 
[\[338b.4\]]pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul ma 'dres pa'i sgo mngon par bsgrubs pa/_stobs bcu'i sar shes par bya ba shin tu bslabs pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi stegs dang ldan pa/_chos thams cad la lhag mthong 
[\[338b.5\]]gi ye shes dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa' chos de dang de dag rnam par dgod pa'i don khong du chud par bya ba la ye shes kyi mig gis zhi gnas kyis yang dag par non cing ye shes chen po bsgom pas rnam par snang bar gyur pa'i khyad 
[\[338b.6\]]par can gyi smon lam dang ldan pa/_rab tu ston pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu tha dad pa med pa bstan pa ste/_de nyid chags pa med pa'i sgo'i tshul lo/_/de nyid byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i 'byung ba'o/_/
[\[338b.7\]]de nyid byang chub sems dpa'i mthus thams cad mkhyen pa'i brtson 'grus la 'jug pa ste/_chags pa med pa la gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhing rnams kyi zhing ngo /_/sems can med pa'i mtha' la gnas par bya ba'i phyir/_sems 
[\[339a\]]
[\[339a.1\]]can gyi khams rnams 'dul ba'o/_dmigs pa thams cad mi dmigs par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu ston pa'o/_/rtog pa thams cad las rab tu dben par bya ba'i phyir gnyis su med
