[\[362b.3\]]gzhan gyi skad kyis rmongs par 'gyur ba med do/_/'di lta ste dper na/_lha'i bu nyi ma ni shar ma thag tu gzugs rnam par phye ba'i rgyud thams cad snang bar byed do/_/de nas [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang ldan pa rnams gzugs de dang de dag mthong bas mtshan 
[\[362b.4\]]ma yongs su 'dzin to/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang skad kyi sprin rnam par phye ba thams cad la 'jug ste/_skad thams cad mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi skad dang dbyangs kyi tshul mkhas pa la 'jug cing khong du chud par byed do/_/
[\[362b.5\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skad kyi tshul thams cad la mkhas pa zhes bya ba ste/_ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa bdun pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[362b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kha dog dang bral bar rab tu shes te/_tha mi dad pa'i kha dog dang /_rnam pa med pa'i kha dog dang /_bye brag med pa'i kha dog dang /_rnam par dbye ba med pa'i kha dog dang /_sngon po med pa'i kha dog dang /_
[\[362b.7\]]ser po med pa'i kha dog dang /_dkar po med pa'i kha dog dang /_nag po med pa'i kha dog dang /_dmar po med pa yang rab tu shes te/_de de bas kyang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par byed pa'i tshe rang gi lus kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan par 
[\[363a\]]
[\[363a.1\]]byin gyis rlob ste/_mtha' yas pa'i kha dog dang /_tshad med pa'i kha dog dang /_rnam par dag pa'i kha dog dang /_shin tu brgyan pa'i kha dog dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang /_dpe med pa'i kha dog dang /_kun tu 
[\[363a.2\]]snang ba'i kha dog dang /_yid du 'ong ba'i kha dog dang /_mi sdug pa med pa'i kha dog dang /_zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa'i kha dog dang /_shin tu gsal ba'i kha dog dang /_kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i kha dog dang /_mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i kha 
[\[363a.3\]]dog dang thub par dka' ba'i kha dog dang /_nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i kha dog dang /_shin tu bsgrubs pa'i kha dog dang /_shin tu mdzes pa'i kha dog dang /_dpag tu med pa'i kha dog dang /_shin tu bsrungs 
[\[363a.4\]]pa'i kha dog dang /_shin tu bsags pa'i kha dog dang /_yongs su smin par byed pa'i kha dog dang /_'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrubs pa'i kha dog dang /_thogs pa med pa'i kha dog dang /_shin tu dang ba'i kha dog dang /_
[\[363a.5\]]rnyog pa med pa'i kha dog dang /_rab tu gsal ba'i kha dog dang /_mdangs dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang /_zil kyis gnon pa'i kha dog dang /_thams cad zil gyis 
[\[363a.6\]]gnon pa'i kha dog dang /_thams cad zil du brlag pa'i kha dog dang /_thams cad zil du rlog par byed pa'i kha dog dang /_rab rib med pa'i kha dog dang /_mun pa med pa'i kha dog dang /_shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i kha 
[\[363a.7\]]dog dang /_sems bde ba'i kha dog dang /_mtshan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang /_dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang /_che ba nyid dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang /_spyod yul dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang /_
[\[363b\]]
[\[363b.1\]]yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i kha dog dang /_bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i kha dog dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa'i kha dog dang /_mchog tu byung zhing rgya che ba'i kha dog dang /_thub pa med pa'i kha dog dang /_gnas pa med pa'i kha dog dang /_
[\[363b.2\]]kun tu mtha' yas pa'i kha dog dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med par rab tu 'dal ba'i kha dog dang /_rnam par 'phel ba'i kha dog dang /_snying po bzung ba'i kha dog dang /_yon tan mchog dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang /_yid 
[\[363b.3\]]bzhin gyi kha dog dang /_mos pa rnam par spyod pa'i kha dog dang /_tshogs shin tu bstsags pa'i kha dog dang /_chos bsgribs pa med par shin tu rtogs pa'i kha dog dang /_nam mkha' ltar 'od dang ba'i kha dog dang /_rnam par 
[\[363b.4\]]dag pas brgyan pa'i kha dog dang /_dri ma med pa'i kha dog dang /_rdul dang bral ba'i kha dog dang /_rdul med pa'i kha dog dang /_dri ma med pa'i kha dog dang /_mtshungs pa med pa'i kha dog dang /_blta na bzang ba'i kha dog 
[\[363b.5\]]dang /_kun nas blta ba'i kha dog dang /_dus bzhin du yang dag par ston pa'i kha dog dang /_rab tu zhi ba'i kha dog dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i kha dog dang /_'od shin tu gsal ba'i kha dog dang /_bsod 
[\[363b.6\]]nams kyi zhing du gyur pa'i kha dog dang /_bde bar byed pa'i kha dog dang /_'jigs pa med par byed pa'i kha dog dang /_gti mug med par spyod pa'i kha dog dang /_ye shes kyis rnam par gnon pa'i kha dog dang /_chags pa med pa'i lus kyi kha dog 
[\[363b.7\]]dang /_lus kyi rgyan kun tu mtha' yas pa'i kha dog dang /_don yod pa'i kha dog dang /_byams pa chen pos yang dag par 'phags pa'i kha dog dang /_snying rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa'i kha dog dang /_tshul mthun 
[\[364a\]]
[\[364a.1\]]par 'byung ba'i kha dog dang /_bsod nams kyi stobs dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang /_rjes su dran par bya ba'i kha dog dang /_rin po che mtha' yas pa'i kha dog dang /_rin po che dam pa rnam par 
[\[364a.2\]]snang ba'i kha dog dang /_'gro ba thams cad dad par bye ba'i kha dog dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon du gyur pa'i kha dog dang /_bzhin 'dzum pa'i kha dog dang /_rin po che'i rgyan gyi dam pa thams cad dang 
[\[364a.3\]]ldan pa'i kha dog dang /_sems mi gnas pa'i kha dog dang /_gnas med pa'i kha dog dang /_byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i kha dog dang /_rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du mas khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i kha dog dang /_de bzhin 
[\[364a.4\]]gshegs pa'i rigs su yang dag par byung ba'i kha dog dang /_'dra ba med pa'i kha dog dang /_chos kyi dbyings su 'dal ba'i kha dog dang /_'khor ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i kha dog dang /_rnam pa sna tshogs kyi kha dog dang /_
[\[364a.5\]]shin tu grub pa'i kha dog dang /_shin tu sbyangs pas rab tu byung ba'i kha dog dang /_'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du spyod lam ston pa'i kha dog dang /_blta na mi ngoms pa'i kha dog dang /_rnam pa sna tshogs su 'od gsal ba'i kha 
[\[364a.6\]]dog dang /_'od gzer gyi dra ba grangs med pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i kha dog dang /_'od sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i kha dog dang /_dri zhim po dang 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pas khams gsum las yang dag par 'da' ba'i kha dog dang /_
[\[364a.7\]]nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i 'od gzer gyis tshad med par snang ba'i kha dog dang /_'khor lo dpe med pa'i gzugs byin gyis rlob pa'i kha dog dang /_me tog gi sprin yid du 'ong ba mtha' yas par rab tu 'thor ba'i kha dog dang /_
[\[364b\]]
[\[364b.1\]]phreng ba'i sprin gyi pad mo sna tshogs su bsgrubs pas yang dag par brgyan pa'i kha dog dang /_'gro ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa'i kha dog dang /_spos zhim po thams cad kyi bsung 'byung bas spos 'phro bar 'gyed pa'i kha dog dang /_
[\[364b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod spu nas byung ba'i kha dog dang /_sgra dbyangs brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pas chos thams cad bstan pa yang dag par ston pa'i kha dog dang /_rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pas kun tu bzang po'i kha 
[\[364b.3\]]dog tu bdag gi lus byin gyis rlob ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni kha dog med pa'i chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas mthong bas 'dul ba dang /_rjes su dran pas 'dul 
[\[364b.4\]]ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor los 'dul ba dang /_dus kyis 'dul ba dang /_skad cig gis 'dul ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bas 'dul ba dang /_khong du chud par bya bas 'dul ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dul ba dang /_rnam par 'phrul ba sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba dang /_
[\[364b.5\]]cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'dul ba rnams la rnam pa de lta bu'i kha dog tu rang gi lus byin gyis rlob po/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi kha dog grangs med pa'i lus mngon par bsgrub 
[\[364b.6\]]pa'i rgyan ces bya ba mngon par shes pa'i ye shes 'gro ba thams cad yongs su 'grel ba la brtson pa ste brgyad pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad bdag med par rab 
[\[364b.7\]]tu shes so/_/chos thams cad rig med par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad 'ong ba med par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad 'bral ba med par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad bye brag med par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad tha dad pa med par rab tu shes so/_/chos 
[\[365a\]]
[\[365a.1\]]thams cad gnyis su byar med par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad mi gnyis pa dang mi gnyis pa ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad bdag nyid med par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad 
[\[365a.2\]]'dra ba med par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad 'gro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad ma skyes par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad ma 'gag par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad 'pho ba med par rab 
[\[365a.3\]]tu shes so/_/chos thams cad 'jig pa med par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad bden pa med par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pas mtshan 
[\[365a.4\]]nyid gcig par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad yod pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad med pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad chos kyang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad chos 
[\[365a.5\]]ma yin pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad spyod pa la gzhol ba yang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_chos thams cad spyod pa la mi gzhol ba 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad las kyang ma yin par rab tu shes 
[\[365a.6\]]so/_/chos thams cad las ma yin pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad rnam par smin pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad rnam par smin pa ma yin pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad 
[\[365a.7\]]mngon par 'du bya ba med par yang rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad brda yang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad brda ma yin pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/
[\[365b\]]
[\[365b.1\]]chos thams cad don dam pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad don dam pa ma yin pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad 'byung ba 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad mi 'byung ba 'ang 
[\[365b.2\]]ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad 'byin pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad mi 'byin pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad tshad med par yang rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad tshad med pa ma 
[\[365b.3\]]yin par yang rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad 'jig rten pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad rgyu las byung ba 'ang ma yin par rab 
[\[365b.4\]]tu shes so/_/chos thams cad rgyu las ma byung ba 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad kha dog nges pa med pa 'ang rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad kha dog nges pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos 
[\[365b.5\]]thams cad kha dog yongs su grub pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad kha dog yongs su ma grub pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad byung ba 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos 
[\[365b.6\]]thams cad byung ba ma yin pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad rnam par brtags pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad rnam par ma brtags pa 'ang ma yin par 
[\[365b.7\]]rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad tshul yang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad tshul ma yin pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/de ni spyod pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/don dam pa la gnas pa 
[\[366a\]]
[\[366a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/chos la rab tu rtog pa med do/_/yi ge yongs su sgrub pa med do/_/zhi ba'i rjes su shin tu 'brang ngo /_/smon lam yongs su mi gtong ngo /_/don gyi tshul la rnam par lta'o/_/chos 
[\[366a.2\]]kyi tshul la rab tu 'jug go_/chos kyi sprin kun nas slong ngo /_/chos yongs su 'bab pa'i yi ge'i char mngon par 'bebs so/_/tshul brjod du med pa la 'jug go_/tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa zad mi shes pa don gyi tshul rab tu 
[\[366a.3\]]brjod cing chos kyi tshul mngon par ston pas chos thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa dang /_chos thams cad spobs pas thabs mkhas pa'i tshul brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la rab tu 'jug go_/byams pa chen 
[\[366a.4\]]po rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa/_yi ge med pa'i yul dang ldan pa/_yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa'i don la brtson zhing 'gal ba med pa/_rang gzhan gyi chos la brtson pa chos thams cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar 
[\[366a.5\]]ston pas gos pa med pa/_brjod pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/_de chos thams cad zad mi shes pa'i spobs pas ston to/_/brjod do/_/rnam par 'god do/_/yang dag par ston to/_/'grel to/_/rnam par 
[\[366a.6\]]'gyed do/_/'byin to/_/khong du chud par byed do/_/rab tu ston to/_/rtogs par byed do/_/rab tu sgrub bo/_/rnam par sbyong ngo /_/the tsom sel to/_/dogs pa gcod do/_/de kho na ston to/_/rang bzhin rjod do/_/'gro ba la phan 
[\[366a.7\]]'dogs so/_/chos nyid las mi nyams so/_/mi gnyis pa la 'jug go_/chags pa med pa'i sgo ston to/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pas rab tu 'jom pa'i sgras sgra'i char yang bsam pa ji lta bu'i dus 
[\[366b\]]
[\[366b.1\]]las yol bar mi byed par mngon par 'bebs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa ste dgu pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[366b.2\]]dag_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems skad cig re re zhing chos thams cad 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rgyun mi gcod do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i las 
[\[366b.3\]]kyang thogs par mi byed do/_byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa chen po las kyang rnam par mi 'da'o/_/snying rje chen po las kyang phyir mi ldog go_/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang rgyun mi gcod do/_/zhing thams cad rab tu 
[\[366b.4\]]dbye zhing mkhas par bya bas kyang skyo bar mi byed do/_/'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i smon lam yang rgyun mi gcod do/_/chos kyi 'khor lo yang thogs par mi byed do/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul 
[\[366b.5\]]bar bya ba yang ring du mi spong ngo /_/sangs rgyas mchod cing rim gro bya ba yang rgyun mi gcod do/_/chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i sgo las kyang phyir mi ldog go_/sangs rgyas mthong ba'i skal ba med par yang mi 'gyur 
[\[366b.6\]]ro/_/chos thams cad yongs su dri ba las kyang phyir mi ldog go_/mnyam pa nyid dang bstod pa yang rab tu shes so/_/bsgribs pa med par yang mngon par sgrub bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la khyad par gyi smon 
[\[366b.7\]]lam mnyam pa nyid kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/zhing thams cad kyi gzhi dang /_dbyibs tha dad pa'i rjes su 'ang rab tu 'jug ste/_sangs rgyas kyi rigs thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'thob pa yin/_'jig rten 
[\[367a\]]
[\[367a.1\]]gyi khams kyi rgyud de dang de dag tu chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur bslab pa 'ang shin tu bslabs pa yin/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la zhugs pas chos thams cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 
[\[367a.2\]]mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin/_chos thams cad lus med pa'i tshul dang /_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul dang spyod pa'i tshul khong du chud pa dang yang ldan pa yin/_chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba la mi gnas pa yin 
[\[367a.3\]]chos kyi tshul thams cad rab tu rtogs shing bsam pa dang /_dbang po ji lta ba'ang rab tu rtogs pa yin/_de 'dod na bskal pa dang bskal pa gcig dang /_bskal pa brgya dang /_bskal pa stong dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig 
[\[367a.4\]]dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig brgya dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig stong dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong dang /_bskal pa tshad med pa dang /_dpag tu med pa dang /_grangs med pa 
[\[367a.5\]]dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mtshungs pa med pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_kun tu mtha' yas pa dang /_mu med pa dang /_sa mtshams med pa dang /_bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par chos thams 
[\[367a.6\]]cad 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs kyang de'i lus 'jig par mi 'gyur ro/_/nyam chung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/skal ba zhan par mi 'gyur ro/_/chud mi za'o/_rnam par chud mi za'o/_/zhum par mi 'gyur 
[\[367a.7\]]ro/_/rnam par zhum par mi 'gyur ro/_/zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/dngos po yod pa dang med par mi 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid kyang 
[\[367b\]]
[\[367b.1\]]brjod do/_/sems can gyi dus kyang yongs su mi spong ngo /_/sems can 'dul ba'i dus la bab pa yang thogs par mi byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid kyang rnam par 'phel bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mnyam pa 
[\[367b.2\]]nyid kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/sems can thams cad kyi don kyang yongs su mi gtong ngo /_/sprul pa'i rgyud kyang rgyun mi gcod do/_/mig yor lta bu'i chos kyi tshul las kyang ldog par mi byed do/_/bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 
[\[367b.3\]]'dzin gyis las kyang mi g.yo'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad 'gog pa zhes bya ba ste/_ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa bcu pa'o/_/de la gnas pa'i byang 
[\[367b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/_'gro ba thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/_nyan thos thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/_rang 
[\[367b.5\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/_sa 'og ma la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/_lus kyi las bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/_ngag gi las bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/_
[\[367b.6\]]yid kyi las bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/_ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/_ye shes kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems 
[\[367b.7\]]dpa' de dag bstan par mdzad cing bshad pa dang /_gnas de dag dgod par mdzad de/_khong du chud par mdzad pa dang /_mngon par shes pa de lta bu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bstan pa dang /_brjod pa dang /_bshad pa dang /_rab tu bkod pa dang /_bsngags pa dang /_bstod pa dang /_bkrol 
[\[368a\]]
[\[368a.1\]]ba dang /_rab tu bstan pa dang /_yongs su brjod pa ni ma gtogs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po de dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa ste/_de dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[368a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams ni dus gsum thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa bsgribs pa med pa rab tu 'thob bo/_mngon par shes pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//[{D44-35}]sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba 
[\[368a.3\]]shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po nyi shu brgyad pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/_yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po gang 'di rnams ni/_byang chub sems 
[\[368a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bzod pa thob pa ste/_bzod pa thob pa de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bzod pa thams cad kyis bsgribs pa med pa thob pas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos zad mi shes pa bsgribs pa med pa thams cad thob 
[\[368a.5\]]par 'gyur ba dag go_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sgra khong du chud pa'i bzod pa dang /_mthun pa'i bzod pa dang /_mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa dang /_sgyu ma lta bu'i bzod pa dang /_smig rgyu lta bu'i bzod pa dang /_rmi lam lta bu'i bzod 
[\[368a.6\]]pa dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i bzod pa dang /_nam mkha' lta bu'i bzod pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po de rnam ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa thob pa ste/_
[\[368a.7\]]'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/_/gsung ngo /_/gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la bzod pa dang po sgra khong du chud pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste chos de dag thos 
[\[368b\]]
[\[368b.1\]]nas mi 'jigs [{]myi [,]mi [}]skrag_/skrag par mi 'gyur zhing dad pa dang /_yid ches pa dang /_mos pa dang /_spro ba dang 'jug pa dang rjes su 'brang ba dang /_de'i rang bzhin du gnas shing khong du chud par byed pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang 
[\[368b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgra khong du chud pa'i bzod pa thob pa ste dang po'o/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mthun pa'i bzod pa thob pa gnyis pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[368b.3\]]sras dag_/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'di dag ni mthun pa zhes bya bar rtog go_/dpyod do/_/mnyam par byed do/_/mi 'gal bar byed do/_/chos de dag la ji ltar mthun par 'jug par bya ba de ltar rnam par sgom 
[\[368b.4\]]mo/_/bsam pa rnam par dag par byed do/_/mnyam par byed do/_/brtson par byed do/_/rtogs par byed do/_/rab tu sgrub po/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mthun pa'i bzod pa 
[\[368b.5\]]thob pa ste gnyis pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa gsum pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdul 
[\[368b.6\]]tsam gyi chos kyang gang yang skyes par mthong ba med do/_/chos gang yang 'gag par mthong ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang ma skyes pa de ni ma 'gags pa'o/_/gang ma 'gags pa de ni mi zad pa'o/_/gang mi zad pa de ni rdul med 
[\[368b.7\]]pa'o/_/gang rdul med pa de ni tha mi dad pa'o/_/gang tha mi dad pa de ni gzhi med pa'o/_/gang gzhi med pa de ni zhi ba'i sa'o/_/gang zhi ba'i sa yin pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'o/_/gang 'dod chags dang bral ba de ni mngon par 'du bya 
[\[369a\]]
[\[369a.1\]]ba med pa'o/_/gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa de ni smon pa med pa'o/_/gang smon pa med pa de ni gnas pa med cing len pa med pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[369a.2\]]po rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa ste gsum pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgyu ma lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa bzhi pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems 
[\[369a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul gyis sgyu ma lta bur 'jug ste/_chos kyi rnam pa gcig la rnam pa mang por mos par byed do/_/chos rnam pa mang po la chos kyi rnam pa gcig tu mos par byed do/_/
[\[369a.4\]]de ni chos de dag la sgyu ma'i tshul gyis zhing du'ang sgom par byed do/_/sems can du 'ang khong du chud par byed do/_/chos kyi dbyings su yang rtog par byed do/_/'jig rten gyi khams su yang mnyam par byed do/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[369a.5\]]skye bar yang mtshungs par byed do/_/'jug tu med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rjes su 'jug go_/byin gyi rlabs kyi tshul gyis kyang mngon par sgrub bo/_/'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma ni glang po'i lus la yang mi gnas so/_/rta'i 
[\[369a.6\]]lus la yang mi gnas so/_/shing rta'i lus la yang mi gnas so/_/rkang thang gi lus la yang mi gnas so/_/bud med la 'ang mi gnas so/_/skyes pa la 'ang mi gnas so/_/rogs po la 'ang mi gnas so/_/bu mo la 'ang mi gnas so/_/shing la 'ang 
[\[369a.7\]]mi gnas so/_/lo ma la 'ang mi gnas so/_/me tog la 'ang mi gnas so/_/'bras bu la 'ang mi gnas so/_/sa dang chu dang [{]mye [,]me [}]dang rlung la 'ang mi gnas so/_/nyin zhag dang zla ba yar kham mar kham dang /_zla ba dang lo la 'ang 
[\[369b\]]
[\[369b.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/lo brgya la'ang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/zla ba dang nyi ma la'ang mi gnas so/_/bskal pa la'ang mi gnas so/_/zhi ba dang rab tu zhi ba la'ang mi gnas so/_/sna tshogs dang rnam pa sna tshogs la'ang mi gnas so/_/gcig pa dang 
[\[369b.2\]]tha dad pa la'ang mi gnas so/_/yangs pa dang dog pa la 'ang mi gnas so/_/rgya chen po dang rgya chung ngu la'ang mi gnas so/_/tshad yod pa dang tshad med pa la 'ang mi gnas so/_/phra ba dang rags pa la'ang mi gnas so/_/'khor sna 
[\[369b.3\]]tshogs la 'ang mi gnas so/_/'khor kyang sgyu ma la mi gnas/_sgyu ma yang 'khor la mi gnas te/_sgyu ma kun tu bstan pa dang sna tshogs kyi sgyu ma rnam pa tha dad pa bstan pa'i grangs su bgrang ba yang yod do/_/de bzhin du byang 
[\[369b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'jig rten thams cad la/_sgyu ma lta bur 'jug cing las kyi 'jig rten dang /_nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten dang /_zhing gi 'jig rten dang chos kyi 'jig rten dang /_dus kyi 'jig rten dang /_

[\[370a\]]
[\[370a.1\]]la dpyod pa med do/_/byang chub la yongs su rtog pa med do/_/sangs rgyas 'byung bar mi byed do/_/sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi byed do/_/smon lam la gnas par mi byed 
[\[370a.2\]]do/_/skyon med pa la chags par mi byed do/_/mnyam pa nyid mi len to/_/chags pa med pa mi 'dor ro/_/zhing la chags pa med do/_/tha dad pa med par yang khong du chud do/_/sems can gyi khams kyang mngon par sgrub ste/_sems 
[\[370a.3\]]can gyi khams tha dad pa'ang rab tu shes so/_/chos kyi dbyings kyang khong du chud de gnas pa'i chos nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o/_/dus mnyam pa nyid la'ang rab tu 'jug ste/_dus la rnam par rtog pas kyang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/phung 
[\[370a.4\]]po dang skye mched rnams kyang mngon par sgrub ste/_gnas yang dag par gzhol ba 'ang khong du chud par byed do/_/sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed de/_chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid tha dad pa med par yang rab tu 
[\[370a.5\]]shes so/_/chos thams cad brjod du med cing yi ge med par yang rab tu shes te/_so so yang dag par rig pas kyang thogs pa med do/_/sems can thams cad dgrol ba'i don du 'dod pa la 'ang chags par mi byed do/_/snying 
[\[370a.6\]]rje chen pos kyang 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/sems can la lta ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'ang byin gyis rlob ste/_snying rje chen po'i phyogs la'ang sems can thams cad yongs su 'grel to/_/
[\[370a.7\]]sngon gyi rgyu yang rab tu rjod de/_rgyu 'pho ba med pa 'am yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgyu ma lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa ste bzhi pa'o/_/
[\[370b\]]
[\[370b.1\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi smig rgyu lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa lnga pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams 
[\[370b.2\]]cad smig rgyu lta bur rab tu shes te/_'di lta ste dper na/_smig rgyu ni yul na'ang mi gnas phyogs na'ang mi gnas pa'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang yul na yang mi gnas/_phyogs na'ang mi 
[\[370b.3\]]gnas pa'i chos nyid rab tu shes te/_'jig rten nang na'ang mi gnas/_phyi rol na'ang mi gnas pa dang /_yod pa'ang ma yin/_med pa'ang ma yin pa dang /_rtag pa'ang ma yin/_chad pa'ang ma yin par rnam par rig par gyur pa 
[\[370b.4\]]rab tu shes so/_/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/nang zhes bya ba nang na gnas pa ma yin pa dang /_nang zhes bya ba phyi rol na gnas pa ma yin pa dang /_kha dog gcig pa ma yin pa dang /_kha dog tha dad pa ma yin

[\[370b.7\]]thams cad rmi lam lta bur rab tu shes te/_'di lta ste/_dper na/_rmi lam ni 'jig rten las byung ba'ang ma yin/_'jig rten las 'das pa'ang ma yin/_rmi lam ni 'dod pa'i khams kyang ma yin/_
[\[371a\]]
[\[371a.1\]]gzugs kyi khams kyang ma yin/_gzugs med pa'i khams kyang ma yin no/_/rmi lam ni shi 'pho ba 'ang ma yin/_skye ba 'ang ma yin no/_/rmi lam ni kun nas nyon mongs pa 'ang ma 
[\[371a.2\]]yin/_rnam par byang ba 'ang ma yin no/_/rmi lam ni lta ba 'ang ma yin/_/rnam par dag pa 'ang ma yin te/_rmi lam snang ba yang med pa 'ang ma yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'jig rten thams cad 'khrug 
[\[371a.3\]]pa med pa'i tshul gyis rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid dang tshul dang /_rmi lam la mngon par chags pa dang /_rmi lam rab tu dben pa dang /_rmi lam gyi rang bzhin dang /_rmi lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_rmi lam tha mi dad pa dang /_rmi lam gyi 'du 
[\[371a.4\]]shes dang rnam par rtog pa dang /_rmi lam gyi 'jig rten khong du chud pa lta bur rab tu shes te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmi lam lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa ste drug pa'o/_/kye rgyal 
[\[371a.5\]]ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgra brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa bdun pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_
[\[371a.6\]]chos nyid mngon par bsgrub pa'i bslab pa la shin tu bslabs pa yin te/_'di lta ste dper na/_sgra brnyan ni sgra sna tshogs grag par byed kyang 'pho ba med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang /_
[\[371a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung nang na brjod pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung phyi rol na brjod pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/de ltar shes pa de yang nang nas shes pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/phyi rol nas shes 
[\[371b\]]
[\[371b.1\]]pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/phyi nang nas shes pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes te/_'on kyang bstan pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'ang rab tu shes so/_/byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pas 'jug pa yang rab tu shes so/_/tshig kyang rab tu shes so/_/
[\[371b.2\]]sgra brnyan lta bur rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas grag par gyur pa'i chos nyid kyang 'khrug par mi byed de/_sgro 'dogs par yang mi byed la dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug cing bslab pa la'ang shin tu bslabs pa yin/_'di lta ste dper 
[\[371b.3\]]na/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi lha'i bud med 'grogs ma'i kha'i dbugs kyis lan gcig bus bas kha'i dbugs yan lag stong dang ldan pa 'byung ngo /_/kha'i dbugs la rnam par rtog pa med kyang dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam pa stong du sgrog go_/de bzhin du 
[\[371b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rnam par mi rtog pa dang ldan pa'i dbyings la 'jug pa'i tshe/_dbyangs kyi yan lag mtha' yas pa rnam par bsgom pa la mkhas pas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med par 'gro ba thams 
[\[371b.5\]]cad la phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la rab tu 'jug cing 'khor rnams la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston to/_/lce shin tu yangs pa'ang byin gyis rlob ste/_dbyangs chags pa med pa 'ang rab tu rjod do/_/zhing thams cad du 'gengs 
[\[371b.6\]]pa'i dbyangs kyang byin gyis rlob bo/_/sems can rnams kyi mtha' yas par khong du chud par yang byin gyis rlob bo/_/chos rnam par phye ba 'byam klas pa yang rab tu snang bar byed do/_/dbyangs thams cad la 'jug pa med pa 'ang rab tu shes 
[\[371b.7\]]so/_/sgra rnam par dmigs pa 'ang rnam par dmigs pa med par rab tu shes so/_/dbyangs sna tshogs kyang rnam par 'god do/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag gi dkyil 'khor khong du chud pas kyang rab tu spyod do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni 
[\[372a\]]
[\[372a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgra brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa ste/_bdun pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gzugs brnyan lta bu'i bzod 
[\[372a.2\]]pa thob pa brgyang ba gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten nas shi 'pho ba med do/_/'jig rten du skye ba med do/_/'jig rten gyi nang na mi gnas so/_/'jig rten gyi phyi rol 
[\[372a.3\]]na mi gnas so/_/'jig rten du rgyu ba med do/_/'jig rten du rgyun 'chad pa med do/_/'jig rten dang 'dres pa med do/_/'jig rten dang tha dad pa med do/_/'jig rten du 'gro ba med do/_/'jig rten las gol bar 'gro ba med do/_/'jig rten du gzhol bar 
[\[372a.4\]]'gro ba med do/_/'jig rten las ldog pa med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyang 'jig rten ma yin te/_'jig rten las 'das pa'ang ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'ang ma yin te/_smon lam chen po rgyun gcod pa'ang 
[\[372a.5\]]ma yin no/_/mang ba 'ang ma yin/_nyung ba 'ang ma yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rdzogs par thob par bya ba la'ang don yod par spyod do/_/'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi rjes su 
[\[372a.6\]]'brang ba 'ang ma yin no/_/chos kyi rgyud thogs par byed pa 'ang ma yin no/_/'di lta ste dper na/_gzugs brnyan ni nyi ma 'am/_zla ba 'am bud med dam skyes pa 'am/_shing ngam/_ri 'am/_gnas sam/_rtsig pa 'am/_sa 'am chu klung gi rgyud dam/_dngos 
[\[372a.7\]]po sna tshogs mtha' yas pa tshad med pa rnams kyi gzugs gang dang gang yod pa de dag thams cad rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par byed de/_chu 'am/_til mar ram/_nor bu 'am/_mching bu 'am/_me long ngam gzhan yang yo byad kha dog dang ba mdog gsal ba gang yang rung ste/_
[\[372b\]]
[\[372b.1\]]de dag shin tu dad pa'i phyir de dag tu gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par byed kyang gzugs brnyan ni shin tu dang ba'i dbyings de dang 'dres pa'ang med de/_gzugs brnyan de de las gud na 'dug pa'ang ma yin no/_/gzugs brnyan de de 
[\[372b.2\]]ltar rnam par dmigs pa dang yang 'grogs pa med do/_/dang pa'i dngos po de yang gzugs brnyan gyis dang 'grogs pa med do/_/gzugs brnyan de chu klung gi rgyun gyis kyang khyer bar mi nus so/_/gzugs brnyan de chu bo'i rgya mtshor 
[\[372b.3\]]'chi bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/dang ba sna tshogs de dag gis kyang gzugs brnyan de la gos par mi 'gyur te/_de dag tu gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa 'ang yod cing de dag gis bzung ba 'dra yang gzugs brnyan gang du dmigs 
[\[372b.4\]]par gyur pa des de'i cha bzung ba med do/_/gzugs brnyan de ni ring bar yang snang nye bar snang ste/_de ltar ring ba dang nye ba 'ang med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rang gi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gzhan gyi rgyud 
[\[372b.5\]]kyi yul du snang bar byed kyang 'di ni gzhan gyi rgyud do/_/'di ni bdag gi ye shes kyi rgyud do/_/'di ni bdag gi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor to zhes gnyis su mi byed do/_/bdag gi yul dang gzhan gyi yul rnam par dbye ba 'ang rab tu shes so/_/'di lta ste/_
[\[372b.6\]]dper na sa bon du gyur pa ni shin tu 'phel zhing skye ba yin te/_chu ba dang lo ma dang sbu gu'i gnas su gyur pa nas rnam par dbye ba 'ang yod do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos nyid mi gnyis pa la 
[\[372b.7\]]gnyis kyi mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i ye shes la chags pa med pa'i mtha'i tshul gyis rab tu 'jug go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gzugs brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa ste/_brgyad 
[\[373a\]]
[\[373a.1\]]pa'o/_/bzod pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa dag tu 'gro ba 'ang ba med la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod 
[\[373a.2\]]du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag tu yang snang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams gang nas kyang g.yo ba med cing /_'jig rten gyi khams gang du yang 'gro ba med la/_lus kyi dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan du gyur pa yang kun tu rnam par dmigs 
[\[373a.3\]]par byed do/_/rjes su song ba'i lus kyang 'jig rten thams cad du phyin par byed do/_/lus rnam par phye ba chags pa med pas spyod pa yang rab tu shes so/_/gang yang 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi mtshan ma dang /_'jig rten dong skom 
[\[373a.4\]]yod pa de dag 'dres pa 'ang ma yin/_tha dad pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su rigs dang ldan par byung ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid rnam par dag pa 'ang rab tu 'thob bo/_/kha dog mtha' yas 
[\[373a.5\]]pa'i lus thams cad rnam par dag pa 'ang rab tu 'thob bo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sprul pa lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems 
[\[373a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad sprul pa lta bur rab tu 'jug ste/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pas sprul pa dang /_bsams te sprul pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams mngon par 'du byed pas sprul pa dang /_
[\[373a.7\]]rnam par rtog pas sprul pa dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad kyi phyin ci log gis sprul pa dang /_sgro btags pas sprul pa dang /_'jig rten gyi chos thams cad med pas sprul pa dang /_tshig gi lam gyi byin gyi 
[\[373b\]]
[\[373b.1\]]rlabs kyis sprul pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yongs su rtog pas sprul pa dang /_'du shes kyis sprul pa dang /_'di lta ste 'dul ba rnam par byang bar bya ba dang /_rnam par dag par bya ba'i yongs su rtog pas sprul pa dang 
[\[373b.2\]]'di lta ste dus gsum du phyir mi ldog pas sprul pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byung ba med pa dang /_'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyis sprul pa spyod pas yangs par byas pa dang /_'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen 
[\[373b.3\]]pos sprul pa 'gro ba thams cad la bstabs par rnam par bkod pa dang /_'di lta ste chos kyi 'khor lo dang /_thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis sprul pa mi 'jig pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes kyis 'jug pa 
[\[373b.4\]]rab tu shes te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i sprul pa rab tu shes par byed do/_/khong du chud par byed do/_/rtogs par byed do/_/yangs par byed do/_/
[\[373b.5\]]mtha' dang dbus dang mu med par ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin du thob par byed do/_/grub par byed do/_/dbang du byed do/_/de kho na nyid du shes so/_/yang dag pa nyid las mi g.yo bar byed do/_/yang dag par lta'o/_/ji ltar 
[\[373b.6\]]spyod pa bzhin du chud za bar mi byed do/_/'di lta ste dper na/_sprul pa ni sems las mi 'byung ste/_sems kyi chos las ma byung las kyis bsgrubs pa ma yin/_rnam par smin pa'i rjes su 'brang ba ma yin/_'jig rten 
[\[373b.7\]]du skyes pa ma yin/_'jig rten du 'gag pa ma yin/_chos kyi rjes su snyegs pa ma yin/_chos thob par byed pa ma yin/_ring du gnas pa ma yin/_yud tsam du gnas pa ma yin/_'jig rten na spyod pa ma yin/_'jig rten 
[\[374a\]]
[\[374a.1\]]las 'das pa ma yin/_phyogs su 'gro ba ma yin/_phyogs la gzhol ba ma yin/_tshad yod pa ma yin/_tshad med pa ma yin/_skyo ba ma yin skyo ba med pa ma yin/_rgyun chad pa ma yin rgyun mi chad pa 
[\[374a.2\]]ma yin/_'phags pa ma yin/_so so'i skye bo ma yin/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/_rnam par byang ba ma yin/_shi 'phos pa ma yin/_skyes pa ma yin/_shes pa ma yin/_mi shes pa ma yin/_snang ba ma yin/_'jig pa ma yin/_'jig rten 
[\[374a.3\]]la gnas pa ma yin/_chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba ma yin/_mkhas pa ma yin/_shes rab 'chal pa can ma yin/_nye bar len pa ma yin/_nye bar mi len pa ma yin/_'khor ba ma yin/_mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin/_
[\[374a.4\]]yod pa ma yin/_med pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pas/_'jig rten na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod de/_de 'jig rten gyi chos la lta zhing 
[\[374a.5\]]bdag mngon par sprul pa byed kyang 'jig rten gyi sprul pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/bdag gi sprul pa la mngon par chags pa med do/_/bdag dang 'jig rten gyi mngon par sprul pa la yongs su rtog pa med do/_/'jig rten 
[\[374a.6\]]la gnas pa med do/_/'jig rten rgyun gcod pa med do/_/chos la gnas pa med do/_/chos kyi dbang du 'gro ba ma yin no/_/sems can gyi khams kyang rdul tsam yang 'dul ba med do/_/sems can gyi khams smon lam las yongs su 
[\[374a.7\]]spong ba med do/_/chos de dag la rtog pa med do/_/rnam par rtog pa med do/_/chos de dag la len pa med do/_/chos de dag la 'dor ba med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos yod pa ma yin pa de dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_chos de 
[\[374b\]]
[\[374b.1\]]dag kyang yod pa'ang ma yin med pa'ang ma yin no/_/ji ltar sprul pa de yod pa'ang ma yin med pa yang ma yin pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sprul pa lta bu'i bzod pa la gnas shing /_sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[374b.2\]]kyi byang chub kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/sems can gyi don kyang rab tu byed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sprul pa lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa ste/_dgu pa'o/_/bzod pa de 
[\[374b.3\]]dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la mi gnas pa yin te/_ji ltar sprul pa de 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la mi gnas par spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rnam par rtog 
[\[374b.4\]]pa med par spyod pa dang /_ji ltar sprul pa de sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la dub pa med par spyod pa dang /_ji ltar sprul pa de phyin ci log med cing lus su dmigs pa thams cad la lus med par 
[\[374b.5\]]spyod pa dang /_ji ltar sprul pa de byin gyi rlabs kyis gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi gzugs la mi gnas par spyod pa dang /_ji ltar sprul pa de rang bzhin snang ba'i tshul du yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 
[\[374b.6\]]dang /_ji ltar sprul pa de chos thams cad la rnam par grol ba'i chos gnas med par spyod pa dang /_ji ltar sprul pa de gnas med pa'i rang bzhin dang /_chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi rnam par byang ba la spyod pa dang /_ji ltar sprul pa de de 
[\[374b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor du cho 'phrul gyi nye bar 'gro zhing 'gro ba med par spyod pa dang /_ji ltar sprul pa de khor yug dang /_ri rab thams cad la snang ba bzhin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[375a\]]
[\[375a.1\]]chen po rnams kyi nam mkha' lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa bcu pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul gyis chos 
[\[375a.2\]]kyi dbyings thams cad la 'jug go_/nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar zhing thams cad bsgrub pa med pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la 'jug go_/nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams 
[\[375a.3\]]cad la 'jug go_/nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar 'jug pa med pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la 'jug go_/nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar rnam par dbye ba med pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas thams cad la 'jug go_/nam 
[\[375a.4\]]mkha' ji lta ba de ltar tha dad pa med pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs thams cad la 'jug go_/nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar byung ba'i tshul gyis bsam gtan thams cad la rab tu 'jug 
[\[375a.5\]]go_/nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug go_/nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar chags pa med cing bsgribs pa med pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku 
[\[375a.6\]]la 'jug go_/nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar nam mkha'i dbyings kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad gsal ba med pa la 'jug go_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' lta bu'i chos thams cad la de lta bu'i bzod 
[\[375a.7\]]pa las byung ba'i ye shes kyis 'jug pa'i tshe/_lus nam mkha' lta bur rab tu 'thob bo/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i lus kyi las rab tu 'thob bo/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i ngag rab tu 'thob bo/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i ngag gi las rab tu 'thob bo/_/
[\[375b\]]
[\[375b.1\]]nam mkha' lta bu'i yid rab tu 'thob bo/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i yid kyi las rab tu 'thob bo//_//'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' ni chos thams cad dang ldan te/_'chi 'pho ba 'ang med do skye ba 'ang med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[375b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad kyi lus dang ldan te shi 'pho ba 'ang med do/_/skye ba yang med do/_/'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' ni gzhi med de tha dad pa med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[375b.3\]]po yang chos thams cad shes pas gzhi med de sangs rgyas kyi stobs rnams dang tha mi dad do/_/'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi gzhi ste/_rang bzhin med pa dang yul med pas gzhi yang ma yin no/_/de bzhin du byang 
[\[375b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad kyi gzhi yin te/_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin med pas gzhi yang ma yin no/_/'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni skye ba med cing 'gag pa med kyang 'jig rten thams cad kyi skye ba dang 'gag 
[\[375b.5\]]pa 'dzin to/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'jug pa 'ang med yongs su rdzogs pa yang med de/_'jig rten thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa yang rab tu ston to/_/'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni phyogs kyang 
[\[375b.6\]]ma yin/_phyogs mtshams kyang ma yin te/_phyogs rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la 'ang yang dag par gzhol lo/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang las kyang ma yin/_rnam par smin pa yang ma yin te las dang 
[\[375b.7\]]rnam par smin pa rgya mtsho yang yongs su ston to/_/'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni ldang ba med cing 'dug pa med de/_rnam par phye ba mtha' yas pa 'ang yongs su ston to/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang spyod pa 
[\[376a\]]
[\[376a.1\]]yang med gnas pa yang med de/_spyod pa rnam par phye ba'ang yongs su ston to/_/'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni kha dog kyang ma yin/_kha dog med pa'ang ma yin te/_kha dog gi rnam pa yang yongs su 
[\[376a.2\]]ston to/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'jig rten pa'i kha dog kyang ma yin/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i kha dog kyang ma yin te/_kha dog mtha' yas pa yang yongs su ston to/_/'di lta ste 
[\[376a.3\]]dper na/_nam mkha' ni ring du gnas pa yang ma yin yud tsam cig tu gnas pa yang ma yin te/_gnas pa dang yongs su gnas pa yang rab tu ston to/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang ring du gnas pa 
[\[376a.4\]]yang ma yin/_yud tsam cig tu gnas pa yang ma yin te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dang /_yongs su gnas pa yang rab tu ston to/_/'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni kun nas nyon mongs pas nyon mongs par 
[\[376a.5\]]gyur pa'ang med la rnam par byang bas rnam par byang bar gyur pa yang med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'jig rten la 'jug pas bsgribs pa yang med rnam par dag cing gsal bar gyur pa yang med do/_/'di 
[\[376a.6\]]lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/_'jig rten thams cad ni nam mkha'i mngon sum du gyur pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad 
[\[376a.7\]]la mngon du gyur pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad kyi mngon sum du gyur pa ma yin no/_/'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' ni gnas thams cad la rab tu gzhol ba yin te/_nam mkha'i mtha' ni yod pa ma yin no/_/
[\[376b\]]
[\[376b.1\]]de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos kyi gnas thams cad la gnas te/_byang chub kyi sems ni mtha' yod pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni bdag nyid nam mkha' dang mnyam par byas te/_
[\[376b.2\]]yongs su bsgoms pa dang /_rnam par sbyangs pa dang /_shin tu bsgrubs pa dang /_mnyam pa nyid du byas pa dang /_rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu byas pa dang /_ro gcig tu byas pa dang /_tshad gcig tu byas pa dang /_nam mkha' 
[\[376b.3\]]lta bur dag pa'i kha dog tu byas pa dang /_thams cad du 'gro bar byas pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad la yang dag par sems pa dang /_khong du chud par byed pa dang /_chos thams cad tha mi dad pa rab tu thob par byed pa 
[\[376b.4\]]dang /_zhing thams cad du 'gro bar bsgrub pa dang /_lus thams cad la gnas pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_phyogs thams cad kyi 'byung gnas rab tu thob par byed pa dang /_stobs thams cad tha mi dad par 
[\[376b.5\]]bsgrub pa dang /_yon tan thams cad yul mtha' yas par yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas rab tu thob par byed pa dang /_dpag tu med pa thob par byed pa dang /_rdo rje ltar 
[\[376b.6\]]brtan pa la rab tu gzhol ba dang /_dbyangs kyi yan lag tshad med pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad du phyin cing chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di 
[\[376b.7\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi nam mkha' lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa ste/_bcu pa'o/_/bzod pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'gro ba med pa'i tshul du 'gro ba med 
[\[377a\]]
[\[377a.1\]]pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo/_/'gag pa med pa'i tshul du skye ba med pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo/_/'jig pa med pa'i tshul du 'pho ba med pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo/_/ji ltar mthong ba ma yin 
[\[377a.2\]]pa'i tshul du bden pa med pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo/_/mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul du mtshan nyid gcig pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi stobs tshad med pa'i tshul du tshad med pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo/_/de 
[\[377a.3\]]bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshul du mnyam pa nyid kyi lus rab tu 'thob bo/_/dus gsum mnyam pa nyid khong du chud cing bzod pa'i tshul du tha mi dad pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo/_/mnyam pa nyid kyi mig rnam par dag pas bsgribs pa med 
[\[377a.4\]]pa'i tshul du thams cad du 'gro ba'i lus rab tu 'thob bo/_/chos thams cad ldan pa dang ma ldan pa med pa'i tshul du 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha'i lus rab tu 'thob bo/_/bsod nams zad mi shes pa'i tshul du nam mkha' ltar 
[\[377a.5\]]mtha' dang mu med pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid gcig pa'i tshul du chos nyid mnyam pa nyid thob pas zad mi shes shing thogs pa med pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/nam mkha' ltar thogs 
[\[377a.6\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul du dbyangs mtha' yas shing tshad med pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/nam mkha' ltar thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs shing rnam par dag pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/
[\[377a.7\]]nam mkha' ltar rgyun chad pa med pa'i tshul du sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa tshad med pa thams cad rab tu 'thob bo/_/nam mkha' ltar tshad med cing mthar thug pa med pa'i tshul du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams 
[\[377b\]]
[\[377b.1\]]cad tshad med pa'i zhing du byin gyis rlob pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/nam mkha' rgya mtsho'i tshul du chos thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang dag par ston pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha' ltar 'jig rten 
[\[377b.2\]]thams cad 'dzin pa'i tshul du lus thams cad 'jig pa med cing shin tu brtan pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi gdung ba thams cad kyis nam mkha' 'tshig par mi 'gyur ba'i tshul du rdo rje ltar sra zhing brtan la rno ba'i dbang 
[\[377b.3\]]po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi tshul du 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'dzin pa'i stobs la yang dag par 'byung ngo /_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[377b.4\]]chen po rnams kyi bzod pa thob pa bcu'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos don 'di nyid de bas kyang gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag la tshigs su 
[\[377b.5\]]bcad de smras pa/_/ji ltar skyes bu la la zhig_/rin chen 'byung gnas thos gyur nas/_/nor tshogs chen po bsags don du/_/rab tu dga' ba skye ba yin/_/de bzhin shes rab che ldan pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[377b.6\]]rgyal sras rnams/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mtshan/_/zab cing zhi ba rab tu nyan/_/zab pa'i chos ni thos gyur cing /_/de dag yid ni 'jigs mi 'gyur/_/de dag sems la sdangs ba med/_/skrag pa skye bar mi 'gyur 
[\[377b.7\]]ro/_/rgya chen dbyangs ni thos gyur nas/_/bzod pa'i dbyangs kyis byang chub tu/_/shes rab chen po yang dag 'jug_/de la the tsom skye ba med/_/bdag ni thams cad mkhyen par bya/_/bdag ni mi yi mgon du bya/_/chos rab 
[\[378a\]]
[\[378a.1\]]shin tu zab pa rnams/_/bdag gis sgra yi sgo nas thos/_/sgra yi rjes su 'brang bas ni/_/dga' ba'i dam pa mi 'thob ces/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos don du/_/de yi mos pa brtan pa skye/_/
[\[378a.2\]]bsam pa byang chub sems rab kyis/_/'dul zhing yongs su sgom pa byed/_/chos rnams 'khrugs par mi byed de/_/de yis dad pa rnam par 'phel/_/des ni sgra rjes 'gro ba yi/_/bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[378a.3\]]spyod la shin tu brtson byed cing /_/dbyangs kyi bzod la rab tu gnas/_/chos kyi 'byung gnas yin pas na/_/shin tu brtson pa rab tu tshol/_/brtson 'grus ldog par mi byed de/_/sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub par byed/_/
[\[378a.4\]]dbyangs tsam gyis ni gnas byed pas/_/byang chub sems la bag tsha med/_/dbyangs kyis mos pa rab tu 'thob/_/des ni rgyal ba mnyes par byed/_/skyes bu la la bsod nams rgyas gyur pas/_/gser gyi 'byung gnas chen 
[\[378a.5\]]po rnyed gyur nas/_/brgyan pa'i gnas kyi rgyan du rab sbyangs na/_/de dag lus dang mthun pa'i rgyan du byed/_/de bzhin mkhas pas chos kyi phul thos na/_/sems dang blo yangs rgya mtshor bsgyur byas shing /_/ji ltar sngon thos 
[\[378a.6\]]chos rnams rtog par byed/_/mi mthun tshul du chos la tshol mi byed/_/de dag rtogs nas shin tu mthun par spyod/_/rnam par mi sgom chos ni gang yang med/_/de dag chos rnams ji bzhin mthun byed cing /_/de bzhin de ni 
[\[378a.7\]]chos rnams khong du chud par byed/_/mkhas pa'i sems ni rnam dag skyer 'gyur te/_/dga' ba'i sems yid rnam dag gsal ba skye/_/chos kyi yid la bdag nyid che ba brtson/_/rten cing 'brel 'byung chos la rab tu 'jug_
[\[378b\]]
[\[378b.1\]]chos rnams mnyam pa nyid la de brtson te/_/dngos po rnam par bsgom la mngon par brtson/_/rgyal ba'i mdzod dang 'gal bar mi byed de/_/chos rnams mi mnyam med par rab tu shes/_/de ni bsam pa mthar thug rab brtan 
[\[378b.2\]]pas/_/rgyal ba'i byang chub ji bzhin rab tu spyod/_/ri rab bzhin du mi g.yo brtan pa yis/_/de yi bsam pa byang chub mchog la rten/_/mnyam gzhag sems dang ldan pas de brtson te/_/brtson 'grus ldan pa'i yid kyis 
[\[378b.3\]]rab tu spyod/_/bskal pa stong du spyad pa spyod byed kyang /_/de yi brtson 'grus 'jig par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di dag chos la yang dag de 'jug ste/_/rgyal ba'i rtogs bya'i gting yang rab tu rnyed/_/chos nyid zhi ba rab tu thob gyur pas/_/
[\[378b.4\]]de la 'jum pa'i yid byed gang yang med/_/dpe zla med pas ji skad gsungs pa ltar/_/de ni chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du byed/_/mi mnyam tshul du bzod pa mi skyed de/_/ye shes mnyam nyid yongs su rdzogs par sgrub/_/bde 
[\[378b.5\]]bar gshegs pas mthun par gang gsungs pa/_/de dag bzod pa'i sgo nas rab tu 'grub/_/chos rnams 'jig dang ldan pa ma yin te/_/chos nyid ji bzhin de 'dra rab tu shes/_/lha gnas 'di'i lha'i bu rnams 'dir 'dus dang /_/
[\[378b.6\]]sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su lha rnams skyes gyur pa/_/de dag zil dngar sna tshogs rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan/_/de dag khar ba'i snod gcig mngon spyod zad gyur na/_/zil dngar zhim pa de dag 'ong ba ma yin te/_/phyogs bcu kun 
[\[378b.7\]]nas zil dngar stobs pa med/_/las rnams ji lta ji bzhin lha rnams de ltar za/_/de la skye ba med de bza' ba med pa min/_/de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'i sems rab mngon skyes kyang /_/de la rdul cha'i chos kyang skyes 
[\[379a\]]
[\[379a.1\]]par gyur pa med/_/ma skyes gang yin chos de nam yang 'gag pa med/_/dam pa'i chos kyi rkyen brten mkhas pa rab tu zhugs/_/ma 'gag gang yin mi zad chos rgyud de dang de/_/chos nyid 'di yi tshul la 
[\[379a.2\]]rab tu gnas pa yin/_/tha dad ched pa'i chos dbyings 'di la rab tu 'jug_/'jig rten tha dad med pa'i rgyud kyi tshul yang shes/_/de bzhin nyid mnyam 'jig rten zhi ba'i gzhar gyur pa/_/gzhi med tha dad med pa'i yang dag 
[\[379a.3\]]mtha' shes te/_/smon lam rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'gro la phan phyir 'debs/_/rgyal sras de ni bde gshegs mkhyen la'ang mngon chags med/_/de ni dben gzhol sangs rgyas chos rnams ston pa byed/_/chos kyi shugs 
[\[379a.4\]]las 'on kyang g.yo bar 'gyur ba med/_/brda dang grangs kyi tshul gyis mngon par 'du byed de/_/'jig rten snying brtser smon lam dam pa rab tu 'debs/_/smon lam 'debs la gnas kyang stobs bcu ldan pa ste/_/
[\[379a.5\]]'gro ba ma lus kun la de ni gnas pa med/_/mkhas pa'i ye shes yongs su len dang 'dor ba spangs/_/chos dang chos kyi man ngag rnam pa'i tshul la mkhas/_/'di ni bzod pa'i dam pa ma skyes chos can te/_/des ni 
[\[379a.6\]]chos rnams zad med zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/mi skye'i tshul gyis yongs su gdams bya'i chos kyi dbyings/_/de bzhin nyid las brtan pa rnam par 'gyur ba med/_/rgyal sras byang chub don du bzod pa 'dir gnas pa/_/de la phyogs kun 
[\[379a.7\]]sangs rgyas mtha' yas lung yang ston/_/rgyal sras de la sangs rgyas mkhyen pas dbang bskur mdzad/_/phyogs bcu kun nas rab tu snang bar mngon du gnas/_/de dag chos kun rab zhi rtag tu zhi ba'i sems/_/mngon par sgrub cing dge 
[\[379b\]]
[\[379b.1\]]ba kun la 'gro ba 'god/_/dus gsum chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid de 'dra bas/_/mtshan rnams yongs su dag byas sems can 'dul ba byed/_/sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams nges par sus rtags pa/_/de dag 'jig rten sna tshogs 
[\[379b.2\]]du ma rtogs byed cing /_/'jig rten sna tshogs sgyu tshul yang dag rtogs byas nas/_/las yangs shin tu bstsags pas rnam pa sna tshogs pa/_/sems las las kyi rnam pa du ma 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de bas 'jig rten sems 
[\[379b.3\]]de sgyu ma lta bur bstan/_/de dag rnam brtags sgyu ma 'dra bas nub par 'gyur/_/srid pa'i lam rgyud ma lus sgyu 'dra yang dag smin/_/ji ltar sgyu ma'i rnam pa byin rlabs byas pa'i gzugs/_/lam gyi bzhi mdor 'jig 
[\[379b.4\]]rten phal gyi nang bstan pa/_/'gro bas mthong na de la kun kyang mos pa skyed/_/sgyu mas 'jig rten las ni gang yang 'grub mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin 'gro ba ji snyed gang rnams yod pa dag_/sgyu ma'i rang bzhin lta 
[\[379b.5\]]bu ma skyes chos nyid de/_/dngos yod dngos med de bzhin yod dang med pa dang /_/skal pa mi mnyam tshul gyi 'gro rgyud rab tu ston/_/sgyu ma'i tshul rnams shes nas sems can yongs su 'grel/_/sgyu ma lta bu yin 
[\[379b.6\]]par sems can khong du chud/_/sems can sgyu 'dra de bzhin sgyu ma sems can 'dra/_/sems can med cing sgyu ma 'dra bar 'jig rten shes/_/sems can zhing dang chos dang de bzhin dus gsum dang /_/'jig rten 
[\[379b.7\]]thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam par rab tu 'byed/_/sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur chos rnams rab rtogs pas/_/'jig rten ma lus 'di dag sgyu ma'i rnam par shes/_/skyes pa dag dang de bzhin bud med rogs pa dang /_/bu mo de 
[\[380a\]]
[\[380a.1\]]bzhin rnam par dul ba nye bar ston/_/glang po rta dang ba glang phyugs dang shing rnams dang /_/me tog 'bras bu bzang dang ldan pa'i mtsho yang ston/_/thabs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs mang bar sgyu ma'i 
[\[380a.2\]]sems/_/sna tshogs gnas la 'ang sgyu ma yongs su gnas pa med/_/sgyu ma dben la gzhol zhing shin tu zhi ba yang /_/'jig rten rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs mang po ston/_/de bzhin rgyal sras btsun pa rigs dang ldan pa 
[\[380a.3\]]rnams/_/'jig rten sgyu ma sna tshogs ji bzhin ston pa byed/_/bsgom dang rnam par bsgom pa'i dngos po'i sems kyang med/_/dngos po dngos [{]myed [,]med [}]sgyu ma ji bzhin rab tu shes/_/zhing dang sems can chos kyi rnam pa 
[\[380a.4\]]mang por bcas/_/las rnams sna tshogs rnam pas yongs su bstsags pa la/_/gnas par mi byed mngon par chags pa de bzhin med/_/chags med mtha' yi sgyu ma'i tshul ni des shes so/_/de ltar rgyal sras mkhas pa 
[\[380a.5\]]rnams/_rab tu zhi la dga' zhing spros pa med pa ste/_/gnas med sa dang yang dag ldan/_/chos dbyings gnas la de dag rab du zhugs/_/de ni chos nyid rtogs pa ste/_/brtan pa de dag rgyal ba'i sku skyes sras yin no/_/'du shes sgyu la 
[\[380a.6\]]mkhas pa ste/_/'gro ba thams cad 'du shes 'dra bar shes/_/smig rgyu'i 'du shes 'dra ba ste/_/'gro ba thams cad de ltar 'du shes phyin ci log_/'du shes rnams phye mkhas pa ste/_/de ni 'gro kun 'du shes spangs pa 
[\[380a.7\]]yin/_/sems can sna tshogs khong du chud/_/'jig rten kun gyi sna tshogs rnam pa kun dang bral/_/'jig rten 'du shes rab tu shes/_/'jig rten 'du shes med min 'du shes ldan/_/phyogs rnams 'du shes 'dra ba ste/_/
[\[380b\]]
[\[380b.1\]]sems can mtha' yas 'du shes rnam pa sna tshogs yin/_/ma nor mig dang ldan pa rnams/_/'jig rten sna tshogs 'du shes rab tu mthong /_/'jig rten smig rgyu 'dra ba ste/_/'du shes sna tshogs rnam pas 'jig rten 
[\[380b.2\]]rnam par bkod/_/'jig rten 'du shes gnas pa ste/_/de dag phyin ci log gsum rnam par spangs/_/ji ltar smig rgyu'i tshogs kyi rnams/_/'gro ba rnams la chu yi rnam par dmigs par snang /_/de la chu ni yod min 
[\[380b.3\]]yang /_/chu yi 'du shes rnam par rab tu bslu/_/de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad kyang /_/khams gsum lam rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas te/_/'du shes rnam pa smig rgyu bzhin/_/chags med yid ldan spyod yul 
[\[380b.4\]]mtha' yas so/_/'du shes thams cad rnam par spangs/_/chags med ye shes ldan zhing spros pa med pa rnams/_/'gro ba 'du shes chags gyur pa/_/'du shes bslus las brtan pa 'grel bar byed/_/nga rgyal rlom dang 
[\[380b.5\]]dregs pa spangs/_/'du shes thams cad bstsal cing 'jig rten 'dren pa byed/_/mi zad zad pa rtogs pa rnams/_/bden pa zad mi shes pa'i tshul 'di yin/_/'jig rten 'di dag thams cad rmi lam lta bur khong du chud/_
[\[380b.6\]]chos rnams thams cad rmi lam ngo bo nyid du rab tu rtogs/_/rmi lam de dag yul la mi gnas phyogs la 'ang mi gnas te/_/rmi lam lta bur 'jig rten rab tu zhi la de dag gzhol/_/rmi lam rang bzhin mkhas shing rnam par rtog med 
[\[380b.7\]]chos dang ldan/_/rmi lam rtogs pa'i yid ldan sems la 'gyur ba gang yang med/_/'jig rten kun tu rmi lam lta bur shin tu rgyu zhing spyod/_/dus gsum ma lus thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'i tshul du rtogs/_/rmi lam shi 'phyor 
[\[381a\]]
[\[381a.1\]]'gyur ba med cing skye ba de bzhin med/_/rmi lam phyogs rnams kun na yod pa ma yin med pa min/_/khams gsum rmi lam lta bur 'di la rnam rtog [{]myed [,]med [}]byas shing /_/rmi lam shin tu rtogs mkhas 
[\[381a.2\]]de dag sems la bcings pa med/_/'gro ba rmi lam rang bzhin 'dra la de dag mi gnas te/_/'jig rten 'gro ba rnam par dben la de dag brten pa med/_/'jig rten rnams la mi rtog de bzhin rnam par rtog pa med/_/rmi 
[\[381a.3\]]lam rtogs shing mkhas pa'i bzod pa'i sa ni 'di yin no/_/rmi lam 'gro ba rnams na rnam pa sna tshogs du ma snang /_/tha dad rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du bye brag rnam pa mang /_/de bzhin ye shes zla bas 'gro ba thams cad rnam par 
[\[381a.4\]]mthong /_/rmi lam sgra dang 'dra bar de dag rnam par rtogs pa med/_/rmi lam lta bu'i tshul gyis rnam pa brtan pas rab tu rtogs/_/de dag rmi lam mtshan nyid rnam 'das bskal pa mnyam pa min/_/rmi lam de dag gcig pa ma yin 
[\[381a.5\]]nam yang mang ba [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/rmi lam rnam bkod rnam par 'gro ba thams cad rab tu shes/_/de dag sems can thams cad rmi lam 'dra ba'i chos can dang /_/zhing rnams thams cad rmi 'dra de bzhin chos rnams rmi 'dra kun/_/ji ltar nyon 
[\[381a.6\]]mongs de bzhin rnam par byang ba rab tu shes/_/'jig rten rmi 'dra de la rnam par rtog par byed pa gang yang med/_/rmi lam lta bu'i spyod pas yang dag grub par gyur pa rnams/_/rmi lam lta bu'i smon lam rnam pas gnas pa med 
[\[381a.7\]]pa dag_/rmi lam lta bu'i chos rnams kun la gnas 'cha' mi byed de/_/'jig rten rmi lam 'dra la khyad par byed pa gang yang med/_/'jig rten 'di dag rmi lam lta bur 'byung bar shes shing dag_/rmi lam tshul rtogs 'gro ba kun tu mi 
[\[381b\]]
[\[381b.1\]]'jigs chos dang ldan/_/rmi lam bzhin spyod ldan pas 'jig rten kun tu chud mi za/_/ring thung kun kyang rmi lam rgyud bzhin de dag rab tu shes/_/'di ni rmi lam lta bu'i yid ldan rnams kyi bzod pa ste/_/rmi lam lta 
[\[381b.2\]]bu'i 'jig rten sems can rab tu 'dren pa byed/_/sems can rnams kyi bsam pa rtogs byas chags med ye shes can/_/sems la bcings med 'gro ba khrag khrig yongs su 'grel pa byed/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[381b.3\]]spyod pa rgya che mtha' yas/_/chos rnams mngon par bsgrubs pa yangs pa khong du chud byed/_/chos kyi chos nyid du ma'i tshul rnams khong du des chud/_/chos tshul rnam pa tha dad kun la chags pa'i sems med/_/'gro kun dbyangs 
[\[381b.4\]]kyi yan lag rnam pa ji snyed yod pa/_/de dag sgra dbyangs sgra brnyan bzhin du khong du des chud/_/sgrar brjod de dag nang na med par rab tu shes te/_/sgra rnams thams cad phyi nang med par rab tu de shes/_/sgra brnyan ji ltar rnam pa sna 
[\[381b.5\]]tshogs sgra tshul grag ste/_/rnam rtog dbyangs dang 'dra yang rnam rtog [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sgra yin/_/sgra rnams rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad de bzhin rab shes/_/sgra la mngon par chags med de bzhin rlom pa'i sems med/_/sems 
[\[381b.6\]]can kun gyi gtso bo thams cad des mthong gyur cing /_/'jig rten mgon po chos rnams gsung zhing dbyangs sgrog mdzad pas/_/mdo mang brjod du med pa rab tu gsung zhing ston kyang /_/rgyal ba'i gsung dbyangs de la de ni gnas 
[\[381b.7\]]par mi byed/_/sgra brnyan de dag ji ltar sgra yi rnam par grag kyang /_/sgra brnyan rnam pa dag la sgra rnams gang yang yod min/_/de ltar dbyangs kyi bye brag rjes 'brang chos kyi rnam pa/_/chos nyid 'jig med ldan pa rnam phye chos 
[\[382a\]]
[\[382a.1\]]la rab mkhas/_/de dag sgra dbyangs thams cad rnam par rab tu sgom ste/_/sgra rnams rnam par dbye la mkhas pas sgra rnams sel byed/_/'gro ba kun dbyangs dbyangs tshul min par rab tu shes 
[\[382a.2\]]te/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag dag pa de dag dbyangs kun rab shes/_chos rnams de dag kun la sgra med sgrar 'jug byed de/_/brjod pa khrag khrig sna tshogs rnams kyi rjes su zhugs shing /_/'gro ba thams cad sgra brnyan bzhin du 
[\[382a.3\]]mngon par ston byed/_/'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sgra yang de bzhin rab shes/_/de dag tshig tshul rjes su 'gro ba'i shes bya rtogs ldan/_/'jig rten 'di dag thams cad sgra bsnyan yan lag 'drar shes/_/dbyangs kyi rang 
[\[382a.4\]]bzhin rnam par dag par khong du chud de/_/sgra yi mtshan nyid ji bzhin 'jig rten de bzhin shes so/_/ji ltar sgra rnams chos rnams du ma rnam par ston byed/_/sgra yi rnam rtog sna tshogs dbyangs kyi yan lag kun ldan/_/
[\[382a.5\]]'jig rten ma lus kun dbyangs mtshan nyid ci 'dra de bzhin/_/'gro ba kun gyi mtshan nyid rgyal ba'i sras kyis rab shes/_/bzod pa 'di 'dra'i stobs kyi mkhas gyur dpa' bo de dag_/sgra dbyangs sna tshogs 'jig rten kun tu yongs 
[\[382a.6\]]su sbyong ste/_/dus gsum shes pa'i blo dang ldan pas sgra yi tshul shes/_/'on kyang rnam rtog gnas la de dag gnas mi 'cha'o/_/zhi ba'i yid ldan 'di ltar byang chub brtson/_/'jig rten phan pa'i don du byang chub tshol/_/
[\[382a.7\]]chos nyid rab tu zhi la rtag tu 'jug_/brtan pa 'jig rten rnams la rtog mi byed/_/mi sgul mthu can ye shes stobs ldan pas/_/chos nyid dngos med zhi ba ji bzhin du/_/'jig rten thams cad ma lus des shes te/_/
[\[382b\]]
[\[382b.1\]]de la gzhol zhing phan par de spyod do/_/'gro ba kun la nam yang mi gnas te/_/'gro ba kun dang 'bral bar byed ma yin/_/'gro ba kun la de ni gnas mi 'cha'o/_/de la gnas pa gang yang yod pa min/_/'gro ba chos nyid rang bzhin ldan par shes/_/rang bzhin 
[\[382b.2\]]de la'ang gnas par mi byed do/_/'gro ba 'di la 'ang de ni rten mi byed/_/'gro ba'i gnas las yongs su grol ba yin/_/'jig rten gnas pa ji snyed gang yang rung /_/de dag rang bzhin tshul rnams kun shes te/_/gnyis 
[\[382b.3\]]med chos kyang bstan pas rab tu shes/_/gnyis med de la 'ang de ni gnas mi 'cha'/_/de ni 'jig rten rnams dang ldan gyur kyang /_/'jig rten lam la gnas pa'i sems med de/_/'jig rten phyi rol spyad pa 
[\[382b.4\]]spyod pa min/_/chos kun ye shes rang bzhin yin par shes/_/chu la gzugs brnyan ji ltar snang ba rnams/_/nang na mi 'dug phyi na mi gnas pa/_/de bzhin brtan pa byang chub don du spyod/_/'jig rten rnam 
[\[382b.5\]]sgom 'jig rten yod pa [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/'jig rten skye med grol ba ma yin te/_/'jig rten brjod par mi nus gyur pa min/_/'jig rten phyi rol rgyu ba 'ang ma yin te/_/'gro ba 'di ni gzugs brnyan ji bzhin no/_/de ltar 
[\[382b.6\]]zab pa'i tshul las byung bas na/_/dag cing 'od gsal dri med sems dang ldan/_/ye shes gzhol bas chos kyi sgron ma ste/_/smon lam kun las yongs kyang ldog pa med/_/de ni 'jig rten [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]par mi byed de/_/
[\[382b.7\]]ye shes mthar thug mtha' yang mi dmigs so/_/skye dgu mtha' yas kun la bde byed de/_/'gro ba kun las chags pa rnam par bzlog_/dpe med rnams kyi zab pa nyid la ltos/_/'gro ba kun gyi don du rab tu brtson/_/
[\[383a\]]
[\[383a.1\]]bzod pa 'di ni ye shes gzhol ba ste/_/de ltar gnas shing spyad pa de 'dra spyod/_/chos gnas rnam par dben la rab tu zhugs/_/sprul pa de 'dra kun dang ldan gyur cing /_/sprul pa'i dngos la 
[\[383a.2\]]spyod pa rjes song bas/_/sprul pa'i dngos po nam yang gtong ba [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/de ni byang chub spyod pa'i sa mchog tu/_/sprul pa'i dngos ldan rjes su spyad pas na/_/sprul pa ci 'drar rnam pa kun zhi ba/_/sprul pa de 'dra'i tshul la rnam par gnas/_/de 
[\[383a.3\]]bas 'gro kun sprul par rab tu shes/_/skye dgu'i las kyi rnam pa mtha' yas pa/_/sprul pa'i dngos dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam/_/sprul pa'i mtha' rtogs shin tu rnam par dben/_/mi yi mgon po thams cad sprul 
[\[383a.4\]]par shes/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas ji snyed gang bzhugs pa/_/smon lam gang btab spyod pa spyad pa'i rgyu/_/des ni mi gtso thams cad sprul pa yin/_/gang gis sems can rnam dag sprul pa yi/_/byams dang 
[\[383a.5\]]snying rje chen po shin tu yangs/_/de ltar sprul pa rnams phye shes pa ni/_/de dag byin gyi rlabs 'phrul snang byed pa'o/_/de dag 'jig rten rnam par rtog pa med/_/sprul pa'i dngos tshul 'gro ba thams cad shes/_/
[\[383a.6\]]'gro ba'i las kyi rnam pa gang yod pa'i/_/'jig rten de dag sprul pa'i sas bsgrubs pa'o/_/sprul pa'i mdzod mang rnam par phye ba la/_/zhugs shing byang chub spyad pa spyod byas pa/_/de dag sna tshogs bye brag rnam pa mang /_/
[\[383a.7\]]'jig rten las kyi rnam pas byas ba bzhin/_/sprul pa rnam par rtog pa med pa ste/_/sprul pa nam yang yongs su rtog pa med/_/rtog dang rnam par rtog pas yid dben pa/_/sprul pa bzhin du de dag spyod pa yin/_/
[\[383b\]]
[\[383b.1\]]sprul pa rgya mtsho shes pas khong du chud/_/sprul pa'i dngos pos 'jig rten rgyas kyang 'debs/_/sprul pa mi gnas 'gro ba med pa ste/_/sprul pa ji bzhin de bzhin ye shes so/_/de ni nam mkha' gnas med ji bzhin du/_/bzod pa 
[\[383b.2\]]bcu pa'i tshul la rab tu 'jug_/de ni mkha' 'drar chos rnams kun byas shing /_/sems can sems can med par nam mkha' shes/_/de ni nam mkha' lta bu'i shes ldan te/_/de la chags pa gang yang yod pa min/_/ji 
[\[383b.3\]]ltar nam mkha' sna tshogs ma yin pa/_/de ltar 'jig rten chags med rab tu shes/_/de ni bzod pa mkha' 'dra'i mthu ldan pas/_/mi zad nam mkha' bzhin du zad pa med/_/de ni mkha' 'dra'i spyod yul thob gyur kyang /_/
[\[383b.4\]]mkha' la rnam par rtog pa mi byed do/_/nam mkha' la ni ngo bo nyid med de/_/nam mkha'i sa mtshams nam yang chad pa med/_/mkha' la bye brag tha dad yod pa min/_/de ni mkha' 'dra'i blo yi stobs dang ldan/_/
[\[383b.5\]]mkha' la mthar thug rtsa ba med pa ste/_/nam mkha' la ni mtha' dbus yod pa min/_/mkha' la rnam pa tha dad de bzhin med/_/ye shes stobs kyang nam mkha' de dang 'dra/_/brtan pas de 'dra'i chos nyid rab shes 
[\[383b.6\]]te/_/ji ltar nam mkha' skyes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_/ji ltar nam mkha' 'gag pa med tshul du/_/de 'dra'i chos nyid dam pa des thob bo/_/nam mkha' 'dra ba'i chos la de gnas shing /_/phyogs rnams kun gyi 'gro ba kun 
[\[383b.7\]]ston to/_/bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad bcom byas shing /_/mkha' 'dra'i bzod pa'i tshul la shin tu brtan/_/des ni mkha' 'drar mtshan nyid med pa kun/_/'jig rten ji snyed mtshan nyid tha dad pa/_/mtshan nyid 
[\[384a\]]
[\[384a.1\]]mtshan 'das mtshan ma med tshul du/_/kun kyang yang dag mkha' dang 'dra bar byed/_/gang la dus gsum thams cad gnas pa yin/_/chos nyid mkha' 'dra des ni shes byas shing /_/de ni rnam par 
[\[384a.2\]]phye ba gcig tshul gyis/_/'gro ba thams cad nam mkha'i tshul du shes/_/de ni nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes lus/_/de ni nam mkha' lta bu'i sgra dbyangs ldan/_/de ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin lus can te/_/ye shes nam 
[\[384a.3\]]mkha' lta bu zhi bas gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_/bzod pa bcu po 'di dag de dag gi_/bzod pa'i stobs la de dag rab gnas pa/_/'jig rten phan pa'i don du bshad cing bstan/_/'di'i tshul la 
[\[384a.4\]]brtan pa bslabs pa rnams/_/ye shes 'di la shin tu mthu che ste/_/chos kyi mthu dang ye shes mthur yang ldan/_/byang chub tshul rjes bsam pa'i sems dang ldan/_/bzod pa 'di yi tshul la zhugs pa ni/_/ye 
[\[384a.5\]]shes stobs kyi chags pa med la 'jug_/'jig rten lhar bcas de yi zil gyis non/_/'jig rten dag tu 'khor lo bla med bskor/_/de dag spyod tshul shin tu rgya che bas/_/de dag tshad ni 'jig rten kun na med/_/
[\[384a.6\]]skyes bu 'dul ba dpe zla med pa yi/_/ye shes rgya mtsho'i tshul la de dag zhugs/_/bdag med sems kyi 'jig rten spyod pa'i tshe/_/chos kyi rnam dag gyur pa'i yid ldan pas/_/brtan pa de dag 'di 'dra'i chos la 'jug_/
[\[384a.7\]]chos nyid des kyang 'jig rten tshim par byed/_/'gro ba'i tshad ni thams cad shes par nus/_/sems can ma lus thams cad bgrad par nus/_/rdul gcig rtse la ma lus zhing bgrad nus/_/mkhas pa'i yon tan de 
[\[384b\]]
[\[384b.1\]]dag mtha' yas so/_/sangs rgyas sras po skyes bu chen po la/_/bzod pa bcu po 'di dag yod pa ni/_/ye shes spyod yul sgor yang 'gro kun gyis/_/tshad du bgrang bar nus pa yod pa min/_/shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/
[\[384b.2\]]sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/_bzod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/_sum cu lnga pa'o//_//[{D44-36}]sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po nyi shu dgu pa/_
[\[384b.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rgyal pos/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das grangs ma mchis pa shin tu bstan pa zhes bgyi ba dang /_grangs ma mchis pa'i grangs ma mchis pa 
[\[384b.4\]]zhes bgyi ba de/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na grangs ma mchis pa bstan pa lags/_tshad ma mchis pa dang /_mu ma mchis pa dang /_kun tu mtha' yas pa dang /_bgrang du mi rung ba dang /_mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang /_
[\[384b.5\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /_brjod du ma mchis pa'i yang brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/_ji ltar bstan par 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems 
[\[384b.6\]]dpa' sems kyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kye skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so/_/skyes bu dam pa de ltar khyod kyis 'jig rten thams cad grangs kyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 
[\[384b.7\]]kyis mkhyen pa'i don 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la zhu bar bsam pa legs so legs so/_/de bas na skyes bu dam pa legs par nyon la rab tu yid la zungs shig dang bstan 
[\[385a\]]
[\[385a.1\]]par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[385a.2\]]stsal to/_/skyes bu dam pa de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_brgya stong phrag brgyan bye ba'o/_/bye ba bye ba na khod khod do/_/khod khod khod khod na tha dgu'o/_/tha dgu tha dgu na khrig khrig go/_/khrig khrig khrig khrig na thams thams 
[\[385a.3\]]so/_/thams thams thams thams na myad myid do/_/myad myid myad myid na gang ya'o/_/gang ya gang ya na ban bun no/_/ban bun ban bun na phyar phyur ro/_/phyar phyur phyar phyur na lcag lcig go_/lcag lcig 
[\[385a.4\]]lcag lcig na byang bying ngo /_/byang bying byang bying na chem chem mo/_/chem chem chem chem na phyal phyol lo/_/phyal phyol phyal phyol na khyud khyud do/_/khyud khyud khyud khyud na zar zer ro/_/zar zer zar zer na khrib khrib bo/_/
[\[385a.5\]]khrib khrib khrib khrib na ya gangs so/_/ya gangs ya gangs na cho ma'o/_/cho ma cho ma na khram khrim mo/_/khram khrim khram khrim na nab nub bo/_/nab nub nab nub na sang sang ngo /_/sang sang sang sang na brgyud yas so/_/
[\[385a.6\]]brgyud yas brgyud yas na gtang yas so/_/gtang yas gtang yas na bkra yar ro/_/bkra yar bkra yar na gsa' yas so/_/gsa' yas gsa' yas na mtshungs med do/_/mtshungs med mtshungs med na lam 
[\[385a.7\]]lum mo/_/lam lum lam lum na yal yol lo/_/yal yol yal yol na khral khrul lo/_/khral khrul khral khrul na thud thud do/_/thud thud thud thud na bsam phyod do/_/bsam phyod bsam phyod na brang breng 
[\[385b\]]
[\[385b.1\]]ngo /_/brang breng brang breng na bgrod yas so/_/bgrod yas bgrod yas na bsngo yas so/_/bsngo yas bsngo yas na zang yag go_/zang yag zang yag na 'phro bkye'o/_/'phro bkye 'phro bkye na rtse 'phyo'o/_/rtse 'phyo 
[\[385b.2\]]rtse 'phyo na yong tan no/_/yong tan yong tan na 'brug g.yos so/_/'brug g.yos 'brug g.yos na sang yal lo/_/sang yal sang yal na thing yug go_/thing yug thing yug na yid 'phyo'o/_/yid 'phyo yid 'phyo 
[\[385b.3\]]na nab neb bo/_/nab neb nab neb na khrag thams so/_/khrig thams khrig thams na yal yal lo/_/yal yal yal yal na bgrang yas so/_/bgrang yas bgrang yas na thug yal lo/_/thug yal thug yal 
[\[385b.4\]]na shang shang ngo /_/shang shang shang shang na yag yag go_/yag yag yag yag na tham thim mo/_/tham thim tham thim na rlom bsnyal lo/_/rlom bsnyal rlom bsnyal na gzhal 'phyos so/_/gzhal 'phyos gzhal 'phyos na 
[\[385b.5\]]gzhal yal lo/_/gzhal yal gzhal yal na gzhal med do/_/gzhal med gzhal med na gzhal 'khor to/_/gzhal 'khor gzhal 'khor na gzhal thim mo/_/gzhal thim gzhal thim na gar gzhal lo/_/
[\[385b.6\]]gar gzhal gar gzhal na gzhal sangs so/_/gzhal sangs gzhal sangs na gzhal thag go_/gzhal thag gzhal thag na gzhal phul lo/_/gzhal phul gzhal phul na gzhal zhi'o/_/gzhal zhi gzhal zhi na 'phyo 'gyur ro/_/
[\[385b.7\]]'phyo 'gyur 'phyo 'gyur na nyar nyer ro/_/nyar nyer nyar nyer na phyag phyig go_/phyag phyig phyag phyig na zal zul lo/_/zal zul zal zul na sal sal lo/_/sal sal sal sal na g.yo ldeg go_/g.yo ldeg g.yo ldeg na 
[\[386a\]]
[\[386a.1\]]phan phun no/_/phan phun phan phun na brnad ya'o/_/brnad ya brnad ya na rem 'drol lo/_/rem 'drol rem 'drol na rdzi dad do/_/rdzi dad rdzi dad na rdzi rdul lo/_/rdzi rdul rdzi rdul na phun yol lo/_
[\[386a.2\]]phun yol phun yol na ngad ngad do/_/ngad ngad ngad ngad na bgrang brtsi'o/_/bgrang brtsi bgrang brtsi na zab bgrang ngo /_/zab bgrang zab bgrang na dga' rkyang ngo /_/dga' rkyang dga' rkyang na gzhung 'dal lo/_/gzhung 'dal gzhung 
[\[386a.3\]]'dal na khrug phyad do/_/khrug phyad khrug phyad na 'ol phyod do/_/'ol phyod 'ol phyod na gdab yas so/_/gdab yas gdab yas na gcal yas so/_/gcal yas gcal yas na bgrang yas so/_/bgrang yas bgrang yas na 
[\[386a.4\]]byim 'phyo'o/_/byim 'phyo byim 'phyo na yam me'o/_/yam me yam me na bsnyal yas so/_/bsnyal yas bsnyal yas na ldab ldeb bo/_/ldab ldeb ldab ldeb na 'phan chad do/_/'phan chad 'phan chad na phang phung ngo /_/phang phung 
[\[386a.5\]]phang phung na khe'u tshang ngo /_/khe'u tshang khe'u tshang na zhung zung ngo /_/zhung zung zhung zung na mchog yal lo/_/mchog yal mchog yal na mtha' rtul to/_/mtha' rtul mtha' rtul na yun 'gyangs so/_/yun 'gyangs yun 'gyangs 
[\[386a.6\]]na bun lob bo/_/bun lob bun lob na lam lom mo/_/lam lom lam lom bsnyad yas so/_/bsnyad yas bsnyad yas na lang ling ngo /_/lang ling lang ling na ljab ljib po/_/ljab ljib ljab ljib na mi brtsal 
[\[386a.7\]]to/_/mi brtsal mi brtsal na 'byam yas so/_/'byam yas 'byam yas na nga 'grang ngo /_/nga 'grang nga 'grang na smos yal lo/_/smos yal smos yal na bkra chal lo/_/bkra chal bkra chal na lo rgyas so/_/lo rgyas lo 
[\[386b\]]
[\[386b.1\]]rgyas na 'bum rdib bo/_/'bum rdib 'bum rdib na gam gum mo/_/gam gum gam gum na la lo'o/_/la lo la lo na bgrang 'phyos so/_/bgrang 'phyos bgrang 'phyos na bgrang 'phyos la bsgres pa'o/_/bgrang 'phyos la bsgres 
[\[386b.2\]]pa bgrang 'phyos la bsgres na dpag yas so/_/dpag yas dpag yas na dpag yas la bsgres pa'o/_/dpag yas la bsgres pa dpag yas la bsgres na yal phyong ngo /_/yal phyong yal phyong na yal phyong la bsgres 
[\[386b.3\]]pa'o/_/yal phyong la bsgres pa yal phyong la bsgres na mu yal to/_/mu yal mu yal na mu yal la bsgres pa'o/_/mu yal la bsgres pa mu yal la bsgres na bgrang yol lo/_/bgrang yol bgrang yol na bgrang 
[\[386b.4\]]yol la bsgres pa'o/_/bgrang yol la bsgres pa bgrang yol la bsgres na mi 'jal to/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jal [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jam na [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jal la bsgres pa'o/_/mi 'jal la bsgres pa mi 'jal la bsgres na bsam phyod do/_/bsam 
[\[386b.5\]]phyod bsam phyod na bsam phyod la bsgres pa'o/_/bsam phyod la bsgres pa bsam phyod la bsgres na mtha' 'byam mo/_/mtha' 'byam mtha' 'byam na dpag thag go_/dpag thag dpag thag na dpag thag la bsgres pa'o/_/
[\[386b.6\]]dpag thag la bsgres pa dpag thag la bsgres na brjod du med pa'o/_/brjod du med pa brjod du med pa na brjod du med pa la bsgres pa'o/_/brjod du med pa la bsgres pa brjod du med pa la bsgres na brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres 
[\[386b.7\]]pa shin tu bstan pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rgyal po la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_brjod du med pa'i brjod du med pa ni/_/brjod du med pa thams cad 'tshang bar 
[\[387a\]]
[\[387a.1\]]'gyur/_/brjod du med pa bskal par brjod byas kyang /_/brjod du med la mthar thug gang yang med/_/brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas zhing gi rnams/_/thams cad bshig ste rdul du kun blags shing /_/
[\[387a.2\]]gcig rtse la'ang gcig po brjod med par/_/thams cad brjod du med par rab tu 'jug_/zhing rnams brjod du med pa'i brjod med pa/_/skad cig sems kyis kun kyang rab tu 'jig_/skad cig re rer 'jig pa brjod du med/_/
[\[387a.3\]]'jig pas bskal pa mang po zad par byed/_/dbye ba'i bye brag dbye ba brjod du med/_/rdul la 'jug pa brjod du med pa ste/_/bgrang ba'i tshul gyis brjod du med pa yi/_/bskal pa brjod du med pa zad par byed/_/rdul dang rdul 
[\[387a.4\]]la mtshan nyid brjod du med/_/brjod du med pa'i rdul rnams kun bzung ste/_/bskal pa kun tu bzang po bstod byas kyang /_/kun tu bzang po de bsngags mthar mi 'jug_/brjod du med pa'i kun tu bzang po rnams/_/skra 
[\[387a.5\]]rtse re re kun la yang dag 'jug_/skra rtse gcig bzhin yul rnams kun la ste/_/chos dbyings ma lus ji snyed de bzhin no/_/skra rtse re rer zhing gi khams kyi rnams/_/brjod du med par yang dag 'dzud par byed/_/mkha' 
[\[387a.6\]]dbyings skra yi rtse mos gzhal du rung /_/zhing rnams thams cad brjod du med pa'o/_/skra rtse de la sangs rgyas zhing gi rnams/_/rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par phye ba mang /_/bskal pa mi mthun zhing rnams brjod du med/_/
[\[387a.7\]]bskal pa mthun pa'i zhing yang brjod du med/_/skra rtse gcig po de la brjod med pa'i/_/zhing rnams dag pa brjod du med pa dang /_/sna tshogs rgyan rnams brjod du med pa 'god/_/rnam pa du ma tha dad brjod du med/_/ming gi 
[\[387b\]]
